随着时间推移增至最大

Text: Are you sure you want to <action> <name>?

NewTranslation: 每个游客家庭产生的收入

Text: Do not count money above the cap
NewTranslation: 你的工资只有这么么多！

Text: Activate to allow citizens to take food from this building.

每个码头额外提供的船只

Text: Initial state of the *free* upgrades. (Paid upgrades are always on when bought)
NewTranslation: *免费*更新的初始状态。(付费升级功能需购买后使用)

Text: <red>This upgrade is no longer available in this era.</red>
NewTranslation: <red>无法在这个时期激活这项升级项目</red>
任务中的最小工作人数

Text: The building is damaged. You can restore it or salvage what remains.
NewTranslation: 建筑损坏。你可以修复或抢救剩余部分。

Text: Are you sure you want to cancel the construction? You will get <refund> back.
NewTranslation: 是否确定取消建造？你将获得<refund>返回。

Text: Here lie the ruins of a run-down building. You can rebuild it or replace the ruins with another building.
NewTranslation: 这里列出了倒塌的建筑。你能够重建或建造其他建筑。

Text: Enabled during the World Wars era
NewTranslation: 世界大战时期方可使用

Text: This building is on fire. A Police Station with Fire Brigade upgrade is needed to extinguish it.
NewTranslation: 这个建筑物着火了，欲灭火附近必须有进行过“消防队”升级的警察局。

Text: (Low Food) I can't find food on a tropical island. Robinson would laugh at me.
NewTranslation: (口多食寡)天呐，在这岛上我竟找不到一丁点儿的食物，鲁大师会嘲笑我的。

Text: (Low Food) I wonder why they call it "junk food". It's so much better than what I eat these days.
NewTranslation: (口多食寡)为什么他们把这个叫做“垃圾食品”呢？这比我这几天吃的东西好多了！！！

Text: (Low Food) I'm on the perfect weight loss diet. Still, I need something to eat.
NewTranslation: (口多食寡)看呐，我正在进绝食减肥…咕~…好吧，我还是需要吃点东西的…

Text: (Low Food) They say leather boots are tasty...
NewTranslation: (口多食寡)据说皮鞋这种东西，煮煮还是很美味的…

Text: (Low Food) I'm so hungry, I could eat a llama.
NewTranslation: (口多食寡)我饿得能吃下一整头羊驼。

Text: (Low Food) I almost forgot how good food tastes like.
NewTranslation: (口多食寡)食物是什么东西？能吃么？

Text: (Low Food) I'm on a rum diet. I've already lost several days.
NewTranslation: (口多食寡)从星期一开始，我就在用朗姆酒节食…你说…今天是星期一…不是昨天么…

Text: (Low Food) Just give me food and forget I'm here.
NewTranslation: (口多食寡)你们先走吧，只要给我点吃的就够了。我很快就会追上你们的…

Text: (High Food) My stomach hurts no more.
(High Food) I should eat less, but then I'll be less happy.
NewTranslation: (含哺鼓腹)或许我该少吃点，但那样就不幸福了。

Text: (High Food) I can't believe that once I would have eaten my own shoes.
NewTranslation: (含哺鼓腹)真不敢相信我居然曾经饿得把自己鞋子都吃了。

Text: (High Food) Presidente cares for us! Otherwise, I would starve.
NewTranslation: (含哺鼓腹)感谢总统的关心！不然的话，我就会被饿死。

Text: (High Food) Just give me food and forget I'm here. Oops, you already did.
NewTranslation: (含哺鼓腹)只要给我点吃的就够了…额，已经给过了。

Text: (High Food) I shall never think about all the innocent vegetables that died to satisfy my hunger.
NewTranslation: (含哺鼓腹)我从没想过会有这么多无辜的蔬菜因我而死亡。

Text: (High Food) My stomach stopped auditioning for the opera.
NewTranslation: (含哺鼓腹)我的胃不再唱歌剧了。

Text: (Low Health) Man, the healthcare here is killing me!
NewTranslation: (奄奄一息)迦维兰:来人呐，这里有个“怪物”，呃，是医生，要杀了我。

Text: (Low Health) Forget the doctors! No healthcare is the best healthcare.
NewTranslation: (奄奄一息)忘记医生吧，没有医疗就是最好的医疗。

Text: (Low Health) I can swear I saw a hospital somewhere here.
NewTranslation: (奄奄一息)我发誓我肯定在哪见过一家医院。

Text: (Low Health) A doctor would have told me to go home and drink plenty of fluids. Should I listen?
NewTranslation: (奄奄一息)医生告诉我回家多喝点水。我应听他的么？
(奄奄一息)我觉得我还能…抢…救下…

Text: (High Health) Unbelievable! Doctors do know how to heal you.
NewTranslation: (活蹦乱跳)难以置信！医生竟然知道该怎么治好你！！！

Text: (High Health) Tropico healthcare makes me laugh out of happiness.
NewTranslation: (活蹦乱跳)海岛医疗让我“惊声尖笑”。

Text: (High Health) All the doctors in Tropico could not heal my hypochondria. I'm happy because they still try.
NewTranslation: (活蹦乱跳)岛上所有的医生治不好我的忧郁症，但他们仍在尝试，对此我感到欣慰。

Text: (High Health) Our healthcare is so good! Doctors threat me for symptoms I don't even have.
NewTranslation: (活蹦乱跳)我们的医疗真好啊。医生甚至查出了一些我没有的病。

Text: (Low Fun) I am dying of boredom down here!
NewTranslation: (百无聊赖)我要在这里无聊死了！

Text: (Low Fun) Boredom is killing me slowly!
NewTranslation: (百无聊赖)无聊要慢慢杀了我。

Text: (Low Fun) Next April Fools' Day greatest joke will be the lack of entertainment.
NewTranslation: (百无聊赖)在下个愚人节，最大的笑话将是缺少笑话。

Text: (Low Fun) It's sad when there is no fun in the entire Tropico.
NewTranslation: (百无聊赖)真可悲，整个岛都太无聊了。

Text: (Low Fun) I wonder what ants do when they get bored...
NewTranslation: (百无聊赖)我想知道蚂蚁无聊会干啥。

Text: (Low Fun) What fun! Life in Tropico is entertaining enough for everyone.
NewTranslation: (百无聊赖)呵呵，在岛上的生活真有趣，呵呵…

Text: (High Fun) The entertainment was nice. Although, more fun won't hurt anyone.
NewTranslation: (饶有兴趣)这里娱乐服务非常好。当然，玩多不伤身。

Text: (High Fun) That was fun! Now, if I can find myself some llama riding ninjas!
NewTranslation: (饶有兴趣)好有趣，不过如果我能找到一些骑着忍者的羊驼就更好了。

Text: (High Fun) I have heard about tapir wrestling before; always wanted to try it myself.
NewTranslation: (饶有兴趣)曾听说有人和狼摔跤，我也好想试试。
(饶有兴趣)总之，这里到处都很有趣。

Text: (High Fun) I had so much fun in that one establishment. I will rent a chair inside.
NewTranslation: (饶有兴趣)我在那里玩的真嗨啊。我干脆租个椅子坐那里得了。

Text: (Low Safety) The crime here is so bad! When I forgot my keys, a burglar had to let me in!
NewTranslation: (人人自危)这里的治安真差啊。那次我忘带钥匙了，结果一个小偷把门给我打开了。

Text: (Low Safety) Crime safety? What crime safety?
NewTranslation: (人人自危)“犯罪安全保障”。保障什么犯罪安全？

Text: (Low Safety) I am going to fulfill my long-term dream of stealing a llama and conquering Tropico!
NewTranslation: (人人自危)我要去实现我长久以来的梦想了-偷只骆驼然后征服海岛。

Text: (Low Safety) I have heard of policemen, of course. Never seen one, though.
NewTranslation: (人人自危)警察？挺耳熟的，是一种传说中的生物么。

Text: (Low Safety) We have the best police! The one no one ever sees!
NewTranslation: (人人自危)我们有最好的警察，尽管从来没人见过…

Text: (Low Safety) I feel more secure out in the wild.
NewTranslation: (人人自危)我觉得还是在野外更安全点。

Text: (High Safety) I never think about crime.
NewTranslation: (夜不闭户)犯罪是什么？可以吃么？

Text: (High Safety) There are Policemen everywhere! Someone should sell donuts.
NewTranslation: (夜不闭户)这里的治安比龙宵宫好多了，到处都有警察，都有人敢卖甜甜圈了

Text: (High Safety) Let me find some pirates. I want to see how police officers handcuff a one armed man.
NewTranslation: (夜不闭户)让我找到一些海盗吧。我想看看警察是怎么逮捕一个武装分子的。

Text: (High Safety) The police protect me on the street but who protects me from my boss?
NewTranslation: (夜不闭户)警察在街上保护我。但谁能在老板面前保护我。

Text: (High Safety) I feel secure on the street. The lack of traffic lights doesn't bother me at all.
NewTranslation: (夜不闭户)我在街上感觉很安全。哪怕没有交通信号灯也是一样。

Text: (High Safety) The police want to interview me. Strange, I didn't even apply for a job.
NewTranslation: (夜不闭户)警察局想采访我。奇怪。我甚至没应聘过工作。

Text: (High Safety) At last, a country where pigeons get arrested for indecent behavior.
NewTranslation: (夜不闭户)至少在这个国家里，哪怕是鸽子也可能因为举止不雅而被逮捕。

Text: (Low Liberty) I must remain silent. Anything I say can and will be used against me.
NewTranslation: (池鱼笼鸟)“清风不识字，何事乱翻书”，该死，我都说了些什么…

Text: (Low Liberty) I saw the plans for our own Statue of Liberty. It has surveillance tower on top.
NewTranslation: (池鱼笼鸟)我在我们的自由女神像顶端也看到了监视设备。

Text: (Low Liberty) I'm waiting for someone to tell me where to go.
NewTranslation: (池鱼笼鸟)我在等人告诉我哪里能去哪里不能去。

Text: (Low Liberty) Hey, give me some privacy!
NewTranslation: (池鱼笼鸟)嘿！能不能给留我点隐私。

Text: (Low Liberty) They are trying to silence me, but I will prevail.
NewTranslation: (池鱼笼鸟)他们想让我沉默。但我会反抗的。

Text: (Low Liberty) I dream of a time when I will be able to speak my mind freely. No one will close my mouth then.
NewTranslation: (池鱼笼鸟)我有一个梦想，有一天我能随意说出自己的想法，而不会有人使我闭嘴。

Text: (Low Liberty) I am free to die as a free man.
(High Liberty) I feel as free as a bird.
NewTranslation: (安闲自在)我想鸟儿一样自由。

Text: (High Liberty) I am free to complain in any way I like.
NewTranslation: (安闲自在)我可以用任何方式自由吐槽。

Text: (High Liberty) Presidente gives us so much freedom. I wonder what his secret plan is.
NewTranslation: (安闲自在)总统给了我们这么多自由，我很好奇他的秘密计划到底是什么。

Text: (High Liberty) I have the right to speak. Still, no one listens.
NewTranslation: (安闲自在)我有权发言，但仍没人听。

Text: (High Liberty) At last, a country where no one wants to imprison me for speaking my mind.
NewTranslation: (安闲自在)最后，没人禁锢我脑海里的想法了。

Text: (Low Faith) I believe I can fly... and there are not enough priests to prove me wrong.
NewTranslation: (红尘客梦)我相信我能飞…但是没有足够的牧师来证明我是错的。

Text: (Low Faith) I am praying to God for a new cathedral where I can pray for Presidente's health.
NewTranslation: (红尘客梦)我向上帝祈祷一个新的教堂，好让我可以为总统的健康祈福。

Text: (Low Faith) If I start talking to God on the street, they will put me in an asylum... Oh, are there asylums in Tropico?
NewTranslation: (红尘客梦)如果我在街上讨论上帝，我会被送进精神病院…对了，海岛上有精神病院吗…

Text: (Low Faith) I want to hear all about Jesus. He is such a cool guy!
NewTranslation: (红尘客梦)我想听听耶稣的所有故事，他是那么酷的一个人。

Text: (Low Faith) I need a place to confess my sins and forget about them.
NewTranslation: (红尘客梦)我想要一个地方来忏悔我的罪过，然后，忘了它们。

Text: (Low Faith) Just stick a cross in the ground and call it a temple, already!
NewTranslation: (红尘客梦)在地上插上一个十字架就可以叫做教堂了，好啦，完工。

Text: (High Faith) I visited God in his home.
NewTranslation: (大彻大悟)我在上帝家里拜访了他。

Text: (High Faith) A priest gave me his blessing to become the next Presidente!
NewTranslation: (大彻大悟)牧师祝福我成为下一个总统。

Text: (High Faith) My priest is a good man. He always gives me a piece of bread and a sip of wine.
NewTranslation: (大彻大悟)我的牧师是个好人，他总是给我面包和酒。

Text: (High Faith) Tropicans are firm believers. We all believe in El Presidente.
NewTranslation: (大彻大悟)海岛人都是坚定的信徒，我们都相信总统。

Text: (High Faith) Churches are such a cool place to visit during the hot Tropican summer.
NewTranslation: (大彻大悟)教堂在海岛夏天是一个不错的去处。

Text: (Low Happiness) How can the life in such a paradise be so sad?
NewTranslation: (抑郁寡欢)在伊甸园里，我的生活不可能那么悲哀。

Text: (Low Happiness) I am not happy. I may soon find myself some firepower and go party with Presidente.
NewTranslation: (抑郁寡欢)我一点也不高兴，或许我该弄点弹药然后找总统谈谈。

Text: (Low Happiness) I just want food, home, work, fun, health, faith... Is it that much for you, Almighty?
NewTranslation: (抑郁寡欢)全能的主啊，我只要食物。家。工作。乐趣。健康。信任…呃，我是不是要的太多了。

Text: (Low Happiness) Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering... but El Presidente cares for us.
NewTranslation: (抑郁寡欢)生活充满了痛苦，孤独和无奈…但至少还有总统关心我们。

Text: (Low Happiness) I am sad and I need a bit of cheering up! A good disaster, maybe?
NewTranslation: (抑郁寡欢)我现在好难过需要一点刺激来振奋下，或许一场灾难就不错

Text: (Low Happiness) I am starting to dislike everything. Tropico is falling these days.
NewTranslation: (抑郁寡欢)我开始讨厌所有东西，这几天连海岛都开始下沉了

Text: (Low Happiness) I am sad, hurt, angry, mad, disappointed...  the usual.
NewTranslation: (抑郁寡欢)我很悲伤，疯狂，生气，失望…像往常一样。

Text: (High Happiness) There is no place like Tropico in the entire world!
NewTranslation: (笑逐颜开)世界上没什么地方能像海岛一样美好。

Text: (High Happiness) Keep me happy and I will not get sick, or starve, or feel bored again.
NewTranslation: (笑逐颜开)让我一直高兴，我就不会再生病，饥饿和无聊了。

Text: (High Happiness) I am as happy as a llama chewing wheat. People say I even look like one!
NewTranslation: (笑逐颜开)我高兴得就像一头正在吃草的羊驼，额，人们说我确实很像！

Text: (High Happiness) I don't know what made me so happy but I'm definitely not complaining about it.
NewTranslation: (笑逐颜开)真不知道什么能让我这么高兴。额，我绝对不是在吐槽。

Text: (High Happiness) I am having a blast right now, never been so happy in my entire life. I may even run for Presidente.
NewTranslation: (笑逐颜开)好开心啊，我想起那天在夕阳下的奔跑，那是我逝去的青春。

Text: (High Happiness) I am happy. I just saved a fish from drowning.
NewTranslation: (笑逐颜开)好开心啊，我刚刚救了条差点溺死的鱼。

Text: (No Home) I can sleep on the streets and tax people as a tourist attraction.
NewTranslation: (无家可归)我能睡在街上睡成一道风景线。

Text: (No Home) I dream for a place where I can sleep at night.
NewTranslation: (无家可归)或许在梦里我能有个地方能美美地睡上一夜。

Text: (No Home) I have a homeless friend. He will know what to do.
NewTranslation: (无家可归)我有一个无家可归的朋友，他会知道该怎么做。

Text: (No Home) I can build a shack or wait for Presidente to build me a house.
NewTranslation: (无家可归)我可以先建个窝棚凑活下等总统给我盖房子。

Text: (No Home) I am looking for four walls and a door... in a city! Is it that difficult?
NewTranslation: (无家可归)我在找四面墙和一扇门…在这个城市里，这很难么？

Text: (No Home) If there is one thing Tropicans are good in, it is building shacks.
NewTranslation: (无家可归)岛民最擅长什么？搭窝棚…

Text: (No Home) I live in a shack now. Does that make me a homeless man?
NewTranslation: (无家可归)我都住在窝棚里了。我看起来还像是个无家可归的人么。

Text: (No Work) Who am I if I don't have a job?
NewTranslation: (无所事事)假如我没有活干将会怎样？

Text: (No Work) Come on! Even ants have jobs, you know.
NewTranslation: (无所事事)别介，就算是蚂蚁都有工作，为啥我没有？！

Text: (No Work) How does a Tropican find a job?
NewTranslation: (无所事事)岛民该怎样才能找到工作啊。

Text: (No Work) I hear they are looking for pirates at the Docks.
NewTranslation: (无所事事)我听说他们在码头招聘海盗。

Text: (No Work) I may have to leave Tropico for good... or become a rebel.
NewTranslation: (无所事事)我觉得离开海岛会好一点…或许加入叛军也不错…

Text: (No Work) I can find myself a job if I try.
NewTranslation: (无所事事)让我试试吧，或许能给我一份工作。

Text: (Going Home) My sweet, sweet home... Where are you?
NewTranslation: (归心似箭)我最温暖最舒适的家啊，你在哪？

Text: (Going Home) Gosh, all the houses look the same. If I were an architect, I would not approve it!
NewTranslation: (归心似箭)天啊，所有房子都长得一模一样，我要是建筑师绝对不会赞成这样做的。

Text: (Going Home) I can already smell the scent of my pillow. People say it doesn't go more than a mile away of home.
NewTranslation: (归心似箭)我都能闻到枕头的香味了，据说只有离家不超过一英里时才能闻到。

Text: (Going Home) I'm so good at sleeping, I can do it with my eyes closed.
NewTranslation: (归心似箭)我实在是太困了，一闭上眼就能睡着。

Text: (Going Home) I hope that the house is still there.
NewTranslation: (归心似箭)我希望我的房子还在那里。

Text: (Going To Work) I will work and get rich today. Otherwise, tomorrow I am robbing a bank.
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)我今天就去工作，不用多久，我就会升职加薪，当上总经理，出任CEO，迎娶白富美，否则明天我就去抢银行。

Text: (Going To Work) I love going to work. I hate working, though.
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)我喜欢去工作，虽然我讨厌工作。

Text: (Going To Work) I have the best job! I just hope someone will tell me what it is.
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)我有最好的工作，呃，真希望有人能告诉我它是什么。

Text: (Going To Work) I know they are going to promote me today. I just hope they will give me a raise too.
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)我知道他们今天会提拔我，但愿他们会给我加薪。

Text: (Going To Work) They say I am a workaholic. Yet, I never drink at work.
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)他们说我沉迷于工作，但是我从来不在工作时喝酒。

Text: (Going To Work) Crime doesn't pay. Does that mean my job is a crime?
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)犯罪没有酬劳，这是不是意味着我的工作就是犯罪？

Text: (Going To Work) A workaholic is someone who actually works.
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)工作狂人就是那些真正工作的人。

Text: (Going To Work) Moaning about other people not working makes my day fly by.
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)抱怨别人不工作。让我的日子过得飞快。

Text: (Going To Work) I need a six month holiday. Twice a year.
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)我希望一年能放两次假，每次放半年。

Text: (Going To Work) Hard work never killed anybody but why should I take the chance?
NewTranslation: (干劲冲天)努力工作从来导致死亡，不过我不会用自己来证明。

Text: (Emigrates) There is a boat with my name at the docks and I am taking it.
NewTranslation: (离乡背土)码头那里有条船上面有我名字，我要把它也带走！

Text: (Emigrates) Now I am leaving Tropico to live as a tourist.
NewTranslation: (离乡背土)我准备离开海岛像个游客一样。

Text: (Emigrates) I decided to travel the world and work whatever job I can find.
NewTranslation: (离乡背土)我准备环游世界然后随便找个工作。

Text: (Emigrates) When you have traveled all the Tropico roads, you realize it is time to find yourself a continent.
NewTranslation: (离乡背土)当你游遍海岛每一个地方之后，你会发现是时候找一个大陆了。

Text: (Emigrates) I am leaving my home with the single hope that I'll find a better future somewhere else.
NewTranslation: (离乡背土)我抱着一个能找到更好的未来的想法离开了我的家。

Text: (Emigrates) Farewell, Tropico! I hope to see you again someday.
NewTranslation: (离乡背土)永别了，海岛！希望有天我们还能再见面。

Text: (Wander) I am going somewhere... I just do not know where.
NewTranslation: (闲庭信步)我只是没想好准备去哪……

Text: (Wander) The path can lead you to strange places. It is always the journey that matters.
NewTranslation: (闲庭信步)尽管路途总是指引你去奇怪的地方，但旅程才是最重要的。

Text: (Wander) There are so many places to go... I need to choose one.
NewTranslation: (闲庭信步)有那么多地方可以去…我要选一个。

Text: (Wander) I am following a hummingbird right now. Had no idea we have these in Tropico.
NewTranslation: (闲庭信步)我在跟着一只蜂鸟，我以前怎么没在海岛见过这种鸟。

Text: (Wander) I am not an ant... I have the right to wander aimlessly.
NewTranslation: (闲庭信步)我不是蚂蚁…我有漫无目的行走的权利。

Text: (Wander) I am busy pretending to know where I'm going.
NewTranslation: (闲庭信步)我正假装知道我要去哪里。
(闲庭信步)我只是在欣赏景色。

Text: (Wander) Good thing about being an ornithologist is that you don't wander aimlessly.
NewTranslation: (闲庭信步)做一个鸟类学家的好处是你不会漫无目的的到处走。

Text: (Wander) I am just wandering, not doing anything conspicuous.
NewTranslation: (闲庭信步)我只是在散步，没有做什么显眼的事。

Text: (Low Approval) They say that Presidente is our Savior. I say, give me a crucifix!
NewTranslation: (众叛亲离)他们说总统是海岛的救星，我说:给我一个十字架。

Text: (Low Approval) I believe in a better Tropico. One in which there are no Presidentes.
NewTranslation: (众叛亲离)我相信没有总统海岛会更好。

Text: (Low Approval) I feel as some Neanderthal is figuring out new ways to worsen my life right now.
NewTranslation: (众叛亲离)我总感觉有一些野蛮人正想尽办法让我们生活变得更差。

Text: (Low Approval) So many mistakes... It is as if our Presidente has never ruled a country before.
NewTranslation: (众叛亲离)这么多错误…是不是我们的总统以前从没有治理过城市。

Text: (Low Approval) I don't say it's El Presidente's fault. I'm just blaming him.
NewTranslation: (众叛亲离)我不是说这是总统的错，我只是在抱怨。

Text: (Low Approval) I wish I had El Presidente's talent of not having any talent and making money of it.
NewTranslation: (众叛亲离)我希望我有总统没有本事却能赚钱的本事。

Text: (High Approval) I highly value the wisdom of our wise Presidente.
NewTranslation: (天下归心)我非常欣赏我们总统的智慧。

Text: (High Approval) Call me a stalker... but I will follow Presidente everywhere.
NewTranslation: (天下归心)叫我跟踪狂吧…我会跟着总统去任何地方。

Text: (High Approval) How can I not respect the fine planning and subtlety of our Presidente.
NewTranslation: (天下归心)我怎不欣赏这位富有条理，思维缜密的总统！

Text: (High Approval) If I do not stop thinking how worthy of respect Presidente is, he is bound to build me a mansion.
NewTranslation: (天下归心)如果我不停地思考怎么尊敬总统，他一定会给我一栋豪宅。

Text: (High Approval) Presidente made many sane decisions. I hardly remember any of them, but I am still alive to tell that.
NewTranslation: (天下归心)总统做了很多明智的决定，尽管我几乎都不记得了。但我至少还活着站在这里告诉你这些。

Text: (Ambivalent Approval) I do not care who is pulling the strings while there is food on the table.
NewTranslation: (举棋不定)在桌上有吃的东西时，我才不在乎谁在拉弦。

Text: (Ambivalent Approval) I should respect El Presidente. His mistakes make us all better people.
NewTranslation: (举棋不定)我们应该尊敬总统，他的错误让我们变得更好。

Text: (Ambivalent Approval) I threat Presidentes as I threat everyone else. I don't care about them.
NewTranslation: (举棋不定)我威胁总统像威胁其他人一样，我才不关心他们呢。

Text: (Ambivalent Approval) I know that Presidente has done something right. I just haven't found out what yet.
NewTranslation: (举棋不定)我知道总统干了一些正确的事情，我只是还没发现那是什么。

Text: (Ambivalent Approval) I don't believe that I would be a better Presidente. Yet, I don't mind trying to.
NewTranslation: (举棋不定)我不相信我会是一个好总统，但是我不介意去试试。

Text: (New Home) What a beautiful house has someone built me!
NewTranslation: (乔迁新居)给我建的房子多漂亮啊！

Text: (New Home) I rented a new place to live. It's better than a shack.
NewTranslation: (乔迁新居)我租了一个新地方住，比窝棚好多了。

Text: (New Home) I decided to kill the houseplants they gave me for my new home. Now they are all hanging.
NewTranslation: (乔迁新居)我决定弄死这些新家里的室内植物，嗯，现在它们都挂了。

Text: (New Home) Presidente allows me to build only shacks, so I rented a place to live.
NewTranslation: (乔迁新居)总统只允许我们建窝棚，所以我租了一个地方住。

Text: (New Job) I got a new job... no joke!
NewTranslation: (走马上任)我找到了一份新工作…我不是在说笑！

Text: (New Job) I will have 104 personal days a year. They call them Saturday and Sunday.
NewTranslation: (走马上任)我一年有104天假期，它们叫周末。

Text: (New Job) I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
NewTranslation: (走马上任)我喜欢工作:工作让我着迷，我可以盯着它们看上一整天。

Text: (New Job) They said I don't have to be an idiot to work there. They will train me.
NewTranslation: (走马上任)他们告诉我说在那里工作的不是逗比，他们会培训我的。

Text: (New Job) It is the right time to start treating my workaholism.
NewTranslation: (走马上任)是时候该治治我的疯狂工作症了。

Text: (New Job) Now, if someone tells me where I'm supposed to be.
NewTranslation: (走马上任)嗯，谁能告诉我到底该干些啥。

Text: (New Job) I'm going for the big money now.
NewTranslation: (走马上任)我要开始赚大钱了。

Text: (New Job) I'm good in everything I do. Especially, in doing nothing.
NewTranslation: (走马上任)我擅长做任何事情，特别是混吃等死。

Text: (Got Married) It was a beautiful wedding. I still hear the priest hiccupping over a mug of grog.
NewTranslation: (喜结连理)真是一个美妙的婚礼，我还记着那个举着二锅头一直打嗝的牧师。

Text: (Got Married) I love being married. I found that one special person I want to annoy for the rest of my life.
NewTranslation: (喜结连理)结婚真是太好了，我终于找到了那个下半辈子可以一直折腾的人。

Text: (Got Married) Now let's work on staying married.
NewTranslation: (喜结连理)现在让我们来想想怎么保持婚姻。

Text: (Got Married) It was nice. I should do it again!
NewTranslation: (喜结连理)那感觉倍儿爽，应该再结一遍！

Text: (Became Father) My wife says that it will be miracle if the kid looks like me. I wonder what she means.
NewTranslation: (成为父亲)我媳妇说孩子要是长的像我简直是菩萨显灵，我觉得有点不对劲。

Text: (Became Father) Being a dad is the one thing I am good at.
NewTranslation: (成为父亲)造小人是我唯一擅长的。

Text: (Became Father) Insanity is hereditary. You get it from your kids.
NewTranslation: (成为父亲)逗逼是会遗传的，看看孩子们就知道了。

Text: (Gave Birth) These 9 months were worth it.
NewTranslation: (喜得贵子)这九个月还是挺值的。

Text: (Gave Birth) I have a beautiful baby.
NewTranslation: (喜得贵子)我生了一个大胖小子。

Text: (Gave Birth) I just gave birth to the next Presidente.
NewTranslation: (喜得贵子)我刚刚生下了下一任总统。

Text: (Gave Birth) Children in the dark make accidents, but accidents in the dark make children.
NewTranslation: (喜得贵子)小孩拉灯出意外，意外拉灯出小孩。

Text: (Joined the Workforce) Now, how does one find a job in Tropico?
NewTranslation: (参加工作)嗯，在海岛怎么样才能找到工作呢？

Text: (Joined the Workforce) I should buy me an alarm clock... or a rooster. They are harder to break.
NewTranslation: (参加工作)我应该买个闹钟…或者一只公鸡，他们不容易摔坏。

Text: (Joined the Workforce) Now I can fulfill the Tropican dream of working 24/7.
NewTranslation: (参加工作)我现在可以实现全年无休的海岛梦了。

Text: (Joined the Workforce) Are there enough free workspaces in Tropico to match my potential?
NewTranslation: (参加工作)海岛上有能容下我这个和尚的大庙吗？

Text: (Joined the Workforce) Tropico, here I come!
(Joined the Workforce) There are so many cool professions in Tropico. Just think about llama breeders!
NewTranslation: (参加工作)海岛上有这么多牛逼的职业，比如养羊驼！

Text: (Graduated) Education taught me many good skills; sleeping with eyes open included.
NewTranslation: (学业有成)学校教给了我很多技能，比如睁着眼睛睡觉。

Text: (Graduated) My family is extremely proud of me. This is the best time to ask for more money.
NewTranslation: (学业有成)我家里人特别为我骄傲，我应该趁机多要些零花钱。

Text: (Graduated) I managed to graduate without ever getting out of bed in daytime.
NewTranslation: (学业有成)白天不下床都能毕业。

Text: (Graduated) Finally graduated. Now I have to unlearn everything.
NewTranslation: (学业有成)终于毕业了，现在开始倒着学。

Text: (Graduated) I graduated first in my class! Now, let's see the rest of Tropico.
NewTranslation: (学业有成)我是我们班第一个毕业的！爷的智商碾压全岛。

Text: (Graduated) I am looking for the best spot to throw my graduation hat... and several bags of schoolbooks.
NewTranslation: (学业有成)我得找个好地方扔我的博士帽……还有好几袋书。

Text: (Immigrates) Are there illegal immigrants in Tropico?
(Immigrates) They say that Tropico is a paradise!
(Immigrates) I'm thinking about an immigration joke.
(Immigrates) First thing to do: build myself a shack.
(Immigrates) I'm looking for the immigration office.
(Immigrates) How did I end up here?
(Dead: Starvation) At the end, poison ivy proved to be indeed poisonous.
NewTranslation: (死亡:饥饿)毒藤确实有毒，再饿也不要吃。

Text: (Dead: Starvation) I could have survived longer on sawdust if there was a dentist on the island.
NewTranslation: (死亡:饥饿)如果岛上有人看牙的话我还能再吃一阵子锯末。

Text: (Dead: Starvation) I didn't die of starvation. I died because of an angry cattle breeder.
NewTranslation: (死亡:饥饿)其实我不是饿死的，我是被愤怒的牧场主揍死的。

Text: (Dead: Starvation) I didn't die of starvation. I died because I didn't manage to outrun the guard dogs.
NewTranslation: (死亡:饥饿)其实我不是饿死的，我是没跑过看门狗。

Text: (Dead: Starvation) I hope Tropico will learn from my mistake. People cannot live without food.
NewTranslation: (死亡:饥饿)我希望海岛会从我身上吸取教训，人是铁饭是钢。

Text: (Dead: Disease) A doctor would have saved me.
NewTranslation: (死亡:疾病)我觉得我还能再抢救一下。

Text: (Dead: Disease) I had a disease that caused me to make jokes and puns constantly. The implications proved lethal.
NewTranslation: (死亡:疾病)我得了嘴贱病，这导致了我的死亡。

Text: (Dead: Disease) I had a disease that made me say always the truth. If only someone threated it before I was asked about El Presidente...
NewTranslation: (死亡:疾病)我得了实话病，如果有人在我谈论总统之前治好它的话……

Text: (Dead: Disease) At the end, my hypochondria proved legit.
NewTranslation: (死亡:疾病)我早就说过我有病。
(死亡:被杀)谁把窗帘拉下来了？

Text: (Dead: Kill) I'm dying as a free man.
(Dead: Kill) Well, that was uncalled for.
(Dead: Kill) I intended to live forever. So far, not so good.
NewTranslation: (死亡:被杀)余本欲与天同寿，然则，天不遂人愿。

Text: (Dead: Disaster) ... and then all hell broke loose!

NewTranslation: (死亡:灾难)我的命运，被大自然封存在这一刻

Text: (Dead: Disaster) Am I closer to God now?
NewTranslation: (死亡:灾难)我离天堂更近了吧？

Text: (Dead: Disaster) I still wonder what hit me.
NewTranslation: (死亡:灾难)我想知道是啥砸死的我。

Text: (Dead: Disaster) I started this day with a smile and I intend to keep it.
NewTranslation: (死亡:灾难)今日以笑而始，今生以笑而终。

Text: (Dead: Disaster) I asked God for a way to cheat death. So here I am, still thinking.
NewTranslation: (死亡:灾难)我问上帝怎么才能不死，上帝说他还在想。

Text: (Protesting) I know that all my demands will be heard of.
NewTranslation: (示威)我就知道他们肯定会听我的要求的。

Text: (Protest Ended) Give me money and I will forget everything.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)金钱能使我忘记一切。

Text: (Protest Ended) I'm working for El Presidente now.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)我现在是总统阁下的人了。

Text: (Protest Ended) Never been bribed before, feels good.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)第一次受贿，感觉倍儿爽。

Text: (Protest Ended) We are scattering now, but we will be back.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)虽然现在散伙了，但是我们还会回来的。

Text: (Protest Ended) El Presidente knows the true value of money.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)总统阁下知道钱真正的价值。

Text: (Protest Ended) All that blood! They were beating innocent people!
NewTranslation: (示威结束)看看他们！他们在殴打无辜群众！

Text: (Protest Ended) Only a fool would send the Army against unarmed protesters!
NewTranslation: (示威结束)我们不是螳臂挡车的歹徒，我们是手无寸铁的群众！

Text: (Protest Ended) The next step is a civil war.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)下一步就是要发动战争了。

Text: (Protest Ended) How the mighty have fallen!
NewTranslation: (示威结束)将星陨落，天命难违。

Text: (Protest Ended) El Presidente showed us his true face!
NewTranslation: (示威结束)总统露出了他的真面目！

Text: (Protest Ended) I think that both parties were satisfied.
(Protest Ended) It's hard to believe that we came to understanding.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)简直不敢相信我们居然达成了共识。

Text: (Protest Ended) We won! Next time we will want Presidente's resignation.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)赢了！下次试试让总统辞职。

Text: (Protest Ended) I fear that Presidente managed to foul us somehow.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)我担心总统在忽悠我们。

Text: (Protest Ended) El Presidente agreed to all our demands. What a wise man!
NewTranslation: (示威结束)总统阁下同意了我们的要求，多么精明的人！

Text: (Protest Ended) Tropico is such a conformist heaven.
NewTranslation: (示威结束)海岛真是一个守规矩的天堂。

Text: (Disaster) Save the llamas and children first!
(Disaster) Last time there was cow beef everywhere.
(Disaster) Has God come to hate El Presidente?
(Disaster) Someone is going to lose his house!
NewTranslation: (灾难)看来有些逗逼的房子要没了！

Text: (Disaster) Even the greatest army couldn't beat this monstrosity.
NewTranslation: (灾难)连最强大的军队都拿这个没辙。

Text: (Under Attack) Where is my tapir vest?
(Under Attack) Tropico needs more gun industry!
NewTranslation: (受到攻击)海岛应该大力发展军工业的！
(受到攻击)我们究竟做了什么？

Text: (Under Attack) Who let the dogs out?
(Under Attack) The best defense is to stay out of range.
NewTranslation: (受到攻击)最好的防御方法就是别让他打到你。

Text: (Pirate Attack) Brace your booty; the finest of the seven seas are here.
NewTranslation: (海盗进攻)看好你们的菊花；征服七海的猛男在此。

Text: (Pirate Attack) I hope that Tropico's Rum industry is strong enough!
NewTranslation: (海盗进攻)但愿岛上的酒够他们喝的。

Text: (Pirate Attack) Oh, no! They're coming to drink our rum!
NewTranslation: (海盗进攻)噢，天呐！朗姆酒要被喝光了。

Text: (Pirate Attack) Pirates! At last, I will see a real parrot!
NewTranslation: (海盗进攻)海盗！不过至少我能看一眼船长的鹦鹉。

Text: (Pirate Attack) Good time to consider career change.
NewTranslation: (海盗进攻)该考虑换个行当了。

Text: (Rebel Attack) Oh, no, my neighbors are attacking!
NewTranslation: (叛军攻击)卧槽，我的邻居打过来了！

Text: (Rebel Attack) I wonder where they will hit next.
NewTranslation: (叛军攻击)他们下一步要攻打哪里呢？
(叛军攻击)我得找个地方躲躲。

Text: (Rebel Attack) I hear that rebels live out in the wild. They love harassing Presidentes.
NewTranslation: (叛军攻击)我听说他们喜欢睡野地，打野炮，骚扰总统。

Text: (Rebel Attack) They live amongst us; pretending to be normal Tropicans. Until they strike.
NewTranslation: (叛军攻击)直到他们揍你之前，都装的跟正常人一样。

Text: (Rebel Attack) `See me! I'm a rebel, I fight everyone`. Yeah, right. Go home!
NewTranslation: (叛军攻击)看看老子，老子是反抗军，我见谁揍谁。对！就是你！快回家去吧！

Text: (Military Coup) Off with his head! All their heads!
NewTranslation: (军事政变)所有人都把屁股给爷撅起来！

Text: (Military Coup) I hear that they have a heavily armed general on their side.
NewTranslation: (军事政变)我听说他们有个终结者。

Text: (Military Coup) Just arrest them! That will solve the problem.
NewTranslation: (军事政变)把他们关起来！这样就没问题了。

Text: (Military Coup) Sack them all! That will solve the problem.
NewTranslation: (军事政变)把他们都捆上！这样就解决问题了。

Text: (Uprising) The time has come and it will happen again, and again.
NewTranslation: (起义)就在今天，当家作主，日复一日，年复一年。

Text: (Uprising) Is whole of Tropico gone mad, or it's just me?
NewTranslation: (起义)众人皆醉我独醒，还是反之？

Text: (Uprising) Just give me a tomato launcher and show me the Palace.
NewTranslation: (起义)给我一把番茄发射器然后告诉我总统府怎么走。

Text: (Uprising) Is this a fully blown protest or a disguised civil war?
NewTranslation: (起义)抗议玩脱了？还是早就准备好打仗了？

Text: (Engaging the Enemy) Who was the enemy again?
NewTranslation: (与敌人交战)我们要揍谁来着？

Text: (Engaging the Enemy) I wish we all kiss and forget.
NewTranslation: (与敌人交战)我们不如打个啵，把过去的都忘了吧。

Text: (Engaging the Enemy) I have a bullet with someone's name on it.
NewTranslation: (与敌人交战)这一枪是为我三舅老爷打的！

Text: (Engaging the Enemy) I hope that we are heading in the right direction.
NewTranslation: (与敌人交战)希望我们走的路没错。

Text: (Engaging the Enemy) Did I get enough bullets?
(Engaging the Enemy) Someone gave me a gun and told me to run here!
NewTranslation: (与敌人交战)有个逗逼给了我一把枪然后让我过来这里。

Text: (Engaging the Enemy) The last thing I want to do is hurt someone. But it's still on the list.
NewTranslation: (与敌人交战)我想做的就是弄死谁，但是我谁也没弄死。

Text: (Engaging the Enemy) Allies may come and go, but enemies accumulate.
NewTranslation: (与敌人交战)流水的盟友，铁打的敌人。
(消灭敌人)一个能打的都没有。

Text: (Confirmed Kill) I should take a shower now.
NewTranslation: (消灭敌人)我该回家洗洗睡了。

Text: (Confirmed Kill) Now, that is what I call a killing joke.
NewTranslation: (消灭敌人)这就跟我开玩笑的下场。

Text: (Confirmed Kill) I seem to be good at that.
NewTranslation: (消灭敌人)看来我还挺擅长射的。

Text: (Retreating) I'm not scared. I'm just looking for a place to hide.
NewTranslation: (撤退中)我不害怕，我只是找个地方躲一下。

Text: (Retreating) I hope that El Presidente will forgive me.
NewTranslation: (撤退中)我希望总统会原谅我。

Text: (Retreating) At last, a chance to show what I'm good at.
(Retreating) I took a bullet in the knee.
NewTranslation: (撤退中)我从前是一名军人，直到我膝盖中了一枪。
给予国际援助最多的国家

Text: Bad Healtcare Death Promile for Elders
Modifier for the death age that is applied instantly
NewTranslation: 立即生效的对死亡年龄的修改
军国主义者-宗教人士比重
共产主义者-资本主义者比重
环保主义者-工业主义者比重
民族主义者-全球主义者比重
欲与<foreign_power>进行<diplomatic_action>，需要<required_standing>国际声望(现有<current_standing>)<newline>

Text: <red> -"Total propaganda" Constitution Principle - liberty from media buildings
NewTranslation: <red>-“统一宣传”宪法原则-传媒建筑可提供自由度

Text: <green>+"Independant media" Constitution Principle - liberty from media buildings
NewTranslation: <green>+“独立媒体”宪法原则-传媒建筑可提供自由度

Text: PERSONS who are CITIZENS of the state and find themselves in the rightful corporeal possession of MALE physique are to be hereinafter known as VOTERS. VOTERS possess the legal right to pass their vote for the person known as El Presidente on ELECTIONS.
NewTranslation: 我国男性公民拥有合法的投票权。他们拥有在选举中进行投票权利。

Text: Fewer voters, based on chauvinist gender discrimination
NewTranslation: 由于沙文主义的性别歧视而导致选民减少

Text: PERSONS finding themselves in possession of any item of CONSIDERABLE VALUE within the boundaries of the state of Tropico will be hereinafter named VOTERS. VOTERS possess the legal right to pass their vote for the person known as El Presidente on ELECTIONS.
NewTranslation: 我国境内拥有巨额私人财产的公民可作为选民。他们拥有在选举中进行投票权利。

Text: Fewer voters, based on reactionary wealth discrimination
NewTranslation: 由于保守的贫富歧视而导致选民减少

Text: PERSONS who happen to find themselves attributed with CITIZENSHIP from the state of Tropico are to be hereinafter considered VOTERS. VOTERS possess the legal right to pass their vote for the person known as El Presidente on ELECTIONS.
NewTranslation: 我国境内所有拥有海岛公民身份的法人皆可为选民。他们拥有在选举中进行投票权利。

Text: More voters, based on crazy liberal ideals
NewTranslation: 由于疯狂的自由主义使选民增多

Text: CHRISTIANITY is the OFFICIAL religion of the state and the Holy Bible COMMANDS the actions of the legitimate ruling body of the State. May GOD watch over El Presidente and the nation!
NewTranslation: 官方认定基督教为国教，圣经引导着国家最高政体的所有行动。愿上帝保佑我们的总统和国家！

Text: Religious buildings lower crime in their vicinity
NewTranslation: 宗教建筑将减低其附近的犯罪率

Text: FREEDOM of RELIGIOUS worship and ATHEIST expression is to be respected and observed by the institutions of the state. This article of the constitution is issued to affect all, but not limited to, citizens or persons who are legally visiting the country.
NewTranslation: 国家尊重居民的宗教信仰。此宪法文献对但不仅限于对公民及合法访问本国的个人生效。

Text: This constitutional act proclaims all forms of RELIGIOUS worship and ceremonies to be categorized as a metaphorical OPIATE for the people and therefore considered ILLEGAL substances. Citizens of Tropico must be allowed to live WITHOUT the burden of RELIGIOUS ADDICTION.
NewTranslation: 此宪法原则规定一切形式的宗教崇拜及宗教仪式都是违法的，宗教信仰只是为了麻痹人民。海岛联邦的公民允许且仅被允许在无宗教信仰情况下生活。

Text: Research is faster by <value>. Less religious citizens appear in Tropico.
NewTranslation: 研究将加快<value>。减少岛上的宗教人士。

Text: This article of the constitution proclaims ALL mature CTIZENS legally capable and obliged to act as COMBATANTS during the DEFENSE of the state against all and any form of invasion, rebellion, coup, insurrection, insurgency, mutiny, revolt, revolution, riot or uprising.
NewTranslation: 此宪法文献规定所有达至法定成年年龄的公民都有义务成为战士为国家抵御任何形式的入侵，暴乱，政变，起义，哗变，叛乱，革命，骚乱和武装起义。

Text: High-school soldiers. Additional Militia squads raised in battles.
NewTranslation: 士兵受过高等教育。战斗时额外增加的民兵。

Text: All CITIZENS of Tropico are considered SOLDIERS and owe themselves to the defense of the nation. The state ENLISTS citizens to CONSCRIPTION to which they oblige sub poena. Conscripts are considered ipso facto willing to participate in all operations conveyed by the state.
NewTranslation: 所有的岛上公民都有服兵役的责任和义务。所有被征召的公民都将成为义务兵。所有志愿军都将被视为自愿承担国家军事任务。

Text: The state of Tropico is guarded by the legally formed ARMY. The hereinbefore mentioned ARMY is a corpus of standing levy of combatants who receive and follow orders by El Presidente and receive sustenance quid pro quo.
NewTranslation: 海岛联邦依法成立职业军队来守卫国土。职业军人长期听命与总统并接受其给养。
士兵要接受高中教育。行动将更加有效率。

Text: Tropico is El Presidente and El Presidente is Tropico. Attempts to express OTHER OPINION are explicitly FORBIDDEN by the law. CITIZENS have the right and obligation to REPORT DEVIATIONS of this norm performed by others and from themselves.
NewTranslation: 在海岛联邦，国家就是总统，总统就是国家。国家只有一个声音，所有试图表达其他想法的行为都是违法行为。公民有权力与义务检举他人与自己不一致之处。

Text: Elections happen less often. Vote frauds give 300% more votes. 50% more Rebels
NewTranslation: 选举频率减少。获得额外300%的选票。政敌票数减少50%

Text: SECURITY and peace are privileges and priorities of the STATE which has the right to perform all forms of CENSORSHIP and CONTROL to support these values. Citizens who violate the public norms set by the state have the right to !!!...CENSORED...!!!
NewTranslation: 安全与和平是国家进行行为考察与控制时优先考虑之事也是国家的特权原则。违反国家规定的公共行为规范的居民将有权被！！！……依据国家相关管理规定该内容已被删除……！！！

Text: Every policeman convinces 1 voter to vote for you.
NewTranslation: 每个警察将说服一位选民投票给你。

Text: The principle of DEMOCRACY is the ruling principle of the STATE and its INSTITUTIONS. To guarantee the prevention of misinterpretations of the hereinbefore mentioned DEMOCRACY this constitutional act grants the exclusive right to interpret the hereinbefore mentioned term to El Presidente.
NewTranslation: 国家政府与机构将把民主作为基本方针。为了避免误解，宪法中提及的“民主”最终解释权归总统所有。

Text: Mandatory elections that happen more often and no uprisings.
NewTranslation: 更多的强制选举并且没有起义发生。

Text: All CITIZENS who happen to reach the AGE OF 13 are OBLIGED to provide their mental and physical LABOR to the state in return of the lives, security and sustenance provided by the state. The state is obliged to entitle the citizens who abide this constitutional act as Shock Worker Heroes of Tropico.
NewTranslation: 所有年满13岁的公民都有义务尽自己所能来回报回报赐予他生命，食物和庇护的祖国。国家将会授予遵守宪法的人“海岛劳动模范”称号。

Text: Child labor and late retirement. Life expectancy and job happiness reduced.
NewTranslation: 雇佣童工，推迟退休年龄。降低预期寿命以及工作满意度。

Text: All CITIZENS who happen to reach the AGE OF 16 are OBLIGED to provide their mental and physical LABOR to the state in return of the lives, security and sustenance provided by the state. The state is obliged to entitle the citizens who abide this constitutional act as Shock Worker Heroes of Tropico.
NewTranslation: 所有年满16岁的公民都有义务尽自己所能来回报回报赐予他生命，食物和庇护的祖国。国家将会授予遵守宪法的人“海岛劳动模范”称号。

Text: Late retirement. Normal life expectancy and job happiness.
NewTranslation: 推迟退休年龄。正常预期寿命以及工作满意度。

Text: All CITIZENS who happen to reach the AGE OF 16 are ALLOWED to provide their mental and physical LABOR to the state. They have the right to LEAVE the workforce of the state at the AGE OF 60. Due to, but not limited to, the effects of this article of the constitution EL Presidente is obliged to give his best to keep the STATE away from BANKRUPTCY.
NewTranslation: 所有年满16岁的青少年可以工作。年满60岁的工人可以退休。基于但不局限于宪法，总统先生必须保持最好的工作状态来使国家免受破产。
提早退休。高工作满意度。

Text: Only PERSONS who happen to unfortunately find themselves NOT CITIZENS of Tropico but who hath gained any EDUCATIONAL degree in any foreign school, college, institute, lyceum, seminary, university or academy are ADMITTED to SETTLE within the borders of the state.
NewTranslation: 如果阁下不是伟大海岛的一员，但接受过国外学校的教育，那么恭喜你可以申请移民到海岛。

Text: PERSONS of good will who happen to unfortunately find themselves NOT CITIZENS of Tropico are to be ADMITTED FREELY to SETTLE within the borders of the state as long as they observe the good will of El Presidente.
NewTranslation: 只要你发自内心的热爱我们的总统，那么恭喜你成为海岛的一员。

Text: Open borders - easier to immigrate and emigrate.

All PERSONS who happen to unfortunately find themselves NOT CITIZENS of Tropico have the right and the obligation to protect the unity, solidarity, homogeneity, integrity and oneness of the Tropican nation by STAYING OUTSIDE the borders of the state.
NewTranslation: 如果阁下不是伟大海岛的一员，你同样有义务维护海岛的团结，和谐，统一，领土和主权完整。

Text: Regulated borders - harder to immigrate and emigrate.

To guarantee the principle of equality in the society this article of the Constitution REMOVES the personal RIGHTS from the custody of each status quo CITIZEN of Tropico. The aforementioned rights are placed under the custody of El Presidente who has the right and responsibility to dispense, limit or take away them per persona.
NewTranslation: 为了保证社会的绝对公平，宪法剥夺了每个岛民维护个人权益的权力。上述权力归总统先生所有，他有权免除、限制、剥夺岛民的个人权益。

Text: Reduced liberty. Assassination and Banish actions cost less.
NewTranslation: 降低自由度。暗杀和驱逐行动成本降低。

Text: This Constitutional act declares the PERSONAL LIFE of each citizen the FOCUS of the state. To guarantee best quality of personal life the state can SURVEY pro bono the life of each status quo citizen. The hereinbefore mentioned citizens have to file in REPORTS for the activities dine by themselves, their family and their acquaintances per diem.
NewTranslation: 宪法将居民个人生活内容作为国家关注的重点。为了保证优质的居民个人生活内容，国家将会无偿调查一些居民的个人生活情况。被调查的居民及其亲友必须每日报告，内容包括他们的日常开支和晚餐菜样。

Text: Police discovers special citizens such as Rebels faster.
NewTranslation: 警察将更快发现如叛军一类的特殊分子。

Text: This article of the Constitution GUARANTEES the personal LIBERTIES and RIGHTS of any law-abiding citizen to be untouchable and irrevocable. The state represented by its institutions and El Presidente has the right to pursue and punish perpetrators of crimes according to the ruling law determined by El Presidente himself..
NewTranslation: 宪法规定合法公民的个人自由和权力是不容干涉和侵犯的。但总统和国家相关部门有权按照总统先生制定的“特殊手段”追究犯罪嫌疑人的责任。

Text: High liberty. Assassinate and banish are limited. Special citizens are harder to discover.
NewTranslation: 提高自由度，暗杀和驱逐行动被限制。特殊分子更难发现。

Text: Any and all governing bodies of any establishment, business or COMPANY that is yielding economic REVENUE and profits is hereinafter enforced to the DIRECT CUSTODY of El Presidente and being obliged to file report per diem or be forced to accept punishment under the controlling law.
NewTranslation: 任何机构，企业及公司产出的经济收益和利润由总统先生完全控制，管理人员必须每日提交相关信息的报告，否则将会受到相关法律的惩罚。

Text: Buildings with managers gain <value> bonus effectiveness.
NewTranslation: 聘用主管的建筑额外增加<value>收益

Text: By the rule of this article El Presidente and any person he personally declares possesses the right to EXPROPRIATE illimitable amounts of REVENUE from the BUDGET of the state. The aforementioned persons are not obliged to report the cause of their acts regarding the aforementioned expropriation.
NewTranslation: 总统先生以及相关人士可以无限制从国家税收中提取资金。总统先生及相关人士没有义务提交关于资金用途的报告。

Text: All Swiss Bank Account gains increased by <value>
NewTranslation: 所有瑞士银行收益增加<value>

Text: The institutions of the state have NO LEGAL right to CONTROL or interfere in the formation of the PRICES of the goods and services which are exchanged within the borders of the NATIONAL MARKET of Tropico. El Presidente assesses the validity of all litigations lodged at his office.
NewTranslation: 国际机构无权控制或干涉海岛全国市场的物品交易和服务的价格制定。总统先生会评估提交到他办公室诉讼文件的有效性。

Text: Budget impact on building effectiveness is stronger
NewTranslation: 建筑预算对建筑效率的影响加强

Text: The MEDIA establishments operating within the state of Tropico are GOVERNED and REGULATED by the office of El Presidente. The MESSAGES and ideas related to the auditory of the Tropican media are assessed and CONTROLLED by El Presidente to ensure the quality, truthfulness and justice of the information content accessible by the citizens of the state.
NewTranslation: 岛内传媒全部由总统办公室直接监管，所有媒体讯息及观点都要经总统直辖的广电部审查，以保证岛民接收到的信息真实可靠，积极向上。

Text: Media provides less liberty. Protests happen less frequently.
NewTranslation: 媒体提供较少的自由。抗议活动发生的频率降低。

Text: The MEDIA of the state is placed under the FINANCIAL GOVERNANCE El Presidente. The hereinbefore mentioned media has the right to convey its messages freely to the audience. In turn El Presidente has the right to impose financial sanctions on media establishments which fail to comply with his standards.
NewTranslation: 国营媒体的财务收支由总统办公室负责。媒体有权向公众传播讯息，同样总统也有权对惹总统不开心的媒体进行经济制裁。

Text: Media requires higher budget. Journalists convert voters for your cause.
NewTranslation: 媒体需要更高的预算。记者会为你的选举拉选票。

Text: The MEDIA of the state has the legal right to FREELY determine the CONTENT of its broadcasts and to CONVEY them to the audience. Moderate criticism, moderate truthfulness and moderate freedom of media expression are guaranteed by the ruling law.
NewTranslation: 国内媒体有权决定向岛民传播的讯息内容。适当的批评，真实事件报道以及适度的自由理念传播受到相关法律保护。

Text: Media provides more liberty. Protests happen more frequently.
NewTranslation: 媒体提供更多的自由度。抗议活动发生更加频繁。

Text: This article of the Constitution deems the access to the INTERWEB potentially DANGEROUS to the citizens of the state. The institutions determined by the office of El Presidente have the solemn right and obligation to FILTER the messages that emanate from or towards the interweb to guarantee the purity and truthfulness of the information.
NewTranslation: 宪章规定由于因特网存在大量不良信息，会对于广大上网岛民产生不良影响，存在极大的安全隐患。总统办公室及相关机构有义务对岛民浏览的信息进行评估和筛选，保证信息的安全性和真实性。

Text: Less citizens become rebels. Research is slower.
NewTranslation: 减少市民叛变，降低研究速度。

Text: This article deems as ILLEGAL any attempt to commit an INFRINGEMENT of the AUTHORSHIP rights of any artifact possessed by a person or company registered by the rules of international law. El Presidente assesses the legal penalty pro forma.
NewTranslation: 宪章规定任何违反国际法，企图侵犯他人著作权或注册公司的知识产权的行为，将受到总统办公室制定法律的制裁，具体情况由总统裁定。

Text: Increases the foreign aid gained from the EU and USA by <value>
NewTranslation: 增加<value>从美国和欧盟获得的经济援助。

Text: This article guarantees that any person with Tropican citizenship is ALLOWED to ACCESS the INTERWEB without government consent. El Presidente assesses the VALIDITY of litigations of AUTHORSHIP infringements according to the international law within a time period no longer than 20 years.
NewTranslation: 岛民可以不经政府审查自由访问互联网。总统办公室将按照国际法评估20年内关于知识产权问题诉讼的有效性。

Text: The state is compelled to provide GUARANTEED subsidies and EXPORT quotas for any Tropican company, business or contractor that fails to meet its projected annual revenue due to, and not limited to, casus fortuitous, bribes or competition from companies that operate ultra vires.
NewTranslation: 由于贿赂，恶性竞争或其他原因没有达到预计年收的企业，公司以及承包商会提供资金补贴和额外出口配额。

Text: Increases base prices for Raw Resources by <value>
NewTranslation: 原料资源基础价格提升<value>

Text: The state of Tropico has the legal right and obligation to GUARANTEE the DISTRIBUTION of services and GOODS produced by any establishment, company or business that stated its GOING CONCERN and which is operating within the boundaries of the Tropican jurisdiction.
NewTranslation: 国家会从生产、营销和服务流程等方面为海岛管辖范围内希望持续经营的公司提供保障。

Text: This article of the Constitution declares that ALL economic POLICIES imposed by the state of Tropico to regulate the economy of the state will provide EQUAL OPPORTUNITIES and SANCTIONS to any and all companies and contractors operating within its economic jurisdiction.
NewTranslation: 宪章规定所有经济政策的修订均旨在为海岛管辖范围内所有企业，公司，承包商提供公平的竞争机会与奖罚机制。

Text: Increases the base price for Manufactured Goods by <value>
NewTranslation: 制造业产品基准价格提升<value>

Text: All forms of unwanted DISCARDS formed during the operational process of INDUSTRIAL facilities are NATURAL components of the environment and CANNOT BE classified as HARMFUL or polluting. The expulsion of any of the hereinbefore mentioned discards by any of the hereinbefore mentioned facilities is a pro bono enrichment of the environment.
NewTranslation: 所有在工业废弃物都是“自然成分”，不能被视为有害污染物。生产过程产生“自然成分”是对环境的一次免费“补血”。
工厂效率提高<value1>。工厂产生污染增加<value2>

Text: This article of the Constitution proclaims that any INDUSTRIAL FACILITY operating in the jurisdiction of the Tropican state is FREED from the compulsory BRIBE TARIFF as long as it presents the deputies of the state institutions with a certificate that qualifies its operation and production cycles as ENERGY CLASS of TT+.
NewTranslation: 法律规定，海岛管辖范围内的工业设施如果取得由相关部门颁发的能耗等级TT+及以上证书，即可免征收海岛的强制关税。

Text: The NATURAL RESOURCES of Tropico such as, but not limited to, air, water, soil, the Sun, are INVIOLABLE. Any INDUSTRIAL facility, company or business that EXPULSES products of its operation cycle within the media of the Tropican environment are to be TAXED TRIPLE by the standards of the Compulsory Industry Bribe Tariff by the deputies of the state.
NewTranslation: 海岛上例如空气，水，土地，阳光等自然环境是不容被破坏的。任何在岛上的工业设施，公司和企业在生产过程中如有使用到上述资源，将有国家相关部门强制征收3倍于一般税金的税金。

Text: Factory effectiveness <value1>. Factory pollution <value2>. Tourism boost.
NewTranslation: 工厂效率降低<value1>，污染降低<value2>。游客增加。

Text: The soil is dry due to drought. Watering the field will resolve the problem immediately.
NewTranslation: 土地由于干旱缺水，飞机灌溉能立刻解决问题。

Text: This oil spill is the result of an unfortunate disaster. Oil production and fishing in the area are stopped. You can choose a way to resolve the situation. The higher the cost - the faster the resolution.
NewTranslation: 石油泄漏是一场不幸的灾难，这一地区的石油开采和渔业全部暂停。你需要选择解决方案，越贵意味着效率越高。

Text: A chemical treatment will resolve the problem immediately
NewTranslation: 化学试剂清理能立即解决漏油问题

Text: This building is flooded and has stopped working. Repair works would take between 6 and 12 months but you can pay for emergency pumping and finish off earlier.
NewTranslation: 这栋建筑被水淹了并停止工作。修缮工作将在6-12月内完成，您可以支付现金立即将水抽干。

Text: A problem occured while loading the dynasty.
A problem occured while loading the dynasty.
The storage device you selected is no longer available. Loading the dynasty failed.
NewTranslation: 您选择的存档不再可用。加载家族失败。

Text: A problem occured while saving the dynasty.
Not enough space on the storage device you selected.
NewTranslation: 您选择的存储空间不足。

Text: Your dynasty appears to be damaged and there was a problem while trying to delete it. Please delete it from the Memory section of the Dashboard instead. You will not be able to save until you do so.
NewTranslation: 您的家族存档在删除过程中出现损坏，请直接访问目录删除，否则无法继续保存。

Text: The storage device you selected is no longer available. You will not be able to save your game or dynasty until a valid storage device is selected.
NewTranslation: 您选取的存档失效。再选取新存档之后方可保存游戏和家族。

Text: You can not use this edict anymore

NewTranslation: 另一个玩家控制的领域

Text: Must be placed on the shore.
Objects underneath are blocking the construction.
Shore is not suitable for construction.
Not enough pastures in the area.
Not enough trees in the area.
Will possibly cause a power shortage.
Too far from road network connected to a construction office.
NewTranslation: 离连有建筑公司的道路网过远
需要一个特殊的海洋矿床

Text: Better housing quality due to road proximity.
NewTranslation: 更好的居住质量(因为接近道路)

Text: Not connected to an electrical grid.
This building does not work due to unforeseen circumstances.
NewTranslation: 该建筑由于意外情况而未能运作

Text: Building was stopped because of a rolling blackout.
NewTranslation: 由于轮流停电而导致建筑停工

Text: The upgrade <upgrade_name> does not work because of insufficient electricity
NewTranslation: 升级项目<upgrade_name>由于电力不足而未能运作

Text: Not operational due to low effectiveness.
NewTranslation: 由于效益过低而未能运作

Text: This building is damaged. It will not work and will collapse soon.
NewTranslation: 该建筑物遭到损坏，不能正常运作并且即将坍塌

Text: This building is not supplied with <input> and will not produce <output> from it.
NewTranslation: 该建筑缺乏<input>，因而不能产出<output>。

Text: This building is not supplied with <consume>.
Production reduced due to high pollution.
Can't export - no road connection to a dock
NewTranslation: 无法出口-没有道路连接至贸易港
无法出口-贸易港库存已满

Text: Can't be serviced - no road connection to a Teamster's Office
NewTranslation: 无法接受服务-没有道路连接至卡车司机办公室

Text: Docks are overloaded. Increase budget or build more docks
NewTranslation: 贸易港已过载。增加贸易港预算或者建造新的贸易港。

Text: Too far from a road network with a construction office.
NewTranslation: 离连有建筑公司的道路网过远
该建筑没有进行生产活动。

Text: Some production cycles are not producing.
NewTranslation: 一些生产循环未能运转。
玛利亚 德 卡门

Text: Shore(stored in mem as a bit grid)
NewTranslation: 边缘(在内存中占用相当于一格的容量)

Text: The soldiers may kill some protesters. Supresses future protests but some people will become rebels
NewTranslation: 士兵可能会击毙一些抗议者，能迅速镇压抗议但是一些人会成为叛军。

Text: A military squad will be dispatched
Cost depends on Liberty. The protest disperses with no further consequences.
NewTranslation: 花费取决于你的自由度，不会产生严重后果

Text: A military squad will be dispatched
The protesters will offer a task. If you decline it the unrest will grow.
NewTranslation: 抗议者将会给你个任务，如果你拒绝的话骚乱会增加。

Text: A military squad will be dispatched
The cost depends on the number of workers.
NewTranslation: 花费取决于工人的数量

Text: A military squad will be dispatched here
NewTranslation: 一支小队将被派遣至此

Text: The soldiers may kill some strikers. Some people will become rebels
NewTranslation: 士兵可能会击毙一些罢工者，一些人会成为叛军。

Text: A military squad will be dispatched here
NewTranslation: 一支小队将被派遣至此

Text: Once a Presidente, always a Presidente.
NewTranslation: 一日为总统，终身为总统。

Text: Where does the sun go when I sleep?
NewTranslation: 太阳去哪儿？(在我睡觉的时候)

Text: Do you have a death wish?
I shine where others pale by comparison.
There is no Tropico without me.
Some call ME the Iron Lady.
There is no tomorrow without me.
Are you afraid of little me...hahaha!
NewTranslation: 你是不是有点怕我了……哈哈哈！

Text: (in a serious tone) Am I fat? Be honest.
NewTranslation: (严肃的口吻)我胖了吗？说实话哦

Text: You like whispering in my ear... don't you.
NewTranslation: 你喜欢在我耳畔低语……不是吗。

Text: My Children, so lost without me.
NewTranslation: 我的孩子们，没有我的呵护会多么迷惘。

Text: Break my heart, and I'll kill you.
There is no Tropico without me.
Don't you love your lady leader?
NewTranslation: 你们不爱戴你们的女领袖吗？

Text: You wouldn't like me when I'm angry.
NewTranslation: 我生气了你就不会再爱了。

Text: Women like to be on top.
Let's get this show on the road.

NewTranslation: 噢，别怕……嘿嘿(腹黑的一笑)。

Text: (spoken like the maid from family guy) No, no, no
NewTranslation: (语气像恶搞之家里面的妹抖)不，不，不

Text: How can I be of help?
NewTranslation: 需要我为你做些什么吗？

Text: Daddy got me a wooden gun!
I'm the fastest in my class!
Look at me, Look at me!
Scaredy cat, scaredy cat, sitting on the door mat...
NewTranslation: 胆小鬼，胆小鬼，坐在门垫上……

Text: I want to be a princess!
Why, if I were 30 years younger I'd...
NewTranslation: 何也？若能早生三十载，吾……
你还记得大明湖畔的夏雨荷吗？

Text: I used to be so beautiful.
Come closer, so I can see you.
NewTranslation: 靠近一点，让我好好看看你。

Text: Your grandfather was such a handsome man.
Oh, how can I help you, you sweet young thing.
NewTranslation: 哦，有什么能帮你的吗？你这个甜蜜的小东西。

Text: It used to be so lovely here.
NewTranslation: 这里曾经是如此的有爱。

Text: A soldier's duty is never done.
NewTranslation: 士兵永远无法履行完责任。
女人喜欢穿着制服的男人。

Text: I'd give my life if need be.
A soldier's duty is never done.
NewTranslation: 士兵永远无法履行完责任。
我的制服看起来怎么样？

Text: I'd give my life if need be.

NewTranslation: 卧薪尝胆，三千越甲可吞吴！

Text: Your right to rule has expired.
We will fight you in the streets and on the beaches!
NewTranslation: 不要让我看见你，不然见你一次打你一次！

Text: Riding on the winds of change.
This is gonna hurt you bad.
You wouldn't hurt a lady, would you?
NewTranslation: 你不会伤害一名女士，对吗？

Text: Your right to rule has expired
We will fight you in the streets and on the beaches.
NewTranslation: 不要让我看见你，不然见你一次打你一次。

Text: It's so darn hot here in Mexico

NewTranslation: 我不喜欢…额…“苗条”的女人

Text: Have you tried the lama jerky they have here?
NewTranslation: 你尝过这里的草泥马肉干吗？

Text: You people are so thin. Are you sick?
NewTranslation: 你们这些人太瘦了，是生病了吗？

Text: This third world air makes me sick!
NewTranslation: 第三世界的空气让我觉得恶心！
你看见过卓帕卡布拉吗？

Text: I thought it would be cheaper here.
How far is France from here?
Haven't I seen you back in Florida?
NewTranslation: 我在佛罗里达没看见你啊？

Text: It sure is warm here, wow.
Uh, the hotel was just awful!
What's with all these skinny gals here, you short on food?
NewTranslation: 这些瘦小的小女孩怎么了，你们没饭吃么？

Text: I feel everyone's eyes on me.
NewTranslation: 我感觉每个人都在看着我。
你看见过卓帕卡布拉吗？

Text: I could have traveled someplace else
I don't think we're in Kansas anymore.
NewTranslation: 我认为我们已经不是在堪萨斯了。

Text: You have an obligation to keep this place industry free!
NewTranslation: 你有义务让这里保持产业自由！

Text: A slice of Heaven on Earth.
I love that bar, the Jolly Roger.
I can't see stars like these where I'm from.
NewTranslation: 我再也看不到母星上那片灿烂的星辰了。

Text: What a sweet little goat! No, don't kill it!
NewTranslation: 多么可爱的小山羊！不，不要杀了他！

Text: I love how few cars there are here, it's so clean.
NewTranslation: 我喜欢这里的汽车，前置太干净了。

Text: There's nothing more romantic than a night by the fire.
NewTranslation: 没有什么比夜晚在炉边摆龙门阵更浪漫的了。

Text: At least you're safe from the allopath here.
NewTranslation: 至少在医生这里你是安全的。

Text: Huh, I was told it would be quiet here.
NewTranslation: 嗯，有人告诉我在这里要安静一点。

Text: Hey amigo, what street is this?
NewTranslation: 嘿！朋友，这条街叫什么名字？

Text: I'm here to spend some good quality time with the family.
NewTranslation: 我要和家人好好相处一段时间。

Text: Just got a call from the office...*sigh*
NewTranslation: 刚刚从办公室接到一个电话……*叹息*

Text: I bought a Tropican cigar, shhh, don't tell my wife.
NewTranslation: 我买了一支海岛雪茄，嘘……不要告诉我妻子。

Text: I fell asleep at the beach. Ouch!
NewTranslation: 我居然在沙滩上睡着了，哎呦！我的菊花。

Text: Three more days and I'm back to normal everyday life.
NewTranslation: 理论上只要3天时间我就会恢复正常。

Text: I don't like how them there amigos are looking at my daughters.
NewTranslation: 我不喜欢这些朋友看着我女儿。

Text: Where can I have some peace and quiet?
NewTranslation: 他妈的能不能给我安静一点？

Text: Oh, I think our precious little girl is in love.
NewTranslation: 哦，我想我们的小宝贝坠入爱河了。

Text: Ah, I could spend all day at the beach.
NewTranslation: 噢耶！我可以在这沙滩上玩一整天。

Text: *Sigh* they grow up so fast, don't they?
NewTranslation: *叹息*他们长得这么快，不是吗？

Text: Hi, where can I find a drug store? My husband fell asleep the beach.
NewTranslation: Hi，这儿哪里有药店吗？我丈夫在沙滩上睡着了。

Text: Haven't had this much fun since college!
NewTranslation: 大学以来还没有过这么多的乐子！

Text: Can't wait to get back to the hotel.
NewTranslation: 迫不及待的想去酒店开房。

Text: I think my husband been smoking again.
NewTranslation: 我觉得我的丈夫又开始抽烟了。

Text: Oh, I love the Lama De Gray.
There was mold in the opera house.
So many wonderful statues...all of them El Presidente.
NewTranslation: 这些美丽的雕像……全都是总统先生。

Text: The personality cult here is shocking!
NewTranslation: 这里的个人崇拜简直比苏联还叼！

Text: That tribesman's spear is made of plastic!
NewTranslation: 那个部落成员的矛是用塑料做的！

Text: The vampiric Tapir is my favorite cryptoid.
NewTranslation: 吸血狼人是我最喜欢的神秘生物。

Text: Where can I find the museum?
Do you work at the art gallery?
Oh, I love the Lama De Gray.
There was mold in the opera house.
So many wonderful statues...all of them El Presidente.
NewTranslation: 这些美丽的雕像……全都是总统先生。

Text: The personality cult here is shocking!
NewTranslation: 这里的个人崇拜简直比苏联还叼！

Text: I'm here because I read 50 Shades of Tucan.
NewTranslation: 我在这儿是因为我读过犀鸟的50道阴影。

Text: That tribesman's spear is made of plastic!
NewTranslation: 那个部落成员的矛是用塑料做的！

Text: Some good wine to go with a good painting.
NewTranslation: 好酒在欣赏美景时最好喝。

Text: Where can I find the museum?
I know a guy who could buy the whole island.
NewTranslation: 我知道谁可以买下这整座岛屿。

Text: I see some progress here. Cute.
NewTranslation: 我看到了一些进展，不错哦。

Text: What is it with you people?
NewTranslation: 你们这些人是怎么回事？
我们以前没被入侵之前？

Text: My husband could buy this whole beach.
NewTranslation: 我的丈夫可以买下这整块沙滩。

Text: I see some progress here. Cute.
NewTranslation: 我看到了一些进展，不错哦。
我正打电话给我的律师。

Text: I love that hill. I might buy it.
NewTranslation: 我喜欢这座山丘。我想要买它。

Text: I can't reach my shrink. What now?
NewTranslation: 我不会知难而退的，现在该做什么？

Text: Why do you talk so funny?
I want to ride a lama!

NewTranslation: 父亲说你拖了全宇宙的后腿

Text: My country can beat your country!
I want to ride a lama!

NewTranslation: 父亲说你拖了全宇宙的后腿。
哇啊啊啊……我要告诉我妈妈！

Text: My country can beat your country!
You have been disconnected from the server.
NewTranslation: 你已与服务器断开链接。

Text: The other player has left the game.

Connected to <host>:<port> game <game> city <city>
sent <events_sent_ps> received <events_received_ps><newline>
NewTranslation:
连接到<host>:<port>游戏<game>城市<city>
发送<events_sent_ps>接收<events_received_ps><newline>

Text: A road intersection is too near.
The highlighted objects are blocking the construction.
NewTranslation: 无法在高亮的建筑物上进行建造。

Text: Roads can't be built outside the map.
The terrain is unsuitable for construction.
You don't have enough money to build this road.
NewTranslation: 你没有足够的资金建设这条道路。

Text: The road crosses an unexplored area.
NewTranslation: 道路穿过了未探索区域。

Text: The road crosses the territory of another player.
NewTranslation: 道路穿过了其他玩家的领土。

Text: No additional road building. The entire road budget goes to keeping the holes of the current roads in an orderly fashion. Demolish some existing roads if you want to build more.
NewTranslation: 不能再建更多的道路。所有的道路养护开支都用来保证现有道路网的完整有序了。如果想建更多道路，请先删除一些现有道路。

Text: Accept (Currently you have too many tasks)
NewTranslation: 接受(你手头的任务太多了)

Text: The workers here are on strike and the building is not functioning.
NewTranslation: 工人罢工，建筑无法运行。

Text: After declaring himself President for Life of Haiti, Francois Duvalier banished all Catholic bishops from the country and pronounced himself the incarnation of the vengeful spirit of death - Baron Samedi.
NewTranslation: 弗朗索瓦·杜瓦利埃在宣布自己成为海地总统之后，他驱逐了这个国家所有的天主教主教并宣称自己是复仇死魂-安息日男爵萨梅迪的化身。

Text: Believing his rival had turned into a black dog, President Francois Duvalier ordered all black dogs in Haiti hunted and killed.
NewTranslation: 弗朗索瓦·杜瓦利埃总统认为他的对手变成了一条黑狗，所以他下令屠尽了海地的黑狗。

Text: Francois Duvalier once called for early elections in Haiti, baffling everyone as his "term" wasn't over for two more years. Things become rather clear when his 100% victory was announced.
NewTranslation: 弗朗索瓦·杜瓦利埃曾经呼吁提前进行大选，为此所有人都感到莫名其妙，因为他的“任期”还有两年才会结束。但是当他以100%支持率获胜的时候，事情就一目了然了。

Text: In his later years, President of Haiti - Francois Duvalier, declared he alone was responsible for the death of JFK, after casting a curse upon him.
NewTranslation: 海地总统弗朗索瓦·杜瓦利埃在晚年的时候声称他自己将对美国肯尼迪总统的死单独负责，因为他对肯尼迪施过诅咒。

Text: Saparmurat Niyazov, President of Turkmenistan, took a liking to renaming things, like the days of the week or the months. He even changed the word for "bread" to be after the name of his mother - Gurbansoltan.
NewTranslation: 土库曼斯坦总统萨帕尔穆拉特·尼亚佐夫喜欢给东西重新命名，比如星期或者月份。他甚至改变了“面包”这个词。将其变成了他母亲的名字-尔班索尔坦。

Text: Saparmurat Niyazov, self-proclaimed President and Father of Turkmenistan had a 12 meter golden statue of himself built upon a 75 meter high arc - with the statue rotating so it always faces the sun.
NewTranslation: 萨帕尔穆拉特·尼亚佐夫将自己封为土库曼斯坦总统和国父，并为自己建造了一座12米高的黄金雕像，并将其放在75米高的穹顶结构上，以使雕像可以自由旋转来时刻面朝太阳。

Text: Saparmurat Niuazov, president of Turkmenistan from 1990 to 2006, outlawed beards for men and make-up for TV anchors - insisting that Turkmenistan women are naturally beautiful and do not need it.
NewTranslation: 从1990年到2006年土库曼斯坦的总统萨帕尔穆拉特·尼亚佐夫禁止男性留胡子和电视女主播化妆-他坚称土库曼斯坦的女人天生丽质，不需要化妆。

Text: The President of Turkmenistan, Saparmurat Niyazov, wrote a book called Book of the Soul. It was made compulsory to learn in schools and to be held in the same regard as the Quran in mosques throughout the country. Also, in 2006 a copy of the book was sent to space.
NewTranslation: 土库曼斯坦总统萨帕尔穆拉特·尼亚佐夫写了叫做《灵魂之书》的书。他强迫所有的人们去学习书中的知识，并要求全国的清真寺给予等同《古兰经》的地位。而且在2006年，他还把这本书送入太空。

Text: Saparmurat Niyazov had all hospitals outside of Turkmenistan's capital closed as he felt it was reasonable for people needing medical care to travel to the capital.
NewTranslation: 萨帕尔穆拉特·尼亚佐夫下令关闭了除土库曼斯坦首度外的所有医院，因为他认为让那些患者来首都进行医疗是合情合理的。

Text: Rafael Trujillo, President of the Dominican Republic, appointed his 3 year old son colonel, and went on to make him General at the age of 10.
NewTranslation: 多米尼亚共和国总统拉斐尔·特鲁希略将他3岁的儿子封为上校，并在其10岁的时册封为将军。

Text: Rafael Trujillo, President of the Dominican Republic, campaigned to win a noble prize in literature for his illiterate wife, after honoring her as a writer and philosopher.
NewTranslation: 多米尼亚共和国总统拉斐尔·特鲁希略给予自己文盲的妻子作家和哲学家的荣耀，在此之后试图为她争取诺贝尔文学奖。

Text: Rafael Trujillo required every license plate in the Dominican Republic to say "Viva Trujillo" and every church to say "God in Heaven, Trujillo on Earth".
NewTranslation: 拉斐尔·特鲁希略要求多美尼亚共和国内所有的车牌都写上“特鲁希略万岁”，还要求每个教堂都说“天堂属于神，大地属于特鲁希略”。

Text: Rafael Trujillo, President of the Dominican Republic, he had streets, provinces, mountains, schools and bridges named not only in his honor, but in honor of various members of his family as well.
NewTranslation: 多米尼亚共和国总统拉斐尔·特鲁希略下令不光要以自己的名字，还要以自己众多的家人的名字命名为所有街道，省份，山脉，学校和桥梁命名

Text: When in Rome in August 2010, Muammar Gaddafi paid a modeling agency to get 500 women to attend his lecture where he tried to get them to convert to Islam.
NewTranslation: 2010年八月，穆阿迈尔·卡扎菲付钱给一个模特公司，让他们派遣500名女模特参加他的演讲，并在演讲中试图令他们皈依伊斯兰教。

Text: Muammar Gaddafi had a fear of climbing more than 35 steps at a time and would often refuse to go to the upper floors of buildings.
NewTranslation: 穆阿迈尔·卡扎菲恐高，一次爬上35阶台阶就会害怕，所以经常拒绝前往建筑物的高层。

Text: When travelling, Muammar Gaddafi slept in a Bedouin tent that he brought along with him. He sometimes brought camels and horses along as well.
NewTranslation: 穆阿迈尔·卡扎菲在旅行的时候，会住在一顶随身携带的贝多因人帐篷中。有时候他也会带马匹和骆驼。

Text: Muammar Gaddafi decreed that all his bodyguards be female virgins.
NewTranslation: 穆阿迈尔·卡扎菲下令他的保镖必须都是处女。

Text: Mobutu Sese Seko, former President of Zaire, and had an airport especially constructed so he could charter Concorde jets to take shopping trips in Paris with his family.
NewTranslation: 扎伊尔前总统蒙博托·塞塞·塞科为自己特别建造了一个机场，来使他能够包协和客机带着家人去巴黎购物。

Text: In Zaire, the evening news was always preceded with an image of autocratic ruler Mobutu Sese Seko, smiling through the clouds and looking down from the heavens. He also forbade the newscasters to mention anybody but him by name.
NewTranslation: 在扎伊尔，晚间新闻中永远都会出现独裁领袖蒙博托·塞塞·塞科在云间微笑，俯瞰大地的图片。而且他还禁止新闻人士提及除了他的名字以外的任何名字。

Text: Mobutu, dictator of Zaire, had prohibited anybody except him from wearing leopard-print hats and carried with him a wooden cane that he claimed took the strength of eight men to carry.
NewTranslation: 扎伊尔的独裁领袖蒙博托，戴着除自己外禁止任何人佩戴的豹纹帽，手中拿着一把据说需要八个人的力量才拿得动的木杖。

Text: Mobutu Sese Seko, ruler of Zaire, once paid Muhammad Ali and George Foreman $5 million each to fight in his country to give it more recognition in the world.
NewTranslation: 扎伊尔的统治者蒙博托·塞塞·塞科，曾经付给默罕默德·阿里和乔治·福尔曼每人五百万美金来让他们在自己的国家对战，以增加自己国家在世界上的知名度。

Text: The ruler of Zaire had his name changed to Mobutu Sese Seko Nkuku Ngbendu Wa Za Banga ("The all-powerful warrior who, because of his endurance and inflexible will to win, goes from conquest to conquest, leaving fire in his wake").
NewTranslation: 扎伊尔的领袖将自己的名字改成了蒙博托·塞塞·塞科·恩库库·内阁本都·瓦·扎·邦加(“凭借其强大耐力和必胜信念而百战百胜，并在身后留下燃烧之径的强大男人”)。

Text: When Francisco Nguema was President of The Republic of Equatorial Guinea, he banned the word "intellectual", shut down schools, drove educated people out of his country and declared himself the Grandmaster of Education, Science and Culture.
NewTranslation: 在弗朗西斯科·恩圭马还是赤道几内亚共和国总统的时候，他驱逐了“知识分子”:关闭学校，并将受过教育的人赶出了他的国家，并宣称自己是教育，科学和文化的导师。

Text: Francisco Nguema shut down several hospitals in Equatorial Guinea in favor of his witch doctor ancestry.
NewTranslation: 弗朗西斯科·恩圭马因自己有位作为巫医的祖先，关闭了赤道几内亚的多家医院。

Text: Francisco Nguema changed The Republic of Equatorial Guinea's national motto to "There is no other God than Macias Nguema."
NewTranslation: 弗朗西斯科·恩圭马将赤道几内亚共和国的座右铭改成了“世上唯一真神只有马西亚斯·恩圭马”

Text: Once while in power, Francisco Nguema banned the use of lubricants in power plants, claiming that he had the magical capacity to keep them operational - he could not - and caused major power outages throughout Equatorial Guinea.
NewTranslation: 当弗朗西斯科·恩圭马当政的时候，他禁止电厂使用润滑油，因为他说他有迷の力量可以让电厂正常运作，但是显然他没有，并因此而造成整个赤道几内亚都出现断电现象。

Text: In a stroke of genius, Nguema - President of Equatorial Guinea - had the the governor of the public bank killed and hid all the money in his jungle shed.
NewTranslation: 赤道几内亚的总统恩圭马突发奇想杀掉了共和国银行的管理人员，然后将所有钱财都藏在自己的林中小屋里。

Text: A former chef for Kim Jong II revealed the North Korean leader employed staff to make sure the grains of rice served to him were absolutely uniform in size and color.
NewTranslation: 朝鲜前领导人金正日曾经让手下确保每天给他送上的米饭的所有米粒大小和颜色都一致。

Text: According to his official biography, Kim Jong II's birth in Baekdu Mountain was prophesied by a swallow and heralded with a double rainbow and a new star in the heavens.
NewTranslation: 根据官方记载，“伟大领袖金正日出生在一个神山上，他出生前祥瑞之像纷至:双虹汇聚，百鸟齐鸣”

Text: Apart from claiming that he is the greatest golfer in the history of existence, Kim Jong II also apparently composed six operas and enjoyed staging musicals.
NewTranslation: 金正日声称自己除了是史上最厉害的高尔夫球员之外，他还写过六部歌剧，而且他非常享受在舞台上表演。

Text: Kim Jong II had a town called Kijong-Dong built right in the Demilitarized Zone between North and South Korea and had a small crew work around the clock to preserve the illusion that people actually live there - as a farce to try to trick South Koreans into defecting.
NewTranslation: 金正日在朝韩边界停火区设置了一个叫做和平村(Kijong-Dong)的小镇，还让一小队人员在那里昼夜不停地工作，希望以此使韩国人相信真的有人住在那里-这只不过是他想要引诱韩国人叛逃的一个闹剧而已。

Text: Kim Jong II told his people that he invented the hamburger, after which he built a hamburger factory, saying "I've made up my mind to feed quality bread and french-fries to university students, professors and researchers even if we are in (economic) hardship".
NewTranslation: 金正日在建造了汉堡工厂后告诉他的子民们是他发明了汉堡包，他说“即使我们目前处于经济困难时期，但是我依然决定要为大学生，教授和研究员们提供高质量的面包和薯条”。

Text: Kim Jong II is rumored to have had spent $350,000 a year on brandy and to always had traveled with a pack of beautiful women he referred to as his "Pleasure Squad."
NewTranslation: 据说金正日每年为了购买白兰地要花掉三十五万美元，而且每次出门都会带着一群叫做“欢乐队”的女子。

Text: Idi Amin Dada called himself "His Excellency, President for Life Field Marshall Al Hadj Doctor Idi Amin Dada, VC, DSO, MC. Lord of all the Beasts of the Earth and Fishes of the Sea and Conqueror of the British Empire in Africa in General and Uganda in Particular".
NewTranslation: 伊迪·阿敏·达达将自己称作“总督大人，终身总统阁下，战区总指挥伊迪·阿敏·达达博士，维多利亚十字勳章获得者，优异服役勋章获得者，军功十字勳章的获得者。万王之王。日不落帝国征服者”。

Text: An African despot, Idi Amin Dada laid claim to the Scottish throne and offered to marry Queen Elizabeth to lead the Commonwealth.
NewTranslation: 伊迪·阿敏·达达是一个非洲独裁者，他宣称自己有权成为苏格兰王，并提出要和伊丽莎白女皇结婚以共同领导联邦。

Text: To mock the people who pointed out Uganda's crippling famine, Idi Amin Dada created the "Save Britain Fund" by taking a truckload of food from starving peasants and offering it to the U.K.
NewTranslation: 伊迪·阿敏·达达通过建立“拯救不列颠基金”来从饥饿的民众手中夺取食物并交给英国人，这造成了乌干达灾难性的饥荒。

Text: Mad at the Queen of Britain for her refusal to marry him, Idi Amin Dada had four local British businessmen to carry him around in a sedan chair at a diplomatic conference in Uganda.
NewTranslation: 由于不列颠女王拒绝嫁给伊迪·阿敏·达达，所以在乌干达，他让四个当地的英国商人抬着他坐的轿子来出席外交会议。

Text: When Mariano Melgerejo of Bolivia was presented with a white stallion as a gift from Brazil, he was so stunned by the horse that he immediately took a map of Bolivia and put one of its hooves on it ... and gave the Brazilians the entire area covered by it.
NewTranslation: 当马里亚诺·梅尔加雷霍收到了来自巴西的礼物-一匹白色公马的时候，他非常惊讶，立刻拿出来了一幅玻利维亚地图，并将一只马蹄放在了地图上……然后巴西人的马蹄覆盖了全部区域。

Text: Melgarejo of Bolivia, having heard the history of Caligula and his horse consul, thought the story was so cool that he made his horse, named Holofernes, General of Bolivia.
NewTranslation: 梅尔加雷霍在听说卡利古拉将自己的马任命为执政官之后，觉得太给力了，然后也将自己那匹名叫荷罗孚尼的马也任命为玻利维亚的将军。

Text: Bucaram, elected President of Ecuador in 1996, was known as "El Loco" ("The Madman"), a nickname he championed himself.
NewTranslation: 于1996年被选为厄瓜多尔总统布卡拉姆，给自己起了一个叫“艾尔·洛克”(“疯子”)的昵称。

Text: While President, Bucaram recorded a pop album called A Madman in Love ... which he released while still in office and also took advantage of his president side job to circulate his demo to other presidents at an Ibero-American conference in Chile.
NewTranslation: 布卡拉姆总统在位时出了一张流行音乐专辑《陷入爱河》……他并利用职务之便在智力召开的伊比利美洲会议期间，将自己的专辑播放给其他国家的总统听。

Text: One of the first things Bucaram did after taking office was to place his business associates in high government positions and fill the rest of the cabinet with his own family. He even put his 18-year-old son in charge of the Ecuadorian customs office.
NewTranslation: 布卡拉姆上任之后做的第一件事就是将高官厚禄赏赐给他的生意伙伴，并将内阁的剩余席位全安排上了自家人。他甚至让他18岁的儿子掌管厄瓜多尔的海关。

Text: While head of state of an economically struggling Ecuador, Bucaram offered professional coach Diego Maradona $1 million to play one soccer game with him.
NewTranslation: 作为厄瓜多尔这个饱受经济危机困绕国家的总统，布卡拉姆付给了专业教练迭戈·马拉多纳一百万美元，就为了让他和自己踢一场球赛。

Text: In his later years, Jean Bedel Bokassa declared himself the 13th Apostle and claimed that he frequently met the Pope in secret.
NewTranslation: 简·贝德尔·博卡萨在晚年的时候宣称自己隶属于法王厅十三课，并透露出他经常和教皇悄悄见面。

Text: Bokassa crowned himself emperor of the Central African Empire (which he made up one day) in a ceremony that cost the country's annual GDP, where two-thirds of the population lived with less than a dollar per day.
NewTranslation: 博卡萨在一场消耗了中非帝国(他编造的名字)全年GPD的奢华仪式中为自己加冕，而这个国家三分之二的人口每天的生活物资连一美元都不到。

Text: Ne Win consulted soothsayers on almost every aspect of his decision making in his nearly 3 decades as ruler of Burma.
NewTranslation: 奈温在近三十年担任缅甸统治者期间，所作出的几乎所有决定都要征求占卜师的意见。

Text: Being extremely superstitious, Burma's President Ne Win reportedly bathed in dolphin blood believing it restored his youth and vitality and would also cross bridges backwards to ward off evil.
NewTranslation: 缅甸总统奈温非常迷信，据说他会用海豚血洗澡，因为他相信这样做可以恢复他的年轻活力，而且过桥的时候也倒着走，以期阻挡恶魔。

Text: One shiny day, Ne Win, head of state of Burma, announced that he was going to change the currency into denominations of 15, 30, 45 and 90, so that he could live to be over 90 years old. This minor inconvenience effectively rendered the population's savings invalid.
NewTranslation: 有一天，缅甸的统治者奈温宣布他要把货币面值改成15，30，45，90，这样他就可以活得超过90岁。这个小小的不变有效地非法蒸发了人们的储蓄。

Text: Enver Hoxha banned beards, typewriters and color TVs in Albania.
NewTranslation: 恩维尔·霍查在阿尔巴尼亚禁止了面包，打字机和彩电。

Text: Enver Hoxha famously built 750,000 bunkers across Albania, to protect its meager 3 million inhabitants from a hypothetic Soviet invasion.
NewTranslation: 恩维尔·霍查因为在阿尔巴尼亚全境建造了750000个碉堡而闻名于世，他这么做仅仅为了能够在他假想出的苏联入侵中保护他可怜的三百万人口。

Text: Visitors to Albania were forced to go through a disinfectant bath, by decree of Enver Hoxha.
NewTranslation: 恩维尔·霍查制定了一个法令，使所有造访阿尔巴尼亚的游客都必须进行消毒。

Text: Comrade, Chairman, Prime Minister, Foreign Minister, Minister of War, Commander-in-Chief of the People's Army Enver Hoxha, was the dictator of Albania. He got that title because he rewarded all cabinet positions to himself.
NewTranslation: 恩维尔·霍查是阿尔巴尼亚的独裁者，他有着同志，主席，首相，司令，总司令，国防部长以及人民军队的最高指挥官称号。他得到如此多头衔的原因就是他一个人兼任了内阁的所有职位。

Text: Enver Hoxha kidnapped a dentist in rural Albania who looked like him, then forced plastic surgery on him to make the resemblance even more so - leaving the poor fellow no choice but to leave his life behind and live on pretending to be the prime minister.
NewTranslation: 恩维尔·霍查在阿尔巴尼亚乡村绑架了一个和他长得很像的牙医，然后强行给这个牙医做了整形手术，从而再次减少两人之间的差别-这个可怜的牙医别无选择，只能抛弃之前的平静生活，以首相替身的身份继续活着。

Text: Nicolae Ceausescu made sure that the street leading right up to the palace was constructed to be exactly 1 meter wider than the Champs Elysees in Paris.... just because.
NewTranslation: 尼古拉斯·齐奥塞斯库确保通向皇宫的接到比巴黎的香榭丽舍大街整整宽一米……只为…

Text: Nicolae Ceausescu called himself The Genius of the Carpathians and even made a scepter for himself, prompting Salvador Dali to personally send a telegram of mocking, but having no concept of satire, Ceausescu had Dali's letter published on the front page of the newspaper.
NewTranslation: 尼古拉斯·齐奥塞斯库将自己称为喀尔巴阡山的天才，甚至还给自己做了一个王权节杖，萨尔瓦多·达利立即私下拍发了一封讽刺电报，但他没有任何讽刺的天赋，齐奥塞斯库将达利的信件发表在了报纸首页上。

Text: In 1980, Ceausescu destroyed most of the historical part of Bucharest in order to build what was lauded as the biggest building in the world after the Pentagon. After his death, Romania's Parliament moved in, only able to use 30 % of the building.
NewTranslation: 1980年，齐奥塞斯库以拆除了布加勒斯特的大部分历史建筑，为了建造据说是世界上继五角大楼之后最大的建筑。在他死后，罗马尼亚议会搬了进去，但是其中只有30%的区域可被使用。

Text: Ceausescu demanded that his nearly illiterate wife be made a member of the New York Academy of Sciences and the Royal Institute of Chemistry. In Romania, she been crowned "Comrade-Academician-Doctor-Engineer," and top scientists had to include her name in their research.
NewTranslation: 齐奥塞斯库想要让他那近乎文盲的妻子成为纽约科学学会成员和皇家化学学会成员。在罗马尼亚，她被冠以“同志，院士，博士，工程师”称号，而且该国的科学家们必须在自己的研究中署上她的名字。

Text: Ceausescu proclaimed his alcoholic and womanizing son, to be a "scientist of international reputation" and alleged that he had published several volumes on nuclear physics.
NewTranslation: 齐奥塞斯库宣布，他那沉溺于酒色的儿子是“国际知名科学家”而且声称他在核能物理学领域已经出版过多本著作。

Text: Kim II Sung claimed that he could turn sand into rice, and that he could cross rivers on leaves
NewTranslation: 金日成说他可化沙为米，可一苇渡江

Text: This building is inside your territory. You can demolish it.
NewTranslation: 此建筑出在你的控制区。你可以拆除它。

Text: Use <image UI/Xbox/A.tga> to place, <image UI/Xbox/B.tga> to cancel.

Left-click to place.
Right-click to cancel.
NewTranslation:
左键放置建筑。
右键取消。

Text: This building is scheduled for construction.
NewTranslation: 此建筑正在计划建造阶段。

Text: Too far from road network connected to a construction office.
NewTranslation: 距道路过远没有能连接到建筑单位。

Text: We're about to lose this battle.
NewTranslation: 不是国军不努力，是敌军太狡猾，我们要输了。

Text: Sends an expedition to explore new territories
NewTranslation: 派出一个探险队去探索新领地
拆除功能在教程中不可用

Text: Use <A> to place, <B> to cancel, <LB>/<RB> to rotate.
NewTranslation: 用<A>来放置，<B>来取消，<LB>/<RB>来旋转。

Text:
Left-click to place.
Right-click to cancel.
NewTranslation:
左键放置。
右键取消。

Text: Use the mouse wheel or the [ and ] keys to rotate.
NewTranslation: 用鼠标中轮或者[和]键来旋转。

Text: Sends an expedition to explore new territories
NewTranslation: 派出一个探险队去探索新领地

Text: The citizen is already scheduled for execution
This citizen is going to emigrate
NewTranslation: 这个公民将会移民国外

Text: This citizen will be executed. Family members and bystanders will be angered. Increases the civil unrest. If the target or the target's spouse is a faction leader this action influences his faction.
NewTranslation: 这个公民将会被处死。他的家人和旁观者将会很愤怒。增加动荡内乱。如果目标或者目标的配偶是某个派别的领袖这个行为将会影响他们的派别。

Text: This citizen is going to emigrate
NewTranslation: 这个公民将会移民国外

Text: Increases the approval of the citizen and its spouse and increases their family wealth. If the target or the target's spouse is a faction leader this action influences his faction.
NewTranslation: 增加这个公民和他配偶的支持度同时增加他家庭的财富水平。如果目标或者目标的配偶是某个派别的领袖这个行为将会影响他们的派别。

Text: This citizen is going to emigrate
NewTranslation: 这个公民将会移民国外

Text: The target and his or her family will leave the island. You may appropriate some of the family wealth. Increases the civil unrest. If the target or the target's spouse is a faction leader this action influences his faction.
NewTranslation: 目标和目标的家人将会离开海岛。你可以占有他们一部分的家庭财产。增加动荡内乱。如果目标或者目标的配偶是某个派别的领袖这个行为将会影响他们的派别。

Text: This citizen is going to emigrate
NewTranslation: 这个公民将会移民国外

Text: Fabricate compromising evidence. The target drops of any island factions. Target's family will be angered. Increases the civil unrest. If the target is a faction leader, the faction will lose some supporters.
NewTranslation: 伪造十足的证据。目标将被踢出任何岛上派别。目标家庭将会很愤怒。增加动荡内乱。如果目标是某个派别的领袖，这个派别将会失去一部分支持者。

Text: <red>The dynasty member is not on the island at this moment.</red>
NewTranslation: <red>该家族成员当前暂时不在岛上。</red>

Text: <red>The dynasty member is leaving the island at this moment.</red>
NewTranslation: <red>该家族正在现在暂时已离开岛屿。</red>
