Text:
Thanks for playing the Omerta: City of Gangsters demo. The full version features a story driven campaign with 16 missions across the entire Atlantic City, many new gangsters you can hire and a host of combat encounters.

You have carved a piece of the Boardwalk for yourself, but the whole city is there for the taking!

Visit www.cityofgangsters.com for more information.
NewTranslation:
感谢来到黑手党:强盗之城的演示。这个由故事驱动的战役完整版本共有16个任务，围着着这整个大西洋的城市进行，你可以雇佣很多新的强盗，遭遇很多战斗。

你已经为你自己开出了一条路，但整个城市还等着你去占领！
访问www.cityofgangsters.com获取更多信息。
当前没有研究任何东西

Text: PgUp/PgDn or mouse wheel for prev/next page.
NewTranslation: 按PgUp/PgDn或使用鼠标滚轮来翻页。

Text: ESC to close the prompt with cancel. ENTER to confirm the choice.
<B> to close the prompt with cancel. <A> to confirm the choice.
Start a game with a new dynasty.
You can issue bounds to increase your sovereign debt. You will gain money for your Treasury, but Tropico pays interest on debt each year. You can lower the sovereign debt by buying bounds.
NewTranslation: 你可以主动发行你的主权债务。你可以从国债中获取资金，但为此每年海岛都需要付出相应的利息。你可以通过回购债券来降低你的主权债务。
正在被使用的贸易路线

Text: <red>You need at least <standing> standing with <country> to sign this contract</red>
NewTranslation: <red>你在<country>的声望至少需要达成<standing>方可签署此项协议</red>

Text: No applicable managers on the island.
NewTranslation: 岛上没有合适的管理者。
此为测试版-不代表最终质量

Text: o o o o o o
NewTranslation: o o o o o o
增加新的船只以开始贸易

Text: The active controller was disconnected. Please reconnect it in order to continue your game.
NewTranslation: 手柄已断开，请重新连接以继续游戏。

Text: Share electricity with <player_name>. Consumers must still be within the grids of electricity producers.
NewTranslation: 和<player_name>共享电力。用电户必须处于电网内。

Text: Share construction workers with <player_name>. Constructors must be able to reach a construction site via the road network to service it.
NewTranslation: 与<player_name>共享建筑工人。建筑工人必须通过道路网才能到达施工现场为其服务。

Text: Share teamster workers with <player_name>. Teamsters must be able to reach buildings via the road network to service them.
NewTranslation: 与<player_name>共享物流人员。物流人员必须通过道路网才能为其服务。

Text: The primary purpose of this craft, as suggested by its name, is to transport air from one location to another. The demand for air declined due to the global recession, so we had to branch into carrying other stuff like jet planes.
NewTranslation: 就像它的名字一样，航“空”母舰，它的主要目的就是把空气从这个地方运到另外一个地方，但是随着全球经济的不景气，我们不得不开始运输其他的货物，比如喷气式飞机。

Text: Improves the bombing run damage and decreases the chance for collateral damage.
NewTranslation: 提高炸弹伤害，减小造成的附加伤害

Text: Landing is especially dangerous in Tropico, where inexperienced pilots tend to be distracted by the beautiful vistas, the dancing senoritas below and the picturesque industrial fumes. In one particular mishap we accidentally invented the seaplane!
NewTranslation: 菜鸟飞行员往往会被美丽的海岛景色，醉人的舞姿，风景如画的工业区弄的分心，从而让飞机着陆变得非常危险，所以我们发明了水上飞机。

Text: Attracts more tourists, that arrive on the island via plane. Increases Tourism Rating by 10. Unique.
NewTranslation: 吸引更多的游客坐飞机来岛游览。增加旅游评级10。

Text: All foreign relations are increased by 10 but the budget of the Airport will be increased by 10%.
NewTranslation: 所有外交关系+10，机场预算增加10%。

Text: The Ancient Ruins may appear like piles of old stones, but actually they represent the cultural heritage of Tropico. Stealing from these historical sites is sanctioned by an ancient voodoo curse that is so severe that no one dares enter. Any man who enters loses his will to drink rum.
NewTranslation: 古代遗迹由一堆古老的石头组成，事实上这些石头代表着海岛最悠久的历史文化遗产，其中包含着古代巫术的诅咒，非常灵验，没人敢随意进去。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Must be placed on a deposit.

Preferred Tourist Class - Cultural
NewTranslation: 必须交纳押金，才会为附近的土豪市民和游客提供娱乐服务。推荐旅游业类型-文艺游客

Text: Slob tourists are added as a preferred tourist class.
NewTranslation: 添加闲散游客为最适宜游客等级。

Text: Activate to stop citizens from visiting this building (only tourists will visit). The Service Quality will increase by 10.
NewTranslation: 启用后，岛民将被禁止访问此建筑(只有游客允许访问)。服务质量增加10。

Text: Apartment complexes offer a decent, albeit not luxurious, standard of living and are a definite improvement over the crowded tenements. Families living in apartments are often able to afford their own cars and proximity to the island's road network is a plus.
NewTranslation: 公寓提供人们一个体面却不奢侈的居所，这里足够宽敞，住的都是可以买的起汽车的家庭。

Text: Provides housing for 10 families. Housing Quality is increased if placed next to a road.
NewTranslation: 提供10户家庭居住，建立在道路旁会提高住房质量。

Text: The Apartment has higher Housing Quality because it is placed next to a road.
NewTranslation: 建立在道路旁会提高住房质量。

Text: Housing Quality is increased by 15 but the building consumes 20 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 房屋质量提高15，消耗20MW电力。

Text: Activate to add housing space for 4 more families but Housing Quality will be reduced by 10.
NewTranslation: 启用群租房，多容纳4户家庭，房屋质量下降10

Text: Tropican tanks stationed at the army base are designed with top secret specifications. They can shoot pineapples out of their barrels with deadly precision at the astounding 100 yards! The crew blows the pineapple out with a coordinated effort.
NewTranslation: 海岛的坦克驻扎在拥有最高保密程度的基地里，他们可以轻松命中百米外的菠萝，当然这也得菠萝肯配合才行。

Text: Replaces the Tanks in the Army Base with Tanks MKII
NewTranslation: 用MKII型坦克取代军事基地里的坦克

Text: From digging to packaging, every step of the process is fully automated. We have to keep a few workers on duty because of syndicate regulations, but the only thing they do is pressing the big green start button at the beginning of each work cycle.
NewTranslation: 从挖掘到包装。每一步过程都是自动化的。我们只要安排几个工人值班就可以了，他们需要做的只是按下绿色的启动按钮。

Text: Must be constructed over mining deposits and produces ore (Bauxite, Coal, Gold, Iron or Uranium) based on the deposit type.
NewTranslation: 必须建立在对应的铝土矿，煤矿，金矿，铁和铀矿矿床上。

Text: Increases the effectiveness by 30 and decreases the Job Quality by 10
NewTranslation: 产量增加30，减少10的工作品质

Text: Increases the available amount of resources in the deposit by 20 000 units.
NewTranslation: 增加20000个单位的矿床资源

Text: From digging to packaging, every step of the process is fully automated. We have to keep a few workers on duty because of syndicate regulations, but the only thing they do is pressing the big green start button at the beginning of each work cycle..

NewTranslation: 必须建立在对应的铝土矿，煤矿，金矿，铁和铀矿矿床上。

Text: Increases workers by 3 and Effectiveness by 30.
NewTranslation: 增加三名工人。产量增加30%。

Text: Increases the available amount of resources in the deposit by 20 000 units.
NewTranslation: 增加20000个单位的矿床资源

NewTranslation: 增加20000个单位的矿床资源

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20, but pollution is increased by 30.
NewTranslation: 产量增加20，但是污染会增加30

Text: From digging to packaging, every step of the process is fully automated. We have to keep a few workers on duty because of syndicate regulations, but the only thing they do is pressing the big green start button at the beginning of each work cycle.
NewTranslation: 从挖掘到包装。每一步过程都是自动化的。我们只要安排几个工人值班就可以了，他们需要做的只是按下绿色的启动按钮。

Text: Increases the available amount of resources in the deposit by 20 000 units.

Text: Lowers pollution to the amount typical for other mines
NewTranslation: 相对于其他矿业，污染减少

Text: Increases the available amount of resources in the deposit by 20 000 units.
NewTranslation: 增加20000个单位的矿床资源

Text: You need money to make money. Bankers have perfected this process by locking as much money as possible in their vaults and leaving it to procreate there. Every morning they count the new bills that appeared overnight and set the interest rates accordingly.
NewTranslation: 你需要用钱来赚钱。银行家们很热衷这个:把所有钱所在银行里，第二天来数数赚了多少，然后设定一下新的利率。

Text: Generates interest rate on money in the treasury.
NewTranslation: 利用财政资金生成利息

Text: Activate to syphon part of the treasury to your Swiss Bank Account each month. The Bank will no longer provide interest on the treasury.
NewTranslation: 每个月从国库向你的瑞士银行偷点公款。银行将不再发放利息。

Text: The Bank generates revenue for each tourist on the island.
NewTranslation: 银行可以在每一位游客身上产生利润

Text: Tropican Barracks regularly produce heroes. These are the type of heroes who can drink all night, then grab their rifles and shoot twenty rebels in a line. With one shot. Sometimes even less.
NewTranslation: 海岛里的兵营经常会出现英雄。英雄们通宵饮酒狂欢，然后抓起步枪对着一打叛军一顿啪啪啪，结果才干掉一个，有时更少……

Text: Replaces the Infantry in the Barracks with Modern Infantry
NewTranslation: 用现代化步兵取代传统步兵

Text: I was going to write a flavor text here, but the sun, the waves and the breeze are so nice, that I won't even bother. Surfs up, wish you were here! Signed: your friendly flavor-text writer, XOXO.
NewTranslation: 我本打算来这里写篇抒情散文，但是阳光、海浪、海风是如此怡人，以至于不忍叨扰。希望你也能同享此美。签名:您友好的散文作家，XOXO。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for citizens and tourists in the vicinity.

Preferred Tourist Class - Family
NewTranslation:
为附近的市民和游客提供娱乐服务。
 
推荐游客类型-家庭

Text: Wealthy tourists are added as preferred tourist class.
What's the next best thing after having your own tropical island? Renting a luxurious villa on the beach of somebody else's island, that's what!
NewTranslation: 拥有自己的岛屿之后下一个最令人激动的事是什么呢？租一栋别人岛屿的豪华海滩别墅吧！对，正是如此！

Text: Provides room for a single Wealthy tourist family. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Service Quality drops for each residential building nearby.
NewTranslation: 为单个土豪游客提供房间。服务的质量取决于景色。附近房屋增多服务质量就会下降。

Text: There's nothing like a relaxing vacation in a romantic straw hut next to the azure sea. Just lay all day eating pizza, drinking beer from a can and singing drunken songs when the mood strikes you. Pity those fat slob tourists and their noisy kids are around to spoil everybody's fun.
NewTranslation: 没什么比在蔚蓝的大海边度假更浪漫的事了。就这样躺一整天，吃披萨，喝啤酒，唱情歌。可惜那些又胖又穷的游客和他们的孩子太煞风景了。

Text: Provides rooms for 5 Slob tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Service Quality is increased for each entertainment building nearby.
NewTranslation: 为5个休闲游客家庭提供服务。服务质量取决于景色。附近娱乐设施增加会提高服务质量。

Text: The Cabaret is an important social institution in Tropico. Not only does it support young ladies who want to go to college but also provides affordable counseling options for over-worked patrons.
NewTranslation: 歌舞厅可是海岛里最重要的社会场所了。不仅为不想上大学的年轻姑娘提供工作。工作繁重的岛民也可以来这里休闲放松。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Children can't visit the Cabaret.

Preferred Tourist Class - Wealthy
NewTranslation: 为附近的富有的市民和游客提供娱乐场所。未满十八岁可不能进入哦。适宜游客类型-富有

Text: Cabins are where we keep the eco-tourists so they don't get mixed up with our normal tourists. Cabins work best when placed far from civilization, just the way the eco-tourists and the civilization like it.
NewTranslation: 小木屋为生态游客提供了去处。通常远离市区。生态游客和市民都喜欢这里。

Text: Provides rooms for 2 Eco tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Service Quality drops if there are many building nearby.
NewTranslation: 可以为两个生态游客家庭提供服务。服务质量取决于景色。附近建筑增多服务质量会下降。

Text: Canned Food is predicted to become the most desired commodity in the post apocalyptic future. Here's hoping that the apocalypse comes before the expiration date on the cans!
NewTranslation: 罐头食品被预言成世界末日来临后未来最需要的商品。希望世界末日在罐头质保期之前来到吧。

Text: Produces Canned Goods from Coffee, Fish and Pineapples.
NewTranslation: 生产咖啡。鱼和菠萝罐头

Text: Decreases workers by 4 and increases Effectiveness by 20.
Adds an additional production cycle. Allows the Cannery to process Meat into Canned Goods.
NewTranslation: 增加额外生产周期。允许在罐头中加入肉制品。

Text: Presidente, do you have a nickel? The jackpot is really high at the moment. Argh... Blasted luck not the papaya again. Do you have another nickel? Anyway, some say that the Casino causes gambling addiction to which I say "Poppycock!" Another nickel, please!
NewTranslation: 总统先生。你有筹码吗？赌注现在下的真高啊。卧槽，这狗屎运气。你还有筹码吗？总之有人说赌场造成了人们赌瘾泛滥。我说:扯淡！再来一打筹码！

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Children can't visit the Casino.

Preferred Tourist Class - None
NewTranslation: 为富豪市民和游客提供服务。未满十八岁不能进入。适宜游客类型-无

Text: Wealthy tourists are added as a preferred tourist class.
Slob tourists are added as a preferred tourist class.

The Cathedral is defined as the seat of a bishop, but you cannot get one cheaply by just inviting the bishop to the local church. No, you have to build this magnificent house of worship and decorate it with gold, silver, mahogany and precious stones. Only then the bishop will be persuaded to take nest in this giant birdhouse, shielding his flock from the temptation of the sinful material wealth.
NewTranslation: 大教堂必须有一名主教。你别想只花一点钱就能请到主教，你得用金银玉器宝石装饰这个教堂，主教才会来这里。

Text: Provides Religion to citizens living nearby.
NewTranslation: 为附近市民提供宗教服务

Text: Increases Housing Quality of residences in the vicinity by 10 (max 20) but the budget is increased by 25%.
NewTranslation: 增加附近的住房质量10(最高20)，预算增加25%

Text: Doubles the maximum number of visitors.

No one is quite sure what the Catholic mission is but many stipulate that it is to bring as much enlightenment to Catholics and the rest of the world as possible in the hope that God comes down from the sky and declares 'Mission accomplished'.
NewTranslation: 没人知道布道所到底是干什么的。关于这有很多说法:教徒被启示，我主降世了，然后……就没有然后了。

Text: Provides Religion to citizens living in its vicinity.
NewTranslation: 为附近市民提供宗教服务

Text: Increases Housing Quality of residences in the vicinity by 10 (max 20) but the budget is increased by 25%.
NewTranslation: 增加附近的住房质量10(最高20)，预算增加25%

Text: They call them sweets, confectionaries and chocolate bars, but that's not what they are! We manufacture temptation; we sell joy and pleasure, magically created from simple cocoa beans.
NewTranslation: 他们管这个叫糖果，甜食，巧克力棒，但是这不是真正的意义所在。我们制造诱惑，贩卖欢乐，用可可豆变魔术。

Text: Produces Chocolate from Cocoa and Sugar (requires both).
NewTranslation: 用可可豆和糖制造巧克力

Text: Adds an additional production cycle. The Chocolate Factory processes Milk and Cocoa (requires both) into Chocolate.
NewTranslation: 增加生产周期，向巧克力中加入奶，生产奶巧克力

Text: The factory consumes 20% less raw resources but begins to produce pollution.
NewTranslation: 工厂节省20%的原料，造成污染

Text: The Tropican church serves as a direct conduit to God. All prayers are answered promptly and miracles occur daily, sometimes even when nobody is there to observe them. The Pope is known to visit Tropico when he has trouble getting reception in the Vatican.
NewTranslation: 礼拜堂是祈祷者直接与神沟通的地方。就算没人偷窥，祈祷和疑问会被解答，奇迹照旧每日降临。就连梵蒂冈的教皇遇到麻烦时都会来海岛的礼拜堂的！

Text: Provides Religion to citizens living in the vicinity.
NewTranslation: 为附近市民提供宗教服务

Text: Increases Housing Quality of residences in the vicinity by 10 (max 20) but the budget is increased by 25%.
NewTranslation: 增加附近的住房质量10(最高20)，预算增加25%

Text: This factory produces the Tropican man's greatest dignity - his cigars. That is why Tropican cigars are long and thick. Curiously, most Tropican men wince when they have to cut up their cigars before smoking them. No one is sure why...
NewTranslation: 这个工厂维护着海岛最伟大的尊严-海岛雪茄，这就是为什么海岛的雪茄长又粗。但是海岛人抽之前都会减一段，没人知道为什么。

Text: Decreases workers by 4 and increases Effectiveness by 20.
The factory consumes 20% less raw resources.
The factory begins to consume 20 MW of electricity. Effectiveness is increased by 10.
The primary purpose of this establishment is to sell overpriced pop-corn to as many moviegoers as possible. The entire movie industry exists only to perpetuate this plot.
NewTranslation: 电影院主要目的是向更多的观众兜售高价爆米花，这一直是电影业的地下生意

Text:
Provides Entertainment for citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Boosts TV Stations over the island.

Preferred Tourist Class - Slobs
NewTranslation: 为附近市民和游客提供娱乐服务。适宜游客类型-闲散游客

Text: Family tourists are added as a preferred tourist class.
NewTranslation: 家庭游客成为适宜游客类型

Text: Increases Birth Rate on the island by 5% (max 20%).
The ancients Romans discovered that a circus will solve 50% of your problems with civil discontent. Now you just need some bread and we are all set!
NewTranslation: 古罗马人早就发现马戏团能解决50%的民间不满因素，你只需要一些面包就可以了。这些我们都有。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for citizens and tourists in the vicinity.

Preferred Tourist Class - Family
NewTranslation: 为附近市民和游客提供娱乐服务。适宜游客类型-家庭游客

Text: Service Quality is increased by 3 (max 15) for each Llama Ranch or Llama Factory Farm in the vicinity.
NewTranslation: 附近羊驼厂提高马戏团服务质量3(最大15)

Text: Cultural tourists are added as a preferred class.
NewTranslation: 文艺型游客成为适宜游客类型

Text: The sign was supposed to say "parking", but someone vandalized it and we ended up with this picturesque wildlife preserve instead.
NewTranslation: 这原先是“停车”的标志，但它被损坏了，所以我们不得不用野生动物保护区的标志替换它。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for citizens and tourists on the entire island. Service Quality depends on Beauty.

Preferred Tourist Class - None
NewTranslation: 为全岛市民和游客提供娱乐服务。服务质量取决于美景指数。适宜游客类型-无

Text: "Laughter is the cheapest medicine" is a proverb well known in Tropico. Local Clinics embrace these words of wisdom and are world famous for treating many fatal diseases.
NewTranslation: “笑能包治百病”，海岛诊所总是这么睿智的宣传。

Text: Provides Healthcare to citizens living in the vicinity.
NewTranslation: 为附近市民提供医疗服务

Text: Increases the maximum number of visitors by 50.
Increases Birth Rate on the island by 10% (max 50%).

Gather students and books in one place and wait for them to reach critical mass. Theoretically, once this happens the resultant explosion should be so powerful that all Tropicans become geniuses. In practice, however, this has never happened because it appears that we lack the technology to actually make the students read the books.
NewTranslation: 学生和书本在一起会发生临界反应。理论上，这种情况一旦发生，其威力不亚于原子弹，所有的海岛居民都会变成天才。但这种情况却从未发生，因为我们没那么多书给学生读。

Text: Provides College education for citizens with High School education.
NewTranslation: 为高中毕业生提供大学教育

Text: The College will start to produce Research points
NewTranslation: 大学开始产生研究点数

Text: Dockworkers are perhaps the most important citizens of Tropico. They make sure that all that arrives in Tropico is lost, found again, lost again, banged against every possible nearby surface, re-found, and then dispatched promptly. Without dockworkers the economy will come to a grinding halt.
NewTranslation: 码头工人也许是海岛上最重要的市民。他们确保所有到达海岛的物品“安全”、“快速”、“表面完好无损”地送达目的地。没有码头工人将导致经济慢慢停滞。

Text: Exports and imports resources. Each Dock provides one Trade Ship.
NewTranslation: 出口或进口资源。每个码头提供一艘贸易船。

Text: Laying the groundwork is the first and the hardest step. Once they do so, the tired builders take a week off to celebrate and rest. But this is okay as the building will be built in time as the global economy stabilizes.
NewTranslation: 奠定地基是第一步，也是最难得一步。如果完成了，建筑工就可以庆祝和休息一周时间，而且完工后的建筑将和全球经济一样稳定。

Text: Provides additional builders and dispatches them to construction sites.
NewTranslation: 往建筑工地增派额外的建筑工人。

Text: The Country Hotel is the place where campers go after they find out they don't know how to properly set up a tent. It offers the most authentic camping experience possible without any actual camping involved.
NewTranslation: 乡村旅馆是那些没有什么野营经验的人们最好的去处，它提供了还不错的露营体验。

Text: Provides rooms for 6 Eco tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Service Quality drops if there are many building nearby.
NewTranslation: 为生态游客提供6间客房，服务质量取决于周边美景指数。周边建筑过多，服务质量下降。

Text: People living in country houses are close to nobility in lifestyle and manners. For them their home is their castle. It has the same muddy yard, septic pits and constant sound of clucking poultry everywhere around the premises.
NewTranslation: 生活在乡村的人们有着和贵族最接近的生活方式和礼仪。他们的家就是他们的城堡。前提是都有同样泥泞的院子，化粪池坑和到处咯咯乱叫的家禽。

Text: Provides housing for 4 families. Provides food for the residents.
NewTranslation: 为四个家庭提供住房。为住户提供食物。

Text: Housing Quality is increased by 10 but the building consumes 5 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 住房质量提高10，消耗5MW的电力。

Text: The first thing people notice about our Cruise Ship is that it isn't really cruising anywhere. The anchor got tangled in some seaweed and every time we try to pull it out, we threaten to sink the ship instead.
NewTranslation: 人们注意到我们游轮的第一件事情是它不会真的驶去何方，因为锚和一些杂乱的海藻缠绕在一起。每当我们试图将它拖走时，船就沉了。

Text: Built on water. Provides rooms for 20 Family tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty and Crime Safety.
NewTranslation: 建在水上，为20位游客提供房间。服务质量取决于美景指数和治安。

Text: Customs officers are the most incorruptible institution in Tropico. Instead of taking bribes offer counseling to the captains of merchant ships advising them how to avoid problems with the import and the export. For a fair price, of course.
NewTranslation: 海关是海岛上最清廉的机构，这里为那些想避免进出口问题的货船船长提供咨询和建议，而不是从他们手里收受贿赂。当然，如果价格合适，当然也是可以考虑的……

Text: Improves prices of export trade routes. Unique.
NewTranslation: 提高出口贸易的价格。唯一。

Text: Generates Swiss Bank Account from all exports.
NewTranslation: 从所有出口货物中为你的瑞士银行账户提供回扣。

Text: The Hexagon is the pinnacle of modern military building architecture and a definite improvement over the backwards five-sided design used in some other countries. Some extremists have proposed a seven-sided military HQ but they were quickly court-martialed and sent in exile.
NewTranslation: 六角形是现代军事建筑的最好架构，而且明显的改善了另一些使用五角大楼国家的设计。一些极端份子已经提出了一个七角大楼的国防总部设想，但他们很快被军事法庭流放。

Text: Replaces the Commandos in the Defense HQ with Special Forces
NewTranslation: 用特种部队取代了国防总部的突击班

Text: Some prankster took off with all our dolphins and left a "Farewell and thanks for all the fish!" note behind. We urgently need new dolphins, at least 42 of them!
NewTranslation: 捣蛋鬼们抢走了我们所有的海豚并且留下了“感谢你们所有提供的鱼！”的字条。我们迫切需要新的海豚，至少42条！

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity.

Preferred Tourist Class - Family
NewTranslation:
为附近的土豪居民和游客提供娱乐。

最适宜游客类型-家庭型

Text: Eco-tourists are added as a preferred class
NewTranslation: 最适宜游客类型中添加生态游客。

Text: Trade ships mature here and are released on the unsuspecting world when they grow big enough. Ship procreation is a closely guarded secret told to shipwrights when they reach adulthood.
NewTranslation: 货轮在这里改装并驶入未知的世界。造船技术永远是个只能告诉成年造船工人的秘密？

Text: Increases the speed of all Trade Ships. Unique.
NewTranslation: 所有贸易船只速度增加。唯一。

Text: Each Dock provides one extra Trade Ship.
NewTranslation: 每个码头提供一个额外的贸易船只。

Text: Three rooms with the size of one at the price of two! Free breakfast included, some of it even edible. When it comes to prices, nothing beats the Economy Hotel, where we are practically giving you money to stay on our island!
NewTranslation: 三个房间，房型一样，价格不一！提供免费早餐，一些早餐甚至是可食用的。当谈到价格时，没有什么比经济型旅馆更好的了，实际上是我们付钱让你们留在我们的岛上！

Text: Provides rooms for 12 Slob tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Service Quality is increased for each entertainment building nearby.
NewTranslation: 为闲散家庭提供12间房间。服务质量取决于美景指数。附近每一个娱乐建筑都将增强其服务质量。

Text: Cozy space where no one works, with a lot of high-voltage electricity and an unexplainable bag of cement in the backroom... I don't know why the policemen refer to it as the interrogation room. Every time I ask someone, he disappears.
NewTranslation: 舒服的房间里一个人都没有，后面的房间里通着高压的电，放着一袋奇葩的混凝土…我不知道为什么警察称它为审讯室。每当我问别人时，他就消失了。

Text: Increases the range of the electrical grid.
All over the world, people lose their microchips. This widespread problem was finally solved here with the invention of the bigger, harder to lose macrochip.
NewTranslation: 全世界的人们都会丢失他们的微型芯片，现在这个问题在这儿被解决了:因为我们设计的芯片个头儿更大，不宜丢失。

Text: Produces Electronics from Bauxite and Gold (requires both).
NewTranslation: 消耗铝土和黄金生产电子产品(需要两种资源)。

Text: Budget is reduced by 50% but international relations with USA and EU suffer a -5 penalty.
NewTranslation: 预算降低50%，与美国和欧盟的关系-5。

Text: Decreases workers by 2 and increases Effectiveness by 20.
You know what they say about embassies - what happens in the embassy stays in the embassy. That's why we can't tell many jokes about the embassy. It's out of our jurisdiction.
NewTranslation: 你知道他们怎么评价大使馆么-让大使馆的故事沉睡在大使馆内。这就是为什么我们不太调侃大使馆，它超出我们的管辖权。

Text: Allows the establishing of diplomatic relations with a single foreign power.
NewTranslation: 允许与一个外国势力建立外交关系。

Text: Factory farms are not nice places. They do not house happy, free-roaming animal friends, but instead pack their animals in tight spaces and treat them like livestock. They don't really care about the lasting harm they inflict to the environment. However, they reliably provide large quantities of animal products and that is all some people care to know about them.
NewTranslation: 工业化牧场不是个好地方，自由散养的牲畜被关进了狭小的笼子里。人们不关心它会造成什么危害，只需要提供大量的动物制品就行，当然，其他人也只需要知道这些。

Text: Produces animal products (Meat, Milk or Wool) from Corn depending on the type of the farm.
NewTranslation: 根据所选牧场类型，产出动物制品(肉，奶或毛)。当然，你得用玉米喂它们。

Text: The Effectiveness of every nearby Plantation and Hydroponics Farm is increased by 10 based on effectiveness (max 20).
NewTranslation: 每一个附近的种植园和水培农场效力增加10(最高20)。
粪便肥料(牛牛养殖场升级)。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 10 but Budget is increased by 10%.

Factory farms are not nice places. They do not house happy, free-roaming animal friends, but instead pack their animals in tight spaces and treat them like livestock. They don't really care about the lasting harm they inflict to the environment. However, they reliably provide large quantities of animal products and that is all some people care to know about them.
NewTranslation: 工业化牧场不是个好地方，自由散养的牲畜被关进了狭小的笼子里。人们不关心它会造成什么危害，只需要提供大量的动物制品就行，当然，其他人也只需要知道这些。

NewTranslation: 根据所选牧场类型，产出动物制品(肉，奶或毛)。当然，你得用玉米喂它们。

Text: Increases Effectiveness by 10 (max 100) for each nearby Plantation and Hydroponic Farm.
NewTranslation: 为附近每一个种植园和水培农场效率提高10(最高100)。

They don't really care about the lasting harm they inflict to the environment. However, they reliably provide large quantities of animal products and that is all some people care to know about them.

Text: Produces animal products (Meat, Milk or Wool) from Corn depending on the type of the farm.
NewTranslation: 根据所选牧场类型，产出动物制品(肉，奶或毛)。当然，你得用玉米喂它们。

Factory farms are not nice places. They do not house happy, free-roaming animal friends, but instead pack their animals in tight spaces and treat them like livestock. They don't really care about the lasting harm they inflict to the environment. However, they reliably provide large quantities of animal products and that is all some people care to know about them.
NewTranslation: 工业化牧场不是个好地方，自由散养的牲畜被关进了狭小的笼子里。人们不关心它会造成什么危害，只需要提供大量的动物制品就行，当然，其他人也只需要知道这些。

Text: Produces animal products (Meat, Milk or Wool) from Corn depending on the type of the farm.
NewTranslation: 根据所选牧场类型，产出动物制品(肉，奶或毛)。当然，你得用玉米喂它们。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but Job Quality is decreased by 10.
NewTranslation: 效率增加20，工作品质降低10。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 10 but Budget is increased by 10%.

The family resort offers something for every member of the family. Cosmetic procedures for her, sports for him and children's pool for THEM. Everything you need to enjoy your family vacation apart from each other!
NewTranslation: 度假山庄提供每位家庭成员需要的服务。美容，运动和儿童泳池。除了彼此之外，享受你快乐家庭假日吧！

Text: Provides rooms for 7 Family tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty and Crime Safety.
NewTranslation: 为7个旅游家庭提供房间。服务质量取决于美景指数和治安。

Text: Home of the famous designers Llarmani, Diodor and Cucchi. All those other similar-sounding brands are just impostors trying to take advantage of our fame.
NewTranslation: 国内著名的设计师Llarmani，Diodor，Cucchi。其他相似品牌都是试图利用我们的名声的骗子。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 15 (max 45) for each TV Station on the island.
NewTranslation: 所有电视台效率增加15(最高45)。

Text: Service Quality of entertainment buildings in the vicinity is increased by 5 based on effectiveness (max 10).
NewTranslation: 周围的娱乐设施效率提高5(最高10)
高级时装(时装公司升级)

Text: The required education of workers is reduced to High School.
NewTranslation: 工人的学历要求降低到高中

Text: The Fast-Food Joint serves healthy, slimming food at reasonable prices with minimum waiting time. Everything else you hear is a lie, manufactured by their competitors - the Slow-Food Joint.
NewTranslation: 快餐店可以平价、快捷地提供健康、减肥的食品。一切你听到的都是谎言，来自他们的竞争者-慢餐店。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for citizens and tourists in the vicinity.

Preferred Tourist Class - Slobs
NewTranslation:
为附近的市民和游客提供娱乐。

最适宜游客类型-闲散

Text: Increases Housing Quality of residences in the vicinity by 10 (max 20).
NewTranslation: 增加附近的房屋的住宅质量10(最高20)

Text: Halves the pollution generated by the Fast Food Joint.
NewTranslation: 快餐店产生的污染降低一半

Text: Have you heard the one about the fisherman that was struck by a meteor? He always wanted to catch a big one! Not funny? He wasn't laughing either.
NewTranslation: 你听说过一个被流星打到的渔夫的故事吗？他总想逮着个大个儿的！不好笑？哦，他也没有笑。

Text: Catches Fish from schools of fish in the vicinity of the Wharf.
NewTranslation: 从码头附近的鱼群中捕鱼

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the Wharf depletes schools of fish 20% faster.
NewTranslation: 效率提高20，鱼群消耗提高20%。

Text: Schools of fish regrow even while worked by a fisherman.
NewTranslation: 即使只有一个渔夫，鱼群也会再生。

Text: Many famous pieces of furniture were produced by Tropican craftsman. For example a certain prominent Englishman commissioned one round table from us some time ago. It turned out a bit elliptic, but the customer didn't complain. We've also created a very comfy chair for the Spanish Inquisition and most recently a metallic massage-o-tron for a famous TV network.
NewTranslation: 许多名贵家具出自我们海岛工匠之手。例如某个英国名人前段时间向我们订做一个圆桌，做出来有点像椭圆，但客户没有抱怨。西班牙宗教法庭那非常舒适的椅子，和最近许多电视台定制的按摩椅都是出自我们这儿。

Text: Adds an additional production cycle. The factory processes Gold and Planks (requires both) into Furniture.
NewTranslation: 增加了一个额外的生产周期。工厂生产家具需要提供金子和木板(俩者都要)。

Text: Increases workers by 8 and Effectiveness by 20.

The Geothermal Plant creates electricity from harnessing the energy of the magma conduits running in the depths of the island. The giant hamster wheels in the basement are just for fitness exercises, honestly!
NewTranslation: 地热发电厂利用海岛深处的岩浆管道制造电能，地下室的巨大仓鼠轮只是用来锻炼身体的。真的！

Text: Produces Power. Consumers with higher budget are serviced preferentially. Effectiveness is increased if placed closer to a Volcano.
NewTranslation: 生产电力。为高预算用户优先提供服务。如果靠近火山会提升它的效率。

Text: The Geothermal Plant no longer produces any pollution.
NewTranslation: 地热发电厂不再产生任何污染。

Text: Every great revolution starts with throwing groceries. This is why the clever dictator has to assign commissaries to observe and record who buys them from the grocery and who doesn't.
NewTranslation: 每一个伟大的革命始于扔番茄。这就是为什么聪明的独裁者必须派专人观察和记录谁从杂货店购买它们。

Text: Provides Food to citizens living in its vicinity.
NewTranslation: 提供食物给他附近的市民。

Text: Food Quality is increased by 20 but Budget is increased by 20%.
NewTranslation: 食品质量提升20，预算增加20%。

Text: Guard towers are the constant reminder of the care of the government for the people. Ever-vigilant soldiers carry their duty there until they take a bullet to the knee.
NewTranslation: 炮楼不断提醒着岛民，政府是关心群众的。时刻保持警惕的士兵在那里执勤，直到膝盖中了一弹……

Text: Engages enemy soldiers in its vicinity.
NewTranslation: 攻击在其范围内的敌人。

Text: Increases the attack rate of the Guard Tower

Every citizen of Tropico is proud of our cultural heritage and our rich and dramatic national history. Much of those were fabricated and stolen, but we are nonetheless proud of them. On a related note, this grand hacienda, now converted to a tourist trap, was the exact place where Zorro fell in love with Isaura the slave.
NewTranslation: 每个岛民都为我们丰富的文化遗产和引人注目的历史感到自豪，即使大多是山寨来的，仍值得我们引以为傲。值得注意的是，当年佐罗爱上女奴伊佐拉的宏伟庄园，现在成了我们敲游客竹杠的好地方！

Text: Provides rooms for 6 Culture tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Service Quality is increased for each colonial building nearby.
NewTranslation: 为文艺游客家庭提供6间客房，服务质量取决于美景指数。周边的殖民时期建筑可提高他的服务质量。

Text: Isn't it wonderful to see our beautiful island from above? To fly above like a godlike entity, looking at the tiny people toiling like ants on the ground and the miniature cars flying back and forth between the cute little buildings? The Hang Gliding club offers this life-changing experience to everyone who cares to try it.
NewTranslation: 想在空中俯瞰我们美丽的岛屿么？想想上帝一样飞行，看着蝼蚁般的人和糖果似的汽车在迷你建筑之间穿行么？那么滑翔伞运动俱乐部你值得拥有，限时998！快来体验！

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Service Quality improves if place on higher terrain.

Preferred Tourist Class - Eco Tourists
NewTranslation:
为附近的富裕居民和游客提供娱乐，修建在高海拔地区将提高服务质量。

最适宜游客类型-生态游客

Text: Every student here is like a blank slate. It is our solemn duty to write upon that slate only valuable information like the 10 reasons why Tropico is the greatest superpower in the world and why Presidente is the greatest person alive. We also teach the students math because they should suffer like we did.
NewTranslation: 每个学生都是一张白纸，传授有用的知识是我们神圣的职责:海岛成为超级强国的10大原因，总统先生是世界上在世的最伟大的人，等等。同时，我们还教他们数学，因为他们有必要和我们一样多死些脑细胞。

Text: Provides High School education to uneducated citizens.
NewTranslation: 为海岛上的文盲提供高中教育

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 50 (students graduate faster).
NewTranslation: 效率提高50(学生毕业更快了)

Text: Welcome to the Historic Inn where we serve historic tea in historic cups and even historic steaks! Those cultural tourists tend to buy everything branded "historic", so we have a dedicated team developing brand new memorabilia for them.
NewTranslation: 欢迎入住古典旅馆！我们不仅提供老式茶杯盛装的“古典茶”，甚至还提供“古典牛排”。那些文化旅游者们喜欢买印有“古典”标记的东西，所以我们特地为他们准备了一支古典纪念品研发团队。

Text: Provides rooms for 3 Culture tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Service Quality is increased for each colonial building nearby.
NewTranslation: 为三个文化旅行家庭提供住处，服务质量取决于周围美观度。周围每座殖民时期建筑都会提高服务质量。

Text: Modern medical science has proven that the time spent waiting in hospital lines actually provides an invaluable therapeutic effect to the patients. After several hours in the waiting rooms many patients are miraculously cured without even seeing a doctor. The lingering effect makes those patients less likely to visit a hospital ever again. This is why all Tropican hospitals are designed to maximize waiting time and the health benefits resulting from it.
NewTranslation: 现代医学证明，候诊可以治病！在等候室里的几个小时中，许多病人居然奇迹般的痊愈。这种“候诊”效应让病人几乎再也不用去医院，这就是为什么海岛的医院有着最长的候诊时间，等待带来了健康！

Text: Provides Healthcare to citizens living in the vicinity.
NewTranslation: 为附近的岛民提供医疗保障

Text: Increases the maximum number of visitors by 100.
Increases Birth Rate on the island by 10% (max 50%).

Houses are harmless when encountered solitary or in small numbers. Gather enough of them in the same area, however, and you will create Suburbia - an intricate web of deceit, intrigue and betrayal hiding behind a facade of perfectly mowed front yards.
NewTranslation: 独栋或小规模住宅是无害的，但是大规模修建密集住宅，就会形成郊区，一个隐藏在有着绿化前院的完美外表下，充斥欺骗、阴谋和背叛的复杂网络。

Text: Provides housing for 4 families. Housing Quality is increased for each nearby house.
NewTranslation: 为四个家庭提供住房，周围住宅越多，其本身的居住质量越高。

Text: Housing Quality is increased by 20 but the building consumes 10 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 居住质量提升20，消耗10MW电力

Text: Lowers crime in the immediate area.
A modernized, more compact version of the Plantation. It was probably invented by the same people that invented the Chihuahua. They like to miniaturize things.
NewTranslation: 更加现代化，更加紧凑的农场版本。它们可能是由吉娃娃发明者们建造的，这些人总是喜欢把事物最小化。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the farm begins to consume 50 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，消耗50MW电力

Text: Job Quality is increased by 20. Workers wealth is increased.
NewTranslation: 工作品质提高20。工人财富增加。

Text: A modernized, more compact version of the Plantation. It was probably invented by the same people that invented the Chihuahua. They like to miniaturize things.
NewTranslation: 更加现代化，更加紧凑的农场版本。它们可能是由吉娃娃发明者们建造的，这些人总是喜欢把事物最小化。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the farm begins to consume 50 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，消耗50MW电力
