Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the farm begins to consume 50 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，消耗50MW电力

Text: Effectiveness increases each month after this upgrade is built (max 100).
NewTranslation: 生产效率逐月提高(最高100)

Text: A modernized, more compact version of the Plantation. It was probably invented by the same people that invented the Chihuahua. They like to miniaturize things.
NewTranslation: 更加现代化，更加紧凑的农场版本。它们可能是由吉娃娃发明者们建造的，这些人总是喜欢把事物最小化。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the farm begins to consume 50 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，消耗50MW电力

Text: Decreases workers by 2 and increases Effectiveness by 20.
NewTranslation: 减少2名工人，生产效率提高20

Text: A modernized, more compact version of the Plantation. It was probably invented by the same people that invented the Chihuahua. They like to miniaturize things.
NewTranslation: 更加现代化，更加紧凑的农场版本。它们可能是由吉娃娃发明者们建造的，这些人总是喜欢把事物最小化。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the farm begins to consume 50 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，消耗50MW电力

Text: Increases the Effectiveness of all other nearby Pineapple Plantations and Hydroponic Farms by 25 based on effectiveness (max 50).
NewTranslation: 附近菠萝种植园和水培农场效率提高25(最大50)

Text: A modernized, more compact version of the Plantation. It was probably invented by the same people that invented the Chihuahua. They like to miniaturize things.
NewTranslation: 更加现代化，更加紧凑的农场版本。它们可能是由吉娃娃发明者们建造的，这些人总是喜欢把事物最小化。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the farm begins to consume 50 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，消耗50MW电力

Text: Increases the Effectiveness of all other nearby Plantations and Hydroponic Farms by 10 based on effectiveness (max 30).
NewTranslation: 周边其他种植园和水培农场的效率提高10(最大30)
纤维质肥料(水培农场升级)

Text: A modernized, more compact version of the Plantation. It was probably invented by the same people that invented the Chihuahua. They like to miniaturize things.
NewTranslation: 更加现代化，更加紧凑的农场版本。它们可能是由吉娃娃发明者们建造的，这些人总是喜欢把事物最小化。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the farm begins to consume 50 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，消耗50MW电力

Text: Increases Effectiveness by 100 but the soil quality degrades over time.
NewTranslation: 提高生产效率100，长期会使土地肥力下降。

Text: The Jewelry Workshop produces bling since the start of the World Wars. It helped Tropicans invent the SWAG before it was cool. Every time you hear that word you can praise the ingenuity of El Presidente! YOLO!
NewTranslation: 战争开始前，珠宝工坊就开始生产闪亮的珠宝了。在战争结束前，它帮海岛创立了SWAG品牌，每当你听到这个品牌，你都不免要称赞总统的英明。YOLO！(SWAG意为赃物、掠夺物)

Text: Effectiveness increases by 10 (max 50) for every other Jewelry Workshop nearby.
NewTranslation: 附近每有一间珠宝工坊，生产效率提高10(最高50)

Text: The Jewelry Workshop consumes 10% less raw resources
Libraries are infinite source of books which can be taken by everyone and returned by no one. In hard times the libraries help the creation of picturesque book BBQs which warm the rejoicing crowds.
NewTranslation: 图书馆拥有无尽的书籍，任何岛民都可以借阅，不用归还。困难时期，它甚至能提供特别的书籍当柴火，温暖广大的群众。

Text: The Library generates 25% more Research Points.
NewTranslation: 图书馆能多产生25%的科研点数

Text: Lighthouses usually mark safe routes for approaching ships. Tropicans, however, erect such towers around dangerous sea cliffs to lure sailors to their death and then scavenge the shipwrecks.
NewTranslation: 灯塔通常为过往船只指明安全通路。然而，我们把灯塔修建在陡峭悬崖的海岸边，吸引水手撞船，然后才好搜刮。
提供附加贸易选择。唯一。

Text: Being a lumberjack is a serious condition characterized by the sudden desire to sing about your occupation and whether or not you are okay. Other symptoms include trying to listen to trees falling when there is no one around.
NewTranslation: 伐木工的职业病是突然想歌唱自己的职业而且身体状态时好时坏，其他病症包括在没人的时候偷听树倒下的声音。

Text: Produces Logs. Collapses when there are no remaining trees in the area.
NewTranslation: 生产原木。当该地区没有树木时自动荒废。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 30 but the logging camp begins to consume 50 MW of electricity.
The Logging Camp plants new trees over time but the building's Budget is doubled.
NewTranslation: 伐木场种植树苗，预算加倍。

Text: The Lumber Mill is the temple of harmony in Tropico. Building one starts the endless aria of the circular saw which brings joyful smiles on the ears of Tropicans working and living nearby. Just keep the Lumber Mill supplied with logs and it will continue to spread bliss across the island.
NewTranslation: 锯木厂是整个海岛的和谐圣殿。建一座就能让旋转的电锯之歌给周边工作和生活的岛民带来无尽的愉悦。你只需要保证原木供应，它就能一直为您的海岛带来这些美妙的声音。

Text: Decreases generated pollution by 50% but the mill begins to consume 100 MW of electricity.
Increases the consumption of raw resources by 30% and the Effectiveness by 30.
NewTranslation: 增加30%原材料消耗，提高生产效率30

Text: Contrary to the common belief, mansions are not built to emphasize the wealth of the rich people. In fact they are sophisticated prisons made to keep the voracious rich away from the normal people. To distract the snobs from the thought of freedom, mansions are equipped with sophisticated contraptions such as pool tables and beds made of solid gold.
NewTranslation: 不同于传统观念，豪宅并不是用来凸显岛民财富的。事实上，它们是用来隔离贪婪的资本家和普通民众的高级监狱。豪宅利用如纯金打造的台球桌和床等奢侈品，让势利小人永远不去想要什么自由。

Text: Provides housing for 4 families. Beauty improves the Housing Quality of the Mansion.
NewTranslation: 为四个家庭提供住房。美观度提升居住质量。

Text: Housing Quality is increased by 10 but the building consumes 15 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 居住质量提升10，消耗10MW电力

Text: This is the entry point of a huge acceleration system that uses electricity to propel charged trains while containing them in well-defined beams known as tunnels. The occasional earth tremors indicate what happens when such a beam encounters a dead end.
NewTranslation: 地铁是海岛加速系统的入口。地铁利用电力在隧道中运行，但不时发生的地震，告诉我们当地铁在隧道里跑进死胡同时会发生什么。

Text: Allows citizens to quickly travel around the city without using cars. Increases Housing Quality of nearby residences in the area by 10 based on effectiveness.
NewTranslation: 允许岛民在岛上快速通行。依据效率提升附近居住区的房屋质量10。

Text: The Fort contains a gang of cut-throats and murderers that call themselves "soldiers". They will protect your lands from rival cut-throats and murderers when they attack.
NewTranslation: 军事要塞是一群自称士兵的刽子手和谋杀犯集结地。这些家伙能在敌对帮派攻击你时保护你的地盘。

Text: Provides a squad of Colonial Infantry. The squad can be sent to explore uncharted lands.
NewTranslation: 提供一队殖民步兵。可以指派探索岛屿。

Text: Replaces the Colonial Infantry in the Military Fort with Infantry
NewTranslation: 步兵替换要塞内的殖民步兵

Text: Bauxite is somewhat useless chunk of rock. Attempts to produce anything of any value from it failed, as the end result was always a lightweight and soft metal which couldn't be used for anything, even for fish net weights. For some reason unknown foreigners are paying readily for it. Serves their stupidity right!
NewTranslation: 铝土矿某种程度上来说，只是毫无用处的石头。任何试图利用它们创造价值的尝试都失败了，因为结果证明这些鬼东西最后都只能制成更轻更软的金属。这些金属一点用处都没有，甚至轻到不能承受渔网之重。然而不知道什么原因，有些逗逼外国佬却愿意为它们付高价，那还说啥呢，卖给他们吧。

Text: Must be constructed over mining deposits and produces ore (Bauxite, Coal, Gold, Iron or Uranium) based on the deposit type.
NewTranslation: 必须建在矿脉上。依据矿脉的不同出产不同的矿石(铝土，煤，黄金，铁，铀)

Text: Increases the effectiveness by 30 and decreases the Job Quality by 10
NewTranslation: 提高生产效率30，降低工作品质10

Text: Contrary to public opinion, this mine is absolutely safe. The booming sounds come from a fellowship looking for some ring and is just passing through.
NewTranslation: 别理那些老百姓，矿井非常安全。那些爆炸声只是有人在找戒指，很快就会过去的。

Text: Must be constructed over mining deposits and produces ore (Bauxite, Coal, Gold, Iron or Uranium) based on the deposit type.
NewTranslation: 必须建在矿脉上。依据矿脉的不同出产不同的矿石(铝土，煤，黄金，铁，铀)

Text: Increases workers by 3 and Effectiveness by 30.
NewTranslation: 增加工人容量3，提升工作效率30

Text: So bright... so beautiful... ah, precious. We wants it, we needs it. Must have the precious. Send the minerses down to bring the precious. Yes! Yes, the precious!
NewTranslation: 啊，闪闪发光，如此美丽，啊，我的宝贝！我的黄金矿！我们想它，我们要它！我们必须得到宝贝！快把矿工派下矿去！是的，是的，我的宝贝！咕噜，咕噜！

Text: Must be constructed over mining deposits and produces ore (Bauxite, Coal, Gold, Iron or Uranium) based on the deposit type.
NewTranslation: 必须建在矿脉上。依据矿脉的不同出产不同的矿石(铝土，煤，黄金，铁，铀)

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20, but pollution is increased by 30%.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提升20，污染增加30%

Text: Iron is like the Tropican spirit - hard, gleaming, and durable. However, unlike Iron which rusts when water is added, the Tropican spirit remains intact. Unless you use rum instead of water whereas you have a chemical reaction with Tropican spirit that cannot be explained by conventional science.
NewTranslation: 铁代表着海岛精神-坚强，闪光和忍耐。然而，与铁遇到水不同，海岛精神永不生锈。除非有人喝了某种叫朗姆酒的东西，他的精神生锈就不能用科学解释了。

Text: Must be constructed over mining deposits and produces ore (Bauxite, Coal, Gold, Iron or Uranium) based on the deposit type.
NewTranslation: 必须建在矿脉上。依据矿脉的不同出产不同的矿石(铝土，煤，黄金，铁，铀)

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but Job Quality is decreased by 10.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提升20，工作品质降低10

Text: Mining Uranium is the dream job of every superhero wanna-be. He is just one origin story away from getting his superpowers!
NewTranslation: 每个想成为超级英雄的人都梦想着去挖铀矿！

Text: Must be constructed over mining deposits and produces ore (Bauxite, Coal, Gold, Iron or Uranium) based on the deposit type.
NewTranslation: 必须建在矿脉上。依据矿脉的不同出产不同的矿石(铝土，煤，黄金，铁，铀)

Text: Lowers pollution to the amount typical for other mines

The Aerodrome offers many improvements over the conventional Airport. Improvements like passenger seats, separate compartments for livestock, cute stewardesses that explain things that you already know in an entertaining manner and nearly twice as many ways to get your luggage lost.
NewTranslation: 航空港相比传统机场来说有许多优势，包括全新的乘客座椅，单独的宠物隔间，以及性感的女空乘欢快地对你说一大堆废话。最特别的是，在这儿，你的行李更容易丢失。

Text: Attracts even more tourists, that arrive on the island via plane. Increases Tourism Rating by 15. Unique.
NewTranslation: 吸引更多经由飞机来到海岛的游客。增加旅游指数15。唯一。

Text: All foreign relations are increased by 10 but the budget of the Airport will be increased by 10%.
NewTranslation: 与所有外国关系增加10，机场预算增加10%

Text: A tall, luxurious and densely populated residential building. The only predator threatening this form of architectural life is a vicious looking creature, which allegedly could withstand even a nuclear explosion. They call it a cockroach.
NewTranslation: 高大、华丽、人口稠密的居民建筑。唯一能威胁现代公寓的是一种看起来十分邪恶的物种，它们甚至能在核爆炸面前临危不惧，他们经常高歌:我们是蟑螂！

Text: Housing Quality is increased by 20 but the apartment consumes an additional 10 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 居住品质提升20，额外消耗10MW电力

Text: Other museums tend to house dangerous eldritch artifacts that rip the fabric of space-time and unleash unspeakable horrors upon our world. Not so at this museum, where the most dangerous item is the Neconomicon (sic), a book dedicated to cute and fluffy arcane rituals that involve cats.
NewTranslation: 其他博物馆总是喜欢收藏那些撕裂时空、传播恐惧的可怕艺术品。海岛博物馆可不是这样，这里最危险的东西只是一本躺在角落里落灰的很不起眼的旧书，书名为《黑暗圣经》……

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Service Quality improves with age.

Preferred Tourist Class - Cultural
NewTranslation:
为附近的富裕岛民和游客提供娱乐。服务质量随时期增加。

适宜游客类型-文化旅游

Text: Increases the Effectiveness of all High Schools in the vicinity by 25 (students graduate faster).
NewTranslation: 附近所有高中效率提高25(学生毕业更快了)

Text: Newspapers have many uses in the Tropican household. You can use them as wrappers, to absorb spills, to clean windows and to housetrain your pet llama. You can also read them, if you are into such extremes.
NewTranslation: 对于岛民来说，报纸用处很大，可以擦屁股，抹桌子和擦窗户，还能用来训练宠物羊驼。如果你拿着报纸没事干，那你也可以阅读它。

Text: The Newspaper increases Liberty in the vicinity.
The Newspaper begins to generate small profits.
The required education of workers is reduced to High School.
NewTranslation: 员工学历要求降低到高中

Text: A structure reserved for religious and spiritual activities led by a high priest known as a DJ. Many modern rites of passage take place here by the means of chaotic ritual dances, various mystical substances and hypnotic flashing lights.
NewTranslation: 这是为灵魂仪式准备的场所，祭祀名叫DJ。这种混乱萨满舞，稀奇古怪的毒品以及让人昏昏欲睡的闪光灯可以激发很多流行音乐灵感。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Children can't visit the Night Club.

Preferred Tourist Class - Wealthy
NewTranslation:
为附近富裕岛民和游客提供娱乐。未成年禁止入内。

适宜游客类型-富裕

Text: Nuclear Power Plants tend to agitate the environmentalists across the world, often driving the eco-activists to righteous anger and blind eco-rage. Nobody is sure why this happens, but some psychologists theorize that the reason is closely related to the "-mentalist" part of their movement.
NewTranslation: 核电站总是会让世界上的环保主义者发出正义的怒吼，爆发盲目的狂乱，像疯子一样。我真不知道为什么会发生这些，有些心理研究指出，他们可能有间歇性精神分裂症。

Text: Produces Power from Uranium. Consumers with higher budget are serviced preferentially. Unique.
NewTranslation: 利用铀产生电力。优先输送给工资高的岛民。唯一

Text: Negates all pollution created by the building
NewTranslation: 消除建筑产生的所有污染

Text: The Nuclear Power Plant generates profits but the amount of power produced is halved.
NewTranslation: 核电站产生利润，电力生产减半

Text: Every dictator dreams of his very own Nuclear Program. It is the crowning masterpiece of his reign and a representation of his ultimate mastery over the fate of the whole world. Nobody is more disappointed than the dictator who found a piece of coal instead of a piece of uranium in his Christmas stocking.
NewTranslation: 每个独裁者都梦想拥有自己的曼哈哈计划，这是统治的最高成就以及对世界命运的终极掌握。如果圣诞节发现袜子里的是块煤而不是铀，那没人比独裁者更郁闷。

Text: It turns that those crazy astrologists were right - everything really IS written in the stars. We just need a big telescope to read all the tiny words in the night sky and advance our science!
NewTranslation: 那些疯狂的天文学家说的对！万物之理都写在星星上！所以我们得造个大个儿的望远镜，夜观天象，知天下事。

Text: Generates Research Points. Effectiveness is improved if placed on higher terrain.
NewTranslation: 生存研究点数。修建在高海拔地区，效率更高。

Text: The Observatory generates 25% more Research Points.
NewTranslation: 天文台产生25%更多的研究点数。

Text: This huge facility is where individuals are willingly confined and denied a variety of freedoms as a reward for their devoted studying in college. Don't ask Milton to lend you his red stapler - it will not end well.
NewTranslation: 在这个大楼中，大学教育使人们自愿放弃自由，接受调教。还有，别对米尔顿提什么红色钉书机，没好果子吃的。

Text: Generates money based on the number of people living in the vicinity.
NewTranslation: 基于附近的居民产生利润。

Text: The required education for workers is increased to College. Effectiveness is increased by 30.
NewTranslation: 工人学历要求提升为大学。效率提高30。

Text: Oil is sometimes called "black gold". Same thing is true for pepper and marmite. Puzzling enough, all of those are not metallic and look nothing like gold. Anyway, this refinery produces the liquid type of black gold and definitely does not produce the spicy and sticky types.
NewTranslation: 石油有时被称为“黑金”，就像胡椒和酵母都是辣的。但这破玩意儿根本不像金子，连金属都沾不上边。无论如何，本厂生产的黑金液体绝不会是辣的。

Text: Produces Oil and Natural Gas from offshore deposits.
NewTranslation: 基于海上钻井平台生产石油和天然气。

Text: Adds an additional production cycle. The Oil Refinery processes Coal into Oil.
NewTranslation: 增加了一个额外的生产周期，石油精炼厂把煤变成石油。

Text: The pollution generated by the Oil Refinery is halved but the building consumes an extra 100 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 炼油厂污染减半，建筑额外耗费100MW电力。

Text: Presidente, Oil is the greatest thing on Earth! It can be used to make fuel for our planes which we can then use to bomb other countries so that we can get more oil. Neat, huh?
NewTranslation: 总统，石油是地球上最美好的事物！它是我们战机的燃料，战机可以轰炸他国，然后我们就可以获得更多的石油。这是不是超赞？

Text: Must be placed over a deposit. Produces Oil and Natural Gas.
NewTranslation: 必须放置在石油资源上。生产石油和天然气。

Text: Increases the reserves of Oil and Natural Gas in the deposit by 15000 units.
NewTranslation: 增加15000个单位的油田资源

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the Oil Well generates 30% more pollution.

The Opera house is an extremely expensive building to have as we have to put up new glass panels after almost every show. It would have been worth it if the singers could actually hold a melody but they seem to think that breaking glasses is the epitome of their art.
NewTranslation: 歌剧院，是个非常昂贵的建筑，因为我们要在每场演出后更换全新的玻璃板。对歌唱家来说，却是非常值得献艺的地方，因为他们认为只有唱碎了玻璃，才能体现他们的功力。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity.

Preferred Tourist Class - Cultural
NewTranslation:
为富裕市民和游客提供娱乐。

适宜游客类型-文化

Text: Lowers the required Wealth to visit the Opera.
NewTranslation: 降低去歌剧院所需要的财富限制。

Text: The palace is the fortress of Tropican rule. Not that El Presidente needs one but this is the saying. The guards mostly look after the safety of the passers-by and correct misled supporters of El Presidente carrying wrong slogans. They have special correcting batons for that task alone.
NewTranslation: 宫殿，是捍卫海岛权利的要塞。不是说我们的总统阁下需要一个要塞，这仅仅是个俗语。卫兵的职责是确保行人安全和纠正那些支持者们举错了的标语，当然，他们用的工具是警棍。

Text: Houses the ruling dynasty and their most loyal soldiers. The game will be lost if it is destroyed.
NewTranslation: 住着掌权家族和最忠诚的士兵。如果被摧毁，Game Over。

Text: Replaces the Elite Infantry in the Palace with Commandos
NewTranslation: 用突击队取代精英部队

Text: Social creatures the Tropicans are, they love to gather in strange places. They even build parking lots - so they can measure the glossiness of their cars while talking about the weather. Here cars find new decorations for their bumpers and people can exchange pleasantries freely.
NewTranslation: 岛民是社会生物，他们喜欢聚集在奇怪的地方。甚至，他们建立停车场-因此他们能够边维护自己的汽车边讨论天气。在这里，我们能够找到汽车保险杠的装饰物而且人们可以自由的交流分享信息。

Text: Increases the number of people who use cars and the Job Quality of all workplaces in the area based on effectiveness.
NewTranslation: 根据效率增加该区域使用汽车人的数量和工作场所的质量。

Text: "A cure for every illness" is the slogan of the Tropican pharmaceutical industry. The small print clarifies that there is no guarantee that the cure will actually the illness, but all customers are entitled to the full benefits of placebo effect.
NewTranslation: “治愈所有疾病”海岛制药公司的口号，小字说明“不保证本药品有任何治疗效果”。但是所有消费者都因安慰剂效应感到十分满意。

Text: The Effectiveness of Clinics and Hospitals on the island is increased by 20 based on effectiveness (max 40).
NewTranslation: 诊所和医院效率提高20(最大40)。
供应本地市场(制药公司升级)
供应本地市场(制药公司升级)

Text: Adds an additional production cycle. The Pharmaceutical Company processes Oil into Pharmaceuticals.
NewTranslation: 增加了一个额外的生产周期。制药公司把石油变成药品。

Text: Like the British potato, the Tropican banana is not native to the island but is considered to be a national symbol and, of course, it is bigger than the national symbols of other countries. Tropicans are proud to call themselves "residents of a banana republic".
NewTranslation: 和英国土豆一样，香蕉不是海岛本土的，但被公认为国家的象征，当然，香蕉可比其他国家的象征物要大，所以海岛居民自豪地自称是“香蕉共和国公民”。

Text: Job Quality is increased by 20. Workers wealth is increased.
NewTranslation: 工作品质提升20。工人财富增加。

Text: The Cocoa drink is the gentler, more civilized alternative to coffee. It is less likely to induce psychotic rage and tastes much better. Unfortunately it is not as addictive as coffee and thus remains less popular.
NewTranslation: 喝可可的人是绅士，比喝咖啡更加文雅。它不太可能会提神而且味道更好。可惜的是可可并不会像咖啡一样会上瘾，因此它不是很流行。

Text: Did you say 'coffee'? I haven't drunk coffee for like 10 minutes.  I'm going insane, give it to me now! Please, do it now or I will have to kill you! Build more plantations! More, now! Yes, yees, yeeees!!!
NewTranslation: 你在说“咖啡”？如果我不喝个10分钟的咖啡，我就要疯了，现在马上给我！求你了，否则我就宰了你！建造更多种植园！立刻，马上！对，不错，是~~~~的！！！

Text: The Corn plantation produces Corn and corny jokes. One of these products is greatly appreciated all over the world while the other is present at almost every Tropican meal.
NewTranslation: 玉米种植园盛产玉米和黄色笑话，不过这二者的区别在于:一个被全世界的人口口相传，而另一个，则上了海岛人民的餐桌。

Text: Effectiveness increases each month after this upgrade is built (max 100).
NewTranslation: 建成之后每个月增加效率(最大100)。

Text: We will not discuss cotton picking. Instead we will talk about the most interesting facts about cotton: Did you know that cotton has been cultivated for over 5000 years? Cotton seeds are strong enough to survive travel across the ocean. That cotton wool can absorb water more than 27 times its own weight?
NewTranslation: 我们不讨论摘棉花，但是，我们将会讨论棉花更多有趣的事:你知道棉花已经种植超过5000年了吗？你知道棉花种子顽强的生存能力足以使它漂洋过海吗？你知道可以吸收超过它自身重量27倍的水吗？

Text: Decreases workers by 2 and increases Effectiveness by 20.
NewTranslation: 减少两个工人，效率提高20。

Text: Tropican pineapples are like Tropican women - prickly but sweet inside. When you eat one pineapple, you will soon crave another.
NewTranslation: 海岛的菠萝，就像海岛的女人-外表多刺，内在甜美。当你吃菠萝时，你很快会渴望得到“另一个”。

Text: Sugarcane is cherished among Tropicans. Almost every house has an...altar...where sugarcane is cherished through boiling under pressure. The resulting liquid is consumed as part of the ritual.
NewTranslation: 甘蔗在海岛是十分宝贵的。几乎每间房子都有一个…圣坛。甘蔗在圣坛里加热加压，获取精华。别想歪，这种液体精华不是酒，是神圣的祭品！

Text: Increases the Effectiveness of all other nearby Plantations and Hydroponic Farms by 10 based on effectiveness (max 30).
NewTranslation: 附近种植园和水培农场效率提高10(最大30)。
纤维素施肥(种植园升级)

Text: Burning tobacco smells awful, causes many diseases and leads to addiction. It also makes a hefty profit. Let's plant more!
NewTranslation: 烟草烧起来十分难闻，吸烟会上瘾，有害身体健康。烟草还会产生巨大的利润。所以，让我们多种些！

Text: Increases Effectiveness by 100 but the soil quality degrades over time.
NewTranslation: 提高生产效率100，长期会使土地肥力下降。

Text: Who says policemen aren't very bright? All cops in Tropico have to pass mandatory IQ tests and prove they are at least as smart as our politicians. The smartest ones are awarded a special prize - a portable STOP sign.
NewTranslation: 谁说警察是不聪明？所有海盗警察必须参加IQ测试，而且得分最低要和我们政客一样。最聪明的警察将会被授予特别的奖励-一个便携式的停车指示牌。

Text: Increases Crime Safety in the vicinity. Discovers roles of citizens. Can be upgraded with a Fire Brigade.
NewTranslation: 降低周边犯罪率，提高安全等级。监控市民。能够和消防队同时升级。

Text: Sends firetrucks to putout fires but the Budget of the Police Station is increased by 25%.
NewTranslation: 使用消防车来灭火，警察局预算提升25%。

Text: The Police Station services a larger area but the budget is increased by 10%
NewTranslation: 警察局服务更大的范围，预算提升10%。

Text: While in most parts of the world electricity is considered a necessity, in Tropico it is a precious luxury. People with access to electricity savor it like the fine delicacy it is and tell stories to their grandchildren about the time when they touched a live wire or saw a glowing light bulb. Indeed, if it was readily available for everyone, most will probably be nostalgic about the good old times when pearls were not given to the swine.
NewTranslation: 当世界大部分地区认为电力是生活必需品时，在海岛，电还是昂贵的奢侈品。人们如品味美味佳肴般享受电力，老人们给孙子孙女们讲述当初触碰通电的电线和灯泡亮起的怀旧故事。确实，当电变得随手可用时，大多数人最怀念的可能就是当初没把珍珠喂给猪的美好回忆。

Text: Produces Electricity from Coal and Natural Gas. Consumers with higher budget are serviced preferentially.
NewTranslation: 用煤和天然气来发电。优先输送给工资高的岛民。

Text: The Power Station begins to consume Natural Gas instead of Coal. Halves the amount of pollution generated by the power station.
NewTranslation: 发电厂开始消耗天然气替代煤。发电厂产生的污染减半。

Text: Reduces the amount of pollution generated by the Power Station by 25%.

The first lesson a cattle herder learns is to distinguish the bull from the cow when it comes to milking. The second one is that the hat and the spurs make the man. That's all that a good ranch hand has to know about cattle herding.
NewTranslation: 第一件事是在挤奶时分清楚公牛和母牛，第二件事是像男人一样穿仔帽和刺靴。这是作为一个合格的放牛人所需要了解的全部知识。

Text: Produces animal products (Meat, Milk or Wool) depending on the type of the ranch.
NewTranslation: 生产动物制品(肉，奶或皮毛)取决于牧场的类型。

Text: The Effectiveness of every nearby Plantation and Hydroponics Farm is increased by 10 based on effectiveness (max 20).
NewTranslation: 附近种植园和水培农场效率提高10(最大20)。

Text: Tropican goats are the best type of goat in the world. They will eat anything and will reward their keepers' attention with cynicism and malice.
NewTranslation: 海岛的山羊是世界上最好的种类。它们什么都吃，然后用讥讽和恶意来报答牧羊人的细心照顾。

Text: Produces animal products (Meat, Milk or Wool) depending on the type of the ranch.
NewTranslation: 生产动物产品(肉，奶或皮毛)取决于牧场的类型。

Text: Increases Effectiveness of the Goat Ranch by 10 (max 100) for each nearby Plantation and Hydroponic Farm.
NewTranslation: 附近的种植园和水培农场为山羊牧场提高效率10(最大100)

Text: Llamas are the pillar of Tropican traditions and culture. Everything is better with llamas. Wide-spread proverbs such as 'Spits like a llama' and 'A smile as beautiful as a llama's' popularize the beauty of Tropican women. The Tropican paintings 'The Girl and the Llama' and the widely popular but deeply decadent 'Two girls, one llama' would have been impossible without the Tropican llama.
NewTranslation: 羊驼是海岛传统文化支柱。世界因羊驼而美好。有一些谚语说“谈吐像羊驼”以及“美如羊驼的微笑”来推广海岛女性的魅力。海岛名画“女孩和羊驼”和红极一时的“两女一羊驼”，如果没有海岛的羊驼是不可能流行的。

Text: Produces animal products (Meat, Milk or Wool) depending on the type of the ranch.
NewTranslation: 生产动物产品(肉，奶或皮毛)取决于牧场的类型。

Text: Men have a lot to learn from pigs. Pigs prefer to eat slowly and savor their food, they are great optimists and their curiosity knows no limit. Even more - they are capable of abstract thought unlike many humans.
NewTranslation: 人类要从猪学习很多东西。猪喜欢慢慢享受他们的食物，他们是伟大的乐观主义者，他们的好奇心是无止境的，最与众不同的是，他们是有抽象思维的。

Text: Produces animal products (Meat, Milk or Wool) depending on the type of the ranch.
NewTranslation: 生产动物产品(肉，奶或皮毛)取决于牧场的类型。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but Job Quality is decreased by 10.
NewTranslation: 效率增加20，工作品质降低10。

Text: This amazing facility that recycles waste into useful materials. Some critics complain about the cost for the whole endeavor, but they will soon be recycled and turned once again into productive members of our society.
NewTranslation: 这个是神奇的地方，变废为宝。一些评论家抱怨整个过程的成本，但是他们很快会被废物处理一下，再次成为我们的社会生产力的一员。

Text: Increases the Effectiveness of Construction Offices, Steel Mills, Vehicle Factories and Electronics Factories in the vicinity by 20 based on effectiveness (max 40).
NewTranslation: 附近的建设办，炼轧钢厂，汽车厂和电子厂效率提高20(最大40)。

Text: Expensive Material Recycling (Waste Treatment Plant Upgrade)
NewTranslation: 昂贵材料回收(废物处理厂升级)

Text: Expensive Material Recycling (Waste Treatment Plant Upgrade)
NewTranslation: 昂贵材料回收(废物处理厂升级)

Text: Expensive Material Recycling (Waste Treatment Plant Upgrade)
NewTranslation: 昂贵材料回收(废物处理厂升级)

Text: Expensive Material Recycling (Waste Treatment Plant Upgrade)
NewTranslation: 昂贵材料回收(废物处理厂升级)

Text: All-you-can-eat buffet with traditional Tropican delights, the Restaurant is a place of high sanitary standards. It has been documented that at least some of the dishes have been clean in the last 10 years. The floors are complex ecosystem that fall under the protection of several ecological organizations. Finally, the chefs are required to take a bath at least once every season.
NewTranslation: 这个可以吃遍海岛传统美食自助餐的餐馆，是一个有着高卫生标准的地方。据记载，这里的盘子洗了10年。地板上有一个复杂的生态系统，而且该系统已经处于多个环保组织的保护之下。最后，厨师至少每季度洗一次澡。

Text:
Provides Entertainment for citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Effectiveness increases based on Food Variety.

Preferred Tourist Class - None
NewTranslation:
为附近市民和游客提供娱乐。
效率取决于食品种类。
 
适宜旅游阶层-无

Text: Slob tourists are added as a preferred tourist class.
NewTranslation: 适宜游客类型添加闲散游客

Text: Family tourists are added as a preferred tourist class.
NewTranslation: 适宜游客类型添加家庭游客

Text: Rum - the liquid currency of Tropico and the coffee of the enlightened man. Rum - the perfect remedy for all diseases. The only problems we have in the distillery come when a worker falls in the vats. The ungrateful sods will fight to the death rather than allow for someone to pull them out.
NewTranslation: 朗姆酒-海岛的液体货币和开明的人的咖啡。朗姆酒-所有疾病的完美良药。酿酒厂唯一的问题在于，当有工人掉进酒桶里时，这些混蛋宁死不出酒桶。

Text: The Rum Distillery consumes 25% less raw resources.
NewTranslation: 朗姆酒厂原材料消耗减少25%

Text: The factory begins to consume 150 MW of electricity. Effectiveness is increased by 20.
The Effectiveness of Taverns, Restaurants and Night Clubs in the vicinity is increased by 10 based on effectiveness (max 20).
NewTranslation: 附近的酒吧，餐馆和夜总会效率提升10(最大20)。
供应本地市场(朗姆酒厂升级)
供应本地市场(朗姆酒厂升级)
供应本地市场(朗姆酒厂升级)

Text: An indoor playground full of rats, cheese, guinea pigs, cool looking liquids and bored smart people trying to devise new ways to play with them.
NewTranslation: 一个充满了老鼠，奶酪，豚鼠和五彩缤纷的液体的室内游乐场，无聊的聪明人尝试设计和它们一起玩耍的新方式。

Text: Generates Research Points. Improves effectiveness of other science buildings nearby.
NewTranslation: 生成研究点。提升附近科学建筑物的效率。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 (max 60) for each nearby Electronics Factory.
NewTranslation: 附近每个电子厂提高科研室效率20(最大60)。

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 50, but the Science Lab begins to consume an extra 100 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 效率提升50，额外消耗100MW电力。

Text: Shacks are the pinnacle of the Tropican engineering genius. They can be built from everything - wood, metal, old tires, yet all look alike.
NewTranslation: 窝棚是海岛天才工程师的杰作，各种各种的东西都拿来盖房-木头，金属，旧轮胎，还有其他差不多的材料。

Text: Space: the Final Frontier. These are the voyages of the starship Presidente. Its continuing mission: to reach strange new worlds before the Ruskies and the Yankees, to introduce Tropican values to new life and new civilizations, to boldly go where no dictator has gone before.
NewTranslation: 太空，最后的疆域。总统先生，前进吧，开始太空航行吧！赶在美国佬儿和苏联毛子之前抵达新的世界，把我岛光辉历史介绍给新的生命，新的文明。勇敢的闯进独裁者从未踏足的世界吧！

Text: Offers a variety of expensive procedures that mostly make the guests feel good that they can afford them. Many of said procedures are neither pleasant, nor healthy and one in particular involves armadillos.
NewTranslation: 提供各种高端的服务，主要使付得起钱的客人感到愉悦。很多人说这项服务很黄很暴力，特别是涉及到犰狳。

Text: Provides rooms for 10 Wealth tourist families. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Service Quality drops for each residential building nearby.
NewTranslation: 为10个富裕游客家庭提供客房。服务质量取决于美观度。附近的住宅会降低服务质量。

Text: Small groups of people gather here to run around and often follow an inanimate object in random directions. Larger groups of people, called spectators, gather here to eat hotdogs and pretend they have any idea what is happening.
NewTranslation: 一小撮人时常聚集于此盲目的追逐一个连生命都没有的东西，而另外被叫做观众的一大群人呢？他们一边吃着热狗一边假模假样的对下面发生的事情表示出兴趣

Text:
Provides Entertainment for richer citizens and tourists in the vicinity. Service Quality increases for each other Stadium on the island.

Preferred Tourist Class - None
NewTranslation:
为附近富有的本地居民和游客提供娱乐
各场馆可以互相提高服务水平
 
适宜游客类型阶层:无

Text: All tourist classes become preferred tourist class.
NewTranslation: 适宜游客类型为全体游客

Text: Steel Mills are very important for our nature. As you know, steel is produced by combining coal and iron. The by-product carbon is released to be used as the basis for all biological life on Earth.
NewTranslation: 炼轧钢厂对我们再重要不过啦，要知道，钢是由煤和铁混合而成，而副产品碳则是地球生命赖以生存的基础哦。

Text: Produces Steel from Iron and Coal (requires both).
NewTranslation: 通过铁和煤提炼钢(两者需同时拥有)

Text: The Steel Mill consumes 20% less raw resources but begins to consume 220 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 炼轧钢厂减少20%原料消耗，额外消耗220MW电力

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the Budget of the Steel Mill is increased by 20% as well.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，同时炼轧钢厂预算提高20%

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20 but the Steel Mill generates 30% more pollution.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20，污染提高30%

Text: The supermarket is a sure sign that evil consumerism is taking root in Tropico. With its weekly promotions, discount coupons and loyalty programs it will soon corrupt our pristine society to the core and the whole island will be overtaken by ugly shopping malls and hypermarkets.
NewTranslation: 超市是万恶的消费主义扎根海岛的重大标志，它繁多的促销活动，折扣券以及会员制度将很快腐蚀我们淳朴的民风，整个岛屿都将被丑恶的购物中心占据

Text: Provides food to citizens living in the vicinity.
NewTranslation: 为附近的居民提供食物

Text: The Supermarket begins to generate small profits paid directly into your Swiss Bank Account.
NewTranslation: 现在超市开始产生少量利润直接流向您的瑞士银行账户

Text: The Taverns is the preferred place for cultural and political gatherings of any self-respecting Tropican. After few drinks any of the patrons there is ready and willing to demonstrate his expertise in psychology, sociology, political science and martial arts.
NewTranslation: 酒馆是所有热衷于政治文化活动的本地居民聚会的首选之地，任何人在喝了几杯后都愿意展示自己在社会学，心理学，政治学还有武术上的造诣

Text:
Provides Entertainment for citizens living in the vicinity. Service Quality depends on Beauty. Children can't visit the Tavern.

Preferred Tourist Class - Cultural
NewTranslation:
为附近的居民提供娱乐，服务质量依赖于美观度。嗯，儿童禁止入内。

偏好游客阶层-文化游客

Text: Teamsters are everyday super-heroes. Without their aid the whole economy on the island will stop to a grinding halt and the society will crumble into a dark age of terror, chaos and violence. The greatest enemy of the teamsters is the siesta, but they constantly strive to overcome it and continue their endless vigil.
NewTranslation: 卡车司机每天扮演海岛超级英雄的角色，如果没有他们的帮助，我们的经济将会停滞不前，社会也将充满混乱和暴力。卡车司机们的死敌是午间小憩，但他们正用最大的努力抵制它从而光荣的做到全天无休。

Text: Facilitates the transportation of resources around the island.
NewTranslation: 有助于岛内资源的流通

Text: Tenements are the best places to live! Just like lemmings are best at finding safe migration routes and angry crowds are best at making rational, calculated decisions. Ah, who am I kidding? Tenements are the cheapest way to house as many people as possible in a limited space and that's that.
NewTranslation: 毫无疑问，廉租房是最宜居的。这道理就像旅鼠大军总能以最安全的的方式找到迁徙路线或者酒鬼总是提供最理智的建议一样明确。得了吧，我编不下去了，廉租房仅仅是将人们以最小成本聚居在一起的的地方罢了

Text: Provides housing for 12 families. Housing Quality drops over time.
NewTranslation: 可以为12户家庭提供住房。房屋质量随时间下降

Text: Housing Quality is increased by 20 but the building consumes 50 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 住房质量提高20，消耗50MW电力

Text: The Tropican textile industry is unique in the world with the skill and the motivation of its workers. The workers sing songs all day while they work to produce the finest fabrics in the world, praising El Presidente in their songs. Their work is so easy that they do not require lunch break and even siesta!
NewTranslation: 本岛纺织业有着世界上最独特的技术和工作驱动力，咱的工人一边唱着赞美总统的歌一边生产世界上最好的布料。哦，他们的工作就是这么悠闲，他们甚至不需要吃饭和休息

Text: Produces Cloth from Wool and Cotton.

NewTranslation: 丙烯酸染料(亚克力面料)

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 30 but the Textile Mill produces 50% more pollution.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高30，同时增加50%污染
丙烯酸染料(亚克力面料)
丙烯酸染料(亚克力面料)

Text: Effectiveness is increased by 20. Consumes 50 MW of power.
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高20。消耗50MW电力。

Text: Increases workers by 6 and Effectiveness by 50.

Some circulating rumors blame Tropican TV for turning all viewers into mindless zombies without capability for free thought. While this claim is not untrue, exactly the same can be said for television everywhere, so there is no real cause for any concern.
NewTranslation: 有传言说，海岛电台目的是为了把所有观众洗脑成没有独立思考能力的行尸走肉。当然了，这种传言是不切实际的，大家没有任何理由担心啦
提高周围居民的自由度

Text: Effectiveness of entertainment buildings in the vicinity is increased by 20.
NewTranslation: 周边娱乐场所的效率提高20

Text: Tropican cars are so fast they often get pulled over for driving faster than the speed of light. The driver has to pay two fines in this case - one for speeding and one for violating the laws of physics.
NewTranslation: 我们生产的汽车总是超过光速，这导致司机们经常要交两项罚款，一个是超速罚款，另一个是违反物理法则的罚款

Text: Produces Cars from Steel and Bauxite.
NewTranslation: 使用钢铁和铝土矿生产汽车

Text: The Effectiveness of all Plantations on the island is increased by 15 based on effectiveness (max 30).
NewTranslation: 提高15全岛种植效率，最大值不超过30

Text: The Vehicle Factory produces 50% less pollution but consumes an addition 110 MW of electricity.
NewTranslation: 汽车厂减少50%的污染，同时占用10MW的电力

Text: Decreases workers by 6 and increases Effectiveness by 30.
NewTranslation: 减少6个工人并提高30生产效率

Text: There is not enough "bread" in our "bread and circuses"! Most Tropicans eat once a day. This makes them slim and athletic, but not very happy. Some extra rations would be more than welcome when we have the food to spare. Don't forget, fat and lazy people are less likely to revolt.
NewTranslation: 面包店总是没有足够面包，这都不是事，真正的海岛人一天就吃一顿！我们不仅可以保持身材和活力还能时刻有点不高兴。当然了，谁都喜欢吃不了兜着走，另外请记住，吃的油光满面的死肥宅是不会反抗总统大人的。

Text: Increases the food consumption and the food happiness of the citizens.
NewTranslation: 加快食物消耗同时提高食物满意度

Text: Paying for their lunches is a foreign concept to all Tropicans, but I hear it is very popular in countries more sophisticated than ours. Let us put a price on all foodstuff! The poor may starve, but what do they contribute to our economy anyway?
NewTranslation: 提供免费午餐可不是我们本地人的习惯，虽然我听说这在有些社会结构复杂的国家还挺流行的。得了吧，让我们把食物价格涨起来。这也许会饿死一个两个穷鬼，但你瞧，穷鬼对我们经济又有什么用呢？

Text: Tropicans will have to pay for their food.
NewTranslation: 海岛居民必须花钱买食物

Text:
Two out of three of our soldiers cannot identify their right foot from the left. And I have to keep telling them neither is meant to be put in their mouth, unless given explicit orders!
Approve this edict and all military personnel will go through a severe training regimen. With pineapples. As well as a tactical session with a certain Miss Pineapple that is sure to cement their resolve.
NewTranslation: 以前我们的大兵三个中就有两个半分不清左右脚！另外我还得天天告诉他们没有我的命令所有人不准瞎扯淡。通过这条法令后，所有军事人员都必须通过严酷的训练，凤梨小姐评论说，这措施极大的提高了军队的凝聚力，真正做到了军民鱼水一家亲。

Text: All military squads will perform better for the next 5 years.
NewTranslation: 所有军事单位在未来五年中表现更好

Text: The Martial Law is a time-honored way for dictators trying to weasel out of a tight spot. While it is in effect we don't have to worry about elections and even crime is lowered. There are tons of negative effects so keeping it active for too long may be a bad idea unless you want to be *that* badass dictator.
NewTranslation: 戒严令大概是历代独裁者最爱用的灵丹妙药，有了它我们既不用假惺惺的参加选举也不用操心逗逼岛民闹事，但副作用太大，吃太久可不是好事情。不过，你想成为坏的流脓的独裁者的话，请坚持服用若干疗程。

Text: Stops elections. Decreases Crime, Liberty, tourism and efficiency of production buildings. Increases unrest when activated and once each year afterwards.
NewTranslation: 停止选举，减少犯罪。降低自由，降低旅游和生产效率。激活时增加社会不安

Text: Something bad is bound to happen, I just know it. It may be a volcano, an earthquake or the return of the dreaded Chupacabra, as I like to call my mother-in-law. It is a miracle that we are still alive! Let us take precautions now so we don't regret our inaction later.
NewTranslation: 要知道坏事总会来的，它可能是火山爆发，可能是地震，可能是飓风，还可能是来自老怪物电话-哦，我通常这么称呼我岳母。啊，活下来还真是个奇迹！你说我们是不是应该趁着还有时间先采取点预防措施呢？

Text: Permanently reduces the cost of rebuilding destroyed buildings and lowers casualties from disasters.
NewTranslation: 永久降低灾后重建费用，降低人员伤亡

Text: All things come cheaper in bulk, Presidente. Before constructing new residential areas, let us secure an Urban Development deal with the construction company of my cousin Pedro. He promises to work twice as hard at half the price. And let me assure you, he is known to keep at least half of his promises, half the time!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，所有房价都打折啦！在开始开发新地产之前，您最好来看看俺家大兄弟佩德罗是怎么说的，他承诺两倍的效率一半的价格！另外我向您保证，他就是靠至少完成“一半”诺言而出名的！

Text: Decreases the cost of all residential buildings by 50% for the next 2 years.
NewTranslation: 在接下来的两年里降低所有住宅建筑50%的成本花费

Text: Nobody works as hard as you, Presidente. You toil day and night for us and I say it is high time you do something for yourself. Approve this edict and you will get something in your Swiss Bank account for every building constructed on the island.
NewTranslation: 总统您知道么，您是我们海岛工作最努力的人，我觉得是时候您该为自己考虑一下了，通过这条小小的法令，每一个建筑的费用都会抽取一些转到您的瑞士小金库中

Text: Increases the cost of all buildings by 20%. Half of this increase is added to the Swiss account when a construction is finished.
NewTranslation: 所有建筑成本提高20%，20%中的一半将在建筑完工后直接汇入您的瑞士银行账户

Text: Twenty-two, twenty-tree... I lost count again. It is not easy trying to count all those Tropicans while they keep moving, but I am determined to do it. I have this idea where we ask everyone to stand still while I do the counting. I call this a National census.
NewTranslation: 22，23，该死，我数到哪个人了？在大家都走来走去时统计人头数实在太难了！但我有信心做下去！只要总统同意大家都站着不动等我去数。要我说，这就是“全国人口普查”

Text: Discovers citizens with special skills suitable for building managers.
NewTranslation: 可以发现居民的隐藏技能天赋

Text: Giving money back to the populace is an extreme idea, to say the least, but it is known to turn the popular opinion in your favor. Particularly useful at election times, this edict will increase the approval of all rich and middle class citizens.
NewTranslation: 把钱还给大众？这真是个疯狂的想法。不过这样倒真的可以扭转大众对你的看法，特别是你在选举时。这条法令将有效改善所有富人和中产对你的看法

Text: The cost of this edict depends on the number of Tropicans that are well-off or richer. Their personal approval is increased when the edict has been issued.
NewTranslation: 法令的开销取决于居民中产阶级和富人阶级的数量，发布发令后可以提高富人和中产阶级对你的支持度

Text:
This edict guarantees the god-given right of every free-born Tropican to keep and arm bears. Since armed bears can be extremely dangerous, Tropicans will be allowed to bear arms for self-defense. This increases crime, liberty and makes our infantry soldiers stronger. The ones that survive the armed bears, that is.
They may take our lives but they will never disarm our bears!
NewTranslation: 这条法令保证了每一个海岛居民与生俱来的持枪权，虽然大众持枪可以用于自卫，但同样可以用于暴力。这条法令提高了犯罪率和自由度并使我们的大兵更加坚挺持久。是的，可以夺走我的生命但你夺不走我持枪的权利。

Text: Increases Crime and Liberty. Makes infantry units stronger but causes more casualties during uprisings.
NewTranslation: 提高犯罪率和自由以及士兵战斗效率，但在暴乱中会有更多人伤亡

Text:
Fat Tuesday, also known as Mardi Gras, is my favorite day of the year. Traditionally it starts with pancakes. Then there are the carnival, the parade and age-old tradition of young people overthrowing the social norms by getting drunk and naked. It is a glorious day of celebration, chaos and doing stupid things without fear of getting arrested.

It is just like the Revolution. With pancakes!
NewTranslation:
统一现代化改造油腻的周二也就是狂欢节是我一年中最喜欢的一天。从传统的煎饼到疯狂的游行，少年老人都纷纷推翻平日保守的社会规范。哦，这是最欢乐的一天，大家或多或少都做了点平日不会做的傻事。
 
这就像是革命，煎饼革命！

Text: Increases the service quality of all entertainment buildings and overall Crime on the island.
NewTranslation: 全岛娱乐设施服务质量以及犯罪都会提高

Text: Also known as "Soak the Rich", this edict taxes heavily the richest people of our society. Taxing the rich is all right in my book - they are the one with all the money, after all! As you can expect, they will be cross with us. But they managed to become rich once, I am certain they can do it again.
NewTranslation: 打土豪分田地，这条法令给我们的富人阶层带来了沉重的赋税压力。书上说，这可是好事，虽然富人并不这么认为，但你要知道不管我们从富人那里拿走多少钱，富人总能再富起来不是么？

Text: Generates revenue based on the number of rich and filthy rich Tropicans on the island. Those citizens lose wealth and suffer a significant loss of respect towards the regime.
NewTranslation: 法令的收益取决于本地富人数量，该法令同时降低富人的资产和对总统的支持度

Text: per unemployed citizen, kid, or retiree
NewTranslation: 每个失业者，小孩或是退休人员

Text: People with no money excel at creating all kinds of trouble. If we grant a modest sum to all unemployed, students or retirees in Tropico we will spare ourselves a lot of headaches in the future. The poor will be more likely to support the regime if the regime supports them.
NewTranslation: 没有钱的人就会制造各种各样的麻烦，如果我们给海岛的所有失业者，学生还有退休人员一小笔钱，我们未来就可以省掉好多头痛了。只要政府支持穷人，穷人就可能支持政府。

Text: Guarantees at least Poor wealth level for all unemployed, kids, students, and retirees. The upkeep cost depends on the number of people affected.
NewTranslation: 让所有的失业者、小孩、学生和退休人员至少保持在贫穷水准以上。维护费取决于受益人群数量。

Text:
Ran out of money to throw at things? No problem, take a debt! Printing bonds is like printing money, only easier. Who cares about paying interest when we can have what we want right here, right now...Let our grand-children care! Right?

If we have money to spare later you can use the same edict to buy back the bonds we issued and repay our sovereign debt but where's the fun in that?!
NewTranslation:
又没钱啦？没问题，发点债券先欠着吧。印债券比印钱更简单，利息？在我们花钱时谁在乎那玩意啊，这利息不是该我的孙辈们还么？
 
又有钱啦？没问题，那就回购些债券吧。但谁在乎这些破纸片呢？

Text: Manage the sovereign debt of Tropico by issuing and buying back bonds. Borrowed money will accrue interest.
NewTranslation: 通过发行债券缓解赤字，但这样会产生利息

Text:
A preacher I once knew vowed to drink any and all alcoholic beverages he can find, lest they tempt his flock into sin. He nearly managed to do it and was posthumously recognized as a saint for his miraculous drinking prowess. Poor old father Esteban...

A Prohibition, banning all liquor from Tropico, will spare our priests from his fate.
NewTranslation:
我曾经认识一个起誓要通过喝光所有酒精饮料的牧师，据说他相信这样就能让别人喝不到这恶魔的口水了，他几乎做到了并因这神迹一样的酒量死后被教廷封圣酒神。可怜的埃斯特班神父……
 
颁布禁令，禁止所有海岛的酒业，然我们为神父的使命奉献自己的虔诚！

Text: Stops all rum distilleries, night clubs, and Taverns. Increases the efficiency of production buildings by 5. Significantly increases Crime.
NewTranslation: 所有的朗姆酒厂，夜总会和酒吧都将停业，全岛生产效率提高5，犯罪率显著提高

Text: It is a scientifically proven fact that properly motivated students fare better in their studies and graduate faster. We just need enough carrots, sticks and cat pictures to motivate everyone to realize their full potential. Our chief educator Miss Pineapple also requested a flying helmet and a stalk of celery, but I have no idea what they are for.
NewTranslation: 科学证明的证实是，经过适当激励的学生在学习中进步更快，毕业得也更快。我们只是需要足够的胡萝卜、棍棒还有猫的图片来激励每个人实现其潜能。我们的教育主管凤梨小姐还想要一个飞行员的头盔以及一根芹菜，但我搞不清她要那些东西来干啥。

Text: Increases the efficiency of High Schools and Colleges, helping all students graduate faster. The upkeep is based on the total number of education buildings.
NewTranslation: 增加高中和大学的效能，帮助所有学生更快毕业。维护费基于教育类建筑的总数。

Text:
Rebels, what rebels? There are no rebels in Tropico, only loyal, hardworking citizens. You mean those costumed people with red berets on the streets? They are just reenacting some of our most proud historical moments.

If we keep saying that, I am certain some of them may even believe it.
NewTranslation:
叛军？什么叛军，我们没这玩意，我们只有忠诚的，努力工作的的合法公民。哦，你是说那些带着红贝雷帽游行的小家伙？他们只是在重现我们获得自由的历史时刻罢啦！
 
如果我们一直这么说，他们肯定会相信的。

Text: Has a chance to lower the rebel threat. The chance is better with higher happiness in Tropico.
NewTranslation: 有几率将叛军转化为平民，在幸福指数比较高的时候效果更明显

Text: Need to see the doctor? That will cost you. A specialist? Those cost extra. Use of specialized medical equipment like a stethoscope or thermometer? No problems, just ready your pocketbook. This week only, as a special promotion, hospital stay costs as low as a measly 4-star hotel room. Consumables like bandages are sold separately.
NewTranslation: 需要看医生了？你得花不少钱了。专家号？小子，准备破产吧。什么？你还要专业的医疗设备？没问题，我们支持用肾结账。不过现在我们打折了！仅限这周，住院费降至最低，四星级病房只要998，PS。绷带单独出售哦。

Text: Tropicans will have to pay for Healthcare. The ones that cannot afford it will receive no healthcare.
NewTranslation: 岛民将要为医疗付费了，看不起病的人纷纷死去

Text: I have a manila envelope with some particularly condemning evidence against a Tropican faction leader, Presidente. I will spare you most of the gruesome details, just let me tell you that kicking small puppies is involved. We have photos, documents, witness testimony and everything. Who is this evildoer, you ask? Whoever you want him to be!
NewTranslation: 总统大人。我掌握了一些记录海岛其他党派领导人小道消息的文件。我会告知你这其中最可怕的细节，比如踢死一只恼人的小狗，证据包括照片，文件和目击证人。哦，您问谁是当事人？我的好总统，您说是谁就是谁啦。

Text: Target faction loses supporters depending on the popularity of El Presidente. Lose standing with all remaining supporters of the faction and a bigger drop with the faction leader.
NewTranslation: 根据您的指示，目标派别领导会失去支持者。而所有其他阵营和阵营领袖与您的关系将会下降。

Text:
Everyone loves elections! Smiling happy people lining in front of the ballot boxes, casting their meaningless votes, feeling very important about themselves. At least until election day is over, they are free to fantasize how their vote will change everything.

The trick is that proper elections change nothing at all, ensuring that you stay in power for another mandate.
NewTranslation: 是人都喜欢选举！满面微笑的人们正排队站在投票箱前，投出他们毫无意义的选票，让他们自我以为自己很重要。至少在选举结束之前，他们都可以幻想一下他们投的票可以改变一切。

Text: Money don't grow on trees, Presidente, but it turns out they are very useful for growing trees. Growing anything, really. Throw enough money at your farmers and they will throw much more fruit back at you. Figuratively speaking, of course.
NewTranslation: 总统，钱是不会长在树上的，但是钱让树长出来是很有用的，随便种什么都这样。扔足够的钱给你的农民，他们会对着你扔更多的水果回来。啊，当然，我只是比喻一下。

Text: Increased effectiveness of all Plantations and Hydroponic Farms.
NewTranslation: 增加所有种植园和水培农场的效力。

Text: Nobody likes to see families living in shacks, Presidente. Yet when your citizens can't afford an expensive residence, shacks are their only option. This edict will ease the financial burden of all home owners across the island.
NewTranslation: 没人愿意看到住在棚屋的家庭，然而你的居民住不起昂贵的房屋的话，除了棚屋别无他选。这项法令会减轻岛上所有家庭的经济负担。

Text: Lowers the wealth required for living in all residential buildings. The upkeep depends on the number of residential buildings.
NewTranslation: 减少所有住房建筑的财富要求。维护费基于住房建筑的数量。

Text: Science in Tropico is always on the bleeding edge, with exciting discoveries like sliced bread and hot water. But how about science abroad? Are they slicing their bread horizontally or perhaps diagonally? Is their water hotter or somehow more liquid than ours? We will never know. Unless we start sending our scientists on symposiums and joint projects where they will compare notes with the foreign experts and steal what they can from them.
NewTranslation: 海岛的科技总是最牛X的，总是会有像切片面包以及热水这种令人兴奋的新玩意儿。但是国外的科技呢？他们是水平地切面包的？或者是切对角线的？他们的水是比我们的更热还是比我们的流得更快？我们可不知道。除非我们派科学家去跟他们研讨、合作项目，这样就可以和外国专家对比笔记，想办法偷点科技来用用。

Text: Grants bonus research points from all superpowers that have high standing with Tropico.
NewTranslation: 从那些对海岛评价较高的所有超级大国那里获得奖励研究点数。

Text:
Have I told you about my cousin Pedro, Presidente? He is in construction and he has this wonderful offer for us! As long as we give him some money upfront, to cover some of his outstanding debts, he promises to build as many factories as we want on the cheap.

Pedro will be able to repay his debt to Don Angelo and keep both his kneecaps, so everybody wins in the end!
NewTranslation:
总统，我有跟你提起过我的表弟佩德罗吗？他在搞房地产，有个很好的提议给我们！只要我们提前给他一些钱，让他把他的债给还了，他答应我们想造多少工厂他就给我们造多少工厂，优惠价！

佩德罗也就可以把债还给堂·安杰洛，这样就能保住他的膝盖骨了，这样是皆大欢喜啊！

Text: Decreases the cost of all factories by 50% for the next 2 years.
NewTranslation: 在接下来的两年里减少所有工厂的造价50%。

Text:
Our policemen are too busy keeping an eye on the criminals, so we should establish a secret Police to keep an eye on everyone else, Presidente. This way we'll know when someone shows disturbing rebel sympathizer tendencies or too much political ambition for his own good!

The secret Police will identify all rebels and faction leaders for us faster than they can say "personal rights". Then you deal with them as you please, Presidente.
NewTranslation:
我们的警察光是盯着罪犯就忙不过来了，所以我们还需要建立个便衣警察机构盯着别的人，总统。这样如果有人有同情叛军的倾向或者是有太多的政治野心的话，我们就可以知道了！

便衣警察可以辩认所有的反叛者和阵营领袖，速度比他们给人念“个人权利”还快。然后，总统，你想怎么玩他们就怎么玩他们了。

Text: The Police Station discovers special citizens such as Rebels and faction leaders faster.
NewTranslation: 警察局可以更快地发现如反叛者及阵营领袖之类的特殊市民。

Text:
People need supervision, otherwise they tend to do things they regret later. Things like murder, telling political jokes, laughing at political jokes, loitering, petty theft and the worst - conspiring against the elected government.

Some heavy-duty surveillance equipment installed all over the island will wrap up many of those problems quite nicely.
NewTranslation:
人们需要监督，否则他们就会做出一些他们事后会后悔的事来。像是谋杀，讲政治笑话，听政治笑话还敢发笑，闲逛，小偷小摸，还有最糟的-阴谋反对选举出来的政府。

一些耐用的监督设备安装在全岛的话就能很好的解决这些问题。

Text: Reveals the roles of two thirds of the unrevealed citizens with roles. Permanently decreases crime from residential buildings.
NewTranslation: 使有特殊角色但未被发现的市民中的三分之二被发现。永久降低住宅建筑的犯罪。

Text: "How to improve foreign relations", by Penultimo. Step one: invite foreign diplomats and political dignitaries on a free vacation, officially called "international summit"; step two: fill them to the brim with the finest Tropican meals and the strongest Tropican rum; step three: photograph as much of them as possible in compromising situations. Step four: profit!
NewTranslation: 贝奴迪莫著《如何提升与外国的关系》。第一步，邀请外国大使和高官来免费渡假，官方称其为“国际首脑会议”。第二步，用海岛食物和最烈的海岛朗姆酒撑饱他们。第三步，尽可能多的给他们拍点八卦照片。第四步:等着获益！

Text: Increases all foreign relations by 20 for 5 years.
NewTranslation: 五年内增加所有外国的关系20点。

Text:
Come to Tropico for the time of your life. The sun, the beaches, the sights, the nightlife, we've got them all! Marvel at the sight of the worlds' smallest interesting rock formation! Be humbled by the grace and ferocity of our national animal - the Toucan! Try to guess the ingredients of our national cuisine!

Once you come to Tropico, you'll never want to travel again!
NewTranslation:
欢迎来到海岛。太阳，海滩，景色，夜生活，我们都有！在我们的国鸟-犀鸟的优雅及凶猛面前谦卑吧！顺便猜猜我们国家招牌菜的原料是什么！

一日来海岛，此生不旅行！

Text: Increases the tourism rating for 5 years.
NewTranslation: 在五年内增加旅游评级。

Text:
Nothing to see here, citizens! There is no such thing as a top-secret government operation taking place at this very moment and I certainly cannot confirm the rumor that the armed forces of Tropico are particularly vulnerable right now. If there were any rebels on the island, they would certainly make a mistake if they attack us.

Move along!
NewTranslation:
这里没什么好看的，市民！这里没有什么顶级秘密的政府行为发生，我当然不能确认这个流言，说海岛的武装现在特别弱。如果岛上有叛军，他们敢攻击我们的话他们会大错特错的。

前进吧！

Text: Provoke a conflict with the rebels.

Our new waste sorting procedure is designed to be intuitive, elegant and a significant improvement over the way waste is traditionally handled.

Here's how it works. Paper goes into the blue bin, plastic - into the green one. The yellow bin is for metal and the red bin is for glass. The most important bin is the purple one. In it Tropican citizens should put all waste they normally dump directly on the streets.
NewTranslation:
我们新的垃圾分类程序设计得很直观、优雅，比起传统的处理垃圾的方式来是一个显著的改进。

我们来看看它怎么运作的。纸张扔进蓝箱，塑料嘛，扔进绿的那个。黄箱装金属，红箱装玻璃。最重要的箱子是紫色那个，岛民们应该把平时直接扔在大街上的所有垃圾全扔进去。

Text: Reduces pollution from all residential buildings.
NewTranslation: 减少来自所有住宅建筑的污染。

Text:
Children are the future of Tropico, Presidente. If our birth rate declines, we will become a nation of immigrants and has this ever turned out all right?

Let's invest in our future and ban all contraceptives immediately!
NewTranslation:
总统，小孩子们是海岛的未来。如果我们的出生率降低了，我们就会成为一个移民国家，这样能行吗？

让我们为了未来投资，立即禁止所有避孕行为吧！大家一起啪啪啪！

Text: Increases the Tropican birth rate but decreases Liberty.
NewTranslation: 增加海岛的出生率，但减少自由度。

Text:
It appears that we've underestimated the mineral wealth of our country, Presidente. The reason is either a clerical error or a devious plot of your enemies.

Anyway, we can hire a trained team of geologists to turn all the unturned rocks on the island, count all the shiny ones and fix the whole mess in a jiffy.
NewTranslation:
总统，看起来我们之前低估了我国的矿物财富。原因要么是笔误，要么是你的对手画的地图在骗人。

不管怎样，我们可以雇一队训练过的地质学家把岛上所有石头都翻过来一遍，把所有发光的石头都数一下，马上把这些乱糟糟的东西给改正过来。

Text: Increases the amount of iron, bauxite, coal, uranium and gold in all non-depleted deposits.
NewTranslation: 增加所有未耗尽的矿藏中铁、铝土矿、铀以及黄金的储量。

Text:
Tropico is the most natural, all-organic place in the whole world! We've got organic palms, organic llamas, organic alcohol and even organic music performed by our resident church organist. Absolutely no synthetics added.

Remember, people - when something is natural, it must be good for you!
NewTranslation:
海岛是世界上最自然最有机的地方！我们有有机的棕榈，有机的羊驼，有机的酒精，甚至还有本地教堂风琴师弹奏的有机音乐。完全没有添加化学合成品。

人们，记住，自然的东西对你一定是好的！

Text: Stops all Hydroponic and Factory Farms. All agricultural goods increase base price with 20%.
NewTranslation: 停止所有水培农场和工厂化饲养场。所有农业商品的基础价格上涨20%。

Text: I've been scared of needles all my life, Presidente. I've tried spreading all kinds of false rumors about vaccinations causing dandruff, smelly socks and whatnot, but no one ever seems to believe me. Perhaps I should pay a celebrity to spread misinformation for me.
NewTranslation: 总统，我这一辈子都怕针头。我试过散播各种各样的谣言，像是疫苗会产生头皮屑，臭袜子等等，但貌似没人相信我。也许我该花点钱请个有名的人来帮我散布这些假消息。

Text: The campaign takes two years. If completed, it raises the efficiency of clinics and hospitals healthcare and reduces death by bad healthcare.
NewTranslation: 该运动持续两年。完成之后会增加诊所和医院健康服务的效率，并减少因医疗保健缺失导致的死亡。

Text: There has been some controversy about Hydraulic Fracking lately, Presidente. I don't understand all the long words they are using, but I have an opinion. I think all the commotion is caused by that crude word "Fracking". Sounds almost vulgar, no? If they had called it "Hydraulic Persuasion", they could've saved themselves a big headache.
NewTranslation: 总统，最近关于水力压裂有一些争议。我不理解他们用的那些好长的单词，但我有个主意。我觉得所有的骚乱都是来自这个野蛮的词“压裂”。听起来好粗俗，对吧？如果他们称之为“水力说服”，这样就不用头疼了。

Text: Increases the amount of resources in all non-depleted oil deposits.
NewTranslation: 增加所有未耗尽储量的油田的资源量。

Text: I thought sensitivity training means teaching our soldiers and policemen how to hit the most sensitive areas of the human body, but it turns out it is just the opposite. Apparently, a modern police force never leaves marks when beating people up and always uses a polite and accommodating tone when denying their civil rights. What will they think of next?
NewTranslation: 我原以为敏感训练就意味着教我们的士兵和警察如何打击人体最敏感的部位，但结果居然刚好相反。很明显，现代警察在执法时脸上不见血，身上不见伤。周围不见人，不留尾巴，干净利索。他们以为还会有什么？

Text: All military and police buildings reduce liberty less. Upkeep depends on total number of policemen and military personnel.
NewTranslation: 所有军事和警察建筑对自由度的影响减小。维护费基于警察和军事人员的总数。

Text: Allowing same-sex marriages may be just one small step towards liberating Tropico, but it is a giant leap for your evil master plan, Presidente! I know from a reliable source that if we pass this legislation, the entire Western civilization will collapse. Then we move in, take over and rule the world with a fabulous iron fist in a rainbow-colored velvet glove!
NewTranslation: 允许同性婚姻可能只是解放海岛的一小步，但是对于你邪恶的伟大计划来说却是一大步，总统！据可靠消息称，如果我们通过这项法令，整个西方文明将会坍塌，然后我们就可以进入、占据并用戴着彩虹色天鹅绒手套的伟大铁拳统治这个世界！

Text: Allows gay couples to marry and gay tourists to come to the island. Increases Liberty and Tourism Rating. Increases Unrest.
NewTranslation: 允许同性伴侣结婚，允许同性恋游客上岛。增加自由度和游客评价。增加人民不满。

Text: Gone are the days when we allowed other countries to conduct nuclear testing near Tropican soil! With our own nuclear program, we can do those tests ourselves! I expect the superpowers will send some strongly worded letters our way and afterwards they will pay some good money to make us stop.
NewTranslation: 我们允许别的国家在我们的土地周围实施核试验的日子一去不复返了！有了我们自己的核项目，我们可以自己做这些试验！我觉得那些超级大国会先给我们送来些措辞严厉的信件，然后就会乖乖地付钱让我们停止。

Text: Extort some money from the superpowers. All foreign relations drop significantly.
NewTranslation: 从超级大国那里勒索一些钱。所有的外国关系明显下降。

Text:
According to the Tropican Health Organization, smoking is indisputably unhealthy and should be banned island-wide, effective immediately. According to my cousin Pedro, and he knows how things work, "a man just looks cooler with a cigar in his mouth and what do those fancy-pansy doctors know, my grandfather smoked all his life and died of a brick dropped on his head near the age of 85".

You decide who to trust, Presidente!
NewTranslation:
根据海岛健康组织的说法，吸烟有害健康，应当立刻全岛禁烟。根据我的表弟佩德罗的说法:“嘴里叼支烟的人看起来很酷，即使是那些有点娘炮的医生也知道这点。我祖父吸了一辈子的烟，85岁才被一块砸他脑袋上的砖送去天堂。”

总统先生，你来决定要相信谁的话吧！

Text: Stops all Tobacco farms and Cigar Factories. Decreases healthcare death rate and increases life expectancy. Decreases Liberty and Increases Unrest.
NewTranslation: 停止所有烟草农场和雪茄厂。减少因健康导致的死亡率，增加预期寿命。减少自由度，增加不满。

Text:
I was recently taking a bath, thinking how to make us some more money, and I had this "eureka" moment. My idea is to approve an edict that legalizes various substances that are illegal in nearby states and then tax their usage! I just had to run to the palace and tell you right away.

Do you have a spare towel to lend me, by any chance?
NewTranslation:
我最近在洗澡的时候，总是思索如何多赚点钱。突然我有了一个超棒的想法，我们通过实行该法令，把在附近国家的所有非法收入、非法所得合法化，然后收他们的使用税。于是我赶紧跑来宫殿向您汇报了。

话说，您有多余的毛巾可以借我一下吗？

Text: Provides money every year but worsens foreign relations. Increases tourism.
NewTranslation: 每年降低外国关系，获得金钱。增加游客。

Text:
As you know, Presidente, to get online you must either walk down to the basement where we keep the Internet, or use that thingamabob called Wai-Fai. I am still amazed how this Asian gimmick actually works, but it sure beats getting tangled in cobwebs every time I decide to post a new MugBook status.

I suggest supplying the whole island with this wonderful WaiFai. Tourists will surely flock to the only island in the Caribbean where you have basement-less Internet anywhere you go!
NewTranslation:
总统先生，要想上网要么得去连接网络的地下室，要么就得用我们称之为Wai-Fai的那玩意儿。我至今都还对这个来自亚洲的小玩意儿的工作原理感到惊奇，但是每当我要上传嫌犯头像时，没有一大堆蜘蛛网似的玩意儿，感觉好极了。

我建议给全岛上都提供这个很棒的WaiFai。游客肯定会涌进加勒比海上这唯一一个不需要在地下室就可以上网的小岛的。

Text: Increases housing quality and hotel efficiency on the island.
NewTranslation: 增加岛上的住宅品质和旅馆的效率。

Text:
Traffic jams are my least favorite kind of jams, Presidente. Let us do something about them!
Encouraging more people to use the metro should reduce traffic during rush hours and help our teamsters and constructors reach their destinations faster.
NewTranslation:
当道路上的交通状况和果酱一样黏稠的时候，那味道肯定糟糕透了！总统先生，我们该行动起来了！

鼓励更多的人使用地铁，会缩短交通高峰时间段，帮助卡车司机和建筑工人更快抵达目的地。

Text: Reduces the number of people that use cars.
NewTranslation: 减少使用小汽车的人的数量。

Text: I am planning to start an IT Education course to help some of our elderly citizens to get along with modern technology. Can you please review our course? Lesson 1: computers are not your enemy; lesson 2: creating a MugBook profile and friending El Presidente; lesson 3: how to prove that someone's wrong on the Internet.  Extra credits lesson: double-clicking made easy in 12 simple steps.
NewTranslation: 我正在计划开始一项IT普及课程，帮助一些老年市民接触现代技术。请您过目一下我的课程好吗？第一课:电脑不是你的敌人。第二课:在鬼脸谱网站上创建帐号，并粉我们的总统先生。第三课:如何阐明网上的某人的行为是错误的。额外附赠课程:轻松12步，学会鼠标双击。

Text: Increases the retirement age. Requires upkeep based on the number of people above middle age.
NewTranslation: 提升退休年龄。需要根据中年以上的人数付维持费。

Text:
I hate paperwork! This is why I hired some computer geeks to streamline and modernize our bureaucratic procedure so people can submit all documentation digitally. By the miracle of technology, those documents soon appear directly in my spam folder.

The whole process is fully automatic and if you approve it, we will finally be able to fire the five clerks that signed documents in your stead.
NewTranslation:
我讨厌纸上作业！所以我雇了一群网虫把我们的政府工作程序流水化和现代化，这样人民就可以把所有的文档进行数字化操作了。通过这项科学的奇迹，这些文档就可以直接出现在我电子信箱的垃圾邮件里了。

整个过程是全自动的，如果你同意，我们还能炒五个帮你签字的书记员的鱿鱼。

Text: Decreases the cost of all edicts by 25%.

Our researchers are requesting permission to dabble in stem-cell research. Normally I wouldn't hesitate to give them green light, but the Religious faction seems to have very strong feelings against this, so I thought to run it by you first.
While we are on the subject - what are stem cells and are they better than the regular cells in our police station?
NewTranslation:
我们的研究人员请求允许涉足干细胞研究。一般说来我会毫不犹豫给他们开绿灯的，但是宗教团体似乎强烈反对，所以我还是先来请示您。
我们研究这个课题的时候，这个干细胞是啥玩意儿？比我们警察局里的牢房-好像咱们也管它叫小细胞-还要好吗？

Text: All Clinics and Hospitals will provide research points but have increased budget.
NewTranslation: 所有诊所和医院提供研究点数，但增加预算。

Text: Don't like our present political picture? Let us repaint it like the Mona Lisa. By deftly pulling the strings of our puppets, we can make any political faction more numerous and prominent on the island.
NewTranslation: 不喜欢我们现有的政治图案？我们重新画一幅像蒙娜丽莎的吧。只要拉一拉线，海岛上的各方势力就像木偶般被我们玩弄在股掌之间。

Text: Select any faction on the island and make it more prominent. Some citizens will convert to this faction immediately and the faction will attract more members in the future.
NewTranslation: 选择岛上任一阵营，使其更有名。一些市民会立即投入该阵营，该阵营未来也会吸引更多成员。

Text: Apparently some people have problems with us growing genetically modified foods and would prefer that we remain slim, beautiful and critically malnourished instead. I say, let's carefully back away from those people, like real slow, and when we get far enough, do what we were going to do anyway.
NewTranslation: 很明显有人对咱们种转基因作物有意见，他们希望咱们保持苗条、美丽、严重营养不良的样子。我建议，让他们那些人说去吧，我们一点一点地做，等做得差不多了，管他们作甚？

Text: People need less food to be fed.
NewTranslation: 人民消耗的食物量减少。

Text: Let us host the Olympics, Presidente! It will be a grand spectacle and tourists from all over the world will flock to our small country! Don't forget - the most important thing is not to win but to take a part of the profits.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们来办奥运会吧！真的棒极了！还能让全世界的人涌入我们这个小国家！别忘了，奥运会最重要的事不是胜利，而且重在参与……到赚钱当中。

Text: Increased the tourism rating proportionally to the number of Stadiums on the island. The effectiveness of all Stadiums is increased permanently.
NewTranslation: 按岛上体育馆的数量成比例地增加旅游业指数。所有体育馆的效率永久增加。

Text: Once and again this island gave birth to twin civilizations which obliterated each other fighting for its riches.
NewTranslation: 这座岛一次又一次地让两个文明同时兴起，又在相互之间为了财富的战争中同时灭亡。

Text: Despite numerous attempts to break it into smaller pieces, this remains the largest island in the Caribbean.
NewTranslation: 尽管很多人想要把它炸成小碎片，但这个岛依旧是加勒比海上最大的岛。

Text: Our allies <name> sent <number> squads to reinforce us
NewTranslation: 我们的盟友<name>派遣了<number>支部队来增援。

Text: You appropriated <amount> from the banished family
NewTranslation: 你从被放逐的家庭那里占取了<amount>的资金。

Text: You didn't manage to appropriate any wealth from the banished family
NewTranslation: 你未能从被放逐的家庭那里获得任何资金

Text: Social unrest provoked by our negative treasury
NewTranslation: 我们的财政赤字导致了社会动荡

Text: An uprising was prevented due to our democratic principles
NewTranslation: 我们的民主原则阻止了一次起义
海盗正在攻击我们的海岛！

Text: An enemy force is invading our island!
NewTranslation: 敌人的军队正在入侵我们的海岛！

Text: We have successfully repelled the enemy invasion!
NewTranslation: 我们成功击退了敌人的入侵！

Text: The enemy invaders have left the island
NewTranslation: 敌人的入侵者离开了岛屿

Text: <power> warships have been sighted in the sea near Tropico!
NewTranslation: <power>的战船出现在海岛附近的海域！
<power>的战船离开了海岛附近海域

Text: The pirates have plundered <amount> from our treasury!
NewTranslation: 海盗从我们这儿劫掠了<amount>的资金！

Text: No money to plunder - the pirates left disappointed
NewTranslation: 无钱可掠-海盗失望地离开了！

Text: Traitorous citizens are taking arms to overthrow your rightful rule! <number>  traitor squads have been spotted
NewTranslation: 叛变的市民正在拿起武器企图推翻您的正确领导！已发现<number>支叛军部队

Text: Traitorous citizens have tried to incite an uprising against your rightful rule, but there were too few of them
NewTranslation: 叛变的市民试图煽动起义反对您正确的统治，但他们人数太少了

Text: Foreign spies caused an international incident. Diplomatic action failed
NewTranslation: 外国间谍制造了国际事件。外交行动失败

Text: <amount> was paid as interest on the Tropican sovereign debt
NewTranslation: 因为海岛的国债，付了<amount>的利息。

Text: The trade offer for <resource> with <trade_partner> has been completed
NewTranslation: 与<trade_partner>就<resource>的贸易已经完成了

Text: Building Permit earned you <amount> this year
NewTranslation: 建筑许可今年为您赚了<amount>

Text: Building demolished: <Name> (no more trees in the area)
NewTranslation: 建筑被摧毁:<Name>(该区域没有树了)

Text: <building_name> is on fire due to scorching weather
2 of your buildings are on fire due to scorching weather
NewTranslation: 因为酷暑天气，两栋建筑着火了

Text: 3 of your buildings are on fire due to scorching weather
NewTranslation: 因为酷暑天气，三栋建筑着火了

Text: <number> of your buildings have been set on fire due to volcanic eruption
NewTranslation: 因为火山喷发，<number>栋建筑着火了。

Text:

Text:

Text: We are on the verge of creating a new world order, old boy. It will be just like the old world order, but with distinguished people such as you and myself on top.

The Globalists assured me that following their plan of increasing <text_param> by <amount> will bring us one step closer to our goals.

<_objective> Increase <text_param> by <amount>

Context: PopupNotificationPreset Protest Task - Globalists - Build Building title

Text: Being an island, Tropico borders almost every other country in the world. Sadly enough, in order to make the most out of our geo-strategic location we must invite foreign ambassadors to come here.
NewTranslation: 作为一个岛，海岛几乎与世界上任何一个其它国家接壤。但令人伤心的是，为了要充分利用我们的地缘战略地位，我们必须邀请外国大使前来。

Text:

<_objective> Build <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> <reward> Standing with the Globalists

Context: PopupNotificationPreset Protest Task - Globalists - Issue Edict title

Text: We are all but fleeting figures on the great canvas of history, old chap. What prevents us from being forgotten is the value of our words and actions. As your advisor, I would suggest that you use words, as they are cheaper.
NewTranslation: 老兄，在历史的画卷上，我们可不是一闪而过的人物。能让我们不被遗忘的是我们的语言和行动的价值。作为你的顾问，我建议你用语言，因为这样更便宜。

Text:
The edicts you issue have the power to bring happiness to many Tropicans, including my friends the Globalists, and lastly my honest persona. Of course, I'm talking about the edict <text_param>. I would also advise you not to listen to silly conspiracy theories or your conscience while signing it.

<_objective> Issue the <text_param> edict

<_objective>签署<text_param>法令

Text: The unthinkable has happened, Presidente. We've lost the elections.
NewTranslation: 总统，不可思议的事情发生了。我们选举失败了。

Text:
We were able to secure only <percentage>% of the vote, Presidente. I suspect that this is the result of a mass conspiracy involving at least <detractors> Tropicans.

Have some comfort that at least <supporters> of your subjects still love you, Presidente. 

Your opponent called asking you to leave the keys of the Palace under the doormat on your way out.
NewTranslation:
总统，我们只获得了<percentage>%的选票。我怀疑这是席卷了至少<detractors>岛民的巨大阴谋。

值得欣慰的是至少仍有<supporters>依然爱戴着您，总统先生。

您的政敌要求在您离开宫殿时将钥匙留在地毯下。

Text: The election results are in. Let me be the first to congratulate you, Presidente!
NewTranslation: 大选结果出来了。请允许我第一个祝贺您，总统先生！

Text:
I am glad to say that <supporters> Tropicans have given the correct answer and voted for you. Only <detractors> Tropicans have failed the elections by giving the wrong answer and voting for your opponent.

You've won the elections with <percentage>% of total votes cast.
NewTranslation:
我很高兴的宣布<supporters>的岛民做出了投票支持您的正确选择。仅仅<detractors>的岛民因做出错误决定而选举失败，他们投给了您的政敌。

您以<percentage>%的支持率获得选举胜利。

Text: The election results are in. Thanks to a clever interpretation of the numbers we've decided that you have won, Presidente.
NewTranslation: 大选结果出来了。多亏了您对数字的精妙解释，我们决定您赢得了选举，总统先生。

Text:
It may have taken a few extra ballots here and there but we've managed to secure <percentage>% of the vote for you. <supporters> Tropicans were persuaded to vote for you, while we failed to convince the remaining <detractors> voters.

Your opponent called to complain about election fraud but some uniformed men changed his mind. He is now proud of his second place.
NewTranslation:
尽管它已在各处获得了一点额外的选票但我们已设法为您获得<percentage>%的选票。<supporters>岛民被说服为您投票，尽管我们没能说服剩下的<detractors>投票者。

您的对手打电话抱怨您的暗箱操作，但一些穿着制服的人使他改变了想法。他现在为自己是第二名而感到骄傲。

Text: Presidente, I'm shaking. You're shaking. Everyone is shaking.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我看到我在颤抖。您也在颤抖。所有人都在颤抖。

Text: It appears that there is a small earthquake occurring on the island. Let's hope it doesnt wreck anything important.
NewTranslation: 似乎在岛上有小地震发生。让我们祈祷它不会摧毁任何重要的东西。

Text: Presidente, an oil tanker and a stray narwhal were involved in a hit and run accident off the coast of Tropico. The tanker took serious damage while the narwhal fled to Canada.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，一艘油轮和流浪的独角鲸在海岛附近发生交通事故，并肇事逃逸。油轮发生严重损毁而独角鲸逃往加拿大。

Text:
We have a serious problem on our hands, Presidente. Every day, precious oil from the tanker and the nearby oil rig is pouring into the water. If we don't stop this quickly the oil deposits in the area will be drained.

On a minor note, some angry tree huggers are complaining that the oil spill is causing rampant pollution and has killed all the fish in the region.
NewTranslation:
总统先生，在我们手中有一个严重的问题。每天都有昂贵的石油从油轮和附近的石油钻井倒入水中。如果我们无法尽快解决这个问题这个区域的石油矿藏将流失殆尽。

一个小小的提醒，一些愤怒的树环保人士抱怨漏油事件造成的严重污染已杀死了所有该地区鱼类

Text: Presidente, it's so hot outside that I saw two palm trees fighting over a dog.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，外面实在太热了我甚至看到了两只棕榈树在争一棵狗。

Text: This draught poses a serious threat to our crops. Some of our Plantations may stop working altogether. And if that wasn't enough the intense heat can drive people loco and make them do crazy stuff like burning down buildings.
NewTranslation: 这场旱灾将严重影响到我们的农业。我们的一部分种植园将被荒废。如果这样还不够严重的话，酷热会逼疯人们使他们做一些疯狂的事，譬如焚烧建筑。

Text: That's one huge wave, Presidente, and it's coming straight for us!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，那是一个巨大的波浪，并且它直直的向我们袭来！

Text: The tsunami is about to hit our shores. It may be too late to mention it now, but we should avoid constructing on tsunami danger area. Let's hope we get out of this with only a couple of flooded buildings.
NewTranslation: 海啸即将袭击我们的海岸。现在才注意到它可能已经太晚了，但我们应该尽量避免海啸高危区的建筑损失。让我们祈祷我们只是一两个建筑受到淹没而已。

Text: Presidente, did you know that we have a volcano on our island? Well, now you know.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，您知道吗，我们的岛上有一座活火山？好吧，您现在知道了。

Text: Angry of our ignorance, the island's volcano has decided to make its presence known with a rain of fire. Buildings close to the volcano can be set on fire by the flying debris.
NewTranslation: 由于对我们的无知感到愤怒，岛上的火山决定通过火雨来昭示它的存在。靠近火山的建筑将被四处飞溅的岩浆点燃。

Text: The earthquake is over. We made it. I am now going to rethink my life and the choices I have made...Done! Now let's evaluate the damage.
NewTranslation: 地震终于过去了！我们成功了！我现在需要重新考虑我的人生和作出的选择…搞定！现在让我们来对损失进行评定。

Text:
<lives><damaged><destroyed>

The international community sent us <aid> as a disaster relief aid.
NewTranslation:
<lives><damaged><destroyed>

国际救援组织给我们送来<aid>作为赈灾物资。

Text: Presidente, the oil spill has been cleaned up.
NewTranslation: 总统，泄露的原油已被清理干净。

Text: Experts have assured me that, now that the oil has been removed from our waters, the local fish populations will start to grow again and the effects of the pollution will fade away with time.
NewTranslation:
有专家向我保证，我们水域中的原油已被清除，本地鱼类种群将开始再次增长，而污染的影响也将随时间逐渐消失。
。

Text: Victory, Presidente! With the help of my secret rain dance technique I was able to defeat the drought. And it only took me five months.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们胜利了！我有特殊的抗旱技巧，我用独家秘传的祈雨舞蹈打败了干旱。并且做到这些仅仅花费了我五个月的时间。

Text: The drought is over. All of our agricultural buildings have returned to normal production.
NewTranslation: 旱灾已经过去了。我们所有的农用建筑已恢复生产。

Text: I am back in the game! I can now accurately predict rains of cattle, shack and furniture across the entire island. Here is the damage report.
NewTranslation: 我又回来啦！我现在可以准确的预测整个岛上的牛棚，窝棚和家具上空的降雨。这里是损失报表

Text:
<lives><damaged><destroyed>

The international community sent us <aid> as a disaster relief aid.
NewTranslation:
<lives><damaged><destroyed>

国际救援组织给我们送来<aid>作为赈灾物资。

Text: We're alive, Presidente! I didn't think we were going to survive that humongous wave.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们竟然还活着！在如同小山般的海浪拍来时我曾一度以为我们要跪了。

Text:
<lives><damaged><destroyed>

The international community sent us <aid> as a disaster relief aid.

<lives><damaged><destroyed>

国际救援组织给我们送来<aid>作为赈灾物资。

Text: The volcano has finally surrendered, Presidente. It has returned to its dormant state.
NewTranslation: 总统，这座火山终于投降了。它又回去睡觉了？

Text: In the future we should try to avoid constructing important buildings in the volcano danger zone.
NewTranslation: 未来，我们应该尽量避免在火山危险区域建造重要建筑。

Text: The tornado outbreak is over. I have conducted a thorough investigation of who is responsible for these tornadoes. Based on the data the culprit is...me. Wait, that can't be right. Here is the rest of report while I figure what I miscalculated
NewTranslation: 龙卷风的爆发已经结束。我已对引起这些龙卷风者进行彻查。数据显示罪魁祸首是…我。喂，等等，肯定有什么误会在这里。以下是报告的其他部分，让我想想我到底做错了什么

Text:
<lives><damaged><destroyed>

The international community sent us <aid> as a disaster relief aid.
NewTranslation:
<lives><damaged><destroyed>

国际救援组织给我们送来<aid>作为救援物资。

Text: Presidente, my career as a weatherman is over. I promised everyone a warm and sunny day and now we have a Tornado on the island.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我作为天气预报员的生涯就要结束了。我给大家承诺今天是个好日子但现在却受到龙卷风的侵袭。

Text: I miss the old times when Sunny was in charge of telling the weather
NewTranslation: 我怀念过去那总是阳光明媚的日子

Text: Someone must really hate us!  It is bad luck to have one Tornado on your island, but we have several. It must be a conspiracy!
NewTranslation: 一定有人恨我们恨得要死！当一个龙卷风出现在您的岛上只能说运气不好，但是我们却同时存在好几个。这一定是个阴谋！

Text: Personally, I think this is a conspiracy. Anyway, run for the shelters!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我认为这是一个阴谋。无论如何，逃至庇护所！

Text: Presidente, Tropicans await elections next year. They wish to show their everlasting love and respect for you... They may have used different words, but that does not matter.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，岛民们期待着明年的选举。他们希望向您展示对您永恒的爱和尊重……额，他们可能会用一些其他的词汇，不要在意这些细节。

Text:
What matters is that you have to decide whether to give them elections or not. Also consider which member of your dynasty will run for Presidente.

Preliminary polls show that <percentage>% of the people will vote for you.
NewTranslation:
您现在面临的问题为是否要给人们民选举权。当然，您也要考虑哪些家族成员将会与您竞选总统。

初步调查显示将有<percentage>%的人民将会投您一票。

Text: Yes, of course. I know every citizen will show his support for me!
NewTranslation: 好滴，当然要了。我知道所有的人民都会给我支持！

Text: No, there is no need. I already know I am in the hearts of my people.
NewTranslation: 不，没有必要。我知道我在人民的心中。
在海岛上进行强制选举

Text: Elections are coming, Presidente. As our Constitution dictates we have scheduled mandatory elections for 12 months from now.
NewTranslation: 大选将至，总统先生。我们的宪法政体规定我们每隔一年必须进行一次强制选举。

Text: Whose, crazy idea was it to make elections mandatory. I guess there's no getting around it. We have to hold elections. It's time to decide who amongst your dynasty members will run for office and become the next Presidente.
NewTranslation: 是谁，产生了强制选举那么疯狂的想法。我想这已无法逃避，我们要举行选举。是时候决定家族派谁来竞选并成为下一任总统。

Text: We have an opportunity to influence the outcome of the coming elections. Strictly speaking this is not considered exactly legal, but I guarantee that no one will find out.
NewTranslation: 我们还有机会影响未来的大选结果。严格来说这样做是违法的，但我保证没人会发现。

Text: The polls predict that you will get <percentage>% of the votes. With the help of some math voodoo, a couple of bribes and a few bullets we can manufacture additional votes. Some Tropicans won't like this and we may have to deal with a few unhappy people as a result of our election tweaks.
NewTranslation: 民调显示，您可能得到<percentage>%的选票。在一群巫师、几次行贿和一些子弹的帮助下，我们可以得到更多选票。一些岛民可能会不乐意，但是没关系，处理掉他们也是调整选举的一部分。

Text: We can win without cheating (No election fraud)
NewTranslation: 我们可以获得光明正大的大选胜利(没有在大选中舞弊)

Text: Better safe than sorry (Election results will be adjusted slightly)
NewTranslation: 有备无患(大选结果将略作调整)

Text: Presidente is dead! Long live Presidente!

All of Tropico attended the funeral of the beloved Presidente on the sunniest of days. Double-rainbows marked the occasion as flocks of toucans executed perfectly timed aerial maneuvers.

Now the time has come to choose a new Presidente. Choose wisely, since some factions may be sympathetic or antagonistic towards some rulers.
NewTranslation: 今天阳光明媚，圣星高悬，双虹连天，巨嘴鸟成群飞过，犹如完美的阅兵式。在这和当年金主席出生那天一样美好的日子里，全体岛民都出席了他们伟大总统的葬礼。

Text:
<_effect> <effect>

Are you sure you want to repeal <name>?
A devilish combination of the global economy, the Illuminati, bad weather, and just plain rotten luck in made you lose. Please leave your beard and your hat at your desk on your way out.
NewTranslation: 全球经济问题，灿烂的阳光，糟糕的天气和恶心的霉运构成了魔鬼般的组合，这一切的一切使您输掉了这场游戏。请在您离开时，在桌上留下您的胡子和您的帽子。

Text: It happens to the best of us. Stay strong, Presidente, the people feel for you.
NewTranslation: 对我们来说它发生的刚刚好。总统，在人们的印象中，您的名字叫强势。

Text: Once again you have emerged victorious.
The people cheer! The soldiers make sure they do so! Everyone is happy!
NewTranslation: 人们很兴奋！当然，士兵会确保他们很兴奋！所有人都很幸福！

Text: Congratulations, you've followed all the steps and won the tutorial. Not that that's especially hard to do, but hey, a victory is still a victory!
NewTranslation: 祝贺您，您按照所有的步骤完成了教程。而并不是特别的难，但是，嘿，这仍算是一个胜利！

Text: Actually, you can't imagine how many people fail this easy task. Anyway, on to new and more exciting challenges!
NewTranslation: 事实上，您无法想象有多少人跪在这个看似简单的任务上。无论如何，继续进发吧骚年，我们的征途是星辰大海！

Text: Governor, to free ourselves from the shackles of the Crown we must strengthen our peoples' resolve.
NewTranslation: 总督，为了摆脱皇室的束缚我们必须加强我们的人民的决心。

Text: As the fire of the Revolution spreads, we must ensure that we establish the foundation of our new nation.
NewTranslation: 革命之火已熊熊燃起，我们必须确保已准备好建立新国家的基础。

Text:
To gain independence we must build our economic, military and even cultural independence. We need our own army, strong trade relations and advances in science. Every accomplishment will convert more people to the Revolutionary ideals.

<_objective> Build <text_param>
<_reward> Increases the number of Revolutionaries on the island.
NewTranslation:
为了获取独立，我们必须确保我们的经济，军事，甚至文化的独立性。我们需要我们自己的军队，强大的外贸关系和科学的进步。每达成一项都会使更多的人投身至伟大的革命事业中。
<_objective>建造<text_param>
<_reward>增加岛上革命者的数量。

Text: The King has gone too far, and we cannot tolerate him any longer. We must demand a fair price for our goods!
NewTranslation: 山高皇帝远，民少相公多。一日三遍打，不反待如何。我们要求给我们的货物一个公道！
