Text: Currently we are giving all of our <text_param1> production for free to the Crown. We cannot abide this any longer. You have to break the contract with His Majesty. I am sure that the smugglers will help us sell our <text_param1> at a reasonable price.
NewTranslation: 目前我们提供给皇室的<text_param1>完全免费。我们不能在这样下去了。您必须撕毁与陛下的协议。我相信走私者将给我们的<text_param1>一个合适的价格。

Text: The Revolutionaries are angry at the Crown.
NewTranslation: 革命者对皇室感到愤怒

Text: Currently we are selling our <text_param1> production to the Crown at a greatly reduced price. The people are not happy with this outcome and are looking to you for guidance, Governor. What shall we do?
NewTranslation: 目前我们提供给皇室的<text_param1>的价格正在飞降。人民群众并不满意这个结果，他们期待您的指导，总督。我们应该怎么办？

Text: Cancel Crown task (-10 Crown Relations; More Revolutionaries)
NewTranslation: 取消皇室任务(-10与皇室关系；更多的革命家)
拒绝那些革命者(更多保皇党)

Text: Bribe the Crown (-$5 000; The <choice_param1> price returns to normal)
NewTranslation: 贿赂王室(-$5000；<choice_param1>的价格恢复正常)

Text: Thanks to your efforts, the revolutionary movement is growing stronger.
NewTranslation: 多亏了您的努力，星星之火正在燎原。

Text: As a sign of gratitude for your support of the movement the Revolutionaries have offered their help. Remember you need to increase the approval rating above 50% to declare independence. Increasing the number of revolutionaries on the island will greatly help you with this task.
NewTranslation: 为感谢您对革命的支持，革命者用他们的方式向您提供了帮助。记住，您需要增加50％以上的支持率来宣布独立。增加岛上革命者的数量将有助于您完成这个任务。

Context: PopupNotificationPreset Agenda Task Build Team title

Text: Our glorious federation of like-minded Presidentes and Penultimos is presented with another challenge.
NewTranslation: 我们光荣而志同道合的总统们和岛民们现在面临着另一项挑战。

Text: The current task at hand is to be the first team to have <amount> <text_param>
Context: PopupNotificationPreset Agenda Task Build Team text
NewTranslation: 当前首要任务是第一时间获得<amount><text_param>

Text: Things do not look well for you, old chap. His Majesty is extremely displeased with you and has decided to punish you as an example to the other colonies.
NewTranslation: 看起来很不妙啊，老伙计。陛下对您的所作所为感到极其恼怒并决定惩罚您以儆效尤。

Text:
The royal punishment meant for you was so extreme I can't ever bear to put in words but I managed to soften it a bit.

<_effect> <text_param1>
NewTranslation:
皇家对您的处罚实在是太严重了，可把我吓坏了，吓得我都不敢说话，但我尽量试着让它来得尽量温柔点。

<_effect><text_param1>

Text: I gratefully accept His Majesty's prudent judgment
Good grief! The Allied diplomats informed us of the great war effort currently underway in Europe. As if we were some savages in the jungle who do not follow international events.
NewTranslation: 好伤心，感觉不会再爱了！同盟国外交官告诉我们世界大战正在欧洲发生，就好像我们是那些生活在从林中，从不关心国际大事的野蛮人一样。

Text:
Anyway they need our help for their epic undertaking and will reward us greatly if we do.

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>
NewTranslation:
反正他们需要我们为他们的史诗级任务提供帮助，并且会给我们巨大的奖励，如果我们做到的话。

<_objective><ObjectiveText>
<_reward><RewardText>

Text: The Allies are moving towards a big push in their ongoing military effort.They assure me we will achieve peace in our lifetime.
NewTranslation: 盟军的军事行动向前推进了一大步。他们向我们保证我们会在有生之年看到和平的。

Text:
Unfortunately, they are swarmed with military operations at the moment and will kindly redirect some of the opposing armies to us. We will be greatly rewarded for bearing the brunt of their advance.

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>
NewTranslation:
不幸的是，在他们一拥而上之时，非常仁慈地“遗漏”了一些轴心国军队给我们。如果我们能挡住这群纳粹猪仔，奖励肯定很丰盛。

<_objective><ObjectiveText>
<_reward><RewardText>

Text: Dummkopf, old boy! That's the new greeting I learned on my last diplomatic visit to the Axis command!
NewTranslation: 逗逼啊，老男孩！这是在我最近一次至轴心国外交访问时学会的问候语！

Text:
Creating a new world order is big undertaking that requires help from everyone.


<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>
NewTranslation:
“构建和谐社会，人人有责”，创建一个新的社会秩序需要每个人的努力。

<_objective><ObjectiveText>
<_reward><RewardText>

Text: Our allies from the Axis command are ready to share the glory of battle with us! Splendid! Then it will be up to us, the diplomats, to clean up the mess.
NewTranslation: 我们的轴心国盟友愿意与我们分享战斗的荣耀与辉煌！然后外交官会到达这里来收拾残局。

Text:
Anyway, they have done the impossible to bring the battle to our shores and will much appreciate it if we win.

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>
NewTranslation:
至少，轴心国盟友的所作所为不会把战火烧至我们的海岸，如果我们在海岛的“冷泉关”把同盟国的乡巴佬扔进加勒比海，他们对此会感激不尽。

<_objective><ObjectiveText>
<_reward><RewardText>

Text: As the Heir was born, all animals became quiet, a light shone through the skies and la Chupacabra herself went to the crib and bowed to the infant. At least that is what we will write in the history books.
NewTranslation: 新继承人诞生时，万籁俱静，一道光芒划过天空，卓柏卡布拉走至婴儿床边向其跪拜-至少这些会被载入史册。

Text: Using ancient rituals involving heavy rum drinking to affect his brain we may impart some starting skills to your newborn heir. What should they be?
NewTranslation: 依照古老的传统仪式，饮用高度朗姆酒来开启他大脑中的智慧之门，我们可以通过这种方式传授一些技巧给您的新生继承人。他们应该成为怎样的人？

Text: While His Majesty finds your island's backwardness most amusing, he is now worried that it will hinder his great plan.
NewTranslation: 虽然陛下认为您的落后的小岛非常有趣，但他现在担心这会阻碍他的伟大计划。

Text:
Your island's technological progress is questionable at best. You must endeavor to improve your research or you will delay His Majesty's great plan.

<_objective> Research the "<text_param>" technology.
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
您的岛上科技进程值得商榷。您必须努力提高您的科研水平，不然将会阻碍陛下的伟大计划。

<_objective>研发<text_param>科技。
<_reward>您的任期将被延长<reward>个月。

Text: His Majesty personally inspected several reports from your colony and discovered a major oversight in your designs.
NewTranslation: 陛下亲自审查来自您殖民地中的报告，并指出您的规划中的几项重大失误。

Text:
Some of your buildings are not working as efficiently as expected. It seems that your island has finally figured out how to improve certain buildings. His Majesty suggests that you invest in some building upgrades.

<_objective> Have <amount> upgraded <text_param>.
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
您的一部分建筑物并没有达到预期工作的效率。看起来就像在岛上您只尽力去提高建筑物的数量。陛下建议您对一些建筑进行升级。

<_objective>将<amount>个<text_param>升级。
<_reward>您的任期将被延长<reward>个月。

Text: In a flash of brilliance, His Royal Majesty figured out how to fix all of your island's problems through the construction of a single building.
NewTranslation: 灵光闪过，陛下想出了如何通过修建一种建筑来解决您小岛上的所有问题。

Text:
His Majesty assures me that if you construct a single <text_param> all of your island's financial, social and welfare problems will be solved. 

<_objective> Have a new <text_param> 
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
陛下向我保证，如果您建造一个<text_param>所有的岛内金融，社会和福利问题都将迎刃而解。

<_objective>建一个新的<text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将被延长<reward>个月。

Text: His Majesty's plans have been hindered by supply shortages. To offset these setbacks, the Crown demands additional resources from the colonies.
NewTranslation: 国王陛下的计划已被供应短缺阻碍。为了解决这个矛盾，皇室需要从殖民地获取额外的资源。

Text:
Badgers, vermin infestations, lazy workers, foreign agitators and bad weather have pestered His Majesty's great project from the very start. The Empire needs the colonies to step in and provide the necessary resources.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
满地的獾鼠，侵袭的害虫，懒惰的工人，外国煽动者和恶劣天气从一开始就在阻碍陛下的伟大计划。帝国需要殖民地介入并提供必要的资源。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将被延长<reward>个月

Text: The lack of underwear has decimated His Majesty's army, old chap. Hence The Crown's latest demand for more resources needed for underwear production.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，胖次的缺乏使陛下的军队锐减。因此皇室需求更多的制作胖次的资源。

Text:
The Crown is asking for Wool and Cotton of a combined total of <ResourcesToGet>. The Revolutionaries on your island claim that this is "madness" and you should only send half that amount. In response the Royalist insist you should send double the amount to support His Majesty's war.

How much Wool and Cotton will you actually send?
NewTranslation:
皇室需要<ResourcesToGet>的毛和棉花。岛上的革命者称这实在是太“绅士”了，您应该只提供一半的数量，而保皇党则认为您应该送两倍的数量来支持皇室的胖次大业以表忠心。

您觉得应该提供多少毛和棉花？

Text: Send half (no mandate reward; increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 只提供一半(没有任期奖励；壮大革命者的队伍)

Text: Send the original amount (<choice_param1> months mandate extension on completion)
NewTranslation: 提供原本的数额(<choice_param1>个月的任期延长)

Text: Send double (<choice_param1> months mandate extension now and on completion)
NewTranslation: 双倍数额(立即获得<choice_param1>个月的任期延长，并在完成任务后获得相同的延长)

Text: Many of His Majesty's officers have been struck down by a severe case of diarrhea. The army needs talented commanders. Perhaps someone from your own family?
NewTranslation: 陛下的许多官员被严重腹泻打倒。军队需要有才华的指挥官，比如从您的族人？

Text: Pity about all those underpants. So what will it be? Will you send one of your own off to war, risking his life for King and glory? Remember he or she should carry his or her own spare underpants.
NewTranslation: 可惜了那些胖次，那么您将会怎么做？您会把自己的亲人送上战场么，冒着生命的危险只为了陛下和荣耀？记得提醒他或她随身携带备用胖次。

Text: Send a dynasty member to war (6 months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 送您的家族成员上战场(6月的任期延长)

Text: Send a dynasty member to fight for the other side (increases revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 将您的家族成员送至的战场另一边(革命者的队伍正在壮大)
什么战争？我怎么不知道？

Text: Construction of His Majesty's underwater palace has begun. The Crown requires tons of your crops to help pay for this massive project.
NewTranslation: 陛下的水下宫殿开始动工。皇室需求万吨的粮食来支付这个庞大的工程。

Text:
His Majesty demands a combined total of <ResourcesToGet> of your cash crops. Your Revolutionaries find this number too high and suggest that you send only half that amount. Opposing this, the Royalists demand that you send double the amount instead.

With whom will you side?
NewTranslation:
陛下需求<ResourcesToGet>的经济作物。岛上的革命者认为这个数字太高，建议您只送出一半。而保皇党则建议您最好不要这样做，送出两倍才能表现您对皇室的忠心。

您将站在哪一边？

Text: Send half (no mandate reward; increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 只提供一半(没有任期奖励；壮大革命者的队伍)

Text: Send the original amount (<choice_param1> months mandate extension on completion)
NewTranslation: 提供原本的数额(<choice_param1>个月的任期延长)

Text: Send double (<choice_param1> months mandate extension now and on completion)
NewTranslation: 双倍数额(立即获得<choice_param1>个月的任期延长，并在完成任务后获得相同的延长)

Text: His Majesty watched his bonfire burn with joyful glee. He enjoyed the event so much that he decided to hold an even bigger bonfire.
NewTranslation: 陛下享受着篝火的燃烧的欢乐和喜悦。他觉得做一个更大的篝火肯定倍儿爽。

Text:
His Majesty demands <ResourcesToGet> planks for his new bonfire. The Revolutionaries on your island want to charge the King extra. The Royalists strongly oppose this and instead are offering to lower your export prices to help His Majesty.

At what price will you sell your Planks?
NewTranslation:
陛下需求<ResourcesToGet>的木材来做一个新的篝火。岛上的革命者希望国王付出额外的金额来收购这些木材。保皇党则强烈反对这一点，您应该降低木材的出口价格来帮助陛下。

您将以什么样的价格出售您的木材？

Text: Lower prices by 20% (<choice_param1> months mandate extension now and on completion)
NewTranslation: 降价20%(立即获得<choice_param1>个月的任期延长，并在完成任务后获得相同的延长)

Text: Prices should not change (<choice_param1> months mandate extension on completion)
NewTranslation: 原价出售(<choice_param1>个月的任期延长)

Text: Increase prices by 20% (no mandate extension; increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 涨价20%(没有任期奖励；革命队伍正在壮大)

Text: We've been feeding our foes literally tons of food, yet they haven't gained any weight. His Majesty is furious. He demands more food, right now!
NewTranslation: 我们一直给国内的那些蠢货提供成吨的食物，但他们的体重却没有增加。陛下对此感到愤怒，他需要更多的食物，立刻，马上！

Text:
The Royalists on your island demand that you support the King's plan by lowering your export prices. The Revolutionaries have a counter demand that you instead increase your export prices to take advantage of the situation.

His Majesty wants at least <ResourcesToGet> food. Any kind of food will do, just name your price.
NewTranslation:
岛上的保皇党要求您通过降低您的出口价格来支持国王的计划。革命者则持不同意见，您反而应该增加您的出口价格，以占有利地位。

陛下希望至少提供<ResourcesToGet>的食物。任何食物都可以，需要注意的仅仅是您的价格。

Text: Lower prices by 20% (<choice_param1> months mandate extension now and on completion)
NewTranslation: 降价20%(立即获得<choice_param1>个月的任期延长，并在完成任务后获得相同的延长)

Text: Prices should not change (<choice_param1> months mandate extension on completion)
NewTranslation: 原价出售(<choice_param1>个月的任期延长)

Text: Increase prices by 20% (no mandate extension; increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 涨价20%(没有任期奖励；革命队伍正在壮大)

Text: His Majesty's fruitcare plan has hit a minor setback... It doesn't seem to work. The Crown is determined to throw as much fruit at it as necessary to make it work.
NewTranslation: 陛下水果篮子计划似乎遇到一个小小的挫折……它看起来不怎么有效了。皇室确信只要把更多的水果扔里面，肯定有用。

Text:
In support of His Majesty your island's Royalists demand that you lower your export prices. On the other hand the Revolutionaries propose that you increase your export prices and take advantage of the situation.

The Crown demands that you export <ResourcesToGet> fruits. The question is what price will you set?
NewTranslation:
岛上的保皇党要求您通过降低您的出口价格来支持国王的计划。革命者则持不同意见，您应该增加您的出口价格，以占有利地位。

陛下希望至少提供<ResourcesToGet>的水果。需要注意的仅仅是您的价格。

Text: Lower prices by 20% (<choice_param1> months mandate extension now and on completion)
NewTranslation: 降价20%(立即获得<choice_param1>个月的任期延长，并在完成任务后获得相同的延长)

Text: Prices should not change (<choice_param1> months mandate extension on completion)
NewTranslation: 原价出售(<choice_param1>个月的任期延长)

Text: Increase prices by 20% (no mandate extension; increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 涨价20%(没有任期奖励；革命队伍正在壮大)

Text: Twice the Fruit - Double the Flavor
If eating fresh fruit keeps the people healthy and strong, we Tropicans must eat twice as much to be twice as healthy and twice as strong.
NewTranslation: 如果说吃新鲜水果会使人们保持健康和强壮，我们的岛民一定要吃到普通人的两倍。

Text:
That way Tropicans will become healthier and stronger than His Majesty's troops and we will win our independence with ease.

<_objective> Issue the "Extra Rations" edict. It will remain active for at least 2 years.
<_reward> Increases revolutionary support but lowers relations with the Crown.
NewTranslation:
这样岛民将变得比陛下的军队还要健康和强壮，我们才能赢得我们的独立自主。
<_objective>发出“双倍食物”法令并保持其生效至少2年。
<_reward>获得了革命者的支持，但降低与皇室的关系。

Text: Jolly good, old chap! You've given His Majesty's subjects food, so now you should make them pay for it.
NewTranslation: 非常好，老伙计！您给了国王陛下的臣民的食物，所以现在您应该让他们为此付出代价。

Text: I say, this free food thing seems illogical. Why should the Crown waste its profits to feed the people? His Majesty says "No Free Lunch" and he means it. Now be a good dear and issue the edict. Just don't listen to that radical woman and her "Extra Rations" ideas.
NewTranslation: 我说，这个免费食物的事情似乎不合逻辑。为什么要浪费皇室的利益来养活人民？陛下说，“天下没有免费的午餐”。现在是一个非常好的发布诏书的时机。不要听信那些激进的妇女们和她们的“双倍食物”的注意。

Text: Issue "No Free Lunch" (<choice_param1> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 颁布“汉堡不会从天降”法令(<choice_param1>个月的任期延长)
公布“食物配给”法令(革命队伍正在壮大)
同时公布两个法令(获得以上两个奖励)

Text: We have a perfect business opportunity - we can make a huge profit off the misfortune of others. I love this stuff.
NewTranslation: 我们有一个完美的商机-我们可以通过别人的不幸来赚取巨大的利益。我喜欢这点子。

Text: Both the Allies and the Axis are in dire need of supplies. This means we can sell at a huge profit and they can't say "No".
NewTranslation: 无论是同盟国还是轴心国都处于物资短缺状态，这意味着我们可以卖出丰厚的利润并且他们无法拒绝。

Text: Hmm, cash flow has increased. My books on psychology say I should offer you a reward so you'll start making smarter choices more often.
NewTranslation: 嗯嗯，真不错，现金开始增多了。心理书上说，这种情况时我应该给你一些奖励，以后你在做决定时会更聪明一点。

Text: The world is at war... I may not be an expert, but now would seem to be the time to build up one's military power. You never know what might happen.
NewTranslation: 世界处于战火之中……尽管我不是一个专家，但我确信是时候建立自己的军事力量了。您永远不会知道下一刻会发生什么。

Text:
Besides I am sure that there will be ample opportunities to send our soldiers as mercenaries or "fresh meat" as I am assured is the military term for that sort of thing.


<_objective> Have <BuildingAmount> <ChosenBuildingName>
<_reward> $<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
此外我很确信一定会有充足的机会将我们的战士作为雇佣兵或“冷鲜肉”送入战场，就像我确信这是战术用语之类的一样。


<_objective>建造<BuildingAmount><ChosenBuildingName>
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: My years are still ringing from a shouting Axis diplomat inviting Tropico to participate in a great offensive, counter-offensive, or great escape. I couldn't figure out which.
NewTranslation: 我多年来致力于呼吁轴心国集团邀请小岛加入战场，参与一个伟大的进攻，反攻，或者大逃亡，我无法从中自拔。

Text: We are invited to take part in <text_param1>. The offer includes money and the opportunity to be a part of a "historic undertaking".
NewTranslation: 我们被邀请参加<text_param1>。这将给我们提供赚取商机和一个名垂青史的机会。

Text: Send the army and a dynasty member (+20 Axis relations; greater chance of victory)
NewTranslation: 派遣军队和一个家族成员(+20与轴心国关系；极易获胜)

Text: Send only the army (+20 Axis relations)
NewTranslation: 只派遣军队(+20与轴心国关系)

Text: Do not send anyone (-10 Axis relations)
NewTranslation: 不派任何人(-10与轴心国关系)

Text: Hola, Tropicans! It's me, Lulu, your radio host, with a very short message - come join me at the Jolly Roger beach bar! Don't just sit there and listen to some boring old radio.
NewTranslation: 大家好啊，岛民们！是我啊，璐璐，你们的电台主播，我有个小消息给大家-和我一起去好时光海滩酒吧吧！别老是坐在家里听老古董收音机。

Text: Come out and live it up! The weather is fine and the sea fantastic! Time for fiesta, people!
NewTranslation: 走出家门享受生活！天气正好海风徐徐！狂欢的时间到了！

Text: All you lonely souls out there, this is Lulu, your radio host at the Jolly Roger Bar & Radio. Stay tuned for the best Tropico can offer, or even better - come and join me for a drink on the beach.
NewTranslation: 孤独的少年们，这是璐璐，你的海盗酒吧电台。开着收音机听海盗的最新消息，或者干脆来和我一起到海滩喝一杯！

Text: El Presidente is here at the Jolly Roger! I was really hoping to interview our glorious leader, but when I asked him what's in his head, he said
NewTranslation: 总统先生到海盗酒吧了！我本想采访下我们伟大的领袖，但是当我问他头上是什么东西的时候，他说

Text: "Rum and Cola, mostly". Pure Zen! Seldom have I ever heard anything more thoughtful from any country leader!
NewTranslation: “兰姆酒加可乐，管够！”多么纯粹啊！我从没听过任何国家领导人说过比这更贴心的话了！

Text: Tropicans, welcome to our own bright future! Our independence brought us freedom, el Presidente and the Jolly Roger Bar & Radio with me, Lulu, as your host!
NewTranslation: 岛民们，欢迎来到这美好的新未来！我们的独立啦！我们自由啦！我们的总统先生，海盗酒吧电台还有我，璐璐，你的电台主播永远陪伴您左右！

Text: Viva la indepencia, Tropico! No more shall we wear the shackles of European dominion! From now on we shall wear nothing but our own Tropican shackles! Viva El Presidente!
NewTranslation: 独立万岁，海岛国！我们再也不用带着欧洲帝国主义的枷锁了！自今日起我们再也不用带任何的枷锁了，除了我们自己的枷锁！总统先生万岁！

Text: Ahoy there, mateys, this is captain Lulu, queen of the seven seas, broadcasting from my piratey bar, the Jolly Roger. Yarr! Why the all the pirate talk, I hear you ask?
NewTranslation: 你好啊，老兄，我是船长璐璐，七海之女王，在我的海盗酒吧，海盗酒吧里播送。呀啦啦啦啦！我听到你问，为什么每个海盗都嘴碎？

Text: Just because everything is better with pirates!
NewTranslation: 就因为海盗，原来生活可以更美的！

Text: This is Lulu, your radio host. While some people prophesize that World Wars are coming, not just one, but possibly two of them,
NewTranslation: 这里是璐璐，你的电台主播。有些人预测世界大战要来了，不是一场，而是很有可能两场，

Text: I am here to assure you, my friends, that whatever happens, the Jolly Roger will always be there, till the very end of time!
NewTranslation: 我向你们保证，我的朋友们，无论发生什么事，海盗酒吧将会一直在这里，直到时间终止！

Text: In a heated debate, the Communist and the Capitalist argued whether the island's rum should be distributed among the thirsty according
NewTranslation: 在一场激烈的辩论中，共产主义者和资本主义者争论岛上的朗姆酒是应该给那些口渴的人

Text: to their needs or be sold on the free market. Well, I'd hate to take a side and spoil their fun, so let me invite you to the Jolly Roger,
NewTranslation: 来满足他们的口渴还是应该放在自由市场里买卖。我可不想打扰这么有趣的辩论会或者选择支持哪一方，所以我邀请你来海盗酒吧，

Text: where everyone is served according to their needs and as long as they pay for their drinks.
NewTranslation: 这里每个人都可以喝到他们想喝的酒，只要不差钱。

Text: If you think that the Communists and Capitalists are a bunch of crazies fighting over stupid abstracts, well, wait till you see the other guys!
NewTranslation: 如果你认为共产主义者和资本主义者是群争论抽象理论的疯子，那么你更应该看看其他人！

Text: The one lot of them walk around everywhere with loaded weapons, and the others for the most part refuse to drink alcohol in obscene quantities!
NewTranslation: 很多人不管去哪里都带着上膛的武器，一小部分人则拒绝酗酒！

Text: People! Where is our society headed?!
NewTranslation: 群众们！我们的社会在走向何方？！

Text: Does Tropico really need a large standing army to protect its sovereignity? "Make love, not war!", that is what I always say to those Militarist warmongers.
NewTranslation: 我们的海岛真的需要一支庞大的常备军来保护我们的主权吗？“要做爱，别作战！”，这是我一直对军事狂热者说的。

Text: And if anyone really needs to prove how macho he is, he should join me here at the Jolly Roger and try to beat me at arm wrestling!
NewTranslation: 如果他们真的需要证明自己是男人，就应该来海盗酒吧和我比一比掰手腕！

Text: The Religious citizens in Tropico declared their unified stance for peace, virtue, forgiveness, love and upholding Christian values.
NewTranslation: 岛上的宗教主义者宣称他们不适用于和平，美德，宽恕，爱和基督教义的价值观。

Text: Just add "surfing" to that list and I am on board!
NewTranslation: 把“冲浪”加进那个名单吧，我还呆在板子上呢！

Text: Well, people, you thought those World Wars that we just barely survived were bad?! Welcome to the grim present of a possible nuclear apocalypse!
NewTranslation: 如果你们以为我们侥幸逃生的世界大战很可怕的话，那么欢迎来到更可怕的核末日！

Text: Give me a break, people, they may call it "cold" war, but we know... War, well, war never changes.
NewTranslation: 饶了我吧，同志们，他们说这是“冷”战，不过我们知道……战争，恩，战争是永远不变，总是“热”的。

Text: Ola Tropicans! I have a wonderful new message for you! The times they are a-changin' and it's Cold War time, people!
NewTranslation: 岛民们大家好啊！我有个好消息给你！时光流逝了现在是冷战时期了！

Text: Well, I don't know what that means, but it's always hot here on Tropico, so I guess we'll be fine!
NewTranslation: 恩，我也不知这是什么意思，不过岛上一直都是炎热的，所以我觉得我们会没事儿的！

Text: People everywhere are discussing whether we should just stick with the beaches and leave nature pristine and untouched
NewTranslation: 每个角落的人们都在激烈讨论，我们是应该呆在海滩上，保持海岛的自然环境美丽依旧，

Text: or build concrete sweat shops and spend our best years in back-breaking labor. Do you guys even need to think about that one?
NewTranslation: 还是到处盖满钢筋混凝土的血汗工厂，然后让我们的青春消逝在枯燥的体力劳动中。还需要动脑子思考这事儿？

Text: Dear listeners, this is where we take a stand! Even I cannot sit by and watch how some people propose to destroy our nature, our very society!
NewTranslation: 亲爱的听众们，在这儿我们要讲一讲立场问题！就连我，对某些人破坏环境的行为都看不下去了，他们在破坏我们的社会！

Text: They propose that we should WORK! Have we come that far, that we are ready to work now? Have we no dignity? Have we no liberty?
NewTranslation: 他们说我们都要去上班！难道我们已经走到这一步了，我们都必须上班了？我们的尊严呢？我们的自由呢？

Text: Have we not the best of weather on the best of beaches? Join the Environmentalists, and you'll get a cocktail discount at the Jolly Roger!
NewTranslation: 谁敢说我们的天气不是最完美？我们的海滩不是最美丽的？加入环保主义者吧，海盗酒吧的鸡尾酒为环保主义者打折优惠！

Text: People, there are some Industrialists out there spreading lies, saying that if we do not get off the beach and go straight to the factory we will die poor!
NewTranslation: 岛上有些工业主义者到处散播谣言，如果我们不离开海滩去工厂工作我们就会变得死穷死穷的！

Text: Well, I can tell them that is a blatant lie! The more people come to the beach, the more drinks I sell!
NewTranslation: 我可以公然说个谎！这样更多的人可以来海滩，我可以卖更多的酒！

Text: Can't you see that having fun is the economic backbone of Tropico?!
NewTranslation: 你难道看不出，玩的开心才是海岛国的经济支柱吗？！

Text: The next song is for all the righteous boys and girls in the Environmentalist movement, who keep fighting the good fight to preserve Tropican nature and wildlife.
NewTranslation: 下一首歌是献给富有正义感的环保主义者们，他们正在奋起抗争来保护我们的环境。

Text: We may have had our disagreements, but I am actually on your side, dear Environmentalists.
NewTranslation: 我们或许意见不一，但是我其实是和你们一伙的，亲爱的环保主义者。

Text: Just take care to stay on the safe end of my rifle scope during hunting season!
NewTranslation: 在打猎季节里，要小心的呆在我猎枪安全的一端哦！

Text: Modern times have finally arrived in Tropico! Boy, have I been waiting! Better surf boards, plastic surgery, nicer swimsuits, better cocktails and above all -
NewTranslation: 现代社会终于来到了海岛国！孩儿们，我等了好久了！更酷的冲浪板，整形手术，更性感的比基尼，更好喝的鸡尾酒！更重要的是-

Text: a new culture embracing travel, adventure and daydreaming! It's so cool and new, it feels like the sixties all over again!
NewTranslation: 一种新的文化旅游，探险和白日梦！多么酷和新鲜啊，感觉像是六十年代又回来了！

Text: Dear listeners, the Cold War is officially over. Congratulations, we won! The USA and USSR failed to annihilate each other
NewTranslation: 亲爱的听众们，冷战终于结束了。可喜可贺啊，我们赢了！美帝和毛子都没能把对方炸平

Text: and everyone else in a global conflict. I'm putting that down as a win in my book.
NewTranslation: 也没能把其他国家炸平。我认为这就代表着，我们的胜利。

Text: Rejoice, Tropicans - we will have elections within a year! The opposition has come up with a new slogan this year:
NewTranslation: 欢庆吧，岛民们-我们的大选将会在一年内进行！反对党的新竞选口号是:
“投票给别人吧！或者-投给总统先生。”

Text: Hola, Tropicans - we will have elections within a year! The opposition has come with a new slogan this year:
NewTranslation: 欢庆吧，岛民们-我们的大选将会在一年内进行！反对党今年的竞选口号是:

Text: "If you must waste your vote on someone, don't waste it on Presidente!"
NewTranslation: “如果你坚持要浪费你的票在某人身上，至少别浪费在总统先生身上！”

Text: Good news, Tropicans - we will have elections within a year! The opposition has come with a new slogan this year:
NewTranslation: 好消息，我们的大选将会在一年内进行！反对党今年的竞选口号是:

Text: It's official - we will have elections within a year! The opposition has come with a new slogan this year:
NewTranslation: 这是官方消息-我们的大选将会在一年内进行！反对党今年的竞选口号是:
“对独裁厌倦了吗？我们知道我们烦了！”

Text: Good evening, Tropico! We will have elections within a year! The opposition has come with a new slogan this year:
NewTranslation: 晚上好啊，岛民们！我们的大选将会在一年内进行！反对党今年的竞选口号是:

Text: "If you vote Presidente, you are not allowed to complain afterwards!"
NewTranslation: “如果你投票给总统先生，投票完了可不许后悔！”

Text: As the new debate between the Nationalists and the Globalists rages on, I am putting myself firmly in the second camp!
NewTranslation: 随着一场新的民族主义者和环保主义者之间的的辩论开始，我坚定的支持后者！

Text: I welcome everyone to the beach and in the Jolly Roger, regardless of age, sex, ethnicity, religion, or even surfing skill!
NewTranslation: 我在海盗酒吧里欢迎各位来到海滩，不论你的年龄、性别、种族、宗教，连你的冲浪技术我都不在意！

Text: The only requirement is that you are cool or good-looking, or preferably both!
NewTranslation: 唯一的要求条件是你要够酷或够靓，最好是两者都有！

Text: To every Tropican who had high hopes of being able to cast their vote today and feels disheartened:
NewTranslation: 对每一个以为自己可以投票选举然后感到失望的岛民我说:

Text: Come over to the Jolly Roger and try my new bitter-sweet cocktail I named Tropican Democracy! Salud!
NewTranslation: 来海盗酒吧吧，尝一尝我们苦甜味儿的新式鸡尾酒，我把它命名为海岛国式民主！干杯！

Text: Mornin' Tropico. The sun is shining, the birds are singing, outside the palace the mob is demanding elections
NewTranslation: 早上好海岛国。太阳在照耀着，鸟儿在唱歌，总统府外黑帮们在要求选举

Text: and inside El Presidente is demanding that they stop. Just another day for you and me in paradise.
NewTranslation: 宫殿内的总统先生要求他们停下游行。这不过是海岛国普通的一天吗。

Text: Hola Tropicans! I know what you're all talking about. Yeah, how about those elections, eh?
NewTranslation: 岛民们好啊！我知道你们都在说些什么。没错，是关于选举的，对不对？

Text: El Presidente has won, totally fair and square with no cheating whatsoever.
NewTranslation: 我们的总统赢了选举，完全是一场公平的选举，完全木有作弊什么的。

Text: This one-hundred percent honest, squeaky clean election has renewed my faith in the young Tropican democracy and our bright future.
NewTranslation: 这是百分百的实话，公平的大选让我对海岛国年轻的民主体系充满了信心，明天会更好。

Text: A close victory for El Pres this time. Still, he is victorious and the escape boat that general Penultimo
NewTranslation: 一场差距甚小的大选，总统先生。不过，他赢了，至于说贝奴迪莫将军准备的逃离海岛的船

Text: so diligently prepared will have to wait another mandate.
NewTranslation: 将要到下一个任期结束才会被用吧。

Text: Today our beloved president won the elections so convincingly that I hear he had to rig the ballot count in favor of his opponent,
NewTranslation: 今天，敬爱的总统先生自信地赢了大选，他自信心爆棚了，以至于我都怀疑他甚至为他的反对者都伪造了不少票，

Text: just to make them look more plausible for the defenders of democracy overseas!
NewTranslation: 只是为了让那些国外的民主守卫者放心！

Text: Sharpen your pitchforks; light your torches and bring your machetes, fellow Tropicans!
NewTranslation: 把你的粪叉磨亮；点上火炬带着火药枪，跟上来岛民们！

Text: Whether you are defending the regime or fighting against it, it's going to be one hell of a party! Ayayayayayayaaaa!
NewTranslation: 无论你是在保卫现任政权还是为了推翻它，这都将是个激烈的派对啊！啊呀呀呀呀呀呀呀！

Text: This next song is for all our brave soldiers who tirelessly train to hone their battle skills.
NewTranslation: 下一首歌是献给我们敬爱的大兵们，他们是那么的努力训练自己。

Text: I have to say, these military drills have been getting disturbingly realistic recently. Oh my.
NewTranslation: 要我说，最近的军事演习变得有些过于真实了。我的天啊。

Text: Hello, dear listeners. I want you to join me in wishing my boyfriend Raul and his comrades luck in their upcoming surprise attack against our totalitarian regime!
NewTranslation: 你好啊，亲爱的听众们。我希望你们和我一起，为我的男朋友和他们的同志们祈祷，祝他们在反对现任政权的奇袭中好运！

Text: My heart is with you, Raul!
NewTranslation: 我把我的心献给你，劳尔！

Text: For everyone who's always wanted to travel abroad but has found it to be too expensive for his blood...
NewTranslation: 对那些一直都想出国旅游又觉得过于昂贵的人民，我说……

Text: Congratulations, abroad seems to be coming to Tropico! Armed and in great numbers!
NewTranslation: 恭喜了，国外人都来到了海岛上！带着武器而且是一大群！

Text: Still, I am confident that no foreign army will take over the palace while General Penultimo is there to defend it.
NewTranslation: 话说回来，我很有信心外国军队是打不下宫殿的，尤其是将军贝奴迪莫也在宫殿里。

Text: To our brave boys who fought off the enemy: Viva Tropico! Viva El Presidente!
NewTranslation: 对那些击败外国入侵者的勇士们，我说:海岛万岁！总统万岁！

Text: To all you boys back on your boats on your way home鈥?awww, I'd hoped we could get to know one another better,
NewTranslation: 对那些正划着船回家的熊孩子们我说，哈哈，我希望还有机会更深入地了解你们，

Text: but your stay was so brief and you were so preoccupied with getting YOUR ASSES KICKED! (laughs)
NewTranslation: 不过你们呆的时间太长了，而且你们只是专注于被打的屁滚尿流！(哈哈大笑)

Text: Ok, folks, show's over, everyone had a good time, some shots were fired, some words were said.
NewTranslation: 好了，小伙伴们，游戏结束了，每个人都玩得很开心，开了不少枪，说了不少话。

Text: If you鈥檙e not dead or in prison or both, come down to the Jolly Roger and bury the hatchet.
NewTranslation: 如果你们还没有挂掉或被扔进监狱，那来海盗酒吧，大家一起坐下来喝一杯吧！

Text: In the news, the rebels have made their way past the first defense lines of El Presidente鈥檚 Palace and are proceeding to have it surrounded.
NewTranslation: 最新情况，叛军已经突破了第一防线，他们现在包围了总统的宫殿！

Text: Raul, if you are listening, I know now is not the best time... but I think we need to see other people Raul.
NewTranslation: 劳尔，如果你还在，我知道这虽然不是个好时候……但是我觉得我们也许应该见一面，劳尔。

Text: You will always be my own special little rebel.
NewTranslation: 你将永远是那个我可爱的小叛军。

Text: Hola, Tropicans! Last night things got a bit wild between Marco and I, but I assure you, the only collapsed roof
NewTranslation: 大家好啊，岛民们！昨夜我和马克玩的有点疯，不过我向你保证，唯一被我们震塌的房顶

Text: we are responsible for is our own!
NewTranslation: 我们只为我们自己的屋顶负责！

Text: You spilled your coffee all over your morning newspaper, the cat ate the hamster and just when you were running late for work, you blew out a tire?
NewTranslation: 你把咖啡洒到了晨报上，猫把仓鼠吃了然后正当你要上班迟到的时候，你车胎爆了？

Text: Your day just can't get any worse, right? If your home is on the slopes of the big dormant volcano...
NewTranslation: 你的这一天不可能变得更糟了，对不对？如果你的家盖在一个巨大的活火山上……

Text: well, this next song is for you!
NewTranslation: 那么，这首歌是献给你的！

Text: Well, folks, that was FUN! Shake the ash off, put on your lava lavas and come join me at the bar.
NewTranslation: 好吧，伙计们，这确实是很好玩啊！把身上是火山灰抖掉，穿上你的熔岩装，然后来酒吧和我喝一杯吧。

Text: Don't forget to try out my new shot cocktail, directly inspired by the recent volcano eruption!
NewTranslation: 别忘了试试我们新的烈酒鸡尾酒，灵感完全来自于最近的火山爆发！

Text: I have a confession to make. I just came out of a train-wreck of a relationship.
NewTranslation: 我要坦白点事情。我刚刚结束了一场糟糕的恋情。

Text: Things started off pretty nice but then derailed so violently that it left nothing behind but an ugly, disfigured hulk.
NewTranslation: 起初一切都看上去很美好，但是一切都慢慢不对劲儿了，到最后只剩下一个丑陋的庞然大物。

Text: Just like some buildings I've been seeing on the island lately. Fix them, already!
NewTranslation: 就像最近我看到的很多岛上建筑。赶快修好他们！

Text: The ugly oil spill near our shores forced even me to put the surf board away for a while.
NewTranslation: 这场烦人原油泄漏事故，就连我都不得不把冲浪板收起来。

Text: What I always do with oil stains is clean them with beer and lime juice.
NewTranslation: 我一般用啤酒和莱姆汁来清理油污。

Text: However, dumping perfectly good beer into the ocean seems like such a waste, so let's wait for an expert opinion on the matter.
NewTranslation: 不过，向海里倒好啤酒是很浪费的，所以还是让我们等待专家的意见吧。

Text: Temperatures are record high and rain has been record low. I'm sorry, fellow farmers, my rainmaker-dance just doesn't seem to work.
NewTranslation: 气温达到历史最高纪录而降雨量到达历史最低记录。我很抱歉，农民朋友们，我的祈雨萨满舞看上去没有作用诶。

Text: Still, I can help you cure your dry throats, so join me at the Jolly Roger.
NewTranslation: 不过，我可以为你解决口渴哦，来海盗酒吧和我喝一杯吧。

Text: Guys, gals! Where are you going, the big wave is this way! SURFS UP, YEEEHAAW!
NewTranslation: 男孩女孩们！无论你去哪里，都有一股大浪袭来！来冲浪吧，呦吼吼！

Text: Well, people, this afternoon's beach twister contest will have to be postponed - ironically, because there is a twister at the beach.
NewTranslation: 额，大家，这个下午的海滩扭扭乐活动被延期了-好笑的是，延期是因为，风在玩扭扭乐。

Text: Personal confession time. I've been to space once. Even before we had a space program.
NewTranslation: 真心话时间到了。我去过一次太空。在我们有太空项目之前。

Text: I was on the Russian Space Station with my then-boyfriend Boris. After a wild weekend, they had to shut it down and build a new one.
NewTranslation: 我当时是和我的男朋友鲍里斯在俄国空间站。一个疯狂的周末后，他们不得不关了空间站建了个新的。

Text: But he wasn't really my type. And besides, long-term relationships never end well.
NewTranslation: 不过他不是我喜欢的类型。而且，恋情的保鲜期可不会太长。

Text: Our very own Tropican cabaret offers fun, passion, dance, glee and scantily-clad women galore.
NewTranslation: 我们自己的歌舞厅有热情，趣味，舞蹈，快乐，还有穿得很少的美女。

Text: It is like a small-scale Jolly Roger for city folk.
NewTranslation: 就像一个小型的为城市居民提供的海盗酒吧。

Text: I understand a new TV station has been built. Why all the fuss, people?
NewTranslation: 我听说新的电视台建起来了。还有什么不开心的呢，同志们？

Text: If you want pictures with your news that badly, just lay back, listen to me and picture me drinking a glass of milk as some of
NewTranslation: 如果你真的那么想要你的新闻配上图，那么放松下来，听我说话，然后想象我正在喝一杯奶

Text: it makes its way down my chin from my big, soft lips...
NewTranslation: 奶缓缓划过我又大又软的嘴唇，慢慢的流到我性感的下巴……

Text: I want to dedicate the next song to my ex-boyfriend Reggie, who left me to join the army, because, and I quote,
NewTranslation: 我想把下一首歌送给我的前男友雷吉，因为他加入了陆军，我引用他的话，

Text: "they'll treat him better there". I am truly sorry for that unfortunate shopping trip, Reggie.
NewTranslation: “他们会对我更好的”。我对那场不幸的购物之旅感到抱歉，雷吉。

Text: Wherever you are now, at least you won't get bitten by an alligator.
NewTranslation: 无论你在哪儿，至少你不会被鳄鱼咬到。

Text: Ah, I remember my own high school years. I was an acne-covered menace back then.
NewTranslation: 喔，我记得我的高中岁月。我当时是个满脸粉刺的恐龙。

Text: The head cheerleader once stole my jock boyfriend Raul, so I made her eat her own pom-poms.
NewTranslation: 那时候有个拉拉队长抢了我的运动员男朋友劳尔，所以我请她吃了自己的蓬蓬球。

Text: Then I said to Raul "You can't dump me, I'll dump you!" and promptly pushed him in a manure container.
NewTranslation: 然后我对劳尔说“你不能甩了我，我要甩了你！”然后立刻把他推进肥料箱。

Text: Luckily, I've changed for the better since then.
NewTranslation: 幸运的是，我的样貌自那以后变漂亮了。

Text: College time in Tropico! I have fond memories of college.
NewTranslation: 海岛大学开学了！我有很多珍贵的大学回忆。

Text: Once we shaved a goat's butt and taped it to a flagpole and then set the college on fire to illuminate the goat better. Good times!
NewTranslation: 有一次我们把一只山羊的屁股剃光了毛，然后绑在了旗杆上。为了照亮那个羊屁股，我们还点着了大学校舍。真欢乐啊！

Text:
(somber, grave, much-too-serious robotic tone)

Try the new anti-depressant from TropicoChem - the company that puts YOU ahead of profit.
NewTranslation:
(抑郁，悲伤，太严肃的机器人口音)
来试试出自海岛药业的最新抗抑郁药物-海岛药业永远把你的利益放在公司利润之前。

Text: I used to be a sad and miserable person. But not anymore. Thanks to Cheerinax I can now smile and laugh.
NewTranslation: 曾经我是个悲伤痛苦的人。不过这样的日子一去不复返了！我要感谢逗逼药，我现在可以随心所欲地笑了。

Text: I am the life of every party. There are no known side effects except pure joy.
NewTranslation: 我现在是每个派对的中心。除了有可能下巴脱臼外，没有任何副作用。

Text: Join me at the supermarket for my new urban shopping survival course.
NewTranslation: 来加入我吧，在超市里学习城市中的血拼生存课。

Text: Cart races, promotion hunts, herding bored kids on a sugar rush, surviving the Black Friday stampede, we've got it all!
NewTranslation: 手推车竞速教程，降价狩猎指南，熊孩子糖粉放牧手册，黑色星期五踩踏幸存须知，我们全都有！

Text: Remember, dear housewives, it's a jungle out there! Bring your own machette!
NewTranslation: 记好了，亲爱的家庭主妇们，这是丛林法则！带上你自己的大砍刀！

Text: Competition time! We just had a new entry in our "Most annoying sound in Tropico" tournament from the newly constructed Lumber Mill.
NewTranslation: 竞争时间到了！我们和岛上新建的木材厂一起进入了“谁是海岛上最烦人的声音”竞赛。

Text: As you know I am the reigning champion with this sound:
NewTranslation: 我用这个声音成为了卫冕冠军:

Text: Try to top that, lumber mill!!!
NewTranslation: 你能超过这个吗，木材厂！！！

Text: I just ordered a really big wardrobe from our new furniture factory. Do I really need another wardrobe?
NewTranslation: 我刚刚在新的家具厂里订立个巨大的衣柜。我需要多一个衣柜吗？

Text: Of course I do, I'm a woman! And I need a place to store all my skeletons, of course.
NewTranslation: 当然我需要，我是个女人！我当然需要个地方藏起来我的秘密。

Text: Have I ever told you about the time I ran away to join the circus? What a wonderful two years I spent there before they kicked me out for being too crazy.
NewTranslation: 我给你说过我曾经离家出走加入马戏团吗？在他们因为说我太疯把我踢出去之前，那曾是多么美好的两年时光啊y。

Text: I miss my old friends. Freddy, if you're listening: welcome to town and give Olga a yank on her beard!
NewTranslation: 我想念我的老朋友，弗莱迪，如果你在听的话:衷心希望你到城里来，然后使劲儿把奥尔加的胡子上揪一把！

Text: I was as excited as a school girl when I learned that a Dolphinarium had opened its doors here in Tropico. I think I'm beginning to understand the language of our ocean friends.
NewTranslation: 当我上高中时，听说海豚馆要开业了，我是那么的兴奋。我觉得我听得懂我们海中朋友的语言了。

Text: It's early to state with any certainty, but I think the little guys are trying to thank us for something... and it's almost as if they are waving me goodbye. Odd.
NewTranslation: 现在不太能确定，不过我觉得小矮个儿是想要为了什么事感谢我们……也可能是在对我们挥手告别。太奇葩了。

Text: Are you sick of eating fresh fruit directly off the trees and bushes growing on our virgin island?
NewTranslation: 你是不是吃厌了那些长在树上和树丛里新鲜采下来的水果？

Text: Tired of the smell of freshly caught fish being cooked at a beachside barbeque? I know I'm not!
NewTranslation: 厌倦了在海滩上新鲜烤鱼的味道了吗？我知道我没有！

Text: But if you are, our beloved government has built a factory that stuffs those in tin cans, and fills them with preservatives, just for you!
NewTranslation: 如果你是，我们政府建了一个把东西塞进锡罐的工厂，各种防腐剂也被加了进去，生活好滋味！

Text: Now that a new observatory has been built, I expect my horoscope to become a touch more accurate.
NewTranslation: 一个新的天文台建好了，我期待我的望远镜会变得更精确些。

Text: No offense, dear astrologers, but the last 20 times you said that I would find the love of my life turned out to be...well... just BARELY true...
NewTranslation: 没有冒犯你的意思，亲爱的占星师，你告诉过我20次，我会找到我的真爱。结果……嗯……只对了一次……

Text: An old boyfriend of mine once said to me "baby you can drive my car" and so I did.
NewTranslation: 曾经，我的一个前男友给我说“宝贝你可以开我的车”，所以我就开了。

Text: Truth be told, I haven't heard from him since. Pablo, I'm sorry I overreacted and I hope you made it back to town.
NewTranslation: 说实话，我再也没收到他的消息。巴勃罗，我很抱歉。我总反应过度，我希望你能安全回家。

Text: If you still want a car, you can now buy a nicer one, made in Tropico.
NewTranslation: 如果你还想要辆车，你可以买辆更好地，海岛制造。

Text: We have a new science lab, and just in time too, as my cocktails repertoire badly needs an upgrade...
NewTranslation: 我们有了个新的科学实验室，很及时地说，正当我的鸡尾酒单子需要升级的时候……

Text: maybe I can share recipes and experience with the big brains there. I bet they can learn a thing or two from me as well.
NewTranslation: 也许我应该和实验室的聪明人分享一下我的酒单和经验。我觉得他们也能从中学些东西。

Text: I was asked to tell you that red staplers are officially banned from our newly opened office building.
NewTranslation: 我被指派来通知你，红色订书机在新建的办公楼中被正式禁用了。

Text: For some unknown reason they set off the fire detectors there.
NewTranslation: 因为一些不明的原因，它们会让火警报警器报警。

Text: Is it just hot in here, or is it the new geothermal plant on the island? Neither, dear listeners!
NewTranslation: 到底是这里热，还是因为岛上新建的地热发电场？亲爱的听众们，都不是！

Text: It's just the man of my dreams who will walk right through the door any minute now.
NewTranslation: 我的梦中情人将会随时路过这个门口，我热血沸腾。

Text: Dream-man, if you are listening, get your cute butt up here this instant!
NewTranslation: 梦中情人，如果你在听，马上到这来！

Text: Tropican cigars are the healthiest cigars in the world. They are clinically proven to be beneficial for your lungs, vocal cords, nasal cavities and pituitary glands.
NewTranslation: 海岛牌雪茄是世界上最健康的雪茄。它们被医学上证明有利于你的肺部健康，声带健康，鼻腔健康和脑垂体健康。

Text: A Tropican cigar is guaranteed to make you look manlier, even if you are a woman!
NewTranslation: 一支海岛牌雪茄会保证让你更有男人味，哪怕你是个女人！

Text: A shout out to the Tropican police, who just got a new home. Officer Mendez, you know you can strip search me anytime.
NewTranslation: 对刚搬了新家的海岛警察说一声:门德斯警官，你可以随时对我搜身哦~

Text: Also, you forgot your handcuffs. I kept them as a little memento, but if you need them, I could take your hat instead.
NewTranslation: 同时，你忘记了你的手铐。我把它留下来作为个纪念物，如果你需要手铐，那就那你的帽子来换吧~

Text: I admit, fellow listeners, I'm not one for cramped spaces. And while I can鈥檛 say that these new apartments the government built for us are all that bad鈥?
NewTranslation: 我承认，我所在的地方并不狭窄。我也没有说任何关于政府新建公寓楼的坏话，

Text: well, let's just say that when a friend of mine was peeling onions for dinner - she made her neighbors cry.
NewTranslation: 这么说吧，当我的朋友剥洋葱做晚餐的时候，邻居都会流眼泪。

Text: I am so glad that there is a new Church on the island. Jesus taught us many important things like surfing and "Turn the other cheek".
NewTranslation: 我们岛上有了个新的教堂，我超级开心。基督教给我们很多重要的事情，比如冲浪，还有“另一半脸颊”。

Text: I often disregard that last rule and punch the guy instead, but I always feel guilty afterwards.
NewTranslation: 但是我经常忘记了规则，总是两边的脸颊一起抽打。直到抽打完了，才有点点负罪感。

Text: I have proven scientifically that Tropican steel is the best in the world!
NewTranslation: 我用科学的方法证明，海岛牌钢铁是世界上最好的钢铁！

Text: Even my Gut Rot special needs 35 seconds to eat its way through an inch-thick plate.
NewTranslation: 就连我那特别的消化系统，都得35秒才能消化那一寸厚的盘子。

Text: Why do we need clinics? Just grow a pair, people! I once had a whole sea urchin stuck in my foot. But did I go to a clinic?
NewTranslation: 谁要诊所啊？大胆点儿，大家！曾有一次一整只海胆扎在了我脚上。可我去诊所了吗？

Text: NO! Then, when an overly friendly llama attacked me while I was removing the urchin and I had to fight it off, did I go to a clinic like a crybaby?
NewTranslation: 没有！那么，在我拔除海胆时，一只热情过头的羊驼攻击我，我击败了它，我又像个娃娃哭的孩子一样往跑去诊所了吗？

Text: NO! And when I finally had to run across the entire island after the llama came back with his friends? In stilettos?
NewTranslation: 没有！当羊驼带着朋友回来找我报仇的时候我跑过了整个岛屿？穿着海胆鞋？

Text: NO! I just went to my secret rum stash and drank it all. Like all Tropicans should instead of going to a clinic like a bunch of pansies!
NewTranslation: 没有！我只是去把我私藏的朗姆酒全喝光了！所有的岛民都应该像我一样，而不是像是一群伪娘似的跑去诊所！

Text: With the new Jewelry Factory opening doors, I find myself in a sentimental mood.
NewTranslation: 新的珠宝工厂开门以后，我感到我很感伤。

Text: Take my love, take my land, but don't you dare take away my shiny!
NewTranslation: 拿走我的爱，拿走我的地，但你胆敢拿走我的亮晶晶的珠宝！

Text: My firefly brooch is my only memento of a lost love, a guy named Malcolm who was tragically killed by a particularly bad-tempered fox.
NewTranslation: 我的萤火虫胸针是我逝去的爱人唯一的纪念品，一个叫马尔科姆男人，他悲剧性的被一只特别坏脾气的狐狸杀死了。

Text: I still remember you, Mal, and I will always love you!
NewTranslation: 我永远记得你，马尔，我永远爱你！

Text: The new airport on our dear Tropico has some fond memories poppin' up.
NewTranslation: 新的海岛国机场带来了很多有趣的回忆。

Text: You see, I'm a proud member of a certain club, and now that commercial flight is a fact of life here as well - what are you waiting for, folks!
NewTranslation: 你瞧，我是某个俱乐部的尊贵会员，现在商务飞行正是流行-你还在等什么的，伙计们！

Text: Go, have fun, do the mile-high! We can share stories down to the Jolly Roger when you're back.
NewTranslation: 去，玩得开心点，玩点10000公尺爱爱！我们可以在你回来以后在海盗酒吧分享彼此的故事。

Text: The big topic of gossip this week is the secret recipe that our scientists use to make energy in the Nuclear Power Plant.
NewTranslation: 本周最大的谣言话题是，科学家们在用什么秘密配方，让核电厂产生能量。

Text: Some say the secret ingredient is Uranium while others think it's Polonium and even Thorium. Personally,
NewTranslation: 有些人说神秘配料是铀，别人说是钋或者，我个人认为是钍

Text: I like to do things the way my ex-boyfriend Chuck taught me and crush atoms with my bare fists instead of using a shiny reactor, but you know how it is - different strokes for different folks.
NewTranslation: 我喜欢用我前男友查克教我的方法，用我的手压碎原子而不是用那些反应堆，不过你也知道-不同的人用不同的方式。

Text: You know what that new Hospital means, right, ladies? Cute doctors!
NewTranslation: 你知道新医院意味着什么，对不对，姐妹们？可爱的医生们！

Text: I think I may just get sick and catch me a good doctor real, real soon now...
NewTranslation: 我觉得我可能会生病然后勾上个好医生，很快，很快的……

Text: When hunting doctors you have to remember one thing - they scare easily, so you always have to wear excellent makeup as camouflage.
NewTranslation: 在勾引医生的时候要记住一件事-他们很容易感到害怕，所以你一定要花上最好的妆作为迷彩。

Text: All those poor helpless animals, cramped away in the new Factory farm! This is an atrocity!
NewTranslation: 那些可怜的无家可归的动物啊，都挤在那新的工业化牧场里！这是一个暴行！

Text: Hey, Presidente, animals are people too! You should release them all into the wild.
NewTranslation: 你好啊，总统先生，动物也有人权！你应该把它们放归大自然。

Text: Yes, I know they're tasty, but if you fancy a steak you should hunt it down like nature intended!
NewTranslation: 是的，我知道他们很好吃，不过如果你想吃牛排你应该去大自然中去打猎！

Text: Ogling that hot, muscular football player down at the Stadium? Me too! So back off, he's mine!
NewTranslation: 想要勾引那个帅气肌肉发达的足球运动员？我也想！所以滚开，他是我的！

Text: But you can have his friends.  Not the one with the chiseled chin, though. I'll keep him as a substitute.
NewTranslation: 不过你可以勾引他的朋友。不过不是那个下巴轮廓分明的。我要留着他做备胎。

Text: Summer time fun time! How about going to the stadium?
NewTranslation: 夏日时光是开心时间！不如去体育馆吧？

Text: Remember, bring a bar of chocolate to throw at the cheerleaders.
NewTranslation: 记住，带块巧克力扔给拉拉队员。

Text: You don't know what fun is until you've seen a human pyramid explode when all the cheerleaders try to grab the chocolate at the same time.
NewTranslation: 你不知道那多有趣。当你把巧克力扔向那个由拉拉队员组成的人肉金字塔时，每个队员都想抢巧克力，然后整个金字塔就爆炸了。

Text: The fight between those poor skinny girls alone makes it worth the price of a ticket.
NewTranslation: 单单看那些可悲的苗条姑娘打架就值回票价了。

Text: I never have anything good to wear, so I am really excited about the new fashion company in town.
NewTranslation: 我从来都没有好衣服穿，所以我对新开的时尚公司很感兴趣。

Text: Only one problem, before I get myself some sweet designer clothes - I have free up some wardrobe space first.
NewTranslation: 只有一个小问题，在我搞到设计师设计的时装之前-我先要在我的衣柜里清出点空间来。

Text: (*munching sounds*) Chocolates! (*munching sounds*) Can't talk! (*munching sounds*) Must eat!
NewTranslation: (*狂吃中*)巧克力！(*狂吃中*)没空说话！(*狂吃中*)一定要吃！
(*狂吃中*)奶油味的女神！(*狂吃中*)(发疯似得)更多巧克力！！！

Text: A new fast food franchise has just invaded our beloved island and they are selling burgers.
NewTranslation: 一个新的连锁快餐店入侵的我们深爱的小岛，他们在卖汉堡。

Text: Burgers! If you don't have to outrun a cheetah to catch it, it's not fast food, people!
NewTranslation: 汉堡！如果你不需要比猎豹跑得快就能得到它，那就不是“快”餐，同志们！

Text: Now, the Atlantic sailfish or the roadrunner, now those are what I call "fast food".
NewTranslation: 那么，大西洋旗鱼或者是走鹃，这些才是真正的“快餐”。

Text: I feel disheartened, dear listeners. What is this world coming to鈥?We have to pay for food now... What next? Pay for love?
NewTranslation: 我感到很沮丧，亲爱的听众们。这个世界怎么了？我们居然要花钱买失误了……下一个是什么？花钱买爱情？

Text: Military drills start today. You know what that means, ladies, don't you.
NewTranslation: 军事演习开始了。你知道这意味着什么，姐妹们，是不是。

Text: Come to the Jolly Roger quickly and get your front row seats to watch men in uniforms fight El Presidente's invisible enemies
NewTranslation: 来海盗酒吧吧，这有最前排的位置，来看制服帅哥们攻击我们总统意淫出来的敌人。

Text: while you enjoy a refreshing mojito. Don鈥檛 forget your binoculars!
NewTranslation: 同时还有提神的莫吉托酒可以喝。别忘了带上望远镜！

Text: What do you think about this martial law, fellow Tropicans? At first I felt like a caged tiger, but now I try to look at the bright side.
NewTranslation: 你们怎么看待戒严令，岛民们？一开始我觉得我像笼子里的老虎，不过我总看向光明面。

Text: I don't find it too bad. I get to spend some quality time with Alex, my pet alligator, and my average relationship has doubled in length!
NewTranslation: 我没觉得这有多难。我终于有时间陪陪埃里克斯，我的宠物鳄鱼，而且我的恋情比以前长了两倍！

Text: Fiesta time, Tropico! Come over to the Jolly Roger and celebrate the bright future ahead of us all as a nation. Tonight, the future is paying the tab!
NewTranslation: 神圣日到了，海岛国！来海盗酒吧一起庆祝我们国家美好的未来吧。今晚，未来付酒钱！

Text: Our Government may be out of debt, but that doesn't mean that all you freeloaders with mile-long tabs here at the Jolly Roger have any reason to rejoice.
NewTranslation: 我们政府也许付完了所有国债，不过这并不意味着那些欠着海盗酒吧酒钱的人有任何理由感到高兴。

Text: If even Tropico can repay its debts, I am sure you can too!
NewTranslation: 如果海岛国可以付清债务，我确定你也可以！

Text: As rarely as I take sides on various issues, I have to voice my discontent with the last Right to Arms amendment.
NewTranslation: 虽然我很少发出政治意见，我不得不说我对公民持枪法的不满。

Text: If any cowboy waltzes into the Jolly Roger with any weapon more sophisticated than the common machete, I will personally tie them to the electric bull.
NewTranslation: 如果任何牛仔走进海盗酒吧带着比砍刀还复杂的武器，我将会亲自把他绑在电动公牛上。

Text: Take this as a warning - drinks and guns don't mix well.
NewTranslation: 把这当做警告-酒精和枪，从来没好事儿。

Text: Party on, people, it's Fat Tuesday! By the edict signed by El Presidente himself, if someone gifts you with a necklace today,
NewTranslation: 派对开起来，大家，这是欢乐星期二！根据我们总统先生签署的法令，如果今天有人给你个项链，

Text: you are obliged to give him some pineapples in return.
NewTranslation: 你将必须给他个菠萝作为回礼。

Text: Prohibition log, day one. There is not enough milk in Tropico for all the mango and cocoa milkshakes needed for the emptiness that a
NewTranslation: 禁酒法令日记，第一天。整个海岛的奶都没办法做成足够多的芒果巧克力奶昔来填满

Text: single mug of grog could easily fill... Don鈥檛 know how long I can survive鈥?El Pesidente鈥?Please...
NewTranslation: 仅仅一杯烈酒就可以填满的空虚……不知道我还能活多久？亲爱的总统先生，请不要这样下去了……

Text: Hola Tropicans! Our generous Presidente has found it in his heart to forgive our rebellious youth and has granted a general amnesty!
NewTranslation: 岛民们你们好啊！我们伟大的总统先生宽恕了那些反叛的年轻人并且签署了大赦！

Text: Some criminals are being set right free now, while the luckiest of them are to be taken on a cruise vacation of indefinite duration, courtesy of the government.
NewTranslation: 有些罪犯被给与了自由。最幸运的一些人，还有机会参与一场无限期的游艇旅游，这都是我们政府的恩惠。

Text: I was shocked by the recent revelations about one of the island's most prominent factions.
NewTranslation: 最近关于岛上最著名党派的曝光让我震惊了。

Text: I mean, based on their behavior in the Jolly Roger and in the bedroom, I had my doubts, but this is too much. Those poor, poor kittens!
NewTranslation: 我的意思是，基于他们在海盗酒吧和卧室里的行为，我对此表示怀疑。不过这也太过了。这些可怜的小家伙！

Text: Rejoice Tropicans, it is now official that those doing well for themselves will pay a bit more in taxes so that we all share in their success and move hand in hand
NewTranslation: 欢庆吧，岛民们！官方宣称那些有钱人将会多缴纳一点点税，以便让大家都能享受他们的成功

Text: together towards prosperity- as a people! El Presidente, our own modern day Robin Hood - he takes from the rich and he gives to... himself!
NewTranslation: 大家一起手牵手走向贫穷，如同一家人一样！总统先生，我们的现代罗宾汉，从有钱人那里收钱，然后把钱留给……他自己！

Text: In the spirit of our new Industrialization policy, I have installed a conveyor belt to deliver drinks at the Jolly Roger. Cheers!
NewTranslation: 本着最新发布的工业化法令的精神，我在海盗酒吧里装了传送带来递送酒和饮料。干杯！

Text: Dear listeners, let me tell you a secret. In attempt to boost the domestic sunglass industry,
NewTranslation: 亲爱的听众们，让我来告诉你个秘密。在尝试刺激国内太阳镜工业的过程中，

Text: El Presidente has approved the launch of a new top-secret agency! Shhh, don't tell anyone!
NewTranslation: 我们的总统允许成立了新的秘密特工局！嘘……别告诉任何人！

Text: I had a really good time last night鈥?Too good maybe, I now have a new tattoo鈥?It says Fernando!
NewTranslation: 昨晚我玩的很开心！太开心了，我新纹了一个纹身？上面写着费尔南多！

Text: Who is Fernando... I would really like to know but ay ay ay, one drink too many...
NewTranslation: 谁是费尔南多……我很想知道他是谁，不过，呃呃呃，喝得太多了……

Text: Luckily El Presidente - in his everlasting quest to improve lives - has promised us that nothing will go unseen鈥?Or unrecorded 鈥?from now on.
NewTranslation: 幸运的是我们的总统先生-当他永不停息的努力提高公民生活水平时-向我们保证，从现在开始，不会有任何事情看不见，不记录。

Text: Rejoice, Tropico, foreign dignitaries are coming to our shores! Remember, don't you dare pickpocket any of them or you risk starting World War 3 all by yourself!
NewTranslation: 欢庆吧，海岛国，各国要人齐聚海岛国！记住，如果你胆敢偷任何一个人的钱包，那么你很可能挑动第三次世界大战！

Text: A weird trend seems to have invaded Tropico, dear listeners. Sculptures of both rubber and plastic and of various shapes and sizes seem to be selling like hotcakes!
NewTranslation: 一种奇怪的流行趋势入侵了我们的岛屿，亲爱的听众们。奇形怪状的橡胶和塑料雕刻品卖的火爆！

Text: I have to admit that I'm pleasantly surprised by this rather abstract hobby Tropicans have decided to adopt.
NewTranslation: 我得承认，我很高兴的看到这种奇怪的爱好在我们岛民中流行开来。

Text: In unrelated news, the contraception ban is active and in full force as of today.
NewTranslation: 一条不相干的消息，所有避孕产品都被禁止了，即日开始。

Text: Big news, ladies! I am starting my own fashion line! In tune with current events, I will be offering barbed wire covered female underwear.
NewTranslation: 大消息，姐妹们！我开创了我自己的时装品牌！为了配合这个疯狂的消息，我开始出售铁丝网制成的女性内衣。

Text: It is better than the now forbidden methods of contraception.
NewTranslation: 这是最好的避孕器具，比那些被禁止的避孕套什么管用多了。

Text: In unrelated news, biologists have observed some strange bird migration patterns. A huge flock of storks is moving toward the island of Tropico.
NewTranslation: 不相关的一条消息，生物学家观察到一些奇怪的鸟类迁徙规律。一大群鹳正在向海岛飞来

Text: It is set to arrive in nine months. Curious!
NewTranslation: 他们将在九个月后登陆。有趣！

Text: Starting today, flu shots and various vaccines can be received at your local clinic.
NewTranslation: 即日起，流感疫苗和其他的各种疫苗开始在当地诊所出售。

Text: But if you're afraid of needles, or are just plain old fashioned like little old me, my assortment of tequila based shots and other strong immunizations are available at the Jolly Roger.
NewTranslation: 如果害怕打针，或者像我一样喜欢传统方法的人，一种用龙舌兰酒调制的特别饮品混合了各种疫苗，现在海盗酒吧起售。

Text: Let鈥檚 see any virus get anywhere near what I鈥檓 about to pour into myself.
NewTranslation: 让我们看看有没有病毒胆敢接近我的这杯酒

Text: With the new changes in policy we will have even more marriages in Tropico.
NewTranslation: 随着新法令的实行我们将在海岛上看到很多的婚礼。

Text: Why not have hold your wedding at my bar on the beach? Perfect location and excellent service!
NewTranslation: 为什么不在我的海滩酒吧里办婚礼呢？完美的地点和优质的服务！

Text: We even have a special room where you can keep your in-laws locked away until the wedding is over. For a little extra we will even throw away the key.
NewTranslation: 我们甚至有特别的房间，可以把你婆家或者亲家都锁起来，直到婚礼结束。多加一点钱我们还可以把钥匙丢了。

Text: New legislation allows people of the same sex to marry. This will undoubtedly very soon lead to marriages between humans and animals and polygamy.
NewTranslation: 新法规允许同性婚姻。这很快就会变成允许人类和动物结婚，还有一夫多妻。

Text: I am all for those changes! I will finally be able to marry all my boyfriends so they belong to me AND TO ME ALONE! I will also be able to marry my toucan to my pet alligator Alex.
NewTranslation: 我支持这些变化！我终于有机会和我所有的男朋友都结婚了然后他们每个人都是我的！我同样要把我的巨嘴鸟嫁给我的宠物鳄鱼埃里克斯。

Text: Now that the radio is up and working again, I invite all of you who were on the beach during the nuke test to compare skin tans - courtesy of the Government!
NewTranslation: 现在无线电又能用了，我邀请所有核试验的时候在海滩上的人比一比肤色-来自政府的恩惠！

Text: (spoken slowly and monotonously) I admit I had differences with our beloved El Presidente on some matters, but with his recent change of stance on some matters... matt-ers... matters!,
NewTranslation: (又慢又无趣的说着)我承认我和我们敬爱的总统先生在某些事情上有不同意见，不过自从他在这些事情的最新的看法改变……很…很重要！，

Text: I have only this to say: Tropico is the BEST country EVAR!
NewTranslation: 我只说一句话:海岛是世界上最好的国家！

Text: I found genetically modified crops a huge disappointment!
NewTranslation: 我认为转基因农作物十分令人失望！

Text: Turns out we don't grow fish fins after we eat them, they don't cause brain damage and won't horribly and permanently change our indigenous flora.
NewTranslation: 看起来我们以后吃鱼不用吐鱼刺了，不会导致脑损伤，而且也不会严重、不可逆地损害我们的植物系统。

Text: Just about every exciting bad rumor we heard about them isn't true. You can do better, scientists, you can do better!
NewTranslation: 每一个令人兴奋的谣言都是假的。你可以做的更好的，科学家们，你可以做的更好的！

Text: On your feet, Tropicans! With the Olympics coming here, it's paramount that we do our best to push for the disciplines closest to our hearts:
NewTranslation: 预备，岛民们！自从奥运会来到这儿，最重要的就是我们要把我们的纪律牢记心中:

Text: wave-riding, beach partying, synchronized drinking and my all-time favorite: swimsuit contests!
NewTranslation: 乘风破浪，海滩派对，大口喝酒还有我最爱的:比基尼大赛！

Text: Special prizes today. Everyone who guesses the number of the current amendment to the constitution wins a free drink.
NewTranslation: 特别奖哦~任何能猜对我们现有的宪法修正案数量的顾客将会得到一杯免费的鸡尾酒。

Text: Anyone who has even the slightest idea what is in it will also get a drink, because he is definitely not drunk enough.
NewTranslation: 任何一个哪怕记得一点修正案内容的人也会得到一杯免费鸡尾酒，因为他显然没喝够。

Text: Finally, the grand prizes for the night (and any other night) - all cute guys get a FREE date with me!
NewTranslation: 最后，今夜的大奖是(其他的晚上也是一样的)-所有的帅哥得到一个免费和我约会的机会！

Text: Out with the old and in with the new! El Presidente's legal team has finely and precisely tuned our constitution so it is 53% better than the old one.
NewTranslation: 旧的不去，新的不来！我们总统的法律专家们小心仔细地修改了宪法，新宪法比旧的好53%。

Text: It even uses one of those fancy serif fonts for the body text!
NewTranslation: 上面甚至用的是看上去高大上的花体字来书写的！

Text: Dear El Prez, next time you amend our constitution, could you please add in a bit where everyone is obliged to spend at least half their salary here at the Jolly Roger.
NewTranslation: 亲爱的总统，下次你修改我们的宪法的时候，你能不能加上一条，要求每个岛民必须在海岛酒吧花掉一半的薪水。

Text: That would be a progressive law if there ever was one! Thank you in advance, glorious ruler!
NewTranslation: 那将是一部进步性的法令，提前谢谢你了，伟大的领导者！

Text: Many reports of electrical outages today. We even had some trouble here at the bar - the rodeo bull stopped working for half an hour until I caught two electrical eels to power it up.<newline>
NewTranslation: 很多地方爆出停电事故。我们的酒吧里也有些问题-电动公牛半小时无法运转，最后我只好抓了两条电鳗。<newline>

Text: To all my fellow Tropicans affected by the electrical shortages that seem to be plaguing Tropico at the moment... Hey, don't be so gloomy.
NewTranslation: 对所有因为电力短缺而困扰的岛民，我想说……嘿，被那么忧郁。

Text: I'm sure you can find lots of fun things to do in the dark... I know I can.
NewTranslation: 我相信你可以在黑暗里做很多有趣的事情……我知道你肯定行！

Text: Hola Tropico. While many of you don't have a whole lot of love for our El Presidente, I myself would argue that he could be doing worse!
NewTranslation: 海岛，你好。虽然很多人都不那么爱我们的总统先生，我还是要为他辩护一下，他完全可以干的更糟的！

Text: OK, you could say that he could be doing better as well... actually one might even go as far as to say he could be doing a LOT better and...well... not really that much worse.
NewTranslation: OK。你可以说他应该做的更好一些……实际上你还可以说，他应该做的比现在好很多很多……这个吗……也没那么坏吧。

Text: I hear some people are growing less and less fond of our beloved Presidente.
NewTranslation: 我听说人们越来越不爱我们敬爱的总统先生了。

Text: If you trust and love me, you have to love El Presidente, too. Okay, Mr. Secret Agent,
NewTranslation: 如果你相信我并且爱我，你也应该爱我们伟大的总统先生。好吗？探员先生。

Text: I've read it, now will you point that gun somewhere else and give me a kiss?
NewTranslation: 我已经播报完了这条消息，现在你能把你的枪口移开然后给我一个吻么？

Text: It's official! Results from the feel-good poll clearly show that Presidente is the most popular name given to newborns - for both boys and girls!
NewTranslation: 官方宣称，经调查显示，现在最潮的事情就是把自己宝宝的名字取成和总统先生一样的，无论男孩女孩。

Text: It's also the third most popular name for pet Chihuahuas!
NewTranslation: 当然宠物狗名字排名第三。

Text: El Presidente has recently won second prize in a popularity contest. I heard the first guy had to leave the island real quick, chased off by an angry mob of El Prez's devoted fans.
NewTranslation: 最近我们的总统先生赢得了人气之星的二等奖，我听说第一名被一群愤怒的总统先生的脑残粉追得走投无路只好跳海。

Text: With the national treasury being at an all-time low, some analysts are saying that things cannot possibly get any worse for Tropico.
NewTranslation: 随着财政资金正处于历史最低位，分析人士表示，海岛现在的情况已经糟糕到不能再糟糕了。

Text: El Presidente reassured them that they actually can and will.
NewTranslation: 总统先生保证，他和他的幕僚有能力解决这一危机，并且很快就会处理好。

Text: With the national treasury being at an all-time low, some analysts are saying that things are bound to get better soon.
NewTranslation: 随着财政资金正处于历史最低位，分析人士表示，危机很快就会过去。

Text: El Presidente stepped in to say that things will be allowed to get better when it is best for Tropico and not a day earlier.
NewTranslation: 总统先生表示，这件事对海岛来说是一个新的发展和成长机遇，不会对国家发展造成影响。

Text: With the national treasury being at an all-time low, some analysts are saying they are unsure about our financial perspectives at this point.
NewTranslation: 随着财政资金正处于历史最低位，分析人士表示，他们不确定这一事件对金融市场的冲击到底有多大。

Text: El Presidente assured them that he will tell them what to think when the proper time comes.
NewTranslation: 总统先生保证，会在适当的时候公开报告。

Text: You know what they say, right? You know the economy is doing well when your dictator buys golden AK-s for his palace guards.
NewTranslation: 你知道他们是怎么说的对吧？看得出经济发展的相当不错，因为伟大的独裁者已经给他的私人卫队装备上了黄金AK-S。
同志们，我们的国家已经富得流油了。

Text: The treasury is overflowing and I am sure it is just a matter of time until Presidente redistributes all that wealth among the general population.
NewTranslation: 成堆的黄金已经堆满了国库，我相信总统先生很快就会分配好这些财富，带领大家实现共同富裕。

Text: It isn't all about money, folks! The sun, the beach, the surf and your pet alligator are way more important than material wealth.
NewTranslation: 钱不能买到一切，同志们。阳光，沙滩，海浪，还有你的宠物小鳄鱼。这些东西比你那些恶俗的物质财富更宝贵

Text: Still, it is nice to know that Tropico is financially secure at the moment.
NewTranslation: 尽管如此，还是很高兴听到我们的小岛此时并没有陷入经济危机的泥潭。

Text: Rumor has it that El Presidente's personal bank account is one of the few man-made objects that can actually be seen from space.
NewTranslation: 坊间流传说，总统先生的私人账户是为数不多的能从外太空看到的人造奇迹。

Text: This might be an exaggeration, of course, as I'm not even certain that Switzerland can be seen from space.
NewTranslation: 这可能有点夸张，当然，我也不确定能不能从太空上看到瑞士。

Text: Congratulation to El Presidente who has now been in office for 25 years.
NewTranslation: 热烈祝贺我们的总统先生执政25周年。

Text: In all that time he never once forgot to tip me when he visited the Jolly Roger. Truly, no country could desire a better leader than you, Prez!
NewTranslation: 每次他光顾完海盗旗酒吧都会慷慨地留下小费，真的，没有哪个国家的领导人比你更优秀了，总统阁下。

Text: Congratulations go out to El Presidente, who has been in office for 50 years and is still going strong.
NewTranslation: 热烈祝贺我们的总统先生执政50周年。没有哪个人能执政如此之久并仍然保持健康。

Text: I don't know what the world dictatorship record is, but I am optimistic that you can break it, Presidente!
NewTranslation: 我不知道世界独裁时间的记录是多久，但我想您可以永远保持并刷新这一记录，总统先生

Text: In the wake of the news that we have now reached a population of one hundred,
NewTranslation: 新闻周刊，现在我们的人口已经达到了100。

Text: I just want to say I am heartbroken that there are at least two people on the island who still haven't made their way to the Jolly Roger.
NewTranslation: 我表示非常的伤心，因为直到现在还有两位岛民没来光顾过海盗旗酒吧

Text: You make me sad, you two. Don't you love me?
NewTranslation: 你们俩真令我伤心啊！！！难道你们不爱我了么！！！

Text: I'm seeing lots of new faces around here lately. This is awesome, because I am all for meeting new people.
NewTranslation: 最近我看到了不少新面孔，这太棒了，因为我不停的忙着跟新朋友调情。

Text: Welcome to the Jolly Roger, newcomers! Drinking, partying, worshipping El Presidente and having a good time are mandatory on our island!
NewTranslation: 欢迎来到海盗旗酒吧，新移民们，畅饮，狂欢，崇拜总统先生，在我们的岛上，每天都必须要过的开心，这是强制性的！

Text: Whoa, it's getting a bit crowded around here! Tons of new faces on the island.
NewTranslation: 呦~~~~~最近有点挤啊，岛上来了成吨的新移民。

Text: As I speak I have some strange guy sitting right next to me. I don't know where he came from and what is he doing here, but he is looking at me right now.
NewTranslation: 在我播送这条消息的时候，有一些奇怪的家伙坐在了我的身边，我不知道他从哪来，要干嘛，但他正基情满满地注视着我。

Text: Yo, creepy dude, I'm talking to you!
NewTranslation: 嘿，这位基佬，我在跟你说话呢。

Text: * Cough * All this talk about pollution and harming the environment, has everyone gone mad?
NewTranslation: 咳咳，所有的讨论都是围绕着总统阁下所研制的新型激光防御武器-雾霾。难道大家都疯了么？

Text: I can't see any problem. * Cough * I can't see anything further away than my hands... What time of day is it, people?
NewTranslation: 我什么都看不清，(咳咳)我甚至看不到在我一个手掌距离之后的东西，这是什么情况，同志们。

Text: Yes! Our healthcare has become so bad that I now declare us finally free of the harmful influence of modern medicine!
NewTranslation: 是的，我们的医疗保障已经低到没有底线了，我宣布我们终于和无益的现代医疗没有任何关系了。

Text: No more involuntary inoculations, no more tracking chips in our dental fillings, no more physicians' oath keeping the cute doctors from dating you!
NewTranslation: 再也没有强制疫苗注射，再也没有带有跟踪芯片的假牙，再也没机会去和那些可爱的医生们约会了
谁他喵的在乎医疗保健啊？！

Text: Tropicans complain that liberty in the nation is at an all-time low! I say emancipate yourselves from mental slavery, for no one but ourselves can free our minds!
NewTranslation: 海岛居民们正在抱怨社会自由度已经降至冰点，我想告诉他们从精神枷锁中解放自己吧，只有我们自己可以解放我们自己的思想

Text: And do you know what helps me emancipate myself? A drink at the beach, of course!
NewTranslation: 你知道是什么帮助我解放了自己么？在海滩喝个烂醉？没错！唔，菊花怎么这么疼？

Text: I can see Tropico is becoming the tropical paradise it was meant to be!
NewTranslation: 我感觉我们的海岛马上就会成为热带天堂了，没错，它一定会的。

Text: More and more people are abandoning the hustle and bustle of city life to settle in shacks and live as one with nature! Right on, people!
NewTranslation: 越来越多的人放弃了城市的喧嚣和尘埃，选择重归大自然。干得漂亮。

Text: The beach is big enough for everyone, and my bar works 24/7 to satisfy all your wordly needs!
NewTranslation: 海滩对于每个人来说已经足够大了，我的酒吧全年无休，随时满足你的一切需求。

Text: I hear a lot of complaining from people about the lack of priestly attention lately.
NewTranslation: 我最近听到了很多关于牧师太少的抱怨。

Text: I've been sinning left and right, and I haven't confessed my sins to a young muscular friar in quite a while.
NewTranslation: 我一直在左右为难，因为在很长一段时间我都没有向那个小鲜肉牧师坦诚忏悔我的罪孽。

Text: I can feel my spiritual needs tearing me up from the inside! I cry for salvation, young priests!
NewTranslation: 我能感到我的精神需求在我的体内迸发，我内牛满面请求你的救赎，年轻的牧师。

Text: Presidente, I fear that the Cold war is getting too cold. How about we do something to endanger the whole planet? I mean, all the cool nations are doing it.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我担心现在冷战变得太“冷清”。怎么样，我们也来做一些危害这个星球的事情吧？您懂的，所有牛逼的国家都在这么做。

Text:
Let's first increase our military strength for no apparent reason so that both superpowers suspect each other of cooperating with us.

<_objective> Build <amount> new military buildings
<_reward> +10 Militarist relations
NewTranslation:
我们先毫无预兆的提升我们的军事实力，然后两个超级大国就会怀疑对方在同我们合作。

<_objective>建造<amount>个新军事设施
<_reward>+10同军国主义者关系

Text: Increased the tension during the Cold War
NewTranslation: 增加了冷战时期的紧张局势

Text: We have the military power. Now let's do something really stupid and see where it gets us.
NewTranslation: 我们拥有了理想的军事实力，现在我们来干点真正疯狂的事看看谁敢来戏弄我们。

Text: Starting a international incident is always fun and usually pays well. Of course we may also do something totally outrageous!
NewTranslation: 挑起国际纠纷充满了乐趣同时又能大捞一把。当然我们还能干一些十分离谱的事情。
我宣布我们有超级武器啦！
什么都不做(-10同军国主义者关系)

Text: The UN has learned of our plans and has offered us a lot of money to demilitarize our country.
NewTranslation: 联合国已经知晓了我们的计划并为我国裁军计划提供大量资金支持。

Text:
As is often the case with the UN, we can bribe them so that we don't have to do anything.

<_objective> Destroy all of your military buildings
<_reward> $<MoneyPerBuilding> for every military building destroyed.
NewTranslation:
按照国际惯例，我们明明可以贿赂他们然后什么都不会发生。

<_objective>拆除所有军事设施
<_reward>每拆除一处会得到$<MoneyPerBuilding>。

Text: No one believes our claims. How could they?!
NewTranslation: 竟然没人理会我们的请求，怎么可能这样？

Text:
We should build something that looks ominous when seen from a spy plane. I know just the thing.

<_objective> Have <amount> Waste Treatment Plants
<_reward> +10 Militarists relations
NewTranslation:
我们应该建一些侦察机看起来很危险的东西，恰好我知道合适的！

<_objective>拥有<amount>个废物处理厂
<_reward>+10同军国主义者关系

Text: Defended the claim of a super weapon
NewTranslation: 在一片声讨中捍卫“超级武器”

Text: Did something outrageous once the Cold War heated up
NewTranslation: 我们做了一个给冷战升温的疯狂决定

Text: Both superpowers are interested in our weapon. They don't care what it is, as long as the enemy recognizes it as a threat.
NewTranslation: 两个超级大国都对我们的武器表示出兴趣。只要能给对方造成威胁，他们并不在乎是什么样的武器。

Text: This is a perfect situation for us. What will we do with the "weapon"?
NewTranslation: 对我们来说这是一个千载难逢的好机会。究竟要怎么处置我们的“超级武器”？

Text: Sell it to the US (US reward)
NewTranslation: 把它卖给美国(来自美国资金)

Text: Sell it to the USSR (USSR reward)
NewTranslation: 把它卖给苏联(来自苏联资金)

Text: Keep it for yourself (+10 US and USSR relations)
NewTranslation: 留给自己(+10同美国和苏联关系)

Text: Thinks you have a super weapon
Thinks you have a super weapon
We can bribe the UN inspectors so that we don't have to destroy any military buildings.
NewTranslation: 我们可以贿赂联合国观察员，这样我们就不用拆除任何的军事设施。

Text:
Of course, we can make some token progress just for the money.

<_effect> Bribe the UN officials to end the UN intervention. You will still receive money for military buildings already destroyed
NewTranslation:
当然，为了钱我们也可以做一些象征性的工作。

<_effect>贿赂联合国观察员结束干预行动，但您仍可以从已拆除的军事设施中获取援助资金。

Text: Old boy, I just found myself in a very peculiar situation. I just met with a very embarrassed Soviet diplomat who needs our help.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，我正面临着了一个特殊事件。刚才会见过的苏联外交官有难言之隐需要我们的帮助。

Text:
It appears that the USSR needs a place to stash some parts that, I quote, "have not been anywhere near Cuba". Shall we help the poor chap out?

<_objective> Have <amount> Army Bases
<_reward> +20 USSR relations; -10 USA relations
NewTranslation:
看起来苏联需要一个地方来藏匿一些货物，据他所说“这东西从来没有去过古巴”。我们是否要帮助这个可怜的家伙？

<_objective>拥有<amount>个军事基地
<_reward>+20同苏联关系；-10同美国关系

Text: Accepted shifty cargo "definitely not from Cuba"
NewTranslation: 接受“绝对不是来自古巴”的隐秘货物

Text: Accepted shifty cargo "definitely not from Cuba"
NewTranslation: 接受“绝对不是来自古巴”的隐秘货物

Text: Apparently our Russian friends want their, um... parts back.
NewTranslation: 看起来我们的苏联老大哥想要回他们的货物。

Text:
The Soviets want to send men who will oversee the transportation. Apparently, they mustered a peculiar plan - to infiltrate them into Tropico under the excuse that they will be skiing. They need some place to rest and store their skiing equipment. Interesting people those Soviets are.

<_objective> Build <amount> new Cabins 
<_reward> +10 USSR relations
NewTranslation:
苏联人想要派人监管我们的交通运输。看起来他们实施了一个“特别计划”，让监管员扮成需要休整和存放滑雪装备的滑雪人员潜入海岛。真是一群苏联逗逼。

<_objective>建造<amount>个新小木屋
<_reward>+10同苏联关系

Text: Something most unexpected has happened, old boy! Those inconspicuous parts from the Soviets turned out to be missiles!
NewTranslation: 老伙计，最不希望的事情还是发生了！苏联给我们的那些不起眼的货物他喵的居然是导弹！

Text: We've been fooled by the Soviets and as far as I remember an ancient diplomatic tradition allows us to do with the rockets whatever we want. So it's up to you, old boy - what do we do with the rockets?
NewTranslation: 我们被老毛子坑惨了。还好根据传统的外交传统，我们可以按自己的意愿处置这些导弹。好啦，老伙计，是时候做出选择了。到底怎么处理这些导弹？

Text: Give them to the Soviets (+10 USSR relations)
NewTranslation: 还给苏联(+10同苏联的关系)

Text: Send a dynasty member to negotiate ($<MoneyReward>)
NewTranslation: 派出一位家族成员交涉($<MoneyReward>)

Text: Give them to the USA (-10 USSR relations; +20 USA relations)
NewTranslation: 送给美国佬(-10同苏联关系；+20同美国关系)

Text: Keep them for yourself (-20 USSR relations; -20 USA relations)
NewTranslation: 留着自己用(-20同苏联关系；-20同美国关系)

Text: We ought to proceed with just a wee bit of discretion, old boy.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，我们还需要再做一些小决定。

Text:
The Soviets suggest we disguise the rockets as bananas, which I think is a bloody good idea. They assure us that should we manage to get them out of the country disguised as a banana export, they would most certainly intercept and retrieve them.

<_objective> Export <amount> Bananas; the price of Bananas will be doubled for 5 years
<_reward> +10 USSR relations
NewTranslation:
苏联建议我们把导弹伪装成香蕉，这真TM是个好主意。他们向我们保证，只要我们伪装成功并把它运到岛外，他们立即便会拦截，搜查并没收这批货物。

<_objective>出口<amount>香蕉；香蕉出口价格未来5年会翻倍
<_reward>+10同苏联关系

Text: Our man in the USSR has been invited to a drinking contest with the Russians.
NewTranslation: 我们的驻苏联外交官被邀请去参加当地的拼酒大赛了！
那都不叫事，是事就一阵！
不同意参加(-10同苏联关系)

Text: Our diplomat has been invited to a drinking competition with the Soviets.
NewTranslation: 我们的外交官被邀请去参加当地的拼酒大赛！

Text:
We have to give it our best to prepare him for the inevitable hardships that he will have to endure.

<_objective> Build <amount> Rum Distillery
<_timelimit> 1 year
<_reward> Your dynasty member will level up; If you do not complete the objective in time, your dynasty member will die from drinking unprepared
NewTranslation:
我们必须为我们外交官将要面对的荆棘之路做万全的准备！

<_objective>建造<amount>间新朗姆酒厂
<_timelimit>1年
<_reward>您的家族成员将会升级；如果没有按时完成目标，那么家族成员会被毛子灌死。

Text: Those Yankees are blatantly at a loss as to how Soviet missiles work.
NewTranslation: 那些美国佬明显是对苏联导弹运作原理困惑不解。

Text:
They fail to grasp how something so primitive looking can possibly function. The Yankees are willing to pay us a pretty handsome sum should we shed some light on the matter.

<_objective> Have <amount> Colleges with the "Research Projects" upgrade
<_reward> +10 USA relations; +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
他们完全不知道这些看似原始的东西是如何运作的。美国佬愿意付出一笔巨款来聘请我们解决这个问题。

<_objective>拥有<amount>所大学完成“研究工程”升级
<_reward>+10同美国关系；+$<MoneyReward>

Text: Ballistic tests (construction cost of Space program reduced by 20%)
NewTranslation: 弹道测试(太空计划建筑费用减少20%)

Text: Payload tests (construction cost of Nuclear program reduced by 20%)
NewTranslation: 负载测试(核武器计划建筑费用减少20%)

Text: Sell them to the highest bidder (+$<MoneyReward>)
The Russians want to start formal diplomatic relations with you. However, they say something is hampering the dialog between our great nations.
NewTranslation: 苏联人想要与我们建立正式的外交关系，但是他们认为某件东西严重阻碍了两个伟大国家之间的交流。

Text:
I went on a trip to the USSR to find out what it is and now that my hangover is over I can finally tell you what it is.

<_objective> Export <amount> Rum
<_reward> +10 USSR relations
NewTranslation:
为了找到这样东西我亲自去了趟苏联，我想现在我的宿醉貌似能更好解释问题的根本。

<_objective>出口<amount>朗姆酒
<_reward>+10同苏联关系

Text: Exported enough Rum to start formal diplomatic relations
NewTranslation: 为正式建交出口充足朗姆酒

Text: The Politburo has approved our fluid diplomatic techniques and are willing to send some diplomats our way.
NewTranslation: 中央政治局高度赞扬了我们的酒文化外交，并愿意向我们派出外交官。

Text:
Now we should build an Embassy to house them. I suggest somewhere near a pub, old chap.

<_objective> Invite the USSR in an Embassy
<_reward> +10 USSR relations
NewTranslation:
现在我们需要为他们修建大使馆。老伙计，附近最好有酒吧。

<_objective>邀请苏联进驻大使馆
<_reward>+10同苏联关系

Text: Invited the USSR to your Embassy
Our relations with the great Soviet Union have just entered the eternal friendship phase. This means we are eternally friend zoned.
NewTranslation: 我们同伟大苏联的关系进入了长期联盟的新阶段，这意味着我们成为了永久的朋友。

Text:
We need to be more active if we want the USSR to love us.

<_objective> Send a delegation to the USSR from the Embassy
<_reward> +10 USSR relations
NewTranslation:
我们需要进一步的行动赢取苏联欢心。

<_objective>从使馆派代表团访问苏联
<_reward>+10同苏联关系

Text: Sent a Delegation to the USSR
The Politburo has proclaimed eternal friendship between the USSR and Tropico. The bad news is I got kissed by at least two Russians.
NewTranslation: 好消息是中央政治局赞扬了苏联与海岛的长久友谊。坏消息是我至少被两个苏联人亲了。

Text: I am going to drink myself into a stupor to forget this dreadful experience. It's up to you to tell our Soviet friends what you want from them.
NewTranslation: 为了忘记这段痛苦的记忆，我要用酒精麻痹自己。而向苏联朋友索要回报的事情就交给玉树临风的您了。

Text: Those Yankees sure know how to throw a party. Cigars, alcohol, anti-communist purges! This is the life!
NewTranslation: 那些美国佬真是懂得举办一场派对，香烟，酒精，反共大清洗！这TM才叫生活！

Text: What would we want from them?
NewTranslation: 我们应该趁机捞点什么？

Text: Why aren't we exploiting our island for as much cash as we can? We have oil we are not selling!
NewTranslation: 我们为什么不开发岛屿来赚大把大把的现金？我们有石油干嘛闲着不卖！

Text:
Drill, baby drill! Faster and harder!

<_objective> Export <amount> Oil
<_reward> +10 Industrialist relations
NewTranslation:
钻，宝贝使劲钻！要快！要准！要狠！

<_objective>出口<amount>石油
<_reward>+10同工业家关系

Text: I've negotiated a deal with the US government. They help us develop our oil industry, we give them better prices.
NewTranslation: 我已和美国政府达成协议。他们帮我们更好地发展石油产业，我们给他们更优惠的价格。

Text:
I am sure that once your slower brain sees the greatness of this deal, you will sign it. 

I am waiting...
NewTranslation:
我相信只要您在脑中仔细想想这当中的利弊关系，之后肯定会毫不犹豫的签署这项协议。
等待您的好消息…

Text: Sign the deal (1 free Oil Well and Oil Refinery but -20% oil prices for 2 years)
NewTranslation: 签署协议(1座免费油井和1间炼油厂，石油价格两年内-20%)

Text: Presidente, you shouldn't exploit our beloved island. That is a delicate business which only the caring experts of the Soviet Union can handle.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我们不应该自己开采我们敬爱的岛屿。这种细致的工作只有我们亲爱的苏联专家可以解决。

Text: I have negotiated a deal to bring in specialists from the USSR who will most gently extract the Oil without harming the delicate balance of nature.
NewTranslation: 我已经和苏联方面沟通，他们派出的科学家将会在不破坏大自然平衡的前提下温柔的提取石油。

Text: Sign the deal (10 College educated citizens arrive but -10% oil prices for 2 years)
NewTranslation: 签署协议(10位大学学历劳工，石油价格两年内-10%)

Text: The world has been hit by a huge energy crisis. The price of oil is climbing by the hour. We should exploit this situation.
NewTranslation: 世界正迎来一场能源危机，石油价格每分钟都在变化，我们要利用这个特殊时期。

Text: So less dilly-dallying and more extorting the superpowers, please.
NewTranslation: 现在可过了这村没这店的时候。快！尽情地勒索这些超级大国！

Text: Extort the USA (+30% Oil price increase  for 2 years; -10 USA relations)
NewTranslation: 勒索美国(两年内增加石油价格+30%；-10同美国关系)

Text: Extort the USSR (+30% Oil price increase for 2 years; -10 USSR relations)
NewTranslation: 勒索苏联(两年内增加石油价格+30%；-10同苏联关系)

Text: Extort both (+50% Oil prices increase for 2 years; -10 USSR relations; -10 USA relations)
NewTranslation: 两国一起勒索(两年内增加石油价格+50%；-10同美国关系；-10同苏联关系)
谁都不勒索(-10同资本家关系)

Text: Refused to extort the superpowers during the Energy Crisis
NewTranslation: 能源危机期间正常出口石油

Text: We must become independent from fossil fuels, as there are not enough for everybody. That means that they are not in accordance with Communist ideals.
NewTranslation: 我们的化石燃料必须要实现自给，所以不能满足每一个人，尽管这并不符合共产主义理想。

Text:
Also I don't like Oil - it's yucky. We must use something cleaner.

<_objective> Have at least one Power Plant with the Gas Turbines upgrade
<_reward> +10 Environmentalist relations
NewTranslation:
而且我并不喜欢石油，黑乎乎的液体，看起来太恶心了。我们需要换一些清洁能源。

<_objective>完成至少一座电厂的燃气轮机升级
<_reward>+10同环保主义者关系

Text: Switched from yucky Oil to Natural Gas
NewTranslation: 从恶心的石油到天然气

Text: We made our island a little greener. And being green is like being red - your actions may not have any immediate positive effect, but they bring the glorious future closer.
NewTranslation: 我们给海岛增添一抹绿色。就像增添污染一样，增添绿色同样不能做到立竿见影，但是会拉近我们与美好未来的距离。
现在选择一项环保奖励:

Text: Send a dynasty member to a green conference (+$$ <choice_param1>)
NewTranslation: 派家族成员参加环保会议(+$$<choice_param1>)

Text: The USA has launched a new initiative called the "Alliance for Progress". I was rooting for the "Alliance for Pony" but was overruled at the last second.
NewTranslation: 美国发起了一项叫做“进步联盟”的新举措，当时我一直怒挺“小马联盟”这个名字，结果最在后一秒被否决了。

Text:
Anyway we can participate if we get into the good books of the Yankees.

<_objective> Praise the USA in an Embassy
<_reward> +10 USA relations
NewTranslation:
总之，只要我们在美国佬的白名单内就可以参加。

<_objective>在大使馆赞美新举措
<_reward>+10同美国关系

Text: The Yankees will drown us in money, but we have to show a modicum of progress to justify the program's name. This would have been so much easier with ponies.
NewTranslation: 美国佬会给我们投钱，前提是我们要做一些对得起进步联盟名头的事情。这可比应付小马来的容易的多。

Text:
One way to do so is to improve our housing standards.

<_objective> Issue the "Urban Development" edict
<_reward> $<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
一种方法是提高我们的住房水平。

<_objective>颁布“城市发展”法令
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: Presidente, your actions are as shady as the shadow of a hundred-foot oak of misdeeds that will be chopped down once Communism prevails. Still, some good may yet come of them.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，您的行为阴暗的就像一个一百尺的橡木下的树荫，如果共产主义者赢了，您的罪行将会被暴露出来，不过话说回来，没准什么好事会发生呢。

Text: Let us use the "Urban Development" you decreed to help Tropico's homeless. I suggest Tenements as they have proven to be the best type of housing.
NewTranslation: 让我们利用“城市发展”法令减少无家可归海岛居民的数量。我认为廉租房是最合适的选择。

Text: Build Tenements (+10 Communist relations; +10 USSR relations)
NewTranslation: 建造廉租房(+10同共产主义者关系；+10同苏联关系)

Text: Build Apartments (+10 Capitalist relations; +10 USA relations)
NewTranslation: 建造公寓(+10同资本家关系；+10同美国关系)

Text: I will build what I please
NewTranslation: 我想造什么就造什么，我的地盘我做主
