Text: Presidente, your actions are as shady as the shadow of a hundred-foot oak of misdeeds that will be chopped down once Communism prevails. Still, some good may yet come of them.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，您的行为阴暗的就像一个一百尺的橡木下的树荫，如果共产主义者赢了，您的罪行将会被暴露出来，不过话说回来，没准什么好事会发生呢。

Text:
You have not chosen to the greater good but to that of the few. We will remember this.

<_objective> Build 5 new Mansions
<_reward> $$<SwissReward>
NewTranslation:
您没有选择巨大的利益，但选择了少数利益，我们会铭记这一点的。

<_objective>建造5幢新豪宅
<_reward>$$<SwissReward>

Text: Presidente, your actions are as shady as the shadow of a hundred-foot oak of misdeeds that will be chopped down once Communism prevails. Still, some good may yet come of them.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，您的行为阴暗的就像一个一百尺的橡木下的树荫，如果共产主义者赢了，您的罪行将会被暴露出来，不过话说回来，没准什么好事会发生呢。

Text:
You have chosen the proper communist way. I salute you. Your actions are still shady though.

<_objective> Build 5 new Tenements
<_reward> +10 Communist relations; +10 USSR relations
NewTranslation:
您选择了正确的共产主义道路。我们向您致敬。但您的行动仍然是黑幕。

<_objective>建造5新廉租房
<_reward>+10同共产主义者关系；+10同苏联关系

Text: Presidente, your actions are as shady as the shadow of a hundred-foot oak of misdeeds that will be chopped down once Communism prevails. Still, some good may yet come of them.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，您的行为阴暗的就像一个一百尺的橡木下的树荫，如果共产主义者赢了，您的罪行将会被暴露出来，不过话说回来，没准什么好事会发生呢。

Text:
This is not the right way but I hope your actions are in the hope of providing better housing for the people.

<_objective> Build <amount> Apartments
<_reward> +10 Capitalist relations; +10 USA relations
NewTranslation:
这不是一个合适的选择，但我还是希望这能给市民带来好的住房环境。

<_objective>建造<amount>间公寓
<_reward>+10同资本家关系；+10同美国关系

Text: The Yankees will drown us in money, but we have to show a modicum of progress to justify the program's name. This would have been so much easier with ponies.
NewTranslation: 美国佬会给我们投钱，前提是我们要做一些对得起进步联盟名头的事情。这可比应付小马来的容易的多。

Text:
The best way to impress them will be through Industrialization. We don't have to actually build anything but we have to at least sign something.

<_objective> Issue the "Industrialization" edict
<_reward> $<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
给他们留下深刻印象的最好方法就是工业化。虽然不用每种工业都有但还是要有一些必要的。

<_objective>颁布“工业化”法令
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: Excellent choice, Mr. President. Taking money from gullible superpowers is where our priorities should lie. Now let's use it to make something productive.
NewTranslation: 做得好，总统阁下。从超级大国骗钱才是我们的重点，现在让我们做出些“成绩”。

Text:
Let's revolutionize the industry. We have the money.

<_objective> Build <amount> Industry buildings.
<_reward> +20 Capitalist relations; +20 Industrialist relations
NewTranslation:
让我们来次工业革命！这点钱我们还是付的起。

<_objective>建造<amount>栋工业建筑
<_reward>+20同资本家关系；+20同工业家关系

Text:
Anyway, let's not jump the gun here. For now spies from both the States and USSR want to meet in Tropico. Let's humor them and see what happens.

<_objective> Have <amount> <LocalBuildingName>
<_reward> $<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
无论如何都不要提及战争。现在美国和苏联的间谍同时出现在海岛上。让我们逗逗他们看看会发生些什么。

<_objective>拥有<amount>栋<LocalBuildingName>
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: A good thing I didn't place a bet on this. These chaps actually look serious about this whole detente thing.
NewTranslation: 还好我没有下赌注赌他们不会和解。这些家伙居然一脸正经的在讨论缓和双边关系的问题！

Text:
Higher officials intend to meet at Tropico now. We should at least make they have a place to land at as those hotshots always travel by air.

<_objective> Have <amount> Airport
<_reward> $<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
更高级的官员准备在海岛会面。我们应该提供他们降落的地方，因为高官从来都只坐飞机。

<_objective>拥有<amount>个机场
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: I don't know if the Yankees and the Soviets ever will finally bury the hatchet, but this was a valiant effort nonetheless.
NewTranslation: 我不知道美国佬和毛子是否能够不计前嫌，一笔勾销。但不得不承认这是一次勇敢的尝试。

Text:
Let's see it trough and set the stage for an international meeting on a greater scale.

<_objective> Issue the "International Summit" edict
<_reward> $<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
让我们举办一次盛大的国际会议，来测试一下他们的底线。

<_objective>颁布“国际峰会”法令
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: In the spirit of this whole affair, it seems only reasonable we show a token of good faith as well.
NewTranslation: 对于这整件事情看来我们也需要拿出一点诚意。

Text:
The way I see it, if we destroy a military building or two, we'll get both parties off our backs for a while so we can figure out how to profit best from these occurrences.

<_objective> Destroy one of your military buildings
<_reward> $<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
在我看来，如果我们拆除一两座军事建筑，尽管我们会失去双方的暗中支持，但同时我们可以有足够时间实现利益的最大化。

<_objective>拆除一处军事设施
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: Bloody good job on this whole peace affair. Really brought tears to my eyes. Now... let's see how we can turn a profit on it.
NewTranslation: 在和平时期这是一份充满血泪但还不错的工作，这真的让我感激的流泪。现在……来看看我们如何通过它来谋利吧。

Text: Peace is a splendid thing, but at the end of the day we have our own concerns and ambitions. In who's favor do we officially stand?
NewTranslation: 和平诚可贵，但在战争结束的时候，我们仍有自己的担忧和雄心。我们究竟该站在哪一边呢？

Text:
Let's take advantage of our close vicinity to spread influence on the newcomer by sending them some help so they can start better off. The Yankees are bound to like this as well as they consider the new nation to be part of their circle of influence. 

<_objective> Export <amount> <_ResourceName>
<_reward> +10 US relations
NewTranslation:
我们可以给新来者提供一些帮助，让他们改善境况，利用地缘就近的条件来扩大我们的影响。美国佬一定喜欢的，因为他们认为这个新国家是他们的小马仔。

<_objective>出口<amount><_ResourceName>
<_reward>+10与美国关系

Text: It was only a matter of time before the Soviets also wanted in on this.
NewTranslation: 苏联的介入只是个时间问题。

Text: You have to decide which super power you support to exercise its control over the new nation. Not a nice choice, I'll give you that.
NewTranslation: 我必须得跟您说，虽然极不情愿，但您不得不做出决定-支持新国家投靠哪个超级大国。

Text: Support the USA (+20 USA relations; -10 USSR relations)
NewTranslation: 支持美国(+20与美国关系；-10与苏联关系)

Text: Support the USSR (+20 USSR relations; - 10 USA relations)
NewTranslation: 支持苏联(+20与苏联关系；-10与美国关系)

Text: I hear things are not going so well for the new kid on the Caribbean block.
NewTranslation: 我听说，处在经济封锁之下，这个新加勒比国家的情况越来越糟。

Text:
They seem to have a hard time securing enough food to feed themselves. I say we use this opportunity and send them the help they need to get back on their feet and at the same time guarantee a healthy trading relationship between our two nations.

<_objective> Export <amount> Agriculture (Food) resources
<_reward> Prices of Agriculture (Food) resources increased by 20% for 5 years
NewTranslation:
他们似乎已经很难获得足够的食物来养活自己。我们应该利用这个机会给予他们帮助，让他们回到正轨上来，这会使我们两国之间保持稳健的贸易关系。

<_objective>出口<amount>农业(食物)资源
<_reward>农业(食物)资源，价格5年内增长20%

Text: Things look steady now on the food front for our new neighbor. However...
NewTranslation: 现在看来我们的新邻居在食物方面已经稳定了。但是……

Text:
They sure could use some help in laying down the foundations for a strong industry, a crucial feat for surviving in this day and age. I propose we be the first to help them with this matter, so we guarantee our good relations and future trade.

<_objective> Export <amount> Industry goods
<_reward> Prices of Industry goods increased by 10% for 5 years
NewTranslation:
他们肯定会将一些援助用在奠定强大的工业基础上，当今，发展工业对于一个国家来说是生死攸关的壮举。我建议我们做第一个帮助他们解决这件事的人，以保证我们和他们之间良好的关系和未来的贸易。

<_objective>出口<amount>工业品
<_reward>5年内工业品价格增长10%

Text: Apparently our new neighbors welcome the friendship we offered them and wish to further cement our good relations.
NewTranslation: 显然我们的新邻居对我们表现的友谊非常高兴，并希望进一步巩固彼此间的良好关系。

Text: They ask we send an ambassador over so we solidify where we stand. So? Where do we stand old boy?
NewTranslation: 他们邀请我们派谴大使以巩固我们的关系。我们该怎么做，老大哥？

Text: Those cheeky buggers have the audacity to kidnap our ambassador and now demand that we pay ransom鈥?The dirty rotters! And after all we've done for them!
NewTranslation: 那些厚颜无耻的家伙竟敢绑架我们的大使，并且要求我们献上赎金？肮脏的流氓！忘恩负义的家伙！

Text: It's true what they say, everyone sometimes bites the hand that feeds. That doesn't mean we should just stay idle and watch those cocky berks have their way. Although, hypothetically we could... What's your decision on the matter?
NewTranslation: 有传言道，人没节操时是会恩将仇报的。但这并不意味着我们只能假装四处看风景并放任纵容那帮二货，当然，我们也能选择认怂……所以，您决定怎么办？

Text: Do nothing (you will LOSE the dynasty member)
NewTranslation: 袖手旁观(您将失去家族成员)

Text: Yes, yes, no need to go to war, it won't serve the greater purpose.
NewTranslation: 是的，是的，没有必要去战争，它不会有啥好效果。

Text:
I do admit I kind of hoped we would kick those buggers on their behinds for their behavior. You shame me with your contained approach on the matter.

<_objective> Pay $<MoneyToPay> as ransom
<_reward> Your dynasty member will return
NewTranslation:
我承认，我真希望我们能爆这群绑匪的菊花，让他们知道谁才是S。这件事真使我蒙羞。

<_objective>献上$<MoneyToPay>作为赎金
<_reward>您的家庭成员将安全归来

Text: Never Bite The Hand That Feeds!
Sir, you have the army's full support in this matter.
NewTranslation: 先生，在这件事上您得到了军方的全力支持。

Text:
Let's go over there now and make them regret insulting El Presidente and his family like this!

<_objective> Have at least <amount> soldiers (units working in Military buildings)
<_reward> You will be able to send an expedition to retrieve your dynasty member
NewTranslation:
让我们杀过去吧，他们会为羞辱总统您和您的家族成员而后悔的！

<_objective>至少拥有<amount>士兵(在军事建筑工作的人)
<_reward>您将送一队远征军去夺回您的家族成员。
太君，别开枪，是我！我有大大的好消息啊。

Text:
When our troops debarked on the island nation, after brief fighting they found our brave ambassador safe and in good help. I knew no one can hold someone of your dynasty a captive sir!

<_effect> Your dynasty member has leveled up; Your soldiers return
NewTranslation:
我们的军队在那个破岛登陆后，仅经过几秒的战斗，就安全地营救出了我们勇敢的大使。我就知道没有人能轻易俘虏您的家族成员！

<_effect>您的家族成员升级，您的士兵们凯旋

Text: Sir, I have rather interesting news...
NewTranslation: 先生，我有非常有趣的新闻……

Text:
It seems that our brave ambassador took advantage of the chaos us invading the island nation caused, and both organized and executed a successful coup d'etat. He is now in firm control over the Nation.

<_effect> Your former ambassador is no longer part of your dynasty; your soldiers return home
NewTranslation:
看来，我们勇敢的大使利用我们入侵岛国造成的混乱，发动了一场成功的政变。他现在牢牢的控制着这个国家。

<_effect>您的前任大使不再是您的家庭成员；您的士兵无奈返乡

Text: Presidente, I have heard some troubling rumors about pesky rebels handing out leaflets around the island.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我听到一些令人不安的传闻-叛军在岛上散发传单。

Text:
All Tropicans love you, Presidente, and they will never commit such a crime like betraying you without someone from abroad steering the cauldron. You can't tolerate the spread of leaflets! The rebels that committed these crimes must be shot on sight!

<_objective> Build <amount> Guard Towers
<_reward> +10 Militarists relations
NewTranslation:
所有的岛民都敬爱您，总统，他们永远不会犯下里通外国背叛您的罪行。您不应该容忍传单的传播！那些犯下罪行的叛军必须被枪毙！

<_objective>建造<amount>炮楼
<_reward>+10与军国主义者的关系

Text: Made preparations for the Rebel threat from abroad
NewTranslation: 准备面对来自境外叛军的威胁

Text: Presidente, the rebels now have nowhere to hide! I'm watching out for rebels even as I sleep, by keeping both eyes open!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，叛军现在已经无处躲藏！我一直在监视他们，就是睡觉也会睁开双眼保持警觉的！

Text: How do you plan on dealing with them?
Those pesky rebels are nothing but cowards!
NewTranslation: 那些讨厌的叛军不过是一群怂货！

Text:
They have dug up in the forests and hills and refuse to come out to die with dignity. Presidente, we can't win this fight if we don't have a fight to win!

<_objective> Issue the "Provoke the Rebels" Edict
<_reward> + 10 Militarists relations
NewTranslation:
他们阴在森林和山地挖战壕，拒绝荣誉地战死沙场。总统先生，如果我们连跟他们交战的机会都没有又怎么能取得胜利呢！

<_objective>颁布“引蛇出洞”法令
<_reward>+10与军国主义者关系

Text: Being a rebel is extremely expensive these days. At least, that is what the reports from our infiltrator indicate.
NewTranslation: 这年头做职业叛军这一行花费也是挺高的。至少我们的线人是这样报告的。

Text:
The rebels seem to be funding their activities  by selling resources on the black market. We can bankrupt them by exporting more at lower prices! Maybe this will show them that crime does not pay.

<_objective> Export <amount> <_RebelsResourceName> at 10% lower prices
<_reward> +10 Capitalist relations
NewTranslation:
叛军似乎是通过在黑市上出售资源来为他们的活动提供资金。我们可以用较低的价格出口更多的产品来让他们破产！也许这会让他们认识到犯罪是不值得的。

<_objective>出口<amount><_RebelsResourceName>减少10%价格
<_reward>+10与资本主义者关系
摧毁了叛军的经济基础

Text: Our agents say the rebels have a broad network of informants and agents of their own spread throughout the country.
NewTranslation: 我们的线人说叛军拥有广泛的间谍网络，他们的间谍网已经遍布全国。

Text:
If you want to beat them at their own game we have buff up our own intelligence gathering operations, and most probably create an entire new separate organization specifically for the task.
Let's show the rebel scum we can fight them at their own game as easily!

<_objective> Issue the "Secret Police" edict
<_reward> +$$<SwissReward>
NewTranslation:
如果您想用他们的游戏规则来击败他们，我们必须提高自己的情报收集水平，最有用的方式是建立一个新的独立组织专攻此项任务。
让这些叛军人渣看看，我们可以轻松的用他们的游戏规则来打败他们！

<_objective>颁布“便衣警察”法令
<_reward>+$$<SwissReward>

Text: The operation was a huge success. Oh, now it's time for my favorite part!
NewTranslation: 任务获得巨大成功。呀吼，现在是狂欢时间！

Text:
Nothing makes the Tropicans more optimistic and assured of your leadership like some witch hunt! I envy you, Presidente - how I wish I can sign the orders to execute and banish those rebel leaders! That, and the fact that you can write.

<_objective> Execute or Banish all rebel leaders on the island.
<_reward> +10 Militarist rewards; rebel threat will return to its normal levels
NewTranslation:
没有其他措施能像政治迫害一样，可以让岛民保持乐观并巩保您的统治了。我好羡慕您，总统先生，我多么希望我也可以签署命令去处死和流放那些叛军领袖！事实上，只有您才可以签署。

<_objective>处决或流放岛上的叛军领袖。
<_reward>+10军国主义者回报；叛军威胁恢复到正常水平

Text:
However, we seem to be somewhat ill equipped to have a healthy participation in the COMECON, so we need to improve our infrastructure a bit. Let's start by building some more docks.

<_objective> Have <amount> Docks
<_reward> +10 Communists relations; USSR trade routes
NewTranslation:
然而，我们对于顺利地参与经济互助委员会有些力不从心，因此我们需要改善我们的基础设施。让我们开始建造更多的码头吧。

<_objective>拥有<amount>码头
<_reward>+10与共产主义者关系；苏联贸易路线

Text: Initiated trade relations with the COMECON
NewTranslation: 与经济互助委员会建立贸易关系

Text: Comrade Presidente! Your decision to join the struggle alongside our Soviet brothers fills my heart with joy!
NewTranslation: 总统同志！您做出的与苏联大哥并肩作战的决定让我心中甚是欢喜！

Text:
We can't achieve true brotherhood and equality if we keep our current export profile. The Eastern Bloc would forever be grateful if it can share in our gain today, so it can share its gain tomorrow.

<_objective> Export <amount> <_COMECONResourceName> at 90% reduced price
<_reward> USSR import trade routes
NewTranslation:
如果我们保持目前的出口情形就不能实现真正的兄弟关系和平等。如果能将我们的收益与东欧集团分享，他们将会永存感激，而且以后我们也可以分享他们的收益。

<_objective>降低90%的价格出口<_COMECONResourceName><amount>
<_reward>苏联进口贸易路线
经济互助委员会的要求

Text:
Our brothers and sisters from the COMECON will hold a summit here - in our own motherland! Let's not let them down and make sure we give them at least a roof above their heads.

<_objective> Build <amount> Hotels
<_reward> +10 Communist relations
NewTranslation:
从经济互助委员会来的兄弟姐妹将举行首脑会议，地点就在这里-在我们自己的地盘！不要让他们失望，至少别让他们睡在屋外！

<_objective>建造<amount>旅馆
<_reward>+10与共产主义者关系
像哥萨克骑兵一样的党

Text: Comrade! I am as impatient as a devushka waiting for her Ivan to come back from Germany!
NewTranslation: 同志！我已经等不及了，就像那个俄国女孩盼着她亲爱的伊凡从德国战场上归来一样心情急切！

Text:
The people of the Eastern Bloc are friendly people, warm people. They love to sing and dance, especially when they travel. Let's make sure they leave Tropico with special memories, that will forever l linger in their hearts!

<_objective> Build <amount> Entertainment buildings
<_reward> +10 Communist relations
NewTranslation:
东欧集团的人民是友好的，热情的。他们喜欢唱歌和跳舞，尤其是当他们旅行时。让我们确保他们是带着特殊的记忆离开海岛的，这份记忆将永远萦绕在他们心头！

<_objective>建造<amount>娱乐场所
<_reward>+10与共产主义者关系
主持一场经济互助委员会首脑会议

Text: The US want to stash some of their missiles here in Tropico.
NewTranslation: 美国想在海岛藏匿一些导弹

Text:
In order to avoid suspicion, they suggest we hide the rockets in Waste Treatment Plants. Not the brightest plan I've heard but you can only expect so much from those Yankees.

<_objective> Have <amount> Waste Treatment Plants
<_reward> +10 USA relations
NewTranslation:
为了避免怀疑，他们建议我们把火箭藏在废物处理厂。这不是我听过的最聪明的计划，但您别指望美国佬的脑容量有多大。

<_objective>拥有<amount>废物处理厂
<_reward>+10与美国关系

Text: Between The Hammer And The Sickle
Oh bollocks! The Soviets found out about the rockets.
NewTranslation: 哦，扯淡啊！苏联人发现了火箭。

Text:
I don't know how, their agents seem to be everywhere. They demand we dismantle all the installations. This move will surely piss off the Yankees.

<_effect> The USA will no longer contact you about the rockets if you complete this task
<_objective> Demolish all Waste Treatment Plants
<_timelimit> 1 year
<_reward> $<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
他们的间谍貌似无处不在，我不知道他们是怎么办到的。他们要求我们拆除所有的设施。但这一举动肯定会激怒美国佬。

<_effect>如果您完成这个任务，美国将不再因火箭的事联系您
<_objective>拆除所有的废物处理厂
<_timelimit>1年
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text:
The Yankee engineers had some shortcomings when designing the rockets we're hiding and their warheads are quite unstable. By accident or Tropican ingenuity we found out that coating the rockets with manure will stabilize and slow the reaction. Don't ask.

<_objective> Build a <text_param> near every Waste Treatment Plant to prevent them from blowing up
<_reward> No buildings will blow up; +20 USA relations; +$<MoneyReward>
<_timelimit> 2 years
NewTranslation:
美国佬藏匿在海岛的导弹在设计上似乎存在一些缺陷，弹头很不稳定。意外中，或者说是因为聪明，岛民们发现将火箭涂上粪便会使它稳定并且减慢反应。就这样了，别问为什么了。

<_objective>在每个废物处理厂附近建造一个<text_param>，来阻止火箭爆炸
<_reward>不建造就会爆炸；+20与美国关系；+$<MoneyReward>
<_timelimit>2年

Text: I might have been just a touch off in my careful calculated predictions.
NewTranslation: 在我仔细精确的预算中，我可能刚添了一笔。

Text:
It seems that the tourists lately got bored of luxury destinations and prefer to come to Tropico! It's vital that we have hotels where we can host all those lost souls and drain them of their savings.

<_objective> Build <amount> new <LocalBuildingName>
<_reward> +10 Capitalists relations
NewTranslation:
看来游客最近厌倦了去奢侈景点旅游，喜欢来海岛！这是至关重要的，我们的酒店可以收留这些丢了魂儿的游客，然后掏光他们的积蓄。

<_objective>建造<amount>新<LocalBuildingName>
<_reward>+10与资本主义关系

Text: Exploited lucrative opportunities by building Hotels
NewTranslation: 建造旅馆来抓住赚钱的机会

Text: It seems our beautiful beaches will only go so far towards keeping tourists interested in Tropico.
NewTranslation: 看起来美丽的海滩在吸引游客方面只能达到这种水平了。

Text:
We have to spice the scene up a bit, and fast. Invest as much as you can to make the place more appealing to tourists who have other activities in-mind than getting sun burned. 

<_objective> Have <amount> Entertainment buildings
<_reward> +10 Capitalist relations
NewTranslation:
我们不得不尽快为景区增加些乐趣，尽可能多的投资，让这里更吸引那些激情如火的游客。

<_objective>拥有<amount>娱乐设施
<_reward>+10与资本主义者关系
您有没有看过统计数据！

Text:
It seems we are being pinned as a cheap tourist destination which targets the lower traveling class. I suggest we show Tropico has things to offer for both rich and poorer tourists. Of course, now it doesn't...do you see where I'm going with this or do I need to explain?

<_objective> Have <amount> Luxury Entertainment buildings
<_reward> +10 Capitalist relations
NewTranslation:
我们似乎成为了面向低收入游客的廉价旅游目的地。我建议让海岛来展示一下，让他们看看这里的设施既能满足土豪，也能满足屌丝。当然，那不会……您明白我的意思吗，还是需要我解释？

<_objective>拥有<amount>豪华娱乐设施
<_reward>+10与资本主义者关系

Text: Built Entertainment buildings for the Capitalists
NewTranslation: 为富裕游客建造豪华娱乐设施

Text: My calculations show that there's more to be milked from this tourist invasion.
NewTranslation: 我的计算结果表明，能在这些涌入的游客身上挤出更多的“奶”。

Text:
The marine routes to our most popular visiting destinations are over-bloated. Build an airport and you would get better paying tourists from the further away. Chop chop.

<_objective> Have <amount> Airport
<_reward> +10 Capitalist relations
NewTranslation:
来海岛参观的海运航线有些过度拥挤了。建造一座机场，您会从更远的游客身上赚到钱。哈，这些待宰的羔羊，我砍！

<_objective>拥有<amount>机场
<_reward>+10与资本主义者关系

Text: Isn't it wonderful that the two political blocs are trying to nuke each other out of existence? We can make a good profit on that!
NewTranslation: 是不是很美妙？两大政治集团都试图核平对方！我们可以坐收渔利了！

Text:
The demand for uranium is so high right now that it will be a crime not to exploit the situation. Empty the earth, fill our pockets. Money makes a better weapon than nuclear weapons!

<_effect> You will receive "The Peaceful Atom" technology if you accept this task
<_objective> Export <amount> Uranium
<_reward> +10 Capitalist relations
NewTranslation:
现在对铀的需求是如此之高，再不开发简直就是犯罪。挖空地球，填满我们的口袋。钱是比核武器更好的武器！

<_effect>如果您接受这个任务，将获得“和平利用原子能”技术
<_objective>出口<amount>铀矿
<_reward>+10与资本主义者关系

Text: Presidente! The UN had grown even more annoying with their "negligent uranium exports" nonsense!
NewTranslation: 总统先生！由于放出“无序杂乱的铀出口”等鬼话，联合国变得越来越令人讨厌了！

Text: On the other hand the UN always snivel about lots of things we do or don't, all the time. Let's forget about them and continue to export uranium concealed as canned goods! What do you say, Presidente?
NewTranslation: 另一方面，联合国总是哭诉我们做过或没做过的事，一直如此。让我们忘了他们吧，把铀伪装成罐头继续出口！您意下如何，总统先生？

Text: Event - Exported Uranium as Canned Goods
NewTranslation: 事件-伪装成罐头出口铀矿

Text: Are you daft?! Did you really think this whole uranium-in-a-can thing would work?!
NewTranslation: 您蠢吗？！您真的以为把铀矿装在罐头里的计划能瞒天过海？！

Text:
The UN has made a major purchase from our precious canned "food" in attempt to battle famine in some god-blasted country. I'm sure  the "help" will have a mixed reception upon arrival. We have very limited options to fix this mess.

What shall we do?
NewTranslation:
联合国购买了我们大量的特殊罐头“食物”，准备到一些被上帝所谴责的饥荒国家搞赈灾。我确信这些“援助”在到达后一定会受到复杂的回应。看来除了收拾这个烂摊子外我们没多少选择的余地了。

我们该怎么办？

Text: Change the Canned Goods with legitimate aid
NewTranslation: 用合法援助来替代罐头食品
花些钱来掩盖这件事情

Text: Do nothing (-30 to US and USSR relations)
NewTranslation: 什么都不做(-30与美国和苏联的关系)

Text: Alright, old chap, not all is lost. It's a long shot, but maybe we can still pull this one off.
NewTranslation: 好吧，老兄，我们还有戏。虽然这是一次风险巨大的赌博，但没准我们能搞定这件事。

Text:
We have to push the pedal to the metal and produce enough legitimate aid, which then has to make it's way to the shores of the down-on-it's-luck nation before the canned uranium shipment males it there. Then we can deal with the cans.

<_objective> Export <amount> <ResourceToExportName>
<_reward> +10 Religious relations
NewTranslation:
对于那个被天上掉下来的馅饼砸到的国家，我们只能竭尽全力，在装满铀矿的罐头抵达之前给他们提供足够的援助，这样我们就能有时间去处理那些铀“罐头”了。

<_objective>出口<amount><ResourceToExportName>
<_reward>+10与宗教人士关系

Text: Event - Exported aid to a country in need
NewTranslation: 事件-将援助出口到需要帮助的国家

Text: I'm not even going to scold you. This is just...just...ugh....
NewTranslation: 我不想骂您。这……只是……啊啊……

Text:
Let's just make the money, pay to clear this mess and never talk about it, ever again.

<_objective> Pay up $<PenaltyMoney> to cover the UN incident
<_reward> The incident is successfully covered up
NewTranslation:
花些钱去清理这个烂摊子，以后再也不要谈论它，再也不要！

<_objective>付款$<PenaltyMoney>来掩盖联合国事件
<_reward>事情成功被掩盖
利用资本主义者来投资

Text: It seems I keep underestimating your capabilities.
NewTranslation: 看来我低估了您的能力

Text: Your efforts are noteworthy and you might just as well have earned yourself a reward. Please, pick one.
NewTranslation: 您的成果还是很显著的，您不妨奖励自己一下。那么，请选一个吧。
岛上出现更多的资本主义者
岛上出现更多的资本主义者
岛上出现更多的资本主义者

Text: Presidente, your actions were so rash and dastardly that the Militarists are proud to call you their leader!
NewTranslation: 总统，由于您的行为非常鲁莽和卑鄙，军国主义者自豪地称您为他们的领袖！

Text: You know how things go in Tropico - they want you to keep on that course of actions, so they offer you an appeasement gift.
NewTranslation: 您知道岛上发生了什么事-他们给您送了一件礼物作为安慰，希望您继续干下去。
岛上出现更多的军国主义者
岛上出现更多军国主义者
岛上出现更多军国主义者

Text: I try to avoid preaching too much, old top! But I can say for certain that you've made the Lord very proud today.
NewTranslation: 虽然多说无益，老兄！但我还是要肯定的说，您今天的确荣耀我主了！

Text: Consider yourself closer to salvation, and in the meantime choose a more earthly reward.
NewTranslation: 把自己想成救世主，同时选择一个更加世俗的奖励。
岛上出现更多的宗教人士
岛上出现更多的宗教人士
岛上出现更多的宗教人士

Text: I knew you were a communist hiding behind a non-communist facade! A true Comrade!
NewTranslation: 我知道您是一个披着非共产主义外衣的共产主义者！一个真正的同志！

Text: Let us seal this friendship with a reward of your choosing.
NewTranslation: 请选择一种奖励来巩固这份友谊
岛上出现更多的共产主义者
岛上出现更多的共产主义者
岛上出现更多的共产主义者

Text: Although by saving nature, you ultimately save yourself, you still deserve a reward.
NewTranslation: 拯救了自然，最终也拯救了自己，您应该得到奖励。
岛上出现更多的环保主义者
岛上出现更多的环保主义者
岛上出现更多的环保主义者

Text: Making Tropico the industrial powerhouse of the Caribbean is a long hard process.
NewTranslation: 让海岛成为加勒比地区的工业强国是一个长期而艰难的过程。

Text: The Industrialists think that you might need a bit of help to battle those pesky tree-hugging cry-babies that snivel about the useless nature and so on. How they're going to help is up to you:
NewTranslation: 工业主义者认为您可能需要一些帮助，去对抗那些令人讨厌的抱着树木哭鼻子说这说那的脑残。他们将如何帮您:
岛上出现更多的工业主义者
岛上出现更多的工业主义者
岛上出现更多的工业主义者

Text: His most gracious Majesty has dispatched your replacement, but he somehow managed to get himself kidnapped by vicious pirates along the way. I had nothing to do with it. Nothing they can prove, at least.
NewTranslation: 仁慈的陛下已经派人来接替您了，但来的人在路上莫名其妙的设法让邪恶的海盗绑架了自己。我可没有做什么，至少他们没有证据。

Text:
You get to stay on for another year but blind luck won't save you next time. Work hard and your mandate will be extended again. Fail and you won't remain Governor of this island for long.

<_effect> Your Mandate was extended by 12 months.
NewTranslation:
您可以在岛上再多待一年，但是下一次就没有这么好的运气了。努力工作，您的任务期限将再次延长。不合格的话您这个总督就干不了多久了。

<_effect>您的任务期限延长12个月。

Text: His Majesty's jubilee is approaching. Present him with an expensive gift and he may extend your mandate.
NewTranslation: 国王陛下登基庆典马上到来了。送给他昂贵的礼物，他也许会延长您的任务期限。

Text:
I suggest a golden tea set or a herd of dancing llamas or a flock of toucans. Everyone likes toucans. I believe that $10,000 will be enough for an appropriate gift.

<_effect> Mandate will be extended by 6 months.
NewTranslation:
我建议送一套黄金茶具，或者一群会跳舞的骆驼，或者是一群巨嘴鸟。每个人都喜欢巨嘴鸟哦。我相信$10000足够买一件合适的礼物。

<_effect>任务期限延长6个月

Text: Congratulations, the Royalists are singing your praises. Word of this has even reach the mainland.
NewTranslation: 恭喜，保皇党人赞美您。这个消息已经传到了大陆。

Text:
His Majesty has learned of your loyalty and is impressed.

<_effect> Mandate increased by 12 months
NewTranslation:
您的忠诚给国王陛下留下了深刻印象。

<_effect>任务期限增加12个月

Text: The Crown imposes an embargo on <_PrimaryResourceName> for 2 years
The Crown imposes an embargo on <_PrimaryResourceName2> for 2 years
The Crown reduces your Mandate by 5 months
NewTranslation: 国王给您减少了5个月的任期

Text: The Crown takes $5 000 from your treasury
NewTranslation: 国王在您的国库里拿走$5000

Text: The Crown takes $10 000 from your treasury
NewTranslation: 国王在您的国库里拿走$10000

Text: Building costs increased by 20% for 2 years
The price of <_PrimaryResourceName> decreased by 20% for 2 years
The price of <_PrimaryResourceName2> decreased by 20% for 2 years
The price of all resources decreased by 10%  for 2 years
NewTranslation: 所有资源的价格在2年内降低10%

Text: The King is very angry with you right now, old chap. It will be no easy matter to placate him. Unless, of course, money is involved.
NewTranslation: 国王现在对您很生气，老兄，让他消消火不是件容易的事。除非……当然，钱能起作用。

Text: I suggest you pay or the King may try to replace you.
NewTranslation: 我建议您给国王送些钱，否则他可能炒您鱿鱼的！
付钱给皇室(-$5000，+20与皇室关系)
别逗了！谁也拿不走我的钱！！(任期缩短)

Text: Our wise King, long live his name, has decreed that you are to be the subject of a royal intervention.
NewTranslation: 国王万岁！我们伟大的国王已经命令您必须服从皇家的介入。

Text:
A small contingent of the Royal forces is on its way to attack you for your sins.

<_effect> A royal force will attack you in 3 months
NewTranslation:
因为您的罪行，一小队皇家士兵正在来收拾您的路上。

<_effect>一支皇家部队将在3个月内攻击您

Text: Disaster! The revolutionaries are demanding that you insult the king.
NewTranslation: 悲剧了！革命派要求您侮辱我们的国王。

Text: This is very risky business. You must be very careful for the King is vengeful.
NewTranslation: 这是桩有风险的买卖。您必须得谨慎点，因为国王是个有仇必报的人。

Text: It has been decided that an insulting letter is the best way to get our point across.
NewTranslation: 一封侮辱信才最能把我们的观点传达过去。恩！就这么定了！

Text: It is up to you how to phrase the actual insult.
The King says he wants your "expletive" hung in the palace courtroom as a conversation piece.
NewTranslation: 国王说他想把您的“那个”挂在宫殿的会议室里好作为大家可以谈论的话题。

Text: I managed to assuage this..."unfortunate incident" but you better watch what you are doing from now on. And there will be punishment of course.
NewTranslation: 我建议缓和这个……“不幸的事故”。但您最好知道您在做什么，因为毋庸置疑，一定会有惩罚的。

Text: The King wants me to tell you that he is obliged to punish you for your words, even if they are true.
NewTranslation: 国王让我告诉您他不得不因为您说的话而惩罚您，即使您说的都是事实。

Text: This time I didn't even have to try to minimize your punishment.
NewTranslation: 这次我甚至都不需要尽量去为您争取减轻惩罚。

Text: The King congratulates your attempts at romantic poetry. He says your piece is one of the better he has read in the last few years.
NewTranslation: 国王恭喜您在浪漫诗歌领域的尝试。他说您的这首诗是他在这几年当中读过最好的之一。

Text: However, he insists I inform you that the feelings stated in your..."poetry" is not mutual. You managed to get out of a difficult situation. Good job!
NewTranslation: 然而，他坚持让我告知您，您在您的……“诗”里所表达的情感不是对称的。看样子您要摆脱困境了。干的好！

Text: The best way to insult the King would be to seduce his Queen. That is obvious.
NewTranslation: 侮辱国王最好的方式应该是调戏他的老婆。恩……对，就是这样！

Text: I entered you into the annual list of would-be lovers for the Queen. You have been allowed to pursue one action to impress her.
NewTranslation: 我把您弄进“最可能成为王后的情人”的年度入选名单了。您可以做点什么引起她的注意了。
派您忠实的贝奴迪莫去给她唱首小夜曲

Text: Your poem was well-written and most expressive about the passions that dwell within the human breast. The Queen did not understand a word of it. You are disqualified as her would-be seducer.
NewTranslation: 您的诗写的很好！很好的表达了对于咪咪的感情，但是王后却一个字也不理解。您成为不了她的姘头。

Text: The names of all disqualified candidates are automatically given to the King and it is his duty to punish them.
NewTranslation: 所有不适合的候选人的名单被“不小心”的拿给了国王。当然，国王有责任惩罚他们。

Text: Unfortunately, your gift did not make it to the Queen. It was lost in the humongous pile of gifts from her other suitors. This means you are disqualified as her would-be seducer.
NewTranslation: 很不幸，您的礼物没有拿到王后的手上。它被埋在了别的追求者送的礼物堆里了。这意味着您成为不了王后的姘头了。

Text: The names of all disqualified candidates are automatically given to the King and it is his duty to punish them.
NewTranslation: 所有不适合的候选人的名单被“不小心”的拿给了国王。当然，国王有责任惩罚他们。

Text: (sings) Ooooo I am the very model of a modern Major-General!
NewTranslation: (唱)哦哦哦哦哦~~我是将军们的楷模！

Text: The Queen was very  impressed by me. However, she seems to be not that well in the head. She kept talking about no one sending her a pet monkey before. She gave me some money and sent me away.
NewTranslation: 王后对我的印象很深。然而，她似乎脑子有点问题。她一直在和我说以前从没有人送她宠物小猴子。她给了我一些钱然后就让我走了。

Text: The best insult we could come up with was to name one of the most stupid and boring animals in Tropico after the King.
NewTranslation: 最好的侮辱是我们可以把岛上最蠢的一种动物以国王的名字命名。

Text: Our revolutionaries are not the brightest candles in the night but it's still a valid insult according to the book of etiquette.
NewTranslation: 虽然我们的革命者不是黑夜中最亮的蜡烛，但根据习俗这却是最有效的一种侮辱。

Text: Name the Potoo after the King
Name the Great Egret after the King
NewTranslation: 用国王的名字命名大白鹭

Text: Name the local anteater after the King
NewTranslation: 用国王的名字命名食蚁兽

Text: The King is not pleased to hear that you are naming an animal that grotesque after him.
NewTranslation: 国王很生气您用他的名字命名那么一种荒诞的动物。

Text: I softened him up saying how high a honor that is but he still wants you punished.
NewTranslation: 虽然我千方百计的请他息怒，告诉他荣誉是多么重要，但他还是希望看到您受到惩罚。

Text: The King is most pleased that you picked an animal that does nothing but eat all day.
NewTranslation: 国王很高兴您选了一种整天不做鸟事却只会吃的动物。

Text: Good job getting out of a difficult situation.
NewTranslation: 干得好！这让您摆脱了困境。

Text: You made a terrible mistake there, old chap. Mentioning the size of the King's nose is considered a major faux pas. As is naming anything big-nosed after him.
NewTranslation: 您犯了个大错，老兄。谈论国王鼻子的大小是很大的冒犯。就像以“鼻子”命名任何东西。

Text: The king is livid. He wanted to reopen the old torture chamber in the palace especially for you. I want ten times my usual fare and trust me this is a bargain. You get off with a simple punishment.
NewTranslation: 国王大发雷霆。他认为相比宫殿，宫殿里的老酷刑室更适合您。相信我，我花费了十倍的代价才和国王做了个交易。您躲过了一次惩罚。

Text: We will send the King a gift that will insult him greatly.
NewTranslation: 我们会给国王寄出一份可以侮辱死他的礼物。

Text: I have compiled a list of possible items that will be considered rude.
NewTranslation: 我收集了一份被认为是粗鲁的东西的名单。

Text: The King is extremely grateful for the gift you send him. Collecting  Chamber Pots is a hobby of his and yours is a piece he did not have.
NewTranslation: 国王非常感谢您送他这些礼物。收集尿壶是他的兴趣，而您送给他的那一个，正好他没有。

Text: The whole courtroom was outraged. The fact that the King has no progeny is no joking manner.
NewTranslation: 整个朝堂充满了愤怒:国王没有子嗣可不是开玩笑的。

Text: The King's fury was enormous. I had to spend days trying to reduce your punishment for which I demand double the usual fare.
NewTranslation: 国王愤怒爆表了。这几天我跑断了腿，在付出双倍代价后，才为您减轻惩罚。

Text: The Queen is furious that you presented her husband better undergarments than the ones he bought her for her recent birthday.
NewTranslation: 王后很生气，您的那件内衣比国王当作生日礼物送给她的那件还要好。

Text: As a result the King was forced to punish you.
NewTranslation: 结果国王被迫惩罚您，英雄难挡枕边话。

Text: Your recent actions have caused the Revolutionaries to start a riot in the city. Hide your wife, hide your children, hide your tea!
NewTranslation: 您最近的举动导致了革命派在城里的暴动。快把您老婆孩子，还有……您的茶都藏起来吧！

Text: His Royal Majesty has instructed me to present you with this letter of commendation for your achievements in the name of the Empire.
NewTranslation: 因为您在帝国命名上的努力，国王殿下指示我赠送您这封表彰信。

Text:
His Majesty is satisfied with your progress. He has extended your mandate as a show of gratitude. 

In addition you can turn in the letter of commendation for one of these fabulous rewards!
NewTranslation:
国王殿下很高兴您的进展。作为感激他延长了您的任期。

此外您可以挑选一样在表彰信中的奖励！

Text: Additional Mandate Extension (<choice_param3> months mandate extension)

NewTranslation: 输入革命派(+<choice_param1>受过教育的市民)

Text: New trade routes with the Smugglers
The severe undergarment shortage has halted His Majesty's military campaign. How are we expected to conquer both the North and South Poles without warm undergarments for our soldiers?
NewTranslation: 内衣长度太短已经让我们的士兵不能作战了。士兵们连内衣都不保暖我们又怎么指望他们能征服南北极？

Text:
All colonial governors are hereby ordered to lend their support for His Majesty's campaign. Carry out His Majesty's wishes and you will be rewarded with an extension to your mandate as well as other benefits.

<_objective> Build one <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
所有殖民地总督被要求支持国王殿下的军事竞赛。开始为国王殿下的这个愿望效力，您的任期将被延长，还可获得别的好处。

<_objective>建造一个<text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月

Text: His Majesty's military campaign is not going well. The Scots with their fancy kilts are rampaging through both poles unopposed. We need more underwear now!
NewTranslation: 国王殿下的军事竞赛进展的并不好。苏格兰人穿着他们的短裙在南北极间乱跑简直毫无对手。我们必须要更多的内裤！

Text:
Underpants production has all but stopped because of the <text_param> shortages. His Royal Majesty demands a new shipment of <text_param> for his army.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
内裤的生产因为缺少<text_param>几乎停止了。国王殿下要求为他的军队再运一些<text_param>。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月。

Text:
You decided to send only half of what the Crown demanded. While you scored some points with the Revolutionaries, His Majesty is not happy with you and is already deliberating who will replace you as Governor of Tropico.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
NewTranslation:
您决定只交付皇室要求的一半。因为您获得革命派的支持，国王殿下对您很不爽，并且已经在考虑替换您的人选了。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>

Text:
Trying not to offend anyone, you decided to comply with His Majesty's demand and send the original amount of Wool and Cotton.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
您决定遵守国王殿下的要求，以免激怒任意一方。送出毛和棉花。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将会延长<reward>月。

Text:
His Majesty is very pleased with your commitment to send double the asked amount of Wool and Cotton. He gladly signed a <reward> month extension to your mandate and promised additional rewards if you manage to complete your task.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by an additional <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
国王殿下很高兴您答应他会送出双倍的毛和棉花。他高兴的签署了<reward>月任期延长令，并承诺如果您完成任务将会有别的奖励。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月。

Text: Amply supplied with underwear, His Majesty's army yesterday began a new offensive. However in our efforts to secure warm clothing we seem to have forgotten about ammunition. In short - we lost.
NewTranslation: 内裤的供应很充足，殿下的军队昨天开始进攻了。然而虽然我们努力保证了士兵内裤的供应可是我们忘了战争还需要弹药。总之-我们输了。

Text:
His Majesty is very unhappy about the loss of the North and South Poles. Without their strategic supply of ice the Empire will be left without any ice-cream.

From now on you will receive fewer if any options to extend your mandate.

Chose a reward as a consolation prize for finishing second in the underpants war.
NewTranslation:
国王殿下因为南北极的失利而大发雷霆。没有那些战略物资，冰的供应，我们的帝国将从此没有冰淇淋了。

从今以后您的任期延长的奖励将会比之前更少。

选一个奖励作为结束第二次内裤大战的安慰吧

Text: In an effort to improve the health of his subjects, His Majesty has issued a new decree - all citizens must eat at least one piece of fruit per day. To this end, all colonies are ordered to begin fruit production immediately.
NewTranslation: 为了子民的健康，国王颁布了新的法令-每个市民每天必须吃一个水果。为此，所有殖民地必须开始种植水果。

Text:
Carry out His Majesty's wishes and you will be rewarded with an extension to your mandate as well as other benefits.

<_objective> Build a <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
开始为国王殿下的这个愿望效力，您的任期将被延长，还可获得别的好处。

<_objective>建造一座<text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月

Text: His Royal Majesty is eager to see his fruitcare plan in action. He's expecting your fist shipment of fresh fruit.
NewTranslation: 殿下很高兴看到他的水果健康计划在火热的进行中，他期望收到来自您的第一船水果

Text:
Fruit exports from the colonies are vital to His Majesty's healthcare plan. If people are unable to get their fruit due to a shortage or some sort of logistical problem our country will be the laughingstock of the world.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
对于殿下的水果健康计划，殖民地的水果出口是至关重要的。假如人们因为短缺或后勤问题导致人们买不到水果，那我们会成为全世界的笑柄。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月

Text:
Siding with the Royalists you decided to support His Majesty's fruitcare plan and lowered the export price of fruits by 20%.

<_objective> Export <ResourcesToGet> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <FinalMandateBonus> months.
NewTranslation:
根据保皇派建议，您决定支持国王的水果健康计划并且降低20%水果的出口价格。

<_objective>出口<ResourcesToGet><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<FinalMandateBonus>月。

Text:
Leaving the Royalists and Revolutionaries to fight amongst themselves you left the export price of fruits as it was before.

<_objective> Export <ResourcesToGet> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <FinalMandateBonus> months.
NewTranslation:
让保皇派和革命派自己在一边去打架吧，您维持了水果的出口价格。

<_objective>出口<ResourcesToGet><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<FinalMandateBonus>月。

Text:
Siding with the Revolutionaries you decided to exploit the situation and increase the export price of fruits by 20%.

<_objective> Export <ResourcesToGet> <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support will be increased.
NewTranslation:
根据革命派的建议您决定利用这个大好机会上涨水果出口价格20%。

<_objective>出口<ResourcesToGet><text_param>
<_reward>增加革命派的支持。

Text: It seems that The Crown's ambitious "fruit for health" program didn't work quite as well as expected. His Majesty stated that the plan was "too ahead of its time".
NewTranslation: 看样子国王的“水果健康”计划并没有预想的那样效果好。国王解释说这是因为这项计划“太过于时髦”了。

Text:
There simply wasn't enough fruit to treat everyone. Also it seems that bananas and pineapples were a rather expensive and not that efficient way to treat illnesses. The fruitcare program has been shutdown.

From now on you will receive fewer if any options to extend your mandate.

Choose your reward.
NewTranslation:
显然水果不够供应给每一个人。而且香蕉和菠萝价格更贵但似乎对治疗疾病没什么用处。水果健康计划被迫停止了。

从现在起您收到的缩短任期奖励将会比之前缩短。

选择您的奖励吧。

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 因为外部原因法令不能终止

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 此法令由于其他外部原因无法被取消。

Text: His Majesty has come up with a most ingenious plan to defeat our enemies. We will send them food and then conquer them once they have become fat and lazy.
NewTranslation: 殿下想出了一个巧妙的计划来击败我们的敌人。我们要不断给他们运送食物，一旦他们变胖变懒我们就可以击败他们了。

Text:
Your first task is to begin food production. His Majesty thinks you should start with a <text_param>. Carry out His Majesty's wishes and you will be rewarded with an extension to your mandate as well as other benefits.

<_objective> Build one <text_param>.
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
您的第一个任务是开始食物生产。殿下认为您应该开始<text_param>。开始为国王殿下的这个愿望效力，您的任期将被延长，还可获得别的好处。

<_objective>建造一个<text_param>。
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月。

Text: Stage one of His Majesty's plan has been initiated. All colonies must start exporting food to our enemies.
NewTranslation: 国王计划的第一步已经启动。所有殖民地必须开始给我们的敌人出口食品。

Text:
It won't be long now that the shipments have begun. Once our enemies have been fattened enough we will take over the world in the name of His Majesty.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
船运马上就要开始了。一旦我们的敌人变胖我们就能以国王殿下之名拿下这个世界。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月。

Text:
His Majesty is grateful that you chose to lower the export prices of all your Food exports by 20%. Your mandate was extended by <reward> months as a reward for your loyalty.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by an additional <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
国王殿下很高兴您选择降低20%食品的出口价格。作为您忠诚的奖励您的任期将延长<reward>月。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月。

Text:
You chose not to align yourself with any of the faction and keep your export prices as they were.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
您选择不和任何帮派结盟并保持原有的出口价格。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月

Text:
Siding with the Revolutionaries you chose to increase your export prices of Food products by 20%. His Majesty won't like this.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
NewTranslation:
根据革命派的建议您选择上调20%食品出口价格。国王殿下不会喜欢的。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>

Text: His Majesty's plan didn't work quite as expected. We were unable to make our foes fat. However, they were most thankful for the food and are now our friends.
NewTranslation: 国王殿下的计划并没有预想的那样顺利。我们并不能把我们的敌人弄胖。然而，他们却很感谢我们为他们提供食物，现在，他们倒成为我们的朋友了。

Text:
His Majesty is satisfied with this outcome. After all he has become one of the most beloved people in the world.

From now on you will receive fewer if any options to extend your mandate.

His Majesty has graciously allowed you to chose a single reward for your years of service.
NewTranslation:
国王殿下对这个结果很满意。毕竟他成为了这个世界上最受喜爱的人。

从今以后您的任期延长的奖励将会比之前更少。

因为您多年效忠，亲切的国王允许您选择一个奖励。

Text: To help him find the best food in the Empire, the King has organized a royal cook-off. We must show him that Tropican cuisine is the best cuisine.
NewTranslation: 帮助他在帝国内找到最好的食材，国王已经组织了一个皇家厨艺大赛。我们必须向他证明海岛美食才是最好的美食。

Text:
Those brownnose Royalists think we should let the King's chef win, while others think we should use the cook-off to advertise our produce. However we both know that the Revolution demands we win this competition.

Who will you send to represent us in the cook-off?
NewTranslation:
那些马屁精保皇派认为，我们应该让国王的厨子赢，还有人认为我们应该利用厨艺大赛来为我们的产品做广告。然而我们都知道革命派要求我们赢下这次竞赛。

您觉得我们应该派谁代表我们参加厨艺大赛？

Text: Send a Dynasty Member (+10% Food export prices)
NewTranslation: 派一名家族成员(+10%食物出口价格)
派贝奴迪莫去(6个月任期延长)

Text: Send your personal chef (increases revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 派您自己的厨子去(增加革命支持率)

Text: His Majesty needs money to build a new underwater palace. He wants you to begin growing money... I mean one of those crops that make heaps of cash.
NewTranslation: 国王需要钱来建一座水下宫殿。他希望从您这儿种植些钱出来……我的意思是，种植些能卖好价钱的作物。

Text:
Carry out His Majesty's wishes and you will be rewarded with an extension to your mandate as well as other benefits.

<_objective> Build one <text_param>.
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months.
NewTranslation:
开始为国王殿下的这个愿望效力，您的任期将被延长，还可获得别的好处。

<_objective>建造一个<text_param>。
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月。

Text: His Majesty has commissioned the finest architects to design his new underwater home. We need your cash crops to pay for them.
NewTranslation: 国王已经找来最好的建筑师为他设计水下宫殿。我们需要您的摇钱树来为他支付。

Text:
His Majesty's plan is simple we buy your <text_param> then sell it at twice the price in the civilized world.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
国王的计划很简单，我们先买您的<text_param>然后以两倍价格卖给文明世界。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月

Text: Send the original amount (<MandateReward> months mandate extension on completion)
NewTranslation: 支付原定数量(<MandateReward>月任期延长)

Text: Send double (<MandateReward> months mandate extension now and on completion)
NewTranslation: 支付双倍数量(<MandateReward>月任期延长)

Text:
Agreeing with the Revolutionaries you chose to send only half the demanded crops to the Crown. His Majesty is angry and you won't like him when he's angry.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>.
NewTranslation:
您同意革命派的建议支付一半的数量给国王。国王很生气，后果很严重。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>。

Text:
Deciding to remain neutral you decided to deliver the original amount of produce demanded by His Majesty.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
中立，您决定支付原定数量的货物给国王。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月

Text:
You sided with the Royalists and promised to send double the asking amount of cash crops to the Crown. His Majesty is overjoyed by your show of support. Your mandate was extended by <reward> months.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
您站在保皇派这边并决定支付双倍国王要求数量。国王喜出望外，您这么支持他。您的任期将延长<reward>月。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>月

Text: The sea is too crowded. It is full of lost cities, rich American industrialists and sleeping alien gods. His Majesty has no desire to mingle with such things.
NewTranslation: 海里太拥挤了，全都是失落的城市、有钱的美国实业家和外星人。国王没心情和这些东西混在一起。

Text:
Construction on the underwater palace has been stopped. From now on you will receive fewer if any options to extend your mandate.

His Majesty will grant you one of these rewards for your service to the Crown.
NewTranslation:
水下宫殿的建设停工了。从今以后您的任期延长的奖励将会比之前更少。

作为您为皇室服务的奖励国王让您选择一个奖励。

Text: His Majesty has invited you to attend the groundbreaking ceremony of his underwater palace.
NewTranslation: 国王邀请您参加他水下宫殿的开工仪式

Text:
This is the perfect opportunity to cozy up to His Majesty and get a small extension on your mandate.

Who will you send to the groundbreaking ceremony?
NewTranslation:
这是个拉拢国王的绝好机会，同时还能稍微的延长您的任期。

您要派谁去参加开工仪式？

Text: Send a Dynasty Member (6 month mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 派一个家族成员(6个月任期延长)
什么人也不派(增加革命支持率)

Text: As you know, His Majesty is fond of setting fire to things. He has decided to build the world's largest bonfire and needs all the wood he can get.
NewTranslation: 如您所知，陛下已经决定建立世界上最大的篝火，并且他需要他所能得到的所有的木头。

Text:
All colonial governors are hereby ordered to begin logging operations for His Majesty bonfire. Carry out His Majesty's wishes and you will be rewarded with an extension to your mandate as well as other benefits.

<_objective> Build one <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
所有的殖民统治者已经开始为陛下的篝火开始伐木。开始为国王殿下的这个愿望效力，您的任期将被延长，还可获得别的好处。

<_objective>建立一个<text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text: His Majesty wants to exchange wood for sheep. Wood for sheep, anyone? Well if you don't want sheep than I guess you'll have to take money instead.
NewTranslation: 陛下想用木材换羊。有没有人想要换？哈哈，如果您不想要羊，那您一定想要钱了

Text:
His Majesty is gathering wood from all around the Empire for his bonfire. The Crown needs all of your logs.

<_objective> Export <amount> logs
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
陛下正在为了他的篝火从帝国的每个角落收集木头。皇室需要您所有的木头。

<_objective>出口<amount>木头
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text:
You chose to lower the export prices of your planks by 20%. His Majesty has extended your mandate by <reward> months as a result to this.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by an additional <reward> months
NewTranslation:
您选择降低20%出口木板的价格。所以陛下延长了您的任期<reward>个月。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text:
You chose to keep things simple and promised not to change the export price of Planks.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
您选择让事情变得简单并且承诺不改变出口木板的价格。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text:
Siding with the greedy Revolutionists you betrayed His Majesty by increasing the export price of Planks by 20%. I must warn you that His Majesty has sent people to the stake.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
NewTranslation:
您站在了贪婪的革命者那边并且背叛了陛下，您选择了增加20%出口木板的价格。我必须警告您，陛下马上会让您因为您的所作所为而受到惩罚。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>

Text: Last night His Majesty tragically died while lighting the world's biggest bonfire. The King is dead! Long live the King!
NewTranslation: 昨晚国王在点亮世界上最大的篝火时不幸的死去了。国王死了！精神永存！

Text:
There was talk of building the world's largest funeral pyre for His Late Majesty, but it was shot down by the survivors of the bonfire.

From now on you will receive fewer if any options to extend your mandate.

His Majesty's will stipulates that you can choose one of the following rewards for your years of service.
NewTranslation:
有人要为先王建立世界上最大的火葬，但是被篝火事件的幸存者否决了。
从现在起，不用再指望玉树临风英俊潇洒，比都教授还帅的国王能多给您延长任期的机会了。
陛下将保证在在您任期内，您将获得如下奖励:
任期延长(<MandateReward>个月的任期延长)

Text: His Majesty cordially invites you to the bonfire lighting ceremony. He has had a front row seat reserved for you.
NewTranslation: 陛下诚恳地邀请您参加篝火点燃仪式。他有一个前排座位预留给您。

Text: While this is a great honor, you can send someone in your stead if you are too busy. Who shall I say will attend the royal bonfire?
NewTranslation: 虽然这是一个伟大的荣誉，但是如果您是太忙了，您可以派人代替您的。我说啊，谁会参加皇家篝火？

Text: Send a Dynasty Member (6 months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 派一个家族成员去(延长任期六个月)
派贝奴迪莫去(+$1000瑞士银行)
不派人去(增加革命者的支持)

Text: Freedom will never simply be given to us, we must take it by force. We need to train our own soldiers, soldiers that are ready to fight and die for our homeland.
NewTranslation: 自由和幸福一样不会自己找上门，我们必须采取武力行动。我们需要培养自己的士兵，并愿意为我们的祖国战死。

Text:
We need to prepare ourselves for the coming conflict. You should task our scientists to begin researching the necessary technologies.

Viva la revolucion!

<_objective> Research <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我们需要为即将到来的冲突做准备。您应该让科学家尽可能的研究科技技术

革命万岁！

<_objective>研究<text_param>
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: Our land is untamed and wild, but it is our home. We must do everything in our power to defend it.
NewTranslation: 我们的土地虽然是蛮荒和荒凉的，但它是我们的家。我们必须尽我们所能来保护它。

Text:
We have to construct fortifications to protect our fledgling colony from pesky pirates and angry toucans. Someday we may even have to defend our new homeland from the Crown's soldiers.

<_objective> Build <amount> new <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我们必须构建防御工事来保护我们刚建立的殖民地，远离讨厌的海盗和愤怒的巨嘴鸟。总有一天我们甚至可能不得不与皇室士兵开展。

<_objective>建立<amount>新<text_param>
<_reward>革命派支持

Text: My good fellow, I have it from a very reliable source that - "there be gold in them there hills, boy!" I suggest you send some men to find it.
NewTranslation: 我的好伙计，我得到了非常可靠的消息，“那里是黄金的山，孩子！”我建议您派人去找到它

Text:
If you are yet to establish an army, you can send your palace guard to explore the island. You may have to fund several expeditions until you find the Gold deposit.

<_objective> Explore the island to find the Gold deposit
NewTranslation:
如果您尚未建立军队，您可以让您的宫殿守卫探索这座岛。您也许要找好几次，直到您找到金矿。

<_objective>探索岛屿，发现金矿

Text: Governor, I've made contact with a certain group of not so reputable sailors who would gladly pay extra for our goods.
NewTranslation: 长官，我联系到一群不出名的水手们愿意为我们的商品支付更高的价格。

Text:
Tropicans are tired of working hard only to sell their goods for a pittance to the Crown. We should find more lucrative trade offers. Of course it is up to you to decide with whom we do business. Nevertheless I urge you to strike a deal with the Smugglers, only they will give us a fair price.

<_objective> Initiate any export trade route
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
海岛居民已经厌倦了为皇室出售他们的商品而努力工作，换来的只是微薄的收入。我们应该找到更多的利润丰厚的贸易。当然这是由您来决定。不过我劝您与走私者达成协议，只有他们会给我们一个公平的价格。

<_objective>启动任何出口贸易路线
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: Did you know that there are treasures buried on our island? We should investigate!
NewTranslation: 您难道不知道有宝藏埋在我们的岛吗？我们应该调查！

Text:
A strange looking man came up to me yesterday and sold me this genuine treasure map. It points to hidden riches just beneath the surface of Tropico. You should task our scientists to devise a way for us to extract these treasures from the ground.

<_objective> Research the <text_param> technology
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
一个陌生的男人昨天卖给我这张真正的藏宝图。它指出海岛的表面下隐藏的财富。您应该让我们的科学家设计一种可以让我们从地面提取这些宝藏的技术。

<_objective>研发<text_param>科技
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: I found this book in your office, Governor. It's written by comrade Marx and it has some interesting ideas on how we should build our society.
NewTranslation: 我在您的办公室发现了这本书。马克思同志写的，书上面有一些有趣的想法来指引我们应该如何建设我们的社会。

Text:
Comrade Marx words about the struggle of the proletariat remind me of our struggle for freedom. We need more of these proletariat guys. You should build a new production building to grow our working class.  

<_objective> Build a new <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
马克思同志关于无产阶级的斗争的话提醒我们要争取自由。我们需要更多这样的无产阶级同志。您应该建立一个新的生产建筑来增长我们的工人阶级人数。

<_objective>建立一个新的<text_param>
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: The Revolution needs the peoples' support, and for some reason beyond me the people want religion. You should give it to them.
NewTranslation: 革命需要人民的支持，人民需要信仰的支撑。您应该给您的人民信仰。

Text:
We need the support of 51% of the people to declare independence. One way to improve your Popular Standing is to make the people happy. For example if you build a Catholic Mission the Religion Happiness on the island will improve which in turn will improve your Popular Standing.

<_objective> Have a Catholic Mission.
<_reward> Revolutionary support.
NewTranslation:
我们需要人51%的人的支持来宣布独立。提高您的支持度的一个方法是使岛上的人民快乐。比如如果您修建一个布道所，市民的满意度提高，您的支持率也会提高。

<_objective>拥有一个布道所
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: The Revolution is a struggle for freedom, and there are few as free as the pirates. We should befriend and learn from them.
NewTranslation: 革命是一个争取自由的斗争，很少有人像海盗一样自由。我们应该帮助他们，并且向他们学习。

Text:
You might have heard that pirates like to get drunk and have fun. We must show them that Tropicans are equally skilled at getting drunk and having fun.

<_objective> Build a new <text_param>.
<_reward> Revolutionary support.
NewTranslation:
您可能听说过海盗喜欢喝醉来取乐。我们必须让他们知道，在喝酒上，我们和他们一样。

<_objective>建立一个新<text_param>。
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: Independence must be every Tropican's ultimate goal, but you can't expect us to fight a Revolution on an empty stomach.
NewTranslation: 独立必须成为每个海岛市民的终极目标，但您不能指望我们前胸贴后背的为革命斗争。

Text:
Tropicans find food wherever they can, mostly by liberating it from your farms. However a much better way to provide food for your people is to build a Grocery and supply it with food. It also provides a higher Food Happiness and thus increases your Popular Support.

<_objective> Have a Grocery
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
海岛居民都是从您的农场获取食物。另一个更好的为人们提供食物方法是建立一个食品杂货店来供应食物。它还提供了一个更高的食品的快乐，从而提高公众的支持。

<_objective>拥有一个食品杂货店
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: Listen very carefully, as I shall say this only once! I've learned of a secret weapon that is crucial to the Revolution.
NewTranslation: 仔细听着，我只说这一次！我知道的一个秘密武器，这对革命是至关重要的。

Text:
My sources tell me that this weapon is more powerful than a hundred muskets. We need to begin development of the secret weapon as soon as possible but first we'll need another Library.

<_objective> Build a new Library.
<_reward> Revolutionary support.
NewTranslation:
我的消息来源告诉我，这种武器比步枪强大一百倍。我们需要尽快开始发展的秘密武器，但是首先我们需要另一个图书馆。

<_objective>建立一个图书馆
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: Technological progress is the path to autonomy, Governor. We need more scientists to think important thoughts and discover new 鈥?stuff.
NewTranslation: 技术进步是实现自治的必经之路，总督。我们需要更多的科学家来充实大脑和发明新东西。

Text:
Researching new technologies will allow us to improve our economy and society and help us break the shackles of our imperial masters.

Research buildings require educated workers. You may have to hire them from abroad.

<_objective> Build a Library
<_reward> You will receive more tasks
NewTranslation:
研究新技术将使我们能够改善我们的经济和社会并且帮助我们打破帝国主义的枷锁。

研究建筑需要受过教育的工人。您可能不得不从国外雇佣他们。

<_objective>建立一个图书馆
<_reward>您将收到更多的任务

Text: Our soldiers may be few in number, but the fire of the Revolution burns in their hearts. We need more brave men and women like them.
NewTranslation: 我们的士兵人数少的可怜，但革命之火在他们心中燃烧。我们需要更多和他们一样的男人和女人。

Text:
The sons and daughters of the Revolution are ready to give their life for our freedom. We must make sure that their efforts will not be in vain. We have to strengthen our army so that we can win and defend our independence.  

<_objective> Build a new Military Fort.
<_reward> Revolutionary support.
NewTranslation:
革命的儿女准备好为自由牺牲了。我们必须确保他们的努力不会白费。我们必须加强我们的军队，这样我们才能赢得和保卫我们岛屿的独立。


<_objective>建立一个新的军事要塞
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: His Majesty is furious! He has just learned that you've begun mustering a sizable army... yet you don't have a major-general. Appoint one immediately!
NewTranslation: 陛下愤怒了！他刚刚得知您已经开始召集可观数量的军队……但是您没有一个将军。立即任命一个！

Text:
His Majesty recommends a loyal Royalist. He will be the very model of a modern major-general. Just don't appoint a Revolutionary - what do they know of matters vegetable, animal, and mineral?

Naturally the Crown will provide a generous stipend to go with the post.
NewTranslation:
陛下推荐一个忠诚的保皇派。他将成为现代将军的模型。只是，不任命一位革命人事-他们怎么知道什么重要，蔬菜，动物，和矿物？

自然，陛下将会慷慨的对这个职位进行赞助。

Text: Appoint a Royalist (<choice_param1> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 任命一个保皇派人(<choice_param1>个月的任期被延长)
任命一个革命派人(增加革命派支持)

Text: The Tropican soldier is brave. The Tropican soldier is proud. The Tropican soldier is ready to die for our homeland. The Tropican soldier's shooting skill leaves much to be desired.
NewTranslation: 海岛士兵是勇敢的。海岛士兵是让人骄傲的。海岛士兵准备为我们的祖国而死。海岛士兵的射击技能还需要做出很多的训练。

Text:
All we need is someone to shout at our solders and make them march in different geometrical shapes. That is bound to make them shoot and fight better.

<_objective> Issue the <text_param> edict
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我们需要的是让某个人来训练三个月的海岛士兵，让士兵射击不同的几何形状的靶子。这必然能提升他们的战斗能力！

<_objective>通过<text_param>法令
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: I can almost smell the Revolution. It smells like victory!
NewTranslation: 我几乎可以闻到革命的味道。它闻起来和胜利的味道一样！

Text:
Our Tropican army is almost ready to stand up against the King's troops in battle. We just need a few more brave men and women.

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我们的士兵已经准备好和国王开战了，当然我们需要更多勇敢的士兵！

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>获得革命派人支持

Text: His Royal Majesty would like to know more about your island, old chap. Be a good fellow and send a few men out to explore the island a bit.
NewTranslation: 陛下想知道更多关于您的岛屿的事情，老朋友。成为一个好的狗腿子，派几个人去探索您的海岛。

Text:
I still remember my first expedition. We trekked through snake infested swamps to reach the heart of the jungle and capture the deadly Panamanian golden frog. Jolly good fun all around!

<_objective> Send an expedition to explore the island. You can send an expedition from your Palace or a Military Fort
<_reward> <MoneyRewardText>
NewTranslation:
我仍然记得我第一次探险。我们长途跋涉，穿过蛇出没的丛林沼泽来到雨林中心捕获的致命巴拿马金蛙，并且我的膝盖没有中箭，真的太有趣了！

<_objective>派遣一个探险队探索岛屿。您可以从军事要塞派遣他们。
<_reward><MoneyRewardText>

Text: The expedition has made a wonderful discovery - a peculiar, wide-eared marsupial. What shall we name it?
NewTranslation: 探险队发现了一个有趣的物种，大耳朵袋鼠？？我们怎么命名它？

Text: If you would allow me to give a couple of suggestions - Bradley, Tobias, Finn, Darcy, Rowan, Kelsey, Leighton, Zachery, Issac, Tobias, oh I said that already, Frances, Brodie, Louis, Kane, Milo, Albert, Willow, Savannah, Jude, Tobias, Alistair, John or Tobias.
NewTranslation: 如果您允许我给您一些建议的话-Bradley，Tobias，Finn，Darcy，Rowan，Kelsey，Leighton，Zachery，Issac，Tobias，ohIsaidthatalready，Frances，Brodie，Louis，凯恩，Milo，Albert，Willow，Savannah，Jude，Tobias，Alistair，JohnorTobias。

Text: His Royal Majesty (<MandateReward> months mandate extension AND increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 国王陛下(<MandateReward>个月的任期延长AND增加革命派人支持)

Text: Name it after one of your dynasty members (+$$<SwissReward>)
NewTranslation: 以您一个家族成员的名字命名(+$$<SwissReward>)

Text: Bears the name of a wide-eared marsupial
NewTranslation: 熊的名字是大耳树袋熊

Text: We, the people of Tropico, demand the right to bear rams... wait that's not right. There's a typo here.
NewTranslation: 我们海岛人民决定熊的权利……等等，这是不正确的。这里有一个错误。

Text:
We need guns! Lots of guns! How else are we going to defend our liberty from the oppression of tyrants and despots?

<_objective> Issue the <text_param> edict. It will remain active for at least 2 years
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我们需要枪支！成吨的枪！另外，我们如何保护我们的自由而不是被暴君和独裁者的压迫？

<_objective>颁布<text_param>法令。此法令在未来两年内保持有效。
<_reward>获得革命党的支持

Text: We shall defend our island. We shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight in the fields and in the streets but it is best we fight from the safety of thick stone walls.
NewTranslation: 我们将在海滩作战，我们将在敌人的登陆点作战，我们将在田野和街头作战，我们将在山区作战。我们绝不投降，但我们最好还是在厚厚的石头后边作战吧。

Text:
And by "them" I mean the Crown's soldiers, obviously.

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
嗯……还有他们，我指的是皇家士兵

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: So there was gold in those mountains. Jolly good, old chap. I believe it's only fair that I get a piece of the pie, having supplied the information and all that.
NewTranslation: 那么说这些山脉有黄金。非常棒，老朋友。我相信我要去分一杯羹才是公平的，让我给您提供信息。

Text:
Right, let's get down to it. I believe that 10% should do the job. That's standard for a mining claim I believe. Do me this little favor and I'll say a few good things about you to His Majesty.

What do you say, old chap?
NewTranslation:
好的，让我们来做这件事吧。我只要10%的回扣就够了。我相信这是矿业的惯例。帮我这个小忙，我将帮您讨好国王殿下。

元芳，您怎么看？

Text: Agree with Lord Oaksworth (-10% price of Gold, <MandateReward> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 赞同欧克沃斯总管(-10%黄金价格，<MandateReward>个月的任期延长)

Text: Tropico will get all the Gold (increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 海岛将得到所有黄金(增加革命的的支持)

Text: Award the claim to a dynasty member (+$$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 赞同一个家族成员(+$$<SwissReward>瑞士银行)
欧克沃斯总管的回扣索要

Text: Tropico itself has given us a way to gain our independence. I am talking about gold. Mother Earth will gladly sacrifice her precious gifts for our freedom.
NewTranslation: 海岛给我们指出了一条独立之路，我说的是黄金。地球母亲愉快的决定牺牲她珍贵的礼物来帮助我们换取自由。

Text:
There are two ways to gain our independence - with weapons or with money. In either case gold will help. We should begin mining gold as soon as possible.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
有两种方法可以让我们的独立，战斗，或金钱。这两条路都需要黄金，我们应该尽快开始开采黄金。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 因为外部原因，该法令不能停止

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 因为外部原因，该法令不能停止

Text: Governor, my "special" friends are ready to do more business with us. We just need additional ships to handle the workload.
NewTranslation: 总督，我的“特殊”朋友们想和我们多做点儿生意。我们需要更多的船来满足运输需求。

Text:
To defeat the Crown we'll need lots of money. Trade can bring us significant profits if we make the right deals. Every new dock we build will give us more ships that we can send to sell our exports.

<_objective> Build a new <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
击败皇室我们需要很多钱。贸易可以带来巨大的利润，如果我们作出正确的交易。我们每创建一个新的码头将会给予我们更多的船只，之后我们可以出口我们的货物。

<_objective>建立一个新<text_param>
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: My black market contacts say that they have a hard time finding our island. I suggest we build something tall and shiny to attract their attention.
NewTranslation: 我的黑市联系人说他们很难找到我们的岛。我建议我们建设又高又亮的东西来吸引他们的注意力。

Text:
Constructing a Lighthouse will open new trade opportunities for Tropico and as I already told you more trade means more money and more money means more Revolution!

Viva la revolucion!

<_objective> Have a Lighthouse
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
建造一个灯塔，海岛将开展新的贸易路线，我已经告诉您更多的贸易意味着更多的钱，更多的钱意味着更有力的革命！

革命万岁！

<_objective>拥有一个灯塔
<_reward>获得革命者的支持

Text: I understand that you have a lighthouse, old chum. His Majesty wants you to appoint a royalist as the new keeper of the lighthouse. It is of the utmost importance.
NewTranslation: 我知道您有一个灯塔，老朋友。陛下要您任命一个皇室的成员来管理新灯塔。它是至关重要的。

Text:
As you know being the keeper of a lighthouse is a very responsible job that brings both status and wealth. Don't ask me why. It just does.

Now be a good chap and hire a royalist for the job.
NewTranslation:
正如您所知道的灯塔管理员是一个非常重要的工作，可以带来社会地位和财富。不要问我为什么。快去做！
现在做个狗腿子吧，马上任命一个皇家成员！

Text: Hire a Royalist (<MandateReward> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 雇佣一个保皇派(<MandateReward>个月的任期延长)
雇用一个革命派(增加革命派支持率)

Text: My friends the smugglers inform me that there's good money in buying and reselling goods at a profit.
NewTranslation: 我的走私犯朋友告诉我，通过买卖商品能获得丰厚的利润。

Text:
We'll need a large trade fleet to take advantage of such opportunities. We should build more docks and start looking for lucrative import and export trade routes.

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我们需要一个大型贸易商船队来抓住这个机会。我们应该建立更多的码头，开始寻找有利可图的进出口贸易路线。。

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: Looks like the buried treasures I was told about were actually natural treasures. Still, any kind of treasure is better than no treasure.
NewTranslation: 像是被埋藏的宝藏，或者是自然宝藏。不过，发现总比没有强。

Text:
It turns out that the map I was given was a prospecting map, not a pirate map. I am disappointed I had hoped for an exciting adventure and it turns out only the digging part was true.

<_objective> Have a Mine
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
看来我得到的是勘探地图，不是藏宝地图。令我失望的是只有一部分地图是真的！

<_objective>拥有一个矿井
<_reward>获得革命派支持

Text: I understand you've begun mining operations, my good chum. I am sure your island holds even more hidden riches.
NewTranslation: 我知道您已经开始采矿作业，我的好朋友。我相信您的岛拥有更多未知的的财富。

Text:
Why don't you send an expedition to explore for more mineral deposits? His Majesty loves expeditions and will be exited to hear tales of new undiscovered lands.

<_objective> Explore the island to find a new mining deposit
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <MandateReward> months
NewTranslation:
您为什么不派探险队探索更多矿藏？陛下喜欢探险也喜欢听探险故事。

<_objective>探索岛屿发现新矿脉
<_reward>您的任期将会延长<MandateReward>个月

Text: Our miners stumbled upon an oddly shaped ore nugget. You know, if you squint your eyes and tilt your head slightly to the right it almost looks like... (chuckles).
NewTranslation: 我们的矿工偶然发现了一个奇形怪状的矿石块。您看，如果您把头略微向右倾斜，看起来像…(笑)。

Text:
We should sell the nugget and use the money for the Revolution. I am sure that there are many who would pay good money for this natural wonder.

What are your orders, Governor?
NewTranslation:
我们应该为了我们的革命事业出售一些金块。我相信有许多人会掏来欣赏这个自然景观的。

您怎么看，总督？

Text: Gift the nugget to the King (<MandateReward> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 把金块送给国王(<MandateReward>个月的任期延长)

Text: Gift the nugget to a dynasty member (+$$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 金块送给自己(+$$<SwissReward>瑞士银行)

Text: Owner of a humorously shaped ore nugget
NewTranslation: 拥有一个滑稽形状的金块

Text: I've come to dislike mining - it is a messy process that pollutes our beautiful island. However, the Revolution demands sacrifices - even from our motherland.
NewTranslation: 我一直都不喜欢采矿业-它一直污染我们美丽的岛屿。然而，革命必须要我们这样牺牲-即便是我们的家乡。

Text:
We need money to declare independence. Weather we will spend the money for an army or to buy our freedom is a question for another time. Right now we should focus on exporting as much coal and ores as possible.

Viva la revolucion!

<_objective> Make <amount> profits from mining exports
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我们需要钱来宣布独立。我们将花钱打造一支军队或花钱购买主权自由，当然那是后话。现在我们应该尽可能多的出口煤炭和矿石。

革命万岁！

<_objective>从矿业获得<amount>的收益
<_reward>获得革命者的支持

Text: Comrade Governor. The more I read the works of comrade Marx, the more sure I am that our revolution must be a socialist revolution.
NewTranslation: 总督同志，我读马克思同志的书越多，我就越相信我们的革命必须是社会主义革命。

Text:
I would further state that we need to establish a revolutionary vanguard to serve as an example and lead the proletariat. For that we will need to find the right people. I am sure that our scholars will find a way to do that.

<_objective> Research the "Foremen" technology
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我要进一步声明，我们下一步应该树立一个革命的先锋作为榜样，来领导无产阶级。为此，我们需要找到合适的人选。我相信我们的学者会找到一种方法来这样做。

<_objective>研究督导科技
<_reward>获得革命者支持

Text: Workers of Tropico, unite! It is time to show the world that we can achieve any goal despite the Crown's oppression.
NewTranslation: 海岛的工人们，团结起来！是时候向世界证明，就算在皇室的压迫下，我们一样可以完成目标。

Text:
Through the wisdom of comrade Marx and the strength, and toil of the Tropican worker we will build an economic powerhouse that rivals any other nation.
 
<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
通过马克思同志的智慧和力量和海岛工人的辛劳，我们将建立一个经济强国，任何国家都不是我们的竞争对手。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>
<_reward>获得革命者支持

Text: The Revolution dictates that all people are equal. Now assign some of those equal people to give orders to the other equal people.
NewTranslation: 革命，所有的人都是平等的。现在给每个人平均分配。

Text:
Only a select few Tropicans have the superpowers known as "skills". Assigning such "skilled" people to buildings will improve the building's performance or add additional benefits. Keep a lookout for "skilled" people and use their formidable powers for the good of the Revolution.
 
<_objective> Hire a manager in a Catholic Mission
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
只有少数海岛居民有称之为“技能”的强大力量。分配这样的“熟练”人们建筑将改善建筑物的性能或添加额外的好处。保持寻找“熟练”的人，他们将领导革命。

<_objective>在教堂雇佣一个督导
<_reward>获得革命者支持

Text: They say a man's home is his castle, old chap. I would state that the reverse is also true - my castle is my home, or at least one of my homes.
NewTranslation: 他们说一个人的家就是他的城堡，老朋友。我想说反过来也一样-我的城堡是我的家，至少是我的一个家。

Text: I say, you should build some more houses for your subjects. Not  those small for hovels for the common folk. I'm talking about proper homes for the well-off citizens. Keep in mind that mansions are costly and will drain your economy if you don't have wealthy people to rent them.
NewTranslation: 我说，您应该建造更多的房屋，不是那些给普通人的小屋子，而是适当的为富裕市民家庭建立舒适的房屋。记住，豪宅是昂贵的，因为如果没有土豪为它花钱，它就会来花我们的钱。
建造廉价房屋(增加革命者支持)

Text: Build expensive homes (<choice_param1> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 建造昂贵的房屋(<choice_param1>个月的任期延长)

Text: They say a man's home is his castle, old chap. I would state that the reverse is also true - my castle is my home, or at least one of my homes.
NewTranslation: 他们说一个人的家就是他的城堡，老朋友。我想说反过来也一样-我的城堡是我的家，至少是我的一个家。

Text:
I see you won't be taking my advice on this. Sir, I am offended. Fine have your cheap homes. I am sure your Revolutionary pals will be quite overjoyed by this.

<_objective> Build <amount> new <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我认为您不会接受我的建议。大人，我冒犯了。又好又廉价的住房。我相信您的革命者的朋友会很喜欢。

<_objective>建立<amount>个新的<text_param>
<_reward>获得革命者支持

Text: They say a man's home is his castle, old chap. I would state that the reverse is also true - my castle is my home, or at least one of my homes.
NewTranslation: 他们说一个人的家就是他的城堡，老朋友。我想说反过来也一样-我的城堡是我的家，至少是我的一个家。

Text:
I see you won't be taking my advice on this. Sir, I am offended. Fine have your cheap homes. I am sure your Revolutionary pals will be quite overjoyed by this.

<_objective> Build <amount> new <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我认为您不会接受我的建议。大人，我冒犯了。又好又廉价的住房。我相信您的革命者的朋友会很喜欢。

<_objective>建立<amount>个新的<text_param>
<_reward>获得革命者支持

Text: The people's support for the Revolution is increasing, but there's still more we can do. You should address employment issues on the island.
NewTranslation: 人民对革命的支持越来越多，但我们还可以做的更好。您应该解决就业问题。

Text:
To improve the Job Happiness on your island you should first provide jobs for all unemployed citizens. Secondly try increasing the budget of some buildings. That will rise the Job Happiness (and the Wealth) of the workers. Just make sure that the increased budgets don't drain your finances.

<_objective> Increase Job Happiness above <amount>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
改善工作幸福度，您应该首先为所有失业的公民提供就业机会。其次尝试增加一些建筑物的预算。增加工作的工人的幸福(和工资)。但是要确定增加预算不会拖垮您的经济。

<_objective>使工作幸福度高于<amount>
<_reward>获得革命者支持

Text: I tried to talk to the pirates about our Revolution but they only laughed at me. I am certain that it was because our fleet is not big enough.
NewTranslation: 我试图和海盗们谈论我们的革命，但他们只是嘲笑我。我确信那是因为我们的舰队不够大。

Text:
My sources tell me that the size of a pirate's fleet is a sign of status. If we are to be taken seriously we need more ships.

<_objective> Build a new <text_param>
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
线人告诉我，海盗舰队的规模是一种身份的象征。如果我们要认真对待的话，我们需要更多船只。

<_objective>建立新的<text_param>
<_reward>获得革命者支持

Text: It is all a hoax! To think I admired the pirates for their free spirit. It turns out that they also follow a king - the Pirate King.
NewTranslation: 这一切都是一场骗局！我还敬佩海盗的自由精神。事实证明，他们也有一个国王-海贼王。

Text:
Bowing down to a monarch. That's not what I expected of pirates to be. Perhaps we can share our Revolution with them and help them free themselves from this Pirate King.

Anyway we can still get something out of all this we should send someone to meet with the Pirate King. Who shall it be?
NewTranslation:
拘泥于君主，那不是我印象中的海盗。也许我们可以与他们分享我们的革命经验，并帮助他们摆脱这个海贼王。

不管怎样我们仍然可以得到东西。我们应该派人与海贼王会面。谁来？

Text: Send a dynasty member (+$$<choice_param1> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 让家族成员去(+$$<choice_param1>瑞士银行)
让欧克沃斯总管去(增加革命主义支持)

Text: Send Evita Vasquez (additional trade routes with pirates)
NewTranslation: 让艾维塔·瓦斯克斯去(增加更多私人贸易路线)

Text: It turns out that the Pirate King is quite a nice fellow, if I do say so myself, old chap! Like me, he too is a fan of the opera. You should commission a new piece in his honor.
NewTranslation: 就我看来，海贼王是一个相当不错的家伙，老朋友！像我一样，他也喜欢歌剧。您应该委任他一个新荣誉。

Text:
His other Majesty - the Pirate King communicated to me that he would be very grateful if we commission a new opera in his name. He even promised to share with Tropico part of his booty, whatever that may be.

<_objective> Have an Opera
NewTranslation:
海贼王告诉我说，如果我们让一个歌剧以他的名字命名，他承诺将与我们海岛分一部分的享战利品，那是什么呢？

<_objective>有一个歌剧院

Text: The Pirate of the Opera Returns
Jolly good news, old chap! The piece you commissioned for the Pirate King is ready. All that is left is to cast the role of the title character.
NewTranslation: 天大的好消息，老朋友！您委托的海贼王歌剧已经准备好了。剩下的是就是谁来当男一号的问题了。

Text:
Did I mention that I played the lead in my school's play? Not that I am implying anything, but I can put in a good word about you to His Majesty and I have an excellent singing voice.

So have you made your decision, my good chum?
NewTranslation:
我曾经提到过我在学校的话剧中担任过主角吗？额，并不是说我想刻意表达什么，但是我可以在陛下面前用我那带有磁性的嗓音为您美言几句。

所以请做决定吧，我的好基友？

Text: Let Lord Oaksworth play the lead (<choice_param1> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 让欧克沃斯总管担任主角(任期延长<choice_param1>月)

Text: Give the part to Evita Vasquez (increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 让艾维塔·瓦斯克斯来担任这个角色(增加革命者支持)

Text: Give the part to a dynasty member (+<choice_param2> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 让家族成员来担任这个角色(+<choice_param2>瑞士银行)

Text: Played the leading role in a play
NewTranslation: 在话剧中担任主要角色

Text: You've managed to win the Pirate King over to our side. He's offered us a part of the pirates' plunder.
NewTranslation: 您已经成功将海盗王拉拢到我们这边。他向我们提供了他们搜刮的一部分民脂民膏。

Text:
The Pirate King has presented us with a new trade opportunity - we can buy gold from the pirates at a cheap price and then export it at a much higher price. The pirates will then "liberate" the gold from the Crown's ships and sell it to us again.

<_effect> Special "Pirate Gold" trade route
NewTranslation:
海盗王提供给我们一个贸易的机会-我们可以以相对便宜的价格从海盗那里购买黄金，然后高价出售。这些海盗将“征用”皇家巨船上的黄金并将它们卖给我们。

<_effect>“海盗寻宝”特殊贸易路线

Text:
I say, this free food thing seems illogical. Why should the Crown waste its profits to feed the people? His Majesty says "No Free Lunch" and he means it. Now be a good dear and issue the edict. Just don't listen to that radical woman and her "Extra Rations" ideas.

<_objective> Issue the <text_param> edict
<_reward> <MandateReward> months mandate extension
NewTranslation:
在我看来，免费的食物似乎不符合逻辑，为什么国王要浪费自己的财产来饲养他的臣民？陛下曾曰:“天下没有免费的午餐”。现在颁布您的法令吧，别听那个激进的女人和她的“食物配给法令”想法。

<_objective>颁布<text_param>法令
<_reward>任期延长<MandateReward>月

Text:
I say, this free food thing seems illogical. Why should the Crown waste its profits to feed the people? His Majesty says "No Free Lunch" and he means it. Now be a good dear and issue the edict. Just don't listen to that radical woman and her "Extra Rations" ideas.

<_objective> Issue the <text_param> edict
<_reward> Increased revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
在我看来，免费的食物似乎不符合逻辑，为什么国王要浪费自己的财产来饲养他的臣民？陛下曾曰:“天下没有免费的午餐”。现在颁布您的法令吧，别听那个激进的女人和她的“食物配给法令”想法。

<_objective>颁布<text_param>法令
<_reward>任期延长<MandateReward>月

Text:
I say, this free food thing seems illogical. Why should the Crown waste its profits to feed the people? His Majesty says "No Free Lunch" and he means it. Now be a good dear and issue the edict. Just don't listen to that radical woman and her "Extra Rations" ideas.

<_objective> Issue the "No Free Lunch" and "Extra Rations" edicts
<_reward> <MandateReward> months mandate extension; Increased revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
在我看来，免费的食物似乎不符合逻辑，为什么国王要浪费自己的财产来饲养他的臣民？陛下曾曰:“天下没有免费的午餐”。现在颁布您的法令吧，别听那个激进的女人和她的“食物配给法令”想法。

<_objective>颁布<text_param>法令
<_reward>任期延长<MandateReward>月

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 该法令由于外部原因无法撤销

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 该法令由于外部原因无法撤销

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 该法令由于外部原因无法撤销

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 该法令由于外部原因无法撤销

Text: It is the right, nay, the duty of every freeborn Tropican to grow his own bananas!
NewTranslation: 就是这样！不仅如此，种植自己的香蕉是每一个自由的岛民义不容辞的责任

Text:
Country houses may not be as fancy as Lord Oaksworth's mansions but they provide every Tropican with all the necessities of life - a roof above his head and a fine garden to grow his own food. Citizens living in country houses will never starve.

<_objective> Build <amount> new Country Houses
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
乡村小屋也许不像欧克沃斯总管的豪宅那样华丽，但是他们向每一位岛民提供了所有的生活必需品-一个屋顶和可以为自己种植食物的漂亮花园。住在乡村小屋市民将永远不会饥饿。

<_objective>新建<amount>乡村小屋
<_reward>革命支持者

Text: I say, you need at least four dishes for a proper English breakfast, my good chum.
NewTranslation: 我的好基友，您如果想要一顿不错的英式早餐，那就要至少四道菜。

Text:
Providing His Majesty's subjects with as many different food products will increase the Food Variety on your colony and thus improve the Food Happiness of Tropico.

<_objective> Build <amount> different <text_param>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <MandateReward> months
NewTranslation:
给人民提供不同的食品将会增加殖民地的食物多样性，将会提高岛民的食品幸福度。

<_objective>建造<amount>不同的<text_param>
<_reward>任期时间<MandateReward>月
