Text: We are one step closer to developing the Revolution's secret weapon. We now need to develop several technologies before we can proceed any further.
NewTranslation: 我们离拥有革命的秘密武器只有一步之遥了，现在，为了长远的未来我们需要研发一些科技。

Text:
As you know technological progress is not spontaneous, you have to develop the previous idea before moving to the next one. For example how can you expect to discover planks without first researching the shovel?

<_objective> Research <amount> technologies
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
如您所知，科技的进步不是自发的，在进一步研发科技之前您得研发以前尚未研发的科技。就好比没学会爬您就会走路吗？

<_objective>研发<amount>科技
<_reward>革命支持者

Text: Congratulations, Governor! We are almost ready to deploy the Revolution's secret weapon.
NewTranslation: 祝贺您，总督！我们已经准备好部署革命的秘密武器了。

Text:
Words - our secret weapon is words. Printed on paper and distributed to the masses. It is time to construct a Newspaper so that we can spread the ideals of the Revolution throughout Tropico.

<_objective> Have a Newspaper
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
文字-我们的秘密武器是文字。把文字印在纸上并向群众散发。是时候建立一个报社让我们的革命思想得以在全岛散播。

<_objective>拥有一家报社
<_reward>革命支持者

Text: Witness the power of this fully ARMED and OPERATIONAL revolutionary weapon!
NewTranslation: 见证奇迹的时刻！看看我们全副武装和战力十足的革命武器吧！

Text:
Witness the power of the front page! We have to have a strong article that state our intentions on our first front page. I believe there is only one author that can do the job properly - myself.

Assign someone to write the front page article.
NewTranslation:
见证头条的力量吧！我们需要做一篇有力的文章去展示我们的意图。我相信只有一个作者能够办到此事，那就是-我自己

让某一个人去写这篇文章

Text: Give the article to Evita Vasquez (increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 让艾维塔·瓦斯克斯来写文章(增加革命支持者)

Text: Assign it to Lord Oaksworth (<choice_param1> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 让欧克沃斯总管来写文章(任期延长<choice_param1>月)

Text: Give the article to a dynasty member ($$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 让家族成员来写($$<SwissReward>瑞士银行)

Text: Our army is ready to defend Tropico. Time to put it to the test. I know! Let's pick a fight with the pirates!
NewTranslation: 我们的战士已经准备好守卫海岛了，是时候来检验海岛的防御了，让我们击退海盗！

Text:
As you know pirates are masters of insult fighting. They have risen cursing to an art form. Provoking them to attack us is no easy task. We must choose the proper inflection, syntax and delivery.

How will you taunt the pirates?
NewTranslation:
如您所知。海盗是嘴炮界的大师。他们将咒骂升华为一种艺术形式。挑衅他们来攻击我们不是一个容易的活计。我们必须选择合适的词形，语法和演讲。

您将如何嘲讽海盗？

Text: Your looks would make pigs nauseated.
NewTranslation: 你这样子连二师兄都会被恶心到。

Text: I give you a choice. You can be gutted, or decapitated!
NewTranslation: 我给你一个选择，您是想被烧死，还是被斩首！

Text: The pirates are furious! They are sending an expedition to punish you for your insolence.
NewTranslation: 海盗们怒了！他们派了一只远征队来惩罚您的傲慢无礼！

Text: The pirates are afraid of your incredible might. They are sending a gift to appease your wrath (<param1>).
NewTranslation: 海盗们是如此的惧怕您。他们送来了一份礼物来平息您的愤怒(<param1>)。

Text: The King has offered a huge sum for the capture of Black Soulpatch before he becomes more than a mere nuisance.
NewTranslation: 国王在黑色山羊胡还不是一个大麻烦之前就已经悬赏巨资去俘获他。

Text: Send a dynasty member on an expedition
NewTranslation: 指派一位继承人加入到远征队

Text: Let somebody else take care of it
The dread pirate Black Soulpatch turned out to be a mere teenager. Our brave commander promptly spanked him and returned him to his mother for further punishment.
NewTranslation: 恐怖的海盗黑色山羊胡居然是一位单纯的少年。我们勇敢的指挥官毫不犹豫的扇了他两耳光并把她送回他母亲那儿，教他做人。

Text:
The scourge of the sea is no more and we will receive the Crown's just reward.

<_effect> +$5 000; Your dynasty member will level up
NewTranslation:
海洋灾害不会增多，并且我们会从国王那儿收到应有的报酬。

<_effect>+$5000；您的家族成员将会升级。

Text: Our brave commander did not manage to catch the dreaded pirate as another fleet beat him to the punch.
NewTranslation: 我们勇敢的指挥官没能抓住那个可怕的海盗，因为他被另一支舰队打得措手不及。

Text: However, he was convinced by his crew that losing a leg is a must for any naval commander. He asks what what wood to use for his new wooden leg.
NewTranslation: 然而，他被他的船员说服了:任何一个海军指挥官都必须要失去一条腿。现在他在询问他的新假腿该用什么木头来做。
拥有一条木制腿(桃花心木)
拥有一条木制腿(落叶松)

Text: Our brave commander met with the pirate and decided to join him. Together they raided several towns. By the by, Black Soulpatch is now known as Black Goatee.
NewTranslation: 我们英勇的指挥官会见了海盗并决定加入他们。他们一起袭击了几个城镇。顺便说一下，黑色山羊胡现在更名为黑胡子。

Text: <_effect> $2 000; You dynasty member will level up

NewTranslation: 颁布汉堡不会从天降法令
颁布汉堡不会从天降法令
颁布汉堡不会从天降法令
颁布汉堡不会从天降法令
撤销汉堡不会从天降法令
撤销汉堡不会从天降法令

Text: This edict can not be active at the same time as "Legalized Substances".
NewTranslation: 此法令无法与“资产合法化”同时启用

Text: There must be at least one Rebel Leader on the island.
NewTranslation: 岛上至少要有一个叛军头领

Text: You need to research "Red Tape" to use this edict
You need at least one Tavern to activate this edict.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一个酒馆来启用这项法令

Text: You need at least one Rich or Filthy Rich citizen
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一个富裕或土豪公民

Text: You need to research "Socialism" to use this edict
You need to research "Socialism" to use this edict
You need at least one High School
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一所高中

Text: You need at least one Clinic or Hospital
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一所诊所或者医院

Text: You need to wait at least 12 months after the last elections
NewTranslation: 您在上次选举后至少需要等在12个月

Text: You need to research "Socialism" to use this edict
We received <param1> Research Points from the Global Research Initiative
NewTranslation: 我们从全球研究计划中获得<param1>研究点数

Text: You need good standing with at least one foreign superpower.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少和一个超级大国保持良好关系

Text: You need at least one Police Station to activate this edict.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一个警察局来启用这项法令

Text: The "Secret Police" edict must be active in order to wiretap people.
NewTranslation: 便衣警察法令必须已启用，以便于监听民众

Text: You need to research "Naive Foreigners" to use this edict
NewTranslation: 你需要研发纯真有爱外国佬

Text: You need at least one Airport
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一座机场

Text: You need at least one Hotel
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一个宾馆

Text: You need to research "Naive Foreigners" to use this edict
NewTranslation: 你需要研发纯真有爱外国佬

Text: There must be active rebels on the island to use this edict
NewTranslation: 此法令必须在岛上启用反叛后使用

Text: You need at least one ore deposit that has not been depleted.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少一个未开采完的矿床

Text: Can not be active at the same time as the "GM Crops" edict
NewTranslation: 不能与“转基因作物”法令同时启用

Text: You need a Nuclear Program to issue this edict.
NewTranslation: 您需要拥有核计划才可颁布此法令

Text: The Immunization Campaign has improved our healthcare
NewTranslation: 防疫计划提高了医保质量

Text: You need at least one Hospital to activate this edict.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少一所医院才能启用此法令

Text: You need at least one oil deposit that is not depleted.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少一个未开采完的油田

Text: You need at least one Police Station to activate this edict.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一个警察局来启用这项法令

Text: This edict can not be active at the same time as "Legalized Substances".
NewTranslation: 此法令无法与“资产合法化”同时启用

Text: Taxing Legalized Substances provided us with <param1>
NewTranslation: 税收合法化为我们提供了资金<param1>

Text: This edict can not be active at the same time as "Smoking Ban"
NewTranslation: 不能与“禁烟令”法令同时启用

Text: This edict can not be active at the same time as "Prohibition"
NewTranslation: 不能与“禁酒令”法令同时启用

Text: You need to research "The Internet" to use this edict
You need to research "The Internet" to use this edict
You need to research "The Internet" to use this edict
You need at least one Science Lab to activate this edict.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一个科学实验室才可启用此法令

Text: Can not be active at the same time as the "Organic Campaign" edict
NewTranslation: 不能与“有机”运动计划同时启用

Text: You need at least one Stadium to activate this edict.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一个体育馆才可启用此法令

Text: You need at least 3 military buildings to activate this edict.
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有三个军事建筑才可启用此法令

Text: Presidente... Whooops I'm getting ahead of myself. Governor, the island is ripe for revolution.
NewTranslation: 总统先生……哦，见鬼，我要先跑了。总督大人，革命席卷了整个海岛。

Text:
Your approval rating is high enough so that you can proclaim Independence from the Crown and we can finally be free from their stupid demands.

<_effect> You can proclaim Independence
NewTranslation:
您已到达宣布独立的等级，我们终于获得自由，可以摆脱国王那愚蠢统治了。

<_effect>您可以宣布独立了。

Text: His Majesty is most amused by your declaration of independence.
NewTranslation: 由于您宣布独立，他的王权变得很难堪。

Text: He is currently not very interested in your little island anyway. If you pay to the Empire for the losses it has incurred from you, you will be allowed to be independent. Otherwise, the royal forces will come for a small visit.
NewTranslation: 不管怎么说，他目前对您的小岛没啥兴趣。如果您愿意支付给帝王您带来的损失，您会被允许独立。否则，皇室们会来找您麻烦的。

Text: It looks like the wars in Europe will finally end. It is but a matter of time before the Allies deal the Axis a crushing blow.
NewTranslation: 看样子欧洲战火要结束了，同盟国打败轴心国只是时间问题而已。

Text:
We need to be prepared for the new world order after everything is said and done. We should sign treaties with both sides to be sure that no one will try to blame us for all that happened.

<_objective> Sign treaties with the Axis and the Allies
<_reward> Progress to the next era
NewTranslation:
我们需要马上为新的世界格局做点准备。我们应该和两个阵营都签署一些条约，确保以后不会因做错板凳而受到瓜葛。

<_objective>与轴心国和同盟国签署协议。

<_reward>过度到下个年代。

Text: Even the coldest of wars must end, old chap. I blame global warming. We should consider our future.
NewTranslation: 尽管冷战肯定会结束，老伙计，但我们应该为我们的子孙后代考虑下，因为可能会有我最讨厌的温室效应。

Text:
As usual, big bullies like the current superpowers have an achilles heel in their pride. Shame them and they will promptly end their bickering.

There are two courses we can partake to this end:
NewTranslation:
通常，大坏蛋和超级大国一样都有同样的致命弱点-骄傲。如果我们正面打掉他的傲气，他就变得一文不名了。

有两种方式供我们选择:

Text: My Rocket Is Much Bigger Than Yours
NewTranslation: 我的火箭比您的大多了

Text: Presidente, I am overjoyed that you chose these means to end the war, as are all militarists. Never again will the world make jokes about our little rockets.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我很高兴您选择了采取强硬手段来结束这场战争。全世界再也不敢嘲笑我们的火箭个头儿小了。

Text:
When we have the biggest rocket all the girls will come to us and the superpowers will be alone and unwanted. NOT US!!!

<_objective> Have a Nuclear Program
<_reward> Progress to the next era
NewTranslation:
当我们拥有最大个儿的火箭时，姑娘们都会冲向我们的怀抱。那些超级大国，哈哈，别做白日梦了，还是呆一边自己撸吧！

<_objective>拥有核计划
<_reward>发展到下一时期

Text: Good show, old chap! Let's hit them with technological envy. That will smart for a lifetime.
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮，老兄！让他们尝尝先进科技的滋味儿，这TM感觉太销魂了。

Text:
Space is what all the kids are talking about these days. Let's go with that. We can send Penultimo  and claim the first chimpanzee in space!

<_objective> Have a Space program
<_reward> Progress to the next era
NewTranslation:
宇宙永远都挂在所有孩子的嘴边。让我们飞吧，我们可以把贝奴迪莫送入太空，然后宣称海岛的第一只黑猩猩成功上天了！


<_objective>拥有航天工程

<_reward>进步到下一时期

Text: The Allies are pleased by your cooperation during this extremely turbulent time.
NewTranslation: 同盟国对您在动荡时期给予的合作表示感谢

Text:
They are advising you to keep calm and carry on. They will sign a treaty with us without reservation.

<_effect> The Allies have agreed to a treaty with you.
NewTranslation:
同盟国建议我们继续保持，他们将于我们签署无条件互信条约。

<_effect>同盟国同意了与您签署条约。

Text: To The Victor Go The Spoils
The Allies have won and now think they can do as they please.
NewTranslation: 同盟国赢了，他们现在为所欲为了。

Text:
I received an ultimatum that we either agree to overburden our economy with what they call a tax for not participating on our side, or they will invade us next.

What will we do?
NewTranslation:
我们收到了最后通牒，由于战争时期我们没有和他们穿一条裤子，所以现在要么给他们交保护费，要么他们就会进攻我们。

老大，我们该怎么办呢？

Text: The Allies concluded their business with you and will sign a treaty with you.
NewTranslation: 同盟国决定与您展开贸易并签署条约

Text: The Allies have scored a crushing victory over the Axis. Now they are targeting the last pockets of resistance and everyone they deem a sympathizer.
NewTranslation: 同盟国已经大获全胜击败了轴心国。现在就剩下最后的一点残余势力需要清理，所有人都站在了他这边。

Text:
Unfortunately, we have fallen in the black list, chap. Good news is they probably won't send their best and brightest against our small and homely island.

<_effect> The Allies refuse a treaty with you and will attack you soon.
NewTranslation:
很不幸，我们被列入了黑名单，伙计。但是好消息是他们不会太过重视我们这兔子不拉屎的小岛。

<_effect>同盟国拒绝了和您的条约签署，并且很快就要进攻您了。

Text: The Allies concluded their business with you and will sign a treaty with you.
NewTranslation: 同盟国决定与您展开贸易并签署条约

Text: I met with a very anxious Axis diplomat who said he will sign any piece of paper I want just as long as you don't tell anyone what they were doing during the war.
NewTranslation: 我遇见了一个轴心国的外交家，他会签署我提出的任何条约，但是希望天知地知，他知我知。

Text:
Of course, I have no idea what he is talking about. But I may just be saying that because I am a skilled diplomat.

<_effect> The Axis have agreed to a treaty with you.
NewTranslation:
当然，我完全没明白他说啥，但我只想说我也是个外交家。

<_effect>轴心国同意了和您签署协议。

Text: The Axis high command was very rude. They were packing their bags the whole time I was trying to negotiate.
NewTranslation: 轴心国的高层太无理了，在我试着和他们协商的时候，他们居然在准备卷铺盖走人。

Text:
They will sign a treaty with us only if we give them shelter. Otherwise, they have decided that they will take the island for themselves and start again. They considered the moon first but thought it too expensive.

What will we do?
NewTranslation: 如果我们给他们庇护，他们才会签署条约。否则，他们就会入侵海岛。他们本来想躲到月球上去，估计是费用超出预算了。那我们怎么办啊？

Text: Accept them (+30 immigrants; -20 to all foreign relations in the next era)
NewTranslation: 同意(+30外来移民，在下一时期-20与所有外国关系)

Text: The Axis concluded their business with you and will sign a treaty with you.
NewTranslation: 轴心国决定与您展开贸易并签署条约

Text: I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but I am. Those rotten Axis generals won't sign a treaty with us.
NewTranslation: 虽然我痛恨带来坏消息，但不得不说那帮缺德的轴心国将军们拒绝和我们签署条约

Text:
In fact they intend to storm Tropico and start their plan of world dominance all over again. Apparently ,they never learn

<_effect> The Axis refuse a treaty with you and will attack you soon.
NewTranslation:
事实上，他们计划着用武力再一次统治世界，您的海岛也在其中。

<_effect>轴心国拒绝了与您签署条约，并且准备很快进攻您的海岛。

Text: The Axis concluded their business with you and will sign a treaty with you.
NewTranslation: 轴心国决定与您展开贸易并签署条约

Text: Offer the Axis to sign a treaty with them.
NewTranslation: 提出与轴心国签署协议

Text: Offer the Allies to sign a treaty with them.
NewTranslation: 提出与同盟国签署协议
在叛变袭击中存活下来

Text: Welcome to the Caribbean, Governor. Allow me to introduce myself - Lord Oaksworth - His Majesty's emissary to the region.
NewTranslation: 欢迎来到加勒比，总督阁下。请允许我进行自我介绍，在下是欧克沃斯总管-国王陛下的地方特使

Text: His Majesty has graciously given you this colony to rule in his name for a number of years indicated by your mandate. Complete the tasks sent by His Majesty and I'll make sure that you get extensions to your term as Governor.
NewTranslation: 陛下慷慨地将这块殖民地交给你，现在你可以以他的名义统治一短时间。完成陛下交给你的任务吧，这样我也好在其面前为你美言几句来延长你的任期。

Text: We are the shadows that move the world. We rule in secret. We are the salvation of mankind. We are the Order, and you will be one of us.
NewTranslation: 我们是撼动世界的影子，黑暗中的统治者；我们是人类的救星，是世界的主宰。而你，将成为我们共济会中的一员！

Text:
I've been watching your career with interest, Governor. I sense great potential in you. However joining the Order is not so trivial. You must first prove yourself - gain your independence from the Crown and you will be one of us.

<_objective> Declare Independence
<_reward> Win the mission
<_hint> To declare independence you have to increase your Popular Support above 50%. To do this improve the happiness and take steps to increase the revolutionaries on your island.
NewTranslation:
我曾在暗中仔细地观察过你，总督阁下。怎么说呢，你骨骼惊奇，日后必有一番作为，但是，加入我们共济会也不是随随便便的事，你必须先证明你自己-从国王的淫威下独立！这样，你才有资格成为我们的一员

<_objective>宣布独立
<_reward>通关
<_hint>要宣布独立，你必须让自己的支持率超过50%。所以，请提高人民的“幸福指数”，并有计划的在你的岛上扶持“革命党人”吧。

Text: Welcome, brother! Today you and your family join the select few who have taken upon themselves the burden of governing the world.
NewTranslation: 欢迎光临，吾友，今天起你跟你的家人就要开始承担起统治世界的重担了

Text:
Congratulations, you are in! Here is your membership card, your ceremonial dagger and robes. Membership fees are due the second Monday of each month.

Since you are our newest member I will continue to guide you in your endeavors. I will also remain your primary contact with the Order.
NewTranslation:
恭喜恭喜，你已正式加入我们的行列！这是你的会员卡、仪式剑还有礼服。会费在每月的第二个星期一交。
以后，我会不断在你前进的道路上为你提供指引，当然，我也会保证你跟共济会的日常接恰。

Text: I understand you are still struggling with trivial things like money. I will aid you this time, but remember, I offer my help only once.
NewTranslation: 我懂的，你还在为钱的事困惑烦恼，这次我就大发慈悲地援助你好了，但是切记，下不为例。

Text: Money, while it does provide a means to an end, is largely irrelevant in the big picture. It is just a convenience to keep the world in check. Here, have some. Just remember that a man that relies on other people's money quickly becomes their servant. And I have no time for servants.
NewTranslation: 钱，作为一种达到目的的手段，其实无关大局，它只是为掌控世界提供某种便利罢了。咳咳，这些拿去吧。记住，依赖别人口袋的人只会迅速沦为仆从，我可不想把时间花在仆从身上。

Text: Take the money for yourself (+$$<choice_param1> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 将钱纳入个人账户(瑞士银行+$$<choice_param1>)

Text: Many people are ready to give their life for their ideals. You must be ready to take lives for yours.
NewTranslation: 许多人都准备为理想而献出生命，但你必须准备为理想而夺取生命。

Text:
You don't agree with me? I will have to take matters into my own hands and show you. 

The Royalists on your island do not support independence and lower your approval. I have arranged for the deaths of several of them. 

This is an important lesson. Sometimes you have to make sacrifices to achieve your goals.

<_effect> Several Royalists have been killed
NewTranslation:
你难道不赞同我么？算了，我亲自来帮你解决问题，顺便给你上一课。
你岛上的保皇党不支持独立，还降低了你的支持率，而我为他们中的一些人安排了事故。
重要的一课，不是吗，有时为了个人理想就得做出牺牲。

<_effect>数名保皇派被处决。

Text: Being able to stand on your own is a virtue I personally cherish. Self-sufficiency should be every country's goal.
NewTranslation: 自力更生是我所器重的美德，自给自足应该成为每个国家的目标。

Text:
This is a lesson I would like you to learn well. Show me that you can stand on your own and become a profitable colony and I will help you with your revolution.

<_objective> Have $<amount>
<_reward> 12 educated Revolutionaries will immigrate to your island
NewTranslation:
这也是我想让你好好领教的，展现你自己的力量，让这片殖民地繁荣起来吧，我会为你的革命助一臂之力。

<_objective>拥有$<amount>
<_reward>12名受过教育的革命党人将会移民到你的海岛

Text: I say, being a Crown colony is a kind of competition, one you are losing, old chap. The colonies of Puerto Coco and Isla Rojo are beating you badly.
NewTranslation: 我觉得，成为王室殖民地是一种竞争，一旦你开始输了，老兄啊，椰岛和红岛这些殖民地就会让你败的很惨。

Text:
In fact the islands of Puerto Coco and Isla Rojo are doing so well that the Crown has come to expect much more from you also.

His Majesty has decided since the region is doing quite well all colonies should pay a higher tax this year.
NewTranslation:
事实上，椰岛和红岛表现得很好，所以王室也期望你能有更多表现。
陛下已经决定了，基于地区发展的这么给力的情况，今年所有殖民地税收涨价。

Text: Pay double tax (-$<choice_param2> Treasury; 12 months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 支付双倍税(财政-$<choice_param2>，延长12个月的任期)

Text: Don't pay the tax (-<choice_param3> Crown Relations)
NewTranslation: 不支付这笔税(-<choice_param3>王室关系)

Text: I am afraid that your colony is still doing rather poorly compared to your neighbours - Puerto Coco and Isla Rojo. His Majesty is not pleased.
NewTranslation: 我不得不说你表现得不如你的邻居-椰岛和红岛。陛下很生气，后果很严重。

Text: His Majesty has decided to provide you with an incentive to do better in the future - a special tax, to be paid immediately. Now is the time to impress the Crown and prove that you colony is as good as your neighbours.
NewTranslation: 但陛下决定给你次机会将功赎过-直接支付一笔特别税。这可是给王室留下深刻映象并嘚瑟一把的大好机会啊！

Text: Pay double tax (-$<choice_param2> Treasury; 12 months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 付双倍税金(-$<choice_param2>财政资金；延长十二个月任期)

Text: Don't pay the tax (-<choice_param3> Crown Relations)
The burden of ruling twists our perception of humanity. To us, people are just a resource that has to be managed properly.
NewTranslation: 统治的重担扭曲了我们的人性观。对我们来说，人只是一种必须被妥善管理的资源。

Text:
Speaking of managing people you can attract additional managers to your island. You can then assign them to your most important buildings to improve their performance. All you need is to build some new housing for the managers.

<_objective> Build <amount> new Country Houses
<_reward> <reward> managers will immigrate to the island
NewTranslation:
说到管理人民，您可以吸引更多管理人才来到您的小岛。您可以给您最重要的建筑分配督导来改善工作效率。您只需要给高管们盖些新房子。

<_objective>新建<amount>个乡村小屋
<_reward><reward>个督导将移民到您的小岛

Text: I see the houses are ready. Unfortunately, the islands of Puerto Coco and Isla Rojo have kidnapped the managers intended for you.
NewTranslation: 看来您的房子已经准备好了。不幸的是，椰岛和红岛的人绑架了正前往我国的督导。

Text:
As I understand it they offered large mansions to get the managers from under your nose. Don't worry too much about it - you'll be able to get back at them at some point. In the meantime I used the Order's connections to get an extension to your mandate.

<_effect> Your mandate was extended by 12 months
NewTranslation:
以我个人的理解，一定是他们提供了更大的豪宅吸引了督导，所以才能在您眼皮底下把他们拐走。别太担心-您绝对有机会把他们弄回来的。与此同时，我利用我在王室的人际网延长了您的任期。

<_effect>您的任期将延长12个月

Text: Ah, the Caribbean. A lush and untamed land - my new home. Beautiful and full of promise.
NewTranslation: 啊，加勒比！郁郁葱葱的蛮荒之地，我的新家园。美丽迷人，希望盎然！

Text: I'm tired of the musty weather and rigid thinking back home. I need a change.
NewTranslation: 厌倦了腐朽的空气，我决心返乡。我需要，一场变革……

Text: I was appointed Governor of this island, not that anyone else wanted the job anyway.
NewTranslation: 我被任命为这个小岛的总督，一个倒给钱都没人要的职位。

Text: Governor, I understand you bear a grudge against the governor of Cayo de Fortuna and Bao-bao. This calls for a little competition, my good fellow.
NewTranslation: 总督，我知道您对财富之键岛和宝宝岛的统治者怀恨在心。勇敢地上吧，我的好伙伴。

Text:
I would suggest you draw the attention of His Majesty by governing your colony well. You will thus be able to curry favor in the court and deem your rival incompetent. 

One stone, two birds - you will ruin his life and his reputation. But beware if your rival gains independence - he will be out of your reach.

<_objective> Export a combined total of <amount> resources
<_reward> Win the mission
<_timelimit> You have <timelimit_main> years before the other colony becomes independent
NewTranslation:
我建议您将殖民地治理得井井有条从而吸引陛下的眼球。您因此能够巴结朝廷，并且让您的对手无能为力。
一石两鸟-您会毁了他们的生活和名声。但是注意了，如果他们独立的话，将不再受您影响。

<_objective>总计出口<amount>的资源
<_reward>赢得任务
<_timelimit>在别的殖民度独立前，您还有<timelimit_main>年

Text: Herr Presidente, I'm afraid my calculations proved correct. The events re-arranged themselves so that time may continue its pre-determined course.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，恐怕我的计算是正确的，时间的浪潮不可阻挡。

Text:
You did astounding job trying to impede the progress of your other self. Yet it seems that that even slightly different, this timeline resulted in the same pattern of events. Kane managed to earn the independence of the other colony and his plan continues unabated.

My intuition tells me that you have to keep up trying! I just ask you to be patient until I find which the pattern-breaking points that will change the universe are.
NewTranslation:
为了阻止另一个“您”的前进步伐，您已经做出了惊人的努力。然而，即使已经出现了些许的改变，但这里的时间轴还是慢慢走向了和原来同样的结局。凯恩的殖民地还是赢得了独立，他的计划仍然不可阻挡。

我的直觉告诉我，您得继续努力！我只请求您要有耐心，我肯定会找到突破这个空间、改变时间轴的突破点的。

Text: Great jumping llamas, Presidente! Oh, I mean Governor! A shipment of gold has arrived!
NewTranslation: 一大早羊驼就在欢跳啊，总统先生！哦，我是说，总督大人！一批黄金已经靠岸了！

Text:
The pirates came during the night with boats full of dough and brought back a portion of the gold we paid them as ransom for the Prince. 

They are still pirates and after discounting their wages, the cost of the supplies, rum and wenches they spent on the way here, we are getting only a small portion of the money, but it's better than nothing!

<_effect> You receive $<text_param1>
NewTranslation:
海盗满载着我们付给他们作为王子的赎金的金钱与黄金在夜晚来了。
他们在计算了工资、物资和朗姆酒之后，我们只得到一点现金，但是这总比没有好！

<_effect>您收到$<text_param1>

Text: Oh Presidente, I forgot how slow these Colonial ships are! Exporting goods will take forever!
NewTranslation: 总统！我忘了这些殖民船到底有多慢！但是出口恒久远，一船到永远！

Text:
I wish we had one our old modern super-freighters! But we can always compensate quality with quantity! I even heard that some landless colonists from Europe know about our fast progress and will settle in Tropico if there are ships to carry them here.

<_objective> Have <amount> Docks
<_reward> <reward> illiterate colonists
NewTranslation:
我希望我们有一个旧时期的超级大船！但是我们可以用数量填补质量！我甚至听说只要我们派船去接那些在欧洲无家可归的殖民者，他们肯定乐意过来！

<_objective>拥有<amount>码头
<_reward><reward>文盲移民

Text: I remembered that time we really wanted to drain some brains here to Tropico! It was so depressing when we failed!
NewTranslation: 我记得曾经我们真想把一些人才带到海岛上去！但可惜的是我们失败了！

Text:
Now that I think about it, is there a chance that we actually stole those people from ourselves?

Jumping llamas, Presidente, I am not even sure which grammar tense to use any more!

<_objective> Have <amount> Mansions
<_reward> <reward> Managers
NewTranslation:
现在我想想，这不就是把那些家伙偷偷带走的好机会么？
羊驼跳啊，总统先生，我连说都不会话了？！

<_objective>拥有<amount>豪宅
<_reward><reward>督导

Text: The King is very excited about your rivalry with Cayo de Fortuna and Bao-bao. He fancies the idea of pitting his two best governors against each other to break the monotony of life at court.
NewTranslation: 国王非常期待您与财富之键岛和宝宝岛的竞争。他想让两个执政者互相竞争来打破王庭中平淡的日子。

Text:
At first he wanted to organize a gladiatorial fight to the death between the two of you, but I talked him out of it.

I told him that if he allows you to impose economic sanctions on your rival this will make the fight much more epic. Because of your excellent performance in the past, he grants the option of first strike to you:
NewTranslation:
期初他想准备一场你们之间的生死决斗，但是我劝他不要这样。
我告诉他，如果他可以允许您对您的对手施加经济制裁，这将使战斗更有趣。鉴于您过去优秀的表现，国王为您的第一波打击准备了以下选择:

Text: Increase the export quota of your rival
NewTranslation: 增加您对手的出口配额

Text: Increase the taxes of your rival
It seems that your rival has some crafty and rather undesirable allies. A man going by the name of Leon Kane used his influence to pull him out of the misery.
NewTranslation: 看来您的对手有一些不受欢迎而且狡猾的盟友。一个名叫利昂·凯恩的家伙用他的影响力，把您的对手拽出痛苦的泥沼。

Text:
The King was talked into reducing the penalty to a petty sum of money in the name of this nonsense called "healthy competition". 

Yet His Majesty is very interested in the development of the rivalry and hopes that soon one of you two will hang on the rope for incompetence!

<_effect> Mandate increased by <text_param1> months
NewTranslation:
国王被说服降低小额罚款，这个无意义的名字叫做“良性竞争”。
然而陛下并不对竞争的竞争发展感兴趣并且陛下希望因为你们两个人的无能把你们吊死！

<_effect>任期将延长<text_param1>个月

Text: It seems that your rival has some crafty and rather dodgy allies. A man going by the name of Leon Kane used his influence to pull him out of the misery.
NewTranslation: 看来您的对手有一些不受欢迎而且狡猾的盟友。一个名叫利昂·凯恩的家伙用他的影响力，把您的对手拽出痛苦的泥沼。

Text:
The King was talked into reducing the penalty to a petty sum of money in the name of this nonsense called "healthy competition". 

Yet His Majesty is very interested in the development of the rivalry and hopes that soon one of you two will hang on the rope for incompetence!

<_effect> Mandate increased by <text_param1> months
NewTranslation:
国王被一堆什么“良性竞争”的废话说服了，减少了处罚的罚金。
然而，国王陛下对你们之间的争斗进展仍然很感兴趣，他希望你们中的一人很快就因为无能而被吊死！

<_effect>任务延长了<text_param1>月

Text: His Majesty is bored with the monotony of your rivalry with Cayo de Fortuna and Bao-bao. He thinks that it is time to start a few fires, so to say.
NewTranslation: 陛下已经厌倦了财富之键岛和宝宝岛的竞争，他已经准备开始谋划另一场阴谋了。

Text: To steer the things up he commissioned the Royal Navy Frigate "Misappropriate" to your orders for a military strike over your rival's colony. His Majesty hopes that at least this time some people will die.
NewTranslation: 为了使这件事走上正轨，他委托皇家海军护卫舰“挪用”军事打击您对手的殖民地。陛下希望，至少这一次有些人会死。

Text: Send the Frigate to sink some rival ships
NewTranslation: 派遣一些护卫舰击沉对手的船只

Text: Order a bombardment over the enemy's island
The mysterious Leon Kane met with the King himself! He bet his life on the toss of a coin and won!
NewTranslation: 神秘的里昂·凯恩会见了国王本人，他用一枚硬币赌自己的一辈子。

Text:
It's needless to say that His Majesty was so impressed that he allowed Kane to donate to the Royal Navy Retirement Fund and now the frigate is heading back to Europe. 

Even though His Majesty was very annoyed, he had to keep the word of a sovereign. He told me that you amuse him and you have his gracious applauds.

<_effect> Mandate increased by <text_param1> months
NewTranslation:
不用说，陛下对凯恩皇对家海军的捐款印象深刻，现在护卫舰回到欧洲。

即使陛下非常恼火，他必须保持自己高尚的地位。他告诉我，您逗他，您获得了陛下的赞同

<_effect>任期将延长<text_param1>个月

Text: The mysterious Leon Kane met with the King himself! He bet his life on the toss of a coin and won!
NewTranslation: 神秘的里昂·凯恩会见了国王本人，他用一枚硬币赌自己的一辈子。

Text:
It's needless to say that His Majesty was so impressed that he allowed Kane to donate to the Royal Navy Retirement Fund and now the frigate is heading back to Europe. 

Even though His Majesty was very annoyed he had to keep the word of a sovereign. He told me that you amuse him and you have his gracious applauds.

<_effect> Mandate increased by <text_param1> months
NewTranslation:
不用说，陛下对凯恩皇对家海军的捐款印象深刻，现在护卫舰回到欧洲。

即使陛下非常恼火，他必须保持自己高尚的地位。他告诉我，您逗他，您获得了陛下的赞同

<_effect>任期将延长<text_param1>个月

Text: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
Presidente, your idea is brilliant! Making money by exploiting our knowledge of the future - I never would have thought of that.
NewTranslation: 之时，您的想法还真聪明！未来可以通过利用我们的知识来赚钱-我从未想过这个。

Text:
With our knowledge of history we should be able to make some serious dough and turn Tropico into a superpower that rivals the Order.

I will mark opportunities for large profits as their time approaches. Resolve these side tasks to rake in even more profits.

<_objective> Have $<amount> in your Treasury
<_reward> Win the mission
NewTranslation:
历史知识就是金钱，将海岛变成一个超级大国，争夺对手的订单。
我们将会赚大钱。解决这些任务赚取更多的利润。

<_objective>拥有$<amount>在您的国库
<_reward>获得任务

Text: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire
Congratulations, Presidente! We are now rich! Tropicans now have millions of reasons to celebrate and praise your name.
NewTranslation: 祝贺您，总统！我们现在发财了！海岛居民现在有成千上万的理由庆祝和赞美您的美名。谁想成为百万富翁

Text: With these funds we are sure to become the number one country in the Caribbean and even the world.
NewTranslation: 随着这些金钱我们肯定会在加勒比海，甚至世界成为一个国家。

Text: Presidente, we can make a lot of money by playing the stock market. Since we already know what's going to happen, there's absolutely no risk at all.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们可以在股票市场赚很多钱。既然我们已经知道会发生什么，绝对没有风险。

Text:
I have setup a special account that you can deposit money into. We'll use it to buy and sell stocks on the market. We'll use our knowledge of history to make the right moves at the right time. The end result is that you'll gain interest on the money in the account.

The investment account will also allow you to evade all of those corrupt Tropican officials that keep stealing our money.

<_effect> Use the investments account to multiply your money over time and avoid Corruption
NewTranslation:
我有设置一个专用投资帐户，您可以存款资金投入。我们将使用它来市场上买卖股票。根据历史使得我们在正确的时间做出正确的举动。最终的结果是，您将会获得含有利息的帐户。

投资账户也会使海岛贪官不断偷我们的钱。

<_effect>使您的投资账户资金增加，同时避免腐败

Text:
Money in the investments account accumulates interest each month. You can deposit or withdraw money from the account freely.

Current Balance: $<c_Stash>
Interest Rate: <c_Interest>%
NewTranslation:
投资账户每个月累积利息。您可以从帐户自由存款或取款。

当前余额:$<c_Stash>
利率:<c_Interest>%

Text: There are no funds in the investments account.
I know how we'll get rich - meat! The coming wars and famines will drive the price up. All we have to do is prove that our animals are healthy.
NewTranslation: 我知道我们会丰富-肉！未来战争和饥荒将推动价格上涨。所有我们要做的就是证明动物是健康的。

Text:
We can sign very profitable trade agreements for our meat exports if we can prove the quality of our products. We'll need a herd of doctors to guarantee the health of our other herds.

<_objective> Have <amount> Doctors
<_reward> Extremely profitable Meat trade routes and $<reward> Treasury
NewTranslation:
如果我们能证明我们的肉食品物美价廉，我们也许能够签一个利益丰厚的出口肉类的贸易协议。我们需要一群兽医保证动物的健康。

<_objective>拥有<amount>医生
<_reward>有利可图的贸易路线以及$<reward>财政厅收入

Text: War is good for business, Presidente! We know that the Axis powers will need steel. We only have to convince them to buy from us.
NewTranslation: 战争是好的，总统！我们知道，轴心国需要钢。我们只需要说服他们购买。

Text:
We both know that the Axis will lose the war anyway, Presidente. It's not like anything bad will happen if we sell them some quality Tropican steel. 

However, we have to prove that Tropico's trade fleet can handle the volume needed by the Axis.

<_objective> Have <amount> Docks
<_reward> Extremely profitable Steel trade route and $<reward> Treasury
NewTranslation:
我们都知道，轴心国会输掉那场战争，总统。它不像会发生任何不好的事情如果我们卖一些优质的海岛钢。

我们必须证明海岛可以为轴心国提供充足的钢材！

<_objective>拥有<amount>码头
<_reward>有利可图的钢铁贸易路线$<reward>财政部收入

Text: A decade of lavish parties and crazy people is approaching. And you know what goes well with parties - jewelry.
NewTranslation: 为了未来十年的繁华和派对，疯狂的人们正在接近。您知道什么让政党进展顺利-珠宝。

Text:
If we play our cards right we can establish Tropico as the leading jewelry exporter in the world. We just have to convince the hip people that we are as fancy as them.

<_objective> Build a new Cabaret.
<_reward> Extremely profitable Jewelry trade route and $<reward> Treasury
NewTranslation:
如果我们策略得当，我们海岛将是世界上最大的珠宝出口国。我们必须说服时髦的人喜欢那些珠宝。

<_objective>>建立一个新的酒店。
<_reward>有利可图的珠宝贸易线路和$<reward>财政部收入

Text:
Of course I mean the Hindenburg disaster. Count von Zeppelin's flying machine is going to make a lot of money. Before it explodes, that is! We should invest in the Zeppelins - they are going to make good profits for several decades. However the Count doesn't like us and doesn't want to do business with Tropico. Luckily there's a an easy solution - we can use our banks to go around Count von Zeppelin's back.

<_objective> Have <amount> Banks
<_reward> $<reward> Treasury
NewTranslation:
当然我指的是兴登堡灾难。齐柏林硬式飞艇将会赚很多钱。在爆炸之前，就是说！我们应该投资齐柏林飞艇-他们将几十年来获取不错的收益。然而伯爵不喜欢我们和海岛并不想要与我们做生意。幸运的是有一个简单的解决方案，我们花钱让齐柏林硬式飞艇回来。

<_objective>拥有<amount>个银行
<_reward>$<reward>财政部收入

Text: Congratulations, Presidente, we are now in the Zeppelin business. You know we can make even more money if we insure the Hindenburg against accidental fires.
NewTranslation: 祝贺您，总统，我们正在经营飞艇生意。您知道我们可以赚更多的钱，如果我们可以远离飞艇灾难的话。

Text: I know, I know, it was a tragic event. I'm just saying we can make money out of it. In the end it is up to you, Presidente.
NewTranslation: 我知道，我知道，这是一个悲剧性的事。我只是说我们可以赚钱。这取决于您，总统。
现在卖出股票(+$<choice_param1>财政部收入)

Text: Wait for stocks to rise (+$<choice_param2> Treasury in 1 year time)
NewTranslation: 等待股票上升(+$<choice_param2>财政部收入在一年内)
确保兴登堡(+$<choice_param3>财政部收入在1937年)

Text: You've received $<param1> from the sale of Zeppelin stocks
NewTranslation: 您将从飞艇的门票收入中收到$<param1>

Text: You've collected $<param1> from the Hindenburg insurance
NewTranslation: 您将从兴登堡保险收集$<param1>

Text: Presidente, it's time for the Swiss lottery again! Do you remember what the numbers were? I'm sure I had them written down somewhere...
NewTranslation: 总统，是时候买瑞士彩票了！您还记得什么数字吗？我肯定让他们写下来……

Text:
Listen carefully, Presidente, I know a trick to jog you memory. Now close your eyes! Are they closed? Close them! Now relax and try to visualize the numbers in your mind. I think the first one was 1 or maybe a 2 or a 0.

Ok, that didn't work, but I'm sure it was one of these three sets:
NewTranslation:
仔细听，总统，我知道如何让您的钱跑起来。现在闭上您的眼睛！快了？接近他们！现在放松，试着想象的数字在您的头脑中。我认为第一个是1或者2或者0。

好吧，不奏效，但我相信这是其中三组中一的个:

Text: Unfortunately you didn't win the Swiss Lottery
NewTranslation: 不幸的是您的瑞士彩票没中奖

Text: Unfortunately you didn't win the Swiss Lottery
NewTranslation: 不幸的是您的瑞士彩票没中奖

Text: Congratulations, Presidente! You won the Swiss Lottery.
NewTranslation: 祝贺您，总统！您瑞士彩票中奖了。

Text: The Swiss have sent a check for $<text_param1>, which I added to our Treasury. Come to think of it $<text_param1> now is at least two or even three million in future money. Too bad we are still in the past.
NewTranslation: 瑞士已经发来一张支票$<text_param1>，我将把钱放到我们的财政部。来想想$<text_param1>吧，未来至少有两三百万。太糟糕了，我们仍在过去。

Text: There are no funds in the investments account.
Good news, Presidente! The Great Depression is just around the corner and we're going to make heaps of money out of it.
NewTranslation: 好消息，总统！大萧条时期就在眼前，我们要赚很多钱。

Text:
I just remembered that the Black Tuesday will be upon us in a couple of years. We can use our investments account to short companies that will die during the Wall Street Crash in 1929. We'll make a ton of money just as long as we pull our investments on time.

<_effect> The interest rate of the investments account has been doubled for 2 years
NewTranslation:
我只是记得黑色星期二将在几年内接近我们我们。我们的投资账户的公司将会死在1929年的华尔街崩盘事件中。我们将在那是赚成吨的毛爷爷。

<_effect>投资账户的利率已经2年翻一番

Text: Great galloping toucans, Presidente! I almost forgot that the Great Depression is about to hit us.
NewTranslation: 伟大的巨嘴鸟，总统！我差点忘了，大萧条即将袭击我们。

Text:
I've withdrawn all of our money from the investments account and stored them securely in my basement. In a couple of years the situation will start to turn around and we can start investing again.

<_effect> Investments account will be unavailable for 2 years
NewTranslation:
我已经把我们的投资账户取空了，他们安全地存储在我的地下室。在几年的情况下将开始扭转，我们可以重新开始投资。

<_effect>2年内投资账户将不可用

Text: As per your orders, we've began the military preparations for our invasion of Cayo de Fortuna. We commence operation "T-Day" as soon as all the required troops have joined the invasion force.
NewTranslation: 根据您的命令，我们开始了军事准备入侵财富之键。我们尽快开始操作“T-Day”所需的所有部队已经加整装待发。

Text:
Soldiers will leave the island and join the invasion force each year automatically, so we will need a steady population influx of raw recruits to take their places. For the sake of the future, I hope your plan works, Presidente!

<_objective> Assemble the invasion force. Half of our soldiers and tanks will join the invasion force each year.
NewTranslation:
士兵将离开这个岛，每年自动涌入入侵力量，所以我们需要一个稳定的人口招募新兵来接替他们的职位。为了未来，我希望您的计划可行，总统！

<_objective>组建武装力量，每年一半的士兵和坦克都会加入入侵行动。

Text: How Do You Like Them Bananas?

That devious mastermind Leon Kane managed to intercept and replace our invasion force's orders. They invaded Poland instead! Can you believe those Polish people peel the bananas from the blossom end instead of the stem end?
NewTranslation: 狡猾的督导里昂·凯恩设法入侵替换我们为了守护自己的家园而下的订单。他们入侵波兰！您能相信那些波兰人从头剥香蕉皮而不是从底下剥？

Text: Anyway, the international community was outraged and we were forced to return Poland and cancel all future invasion plans. You'll have to think of a new way to stop the Order and change the future...
NewTranslation: 不管怎么说，国际社会非常愤怒，我们被迫返回波兰并且取消所有未来的入侵计划。您必须想办法阻止新秩序并且改变未来……

Text: <param1> soldiers and <param2> tanks have joined the invasion force
NewTranslation: 拥有<param1>士兵和<param2>坦克加入未来的战争

Text: With the World Wars raging on, the army needs new facilities. Remember, all military buildings contribute additional troops to the invasion force each year. Cayo de Fortuna's days are numbered!
NewTranslation: 随着世界大战的爆发，军队需要新的设施。记住，所有的军事建筑每年贡献额外的军队在新的大战中。财富之键的日子时日无多！

Text:
<_objective> Build <amount> new military buildings
<_reward> <reward> people will immigrate to your island
NewTranslation:
<_objective>建立<amount>个新的军事基地
<_reward><reward>更多的移民

Text: Staging an invasion of this scope requires more than just troops, Presidente. Naval logistics will be crucial for the success of operation "T-Day".
NewTranslation: 策划这个入侵需要更多的军队，总统。操作“T-Day”的成功，海军后勤学将是至关重要。

Text:
<_objective> Have <amount> Docks
<_reward> Invasion preparations will progress; <reward> people will immigrate to your island
NewTranslation:
<_objective>有用<amount>码头
<_reward>准备入侵；<reward>更多的海岛移民

Text: Good news, Presidente! We've managed to secure a contract for cheap tanks with a certain Italian tank manufacturer that we know from the previous timeline.
NewTranslation: 好消息，总统！我们设法弄到从意大利坦克商弄到一些廉价坦克，我们从时间轴就知道了。

Text:
If your ex-mentor, Leon Kane and his she-llama of an apprentice, hope to get their dirty paws on this sweet deal, they'll be sorely disappointed. The top-of-the-line 3000-series Italian tanks are ours at a discount!

<_effect> Army bases price halved for the next two years.
NewTranslation:
如果您的前倒是里昂·凯恩还有他的she-llama学徒希望用他们肮脏的爪子的得到糖果交易的话，他们会非常失望。意大利顶级3000系列坦克我们打折了！

<_effect>未来两年军事基地的价格减半。

Text: Some Men Just Want To Watch It Burn
NewTranslation: 有些人只是想看着它燃烧

Text: Fire, fire! Leon Kane is using every possible means to slow us down. This time his agents have set several of our buildings on fire. All this just because of that little invasion force we plan on sending his way!
NewTranslation: 火，火！里昂·凯恩会使用所有可能的手段。这一次他的几个代理商的建筑着火了。这一切都是我们的几个小的入侵计划！

Text: I recommend upgrading our Police Stations with fire brigades so we are better prepared to deal with arson attacks against our island.
NewTranslation: 我建议您升级我们的警察局和消防队所以我们能更好的应对纵火犯。

Text: Two of our buildings have been blown up, Presidente. I am sure saboteurs from Cayo de Fortuna are behind this.
NewTranslation: 我们的两个建筑被炸毁，总统。我相信是财富之键指使的。

Text:
Our current police force is clearly unable to identify the perpetrators. We need to tighten the internal security and prevent the saboteurs from destroying more buildings.

<_objective> Build a new Police Station
<_reward> No more buildings will be bombed
NewTranslation:
我们当前警察显然是无法识别罪犯的。我们需要加强内部安全，防止破坏者破坏更多的楼房。

<_objective>建立一个新警察局
<_reward>不再有更多的大楼被炸毁

Text: Our police has caught the bomber from Cayo de Fortuna
NewTranslation: 我们的警察从财富之键手里抓住了投弹手

Text: Presidente! Living in a past I already experienced once makes me feel smart and ready for anything you command! It is payback time for Leon Kane!
NewTranslation: 总统，从历史来看我已经迫不及待的等您的命令了。是时候让里昂·凯恩还债了。

Text:
Mr. Kane may think he will escape judgment by faking his own death and fleeing to another country, but he counts his chicken before they hatch! You surely remember that one in every hundred tourists is a cold-blooded killer. With enough tourists we can select the best killers, brainwash them and plant them as sleeper agents in every country around the world.

<_objective> Have <amount> tourists visit to select the best sleeper agents
<_reward> Win the mission
<_timelimit> <text_param> years
NewTranslation:
凯恩先生可能会认为他会通过伪装自己死了来逃跑到另一个国家，先有鸡才有蛋！您一定记住，每名游客都是一个冷血的杀手。我们拥有足够的游客的话，我们可以派一些间谍埋伏在各个国家之中。

<_objective>拥有<amount>个游客以便我们选择最好的间谍
<_reward>赢得任务
<_timelimit><text_param>个年

Text: Comrade Presidente! A man is not complete until he has found his connection to untamed nature!
NewTranslation: 总统同志！一个男人并不完整，除非他找到了自己的野性！

Text:
Our sleeper agents must be able to survive the wildest places on Earth. Pit the sleeper agents against our most vicious beasts - tapirs, llamas and sloths. The starving animals will be fed and the agents who survive will be proven by evolution itself

<_objective> Have a National Park
<_reward> <reward> Tourism Rating and <text_param> standing with the Environmentalists
NewTranslation:
我们的间谍必须能够在地球上最疯狂的地方。间谍正对抗着我们最恶毒的野兽-貘，骆驼和树懒。饥饿的动物将向美联储和代理商将证明生存进化的本身

<_objective>拥有一个国家公园
<_reward><reward>旅游评级和<text_param>环保人士

Text: Completed the Natural Selection task to build a National Park
NewTranslation: 完成了自然选择任务来构建一个国家公园

Text: Mr. President, have you noticed the way that little tramp Adrianna Diaz constantly butters up that Leon Kane?
NewTranslation: 总统您注意到流浪汉阿德里安娜·迪亚兹给里昂·凯恩抹黄油了么。

Text:
Personally I think that she looks like a torn rag, but most of the men are foolish enough to succumb to her charms. I fear that she may use untrained sleeper agents to feed us falsified information - and this can ruin a carefully-woven plan!

The Cabarets seem a nice cover-up for our anti-seduction program. Test our agents as much as their psyche allows and they will be ready to face her.

<_objective> Have <amount> Cabarets
<_reward> <reward> Tourism Rating
NewTranslation:
我个人认为，她看起来像一个破抹布，但大多数人蠢到屈服于她的魅力。我担心她可能使用间谍来篡改我们的信息的信息，这可以毁掉一个织物计划！

咖啡馆看起来能隐藏我们的抵制诱惑计划，测试我们代理人的灵魂一边能面对她。

<_objective>拥有<amount>咖啡馆
<_reward><reward>旅游评级

Text: Comrade Presidente, I must confess that I watched and enjoyed some capitalist super-agent movies. They made me think about out sleeper agent program.
NewTranslation: 总统同志，我必须承认，我看到和享受一些伟大的资本家的电影。他们让我想起了我们的卧计划。

Text:
All the cool super-agents are able to drop from a super-sonic missile with a parachute on top of another super-sonic missile and disarm it. 

If we want to kill the most dangerous man in the world, our sleeper agents must be as good as that and even better! I propose we put them to intensive vertical insertion training.

<_objective> Have <amount> Hang Gliding Clubs
<_reward> <reward> Tourism Rating
NewTranslation:
我们的代理人用一颗导弹击毁了敌人的另一颗导弹。

如果我们想杀了世界上最危险的人的话，我们必须密集安插间谍。

<_objective>拥有<amount>个悬挂式滑翔运动俱乐部
<_reward><reward>旅游评级

Text: Mister President, our sleeper agents are soft. I don't think many of them have the guts to fire an entire company.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们的间谍是无能的。我不认为他们有胆量烧了整个公司。

Text:
The fastest method to toughen them up is to pit them against the most dangerous individuals the world knows - the evil clowns. Those of them who survive the repeated encounters with the vicious clowns will have the guts to do anything.

<_objective> Have a Circus
<_reward> <reward> Tourism Rating
NewTranslation:
强化他们的最快的方法是人与人之间的斗争-邪恶的小丑。那些生存的反复遇到邪恶的小丑将有勇气去做任何事情。

<_objective>拥有一个马戏团
<_reward><reward>旅游评级

Text: Presidente, the first reports from our sleeper agents are flowing in!
NewTranslation: 总统，第一个报告是，我们的间谍已经成功入侵了

Text:
One of our agents works as a phone company administrator who listens to random phone calls while having nothing better to do. He accidentally came across intriguing conversation that confirmed the caller was no other but Leon Kane.

It appears that Mr. Kane has a secret meeting with the Order soon, but we still don't know where.
NewTranslation:
我们的一个代理商是电话管理员，他随机听一些电话，他没有什么更好的事情可做。他有时不小心碰到有趣的谈话，确认有没有里昂·凯恩。

看来凯恩先生的秘密会议要开了，但是我们不知道在哪儿开。

Text: Presidente, we have another report from one of our sleeper agents.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们已经从一个间谍那里得到了一份报告。

Text:
She's working in a fashion shop and she spotted Adrianna Diaz buying some warm lingerie. 

The she-llama Diaz is always around Leon Kane - maybe they are going to meet the Order in some cold place?
NewTranslation:
她的工作在一个时尚店，她发现阿德里安娜·迪亚兹买了一些内衣。

she-llama 迪亚兹总是在里昂·凯恩附近。也许他们一直在寒冷的地方？

Text: Presidente, we finally know where the secret meeting will take place - it will be in Anadyr, the capital of Chukotka!
NewTranslation: 总统，我们终于知道秘密会议--它将在Anadyr举办，楚科奇的首都！

Text:
The sleeper agent who reported this works in the biggest hotel in Anadyr. He cannot recall anyone staying there ever, but someone called the reception to ask for the rates at the hotel! 

All the clues come together - now we only have to know the exact date!
NewTranslation:
特工潜伏在Anadyr大酒店。他不记得有人呆在那里，但是有人叫接待给酒店评级！

线索汇集了，我们知道确切的日期了！

Text: Presidente, it's payback time! I waited an eternity for this moment, but we must be careful - catching the most dangerous mastermind flat-footed is a real challenge!
NewTranslation: 总统，该回报了！我等待着这一刻的永恒，但我们必须小心-抓住主谋才是一个真正的挑战

Text: Each of these three top-secret files contains a plan so deadly that merely reading them is a risk itself! You also have to choose a member of your dynasty to carry out the operation - I don't want to get shot if everything fails!
NewTranslation: 这三个绝密文件包含一个计划，这是如此致命，以至于阅读他们是危险的。您也必须选择一个王朝的成员进行操作，如果我不想让一切失败！

Text: "Cold Reception": Send Kane naked pictures of Penultimo
NewTranslation: “冷接待”:贝奴迪莫发送裸体画给凯恩

Text: "Cruel Nature": Hide a polar bear in the hotel room closet
NewTranslation: “残酷的大自然”:把北极熊藏在酒店房间衣柜里

Text: "Laughing Jester": Plant exploding utensils on the gala-dinner
NewTranslation: “笑杰斯特”:在节日聚会的时候使用爆照餐具

Text: Killed Leon Kane with naked pictures of Penultimo!
NewTranslation: 里昂·凯恩被贝奴帝莫的裸照杀了！

Text: Killed Leon Kane by hounding a bear on him!
NewTranslation: 里昂·凯恩被一只熊吃了！

Text: Blasted Leon Kane with explosive spoon!
NewTranslation: 诅咒里昂·凯恩的勺子爆炸了

Text: Is that the best you can do? Send filthy assassins to murder the finest mind of the Order, a visionary who wanted the best for humanity? You are a coward, Presidente, and I will make you pay!
NewTranslation: 那是您能做的最好的事了吗？命令此刻暗杀警察，一个有远见的人，一个最好的人？您是个胆小鬼，之时，我会让您付出代价！

Text:
You may have killed the man, but you cannot kill his vision. Like a phoenix, humanity shall rise from the ashes, renewed and better. And you will not doom it to continue its decadent existence! 

I once promised Leon that if something happens to him I will see his plan complete!

Now I promise you, Presidente, I will give you Hell - and only when you are a broken, sobbing wretch I may allow you to die!
NewTranslation:
您能杀死一人，但是您不能杀死他的幻想。就像一个凤凰，人类应该凤凰云涅，有更好的未来。末日就不会存在！

我曾经承诺里昂，如果他发生了什么事情，我将看到他的计划完成了！

现在我向您保证，总统，我将给您地狱，您要完了，我保证您会死！

Text: Presidente, Miss Diaz is working closely with the Soviet government now and this calls for an earlier demise of the USSR. If we do not change the history, she will bring Day Zero about before Gorbatchev takes power!
NewTranslation: 总统，迪亚兹小姐与苏联政府密切合作，前苏联要完了。如果我们不改变历史，她将在亚历克斯之前迎来报到日

Text:
Luckily your book "Memoirs from the Future" contains all the clues we need! If we make oil production in the USSR unfeasible, the Soviet government will lose their only income of hard currency and will step down ahead of its time.

Just export enough Oil at <text_param> its market price!

<_objective> Export <amount> Oil barrels at <text_param> price
<_reward> Bring down the Soviet economy
NewTranslation:
幸运的是您的书“未来回忆录”包含了所有我们需要的线索！如果我们使得石油产量在苏联不可行的话，苏联政府将失去他们唯一的硬通货并且提前下台。

出口足够的是由<text_param>市场价！

<_objective>以<text_param>的价格出口<amount>石油
<_reward>降低苏联经济

Text: Presidente, the failing Soviet economy is creating domestic dissent, yet the old guard is still in power. If the KGB officers and Politburo can shelter their money somehow, they will step down!
NewTranslation: 总统，失败的苏联经济导致了内货争议，然而保守派仍然掌权。如果苏联长官和政治局可以庇护他们的钱，他们会下台！

Text:
However, no bank will accept this money out of fear of KGB. That is why we must establish "Dirty Party Money" Bank Ltd. in Switzerland.

Unfortunately, the Swiss government does not grant  banking licenses to foreigners. We must barter enough Oil for it to make Switzerland largest oil trader in Europe.

<_objective> Export <amount> Oil barrels at <text_param> price
<_reward> Acquire license for "Dirty Party Money" Bank Ltd.
NewTranslation:
然而，处于恐惧没有一家银行将接受这笔苏维埃的钱。这就是为什么我们必须建立“脏钱”在瑞士银行公司。

不幸的是，瑞士政府不把银行许可证给外国人。我们必须以物易物足够的石油，在欧洲瑞士成为最大石油交易商。

<_objective>以<text_param>的价格出口<amount>石油
<_reward>获得脏钱账户许可证

Text: Now that there is dissent in the USSR and the old guard can leave the scene peacefully, we need to end the delusional utopia called "Communism".
NewTranslation: 现在，和苏联有异议，保守派可以和平地离开现场，我们需要结束“共产主义”。

Text:
The Soviets believe that Communism is not only better than Capitalism but also more efficient. We can prove them wrong through a generous gift of Oil from the Tropican people to the Soviet people. 
Cheap capitalist Tropican Oil will kill expensive communist Soviet Oil. Opposition will erupt like wildfire and Gorbatchev will come to power as a party reformer. The rest, as they say, is, or will be, history!

<_objective> Export <amount> Oil barrels at <text_param> price
<_reward> Watch the USSR crumble from within.
NewTranslation:
苏联相信共产主义是比资本主义还有效率。我们石油海岛人可以通过慷慨的礼物来证明他们错了，苏联人。
廉价资本主义海岛石油会杀了昂贵的共产主义苏联石油。反对将像野火一样爆发，Gorbatchev将作为一个政党执政的改革者。除此之外，正如他们所说，或将成为历史！

<_objective>以<text_param>的价格出口<amount>石油
<_reward>从内部看苏联崩溃。

Text: Ironic, Presidente, isn't it? You thwart my plans for nuclear war by bringing down the USSR, and the fall of the Soviet empire allowed me to buy an ICBM at a ridiculously low price!
NewTranslation: 总统，这是讽刺不是吗？您阻止让苏联倒台的核计划，苏联的坠落使得我们可以以极低的价格购买洲际导弹！

Text:
I have never dreamed to be in control of a nuclear ICBM and yet here it is - direct result of your actions!

Actions always have consequences; you may believe you can control the outcome, yet the result of one's actions are always beyond anyone's plans and control. 

That is why I fired the ICBM to your pathetic little Tropico, actually - to make a point. I believe it will have a strong impression on you.
NewTranslation:
我从来没有想过控制核洲际弹道导弹，但在这里-您的行动决定您的结果！

行动总是导致后果的；您可能相信您能控制结果，但结果的行动总是超出任何人的计划和控制。

这就是为什么我向您发射洲际导弹，实际上-这一点。我相信您会对它有深刻的印象。

Text: Presidente, I have analyzed the time-space continuum and found an interesting paradox! I must leave for Bao-bao immediately to research the time machine so we can meet in our past!
NewTranslation: 总统，我已经分析了时空连续体，发现一个有趣的悖论！我必须马上让宝宝岛研究时间机器，这样我们就可以知道我们的过去！

Text:
Otherwise your past travel to the future will not be possible and the current reality will become a mere probability, and as you know, I dislike this probability stuff!

God does not play dice, to quote a clever man.

Auf wiedersehen, Presidente! I will enjoy working with your other self!
NewTranslation:
否则，您过去旅游您的未来和过去只能成为一个纯粹的概率，正如您知道的那样，我不喜欢这个概率的东西！

上帝不掷骰子，而是用一个聪明的人。

再见，总统，我想要自己享受自己的生活了！

Text: "Dear Presidente, as you know from the fact of your existence, I have already started my research into the time machine.
NewTranslation: “亲爱的总统，正如您知道您自己的存在，我已经开始研究我的时间机器。

Text:
I admit knowing in advance that I will succeed in creating this time machine is somewhat dissatisfactory; yet I am determined to preserve the current timeline where I used to know you. Your other self on Bao-bao island is dealing with the nuclear crisis from the arrival of USS "Secret Plan" and does not suspect a thing. All is well that ends well, and, frankly, you've seen the end.

Your friend in the past, present and future, 
-Dr. Zweistein"
NewTranslation:
我承认提前知道，我将成功地创建这个时间机器有点不满足，但我决心保持当前的时间表，我曾经认识您。宝宝岛以及岛上其他的其他的自己将会处理核危机，“秘密计划”号航空母舰，不怀疑一件事。一切都好，坦率的说，如您所见。

您的朋友在过去，现在和未来，
-Z因斯坦博士

Text: Sir, a flood of immigrants from the Arab peninsula is about to hit our shores. It seems like most of them paddled or even swam to our shores! Astonishing, really!
NewTranslation: 先生，大量移民从阿拉伯半岛而来。似乎他们中的大多数划船甚至游到我们的海岸！惊人，真的！

Text:
Rumor has it our oil is so cheap it basically spurs from the ground. Now, most decent folks do not believe such stupidity, but I guess it all makes sense to a lot of the Arab people. Probably because, as I have heard from reliable sources, oil there is so cheap, it basically spurs from the ground!

<_effect> <text_param1> immigrants will come with the next boat.
NewTranslation:
流言蜚语，我们的石油是如此便宜，基本上从地面就有。现在，相信如此的愚蠢，但我猜这对阿拉伯人有意义。可能是因为，我听说从可靠的来源，石油这么便宜，基本上从地面就有！

<_effect><text_param1>下一艘船将会与移民

Text: Howdy, Presidente! Not only is your oil industry lowering every energy resource price in the world, it is also fueling unforeseen world economic growth! That means one thing - global inflation!
NewTranslation: 您好，总统！不仅是您的石油行业能降低世界上每一个能源资源价格，当人也能推动世界经济增长，这是不可预见的！这意味着一件事-全球通胀

Text:
I am happy with the effect of cornering the USSR and global inflation is always good for the US, but I suspect it may hit your island hard, so I had a little chat with our big oil companies and they agreed to invest in your economy. 

<_effect> Global inflation increases buildings prices by <text_param1>%
<_effect> <text_param2> Free Oil production buildings
NewTranslation:
我满意的扭转苏联和美国全球通货膨胀总是好的，但我怀疑它可能重创您的岛，所以我我们还是投资一个石油公司吧，他们同意投资您的经济。

<_effect>全球通胀增--加建筑物价格<text_param1>%
<_effect><text_param2>个免费的石油井
苏联国家安全委员会的力量

Text: Presidente, did you think that I would simply ignore your plans to destroy the USSR? My good friends here at the KGB have charged with me with assessing Tropican military intelligence. We both know that neither term is applicable.
NewTranslation: 总统，您不认为我会简单的忽略您的摧毁苏联的计划吗？我的好朋友在苏联的情报部门改变他们的情报计划。我们都知道，这个期限是可以接受的。

Text:
I will tell you a secret. The KGB colonel in charge of defending the USSR started a covert operation to boost rebel presence on Troico. This operation is so secret that even though you now know about it, you cannot do a thing to stop it!

<_effect> KGB activity will constantly rise the rebel threat
NewTranslation:
我将告诉您一个秘密。负责保卫苏联的克格勃上校开始秘密资助海岛反对派的存在。这个操作是非常秘密的，即使您现在知道它，您也不能做一件事让它停止！

<_effect>苏联将助长反对派的活动

Text: KGB subversive activity increased the rebel threat level to <param1>
NewTranslation: 苏联国家安全委员会的破坏活动增加了反叛者的威胁等级<param1>

Text: KGB subversive activity increased the rebel threat level to <param1>
NewTranslation: 苏联国家安全委员会的破坏活动增加了反叛者的威胁等级<param1>

Text: KGB subversive activity increased the rebel threat level to <param1>
NewTranslation: 苏联国家安全委员会的破坏活动增加了反叛者的威胁等级<param1>

Text: You managed to express the Tropican dream with a single word, Presidente. Hope! Hope that our little country will unite the world and change the course of history!
NewTranslation: 您成功地用一个字表达海岛梦，总统。希望！希望我们的小国家将团结世界，改变历史的进程！

Text:
We have to impress each of the five superpowers - USA, Russia, Europe, China and Middle East. This may just change the course of history and prevent the nuclear World War 3. Beware, that crazy she-llama Diaz would not stand idly by and will probably attack us directly with all she can throw at us.

<_objective> Impress the superpowers
<_reward> Win the game
NewTranslation:
我们必须打动的五个超级大国-美国、俄罗斯、欧洲、中国和中东。这可能会改变历史的进程，防止核世界大战。当心，疯狂的she-llama迪亚兹不会袖手旁观，可能会攻击我们。

<_objective>打动超级大国
<_reward>赢得游戏

Text: You did it, Presidente! All the superpowers have rallied around us and the nuclear war is postponed indefinitely. The crazy Diaz woman has been arrested and will be tried for crimes against humanity.
NewTranslation: 您做到了，总统！所有的超级大国都聚集在我们周围，核战争无限期推迟。疯狂的迪亚兹女人被逮捕，将获反人类罪。

Text:
As you so often said, hope is the one thing that can set us free! Tropico dared hoping and managed to change history and prevent Armageddon!

Only one thing remains, to send your message of hope to each and every human being! Let's paint the moon!
NewTranslation: 就像您常说的那样，我们自由了！海岛希望并设法改变历史，防止世界末日！
只有一件事是，发送您的信息希望每一个人！让我们画月亮！

Text: Little Tropico, hoping to change the fate of world. Little Tropico, fighting for peace and prosperity in the face of Armageddon. Cute. But you know it won't work, Presidente!
NewTranslation: 小海岛，希望改变世界的命运。小海岛，为远离世界末日而争取和平。可爱。但是您知道它不会工作，总统！

Text:
Ideas can't really change the world. Great men can. Men like Leon Kane, who you brutally murdered!

Day Zero will be a reality. I will not rest until you small island is obliterated. Let the world see how you build that "Tropican Dream" of yours in the face of my commandos storming your Palace.
NewTranslation:
思想不能真正改变世界。伟人。男人喜欢里昂·凯恩，您却残忍地谋杀了他！

报到日将会变成现实。我不会休息，直到您小岛消失了。让世界看到您建立您的“海岛梦”在我突袭您的宫殿的时候。

Text: Achoo! Your lackey Penultimo sent me a bouquet! There was even a little card, saying "Better luck next time" - with three typos. Achoo! I may be allergic to pollen, but I am even more allergic to idiots!
NewTranslation: 啊嚏！您的侍从贝奴迪莫送我一束花！甚至有一个小卡片，说“下次好运”-有三个字。啊嚏！我可能对花粉过敏，但我更讨厌白痴！

Text:
I was enjoying playing cat and mouse with you until now, but this time I am going to hit you with all I have!

<_effect> Larger invasion forces will attack Tropico
NewTranslation:
我很享受和您玩猫捉老鼠直到现在，但是这一次我要打您！

<_effect>海岛将承受巨大的攻击

Text: You are struggling to find allies, right, Presidente? I recruited some allies of my own. Turns out there are quite a few influential people who don't like the world as it is and want to see it remade.
NewTranslation: 您正在努力寻找盟友，对的，总统？我招募了一些自己的盟友。原来有不少有影响力的人不喜欢这个世界，他们想看看它重塑。

Text:
Day Zero will happen and it will happen in my lifetime! It may be the last thing I ever do, but Leon Kane's death will not be in vain. And Tropico will be made an example of, the very incident that sparks the global conflict!

<_effect> Larger invasion forces will attack Tropico
NewTranslation:
报到日会发生，它会发生在我的有生之年！也许是我做的最后一件事，但是里昂·凯恩的死亡不会白费。海岛的这个例子将会引发全球冲突

<_effect>海岛将被大局军队进攻

Text: Our comrades in China will surely hear your message of hope! They know all about hope, and are even now setting up manufacturing lines to mass-produce hope and export it to the hopeless countries in the world.
NewTranslation: 我们远在中国的同志一定是听到了您的希望之声！他们了解所有的希望，所以他们正在建立生产流水线，批量生产希望，然后把希望出口到那些绝望的国家去。

Text:
Still, we have to do something really impressive to put Tropico on their radar. A population milestone will really show the progress of Tropican communism. Remember, Presidente, people need housing, work and a good life to stay in Tropico even with the war raging on.

<_objective> Reach <amount> population
<_effect> Impress China; +20 standing
NewTranslation:
不过，我们必须做一些真正令人印象深刻的事当然是海岛雷达。一个人口的里程碑将真正证明海岛人民共产主义的进步。记住，之时，人们需要住房，工作和生活留在海岛即使战争肆虐。

<_objective>人口达到<amount>
<_effect>增加中国关系；+20支持

Text: Of course I support your cause, Presidente! If a man does not have an ideal to try to live up to he becomes a mean, base, and sordid creature, no matter how successful.
NewTranslation: 我当然支持您的事业，总统！如果一个人没有理想，他将变成多么肮脏的生物，无论多么成功。

Text:
Still, it will take more than my support to convince the American citizens to rally behind your cause. Perhaps if they see more of your small but beautiful country, of your way of life, they will be more inclined to sympathize with your ideals.

<_objective> Have <amount> tourists on the island at the same time
<_reward> Impress the USA; +20 standing
NewTranslation:
不过，我们需要更多的美国群众来支持您的世界。如果他们看到更多的关于您的小而美丽的国家，您的生活方式，他们会更倾向于支持您的理想。

<_objective>同时拥有<amount>个观光客在岛上
<_reward>提升美国关系；+20支持
强大的债券和强大的精神

Text: Impressing the Russians will be a cakewalk, Mr. President. They are known to really bond over alcohol. If our rum industry can't give them hope for a better future, I don't know what can.
NewTranslation: 提升与俄罗斯的关系将是一件轻而易举的事，总统先生。他们知道他们欠下了酒债。如果我们的朗姆酒行业不能给他们一个更美好的未来，我不知道什么才能。

Text:
As much as it pains me to say that, we must lower the price, so every Russian can afford some Tropican rum.

<_effect> Rum price lowered for the duration of this objective
<_objective> Export <amount> Rum
<_reward> Impress Russia; +20 standing
NewTranslation:
俄国佬说自己穷死了，我们必须降低价格，以让每个俄罗斯人买得起一些海岛朗姆酒。

<_effect>在此任务期间朗姆酒价格将会降低
<_objective>出口<amount>朗姆酒
<_reward>增加苏联关系；+20支持

Text: During my diplomatic visit to the Middle East I received a camel as a gift! Horrible, horrible creature. It ate my best hat!
NewTranslation: 我在访问中东期间，他们送了我骆驼当礼物！那是种可怕的生物。它吃我最好的帽子！

Text:
Anyway, the Sheiks are divided about supporting our cause. On one hand, they have no sympathies towards our enemies; on the other they think we are too weak to even hope to survive.

<_objective> Have <amount> military personnel
<_reward> Impress the Middle East; +20 standing
NewTranslation:
无论如何，酋长对支持我们的事业。一方面，他们对我们的敌人没有同情；另一方面他们认为我们太弱甚至没有生存的希望。

<_objective>拥有<amount>名军事人员
<_reward>中东会很高兴；+20声望

Text: The European Union is bogged down by bureaucracy. Same old, same old. Most member countries want to support our cause, but ratification will take somewhere around 103 years.
NewTranslation: 欧盟官僚主义陷入泥潭。老样子，老样子。大多数成员国希望支持我们的事业，但批准将大约103年。

Text:
The only way we can expedite matters is to be accepted as an EU member country. We are not in Europe, but that doesn't matter, they assured me that we just have to answer their membership requirements on free media and we are in.

<_objective> Have <amount> TV stations
<_reward> Impress Europe; +20 standing
NewTranslation:
我们必须成为欧盟成员。我们不是在欧洲，但这并不重要，他们向我保证，我们只需要答应他们成员的请求并且允许舆论自由。

<_objective>拥有<amount>个电视台
<_reward>给欧洲深刻印象；+20身份

Text: Some comrades from abroad have expressed their desire to join our prosperous community. We just have to bail them out of the capitalist prisons and cover their travel expenses.
NewTranslation: 我们已经从国外打听到有一些志同道合之士希望加入我们这个大团体。我们现在只需要帮助他们摆脱资本主义的荼毒，我们只要报销他们的旅费。

Text:
<_objective> Pay $<text_param>
<_reward> <reward> immigrants will arrive on the next ship
NewTranslation:
<_objective>花费$<text_param>
<_reward><reward>移民将在下一艘船时到达

Text: Welcome to your new island, my apprentice! The Order needs you to earn the US President's friendship. Your friend Penultimo could probably help. He knows how to get under a person's skin in no time!
NewTranslation: 欢迎来到新的海岛，学徒！看来你现在需要获得美国总统的友谊。您的朋友贝奴迪莫会帮助你，他知道如何马上上手。

Text:
The US President stated that no economy can prosper without independence. Make Tropico an economy powerhouse; prove him wrong and he will surely visit. Then you will have plenty of opportunities use your charisma on him. 

<_objective> Make <amount> from exports
<_reward> The US President will visit Tropico
NewTranslation:
美国总统认为没有独立就没有经济。让海岛经济繁荣，证明他错了。那么，他就会来拜访您的，那时候您将有充分的机会来展现您的才能和魅力。

<_objective>获利<amount>从出口
<_reward>美国总统将拜访海岛

Text: Governor, Tropico's economic performance is most astounding. It almost looks like you did that specifically to challenge me!
NewTranslation: 总督，海岛的经济表现真是令我震惊！我从没有想过会有这样的成绩。

Text:
Sound the horns, I am coming to your shores!

<_effect> The US President will arrive in <text_param1>
NewTranslation:
听见了吗，我来了！

<_effect>美国总统将抵达<text_param1>

Text: The fastest way to bond with someone is to drink with him! The way to the heart is through the stomach, and that is why I never come to your office without a bottle!
NewTranslation: 获得好感的方法莫过于请他喝酒了，占领他的胃，就可以占领他的心。你知道的，我每次来您的办公室，从不会忘记带上一瓶酒！

Text:
The US President is a renown gambler. Win some wagers against him, drink together insanely on the occasion and voila! He will be your best friend forever, after the headache, that is!

<_objective> Win <amount> Wagers
<_reward> Earn the friendship of the US President
NewTranslation:
美国总统是一个有名的赌徒。我们需要赢他一些赌注，在那时我们与他一起疯狂！之后，他会成为您最好的朋友的，永远！

<_objective>赢得<amount>赌注
<_reward>获得美国总统的友谊

Text: It's high time that I left for the US, buddy, but before I go, I cannot help but acknowledge the many things I learned while staying on this beautiful island as your guest of honor.
NewTranslation: 我是时候回美国了，伙计。但是走之前，我不得不说，我在海岛上学到了很多，成为这个美丽海岛的贵宾是我的幸运。

Text:
Now, my joy is greater, not only because I learned a lot, while, admittedly, wrong on many issues; not only because I did have a great time losing wager after wager after wager against you, but because I, hopefully, discovered a new friend in your esteemed self.

I shall look forward to our next meeting with the greatest of anticipation.
Always yours, truly!"

- The US President
NewTranslation:
“不可否认，我错了很多，比如在赌博上不断地输给你。但现在，我非常开心，这不仅仅取决于在这里学到的许多东西，我更希望和你做一个真诚的朋友。

期待我们下一次的会面！”

-美国总统

Text: Ok, you got my attention. Yet I bet there is no way you can export agriculture products on a large scale with all the taxation and regulation from that Crown of yours!
NewTranslation: 好吧，你成功的让我注意到了。然而，我敢打赌你没办法在大规模出口农产品时，还能得到全部的税收和荣誉！

Text:
Hell, I'll even throw in some rewards from my side! I'll get you some decent US export deals or a fancy research technology. 

<_objective> Make $<amount> profits from agriculture exports
<_reward> Win a wager; get a reward from the US
NewTranslation:
该死的，我甚至可以从我这给你一些想要的！你是想要一些美元还是一项科学技术？

<_objective>利润<amount>从农业出口获得利润
<_reward>赢得赌注，从美国获得奖励

Text: Ok, you proved me wrong, I'll give you that, buddy! Let鈥檚 drink to your success!
NewTranslation: 好吧，我错了，我会给你想要的，伙计！为你的成功干杯！

Text: Now, I believe I promised something if you got where you are. What will it be?
NewTranslation: 现在我兑现我的承诺，我相信你就在那里。那接下来会怎样？

Text: I'll get the fancy US trade deals (2 profitable trade routes)
NewTranslation: 我将获得美国贸易协定(2个有利可图的贸易路线)

Text: I can use help writing a Constitution (Constitution technology)
NewTranslation: 我可以帮助起草一份宪法法令(宪法科技)

Text: Anyone can try to grow something. Try making money out of large-scale cattle farms! Now, that's a tough smelly challenge! What do you say?
NewTranslation: 尝试种植一些东西。大规模建造养牛场来赚钱吧！这是一个艰难又混蛋的挑战，你说呢？

Text:
Let's not make this too hard, anything can count - cattle products, meat, etc. On my end I can bet one opera house or some red tape. Take it from me, you can never have enough red tape.

<_objective> Make $<amount> profits from cattle products exports
<_reward> Win a wager; get a reward from the US
NewTranslation:
我们不用太为难，牛产品，肉类等等都可以算数。结束的时候，我们将获得一个歌剧院或者一些繁琐的东西。相信我的话，你不会有那些繁琐的。

<_objective>利润$<amount>从牛产品出口获得
<_reward>赢得赌注，从美国获得奖励

Text: Well done, congratulations! Well, what do you know? I like to be proven wrong, it means I get to learn something new!
NewTranslation: 干得好，恭喜！，知道吗，我被证明是错的这更让我兴奋，这意味着我能够得到更多的东西！

Text:
What  reward will it be, buddy? Red Tape or a brand new Opera House? 

I really like the male singing, it is a thing of mine.
NewTranslation:
伙计，有什么奖励？印章还是一个新的歌剧院？

我很喜欢这个雄浑的声音，这是我个人的事。

Text: One can never go wrong with red tape (Red Tape Technology)
NewTranslation: 永远不会出错的印章(印章技术)

Text: I like male singing too! (Free Opera House)
NewTranslation: 我喜欢那个用力的声音！(免费的歌剧院)

Text: Throwing some cheap exports on the crop market is easy! Now, a solid resource-based operation is impossible in a backward economy exploited by a so-called "motherland"!
NewTranslation: 将一些廉价的农作物出口是很简单的！现在，在这一个经济落后的地方，想通过利用所谓的‘祖国’，以基础资源为经营是不可能的。

Text:
I bet there is no way Tropico can export substantial amount of raw resources! As I am absolutely certain you will lose, I can actually bet half the US Army on this, or give Tropicans free journalist courses, whatever good that may be!

<_objective> Make $<amount> profits from mining and logging exports
<_reward> Win a wager; get a reward from the US
NewTranslation:
我打赌你的海岛没有办法出口大量的原材料，我相信你绝对会失败的，我敢用一半的美国陆军或者自由记者科技来打赌，不管你做的有多好！

<_objective>利润$<amount>从采矿和伐木出口获利
<_reward>赢得赌注，从美国获得奖励

Text: Ok, man, congratulations! Well done! You continue to amaze me! Now, let's celebrate your success!
NewTranslation: 好吧，老兄，祝贺你！干得好！你再次让我吃惊！现在，让我们庆祝你的成功！

Text: You've won the wager fair and square! What do you want as a reward?
NewTranslation: 你赢了！你想要什么奖励？

Text: I will take half the US Army (Free Military Fort)
NewTranslation: 我要一半的美国陆军(免费的军事基地)

Text: Can you teach Penultimo some journalism (Paper technology)
NewTranslation: 你能教贝奴迪莫一些新闻知识吗(新闻科技)

Text: You don't really need half the US Army, pal! It actually consists of 37 volunteers at this point. That's all there is.
NewTranslation: 你真的不需要一半的美国陆军，朋友！他实际上只是37名志愿者，是的，这已经是全部了。

Text:
A study was made recently, and it showed that the US Army is insignificant in size, smaller even than the army of Bulgaria!

That is why I took the liberty to provide you with a free military fort.
NewTranslation:
最近的一项研究表明，美国陆军的规模根本无关紧要，他甚至比保加利亚的军队还要小！

这就是我为什么要擅自给你一个免费的军事基地。

Text: Sir, the Crown has decided to impose a real estate tax on Tropico. My friends at court hinted that Isla Rojo was behind the idea. I do not know how they will profit from it, but you will surely suffer!
NewTranslation: 总督，王国决定要向海岛征收房地产税。我的朋友暗示我似乎是红岛的主意。我不知道他们如何获利，但您肯定要遭殃！

Text:
The crown will annually charge Tropico $<text_param1> per every constructed building, and they will even count your palace.

<_effect> The Crown will annually charge Real Estate Tax - $<text_param1> per building
NewTranslation:
王国每个建筑每年一次收取$<text_param1>费用，这还包括您的宫殿。

<_effect>王国每年收取房地产税-$<text_param1>每个建筑

Text: The Crown deducts $<param1> real estate tax from the Treasury
NewTranslation: 王国从国库里扣除$<param1>房地产税

Text: Sir, the Crown introduced budget cuts under the "Share the Weight of the Crown" plan, which somehow lead to the increase of the real estate tax.
NewTranslation: 总督，由于‘分担王国的负担’计划，王国削减了预算，这在某种程度上导致我们房地产税的增加。

Text:
Effective immediately, the rate of taxation has been doubled to $<text_param1> per building.

<_effect> The Crown will annually charge Real Estate Tax - $<text_param1> per building
NewTranslation:
立即生效，税收翻倍，每建筑物收税$<text_param1>。

<_effect>王国每年每建筑将收取房产税$<text_param1>。

Text: The Crown deducts $<param1> real estate tax from the Treasury
NewTranslation: 王国从财政资金扣除$<param1>房地产税

Text: Sir, the Crown has once again doubled the real estate tax rate, and I know from my vast intelligence network that the governor of Island Rojo was behind this so-called "tax reform". This tip is free, since you can no longer afford my services.
NewTranslation: 总督，王国再一次把房地产税率翻了一番，从我的情报网里我了解到这个所谓的‘税收改革’幕后黑手是海岛的总督Rojo。这条提示赠送给你，因为你再也负担不起我的服务了。

Text:
If this tax was not the will of His Majesty, I would strongly suggest declaring war on Island Rojo, invading them and uniting them under your funny Tropican banner as the only possible gentleman's response! 

<_effect> The Crown will annually charge Real Estate Tax - $<text_param1> per building
NewTranslation:
如果这不是陛下的旨意，我强烈建议你向Rojo宣战，侵略他们，让他们凝聚在你的海岛旗帜下。

<_effect>王国每年每建筑收取$<text_param1>美元税收

Text: The Crown deducts $<param1> real estate tax from the Treasury
NewTranslation: 王国从财政资金扣除$<param1>房地产税

Text: It has come to the Order's attention that the favor of the Crown has shifted away from you, and this endangers your current mission. I have pulled considerable strings to find a way out of this situation.
NewTranslation: 你已经引起共济会的注意，王国的对你的支持已经开始远离。我正在尽我所能脱出这一困境。

Text:
The real estate tax is a clever way to put you off-track. I do not yet know who exactly is behind it, but this is an obstruction of the Plan which cannot be tolerated. Once I have found a possible solution I will notify you accordingly.

Remember, the Order is your only friend. Our Plan is our only future!
NewTranslation:
房地产税的确是一个让你无法发展的好方法。我还不知道到底是谁干的，当这绝对是不能容忍的，一旦我找到什么解决的办法，我会告诉你。

记住，共济会是你唯一的朋友，我们的计划既是我们唯一的未来。

Text: There is a way around the real estate tax. You, of course, will have to do your part - the Order does not want you to rely on us for everything. The Order provides the guidance, and you provide the effort.
NewTranslation: 有一个方法可以解决房地产税的问题。教团不可能完全让你依赖，你也需要做一些事情。共济会负责指引，而你，提供工作。

Text:
I have secured the palms which you must grease. However, the Crown's accountants have Tropico finances under acute observation and you will need to provide the money off-the-books. 

<_objective> Provide money from your personal stash in Switzerland to grease some palms
<_effect> Real Estate Tax will be suspended
<_hint> The "Building Permit" Edict and rewards from the Crown can increase your Swiss Bank Account
NewTranslation:
我担保有一些人你必须要贿赂。然而王国的会计对你的财政盯得很紧，你需要一些帐外资金。

<_objective>从你的瑞士银行账户中提供贿赂基金
<_effect>暂停房地产税
<_hint>建筑许可法令和国王的奖励可以增加你的瑞士银行存款

Text: Unusual Obstruction Calls For Unusual Solution
NewTranslation: 不寻常的解决办法才能解决不寻常的困难。

Text: The governor of Isla Rojo was once again successful at pulling strings against you. However,I found a way to thwart his schemes!
NewTranslation: 红岛总督又在暗地里策划了一个对你不利的事情。不管怎样，我发现了一种可以阻止他的方法。

Text:
As an informed ruler as yourself undoubtedly knows, there is rampant hunger problem in one of the provinces of the Crown. Send the population there <amount> tons of foods for free and this will earn you a favorable image with the Crown. 

I will then use my influence with the Queen and press to abolish the real estate tax once and for all! 

<_objective> Export <amount> tons of foods for free
<_reward> Abolish the Real Estate Tax
NewTranslation:
作为一个明智的统治者，必须知道统领的区域哪里发生了灾荒。给人民<amount>吨免费粮食，这将为你赢得王国的赞许和好感。

为了一劳永逸，我会利用我对女王的影响力，使其废除房产税。

<_objective>出口<amount>吨免费食物
<_reward>废除房地产税

Text: Isla Rojo troops are attacking your newly independent country! This ridiculous conflict is undesirable. Put an end to it as soon as possible!
NewTranslation: 红岛部队即将对您新的小岛进行攻击！这真是让人不开心。我们尽快结束它吧！

Text:
The Order enforced a temporarily ceasefire but your enemies from Isla Rojo will attack again in full force the moment this ceasefire ends. 

I would do what I can to delay them while you prepare your defenses. My new apprentice, Adrianna Diaz, will assist you with this task.

<_objective> Prepare for the invasion
<_timelimit> Ceasefire will hold for <text_param> years. Isla Rojo will invade after it expires
<_reward> Win the mission
NewTranslation:
他们已经暂时停火，但来自红岛的攻击随时可能破坏这片刻的安宁。

在你准备防御的这段时间，我会尽量为你拖延时间。这是我的新学生阿德里安娜·迪亚兹，她将帮助您完成这个任务。

<_objective>准备入侵
<_timelimit>停火持续<text_param>年。红岛将在之后入侵
<_reward>完成任务

Text: The Order can buy you no more time, Presidente! Just as Leon Kane foresaw, the invaders from Isla Rojo will soon attack!
NewTranslation: 共济会可以让你有更多的时间，总统，正如里昂·凯恩预见，红岛的军队很快就会前来。

Text:
I hope the defenses you prepared will prove adequate. Otherwise your failure may prove fatal for both our careers within the Order.

<_objective> Defeat the invading force
NewTranslation:
我希望你已经准备好了。否则共济会会让我们的事业彻底失败。

<_objective>击败侵略军

Text: You and Adrianna defeated the would-be conquerors! It was nice to see you getting along so nicely.
NewTranslation: 你和阿德里安娜击败了可能的胜利者！看见你们相处融洽，我真高兴。

Text:
Once again you have proven yourself as a valuable asset for the Order. 

I never doubted your success, Presidente. I see great future for both you and Adrianna.
NewTranslation:
你再次向共济会证明了自己的价值。

我从不怀疑你会成功，总统阁下。我仿佛已经看到一盒阿德里安娜的美好未来。

Text: The Order secured a deal for some top of the line 3000-series tanks designed by the best Italian engineers. This model looks promising and I am sure it will prove superior to the other armored vehicles in the field.
NewTranslation: 共济会承诺了一些由最好的意大利工程师设计的3000李烈坦克生产线。这个模型看着很有前途，我也相信在实战上，他的表现将优于其他装甲车辆。

Text:
The Order will take care of the details. only thing you have to do is supply our Italian partners with some raw materials.

<_objective> Export <amount> Logs and Planks
<_reward> Free <text_param>
NewTranslation:
细节的事可不用您管。您唯一要做的就是为我们的意大利伙计提供原材料。

<_objective>出口<amount>原木和木材
<_reward>解放<text_param>

Text: According to your newly appointed Chief of Staff, General Penultimo, there is no better way to improve the defenders' morale than sticking some flags in high places!
NewTranslation: 按照你新任命的参谋长贝奴迪莫长官的说法，相比没有比在高处树立旗帜来给守卫提高士气更好的方法了。

Text:
I am somewhat skeptical about the morale effect, but some new Guard Towers will surely prove useful against the invading force.

<_objective> Have <amount> Guard Towers
<_reward> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months
NewTranslation:
我对士气不是很有信心，但那些新的炮楼肯定会发挥一些作用。

<_objective>拥有<amount>炮楼
<_reward>推迟<text_param>月入侵

Text: Our mentor Leon Kane taught me there is no such thing as excessive force when resolving a military conflict.
NewTranslation: 我们的导师里昂·凯恩告诉我，使用超级武力解决斗争是不可取的。

Text:
A larger standing army with an emphasis on armored vehicles will certainly shake the resolve of the invaders.

<_objective> Have <amount> Army Bases
<_reward> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months
NewTranslation:
一个以装甲车为主力军的部队肯定会动摇侵略者的决心。

<_objective>拥有<amount>军事基地
<_reward>入侵推迟<text_param>月

Text: General Penultimo has hatched yet another plot to delay our enemies. His keen military intelligence has determined that we should get all of them drunk!
NewTranslation: 贝奴迪莫已经策划了一个阴谋，用以推迟敌人的进攻。他的情报已经确定，我们应该已经把他们全都灌醉了！

Text:
Frankly, I am not sure why you keep this buffoon around. You are not going to go forward with this ridiculous idea, are you?

<_objective> Export <amount> Rum
<_reward> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months
NewTranslation:
坦诚而言，我不明白你为什么让这个小丑在你身边。你不会是想用这个荒谬的想法继续下去吧？

<_objective>出口<amount>朗姆酒
<_reward>入侵推迟<text_param>月

Text: I don't like that Adrianna lady, Presidente. She is never nice to me, calls me names like "baboon" and doesn't like my plans, even when they are bound to work.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我不喜欢那个就阿德里安娜的女士。她从来不给我好脸色看，叫我的名字就好像叫‘狒狒’似得，不仅如此，她也总是不认同我的计划，即使一定要去做。

Text:
For example, I proposed to use a fisherman fleet to lay mines in our waters and she just laughed at me. 

We will do it, won't we, Presidente? Please!?

<_objective> Build <amount> Fishing Wharves
<_reward> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months
NewTranslation:
举例来说，我曾建议让渔夫舰队在我们的海域布雷，她就嘲笑我。

<_objective>建造<amount>渔场
<_reward>入侵推迟<text_param>月

Text: The Order has its contacts everywhere, Presidente. Leon Kane, our mentor, introduced me to some shady characters residing on Isla Rojo that might just help our cause. If we provide the right incentives, that is.
NewTranslation: 哪都有共济会的人，总统阁下。我们的导师里昂·凯恩给我介绍了一些红岛的班底，也许他们会对我们有用。如果我们能够给足诱惑的话。

Text:
Those individuals offered to sabotage some of the enemy ships when the invasion commences. For a price, of course.

<_objective> Pay $<_TaskPayment>
<_reward> Weaken the invasion
NewTranslation:
入侵开始的时候，这些人能够破坏敌人的船只。当然，这需要花费一些钱。

<_objective>花费$<_TaskPayment>
<_reward>入侵变弱

Text: My young apprentice, it has come to my attention that the brilliant scientist Dr. Abraham Zweistein has fled Germany and is hiding in Switzerland.
NewTranslation: 我的学生，我发现那个天才的科学家阿德里安娜·迪亚兹博士已经逃离了德国，现在正藏在瑞士。

Text:
My agents informed me that the Axis is developing its own super-weapon and desperately want him back. The Swiss, being resourceful and quick-witted people, will give him to the highest bidder.

However, the price they want is so ridiculously high that it would be cheaper to buy the whole country instead. I had always taught you to think big - this is exactly what we will do!

<_objective> Generate <amount> Swiss Bank Account to buy Switzerland 
<_reward> Win the mission
NewTranslation:
我的代理人告诉我，轴心国正在开发自己的超级武器，并迫切期待他回去。多谋机智的瑞士决定把他给予初级最高者。

但他们出的价格实在是太离谱了，那价格都已经足够购买一个小型岛国了。我总是让你多想想-这恰好是我们要做的事情了。

<_objective>瑞士银行账户有$<amount>
<_reward>完成任务

Text: You did well, my young apprentice. If you continue to follow my lead we will accomplish amazing things in the future!
NewTranslation: 干得好，我的学生。继续跟着我，将来我们一定可以完成令人震惊的成果！

Text:
