With the Swiss Bank Account you accumulated I will arrange the passage of Swiss leadership to of the Order. Switzerland is no more of any concern to you.

Dr. Zweistein will travel to the United States where he will direct the creation of the atomic bomb - a super-weapon so powerful that it breaks the boundaries between matter and energy.

You have done well for the Order and possibly for the entire human race!
NewTranslation:
带着你累积的瑞士存款，我会安排你和瑞士高层接触。你不用再担心瑞士的事情了。

Z因斯坦博士将要前往美国，他会创造出原子弹-这个超级无极无比强大，他打破了物质和能量的界限。

你已经做得很好了，对得起整个人类！

Text: I congratulate your efforts, Herr Presidente! Only those who attempt the absurd can achieve the impossible!
NewTranslation: 祝贺你，总统阁下！荒谬创造奇迹！

Text:
Your effort to end all wars is commendable, yet I fear that our technology has exceeded our humanity. Even with my ongoing research, I am skeptical that we can divert humanity from its path of self-destruction.

I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones. Oh how I wish that somewhere there existed an island for those who are wise and of good will...
NewTranslation:
你为了战争的结束所做的努力真是值得称道，但我担心我们是否可以驾驭这些技术。即使我正在进行的研究，我怀疑，我们是否会把人类带进一条自我毁灭的不归路。

我不知道第三次世界大战会有什么武器，但第四次世界大战恐怕只有棍棒和石头了吧。我真心希望，有那么一个小岛，他为那些明智的人。。

Text: Howdy, Presidente! I heard of your noble quest and came up with a deal that might help you.
NewTranslation: 哟，总统先生！我听说了你的崇高理想，我想出了一个协议，也许可以帮上你。

Text:
The US need to smuggle a genius scientist of Italian origin out of the Axis super-weapon program. I would have done it myself but a direct attack would threaten his life. The only way to save him is to convince the Axis to let him travel abroad. I will exploit their zest about national heroes by arranging a fake Nobel Prize for him. You only have to provide the funds and I will make sure he is rescued during the prize ceremony.

<_objective> Pay $<amount_skip> to the Allies
<_reward> $$<swiss_reward> Swiss Bank Account and <immigration_reward> college-educated immigrants
NewTranslation:
我们需要诱拐一个出身意大利，因超级武器计划而离开的天才科学家。拯救他的唯一方法就是说服轴心国让他出国旅游。我会利用他们的民族英雄情怀来为他安排一个假的诺贝尔奖。您只需要提供基金，而我则确保他会在颁奖仪式上获救。

<_objective>给盟国$<amount_skip>
<_reward>$$<swiss_reward>瑞士银行账户<immigration_reward>受过高等教育的移民

Text: Opportunities present themselves occasionally, but you can't rely on pure chance. You have to learn how to earn the needed money yourself, my young apprentice.
NewTranslation: 偶尔会有机遇出现，但你不能依赖运气。你必须学会自己赚钱，我的学生。

Text:
There are several methods to earn Swiss Bank Account money on your own. The weak-hearted would call them "disreputable" but I prefer "unconventional".

<_hint> Issuing the Building Permit edict will yield you a portion of the cost of the building as Swiss Bank Account money
<_hint> Banks may add to your own personal Slush Fund, while the Customs Office allows you to collect Special Tax
NewTranslation:
有几种增加瑞士银行存款的方法，弱者通常会说这是‘肮脏的’，而我则称为‘打破常规的’。

<_hint>发布建筑许可法令，增加所有建筑建造费用，一部分费用汇入你的瑞士银行账户
<_hint>银行可以增加你的个人行贿基金，海关则允许一个‘特别税’

Text: Swiss people love banks - otherwise they wouldn't have so many big ones. I believe it's a matter of national pride.
NewTranslation: 瑞士人民喜欢银行-否则他们不会有这么多钞票。我相信这关乎民族自豪感。

Text:
To get our hands on Switzerland faster, we have to reduce the cost of the most valuable Swiss assets.
I am pretty sure that you didn't miss the fact that Tropican banks can slush Swiss Bank Account money, did you? With a couple of banks we can instill the pains of the over-inflation to the Swiss and thus buy them off faster. It may seem evil, but the goal justifies the means.

<_objective> Have <amount> Banks
<_reward> $$<reward> Swiss Bank Account
NewTranslation:
我们需要尽快动手，马上减少持有的瑞士资产。
我想你并没有错过这场好戏，海岛银行可以代替瑞士银行，你说呢？通过建造一些银行来形成通货膨胀从而打压瑞士银行。这看起来有些不正当，不过，结果决定一切。

<_objective>拥有<amount>银行
<_reward>$$<reward>瑞士银行存款

Text: Some dreadful opera music ruined my entire evening. And then it hit me!
NewTranslation: 这些可怕的歌剧把我的整个晚上都毁了！他成功了。

Text:
The Swiss really cherish their yodeling, a cultural tradition they share with some nations from the Axis. 

I pulled strings with the Allies and introduced them to this idea - if they pay us enough money, we can add some Tropican flavor to the yodeling, ruing it forever. This will send the Axis nationalists in terror and we will profit from their misery.

<_objective> Have <amount> Opera Houses
<_reward> $$<reward> Swiss Bank Account
NewTranslation:
瑞士看来非常珍惜自己的岳德尔唱法，毕竟这是他们的传统，还与一些轴心国发生了交流。

我暗中与盟友会面，并把我的想法告诉了他们-如果给我们足够的钱，我们可以适当的增加一些有海岛风味的岳德尔唱法，错了了会后悔的。也许这会让轴心国的民族主义者们恐惧，而我们偷偷获利。

<_objective>拥有<amount>歌剧院
<_reward>$$<reward>瑞士银行存款

Text: It is time to break the steel Swiss spirit. Literally! Now listen and take notes.
NewTranslation: 是时候打破瑞士的钢铁垄断了。现在！认真听，逐字逐句做好笔记！

Text:
For quite a long time the Axis propaganda tried to prove their Pocket Viking Knife to be the best utility knife in the world, but they are hopelessly dwarfed by the Swiss Army Knife. 

I made some arrangements with the Axis HQ and they are ready to pay us in Swiss Bank Account if we manage to export some "fine quality" Tropican steel to Switzerland to sabotage the production of Swiss Army Knives.

<_objective> Export <amount> Steel
<_reward> $$<reward> Swiss Bank Account
NewTranslation:
很长一段时间，轴心国一直想要证明他们的维京刀才是世界上最好的多用途刀，但他们与瑞士军刀相比，高下立判。

我已经在轴心国总部做了一些安排，他们承诺如果我们设法向瑞士出口一些‘优质’的钢铁，用以破坏瑞士军刀的质量的话，他们会向瑞士银行账户存上一笔钱。

<_objective>出口<amount>钢铁
<_reward>$$<reward>瑞士银行存款

Text: Time is everything. And I feel that it's ticking fast for our friends the Swiss.
NewTranslation: 时间就是一切。我觉得对我们的朋友瑞士来说，滴答声走的有些快了。

Text:
The Axis spy network discovered that many a British generals are using Swiss watches. If they suddenly start missing their tea time the entire Allied chain of command will be ruined! 

If we manage to export some bauxite and add our renowned Tropican punctuality to the Swiss watches, we will not only reduce the price of the Swiss assets, but also receive a reward from the Axis.

<_objective> Export <amount> Bauxite
<_reward> $$<reward> Swiss Bank Account
NewTranslation:
轴心国间谍网络发现，有许多英国的将军都在使用瑞士手表。如果他们在下午茶时间突然‘失踪’，那么他们的整个指挥系统就会陷入瘫痪！
如果我们设法向瑞士出口一些铝土矿，让瑞士手表的时间变成海岛时间，我们不仅会减少一些瑞士资产，同时还能从轴心国中获得一份报酬。

<_objective>出口<amount>铝土矿
<_reward>$$<reward>瑞士银行存款

Text: My young apprentice, it is time to turn the tides of fate against the Swiss.
NewTranslation: 我的学生，我们是时候对抗瑞士了。

Text:
With enough money invested in the Swiss Lottery we can cover all the possible number combinations. Our success is guaranteed - and after we deplete the assets of the lottery, we will strike a killing blow to the Swiss economy! 

I, being the mastermind, will make sure the correct numbers are input - you just have to finish the leg work with providing enough money.

<_objective> Invest $<text_param> in Swiss lottery tickets
<_reward> Win the lottery jackpot in Swiss Bank Account
NewTranslation:
我们拥有足够的钱来涵盖瑞士彩票所有可能的组合。我们肯定会成功-当我们耗尽瑞士的彩票资产，我们将对瑞士经济来一次致命一击！

我是一个优秀的策划，我会保证中奖，而您，只需要跑跑腿，以及提供足够的资金。

<_objective>投资$<text_param>瑞士彩票
<_reward>瑞士银行账户将赢得彩票头奖

Text: I'm so furious! I can't believe what just happened!
NewTranslation: 我很愤怒！我完全无法想象刚才发生了什么！

Text:
The fate played a trick on us - our rivals from Puerto Coco and Isla Rojo won the lottery! The combination was the most absurd thing one could imagine - 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6!!! It was the only combination I didn't submit! The universe is mocking me! Argh!
Still, we won a fraction of the jackpot. Thank you, fate, for not ruining my day!

<_effect> $$5000
NewTranslation:
命运真是会开玩笑-我们的对手竟然从椰岛和红岛中赢得了彩票！最荒谬的是，那组合竟让是-1，2，3，4，5，6！！！这是我唯一没有提交的组合！整个宇宙都在嘲笑我！
不过，我们总算是赢得了头奖的零头。感谢上帝，没有抛弃我！

<_effect>$$5000

Text: My life is in danger, Presidente! I just survived an assassination attempt and I fear there are more to come. We need a decoy, a double who looks exactly like me - someone to play my role out in the open.
NewTranslation: 我的生命在处于危险之中，总统阁下！我刚刚躲过了一次暗杀，但我担心还有更多的暗杀。我们需要替身作为诱饵，我需要两个和我长得一样的替身，让他代替我外出。

Text:
For better or worse, I don't look like a common Tropican. Nobody on your island would do the job, but a foreign tourist may be suitable. An elementary calculation shows that we need at most <amount> tourists to visit your shores.

If something happens to me, stick to the original plan. The Order may still need that double.

<_objective> Attract <amount> tourists
NewTranslation:
无论是好是坏，我都不像是一个不同的海岛居民。外国游客可能非常适合您岛上无人胜任的工作。有一个数据调查发现，你最多需要<amount>游客。

如果我发生了意外，计划照常进行。目标可能翻倍。

<_objective>吸引<amount>游客

Text: I have sad news, Presidente. Leon Kane was murdered, his boat sabotaged inside our territorial waters. We don't know who did it, but there were no survivors.
NewTranslation: 这是悲剧，总统阁下。里昂·凯恩是被谋杀的，他的船只在我们的领海内被毁坏了。我不知道谁干的，可惜没有幸存者。

Text:
With no word from the Order, we are sticking to his original plan, looking for his double. This may work in our favor. 

I heard somewhere that one in every <amount> tourists is a perpetuator in a violent crime. If we are lucky, we may just find our murderer, or at least a scapegoat, if need be.

<_objective> Attract <amount> tourists
<_reward> Win the mission
NewTranslation:
共济会没有消息传来，我们必须坚持原有计划，加倍努力。我想这对我们有利。

我从某处听说，每<amount>个游客中就会有一个游客是暴力犯罪者。如果我们幸运些，我们就能够找到凶手了，当然，我们至少可以找到一个替罪羊-如果需要。

<_objective>吸引<amount>游客
<_reward>完成任务

Text: Our investigation has been completed, Presidente! We've managed to find a tourist willing to confess to the murder of Leon Kane.
NewTranslation: 我们的调查完成了，总统阁下！已经有一个游客愿意承认谋杀里昂·凯恩的罪行。

Text:
Frankly, I have no idea if he is the real perpetrator or just a crazy glory seeker. 

Strangely enough, he looks very similar to your mentor and we know that they met in secret just a week before the murder. For what we know, he could've done it.

In any case, his confession should clear your reputation with the Order.
NewTranslation:
坦率地讲，我不太确信他到底是一个犯罪者，或者只是个疯狂地索求者。

奇怪的是，他看起来和你的导师十分相似，要知道，谋杀前一周，他们进行了一次秘密会见。对于我们所知道的，也许他已经成功了。

不管如何，他的忏悔已经足够洗清您的声誉。

Text: Mentor Kane was a visionary, the finest mind of our Order. He was relying on you for protection and you failed him, the Order and all of humanity! For all we know, you may even have arranged his murder!
NewTranslation: 凯恩导师是一个有远见的智者。他希望依靠于你，但你辜负了他，辜负了共济会，也辜负了人类！我们知道，他的谋杀甚至可能是你的安排。

Text:
It is my opinion that you did it, but some in the Order are still willing to give you the benefit of the doubt until the investigation is finished. 

While you are under suspicion, severe financial sanctions will be imposed on you. Not to say you would use the treasury of Tropico to bribe and manipulate our investigations, but we'd rather not take any chances.

<_effect> <_SanctionPercent>% of the Treasury will be confiscated at the end of each year.
NewTranslation:
我认为是你做的，但共济会的一些人直到调查结束都选择相信你，疑罪从无。

当你处于嫌疑时，你会收到一些金融制裁的影响。我并不是让你使用海岛的财政去贿赂和操纵调查，我们不应该冒任何风险。

<_effect>每年<_SanctionPercent>%财政收入将被没收

Text: The Order has confiscated $<param1> (<param2>%) from the Treasury
NewTranslation: 共济会已经从财政资金没收了$<param1>(<param2>%)

Text: Did you know that your clueless lackey Penultimo plans to spy on the tourists by installing statues and gardens with hidden cameras all over the island?
NewTranslation: 你知道你那个白痴助手贝奴迪莫想要通过隐藏有摄像机的雕像和花园来监视整个海岛的计划吗？

Text:
Actually, the Order does not mind. Give the Tropicans some beauty. After your crimes are proven, it will make the transition from your rule easier.

Plus, it is always a good idea to keep an eye on people.

<_objective> Build <amount> Gardens
<_reward> <SanctionPercentChange>% less will be taken from the Treasury
NewTranslation:
实际上，共济会并不介意海岛更加美丽。如果你的罪行被证实，他接替您的统治也更加容易。

此外，留意人们始终是一个好主意。

<_objective>建造<amount>花园
<_reward>财政资金需上缴的钱减少<SanctionPercentChange>%

Text: How to catch a murderer? With a plane, according to your chief investigator Penultimo.
NewTranslation: 如何抓到凶手？根据你的首席顾问贝奴迪莫的话:使用飞机。

Text:
I don't even want to know the details this time. Just finish this mockery of an investigation quickly.

<_objective> Have an <text_param>
<_reward> <SanctionPercentChange>% less will be taken from the Treasury
NewTranslation:
我现在甚至不想知道那些细节。只想早点结束这个备受嘲讽的调查。

<_objective>拥有一个<text_param>
<_reward>财政资金需上缴的钱减少<SanctionPercentChange>%

Text: Presidente, we are hunting a killer here! And real hunters need cabins.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们抓到了一个杀手！我们的猎人需要更多的小旅屋

Text:
Let's build some good spotting locations in Tropico. Our men would use them to look out for the bad guy. Meanwhile, the Tropico Hunting Society may even join the hunt!

<_objective> Build <amount> Cabins
<_reward> Free entertainment building
NewTranslation:
我们在海岛上建立了一些定位点，这会为我们寻找那些坏蛋提供帮助。同时，海岛上的狩猎团体也将加入追捕！

<_objective>建造<amount>小旅屋
<_reward>免费的娱乐建筑

Text: We need to lure more tourists to the island, Presidente. I'm certain one of them will be our murderer, returning to the scene of the crime! Trust me, I learned that from all those profiler movies!
NewTranslation: 我们需要吸引更多的游客，总统阁下。我肯定其中有一个是凶手，他会回到犯罪现场的！相信我，我已经从侦探电影里全都了解了！

Text:
Let us build a new fancy attraction and name it "Scene of the Crime"! Then we round up every suspicious person that visits it and we are good to go. That's bound to straighten your reputation with the Order!

<_objective> Build a <text_param>
<_reward> <SanctionPercentChange>% less will be taken from the Treasury
NewTranslation:
我们建造一个奇特的地点并命名为‘犯罪现场’！我们可以询问每一个可疑的游客，因为我们是好人。这个方法一定可以提高您的声誉！

<_objective>建造一个<text_param>
<_reward><SanctionPercentChange>%财政收入将会降低

Text: Sir, the USS Battleship "Secret Plan" just took refuge in our waters! Its captain refused to fire their nuclear missiles to avoid starting a world war, and now the "Secret Plan" is on the run!
NewTranslation: 总统，美国海军战舰‘秘密计划’就躲在我们的海域！为了避免世界大战，他的船长没有引爆核导弹，现在‘秘密计划’看起来还不错。

Text:
Both the US and the Soviet navies are converging to the Caribbean  as we speak! The only hope to avoid invasion and total war is to go nuclear ourselves!
The situation is extremely complicated and very well on the brink of World War III. The Cuban missile crisis was a child's play compared to the run-away nuclear battleship situation we have here. 

<_objective> Build Nuclear Program in <text_param> months
<_effect> Failure to do so will start World War III
NewTranslation:
美国和苏联的海军因我们的演讲正在向着加勒比海汇合！研发我们自己的核武器是防止侵略和全面战争的唯一希望！
形势非常严峻，第三次世界大战随时可能打响。相比于我们这核战舰云集，古巴的导弹危机就像是小孩子玩泥巴。

<_objective>建造核项目<text_param>月内
<_effect>如果失败，第三次世界大战开启

Text: The Best Help Tropico Can Get
NewTranslation: 海岛可以获得的最好的帮助

Text: Presidente, thank you for calling me! If you need ideas on how to delay an impending invasion from one or possibly two superpowers, well, I'm your man! You know you can rely on me!
NewTranslation: 感谢您的呼唤，我的总统！如果您想要让一个甚至可能两个超级大国推迟他们的入侵脚步的话，您可以相信我。您可以依靠我。

Text:
I am at my best when it comes to brewing inefficiency and boggling down state organizations like armies or top-notch governments! 

You know I speak the truth because you have experienced my vast talents so many times in the past. 

<_effect> Penultimo will present different ways to delay the impending invasion
NewTranslation:
当需要像军队或者政府一样的组织陷入瘫痪或者困境时，我想是我行动的时候了。

您知道我说的是真话，毕竟您在过去见证了我伟大的天赋。

<_effect>贝奴迪莫将选择不同的方法来延缓迫近的侵略

Text: Nice to meet you, I am Dr. Zweistein. I heard your nuclear situation may lead to a world war, so I felt obliged to come and assist you in the matter with my vast intelligence!
NewTranslation: 很高心见到你，我是Z因斯坦博士。我听说你的核态势有可能引发一场世界大战，因此在这个问题上，我想我有责任用我的智慧来帮助你。

Text:
I started researching a device which will resolve all your - and the world's nuclear troubles and avoid such problems as total nuclear war... It will be either related to elementary particles reaction or time-space continuum on quantum level. Anyway, it is too complicated for you to understand.

I will let you know when I have results; in the meantime, please, go ahead with your actions to resolve the situation yourself.
NewTranslation:
我正在研究一个可以解决你所有问题的机器，当然，这包括了核问题以及与此相关的核战争问题……它和基本离子反应或是在量子能级上的时空连续体有一些联系。总之，你很难理解其中的复杂性。

我会让你知道最后的结果的，在这之前的困境，请你用自己的手段来解决问题吧。

Text: Presidente, if you receive this automated message, then the worst has happened! American liberty is at risk!
NewTranslation: 总统，如果您收到这个自动发送的邮件，说明最坏的事情发生了！美国式的自由是危险的。

Text:
As I feared, the US Generals that want to trigger a total nuclear war have started a coup against the legitimate US government! That is me.

Stay assured I will not go down without a fight! In the meantime, do everything you can to avoid invasion from the US Army!
NewTranslation:
如同我担心的一样，那个引发了核战争的美国将军发动了政变。

尽管放心，我绝不会束手就擒！这段时间尽你所能，阻止美国的入侵！

Text: Good news, Presidente! I defeated the US Generals who tried to take me down! They should have known better.
NewTranslation: 好消息，总统阁下！我击败了那个试图打败我的美国将军！他们应该再好好想想了。

Text:
I vanquished all of them in twelve consecutive boss battles! I know you're dying to hear all the details but it suffices to say that speaking softly and carrying a big stick is a lot more productive than simply speaking softly.

The liberty of the American people is defended!
NewTranslation:
我赢得了所有12场战斗！我知道您想要听所有的细节，但轻言轻谈已经足够了，我想大棒比言语更加富有成效。

捍卫美国人民的自由！

Text: Presidente, I have a solution to all of our problems! Well, a temporary solution, at least! I believe oil is the answer!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我有一个办法可以解决所有问题！好吧，至少是一个可用的方案！答案就是:石油！

Text:
Have you noted much clamor takes place every time an oil-exporting country is about to be invaded? Global markets, policy-makers, other oil-production countries all raise voices and a big noisy argument always follows!

<_objective> Export <amount> Oil
<_effect> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months
NewTranslation:
您是否注意到，每次石油出口国被入侵时，总是人声鼎沸？全球市场，决策者以及其他石油出口国都会嘈嘈嚷嚷，总会产生各种争论！

<_objective>出口<amount>石油
<_effect>推迟入侵<text_param>月
石油巨头总是互帮互助

Text: Presidente, I have been holding delicate secret talks with our American friends in Big Oil! Yes, we do have friends there! Hard to believe, I know. Wonderful guys, generous, kind-hearted, willing to do anything for us!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我已经在通过石油巨门想我们的美国朋友举行了秘密会谈！是的，真是难以置信那儿竟然有我们的朋友。那些慷慨、大方、善良的朋友愿意为我们做任何事！

Text:
They can lobby to delay the impending US invasion! I am told they have no power whatsoever in Washington, but DC is also full of compassionate politicians who care about humanity's greater good. 

Makes you wonder how oil makes people good, really!

<_objective> Pay $$<amount> to invite Big Oil to Tropico
<_effect> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months, drop of oil price, free oil buildings
NewTranslation:
他们能够游说推迟美国的入侵！有人告诉我他们在华盛顿没有丝毫权利，但那些在乎人类普世利益的政治家则富有同情心。

我会让你知道石油对人们的好处有多大！

<_objective>花费$$<amount>邀请石油巨头来到海岛
<_effect>入侵延迟<text_param>月，石油价格下降，免费的石油类建筑
欺骗他们！我们有核武器

Text: Presidente, we can fool the US Navy into thinking that we have already gone nuclear! Just make sure we have enough uranium rolling down the street and then sit back and enjoy the show!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我们可以欺骗美国海军我们已经拥有了核武器！只要我们能够确保轧制足够的铀，我们接下来便可以坐享其成！

Text:
Even if the US generals do not believe Tropico went nuclear, there will be fear of uranium fallout during an invasion! This will start discussions about the safety of military personnel, long-term effects of mutations in American society, etc., etc.!

<_objective> Export <amount> uranium
<_effect> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months
NewTranslation:
即便美国将军不相信海岛上有核，他们也会因为铀的存在而束手束脚！他们必须考虑军人的安全，以及这会对美国带来的长期影响等等！

<_objective>出口<amount>铀
<_effect>入侵推迟<text_param>月

Text: Presidente, I was secretly contacted by executives of Big Atom! They believe in Tropico and its people and want to do everything in their power to keep the peace!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我曾秘密联系过大原子的高管！他们相信海岛和海岛人民，他们愿意尽一切力量来维护和平！

Text:
Big Atom wants to invest in our nuclear industry just for the sake of friendship! What is even better, they can delay the invasion! I never knew dealing with radiation made you such a positive-thinking human being and have started taking uranium pills myself!

<_objective> Pay $$<amount> to invite Big Atom to Tropico
<_effect> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months, drop uranium price, free technology
NewTranslation:
大原子想投资我们的核工业--为了我们的友谊！更加令人振奋的是，他们可以推迟美国的入侵！我从未想到处理辐射问题会让你的思维如此积极，并已开始获取铀丸！

<_objective>花费$$<amount>邀请大原子前来海岛
<_effect>入侵延迟<text_param>月，铀的价格下降，免费的技术

Text: Presidente, if I have learned anything in the many years by your side, it is that no one wants to clean up your mess! Make a crisis ugly enough that no one will dare touch us because no one will want to deal with it!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，如果说在你身边多年我学到了什么，那就是没人愿意收拾的烂摊子！人们不愿来这里，就因为这个烂摊子！

Text:
What do we need for a humanitarian crisis? Shacks! The more shacks, the worse! We can invite hundreds of homeless refugees and their shacks will be the best defense against any attack! 

This is pure Tropican wisdom!

<_effect> <text_param> refugee immigrants will come to Tropico
<_effect> Delay the invasion by 12 months
NewTranslation:
人道主义危机需要什么呢？窝棚！窝棚越多情况越坏！我们可以移民数百名无家可归的难民，他们的窝棚就是对付入侵最好的防御！

这是海岛的智慧！

<_effect><text_param>难民将一名海岛
<_effect>入侵延迟12个月

Text: Presidente, have you ever thought about who your dearest friend is? The one who owes you most money! You don't really want anything bad to happen to them, right?
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，您有想过谁是您最亲爱的朋友吗？当然是欠你钱最多的！你一定不希望他有什么事，你说呢？

Text:
Now, you get my idea with the invasion and the sovereign debt?

Do not give me that look, Presidente! Of course, you are my dearest friend! 

<_objective> Reach Junk Credit Rating
<_effect> Delay the invasion by <text_param> months
NewTranslation:
现在，您了解了我关于入侵和外债的想法了吗？

不用给我看，总统阁下！当然，我是您最亲密的朋友！

<_objective>达到垃圾评级
<_effect>入侵推迟<text_param>月

Text: Presidente, in times as dark and dire as these we must turn to our most powerful friends! Our most powerful friend is the US President! He can drink a whole keg of beer and still lift an ox!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我们总是碰到未知而可怕的东西，我们必须求助于我们最强大的朋友--美国总统！他可以喝一整桶啤酒后，还把一头牛举起来！

Text:
Besides, he is the Commander-In-Chief of the US forces, right? His word should count whether they invade us or not!

I have found his personal phone number. It's 1-800-PRESIDENT! Give him a call, if you reach him he might help you!

<_effect> Call 1-800-PRESIDENT to talk to the US President
NewTranslation:
除此之外，他还是美国军方总司令，您说呢？他的话语可以决定是否入侵我们！

我找到了他的私人电话号码。1-800-PRESIDENT这是他的电话，给他打电话，他或许可以帮到你！

<_effect>拨打1-800-PRESIDENT，与美国总统谈谈

Text: Howdy, Presidente! I was wondering whether you were about to call me or defeat the US Army all by yourself!
NewTranslation: 你好，总统！我还一直好奇你是要给我打电话还是凭借自己的力量战胜美国陆军呢！

Text:
This invasion story is deeper than you think! There are some US generals which apparently want to start World War 3! I cannot cancel the invasion by myself, but by God, I will give you a head start!

I'll make mandatory Spanish classes for every US soldier to participate in the invasion. This will slow down things a bit.

<_effect> The US President will delay the invasion by <text_param1> months
NewTranslation:
这次的入侵有许多的故事在里边。有一些美国将军显然想要进行第三次世界大战！我无法取消入侵的命令，但我可以让你从头开始！

我会让每一个参与入侵的美国士兵强制学习西班牙语。这东西将会帮你拖延一些时间。

<_effect>美国总统将入侵推迟<text_param1>月

Text: Should I call the US President again? Is it that bad?
NewTranslation: 难道我还要再给美国总统打电话吗？有这么糟糕吗？

Text: The old scoundrel might bring some more light into the situation on his end...
NewTranslation: 那些老混球也许会在结束之前给处境带来一些麻烦…

Text: Presidente, it's a real pleasure to talk to a true friend in these awful times!
NewTranslation: 总统，能在这一严峻的时刻和你这样一个真正的朋友交谈，真是令人愉快！

Text:
The US Generals are breathing down my neck and press me to issue an invasion order every 7 minutes! I will institute filling out a mandatory customs declaration for every soldier enlisted for the invasion of Tropico, but that is about it.

It will buy you some time and I pray to God it is enough!

<_effect> The US President will delay the invasion by <text_param1> months
NewTranslation:
我们的将军死死地盯着我，每过7分钟，他都让我发布一次入侵的命令！我会让每一个征募的士兵强制性地填写报关表，但这也已经快到极限了。

他可以为你拖延些时间，我会向上帝祈祷！

<_effect>美国总统将入侵推迟<text_param1>月

Text: Greetings, old friend. I faked my death to throw our enemies off-track, but I can stay in the shadows no longer. I have come back from the dead to help the world in its time of need.
NewTranslation: 哟，我的老朋友。我假装死亡骗过了该死的敌人，但我现在只能呆在阴影里。我回来了，这个世界需要我。

Text:
Humanity is headed towards destruction. Resources are consumed greedily, most basic human needs are ignored, and the largest energy crisis in history looms on the horizon. 

If we do not take precautions, it will leave the world shrouded in darkness. The Order is stockpiling energy resources and you are to supply the most precious one.

<_objective> Export <amount> Uranium
<_reward> Win the mission
NewTranslation:
人类正在走向毁灭。人类最基本的需求一直被忽略，而资源却被过度掠夺，人类历史上最大的能源危机即将来临。

如果我们不采取一些预防措施，世界将会被黑暗笼罩。我们需要储备能源，最宝贵的铀则由你来提供。

<_objective>出口<amount>铀
<_reward>完成任务

Text: We have been played, Presidente! I have uncovered a massive conspiracy against Tropico and it appears that your mentor, Leon Kane, has been playing a double game.
NewTranslation: 我们一直在战斗！总统阁下，我发现了一个巨大的阴谋，您的导师里昂·凯恩一直扮演着两面派的角色。

Text:
Altered shipping manifests, bribed captains and custom officials, fake trade agreements, I don't know where to start, but it turns out that practically all the Uranium we've been mining was channeled to terrorist groups across the globe. 

We've been perpetuating Day Zero all along! For all we know the terrorists and the Order are one and the same! We have to stop all this, Presidente!

<_objective> Destroy all Uranium Mines
<_reward> Win the mission
NewTranslation:
篡改船运清单，贿赂船长和海关官员，贸易协定造假，我都不知道从哪说起！但是事实是，我们开采的铀正运向世界各地的恐怖组织。
我们一直在助纣为虐！我们都知道的，所有的恐怖主义和救世共济会都是沆瀣一气的！我们必须停止开采铀矿了，总统阁下！

<_objective>摧毁所有的铀矿
<_reward>任务完成

Text: So, is this to be where our ways part? You were always a bright student; I will not try to convince you of the rightness of my actions, but will instead tell you my plans and let you judge them for yourself.
NewTranslation: 又到了分道扬镳的时候吗？你永远是这样一个开明聪慧的学生。我不会试图说服你我的选择的正确性，但是我会把我的计划告诉你，让你自己做出判断。

Text:
For centuries our Order was steering humanity, trying to prevent it from destroying itself. But we have failed. The world is fading into corruption - we have devastated our civilization, our planet, ourselves. 

Our only option is a fresh start, the Day Zero. Yes, the world as we know it will end, but a better one will rise from the ashes and avoid the mistakes of the past!

Will you join me, old friend?
NewTranslation:
几个世纪以来，我们共济会一直在引导人性，尽力避免其自我毁灭。但是我们失败了，世界坍塌了-我们毁掉了自己的文明，自己的星球。我们毁灭了自己！

我们唯一的选择是从新开始，从零开始。是的，旧世界要毁灭了，但是新世界将从废墟和过去的错误中成长起来。

你会加入我吗，老朋友？

Text: Leon Kane is alive! I may have doubted your loyalty to the Order, but our mentor assures me that you are still our staunchest ally. Even though we dislike one another, we are to work together once more.
NewTranslation: 里昂·凯恩还活着！我可能怀疑过你对共济会的忠诚度，但是我们的导师让我相信你仍然是我最忠诚的朋友。即使我们都讨厌对方，但是我们又将再一次开启合作！

Text:
The new threat to our plans - Eco-activists! They usually protest against the storage of uranium ore in open containers, and such petty issues. However, our plans for extensive mining have unsettled their limited minds and they decided to take drastic actions.

<_effect> Eco-activists will organize strikes on the island.
NewTranslation:
我们计划的新威胁-环保主义者！他们总是抗议我们用未封口的容器盛装铀矿石，这还只是鸡毛蒜皮的小事。真正的大事是我们打算扩大采矿规模的计划让他们这些思想狭隘的人打算采取激烈的行动！

<_effect>环保主义者将在海岛组织攻击

Text: Presidente, the world media is ablaze with threats from several terrorist organizations. They all keep repeating the same two words - Day Zero.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，世界媒体都在不停的受到不同恐怖组织的威胁。这些组织不断重复两个字-末日！

Text:
Day Zero is their weird plan to end us all in a nuclear apocalypse, to reset on our civilization. I have no idea why the world buys this crap but it all lead to hysteria here, in Tropico, with our uranium exports and all. 
I say we build something eco-friendly, quickly, to put the crazy people at ease!

<_effect> Ongoing strikes in the Uranium Mines
<_objective> Have <amount> Waste Treatment Plants
<_reward> No more strikes in the Uranium Mines
NewTranslation:
世界末日是他们狂野的计划，他们打算利用核爆杀死我们，重启整个文明。我真不明白为什么世界上有人买这破玩意，但是海岛的铀矿出口却给我们带来了疯狂。
来，让我们建设一些环保建筑吧。让这些疯狂的人们平静下来！

<_effect>铀矿被攻击
<_objective>拥有<amount>座垃圾处理厂
<_reward>铀矿不再被攻击

Text: Herr Presidente, there have been reports of prominent scientists being abducted by terrorists all over the world. I don't have time to be abducted; I am too close to perfecting my concept for a time travelling apparatus.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，有报道称世界各地都有顶尖科学家被恐怖分子绑架。我实在是太忙了，没给他们留时间绑架我。我就快要完成我的时间旅行装置了！

Text:
As I need some modern equipment anyway, would you be so kind to provide me with a new laboratory with adequate security measures? That may even lessen the rumbling among the academic circles.

<_effect> Strikes start in research buildings
<_objective> Build a new Science Lab
<_reward> No more strikes in the research buildings
NewTranslation:
但是无论如何我还是需要一些现代化设备的，你能不能给我提供一间有充足安保措施的实验室呢？这也许能减少学术圈对我的冷言冷语。

<_effect>科研建筑受到攻击
<_objective>建立新的科学实验室
<_reward>科研建筑不再被攻击

Text: All hell is breaking loose, old chap! The international community is convinced that Tropico is supplying the terrorists with uranium, helping them build their doomsday device and perpetuate Day Zero.
NewTranslation: 万事不顺啊，老伙计！国际组织指控我们为恐怖分子提供铀矿，帮助他们建造末日装置和策划世界末日。

Text:
I supposed they hijacked one of our shipments for the Order. I am sure you will conduct an investigation to disprove those claims, but in the meantime we need an army of diplomats to handle this foreign relations nightmare.

<_effect> Standing with all Foreign Powers is decreased
<_objective> Have <amount> Embassies
<_reward> Foreign standing returns to normal
NewTranslation:
我觉得他们肯定为共济会劫持了我们的货物。我确信你一定会调查出事情真相，粉碎这些谣言。但是与此同时，我们需要一队
外交官来处理这个外交噩梦。

<_effect>与所有国外势力的关系指数下降
<_objective>有<amount>间大使馆
<_reward>国外关系指数回归正常
命运石之门(建造4个地铁站)
时间跳跃机(建一个时尚公司)

Text:
Excellent choice. Next you have to construct a Vehicle Factory so that we can produce a prototype. You know I've always wanted a convertible.

<_objective> Build a Vehicle Factory
NewTranslation:
绝妙的选择！接下来你需要建设一座汽车工厂，这样我们可以开始生产样车了。你知道我一直想要一辆敞篷车的。
<_objective>建设一座汽车工厂

Text:
Excellent choice! Next you have to construct four metro stations - once for each dimension of spacetime.

<_objective> Build <amount> Metro Stations
NewTranslation:
绝妙的选择！接下来你需要建设四个地铁站-每个时空维度建设一次

<_objective>建设<amount>个地铁站

Text:
I hoped you wouldn't chose this. I really don't like heights. No matter, we need a tall building - a Fashion Company should do the trick.

<_objective> Build a Fashion Company
NewTranslation:
你还是别选这个吧。我恐高啊！算了，我们需要建点高楼。-建个潮流时尚公司应该可以。

<_objective>建设一座潮流时尚公司

Text: Wunderbar! Now we have to develop my flux capacitor - it is what makes time travel possible by incapacitating the natural flow of time!
NewTranslation: 棒极了！现在我们需要研发通量电容器-就是这东西通过改变正常时间流来完成时间旅行的！

Text:
We should focus all research efforts towards the development of the time machine. The more research points you generate, the faster we will finish the flux capacitor and travel back through time.

We have to finish the research in less than <text_param> years or we will be destroyed by Herr Kane.

<_objective> Develop the time machine by generating research
<_reward> Win the mission
<_timelimit> <text_param> years
NewTranslation:
我们应该集中科研精力研发时间机器。产生的科研点数越多，我们就能越快完成通量电容器，然后穿越时间回到过去。

我们应该在少于<text_param>年的时间内完成研发，否则Herr凯恩会消灭我们。

<_objective>通过科研完成时间机器
<_reward>任务完成
<_timelimit><text_param>年

Text: This is not good, Herr Presidente! I am detecting nuclear missiles on a trajectory for this island. The time machine is not ready. That is not what happened last time!
NewTranslation: 大事不妙，总统阁下！我监测到有核弹朝我们岛来了！但是时间机器还没准备好啊。天啊，上次不是这样的啊！

Text:
We have already lost, Presidente! There is no way that we can stop the missiles and we couldn't finish the time machine in time. Ironic isn't it. Better luck next time, Presidente!

<_effect> Time's up. You have lost the mission.
NewTranslation:
我们输了，总统阁下！我们没办法阻止核弹，也不能按时完成时间机器。真讽刺，不是吗？祝你下次好运，总统阁下。

<_effect>时间到，你输了。

Text: I am detecting ballistic missiles on a trajectory for this island, Herr Presidente! Schnell, schnell! To the time machine!
NewTranslation: 我监测到有弹道导弹朝我们小岛来了，总统阁下！快，快，快进时间机器！

Text:
We managed to complete my time machine just in time to escape the nuclear blast. 

Now get in! There's just enough space for me and your family.

Ready or not, here we go!
NewTranslation:
我们及时完成时间机器，躲过了核爆

快进来！这里空间正好可以装下我和你的家人。

准备好了吗？出发！

Text: I cannot change the laws of physics, Herr Presidente! At least not without electricity. I need more power!
NewTranslation: 我也不能违反物理法则，总统阁下！至少在电力方面不能，我需要更多电力！

Text:
The flux capacitor demands a big amount of power to operate. If we had more power we would be able to experiment on a smaller scale, perhaps I'll send my dog Emmett a couple of minutes into the future.

<_objective> Generate <amount> power
<_reward> Increases Time Machine development progress
NewTranslation:
通量电容器需要大量电力运行。如果我们能有更多电力的话，应该能开始小规模的实验。也许我可以把我的狗Emmett送到未来去几分钟。

<_objective>产生<amount>电力
<_reward>增加时间机器研发进程

Text: Herr Presidente, we will need one of your family members to test the time machine. However, it seems that you don't have any dynasty members left.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我们需要用你一个家族成员来测试时间机器。但是，你好像没有家族成员剩下了。

Text: We must fix this quickly. I will give you one of my minions... eh I mean interns - to adopt as your own family member. Here you go!
NewTranslation: 我们得赶快修好它。我会给你一个我的手下……。。额，我是说实习生……来假装成你的家族成员。来，给你！

Text: Herr Presidente, we have a working prototype of our time machine. Do we have a volunteer - a member of your dynasty, perhaps?
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我们有一个时间机器的工作样机了。我们需要志愿者，也许你的一个家族成员？

Text:
Don't worry I am sure he or she will be perfectly safe. We'll just send him or her on a short trip - one month in the future.

Side effects may include disorientation, nausea, temporary blindness, headache, permanent blindness and severe dinosaur bites.

So who will be my volunteer?
NewTranslation:
别担心，我保证他绝对安全。我们只是让他做个短途旅行-去未来一个月。

副作用包括定向障碍、恶心、短暂失明、头疼、永久失明以及严重的恐龙咬伤。

谁想成为我的志愿者？

Text: Idiots! Emmm, Herr Presidente, there seems to have been a slight miscalculation in our experiment. I fear that your dynasty member has been irrevocably lost.
NewTranslation: 白痴！额，总统阁下，我们的实验好像有一点小小的计算失误。恐怕你的家族成员已经无法挽回的迷失了。

Text:
Someone used imperial measurements when he should have used metric. Unforgivable! Nevertheless nothing can be done now. At least we got some useful data out of the experiment.

<_effect> Your dynasty member has been lost in time and space
NewTranslation:
有个蠢货本来应该要用公制度量标准，可他用了皇室度量标准。不可饶恕！但是现在已经无能为力了。至少我们从实验里获得了一些有用的数据。
<_effect>你的家族成员迷失了
一个你不能接受的邀请

Text: I can sense your hatred, my young apprentice. Why are you angry at me when it is the world that is broken? I have been preparing you for this from the very start. Come, join me and let us cleanse the Earth with fire. And from the ashes we will create a new world, a better world. Join me!
NewTranslation: 我能感受到你的恨意，我年轻的弟子。为什么错在这个世界，你却在恨我？我很早就开始为你准这些了。来，加入我。让我们用火焰净化这个旧世界，新的世界将在废墟中诞生。加入我！

Text: Herr Presidente I have an urgent message for you from, well, you. Here I will read - "I am you from the future! There's no time to explain! Don't accept Leon Kane's offer."
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我这里有一条你的信息，来自……。额……。我读给你听-“我是来自未来的你！没时间解释了！不要接受里昂·凯恩的邀请。”

Text: There, you see, even the future you disagrees with, well, you! You should reconsider your decision to join Herr Kane. Are you really ready to lose this game? It's a good game and you'll have to replay the whole mission to this point again.
NewTranslation: 看，未来的你都不同意……额……。现在的你！你应该重新考虑要不要加入凯恩。你真的准备好输掉游戏了吗？这局玩的还不错，加入他你又得重新开始整个任务了。

Text: I still want to lose the game
Ok, you convinced me. I want to play more of this awesome game.
NewTranslation: 你说服了我。我还想多玩下这一局。

Text: So it is treason then! Have it your way. I shall scorch the earth and leave your tiny island for last. When, and only when, you and your little Tropico are naught but ash will Day Zero dawn!
NewTranslation: 所有你要背叛我？随便你！反正我要烧焦全世界，你的小岛我最后再来处理。当你的小岛和你的人民都成为废墟的时候，就是末日的黎明！

Text: hear me, Herr Presidente, it's sabotage! I can't stand it, I know Herr Kane planned it. It's not a mirage, I'm telling you, it's sabotage!
NewTranslation: 听我说，总统阁下，这是蓄意破坏！我受不了了，肯定是凯恩策划的。我再说一遍，这不是我乱猜，这是蓄意破坏！

Text:
The saboteur set fire to my latest experiment. This has set us back a bit. We have to catch the culprit before he strikes again. I would suggest establishing more security checkpoints. Time is of the essence.

Well, at least temporarily. When I complete the time machine, it will no longer be of the essence. Or would it?

<_effect> Development of the time machine has been set back.
<_objective> Build <amount> new Guard Towers.
NewTranslation:
这些破坏分子烧了我上次的实验。这让我们又倒退了些。我们必须再下次袭击发生前抓住这些罪犯。我建议建设更多的安全检查站。时间就是生命！
至少暂时是这样。当我完成时间机器的时候，时间就不重要了，不是吗？

<_effect>时间机器研发倒退
<_objective>建设<amount>座新警卫塔

Text: The saboteur strikes again! You failed to stop him, I am afraid. I am holding you personally responsible for this setback.
NewTranslation: 这些破坏分子又开始了！恐怕你没能阻止他们。时间机器研发倒退要归咎于你了。

Text:
We have lost even more progress towards the development of the time machine. At least it looks like the saboteur has left the island.

<_effect> Development of the time machine has been set back again.
NewTranslation:
虽然我们损失了更多的时间机器研发进度。但是至少现在看起来破坏分子离开了这个岛。

<_effect>时间机器研发又倒退了

Text: Herr Presidente, we have a small problem! The uranium ore on the island is interfering with the time machine's chronoton field. You must get rid of it.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我们有点小问题！岛上的铀矿石干扰了时间机器的年代力场。你必须弄掉它们。

Text:
We can get around the problem but if you can get rid of the uranium ore you'll speed up our development process quite a bit.

<_objective> Export <amount> Uranium
<_reward> Increases Time Machine development progress
NewTranslation:
我们可以处理这个问题。但是如果你能弄掉这些铀矿石，你就能加速研发进程。

<_objective>出口<amount>铀矿
<_reward>增加时间机器研发进程

Text: Welcome to the Caribbean, Governor. Allow me to introduce myself - Lord Oaksworth - His Majesty's emissary to the region. Have we met before?
NewTranslation: 欢迎来到加勒比，总督。请允许我自我介绍，我是欧克沃斯总管，是这个地区的皇家使臣。我们以前见过吗？

Text:
Anyway, your first task is to rescue the Crown Prince who has, sadly, been captured by pirates. The Dread Pirate Roberts demands a ransom in gold or he threatens to cut off his nose and use it as a coat hanger. You should start exporting Gold Ore as soon as possible. Take note that since the gold goes to the pirates, you will not earn the usual profits from the exports until the ransom has been paid.

<_objective> Export <amount> Gold Ore
<_effect> Gold Ore price lowered until the ransom is paid
NewTranslation:
首先，你的任务是营救被海盗抓去的可怜的王子。可怕的海盗罗伯特要求用黄金支付赎金，否则他会切掉王子的鼻子，用来挂他的衣服。你得
赶快开始探测黄金矿。但是要知道，黄金是要付给海盗的，所以你不会从黄金出口里获得任何利润，除非你付清了赎金。

<_objective>出口<amount>黄金矿
<_effect>黄金矿价格降低直到付清赎金

Text: Dreadful news, Governor! His Majesty was so angry, he threw the Queen's pet poodle at the messenger! Don't worry, the wee doggie is fine and the royal surgeon is almost certain to save messenger's life, as well.
NewTranslation: 坏消息，总督！国王很生气，他甚至用王后的狮子狗砸我们的使者！别担心，可怜的小狗没事，而且御医也保证能救活我们的使者。

Text:
The ship carrying the ransom never reached its destination! It was surely attacked by pirates, but the Dread Pirate Roberts denies that he has anything to do with it and demands an ever bigger ransom. This time he threatens to feed the prince to a grue! His Majesty commands you to find some new gold deposits and get to work, now!

<_objective> Export <amount> Gold Ore
NewTranslation:
装着赎金的船根本没到目的地！肯定被海盗劫持了！但是可怕海盗罗伯特否认是他劫持的，他还狮子大开口说要更多的赎金。这次他威胁说要把王子喂鹦鹉。国王要求你赶紧找新的黄金矿，然后开始开采，马上！

<_objective>出口<amount>黄金矿

Text: The Dread Pirate Roberts is demanding even more gold! Otherwise he will poke the prince with a spindle and make him sleep for a hundred years!
NewTranslation: 可怕海岛罗伯特又向我们要更多黄金了！否则他要用锥子戳死王子，让他睡上100年！！

Text:
His Majesty would send the fleet after the pirates, only he fears that if something happens to the prince, he'll never hear the end of it. We have no choice but to dig more Gold Ore and hope this king's ransom will satisfy the Dread Pirate this time.

<_objective> Export <amount> Gold Ore
<_reward> Win the Mission
NewTranslation:
国王想派舰队去抓那些海盗，但是他又怕海盗对王子下毒手。我们没得选择，只能挖更多的金子。希望这次国王的赎金能让可怕海盗罗伯特满意。

<_objective>出口<amount>黄金矿
<_reward>任务完成

Text: It turns out that the Dread Pirate Roberts is none other than our lost dynasty member, Presidente! The one we sent out with the time machine prototype who got lost in time!
NewTranslation: 可怕海盗罗伯特原来是你失散多年的家族成员，总统阁下！就是那个迷失在时间机器里的家伙！

Text: The whole ransom scenario is a clever plot of our Dread Pirate so we end up with all the gold we exported and the Crown's gratitude. We are all set for a wonderful start in this new timeline! Stopping the Order will be a cakewalk, I am sure of it.
NewTranslation: 这个要赎金的剧本就是我们这位天才罗伯特策划的！金子现在都是我们的，而且皇室还很感激我们。真是一个美妙的开始。现在，阻止救世共济会变得易如反掌了。

Text:
I heard that a small tribute may persuade them to pick another island to harass, at least for a while.

<_objective> Bribe the pirates
<_reward> Less pirate attacks in the following years
NewTranslation:
我听说一点小贡品就能说服海盗攻击其他岛屿，至少我们能喘口气！

<_objective>贿赂海盗
<_reward>接下来数年海盗攻击减少

Text: Great jumping monkeys, Presidente! Our tribute convinced those pirates that our island is even richer than they thought. They took some time to prepare and are now going to attack us more fiercely than ever!
NewTranslation: 可恶，总统阁下！我们的贡品让海盗认为我们的小岛比他们想象的要富有的多。他们做了些准备，现在将更频繁的攻击我们了！

Text:
Only way to intimidate them is with a solid defense. Some Guard Towers should be enough to make them reconsider their attitude!

<_objective> Have <amount> Guard Towers
<_reward> Less pirate attacks until the end of the mission
NewTranslation:
阻止他们的方法只有士兵。一些警卫塔应该能让他们重新考虑他们的进攻！

<_objective>拥有<amount>座警卫塔
<_reward>任务结束前海盗攻击减少了

Text: The pirates are afraid of our defenses!
As you know, Governor, the profits from the Gold Ore your island exports have been lowered to a pittance until the ransom for His Majesty's Royal heir has been paid in full.
NewTranslation: 你知道的，总督，黄金矿的利润已经被降到了最低直到你付完所有的赎金。

Text:
I pulled some strings in court to arrange that you are compensated a bit more for your efforts. I am happy to tell you that the Gold Ore price will be raised if you construct a Lighthouse.

<_objective> Build a Lighthouse
<_reward> Gold Ore price increased
NewTranslation:
我已经幕后牵线搭桥，说服法院弥补一些你的努力。现在，我很高兴的告诉你，只要你建设一座灯塔，黄金矿的价格就会上升

<_objective>建设一座灯塔
<_reward>黄金矿价格上升

Text: My smuggler contacts offer to help us come up with the ransom. As long as they get paid, that is. If you ask me, that snotty highborn Prince isn't worth all this effort, but it's your call.
NewTranslation: 我的走私贩愿意为我们走私赎金。只要付他们钱。你开口，我立刻叫他们去办。那个流鼻涕的王子值不上你这么多努力。决定权在你！

Text:
A new trade route for importing Gold Ore has become available. Please note that Gold Ore is imported at its normal price and the colony will lose money if we take advantage of this deal.

Viva la Revolucion!
NewTranslation:
新的黄金矿进口路线可用。请注意，黄金矿将以正常价格进口，如果我们利用这条贸易路线的话，殖民地将会赔钱。

革命万岁！

Text: A Small Mind Is A Tidy Mind
NewTranslation: 没有思想就是纯洁的思想

Text: As my father used to say - ignorance is bliss.
NewTranslation: 我父亲常说-傻逼有傻福。

Text:
Tropicans are getting too smart for their own good. It is our duty to make them stupid and docile. I heard that needles can do that to you.

<_objective> Issue the "Immunization Campaign" edict
NewTranslation:
岛民们变得太聪明了。我们应该把他们变蠢，让他们温顺起来。我听说针管能帮你做到这些。

<_objective>颁布“接种疫苗”法令

Text: Event - tried to dumb down Tropicans through vaccines
NewTranslation: 事件-试图利用疫苗让岛民变蠢

Text: Curse you, pseudoscience! That last plan didn't work!
NewTranslation: 诅咒你，伪科学！上次的计划并没有奏效！

Text:
We have no statistically significant dumbing down. Lets go traditional and just use television to brainwash the citizens.

<_objective> Have <amount> TV stations
<_reward> +10 Nationalists relations
NewTranslation:
统计学角度看，我们并没有让岛民显著变蠢。让我们试试传统方法，用电视机给岛民洗脑。
<_objective>拥有<amount>个电视台
<_reward>加10与民族主义者关系

Text: Event - Tried to dumb down Tropicans through TV stations
NewTranslation: 事件-试图利用电视台使岛民变蠢
如果你搞不过他们，那就加入他们

Text: Presidente, I'm shocked, but it seems that our citizens are impervious to dumbing!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我震惊了，我们的岛民完全没有变蠢的迹象！

Text:
I guess they already hit the rock bottom. Before our citizens start digging down, I propose to promote Tropican smartness!

<_objective> Have <amount> Colleges
<_reward> +10 Nationalists relations
NewTranslation:
我猜想电视台已经尽力了。在我们的岛民继续变蠢之前，我提议晋升那些聪明的岛民！

<_objective>拥有<amount>所大学
<_reward>加10与民族主义者关系

Text: Banks are the only good thing in this evil, evil world. Banks keep the world afloat.
NewTranslation: 银行是这个邪恶时间里唯一的好东西。银行维持着世界运行。

Text:
Without banks, everything will collapse to the darkness of the medieval ages. Banks are a cure-all and we can't possibly have enough of them.

<_objective> Have <amount> Banks
<_reward> +10 Globalist relations
NewTranslation:
没用银行，一切都将坍塌陷入中世纪的黑暗中。银行是万能之药，我们永远都不嫌数量多。

<_objective>拥有<amount>家银行
<_reward>加10与全球主义者关系

Text: Event - built Banks for the Globalists
NewTranslation: 事件-为全球主义者建设银行

Text: Despite the banks' benevolence and responsibility the unthinkable has happened.
NewTranslation: 尽管银行仁慈而充满责任感，但是意想不到的事还是发生了。

Text:
The Banks have lost everyone's money. Gone...like fairy dust. We need a scapegoat.

Who shall we blame?
NewTranslation:
银行丢了所有人得钱。不见了，就想仙尘一样。我们需要一个替罪羔羊。
这该怪谁呢？

Text: The rich do nothing but sit in their ivory towers and play games with the lives of the poor!
NewTranslation: 富人什么都不做，整天坐在象牙塔里以操纵贫民的生活取乐。

Text:
The rich are to blame for everything. Let's redistribute their wealth to the needy.

<_objective> Issue the "Wealth Tax" edict
<_reward> +10 Communist relations
NewTranslation:
一切都怪富人。让我们把这些财富分给有需要的人。

<_objective>颁布“财富税”法令
<_reward>加10与共产主义与者关系

Text: It's every man for himself, except that we need the banks, and we... need the wealthy.
NewTranslation: 人人为己，但是我们需要银行，需要富人。

Text:
We should support the rich and let the poor feed on their scraps. It's called "trickle-down economy". Look it up.

<_objective> Issue the "Tax Cut" edict
<_reward> +10 Capitalist relations
NewTranslation:
我们需要支持富人，让穷人自食其果吧。这就叫“滴入式经济”。你查查看！

<_objective>颁布“减税”法令
<_reward>加10与资本主义者关系

Text: I knew it, Presidente! I just knew it - those foreigners are jealous of us and want to harm Tropico!
NewTranslation: 我就知道，总统阁下！我就知道！这些外国人嫉妒我们，想要危害海岛。

Text:
I want to punch all of them so hard, but our diplomats told me that this could mean war and would harm you. Let's show them they aren't wanted here!

<_objective> Have no foreign powers in your Embassies
NewTranslation:
我真想痛扁他们，但是我们的外交官告诉我这可能会带来战争，战争意味着伤害。所以让我们把他们赶走吧，他们在海岛不受欢迎。

<_objective>大使馆没有外国势力

Text: Event - expelled all foreign powers for the Nationalists
NewTranslation: 事件-为民族主义者驱逐所以外国势力

Text: A famous Californian Governor once said what can't be accomplished with money, can be accomplished with lots of money.
NewTranslation: 一位著名的加州总督曾经说过，钱不能解决的事，很多钱就能解决。

Text:
I have the same saying but with banks. It is obvious that we need to throw even more banks at the problem. The bankers solemnly promised they will never allow such a crisis to occur ever again. If they fail to comply they will be severely berated publicly.

<_objective> Have <amount> Banks
<_reward> +10 Globalists relations
NewTranslation:
对于银行，我也是这么认为的。我们需要投更多的钱建银行来解决这个问题。银行家们答应他们再也不会让这种危机发生了。要是还发生，他们将被公开受到严厉的斥责。

<_objective>拥有<amount>家银行
<_reward>加10与全球主义者关系

Text: Event - boosted the banking sector to resolve a crisis
NewTranslation: 事件-扩大银行规模来解决危机
为了更好的生活，与欧盟建交

Text: The EU seems to be rolling in cash, and they seem to be handing it out to all sorts of riffraff.
NewTranslation: 欧盟似乎很有钱，而且他们好像什么乌合之众都会给点。

Text:
Why shouldn't we take some of their money for our own needs?

<_objective> Invite the EU in one of your Embassies
<_reward> +10 EU relations
NewTranslation:
为什么我们不拿点他们的钱来满足我们的需要呢？

<_objective>在大使馆中与欧盟建交
<_reward>加10与欧盟关系

Text:
We have reached the EU call center for diplomatic relations. 

For financial aid we should press '1'
To try to adopt the Euro as your currency press '2'
To complain about the European Union press '3'
To apply for an European grant press '4'

To reach an operator press '9'
NewTranslation:
我们成功拨通了欧盟外交服务呼叫中心。

经济援助请按“1”
货币采用欧元请按“2”
投诉欧盟请按“3”
申请欧盟拨款请按“4”
人工服务请按“9”

Text: We received all the documentation to apply for financial aid. All how many gazillion pages of it.
NewTranslation: 我们收到了申请经济援助的全部文件。总共有多少亿页来着？？

Text:
I can not sift through this alone. I will need a lot of Tropicans filling out forms simultaneously if we are to have a chance of finishing in the next 300 years.

<_objective> Have <amount> Offices
<_reward> +10 EU relations; +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
我一个人填不完这些表格。要是想在300年之内完成它的话，我需要很多岛民帮我一起填。

<_objective>拥有<amount>间办公楼
<_reward>加10与欧盟关系；+$<MoneyReward>

Text: I finally managed to get a hold of a EU diplomat and ask him about adopting the Euro. He says it's fine as long as we give it a loving home.
NewTranslation: 我终于成功的让一个欧盟外交家和我通了会电话。我问他关于采用欧元的事，他说可以，只要我们让他们有个甜蜜的家。

Text:
There are some restrictions though - no partying after 9, no drinking until the legal age has been reached, that sort of stuff. 

Still the most important thing is the loving home, so we better get to it.

<_objective> Have <amount> Welfare & Media buildings
<_reward> +10 EU relations; Adopt the Euro and become its new father.
NewTranslation:
但是还有些限制条件-9点后不能聚会，法定年龄之前不能饮酒，大概就是这些。

最重要的还是那个甜蜜的家，所以我们最好赶紧开始。

<_objective>拥有<amount>座福利和媒体建筑
<_reward>加10与欧盟关系；采用欧元，成为欧元之父。

Text: Presidente, after being on hold for months I finally got through to the EU diplomatic call center.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，在等了几个月后我终于接通了欧盟外交服务呼叫中心。

Text:
They say that in order to complain about the EU we must praise it first. Otherwise, our complain will be invalid.

<_objective> Praise the EU
<_reward> +10 EU relations
NewTranslation:
他们说，要想投诉欧盟需要先赞美它。否则，我们的投诉无效。

<_objective>赞美欧盟
<_reward>加10与欧盟关系

Text: Presidente, I heard that it's so fashionable to in get involved with EU projects! That's why I shifted Tropico closer to Europe on the official maps, so that we can take part too!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我听说现在很流行加入欧盟项目！那就是为什么我在官方地图上把海岛画的离欧洲更近的原因，这样我们就能加入欧盟项目啦！

Text:
We have to build Infrastructure but the deadlines in the project are so ridiculous that we have to build like crazy. Of course, they will shower us in money if we manage it.

<_objective> Build <amount> Infrastructure buildings
<_timelimit> 2 years
<_reward> +$<HugeEUReward>
NewTranslation:
我们得建些基础设施，但是项目期限实在是太奇葩啦，截止时间前我们得拼了老命加班加点。如果我们搞得定的话，他们会给我们大把的钱！

<_objective>建设<amount>座基础建筑
<_timelimit>2年
<_reward>+$<HugeEUReward>
同一个世界，同一个梦想

Text: Splendid old boy, Tropico is most certainly becoming an important player in the process of globalization.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，毫无疑问现在海岛肯定成为全球化进程中重要的一员。

Text: Thus the Globalists want to express their respect towards you with a bit of old-fashioned lobbyism.
NewTranslation: 因此全球化主义者希望就您老旧办公设施做一些回报。
岛上出现更多全球化主义者

Text: My Communist comrades are happy with your decisions.
NewTranslation: 我们的共产主义领袖对您的决定非常满意。

Text: They have sent us something to express their gratitude.
NewTranslation: 他们想送您些东西表达感谢。
岛上出现更多共产主义者

Text: I do believe I should continue rewarding you for those few times you manage to actually deliver on some task or other.
NewTranslation: 我想应该对你完成的一些艰难任务做一些奖励。

Text: This way it will become more of a reflex to take good decisions. Please choose a reward:
NewTranslation: 这样从今往后，只要遇到问题都会下意识做出正确的判断。来吧，选择你想要的奖励:
岛上出现更多资本主义者

Text: Presidente, the Nationalists are prouder than ever to be Tropicans!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，现在身为岛民的民族主义者比任何时候都更感到自豪！

Text: They are willing to give you their most precious. Take one of their rewards:
NewTranslation: 他们想尽可能的回报您，手下他们的礼物吧！
岛上出现更多民族主义者
您好，这里是欧盟奖惩中心

Text: We have reached the EU reward center.
NewTranslation: 我们刚接通了欧盟奖惩中心的电话。

Text:
For $<MoneyReward> press '1'
To have your resource prices increased by 30% for 2 years press '2'
To receive 2 free Infrastructure buildings press '3'

To receive $$<FakeSwissReward>, a yacht, and an all-expenses-paid trip to a beautiful Caribbean island press '9'

What shall we choose?
NewTranslation:
若需要$<MoneyReward>资金奖励请按'1'
若需要提成30%商品价格请按'2'
若需要2栋免费基础设施请按'3'

想获取巨额瑞士银行资金$$<FakeSwissReward>并享受免费加勒比海岛双飞3日游请按'9'

没事请挂机。

Text: A troublesome band of corsairs have come to steal your treasures!
NewTranslation: 一整船大胡子海盗要来抢走你的宝物了！

Text:
Those greedy pirates have learned of your vast riches. They'll burn down our buildings and rob us blind. You have to stop them!

Use your troops to defend your buildings and drive out the raiding pirates.
NewTranslation:
那大胡子海岛明知道你的宝物在哪，但还是一路打砸抢烧！你必须阻止他们！

用你的部队保护建筑并赶走他们！

Text: Some citizens are protesting against the government. Negotiating will start a task to appease them.
NewTranslation: 有的市民正在抗议政府，与之谈判可以平息他们

Text: Presidente, I have information that a Great War will start soon. We must be prepared!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我收到情报称第一次世界大战即将开始，我们最好做足准备！

Text:
Even if my information is wrong, we should still prepare ourselves. Then we can start the war ourselves.

<_objective> Build <amount> Barracks
<_reward> $ <MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
就算我的情报有误，我们也应该做好万全之策以便我们主动开战
<_objective>建造<amount>兵营
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: The Illuminati High Council held its usual drawing of lots to decide who has to die to kick off the great war.
NewTranslation: 光照会高级委员会举行常规会议决定谁去死来引发第一次世界大战。

Text:
The "winner" is Franz Ferdinand. He wasn't thrilled about it. 

The bookmakers are taking bets who will be the lucky assassin. I say we participate as well.

Select a dynasty member who will attempt to murder Franz Ferdinand.
NewTranslation:
“赢家”是弗朗兹·斐迪南，他并不对此感到兴奋。著作家就谁会是幸运的杀手下赌注，我们也加入吧。

选择一名愿意去刺杀弗朗茨·斐迪南的家族成员。

Text: Let somebody else kill him (Lose 20 standing with the Militarists)
NewTranslation: 换一个人去做掉他(失去20点军国分子的支持)

Text: Franz Ferdinand is going to Serbia. All would-be assassins will have to get him while he is there.
NewTranslation: 弗朗兹·费迪南要前往塞尔维亚。他在那里后所有可能是杀手的人都不得不干掉他。

Text:
We will need to get our man in the country.

<_objective> Send a delegation to the Allies or the Axis. You will need an Embassy
NewTranslation:
我们得安排自己人去那个国家
<_objective>派遣使团前往同盟国或轴心国，你需要大使馆。

Text: A war has started as a result of Franz Ferdinand's assassination. Let's hope it's going to be a great one.
NewTranslation: 作为斐迪南被暗杀的后果，引发了一场战争。让我们拭目以待是漂亮的一战吧。

Text: Since we won the bet, we can pick our spoils:
NewTranslation: 既然我们赢了赌注，就可以选择自己的战利品:

Text: The Great Communist Revolution started in Russia. Unfortunately, it was a resounding success. Now they have no one to revolt against.
NewTranslation: 伟大的共产主义革命始于俄罗斯。不幸的是，他们革命得太彻底了，结果现在没人和他们玩了。

Text:
That is why they are trying to export it and they are selling it cheap to brother nations like ours.

<_objective> Pay $<skip_amount> to import the Communist revolution
<_reward> +10 Communists
NewTranslation:
这就是为什么他们尽量出口并且低价卖给兄弟国家，比如说我国。

<_objective>支付$<skip_amount>进口共产主义革命
<_reward>+10共产党

Text: Now that we have bought the Revolution, we can export it to other brother and sister countries.
NewTranslation: 既然我们购买了革命，就可以出口别的到兄弟姐妹国家。

Text:
However, in accordance with the principles of Lenin we should mass produce it for all. Therefore, we should put it in a can and sell it to the World.

<_objective> Export <amount> Canned Goods
<_reward> +10 Communists standing
NewTranslation:
然而为了与列宁的主义一致，我们应该为全人类大量生产。因此，我们应该装在罐头里面再销往全球。

<_objective>出口<amount>灌装商品
<_reward>+10共产党支持

Text: Now we have exported the Revolution, it is time to reap the benefits. Our comrades across the world will join us if we let them.
NewTranslation: 我们现在出口了革命，是时候收获果实了。只要我们愿意全世界同志们都会加入我们。

Text:
We just need to build some space for them.

<_effect> 5 Communists will arrive each year  for as long as you keep the housing quality above 40 (up to 10 years)
NewTranslation:
我们得给他们腾点地。

<_effect>只要你保持房屋质量在40(直到10年)以上，每年增加5名共产党。

Text: How could you buy the useless communist revolution, Mr. President? This thing is unusable and not worth the effort.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，你怎么能买如此没用的革命？这货不仅没用而且不值得费力。

Text:
Anyway, I may manage to find a buyer but you will have to increase the happiness of people so we can claim the communist revolution actually does something.

<_objective> Increase the <text_param> to <amount>
<_effect> Cancels the Communist task
<_reward> $<reward>
NewTranslation:
无论如何，我会尽力找到买家，但是你得增加人民的幸福度，然后我们可以宣称共产主义革命确实有用。

<_objective>增加<text_param>到<amount>
<_effect>取消共产主义任务
<_reward>$<reward>

Text: How could you buy that worthless communist revolution, Presidente? The thing is completely unusable and not worth the effort.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，你怎么能买如此没用的革命？这货不仅没用而且不值得费力。

Text:
Anyway, I may manage to find a buyer but you will have to increase the happiness of people so we can claim the communist revolution actually does something.

<_objective> Increase the <text_param> to <amount>
<_effect> Cancels the Communist task
<_reward> $<reward>
NewTranslation:
无论如何，我会尽力找到买家，但是你得增加人民的幸福度，然后我们可以宣称共产主义革命确实有用。

<_objective>增加<text_param>到<amount>
<_effect>取消共产主义任务
<_reward>$<reward>

Text: How could you buy that worthless communist revolution, Presidente? The thing is completely unusable and not worth the effort.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，你怎么能买如此没用的革命？这货不仅没用而且不值得费力。

Text:
Anyway, I may manage to find a buyer but you will have to increase the happiness of people so we can claim the communist revolution actually does something.

<_objective> Increase the <text_param> to <amount>
<_effect> Cancels the Communist task
<_reward> $<reward>
NewTranslation:
无论如何，我会尽力找到买家，但是你得增加人民的幸福度，然后我们可以宣称共产主义革命确实有用。

<_objective>增加<text_param>到<amount>
<_effect>取消共产主义任务
<_reward>$<reward>

Text: Presidente, the world has changed. We need to create a dystopian future where everything is bleak - worlds like that will be a real hit in the future.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，世界已经变了。我们得创造一个一片暗淡的，错位的未来-那样的世界对未来才是一个真正沉重的打击。

Text:
For that we will need industry - preferably of the more polluting kind. Also we would need more than one as otherwise it would be impossible to form an evil corporation.

<_objective> Have <amount> different industries on the island
<_reward> Steel Mill Technology
NewTranslation:
因此我们需要工业-更具污染的那种，而且不止一个，不然不能成为邪恶集团。

<_objective>有<amount>岛上有不同行业
<_reward>轧钢厂科技

Text: The war has the price of steel rising steadily. We should capitalize on that right now.
NewTranslation: 战争使得钢材价格稳步上升，我们现在要利用好机会。

Text:
You can not have a dystopic future without Steel everywhere.

<_objective> Build a Steel Mill
<_reward> +10 Capitalists relations
NewTranslation:
没有随处可见的轧钢厂便没有一个错位的未来。

<_objective>建造一个轧钢厂
<_reward>+10资本主义关系

Text: The Axis is currently in desperate need of steel. I worked my feminine wiles on them and they offered us a contract.
NewTranslation: 轴心国目前急需钢材。我略施美人计就得到了他们的合同订单。

Text: The Allies on the other hand will give us a hefty reward if we don't export Steel to the Axis. I just love playing with my trade partners.
NewTranslation: 另一方面如果我们不出口给轴心国钢材同盟国会给我们一个重大奖励。我就喜欢玩弄我的贸易伙伴。

Text: Make Contract with the Axis (Trade offer for Steel; -20 Allies relations)
NewTranslation: 与轴心国签署合同(钢材生意；-20同盟国关系)

Text: Accept Allies offer ($<choice_param1>; Can't export Steel to Axis; - 20 Axis relations)
NewTranslation: 接受同盟国提议($<choice_param1>；不对轴心国出口钢材；-20轴心国关系)

Text: Hmm, cash flow has increased. My books on psychology say I should offer you a reward so you'll start making smarter choices more often.
NewTranslation: 嗯，现金流动已经有所增加。我的心理学书告诉我应该给你奖励，你以后才会做更多机智的选择。
进口便宜钢铁的贸易航路
进口便宜可乐的贸易航路

Text: It's a great time to be a diplomat - everyone is running left and right trying to get allies for the Great War. Banquets and lavish gifts are becoming part of my daily routine.
NewTranslation: 现在是做外交官的黄金时机-所有人都在四处奔波为第一次世界大战寻找盟友，丰盛的晚宴和贵重礼品逐渐变成我生活的一部分。

Text:
Both sides offer big rewards for potential allies. How about we build an Embassy and invite someone here so they can give us even better gifts.

<_objective> Build an Embassy and invite a foreign power
<_reward> +20 relations to the foreign power invited
NewTranslation:
双方都给潜在盟友提供巨大奖励。为什么我们不建造一座使馆邀请一些人来，我们可以得到更好的礼品。

<_objective>建造一座使馆并邀请一方外国势力
<_reward>+20邀请的外国势力的关系

Text: I say, good chap, my fellow diplomats want to us to commit the sin of tautology. In other words they want us to ally with the Allies and to give the Axis the axe.
NewTranslation: 我说，小伙子，我的外交官兄弟们想要断我们赘述罪。换句话说他们想让我们与轴心国结盟，给予他们一臂之力。

Text:
The rewards of this will be great but so is the risk. The Axis have a counter-offer and are threatening to attack if we join the Allies.

<_objective> Join the Allies by forming an Alliance. This will cancel the offer from the Axis.
<_reward> +20 Allies relations; -20 Axis relations
NewTranslation:
巨大的风险与奖励同在，轴心国与我们讨价还价，威胁说如果我们加入同盟国将攻击我国。

<_objective>成立联盟以加入同盟国。这将取消轴心国提议。
<_reward>+20同盟国关系；-20轴心国关系

Text: Our friends with the affection for shouting want you to form an alliance with them. Very, very loudly.
NewTranslation: 我们的朋友带着这种情绪大声疾呼想要你跟他们结盟，非常非常的大声。

Text:
Meanwhile, the Allies are throwing a counter-offer at us. The decision is your, old chap.

<_objective> Join the Axis by forming an Alliance. This will cancel the offer from the Allies.
<_reward> +20 Axis relation; -20 Allies relations
NewTranslation:
与此同时，同盟国也在跟我们还价。小伙子，决定权在你手上。

<_objective>结盟以加入轴心国，这将取消同盟国的提议。
<_reward>+20轴心国关系；-20同盟国关系

Text: Good show, old chap! Those Axis blokes give me the heebie-jeebies. I'm afraid this also means I will have to consort with those even snobbier than I. Yet such is the fate of any good diplomat.
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮，小伙子！这些轴心国的家伙真让我神经过敏。我怕这意味着我讲不得不与这些比我还要无耻的家伙打交道，然而这就是任何外交官的命。

Text: The good chaps have offered to shower us in rewards for our excellent behavior and immense virtue.
NewTranslation: 因为我们出色的表现和众多优良品质，那个好家伙给了我们大量的奖励。

Text: 2 free  buildings from the Raw Resources category
NewTranslation: 2个免费建筑从原材料分类中获得

Text: 10% increase of export prices for 2 years
Good job, old boy! Best stay away from those snobs who call themselves "Allied diplomats". Although I'm afraid I will have to listen to a lot of shouting now.
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮！小伙子，最好远离这些自称“同盟国外交官”的小人。尽管我担心现在会备受指责。

Text: The Axis have offered us several rewards hoping we will strengthen our military forces and help them in the war.
NewTranslation: 轴心国给我们提供一些奖励，希望我们增强我们的军事实力在战争中协助他们。

Text: 1 free building from the Industry (Goods) category
NewTranslation: 1个免费建筑从行业(产品)类别获得

Text: Good show, old chap! Those smug bastards are pleased.
NewTranslation: 干得好！老兄，那些自以为是的杂种都很满意。

Text: The good chaps have offered to shower us in rewards for our excellent behavior and immense virtue.
NewTranslation: 因为我们出色的表现和众多优良品质，那个好家伙给了我们大量的奖励。

Text: 2 free  buildings from the Raw Resources category
NewTranslation: 从原材料分类获得2个新建筑

Text: 10% increase of export prices for 2 years
Good job, old chap! I just participated in a very positive shouting match with the Axis diplomats. They are pleased.
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮，小伙子！我刚同轴心国的外交官家伙们干了一场口水战，他们现在被我骂得服服贴贴。

Text: The Axis have offered us several rewards hoping we will strengthen our military forces and help them in the war.
NewTranslation: 轴心国给我们提供一些奖励，希望我们增强我们的军事实力在战争中协助他们。

Text: 1 free building from the Industry (Goods) category
NewTranslation: 1个免费建筑从行业(商品)分类中获得

Text: My boy, if you are sick of those snobs we have in the embassy (I know I am), we have an alternative. The Axis is offering us a huge monetary boost if we give the Allies the boot.
NewTranslation: 小的们，不管你们怎样，反正我是受够了这些使馆里的势力小人！我们有了一个新的出路，如果我们把同盟国踹出去，轴心国就会给我们不错的回报。

Text:
<_objective> Expel the Allies from the Embassy. This will cancel the Allies task to form an Alliance
<_reward> +$<MoneyReward>; +20 Axis relations
NewTranslation:
<_objective>从大使馆驱逐同盟国的人，会取消和同盟国结盟的任务
<_reward>+$<MoneyReward>；+20轴心国关系

Text: If your ears are ringing from all the shouting of those Axis chaps and you are just as disgustingly sick of Bavarian drinking songs, we have an alternative.
NewTranslation: 如果你的耳朵一直被那些轴心国家伙的叫嚣所骚扰，也受够了恶心的巴伐利亚式饮酒歌，现在我们有别的选择。

Text:
The Allies are willing to forgive and forget if we expulse the Axis and will even give us some change to spare.

<_objective> Expel the Axis from the Embassy. This will cancel the Axis task to form an Alliance
<_reward> +$<MoneyReward>; +20 Allies relations
NewTranslation:
如果我们驱逐出轴心国，同盟国愿意既往不咎而且还会提供一些零钱。

<_objective>从大使馆驱逐轴心国的人，会取消和轴心国结盟的任务
<_reward>+$<MoneyReward>；+20同盟国关系

Text: I received word from my dear comrade-at-arms, the leader of La Resistance.
NewTranslation: 我从情同手足的同志，抵抗组织的领袖那里收到了消息。

Text:
The Nazi occupiers are proving too tough for their men! They need some of our world-famous soldiers to deal a crushing blow to their enemies. 

Let's help them promptly, old chap!

<_objective> Have <amount> soldiers
<_reward> + 10 Allies relations; +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
事实证明纳粹占领者对他们太过严苛！他们需要一些举世闻名的士兵对他们的敌人来一次毁灭性打击。

我们赶快帮助他们吧，老兄！

<_objective>有<amount>大兵
<_reward>+10同盟国关系；+$<MoneyReward>

Text: My dear friend, the leader of the Resistance is in dire need of our help again.
NewTranslation: 我亲爱朋友，抵抗组织的领袖又一次极其需要你的协助。

Text:
Due to a series of events that would be quite amusing under different circumstances they have ran out of carrier-pigeons. They need new animals to use as messengers. 

<_objective> Build Ranches of all types
<_reward> + 10 Allies relations; +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
因为一连串在不同情况或许会显得搞笑的事件-信鸽告罄。他们需要新的动物作为信使。

<_objective>建造各种类型的牧场
<_reward>+10同盟国关系；+$<MoneyReward>

Text: The Resistance seems to be on its feet again, but my brave friend and their leader are once again in need of help.
NewTranslation: 抵抗组织似乎是站稳了脚步，但是我们勇敢的朋友和他们的领袖再一次需要我们的帮助。

Text:
They want to infiltrate the German headquarters and write obscenities on all their war maps. They need help procuring fake German uniforms

<_objective> Build a Textile Mill
<_reward> + 10 Allies relations; +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
他们想要渗透德军总部，然后在其军事地图上写些下流话。需要我们帮助生产假的德军制服。

<_objective>建造一个纺织厂
<_reward>+10同盟国关系；+$<MoneyReward>

Text: The Germans found us out. We should not have printed those "Made in Tropico" stickers.
NewTranslation: 德国人发现我们了，早知道就不该印刷“海岛制造”标签。

Text:
If we don't destroy all Textile factories on the island they will know it was us for sure.

<_effect> Axis relations will be greatly reduced if you do no destroy all your Textile Mills
NewTranslation:
如果我们不摧毁岛上所有纺织厂他们肯定会知道是我们干的。

<_effect>轴心国关系会骤减如果你不摧毁你的所有纺织厂
发现法国军队(举白旗技能)

Text: The Resistance and the French nation are in our debt.
NewTranslation: 抵抗组织和法国都欠我们的。

Text: Pick a reward, my friend and let us drink wine to the success of the brave French Resistance!
NewTranslation: 捡起那个奖品吧，我的朋友，让我们为英勇的法国抵抗组织干了这杯热翔！

Text: Cows make bad messengers. Who would have thought?
NewTranslation: 奶牛是坏信使，谁能想到？

Text: We finally taught the stupid beasts to go where we want them to but they are just too conspicuous and get easily offended when soldiers pass remarks about them.
NewTranslation: 我们总算教会了蠢畜生前往指定地点，但是它们太过显眼所以士兵间谈论它们时总是生气。

Text: Goats make decent messengers, but they tend to eat everything. Including the message.
NewTranslation: 山羊是极好的信使，但是他们啥都会吃，包括信件

Text: Hopefully, we will be able to work around that by then imprinting the message in the cheese made from the goat milk.
NewTranslation: 幸运的是，我们围绕其展开工作并成功把情报铭刻在用羊奶做成的奶酪上。

Text: Llamas are great. Everything is better with llamas.
NewTranslation: 美洲驼非常好。有美洲鸵在一切都好。

Text: Unfortunately, they are not native to Europe. Everybody notices them and reads the message. We even lost some llamas as German soldiers took them on as pets.
NewTranslation: 遗憾的是，他们不是原产于欧洲。所有的人都注意到了它们，也读了信。我们甚至损失了一部分美洲驼因为德军士兵把它们拿去当作宠物饲养。

Text: Pigs are excellent messengers- they are smart and relatively fast. Unfortunately, they tend to become bacon before they reach their destination.
NewTranslation: 猪是很棒的信使，他们聪明又灵敏，遗憾的是他们在到达目的地之前就被做成了腊肉

Text: Maybe we should not send something so delicious to a land at war filled with hungry people.
NewTranslation: 也许我们不该向正处于战争且充满了饥苦人民的国家输送如此美味的东西。

Text:
Both the Allies and the Axis are in dire need of supplies. This means we can sell at a huge profit and they can't say "No".

<_objective> Export <amount> <_AlliesResourceName>. If you accept this task, the respective offer from the Axis will be canceled.
<_reward> +10 Allies relations
NewTranslation:
同盟国和轴心国现在都极其需要补给，也就意味着我们可以卖给他们赚取高额利益并且他们不能说“不”。
<_objective>出口<amount><_AlliesResourceName>。如果你接受这项任务则轴心国的提议会被取消。
<_reward>+10同盟国关系

Text: Now we have them right where we want them. Time for a little gouging. I really should see about getting myself a villainous laugh.
NewTranslation: 总算有用到他们的时候了，是时候来小小搜刮一下。我真应该看看我恶毒的笑脸。

Text: How much should we raise the price?
NewTranslation: 我们应该把价格提高多少？

Text: Increase the price of <_AlliesResourceName> by 20% (+20 Capitalists relations; -10 Allies Relations)
NewTranslation: 将<_AlliesResourceName>的价格提高20%(与资本主义派系关系+20；与同盟国关系-10)

Text: Increase the price of <_AlliesResourceName> by 10% (+10 Capitalist relations)
NewTranslation: 将<_AlliesResourceName>的价格提高10%(与资本主义派系关系+10)

Text: Do not increase the price (-10 Capitalist relations; +20 Allies relations)
NewTranslation: 我们不会加价(与资本主义派系关系-10；与同盟国关系+20)

Text: Raised the price of Tropican exports
NewTranslation: 提升海岛产品的出口价格

Text: Raised the price of Tropican exports
NewTranslation: 提升海岛产品的出口价格

Text: Didn't raise the price of Tropican exports
NewTranslation: 不提升海岛产品的出口价格

Text:
Both the Allies and the Axis are in dire need of supplies. This means we can sell at a huge profit and they can't say "No".

<_objective> Export <amount> <_AxisResourceName>. If you accept this task, the respective offer from the Allies will be canceled.
<_reward> +10 Axis relations
NewTranslation:
同盟国和轴心国都急需物资供应。也就是说我们能大捞一笔，而他们却不能说“不”字。

<_objective>出口<amount><_AxisResourceName>。如果你接受了这个任务，所有与同盟国的贸易将会被取消。
<_reward>与轴心国关系+10

Text: Now we have them right where we want them. Time for a little gouging. I really should see about getting myself a villainous laugh.
NewTranslation: 现在我们终于将他们整到我们希望的方向上，是时候小小地敲个竹杠了。嚯嚯嚯嚯~我得意的笑~得意地笑~

Text: How much should we raise the price?
NewTranslation: 我们应该把价格提高多少？

Text: Increase the price of <_AxisResourceName> by 20% (+20 Capitalists relations; -10 Axis Relations)
NewTranslation: 将<_AxisResourceName>的价格提高20%(与资本主义派系关系+20；与轴心国关系-10)

Text: Increase the price of <_AxisResourceName> by 10% (+10 Capitalist relations)
NewTranslation: 将<_AxisResourceName>的价格提高10%(与资本主义派系关系+10)

Text: Do not increase the price (-10 Capitalist relations; +20 Axis relations)
NewTranslation: 我们才不会加价呢(与资本主义派系关系-10；与轴心国关系+20)

Text: Raised the price of Tropican exports
NewTranslation: 提升海岛产品的出口价格

Text: Didn't rise the price of Tropican exports
NewTranslation: 不提升海岛产品的出口价格

Text: 20% reduced building cost for all Industry buildings in the next 4 years
NewTranslation: 未来4年里所有工业建筑的造价减少20%

Text: My research indicates that the US will soon be introducing a Prohibition.
NewTranslation: 我的研究表明…美国很快将推行禁酒令

Text:
Common sense dictates that the bootlegging will become huge and we can make huge profits out of it.

<_objective> Have <amount> Rum Distillery
<_reward> +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
常识告诉我们，私酒将会变得泛滥，而我们能在其中大捞一笔。

<_objective>拥有<amount>座朗姆酒酿造厂
<_reward>+$<MoneyReward>

Text: The Prohibition has started, so now is the time to flood the markets with illegal alcohol.
NewTranslation: 禁酒令已经开始了，现在是时候用我们的非法酒精淹没市场了。

Text:
I speculate that this will lead to an influx of criminal elements. And will have bad political repercussions. However, profits will be immense. 

<_objective> Export <amount> Rum; The price of Rum will increase by 20%
<_reward> +$<MoneyReward>; -20 Allies relations; More Crime Lords on the island
NewTranslation:
我估摸着这将会成为犯罪的源头，而且还会带来政治灾难。但是利润却不可估量。

<_objective>出口<amount>朗姆酒；朗姆酒的价格将提高20%
<_reward>+$<MoneyReward>；与同盟国关系-20；海岛上出现更多犯罪

Text: Our friends in the States are not pleased. I would even go so far as to say that they are downright livid at our exporting Rum to a dry nation.
NewTranslation: 我们的老朋友在美国可不高兴。我甚至能说他简直被我们把朗姆酒出口到那个禁酒的国家气得吹胡子瞪眼。

Text: They are sending us an ultimatum but I prefer to think of it as a choice - stop exporting or face the consequences.
NewTranslation: 他们正在向我发送最后通牒，但是我更愿意将他视为一种选择-停止出口，或者准备好棺材。
拆除所有朗姆酒酿造厂(与同盟国关系+40；+$<MoneyReward>)

Text: Send a dynasty member to negotiate
NewTranslation: 派遣一个家族成员进行谈判

Text: Our friends in the States are not pleased. I would even go so far as to say that they are rather livid about our exporting Rum to a dry nation.
NewTranslation: 因为我们把朗姆酒出口到那个禁酒的国家，我们的老朋友在美国可不高兴，我甚至可以负责地说他简直被我们气得吹胡子瞪眼，

Text:
As per our recent agreement, we have decided to forfeit all Rum production.

<_objective> Demolish all Rum Distilleries
<_reward> +40 Allies relations; +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
依据我们最近的协议，我们决定放弃生产朗姆酒。

<_objective>拆除所有朗姆酒酿造厂
<_reward>与同盟国关系+40；+$<MoneyReward>
拆除所有朗姆酒酿造厂

Text: Our American friends are getting tired of not drinking. Can't say I blame them. Still, they need some help or they're likely to fall off the wagon.
NewTranslation: 我们的美国朋友越来越厌倦不喝酒的日子，当然，我并没有在责怪他们。因此，他们需要一些帮助，否则他们就会酒瘾复发。

Text:
We will be greatly rewarded if we enact a Prohibition ourselves.

<_objective> Issue the "Prohibition" edict. You will not be able to turn it off for at least 2 years
<_reward> +20 Allies relations; +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
如果我们颁布禁酒令，我们将会得到一大笔油水。

<_objective>颁布“禁酒令”法令。至少两年内你将无法取消它。
<_reward>与同盟国关系+20；+$<MoneyReward>

Text: Our brave negotiator was so convincing that Congress has decided to repeal the Prohibition.
NewTranslation: 与我们勇敢的外交家舌战之后，议会决定撤销禁酒令。

Text: This means that we will be able to resume our exports but at normal prices.
NewTranslation: 这意味着我们可以恢复出口，但是价格会恢复到正常。

Text: Helped repeal the Prohibition in the US
NewTranslation: 帮助美国撤销了禁酒令

Text: Your valiant dynasty member decided that he'd rather stay in America and become a rich crime lord instead.
NewTranslation: 你勇敢的家族成员决定，他宁愿留在美国，成为一个有钱的大罪犯。

Text: He is denouncing the dynasty but at least he took the heat off from our nation and we can continue to export.
NewTranslation: 他在谴责我们家族，但至少他从海岛带走热量，让我们能继续出口。

Text: You can not deactivate this edict because of the agreement with the US
NewTranslation: 目前与美国有协议，因此你无法废除这个法令

Text: You can not deactivate this edict because of the agreement with the US
NewTranslation: 目前与美国有协议，因此你无法废除这个法令

Text: Well hello there, old chum! America is all gloomy and doomy at the moment. I can't have that. If there's one thing I can't abide, it's mopery.
NewTranslation: 你好么老朋友！现在美国人都是那么悲观和绝望。而我可不会那样。如果只有一件事我无法忍受，那就是闲逛。

我们必须立刻采取行动。为每一个美国男人，女人和孩子送上一篮水果。

<_objective>出口<amount>水果
<_reward>+20同盟国关系；

Text: Good job! It didn't have any effect whatsoever and the country is officially in a state of depression, but the effort is very much appreciated.
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮！虽然这一点也没有用，国家还是完全处于大萧条，但是对于你们的努力我十分的感激。

Text:
In fact, even the fruit market crashed as a result

So let's try something else.
NewTranslation:
实际上，水果市场结果还是崩溃了。

所以我们还是来试下其他东西吧。

Text: More trade you say? What a novel idea! I will draft the legislation this instant!
NewTranslation: 你是说要更多贸易？棒极了！我马上起草法案！

Text:
But your ships seem to be on the small side. If we are to trade we should trade big. 

<_objective> Build a Drydock and all of its upgrades.
<_reward> 50% export prices increase for 2 years.
NewTranslation:
但是你的船似乎太小了点。如果想做大生意，我们必须开要大船。

<_objective>建一个船坞以及完成全部的升级。
<_reward>2年内出口格价上升50%

Text: Good idea! That's what I was thinking myself - throw money at it and it will solve itself. If it doesn't - throw government at it!
NewTranslation: 好主意！这就是我的想法-向它砸钱自然就会解决问题-如果没有解决，那就砸政府！

Text:
I am not quite sure how this works so I will just copy what you do. You always seem to spending more and more on government.

<_objective> Issue the "Urban Development" and "Industrialization" edicts
<_reward> All building costs reduced by 10% for 5 years
NewTranslation:
我不是很确定它是如何工作的，所以我将会完全复制你的做法。你似乎在政府上花了越来越多的钱。

<_objective>颁布“城市化”和“工业化”法令
<_reward>未来5年内所有建筑造价减少10%

Text: Military?!? Good God! That seems a tad harsh and not at all democratic. By golly, let's try it!
NewTranslation: 军事？！？OMG！这貌似有点不太“皿煮”。呸，还是让我们试试吧！

Text:
I will order my Generals to assemble the troops and follow the example of your men. 

<_objective> Have at least 2 managers in Military buildings
<_reward> 2 free Military buildings
NewTranslation:
我会命令我的将军们召集军队，把你们作为榜样。

<_objective>在两个军事建筑中任命管理人
<_reward>2个免费的军事建筑

Text: That was some brilliant politics. All of our problems should be solved now... Except that for some strange reason they aren't.
NewTranslation: 这真是天才的政治。现在我们所有的问题都解决了…除了由于某些奇怪的原因。

Text:
My councilors think the problem is that people fear fear itself. They must stop doing that. 

We need someone to explain that to them. Can you send one of your experts?
NewTranslation:
我的议员们认为问题在于，人惧怕的是恐惧本身。他们必须停止这种愚蠢的想法！

我们需要有个人向他们解释。你可以派个砖家过来么？

Text: Send a dynasty member to help (+30 Allies relations)
NewTranslation: 派遣一个家族成员去帮忙(与同盟国关系+30)

Text: Send a dynasty member to steal (+$$<SwissReward>)
NewTranslation: 派遣一个家族成员去偷窃(+$$<SwissReward>)
贝奴迪莫的大斧早已饥渴难耐了(未知的效果)

Text: Americans no longer fear fear itself. They fear Penultimo.(+10 Allies relations)
NewTranslation: 恐惧本身并不可怕，可怕的是贝奴迪莫。(与同盟国关系+10)

Text: Penultimo learned how not to fear fear itself (+20 Militarist standing)
NewTranslation: 贝奴迪莫学会了如何不去害怕恐惧本身(与军国主义者关系+20)

Text: Learned how not to fear fear itslef
NewTranslation: 学会了如何不去害怕恐惧本身
贝奴迪莫表演了一出精彩的戏($<param1>)

Text: An Allied diplomat talked my ears off trying to get Tropico to participate in a great offensive, counter-offensive or escape. I couldn't figure out which.
NewTranslation: 一位盟军外交官在我耳边谈到让海岛参与一次伟大的进攻，反击或者撤退。我不明觉厉。

Text: We are invited to take part in <text_param1>. The offer includes money and the opportunity to "end the war by Christmas".
NewTranslation: 我们被邀请参加了<text_param1>。这份提议不仅有钱，还有机会在“圣诞节之前结束战争”。

Text: Send the army and a dynasty member (+20 Allies relations; greater chance of victory)
NewTranslation: 派遣一支军队和一位家族成员(与同盟国关系+20；更高的胜算)

Text: Send only the army (+20 Allies relations)
NewTranslation: 派遣一支军队(与同盟国关系+20)

Text: Do not send anyone (-10 Allies relations)
NewTranslation: 我们不会派出任何人(与同盟国关系-10)

Text: Something big is happening in Europe. Huge battle plans, operation code names - the whole shebang, if I may put it so bluntly. Pleas for help have arrived from both sides.
NewTranslation: 欧洲出大事了！巨型的战斗计划，行动代号-全部家当，如果你允许我直接说的话。我们已经接到了两边的求援。

Text: <text_param1> will sure be studied in textbooks one day and this is our golden chance to participate.
NewTranslation: <text_param1>将肯定会被载入教科书，这是我们千载难逢的参战机会。

Text: Send a dynasty member and an army to support the Allies (+20 Allies relations)
NewTranslation: 派遣一位家族成员和军队支持同盟国(与同盟国关系+20)

Text: Send a dynasty member and an army to support the Axis (+20 Axis relations)
NewTranslation: 派遣一位家族成员和军队支持轴心国(与轴心国关系+20)

Text: Our brave soldiers are either fighting against tyranny and oppression or to protect it. I always forget which.
NewTranslation: 我们勇敢的士兵不是在反抗暴政和压迫，就是在保护暴政和压迫。尽管我总是忘记这些。

Text:
However, our troops are in dire need of <text_param>. I don't know what they are planning to do with it but it is our duty as a nation to support our troops.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> +10 Militarist relations

NewTranslation: 一位盟军外交官在我耳边谈到让海岛参与一次伟大的进攻，反击或者撤退。我不明觉厉。

Text: We are invited to take part in <text_param1>. The offer includes money and the opportunity to "end the war by Christmas".
NewTranslation: 我们被邀请参加了<text_param1>。这份提议不仅有钱，还有机会在“圣诞节之前结束战争”。

Text: Send the army and a dynasty member (+20 Allies relations; greater chance of victory)
NewTranslation: 派遣一支军队和一位家族成员(与同盟国关系+20；更高的胜算)

Text: Send only the army (+20 Allies relations)
NewTranslation: 派遣一支军队(与同盟国关系+20)

Text: Do not send anyone (-10 Allies relations)
Our brave soldiers are either fighting against tyranny and oppression or to protect it. I always forget which.
NewTranslation: 我们勇敢的士兵不是在反抗暴政和压迫，就是在保护暴政和压迫。尽管我总是忘记这些。

Text:
However, our troops are in dire need of <text_param>. I don't know what they are planning to do with it but it is our duty as a nation to support our troops.

无论如何，我们的军队急需<text_param>。我并不知道他们打算怎样做，但作为一个国家我们有责任去支持我们的军队。
