Text: Budget of the managed building decreased by <value>
Effectiveness for other nearby buildings increased by <value>
Increases wealth for <value> of the workers in the building
Mining and Oil buildings effectiveness increased by <value>
NewTranslation: 矿井和油田的效率提高<value>

Text: Mining and Oil deposits are depleted <value> slower
NewTranslation: 矿井和油田被采光的速度变慢<value>

Text: Maximum number of customers serviced increased by <value>
Service buildings construction costs decreased by <value>
NewTranslation: 服务类建筑的修建成本降低<value>

Text: Increases job quality of all workers in Tropico by <value>
NewTranslation: 全岛所有工人的工作品质获得提高<value>

Text: Increases budget by <value>. Stolen money goes to the Swiss bank account.
NewTranslation: 提高预算至<value>，并把钱偷偷转入瑞士账户

Text: Increases all Swiss bank account gains by <value>
NewTranslation: 瑞士账户的金额提高了<value>

Text: Effectiveness on maximum budget increased by <value>
Increased effectiveness of all buildings on max budget by <value>
NewTranslation: 提高所有已达至预算最大值的建筑的效率<value>

Text: Generates Research Points proportional to the building effectiveness. Monthly base: <value>
NewTranslation: 根据建筑工作效率产出研究点数，月基准点:<value>

Text: All Tropican soldiers inflict <value> more damage
Managed building is <value> more durable against attacks
All Tropican soldiers receive <value> less damage
NewTranslation: 所有士兵收到的伤害降低<value>

Text: Reduces pollution in the vicinity by <value>
Effectiveness increased and job quality reduced by <value>
NewTranslation: 生产效率提高<value>，工作品质下降<value>

Text: Global effectiveness of production buildings increased by <value>
NewTranslation: 全国生产建筑的效率提高<value>

Text: Increases beauty in the vicinity by <value>
Increases workers approval for the regime by <value>
NewTranslation: 工人对政权的认同度提高<value>

Text: Converts <value> votes when cheating on elections
NewTranslation: 干涉选举时获得更多选票<value>

Text: Increases housing quality of nearby residences by <value>
Detect the hidden roles of <value> of the workers in the building
Detects hidden roles in Tropico <value> faster
NewTranslation: 在全岛范围内搜索隐藏工人效率提高<value>

Text: Great news! While searching through the crates of colony supplies we found a sickle! Now we have something that goes perfectly with our hammers! This will boost production sky-high! I can almost see the glorious future!
NewTranslation: 好消息，好消息！我们在堆放补给的仓库找到了一把镰刀！现在我们有了可以完美搭配锤子的好玩意啦，它们可以把我们的生产效率推向新高，我几乎可以看到我们的光明未来咯~。

Text: Someone stole my manuscript and published it under a pseudonym. It was an autobiographical story about two men on a mountain who want to form deep male bonds. They even stole the surrealistic chapter where fairies prance under a rainbow. The circumstances behind the theft are very queer.
NewTranslation: 有人偷了我的《断腹山》手稿，还化名出版了。这是一个关于两个汉子如何在深山中建立“深厚”情谊的故事，他们甚至把兔子君在彩虹下起舞的那章偷走了！我得说，这可真是件奇怪的事情。

Text:
Now all Tropican men want to work on a ranch and I will never receive any recognition. It all went poof.

<_effect> Ranch upgrades unlocked
NewTranslation:
现在所有岛上的汉子都想去牧场工作了，可我在其中的贡献无人过问，唉。

<_effect>牧场升级解锁

Text: Our research team - that is to say me - discovered the shovel. 40 times! If I find out who put it there, I will kill him. Anyway, I gave it to the miners so they can put it somewhere safe. Like underground.
NewTranslation: 我们的搜查队告诉我，他们已经在各种奇怪的地方发现这把铲子了，40次了都。哼，如果让老子知道是谁随手乱丢这东西，老子一定会让他好看。不管怎样，我觉得我该把这玩意交给那些矿工们，他们会善加利用的。

Text: Great news! We found out how to use the muskets the Crown sent us. Apparently, all you have to do is pull the trigger. Our research was seriously hindered until we discovered that you should not look into the barrel when pulling the trigger. We lost a lot of good men that way.
NewTranslation: 好消息，好消息！我想我们总算学会怎么使用国王发给我们的火枪了，很显然，扣动扳机就可以了。不过我要说的是，每次在扣扳机时都要把眼睛对准枪口这个习惯极大的阻碍了我们研究的进展，我们因此损失了多少好汉啊。

Text: I sat with three other members of the research team. Suddenly, it dawned on us- we're four men. Get, it? Foremen? Incidentally, we also discovered bad puns.
NewTranslation: 我和其他三个小伙伴坐在一起搞研究，突然间，我意识到我们是四个人，而我是督导(译者注:发音类似四个人)，因此我们得到了督导和一个烂到不行的双关语

Text: <_effect> Manager skills for production buildings unlocked
NewTranslation: <_effect>向生产建筑派驻主管的功能解锁

Text: We just discovered the number of times you need to get hit by a plank to actually discover something. It is around 7 depending on the plank in question. We call this the Plank constant. I am sure it will become very important one day.
NewTranslation: 我刚刚发现，如果您思考时，总是会用木板重重地敲七下脑袋。我决定把这个数称作“普朗克”(与木板同音)常数，我有预感，这个数值在未来会大显身手的。

Text: Presidente, after suffering a thousand paper cuts, we have invented paper. It has print on it where there will be a summary of important affairs, interviews with important Tropicans, and a page with political editorials. This will give voice to every Tropican! Also, going to the little Presidente's room will be much more comfortable from now on.
NewTranslation: 总统我得告诉您，经过几千次东拼西凑的剪报收集，我不得不发明了报纸。它会把所有重要不重要的事情都写在上面，比如总统访谈，政治花边消息啥的。同时，我用不少报纸垫在您床上，估计您这会睡起来会更舒服了。
人口普查，城市发展，建筑许可证

Text: We have invented red tape. It goes well with everything and there is no limit to the stuff. People are going crazy over it; lines are forming to get more of it. It almost seems like it is trying to grow bigger and bigger all on its own.
NewTranslation: 我们现在有红头文件了！这小东西和任何玩意好像都相处的很好，人们要为他疯狂了。看起来它用自带的横线和表格即将征服整个海岛了。

Text: <_effect> Census, Urban Development and Building Permit edicts unlocked
NewTranslation: <_effect>解锁新法令:人口普查，城市发展，建筑许可

Text: We, the leaders of the Tropican nation, in our desire to put into words the will of the Tropican people to follow and obey the laws of the state and maintain the traditional universal Tropican values of liberty, peace, love, understanding, siesta and hidden Swiss bank accounts, do hereby sign the first legitimate Constitution of Tropico.
NewTranslation: 我们，全海岛人民，庄重地把我们共同遵守海岛法律的的意愿汇集成文，我们宣誓维护海岛的自由，和平，爱，理解，午睡和某个角落里的瑞士账户。愿我们海岛永远昌盛，人民永远幸福！

Text: <_effect> Increases support for Independence; Allows amending the Constitution once Independent
NewTranslation: <_effect>增加支持独立派别的人数，一旦成功独立，可以修改宪法

Text: Presidente, we didn't manage to get any research done. So we decided to steal France's greatest achievements. Unfortunately, we broke into their Museum of Military Accomplishments and all I found was this white flag. It seems we will have to work on our diplomacy skills.
NewTranslation: 尊敬的总统先生，我觉得我们自己可搞不定这些复杂的问题，我们应该从法国佬那偷走他们最引以为豪的成就。我派人闯进了法国国家军事博物馆，发现这面白旗被摆在最明显的位置上。我猜，是时候向法国人学点外交技巧了。

Text: <_effect> Embassy unlocked. Praise Diplomatic action unlocked
NewTranslation: <_effect>大使馆解锁，大使馆能力:恭维外国势力解锁

Text: Social Security, Literacy Program, Mortgage Subsidies
NewTranslation: 社会保障，义务教育，贷款补助金

Text: Presidente, don't research that. Don't you know that if you do, you will then research Socialism. Which everyone knows is bad. We should stick to our current model of capitalist cronyism. I, my friends, and and all my relatives think is the best model for government.
NewTranslation: 总统先生请不要继续研究这个社会主义了，你的手下没有一个觉得它好的。我们应当坚持走现在这套任人唯亲的资本主义道路，我，我朋友，我所有亲属都是这么想的。

Text: <_effect> Social Security, Literacy Program, and Mortgage Subsidies edicts unlocked
NewTranslation: <_effect>社会保障，义务教育，贷款补助金法令解锁

Text: Presidente, I am sorry but we didn't discover anything. For a small raise, maybe something will come up in our notes. Nothing big - 20% and I will tell you our amazing techniques for begging for bribes. For an additional 5%, we will also make up a handbook that can be given to highly trained professionals who can then use these skills on foreigners.
NewTranslation: 总统，我想我们的研究没有什么进展，不过要是多给我们20%，我估计可以把如何有效贿赂别人的技术告诉你，再多给5%，我们还可以提供一本傻瓜指导手册，这东西大概只有最高级最聪明最有大脑的外国专家才能看懂。

Text:
Here is our latest scientific data:

Foreign diplomats are 45% more prone to agree with us if our diplomats fart less often or if they at least stink less. As a part of a cross-group study, we also found out that 33% of foreign diplomats do not like belching at the table. Finally, a staggering 95% have indicated they have a very negative opinion of our diplomats singing the national anthem while standing on top of the table naked. Who would have thought!
NewTranslation:
总统，以下内容来自我们最新研究:

第一，如果我们的外交官不放屁，或者说不放臭屁，外国友人会有多达45%的几率同意我们的观点。第二，作为对比研究组，我们发现33%的外国外交官居然可以在谈判桌上不打嗝。最后，居然几乎95%的外国友人不喜欢看到我们的外交官站在谈判桌上唱国歌跳脱衣舞！天啊，这谁能想到呢。

Text: <_effect> Delegation and Alliance foreign actions unlocked
NewTranslation: <_effect>派驻代表团和结盟能力解锁

Text: Our research team developing new materials was wondering why the steel girder kept getting bigger and bigger. Until it hit them. They will be missed.
NewTranslation: 我们的研究人员总算发现了可以做扳机的新材料，这太好了，扳机现在越做越大，整枝枪就剩下这么一个大扳机了。

Text: A glorious invention, Presidente! Electricity! It's like organized lightning, there's no better way to put it. And you can make your own with a balloon and a little friction! Just like making fart noises!
NewTranslation: 电力，一个闪亮的发明，我的总统大人！想想看！这种规规矩矩的闪电是我们能得到最好的结果了！另外，您也可以用一个气球在脑袋上磨一下，虽然声音听起来像放屁，不过这样您也可以拥有自己的发电器了！

Text: Presidente, I herebywithtofore require you under Habeas Cojones to execute a writ with a novation decreeing a pay raise to one Penultimo hereby referred to as the penultimate party. Should you fail to comply you shalt therebytofore be knownst as a tortfeasor and the Tropican people shall be taught the language of legalese.
NewTranslation: 总统您好，我谨代表贝奴迪莫及贝奴迪莫联盟请求您根据劳动保护法令提高您手下人的薪水，如若您未能执行这项决定，我们只好遗憾的通知您，您必须在之后的三个工作日内强制学习如何保障人权和使用正规法律术语。

Text: Presidente, after thorough research we have discovered the compass. It was in your cabinet behind the plans for world domination and under the bottle of rum. I have lent it to our captains so they don't have to navigate by their sense of smell anymore and can use bigger and better ships.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，经过我们不懈寻找，终于在您柜子后面的朗姆酒瓶和统治世界的计划表下面找到了指南针。我已经把它移交给我们的船长了，我想他们以后就可以不用通过看天看鸟看风景判断航向了。这是好事，真的。

Text: Presidente, we discovered a way to decrease casualties in battle. We just have to put the most incompetent and useless soldiers up in front of the army and make them wear ornate uniforms in bright colors. This will make them feel important and add to their self-esteem while keeping them out of the way.
NewTranslation: 总统大人，我们发现了一个有效降低战斗伤亡的方法，我们把最无能最无用的士兵放在第一排，然后给他们穿上最华丽最明亮的衣服。这不仅有效提高了他们的自信，还有效降低了老兵的伤亡，谁让我们的敌人都是强迫症呢？

Text: <_effect> Manager skills for military buildings unlocked

Long ago we weaponized jokes, now we have managed to weaponize numbers! Unfortunately, they have proved to be the most inhumane way to destroy the human soul and have been banned by most international courts. As a result, we can only use it on our people, and then only on select individuals able to survive the terrible effects.
NewTranslation: 以前我们把笑话武器化，现在我们学会如何把恼人的数字武器化。不幸的是，这种威力强大的武器已经被大多数国际法庭禁止使用，唉，我想这种可以不费吹灰之力就能毁灭人性的武器只好留给我们自己用了，这将是一种试炼，经受住数字考验活下来的都是英雄。

Text: Presidente, we discovered the tank. It was left unlocked at a military exhibition. We took it for a spin and for a while controlled most of Europe. We eventually ran out of fuel but we managed to dismantle the tank and smuggle it back home. Now we just have to figure out how to put it together again.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们在欧洲的旅行团发现坦克这一神奇的玩意被丢在展览馆生锈，这东西曾经一度控制了大半欧洲。虽然我们不小心玩过头把油料耗尽了，不过我们的旅行团还是充分发挥了聪明才智把这小东西拆成几块带了回来，我想，我们现在只要弄清楚怎么把这些碎片粘在一起就可以无敌于世界了！

Text:
Presidente, we have made a major breakthrough...
OOOHHH! Shiny!
Anyway, we have deducted that....
OOOHHH! Shiny!
Our research indicates that....
OOOHHH! Shiny!
Our research goal...Oh, never mind!
NewTranslation:
总统，我们取得了重大突破。
(噢噢噢噢噢~看这发亮的小东西！)
在扣除必要的……
(噢噢噢噢噢！它真亮啊~)
我们研究表明
(啊啊啊啊啊，闪瞎了我的氪金狗眼！)
我们的研究…
不要在意这些细节。

Text: We've discovered the mineral oil, which can be processed into gasoline! The cars in Tropico no longer need to run on magic! Our profits are guaranteed until someone starts selling oil cheaper than us. Then we should bomb and invade them!
NewTranslation: 我们发现石油啦！这神奇的小东西可以让本岛的汽车不再依靠魔法飞驰，还可以让咱们在别人开始卖油前挣上很多很多的钱。哦，对了，我们也不用过分担心低价竞争，谁比我们低我们就干掉谁。

Text: <_effect> Oil Well, Oil refinery resource unlocked. Oil and Natural gas resources now exploitable.
NewTranslation: <_effect>油井，炼油厂解锁，石油及天然气资源现在可用

Text: We tried to discover democracy, but it proved extremely difficult! Building a true democracy is like chasing a unicorn - everybody has heard of them, but no one has ever seen one. We captured a whole herd of unicorns, but not a glimpse of democracy anywhere to be found. However, we did discover the expectation of democracy, which should be more than enough for simple Tropicans.
NewTranslation: 我们试图找到民主，但这太难了。有人说追求真正的民主就像是追逐一只独角兽，所有人都说知道，可就是没人见过。不过，我们以前就抓到过不少独角兽，可惜手段都谈不上“民主”。不过，我倒真的了解了什么叫对民主的期望，我想这些玩意就够岛民们使用了。

Text: Presidente, we discovered flight! It's just like falling, but backwards. I can't believe no one thought of it before. Then we discovered landing! It's just like splatting, but it hurts less.
NewTranslation: 哇哦，我们学会飞了，虽然只会往后飞，但起码我们会飞了！接下来我们要学学怎么落地，每次落地就摔成一堆破烂可一点都不好。

Text: International Summit, Tourism Campaign, Organic Campaign
NewTranslation: 国际峰会，旅游，生态旅游

Text: We conducted thorough testing to identify the preferences of those strange species inhabiting foreign countries and found out some amazing facts! Do you know how to entertain a foreigner for an entire day? Put him in a round room and tell him there's a croissant in the corner. The valuable information we have collected will allow us to communicate with these simple-minded creatures.
NewTranslation: 我们前阶段进行了一次针对外来奇怪物种的测试，并发现一些让人震惊的实情。你知道怎么让一个外国佬老老实实呆一天么？把他放在一个帐篷里并骗他这是个土著之家就可以了。这次测试中收集的数据可以让我们和这些奇怪的脑子简单的家伙交流的更加顺畅，更方便骗他们钱。

Text: Presidente, we discovered the best thing since... Probably the best thing ever!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们发现了一件美妙的事情，或许是有史以来最好的事情

Text: Amend the Constitution can be used more often
NewTranslation: 可以更灵活的修改宪法

Text: Presidente, we have done nothing productive since our last research project, almost started a war and we killed a llama. See? It works! If you do something bad, tell everybody about it and then say that you killed a llama, everyone just asks why you killed the llama. Now we can do all sorts of bad things with no consequences!
NewTranslation: 看吧！总统！这是我们终极的研究结果！看到了么？我们杀了一只羊驼并且引发了一场战争。可人们只关心前者。如果以后咱做了什么傻事，我们只要告诉别人我们杀了一只羊驼就行，别人只会傻乎乎的追问你为什么要杀羊驼！看出来了吧，我们现在犯罪成本为零！

Text: <_effect> You can amend the constitution more often
NewTranslation: <_effect>您现在可以更频繁的更改法令

Text: We have been very hung-over the last few days and have had no ideas. Fortunately, one of the research team had a flat tire yesterday and we discovered the wheel! It's round!  And it can be used in lots of stuff!
NewTranslation: 我们的研究已经卡了很久了，不过幸运的是，某天一个人的发圈掉到地上滚了起来，就这样我们发现了轮子！对！圆的轮子！我觉得它能派上大用场！

Text: Presidente, I was doing some experiments with the products of neutron-bombarded uranium and made some astounding discoveries! Hah! Just kidding. I was actually washing my socks and thus discovered that nuclear power exists and can be harnessed. Hah! Just kidding. I never wash my socks.
NewTranslation: 总统，我在做中子轰击铀的化学实验时取得了一些惊人的发现！哈，开个玩笑啦，实际上，我只是在洗袜子时发现核能存在并且可利用的。好吧，这也是个玩笑，我从来不洗袜子的。

Text: Presidente, a new era of modern warfare dawns! With the discovery of ballistics we can ensure that 10 out of 12 bombs hit their designated targets. The remaining bombs will politely allow civilians to clear the area before exploding.
NewTranslation: 总统，现代战争的黎明到来了！随着弹道学的发展，我们可以确保12枚炸弹中至少有10枚准确命中指定目标。至于其它几枚嘛，爆炸之前会留时间给那屁民们跑路的。

Text: Presidente, I encountered a hostile atom today. It was attached to a hostile punch, attached to a hostile arm, attached to a hostile lady. This was clearly a provocation! I have declared a war on all atoms. I propose we use neutrons to split their forces.
NewTranslation: 总统，我今天遇到了一个充满敌意的原子。它附着在一个沙包一样大的拳头上，有个死女人用这可恶的拳头揍了我一顿。这明显是一种挑衅！我要向所有的原子开战！我建议用中子撞击来削弱它们的力量。

Text: As you know, Presidente, we've been trying to improve flight conditions on the airplanes bringing tourists to Tropico. By keeping the livestock out of the crew compartments, requesting personal hygiene from the flight attendants and placing seats in the planes we managed to double flight enjoyment!
NewTranslation: 如你所知，总统，我们一直在致力于改善海岛客机的乘坐舒适度。通过将畜生清出机舱，严格要求乘客个人卫生，以及在机舱里摆放小马扎，我们以及成功增加了一倍的飞行乐趣！
网上政务大厅，免费WiFi，IT教育

Text: Presidente, we have discovered the Internet. It was in the palace basement for who knows how many years. It seemed to work OK after I blew the layers of dust off it. For some reason it seems to be full of cat pictures. And pictures of nude ladies and gentlemen which I have taken to my office for further study.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们发现了互联网。不知道它在皇宫地下室被封存了多少年。在我吹掉它上面一层厚厚的灰尘后似乎仍能正常运转。不知道为啥，里面似乎充满了猫咪照片。噢，还有裸男裸女的照片，这些我得带到办公室进一步研究！

Text: <_effect> E-Government, Free Wi-Fi, and IT Education edicts unlocked.
NewTranslation: <_effect>网上政务大厅，免费WiFi，IT教育已解锁。

Context: Technology 12.1. Research to Swiss Account DisplayName
Technology 12.1. Research to Swiss Account DisplayNameAllCaps
Technology 12.1. Research to Swiss Account Summary
Technology 12.1. Research to Swiss Account Title

Text: Presidente, we finally found your Swiss account! Once we gave it to an investment bank we had a really hard time following it around the world and uncovering it once they finished all their financial voodoo. Still, those shady bankers do seem to know what they are doing, because it now has more money in it than it used to.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们终于找到了你的瑞士帐户！我们将它给了一家投资银行，但是为此陷入一段艰苦的时期:我们不得不一直追踪它在世界各地的流转，并且在那些银行家对账户作完手脚后立刻找回它！话又说回来，这些苦不算什么，那些狡猾的银行家似乎非常清楚自己在做什么，总而言之你瑞士账户中的钱比以前更多了。

Text: <_effect> Research points converted to Swiss account money
Context: Technology 12.1. Research to Swiss Account BodyText
NewTranslation: <_effect>研究点可转化至瑞士银行账户

Text: Presidente, we have discovered the Future. In fact, it will be happening any moment now. Our profits are going to skyrocket once we open a fortune teller booth.
NewTranslation: 总统，我们发现了未来。实际上，它随时都在发生。好了，现在我们可以摆摊算命了，相信钱会来的飞快！

Context: Technology 12.3. Research to Free Building DisplayName
Technology 12.3. Research to Free Building DisplayNameAllCaps
Technology 12.3. Research to Free Building Summary

NewTranslation: 苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟
委内瑞拉玻利瓦尔共和国

Text: (Bad Job) Huh, at least I have a job.
NewTranslation: (不安于位)呃，至少我还有份工作。

Text: (Bad Job) Why everyone laughs at me when I ask for safety goggles?
NewTranslation: (不安于位)为什么我要护目镜时每个人都在嘲笑我。

Text: (Bad Job) I have the worst job in the world.
NewTranslation: (不安于位)我有世界上最差的工作。

Text: (Bad Job) I don't blame the boss. He has enough problems.
NewTranslation: (不安于位)我从不怪老板，他有足够多的麻烦。

Text: (Bad Job) When your work speaks for itself, don't interrupt.
NewTranslation: (不安于位)当的你工作为自己辩解时，不要打断它。

Text: (Bad Job) We need a water cooler!
NewTranslation: (不安于位)我们需要一个办公室。

Text: (Good Job) I have my dream job now.
NewTranslation: (鞠躬尽瘁)我现在有一份理想的工作。

Text: (Good Job) No one knows what exactly I should be doing.
NewTranslation: (鞠躬尽瘁)没人知道我究竟应该再做点什么。

Text: (Good Job) Even my boss is afraid of me. Frankly, that scares the hell out of me.
NewTranslation: (鞠躬尽瘁)连我的老板都怕我，确切说，他怕我把这里搞得一团糟。

Text: (Good Job) The bulletproof aprons reduced incidents in half.
NewTranslation: (鞠躬尽瘁)防护服能减少一半的事故发生率。

Text: (Good Job) I love how paper cuts are considered accident at the work place.
NewTranslation: (鞠躬尽瘁)我喜欢办公室里剪纸的声音。

Text: (Bad House) I can't count the holes in my roof anymore.
NewTranslation: (空屋蓬户)我房顶的洞数不清。

Text: (Bad House) A wall collapsed at my place.
NewTranslation: (空屋蓬户)我屋里的墙都快倒了。
(空屋蓬户)我家的房子怎么会自己吱吱叫啊。

Text: (Bad House) I'm fighting a war against cockroaches. Sadly, I'm losing.
NewTranslation: (空屋蓬户)我正在消灭家里的蟑螂。可悲的是。我失败了。

Text: (Bad House) My cat fell in mortal combat against the attic rats.
NewTranslation: (空屋蓬户)我的猫倒在了鼠群的攻击下。

Text: (Nice Home) At last, a home where animals stay outside.
NewTranslation: (芝兰之室)至少，家可以把野生动物挡在外面。

Text: (Nice Home) It's so calm. I miss my mischievous neighbors.
NewTranslation: (芝兰之室)真安静啊。我想念我以前那淘气的邻居了。

Text: (Nice Home) I have never visited the basement, though.
NewTranslation: (芝兰之室)虽然我从来没有进过地下室。

Text: (Nice Home) Whoever said that size doesn't matter hasn't visited my place.
NewTranslation: (芝兰之室)那些说家大小无所谓的你应该来我家看看。

Text: (Nice Home) It has a waterfall since the flooding.
NewTranslation: (芝兰之室)自从洪水过后，这里就有了一个瀑布。
(农夫)农家少闲月，五月人倍忙
(农夫)娇騃三四孙，索哺绕我傍。

Text: (Farmer) Some people crunch while other munch.
NewTranslation: (农夫)朱门酒肉臭，路有冻死骨。

Text: (Farmer) What cows produce during an earthquake? Milkshake!
NewTranslation: (农夫)金壶新练乳，玉釜始煎香。

Text: (Farmer) From shoveling manure to changing Presidentes, no better tool than a fork.
NewTranslation: (农夫)利器从来不独工，叉为农具古今同。

Text: (Farmer) I should really stop counting sheep at work.
NewTranslation: (农夫)逐有水草兮安家葺垒，牛羊满野兮聚如蜂蚁。

Text: (Attendant) I keep rum-influenced people away from heavy equipment.
NewTranslation: (侍者)我得让那些醉汉远离重型设备。

Text: (Attendant) I'm good at punching. I punch tickets all day long.
NewTranslation: (侍者)我擅长打孔，我可以打票一整天。

Text: (Attendant) I have never sprinkled pepper on someone's towel!
NewTranslation: (侍者)我从来没有向别人的毛巾里倒过胡椒粉！

Text: (Attendant) I sell hot-dogs and I'm proud of that.
(Miner) I found myself a gold vein and I'm telling no one.
NewTranslation: (矿工)我工作中发现了一条黄金矿脉，我谁也没敢说。

Text: (Miner) I'm scared. My canary just died.
NewTranslation: (矿工)吓尿了，我的金丝雀死了，瓦斯漏啦！

Text: (Miner) I hate it when people show me two shovels and then ask me to take my pick.
NewTranslation: (矿工)给我两把铲子让我选一个什么的最讨厌了。

Text: (Miner) I wonder when will we hit lava?
NewTranslation: (矿工)我们什么时候才能挖到“滚石”。

Text: (Banker) Great day today, some mortgages are expiring!
NewTranslation: (银行家)不错的一天，一些贷款要到期了。

Text: (Banker) I hope nobody cries on my desk today. I just cleaned it.
NewTranslation: (银行家)但愿没人会在我的桌子上哭，我刚刚才擦过。

Text: (Banker) I couldn't sleep last night because of the penny I lost yesterday...
NewTranslation: (银行家)昨天弄丢了一分钱，急的我整晚都睡不着。

Text: (Banker) A boat. I should buy a boat.
NewTranslation: (银行家)一艘船，我应该买一艘船。

Text: (Banker) I hope nobody discovered that offshore account...
NewTranslation: (银行家)但愿没人发现我的海外账户…

Text: (Clerk) Aah! Another great day at work!
(Clerk) I want everyone to know how much I enjoy my job!
NewTranslation: (职员)我想让每个人都知道我多么热爱我的工作。

Text: (Clerk) Nothing quite like a white-collar job.
NewTranslation: (职员)什么工作能比得上成为白领了。

Text: (Clerk) I hope I would be the Employee of the Month!
NewTranslation: (职员)我希望我是本月最佳员工。

Text: (Clerk) Why do you need promotion when you have the best job in Tropico?
NewTranslation: (职员)当你拥有海岛上最好的工作时，还需要晋升机会吗？

Text: (Construction Worker) Let me swing that hammer!
(Construction Worker) I swear, they said wooden base with a concrete roof.
NewTranslation: (建筑工人)我发誓，他们说的是木质地基，和混凝土屋顶。

Text: (Construction Worker) I'm good at my job. Only 10% of my constructions collapse.
NewTranslation: (建筑工人)我擅长我的工作，我盖的房子只倒了10%。

Text: (Construction Worker) Demolish one little supporting wall and they send you to dig canals.
NewTranslation: (建筑工人)拆掉一堵承重墙，他们就会送你去挖运河。

Text: (Construction Worker) When I make a mistake, sewage floods happen.
NewTranslation: (建筑工人)我犯错的时候，下水道的污物就会像洪水喷涌而出。

Text: (Performer) I love it when people think I have any idea what I'm doing.
NewTranslation: (演员)我很高兴人们能够认为我对于我的工作有自己的见解。

Text: (Performer) They say I stole the scene. Where did I put it then?
NewTranslation: (演员)他们说我抢戏了，但我抢了能放哪呢？

Text: (Performer) Do I have to participate in this show involving untamed Tropican monkeys?
NewTranslation: (演员)我一定要参加这个和海岛猴子一起出演的节目吗？

Text: (Performer) My costume doesn't leave much to imagination.
NewTranslation: (演员)我的服装不能留下太多的想象空间。

Text: (Docker) If I make a mistake, Tropican economy goes down the ocean.
NewTranslation: (码头工人)如果我犯错了，海岛经济就会跌到海里去。

Text: (Docker) No one cares if a crate or two disappear every now and then.
NewTranslation: (码头工人)没人关心一两个箱子的消失。

Text: (Docker) Haven't seen any smugglers in the last few months.
NewTranslation: (码头工人)最近几个月还真没看见走私者。

Text: (Docker) Those crates smell like tea! For some reason, I want to throw them down the ocean.
NewTranslation: (码头工人)这些箱子好像装的是茶叶，出于某种原因，真想把他们扔下海去！

Text: (Docker) The best way to sabotage a ship? Load all cargo at one side of the hold.
NewTranslation: (码头工人)弄沉一艘船的最好方法就是把货物都放在船的一边。

Text: (Doctor) I'm a doctor, not an engineer.
(Doctor) The difference between me and God? God is not a doctor.
NewTranslation: (医生)我和上帝有什么区别？上帝不是一名医生。

Text: (Doctor) Who cares that I got C's all the way through med school?
NewTranslation: (医生)谁在乎我以前在医学院里一直得的C？

Text: (Doctor) Time to poke some people with big needles?
NewTranslation: (医生)是时候用大针头好好治治一些人了。

Text: (Doctor) How many times should I say that I'm not a veterinarian?
NewTranslation: (医生)我要说多少遍，我不是兽医！

Text: (Engineer) I'm an engineer, not a doctor.
NewTranslation: (工程师)我是工程师，不是医生。

Text: (Engineer) If it works, then it is not complicated enough yet.
NewTranslation: (工程师)如果可行的话，是不是还不够复杂呢。

Text: (Engineer) Just give me Uranium! Everything is better with Uranium!
NewTranslation: (工程师)给我铀就行，铀会让一切都美好起来。

Text: (Engineer) I forgot to turn off the burner!
(Factory Worker) Producing the future of Tropico, one crate of goods at a time.
NewTranslation: (工人)为了海岛的未来，一次只造一批货。

Text: (Factory Worker) Raw materials come in, expensive goods come out.
NewTranslation: (工人)原材料进来，贵重货物出去。

Text: (Factory Worker) You never know how dangerous something is until you ignore the warning sign.
NewTranslation: (工人)当你忘记警告标志时，就会知道有些东西是多么危险了。

Text: (Factory Worker) Sometimes I feel like a little cog in a large machine.
NewTranslation: (工人)有时候我感觉就像一个一个巨大机器中的小小齿轮。

Text: (Factory Worker) If it doesn't work, hit it. If it's still not working, hit it again.
NewTranslation: (工人)御坂美琴:果然机器什么的，踢踢就好了。

Text: (Fisherman) Work is for those who don't fish.
NewTranslation: (渔民)工作就是为那些不钓鱼的人准备的。
(渔民)让我们去找那条金鱼吧。

Text: (Fisherman) A friend of mine fell in love with a mermaid. True story!
NewTranslation: (渔民)我的一个朋友与美人鱼相爱了，真实的故事！

Text: (Fisherman) I'm looking for a big white whale.
(Fisherman) My job is to save fish from drowning.
NewTranslation: (渔民)我的工作就是拯救溺水鱼类。

Text: (Fisherman) I'm not fishing, I'm drowning worms!
NewTranslation: (渔民)我才不是在钓鱼呢，我只是想淹死这些鱼饵。

Text: (Journalist) Facts are so boring. I'm going to make something up!
NewTranslation: (记者)事实真无聊啊，我还是编一些令人振奋的消息吧。

Text: (Journalist) The big headline today - Penultimo stops a llama stampede!
NewTranslation: (记者)今天的特大头条，贝奴迪莫制止了一头受惊的羊驼。

Text: (Journalist) I've failed as an author, so I decided to become a journalist.
NewTranslation: (记者)我想成为作家，但失败了，所以我只好尝试去做记者。

Text: (Journalist) It's good that El Presidente can't read my thoughts. Else I'm a goner!
NewTranslation: (记者)总统看不穿我的想法是好事，否则我就完了。

Text: (Journalist) Another great day for Tropican freedom - another praising article for El Presidente!
NewTranslation: (记者)又一个海岛自由日，又一篇为总统祈福的文章。

Text: (Lumberjack) I'll save Tropico from these pesky trees!
NewTranslation: (樵夫)我会从这些讨厌的树手中救下海岛的。

Text: (Lumberjack) If a tree falls in the forest and no one hears it...naah, too complicated.
NewTranslation: (樵夫)如果森林里的一颗树倒下了，没人会听到它的抱怨…喏，抱怨的实在太多了。

Text: (Lumberjack) "Murdering trees"! Bah, as if Sahara turned into a desert overnight!
NewTranslation: (樵夫)“这是对树的谋杀！”呸，听着就像撒哈拉一夜变成了沙漠一样。

Text: (Lumberjack) I'm a lumberjack and I'm ok.
(Policeman) They can't prove that I touched him!
NewTranslation: (警察)他们不能证明我碰过他。

Text: (Policeman) I hope someone disregards a stop sign, my pockets are empty.
NewTranslation: (警察)我希望人们无视那些停止标志，我钱包都空了！

Text: (Policeman) I should start taking higher bribes...
(Policeman) Hope the chief doesn't notice that I lost my gun.
NewTranslation: (警察)希望那个贼没有注意到我的枪丢了。

Text: (Policeman) By day I fight crime. By night I become a mild-mannered uninteresting person.
NewTranslation: (警察)白天打击罪犯，晚上我就变成了一个温和而无趣的人。

Text: (Priest) I lost my faith. Then I found it again!
NewTranslation: (牧师)我失去了我的信仰，然后我又找到了。

Text: (Priest) Oh, Lord, shield us against sin and temptation.
NewTranslation: (牧师)哦，仁慈的主啊，保护我们远离罪恶和诱惑吧。

Text: (Priest) I love the Lord with all my heart and mind and soul.
NewTranslation: (牧师)我用我的心。意志和灵魂爱着上帝。

Text: (Scientist) How I wish to divide by zero!
NewTranslation: (科学家)我多么希望被除以0啊！

Text: (Scientist) I wonder where I put that particle. I swear it was here a moment ago!
NewTranslation: (科学家)我把质点放在哪了，我发誓刚刚就放在这里的。

Text: (Scientist) Where is my coffee? Where are my glasses?
NewTranslation: (科学家)我的咖啡呢？我的眼镜呢？

Text: (Scientist) I just had a wonderful idea! But what was it about?
NewTranslation: (科学家)我刚有了个绝妙的点子！但是它是什么呢？

Text: (Scientist) I'm the one who invented hot water.
NewTranslation: (科学家)我是那个发明了热水的人。

Text: (Soldier) Left, right, right, left... Oh no, I messed it up!
NewTranslation: (士兵)左。右。右。左…噢，不，我又错了。

Text: (Soldier) My gun is my best friend.
(Soldier) I've got an itchy trigger finger...
NewTranslation: (士兵)我有一个痒痒的想扣扳机的手指。

Text: (Soldier) Breathing without an order is not a crime!
NewTranslation: (士兵)不遵从命令呼吸不是犯罪。

Text: (Soldier) My shift is ending soon, but I'll be back tomorrow, my dear rifle.
NewTranslation: (士兵)我的轮班马上就结束了，但我明天一定会回来的，我的亲爱的来福枪啊！

Text: (Teacher) I don't want to go back there to these beasts...
NewTranslation: (老师)我不想回到那群野兽那里去…

Text: (Teacher) Where's a tornado when you need it most?
NewTranslation: (老师)当你最需要龙卷风的时候它在哪里呢？

Text: (Teacher) I hope my students will behave today.
NewTranslation: (老师)我希望我的学生今天都能好好表现。

Text: (Teacher) I'm going to give everyone A on the finals so I can get rid of them.
NewTranslation: (老师)我准备给每个学生一个A这样我就可以摆脱他们了。

Text: (Teacher) Relax, stop shaking... Don't show the students your weakness...
NewTranslation: (老师)放松点，别抖了…不要让其他学生看见了你的软弱。

Text: (Teamster) Work never ends, so take it easy!
NewTranslation: (物流员工)工作从来没有结束的时候，所以放轻松点吧！

Text: (Teamster) I'll bring the rest... after my siesta.
NewTranslation: (物流员工)午睡后我还会在车上再睡一会。

Text: (Teamster) Why people can't carry their own stuff around?
NewTranslation: (物流员工)为什么人们不带着自己的东西到处跑呢？

Text: (Teamster) I hope there's a heavy traffic today, I need to take a nap.
NewTranslation: (物流员工)我希望今天能堵车，这样我就可以休息一下了。

Text: (Teamster) Why everyone thinks that a delayed delivery is my fault?
NewTranslation: (物流员工)为什么大家都认为延迟交货都是我的错？

Text: (Guide) I am the messenger of Tropican culture!
NewTranslation: (导游)我是海岛文化的传播者！

Text: (Guide) I'm sure the visitors will be astounded by my lecture!
NewTranslation: (导游)我确信游客会因我的解说而迷惑不解。

Text: (Guide) Yes! Behold the glory of Tropican history!
NewTranslation: (导游)没错！为海岛历史感到自豪吧！

Text: (Guide) I have so much to tell the visitors today, I hope they take notes!
NewTranslation: (导游)我今天有许多想要给游客们听的，我真希望他们能记个笔记。

Text: (Guide) I make up everything I say and no one seems to notice.
NewTranslation: (导游)抱歉，我不懂英语，前面的翻译都是我编的，我实在编不下去了。

Text: (Waiter) I guess bad tippers just like the extra liquid in their meals.
NewTranslation: (侍者)我想，那些给小费少的，只是想要在他们的饭菜里加些额外的液体佐料。

Text: (Waiter) Fly in the soup? They must be grateful that there IS soup...
NewTranslation: (侍者)汤里有苍蝇？那他们一定很感谢那是汤…

Text: (Waiter) Great, only a few thousand tips more and I'll make it big!
NewTranslation: (侍者)太好了，有几千块的小费了，我会让它变得更多。

Text: (Waiter) Ha, I remember dad telling me I'll never get a decent job!
NewTranslation: (侍者)哈，我记得爸爸说过我永远不会得到一份体面的工作！

Text: (Waiter) May I recommend our specialty - the ragout plaine!
NewTranslation: (侍者)郑重向您推荐我们的特色菜-炖肉汤，小牛肉口味的！

Text: (On Strike) I'm defending my right to wear pants at work!
NewTranslation: (消极怠工)我要为维护我工作中穿裤子的权利而奋斗！

Text: (On Strike) They told me to write something on a sign and run here.
NewTranslation: (消极怠工)他们叫我在标牌上写点东西然后跑到在这里。

Text: (On Strike) I'm defending my rights as a worker.
NewTranslation: (消极怠工)我要维护我作为工人的权利！

Text: (On Strike) I demand better safety precautions!
NewTranslation: (消极怠工)我需要更好的安全措施！

Text: (On Strike) A colleague of mine lost his arm in a ridiculous stapler accident.
NewTranslation: (消极怠工)我同事因为一个订书机丢了一条胳膊！

Text: (On Strike) My workplace is destroying the environment!
NewTranslation: (消极怠工)我的工作环境太逆天了！

Text: (Benching) I'm on a quest to find the best bench in Tropico.
NewTranslation: (坐观成败)我在完成寻找海岛最好板凳的任务。

Text: (Benching) I can almost hear the silence.
NewTranslation: (坐观成败)我几乎能听到“寂静之声”。

Text: (Benching) I'm not lazy. I'm just testing whether benches need repair.
NewTranslation: (坐观成败)我才不懒呢，我只是在看这凳子是不是需要修修了。

Text: (Benching) I'll just sit here and pretend that I've nothing to do.
NewTranslation: (坐观成败)我只是坐着假装没什么事要做。

Text: (Relaxing) I'm searching for a white rabbit.
NewTranslation: (悠然自得)我在找一只大白兔。

Text: (Relaxing) I just saw the biggest butterfly ever! It flew away with a flower.
NewTranslation: (悠然自得)我刚看见了一只大蝴蝶在花上飞。

Text: (Relaxing) I should understand ants if I want to become good Presidente.
NewTranslation: (悠然自得)想成为好总统的话，就算蚂蚁我也要了解。

Text: (Relaxing) I'm working on new ways to evade school.
NewTranslation: (悠然自得)我正在用一个新的法子逃学。
(悠然自得)我才没有在想家庭作业呢。

Text: (Relaxing) I hate Tropican language classes. Spanish is easier.
NewTranslation: (悠然自得)我讨厌海岛语言学习班，西班牙语会更简单些。

Text: (Relaxing) It's time to play Tom Sawyer.
NewTranslation: (悠然自得)是时候演汤姆索亚历险了。

Text: (Dead: Age) I was the oldest man I knew.
(Dead: Age) Hey, now I'm really just skin and bones.
NewTranslation: (死亡:老死)嘿，现在我真成皮包骨了。

Text: (Dead: Age) I plan to stay around some more, haunting this place.
NewTranslation: (死亡:老死)我觉得我应该再呆一段时间，作作祟什么的。

Text: (Dead: Age) Hey, I feel even older now!
(Dead: Age) Why didn't I die under a beautiful tree?
NewTranslation: (死亡:老死)我应该挑个好地方再死。

Text: (Protesting) Here and now, we are building a better Tropico.
NewTranslation: (示威)此时此刻，我们要建立一个更和谐的海岛。

Text: (Protesting) Today is the day. And it's going to happen, again and again.
(Protesting) Someone told me there will be free sausages here...
NewTranslation: (示威)有人告诉我说这有免费火腿肠……

Text: (Protesting) Keep walking... Nothing to see here, just some people defending their rights.
NewTranslation: (示威)别停下，没啥好看的，只是一些维权上访的。

Text: (Protesting) If we convince 51% of Tropico in our rightness, El Presidente will lose the elections.
NewTranslation: (示威)如果我们说服51％的岛民站在我们这边，总统就可以下台了。

Text: (Protesting) I bet El Presidente is scared to death right now.
NewTranslation: (示威)我敢说总统现在肯定很怕死。

Text: (Drought) Is that a cloud in the sky?
NewTranslation: (干旱)天上那坨东西真是云彩吗？

Text: (Drought) I feel really hot right now.
(Drought) Something is going to burn any moment now.
NewTranslation: (干旱)什么东西着了都不稀奇。

Text: (Tornado Outbreak) Last time there were raining men everywhere!
NewTranslation: (龙卷风来袭)上一次满天飞的都是人。

Text: (Tornado Outbreak) I'll hide inside the eye of the storm.
NewTranslation: (龙卷风来袭)我要躲在暴风眼里。

Text: (Tornado Outbreak) Now that's what I call a twister party.
NewTranslation: (龙卷风来袭)就像大型扭扭乐一样。

Text: (Tornado Outbreak) Last time there was cow beef everywhere.
NewTranslation: (龙卷风来袭)上次这里满天都是牛。
(龙卷风)我看见鲨鱼在天上飞。
(龙卷风)不是堪萨斯州怎么还有龙卷风啊！
(龙卷风)我最喜欢玩什么？扭扭乐！
(龙卷风)该往窗户上钉木板了。
(海啸)我人生中最起伏的时刻！

Text: (Tsunami) It's nature's way of telling you to clean your house.
NewTranslation: (海啸)大自然告诉你该清理房间了。

Text: (Tsunami) Now that's what I call a big wave.
(Oil Spill) Now that will teach those seagulls.
NewTranslation: (原油泄漏)这应该能教训一下那些海鸥。

Text: (Oil Spill) Grab the buckets! Free oil!
NewTranslation: (原油泄漏)抄桶上啊！免费的油！

Text: (Oil Spill) I will make myself a beautiful fire on the beach.
NewTranslation: (原油泄漏)我会成为沙滩上的“焦”点。

Text: (Oil Spill) Save a penguin, clear an oil spill.
(Oil Spill) Yuck! I am not going to the beach today.
NewTranslation: (原油泄漏)真恶心！我今天不去海滩玩了。

Text: (Volcano) The sky is falling! The sky is falling!
(Volcano) Well, that went well in Pompeii.
(Earthquake) Those were the scariest three seconds of my life!
(Earthquake) I didn't feel it. Do it again!
(Earthquake) Llama bites kill more Tropican citizens than earthquakes.
NewTranslation: (地震)被羊驼咬死的人比震死的还多。

Text: (Crown Invasion) Time to teach the Old World a lesson!
NewTranslation: (皇室侵略)是时候给那群老古董上一课了！

Text: (Crown Invasion) Revolutionaries or Loyalists, we're all Tropicans!
NewTranslation: (皇室侵略)不管是革命人还是反对独立的人，这一刻我们都是海岛人！
(皇室侵略)为了能自由的吃蕉！

Text: (Crown Invasion) They can't take the sky from us!
NewTranslation: (皇室侵略)为了蔚蓝清净的世界！

Text: (Foreign Invasion) What has El Presidente done now?
NewTranslation: (进击的外国人)总统到现在为止都做了些啥？

Text: (Foreign Invasion) I bet they are here to take our oil.
NewTranslation: (进击的外国人)我打赌他们是冲着石油来的。

Text: (Foreign Invasion) Keep calm and carry on.
NewTranslation: (进击的外国人)嘛事没有，吃嘛嘛香。

Text: (Foreign Invasion) Are we at war now?

NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我这是在阿拉斯加？

Text: (Arrival) They say the Tropican cuisine is very tasty.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)他们说这里是吃货的天堂。

Text: (Arrival) Why is it called tourist season if no one shoots at us?
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)没人朝我们开枪算什么旅游旺季？

Text: (Arrival) Just show me the nearest pub.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)告诉我最近的酒馆怎么走就行了。

Text: (Arrival) Oh, why didn't Noah swat those two mosquitos?
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)操，为啥诺亚当初不弄死那两只蚊子。

Text: (Arrival) I haven't eaten junk food for weeks!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我好几个礼拜没吃垃圾食品了！

Text: (Arrival) I saw a vicious looking turtle!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我看到一只凶猛的海龟！

Text: (Arrival) I want to eat chocolate from a tree!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我想吃树上的巧克力！

Text: (Arrival) Let's play hide and seek with the locals.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)让我们来玩捉迷藏吧。
(成功抵达)多么巨大的沙箱啊！

Text: (Arrival) I bet they have dummy-looking animals here!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我敢打赌这里一定有呆萌的生物<(￣▽￣)>！

Text: (Arrival) My stomach hurts. I'm never getting on a boat again!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)肚子好痛……我再也不要坐船了！

Text: (Arrival) My friends are already on the island.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我的朋友都已经在岛上了。

Text: (Arrival) Dad gave me a treasure map.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)爸爸给了我张藏宝图。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I ate a giant marshmallow in my dream. When I woke up my pillow was missing.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我梦见吃了好大的一个棉花糖。咦，我的枕头呢？

Text: (Visiting Hotel) They told me my hotel is more luxurious than the quarters of El Presidente.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)他们跟我说我的房间比总统的还要奢华。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I love hotels without sanitary regulations.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我喜欢可以随地大小便的宾馆。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) Best place ever! They hand you a gun to shoot rats from the bed!
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我住过的最好的宾馆！他们甚至提供枪让你玩射老鼠游戏！

Text: (Visiting Hotel) They have real Chinese food here!
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)这才是正宗的川菜！

Text: (Visiting Hotel) They change the sheets every day but only from one room to another.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)他们每天都换床单，不过从来不洗就是了。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) Just a short nap and I'm back on that ride!
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)休息一下，马上回来！

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I'm so tired. I ate a bag full of bananas.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我累得都能吃下一麻袋香蕉了。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I want to sleep in a hammock!
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我想在吊床上睡觉！

Text: (Visiting Hotel) Someone told me there are real pirates here.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)有人告诉我这里有想要成为海贼王的男人。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I love this place. It's full of weird creatures!
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我爱这个地方，因为这里到处都有怪物！

Text: (Visiting Hotel) When're we leaving? I want to go home.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我们什么时候才能离开？我想要回家。

Text: (Attraction) I wondered why the plate was getting bigger. Then it hit me.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)在我纠为什么飞盘越来越大的时候，它砸中了我。

Text: (Attraction) I say no to alcohol, it just don't listen.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我都说了少喝点，就是没人听。

Text: (Attraction) I hope they have better benches in the museum.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我希望博物馆里的长椅更软一点。

Text: (Attraction) It ain't art if I can't taste it!
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我不理解的艺术根本不叫艺术！

Text: (Attraction) That attendant was definitely checking me out.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)那个服务员明显想撵我出去。

Text: (Attraction) I prefer to snore in cineplexes.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我宁愿去电影院里睡大觉。

Text: (Attraction) Everywhere is in walking distance here.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)所有的地方都不远。

Text: (Attraction) I'll discover new ways to get an alcohol poisoning!
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我发现了酒精中毒的新方法！

Text: (Attraction) This looks tasty! I wonder what it actually is...
NewTranslation: (游览景点)看起来去掉头就能吃了，不过它是什么呢？

Text: (Attraction) Dad said that I shouldn't go there!
NewTranslation: (游览景点)爸爸说我不该去那里！

Text: (Attraction) When I become Tropican, I will open my own cabaret!
NewTranslation: (游览景点)当我成为到民事我会尽情地歌舞！

Text: (Attraction) Where should I go for flying monkeys?
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我们应该去哪里看飞猴？

Text: (Attraction) I want to see juggling monkeys!
(Attraction) The bearded lady didn't know where the circus is.

NewTranslation: (游览景点)我想要一个香蕉糖！

Text: (Attraction) I want to ride a llama.
(Attraction) Vacation begins when dad says that he knows a shortcut.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)当爸爸说他知道哪里有捷径时，假期就开始了。

Text: (Arrival) This sand looks artificial to me.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)看起来像是人造的沙子。

Text: (Arrival) At least once in his life, every man should plant a pine tree on a Tropical island.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)每个人都应该到海岛来种一颗树。

Text: (Arrival) What a beautiful sunrise! Why don't we have the same sun at home?
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)多么美妙的日出！我家怎么就没有这样的景色呢？
(成功抵达)嘿，这儿有滑雪山庄吗？

Text: (Arrival) I've always wanted to see a real tsunami!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我一直都想看一次真正的海啸！

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I wanted to sleep on the beach, but they didn't allow it...
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)他们不让我在沙滩上睡觉，我只能来这了。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) Now, where did I put that survival kit?
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)嗯，我的求生工具包呢？

Text: (Visiting Hotel) It's nice how the roof holes bring nature closer to you.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)屋顶上的洞能让你更亲近大自然。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) The food here is organic. It's made out of real organs.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)这里提供有机食物，当然了，各种意义上的有机。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) My hotel is eco-friendly. They never wash the linen.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)这个生态宾馆从来不用洗衣粉，也从来不洗床单。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I just killed a mosquito! I'm a monster!
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我刚拍死了一只蚊子，爷能反杀！

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I love that traditional outdoor toilet.
(Visiting Hotel) The stars are so beautiful! But where's the roof?
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)星空是如此的璀璨……等等，这房子怎么没盖？

Text: (Attraction) Lover's names carved in trees? It's crazy how many people bring knives on a date!
NewTranslation: (游览景点)在树上刻下恋人的名字？卧槽，这么多人约会带刀？

Text: (Attraction) I love nature. There is something surrealistic in it.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我爱大自然，真是鬼斧神工。

Text: (Attraction) Am I allowed to swim with sharks somewhere here?
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我能在这跟鲨鱼一起愉快的玩耍吗？

Text: (Attraction) The food seemed fresh. Hope this is blue cheese.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)食物貌似挺新鲜，闻起来像臭豆腐。

Text: (Attraction) I've never seen such beautiful moves. I hope the performer will survive.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我从来没见过这么高难度的动作，但愿他的骨头没断。

Text: (Attraction) The beach is so overcrowded that I'll need a full protective riot gear.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)这里挤得就跟北京地铁一样！

Text: (Attraction) I find these barbed wires around expositions very amusing.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)展会旁边的这些铁丝网看起来挺好玩的。

Text: (Arrival) I was trapped on a boat with my family in it. Never again!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)感觉就像是全家老小一起被绑架到船上一样，累感不爱。

Text: (Arrival) I swear the captain came close to throwing us overboard.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我发誓船长走过来是想把我们扔下去喂鱼。

Text: (Arrival) Perfect spot to spend some time with your family.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)与家人共度美好时光的好地方。

Text: (Arrival) Casted away on a Tropican island with my family... I'm doomed.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)全家老小一起与世隔绝，完犊子了。

Text: (Arrival) If I hear just one more "are we there yet"...
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)如果再让我听到一次“我们到了没……”，我就……

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I love my soundproof room.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我喜欢有隔音的房间。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) The walls are too thin. I can still hear my spouse.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)这墙太薄了，我甚至能听到我媳妇在叫唤。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I want to sleep! Now!
(Visiting Hotel) I want a rooster for a family! They don't wake you before dawn.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)老子不如去养一窝鸡，至少它们不会在黎明前折腾你。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) My spouse permits me to sleep in the bathroom.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我媳妇只允许我睡浴缸。

Text: (Attraction) Now, where should I hide from my family?
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我该躲在哪才能不被家人发现呢？

Text: (Attraction) I can almost feel women dressing me with their eyes on the beach.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我感觉沙滩上的美女都被哥迷住了。

Text: (Attraction) Never seen something like that back home.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)家里可看不到这景色。

Text: (Attraction) Luckily, most attractions are closed for kids.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)大多数景点不对儿童开放实在是救了我的老命。

Text: (Attraction) I need a place to ditch my family.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我得找个地方撇开我的家人。

Text: (Attraction) I hope this pub serves happy meals.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)但愿这家酒馆有快乐儿童餐。

Text: (Attraction) I hope my spouse didn't saw that shopping alley.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)千万别让我媳妇看到那条购物街。
(成功抵达)这么多遗迹，太棒了！

Text: (Arrival) Tropico! A place with such rich history!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)海岛！有丰富历史的海岛！

Text: (Arrival) Tropico! Home of the only llama goddess in the world!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)海岛！驼力大仙唯一的家！

Text: (Arrival) At last, I'll see some real sports here, like banana throwing!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)至少，我能看到爷们的运动，比如互扔肥皂。

Text: (Arrival) I'm here to study the 1000 portraits of El Presidente.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我是来研究总统的一千种姿势的。

Text: (Arrival) That ship looks like it is at least a century old. It's awesome!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)这条船看起来有上百年历史了，真带劲！

Text: (Arrival) I'm glad to land on Tropican soil in one piece.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)没缺胳膊少腿的到达真是谢天谢地。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I asked for an abandoned asylum. This will suffice.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)给我一间窝棚，带网线就够了。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I almost found a native Tropican.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)几乎看不到原住民。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I have never seen such unique hotels.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我从没见过如此别致的宾馆。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) Tropican culture can be best seen inside shacks.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)窝棚才是最能体现海岛文化的地方。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) They should put some hotels in ancient temples.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)他们应该在古代神庙里开些房间。

Text: (Attraction) I want to hear a traditional Tropican toast.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)有没有海岛传统祝酒词？

Text: (Attraction) Some evidences suggest that Tropico existed before its Presidente.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)很多迹象表明不是总统创造的海岛。

Text: (Attraction) I just bought a native Tropican dream catcher.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我刚买了一个海岛传统捕梦网。

Text: (Attraction) I would love to find some ancient remains.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我很想去找寻一下古代遗迹。

Text: (Attraction) I somewhat expected Tropicans to be more cultural.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我希望海岛人能文明一点。

Text: (Attraction) Wherever I go, I see hot-dogs!
NewTranslation: (游览景点)走到哪，热狗吃到哪！

Text: (Attraction) Tropico has the best rainmaker dances I've ever seen.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)他们的大神是我见过的跳的最好的。

Text: (Attraction) I want to learn all about Tropican wine.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我想学学海岛二锅头是怎么酿的。

Text: (Arrival) Now, which hotel should I buy?
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我该买下哪间宾馆呢？

Text: (Arrival) A Russian told me this is the 256th best place to drink vodka.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)一个毛熊告诉我这儿是第256个最适合喝伏特加的地方。

Text: (Arrival) I will most definitely try a llama steak with a real Tropican cigar.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)我要去试一下烤羊驼排，外加一根海岛雪茄。

Text: (Arrival) What a small island. It's barely big enough for a golf course!
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)这破地方太小了，还没我家高尔夫球场大。

Text: (Arrival) I don't see any castles. Did we land on the wrong island?
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)怎么没有牲口？我们空降失败了？

Text: (Arrival) I swear, the captain was trying to sell me the Eiffel Tower.
NewTranslation: (成功抵达)刚才机长跟我谈笑风生，要弄个大新闻，那逗逼想把埃菲尔铁塔卖给我。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) This architectural menace is well below my pay grade.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)这家宾馆的消费正适合我。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I slept on the street once. I can put up with some uneducated piccolos.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我以前睡过大街，也跟那些人捡过肥皂。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) Does no one know who I am?
(Visiting Hotel) They should train monkeys to carry luggage.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)他们应该训练猴子来搬行李。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) I got myself the best room I could find.
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我给自己开了间最好的房间。

Text: (Visiting Hotel) Now I know why Tropicans are crazy. That rum was toxic!
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我知道岛民为什么都疯了。这酒有毒！

Text: (Visiting Hotel) Where did I put my gold toothbrush?
NewTranslation: (酒店开房)我把我的金牙刷放哪里了？

Text: (Attraction) Native Tropican llama, right! Everyone knows they were imported during the colonial era.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)海岛原生羊驼，没错！大家都知道它们是在殖民时期被引进的。

Text: (Attraction) They most definitely need a golf course!
NewTranslation: (游览景点)他们迫切希望能有个高尔夫球场！

Text: (Attraction) If attractions here are opened 24/7, why do they have locks on the doors?
NewTranslation: (游览景点)如果景点全天候开放的话，他们为什么会锁上门呢？

Text: (Attraction) What is a "free" gift? Aren't all gifts free?
NewTranslation: (游览景点)什么是“免费”的礼物？不是所有的礼物都是免费的么？

Text: (Attraction) Where can I find some spiked rum?
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我在哪里才能买到一些兑过水的朗姆酒呢？

Text: (Attraction) Could I order Tropican cigars here?
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我能在这里订购海岛牌雪茄么？

Text: (Attraction) I need to hit something with my golf club.
NewTranslation: (游览景点)我的高尔夫球杆早已饥渴难耐。

Text: Some people are protesting, unhappy with their life in Tropico
NewTranslation: 有些人正在抗议，对他们在海岛的生活不满

Text: There are buildings within the park area.

NewTranslation: 该建筑已被打上了“拆”的标记。

Text: Allow pilots to fire even when the missiles would cause building damage and civilian casualties.
NewTranslation: 准许飞行员开火，即使导弹会伤及无辜。

Text: Are you sure you want to Praise <power> in order to improve your foreign relations?
NewTranslation: 你确定要赞扬<power>，以此来改善我们的双边关系？

Text:
Are you sure you want to send a Delegation to <power>?

You will receive a special request from <power>. Complete it to improve your foreign relations and receive a reward.
NewTranslation:
你确定你要派一个代表团到<power>？

你将会从<power>接收到一个特殊请求。完成任务可以获得奖励并且提升外国关系。

Text:
Are you sure you want to ally yourself with <power>?

You will receive a special request from <power>. Complete it to form the alliance. <power> will provide greater foreign aid as well as reinforcements if you are invaded by another country.
NewTranslation:
你真的想要和<power>结盟？

你将会从<power>接受到一个特殊的请求。完成这个任务就可以结盟。<power>将会提供给你更多国际援助，并且当你被其他国家入侵时还会给于援军。

Text: Are you sure you want to expel <power> from this embassy? Expelled power cannot be invited for 24 months.
NewTranslation: 你确定你想从大使馆驱逐<power>吗？在接下来的24个月该势力无法再次被邀请。

Text: Researched technologies unlock new buildings and other game features. Research speed depends on the number and type of operational research buildings.
NewTranslation: 研究科技会解锁新的建筑或是其它游戏特性。研究速度取决于研究类建筑的数量及类型。

Text: CTRL-click to set the budget for all buildings of this type.
NewTranslation: CTRL+鼠标左键为所有此种类型的建筑设置相同的预算。

Text: <Y> to set the budget for all buildings of this type.
NewTranslation: <Y>为所有此种类型的建筑设置相同的预算。

Text: This building requires electricity. Build a power plant (any kind)
NewTranslation: 这栋建筑需要电力。修建一座发电厂(任何类型都可以)

Text: (Departure) Farewell, Tropico. You will forever hold place in my heart.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)永别了，海岛！你永远在我的心中占据着一个地方。

Text: (Departure) The last thing I want to do is leave Tropico, but my time is up.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)我最后想做的最后一件事就是离开海岛，嗯，时间到了。

Text: (Departure) I almost forgot that I have a real life outside of Tropico.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)我差点忘了我在海岛外还有一份真正的生活。

Text: (Departure) I'm really glad that this's over.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)我真高兴这一切都结束了。
(心去难留)差点就没有活着从海岛逃出来！

Text: (Departure) Tropico, I have to leave, but my heart stays here.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)海岛，尽管我必须离开这里，但是我的心还在这里！
该市民正居住在<player>的国家
这名游客正在浏览<player>的国家

Text: Roads facilitate the transportation of goods. Buildings with garages must be connected to a road in order to function. Constructions must be placed close to your road network.
NewTranslation: 道路使你的货物可被运往他处。拥有的仓库的建筑必须连通道路以使其正常运转。建筑必须建在道路网附近。

Text: You know those people who establish dynasties so powerful that their names echo through the centuries? I'm one of them.
NewTranslation: 你知道那些建立强大王朝的名垂千史的人吗？我是他们中一个。

Text: New world. New opportunities. No limits. This island of mine could become anything.
NewTranslation: 新的世界，新的机遇，毫无限制！这座岛的矿产能变成任何东西。

Text: It could be a farmer's heaven. The fields reaching the horizon and the markets full of people.
NewTranslation: 这将是农民的天堂，田野无边无际直达地平线，市场人山人海，热闹非凡。

Text: Or it could be a production powerhouse. With chimneys reaching the sky and docks busy with all sorts of exotic goods.
NewTranslation: 或者它可以是个工业强国，工厂的烟囱直抵云霄，码头繁忙喧嚣，堆满外来物资。

Text: Or it could be the paradise on earth. A magnet for travelers from all over the world, a place for fiesta and fun.
NewTranslation: 又或者，它可以成为世外桃源，一块吸引全世界游客的巨大磁铁，一个节日和娱乐的天堂。

Text: But now it's just a dirt poor piece of land in the middle of the ocean... Lets make it shine!
NewTranslation: 但是现在，它只是茫茫大海中央一块贫穷肮脏的土地……。。让我们把它变的闪闪发亮！

Text: On my command, multiple nuclear devices are at this moment being deployed throughout the world.
NewTranslation: 在我的命令下，此刻，大量的核装置将开始在全球各地部署。

Text: The end of the world as we know it is inevitable. And this is a good thing.
NewTranslation: 我们都知道，世界的终结不可避免。但是这是一件好事！

Text: Why? Look around and ask yourselves why!
NewTranslation: 为什么？看看你的周围吧，然后问问你自己为什么！

Text: 3 billion people live in poverty; more than 2 billion are without a toilet.
NewTranslation: 30亿人生活在贫穷之中；超过20亿人甚至过着没有马桶的生活。

Text: And what is the world's most popular topic? Images of cats!
NewTranslation: 然而当今这个世界最热门的话题却是什么？猫咪的照片！

Text: The cure I offer is destruction! Like the mythical phoenix, a better world shall rise from the ashes.
NewTranslation: 我们提供给世界的解药是毁灭性的！但是像凤凰一样，新的世界，一定会涅槃重生！

Text: The air .. the air is crystal clear and smells like the sea! This could only be the 19th century!
NewTranslation: 空气……空气就像水晶般清澈，海水般清新！这只可能出现在19世纪！

Text: At this moment, a multitude of nuclear devices are armed and ready around the world.
NewTranslation: 此刻，大量的核装置正被部署到全世界。
任何东西都无法阻止它们。

Text: Why? You should ask yourselves why!
NewTranslation: 为什么？你该问问你自己为什么！

Text: We live in a world where celebrity nipple flashes are even more popular than cute images of cats!
NewTranslation: 我们生活的这个世界，名人的绯闻甚至比猫咪的照片还流行！

Text: My verdict is guilty, and my sentence is destruction! Prepare yourselves for a new dawn!
NewTranslation: 我的决定是有罪的，我的话语是毁灭性的！准备好，迎接新的黎明！

Text: Time to chill out and relax now.
NewTranslation: 是时候冷静下来放松一下了。

Text: One of these days I'm thinking of going back to building an island nation.
NewTranslation: 这些天我都在考虑，回到过去，建设一个岛国。

Text: You know, starting in colonial times ... this used to be so much fun!
NewTranslation: 你懂的，从殖民时期开始……。。那个时候总是充满快乐！

Text: The Constitution will become available after you research it and declare independence. Additional Constitution principles may be researched in each Era.
NewTranslation: 当你完成研究并成功独立后，就可以制定自己的宪法。在每个时期你都可以通过研究补充额外的宪法条款。

Text:
To all our fans

THANK YOU!!!
NewTranslation: 至所有海岛的粉丝们，谢谢你们！！！

Authentication failed. Please check your user name and password.
NewTranslation: 认证失败，请检查用户名和密码。

NewTranslation: 服务器需要更新版本的游戏，请更新游戏。

The password is not valid. Valid passwords have at least 8 letters mixed with digits. Certain popular passwords are excluded.
NewTranslation: 密码不合法。合法的密码需要至少8个字符混带数字。一些过于常用的密码已排除。

Text: The e-mail address is not valid.
The username is not valid. It must be between 6 and 20 characters long and can contain only letters and/or numbers.
NewTranslation: 用户名不合法。其长度必须是6到20个字符之间，只能包含字母及/或数字。

Text:
<font Text18Bold>Currently there are no active trade routes.</font>

<left>Use the resource category tabs to browse trade offers. Offers cycle over time so check back from time to time to view new offers.

Each trade offer has a time limit and supplies or demands a given amount of resources. When the amount is met or the time limit expires the offer will end.

Remember you need a free trade ship to initiate a trade route. You can send more than one ship on a trade offer to speed up delivery. Construct additional Docks to expand your trade fleet.
NewTranslation:
<font Text18Bold>目前尚无正在使用的贸易路线。</font>

<left>点击资源类别标签来浏览贸易需求。这些需求会不时出现，因此你需要不时点击标签查看最新的需求。

每项贸易需求都有时间限制并会提供或需求一定数额的物资。当物资达到规定数额或超出时间限制，这些需求将被撤销。

切记，你需要一个空的贸易船只来进行贸易。你可以为派遣多条货船来进行同一贸易，以便加快贸易进度。建更多的码头以扩大你的贸易舰队编制。

Text: Warning! This symbol indicates that the game is saving content. Please do not remove the game or turn off the power of your console while this symbol is visible.
NewTranslation: 注意！这个图标表示游戏正在存档。当它出现时请不要关闭游戏或主机电源。

Text: A welcoming island with lush vegetation and plenty of space which awaits the brave Tropican to claim it.
NewTranslation: 有着苍翠的植被和大量空间的迷人小岛，等待着勇敢的岛民来开发。

Text: While this desert island is not a promising place for agriculture, the Tropicans keep trying.
NewTranslation: 尽管这个荒凉的岛屿不适合农业，但岛民们还是在努力。

Text: A regular-sized island with long beaches, it was once a main trading port. Then the Tropicans came.
NewTranslation: 形状规则的岛屿，海岸线很长，曾经是个主要的贸易港口，然后岛民们来开发了。

Text: Wrongly named due to bureaucracy error, Isla Rojo offers green jungle and long beaches next to a coral reef.
NewTranslation: 因为一些官员的错误被错误命名了，红岛虽然字面意思是红岛，但实际上有着绿色的丛林，在珊瑚礁边上还有很长的海滩。

Text: Rich in fresh water, this island is among the most desired in the Caribbean.
NewTranslation: 这座岛有着丰富的水资源，是加勒比地区最受人欢迎的岛。

Text: The legend of Cortez gold lead to so much visits and shoveling that this island is good for both agriculture and tourism.
NewTranslation: 科尔特斯黄金的传说导致很多人来到这座岛并挖掘，而这座岛既适合农业，也适合旅游业。

Text: A volcanic rock at the end of the world, this island astounds everyone with its irregular shape.
NewTranslation: 在世界的尽头有一块火山岩，这座岛因为这种不规则的形状让每个人吃惊。

Text: This large island earned its name from the pristine lake at its center. It is said no human can ever spoil it.
NewTranslation: 这座大岛因其正中远古时期的湖而得名，据说没有人能破坏它。

Text: Mistaken for the famous Tortuga, this island attracted many pirates that were not really good at navigation.
NewTranslation: 因为与著名的托尔图加岛弄混了，所以这座岛吸引了很多实际上并不擅长航海的海盗。

Text: Arguments over the long beaches and raw deposits of Isla de Tucan have lead to several wars in the past.
NewTranslation: 在过去，为了这座岛长长的海岸线以及丰富的矿藏资源发生过几次战争。

Text: Despite its large size, swamps limit the usable land on this island. Do not come to this island without mosquito repellent.
NewTranslation: 尽管面积很大，但沼泽限制了岛屿的可用面积。没有驱蚊剂千万不要来这个岛。

Text: The beaches of Santa Teresa are favorite holiday destination for saints of all kinds.
NewTranslation: 圣特雷莎岛的海滩对于各种各样的圣人来说都是最喜爱的渡假圣地。

Text: Two separate rives nurture the thick jungle on this large island. Lumberjacks are welcome.
NewTranslation: 两条独立的河流孕育了这个大岛上茂密的丛林。欢迎伐木工人的到来。

Text: Traitorous citizens are taking arms to show their disrespect for your rightful rule! <number> traitor squads have been spotted
NewTranslation: 叛变的市民正在拿起武器表达对您正确领导的不忠！已发现<number>支叛军部队

Text: Traitorous citizens have tried to incite a riot against your rightful rule, but there were too few of them
NewTranslation: 叛变的市民试图煽动暴乱反对您正确的统治，但他们人数太少了

Text: The uprising is over! Tropico celebrates your victory!
NewTranslation: 起义结束了！海岛欢庆您的胜利！

Text: Traitorous officers have staged a military coup! <number> traitor squads have been spotted
NewTranslation: 叛变的军官组织了一支军事部队！已发现<number>支叛军部队

Text: Traitorous officers have tried to incite a coup but were promptly neutralized by the loyal soldiers
NewTranslation: 叛变的军官试图煽动部队，但被忠诚的士兵恰当地抵制了

Text: The traitors in the army have been defeated! Tropico celebrates your victory!
NewTranslation: 军队的叛军被击败了！海岛欢庆您的胜利！
叛军正在攻击我们的海岛！

Text: We have successfully repelled the rebel invasion!
NewTranslation: 我们成功地击退了叛军的入侵！

Text: The rebel invaders have left the island
NewTranslation: 叛军入侵者已离开海岛

<_objective><ObjectiveText>

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>

<_objective><ObjectiveText>

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>

I wrote their demands on my hand so as not to forget them when I got drunk. When I awoke up next, they had been censored by the state!

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>

<_objective><ObjectiveText>

NewTranslation: 为了国家安全，经过数小时监视一款射击游戏，美国情报局确信一定会有针对海岛大使馆的恐怖袭击。

The USA can only ally with someone who honors national security.

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>

NewTranslation: 我们的苏联老大哥很高兴的接受了联盟请求。然而，从他们那里刚刚获得了一个消息，中情局派出了他们控制的军队来推翻您的统治。

<_objective><ObjectiveText>

NewTranslation: 一个三千人的中国共产党党内高等级外交代表团，前来与我们洽谈合作结盟事宜。

Text:
As long as we withhold their values of making huge profits and ignoring international copyright law, we should be just fine.

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>
NewTranslation:
我们只要一直隐瞒无视国际法律谋取暴利的事应该就没问题了吧。

<_objective><ObjectiveText>

Text: Apparently our friends in the Middle East have a habit of saving money for rainy days. Quite curious, them developing a habit like that in the desert.
NewTranslation: 很显然，我们这些中东的朋友们有存钱以备不时之需的习惯。我很好奇唉，他们怎么会在沙漠地带养成这样的习惯。

Text:
If we are to help them save some money for "rainy days" we will have no problems in forming an alliance.

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>
NewTranslation:
若果我们能帮他们为“不时之需”存上一些钱，结盟将对我们来说不存在任何问题。

<_objective><ObjectiveText>
<_reward><RewardText>

NewTranslation: 俄罗斯经常在找新的朋友。他们只需要克服轻微的打嗝就好了。

Text:
As they say, censoring the Internet, and oppressing oligarchs and the opposition is not a cheap undertaking. Someone's got to pay and if I get their drift correctly we are the ones who have this dubious honor.

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>

<_objective><ObjectiveText>
<_reward><RewardText>

Text: I reached the EU's call center for alliance related inquiries.
NewTranslation: 我来到了欧盟呼叫中心为联盟相关调查。

Text:
In order to form an alliance, we must:

1. Publicly state the the EU is the greatest thing ever. It has the oldest history and the best state regulations.

2. Ensure there is enough bureaucracy in our country to comply with the EU's tough criteria

<_objective> <ObjectiveText>
<_reward> <RewardText>
NewTranslation:
为了形成一个联盟，我们须有:

1。公开声明欧盟是有史以来最伟大的存在，它有最古老的历史和最好的国家规定。

2。确保我国有足够的官僚机构，以符合欧盟的苛刻条件

<_objective><ObjectiveText>
<_reward><RewardText>

Text: The world is about to end, but we can still save it. Just not this time around. The answer is quite simple actually - we must travel back in time.
NewTranslation: 世界将要毁灭，但我们人有机会拯救它。但这一次不会了。答案其实很简单-我们必须穿越回去。

Text:
We need to choose a time travel mechanism. I've been developing three possible options - The Time Vehicle - nothing says style like a stainless steel automobile; The Time Portal - you just cross to the other side; The Time Jump - jump from very high and hope to land in the past.

So which one with it be?
NewTranslation:
我们需要选择一种时光机。我的发明有三种选择-DMC12，就和电影《回到未来》里的一模一样，是辆不锈钢汽车；命运石之门-您要相信这个巨大的微波炉肯定能带您回到过去；时间跳跃机-您得像J一样从非常高的地方跳下来，然后祈祷吧，祈祷自己也能在过去着陆。

您会选择哪种呢？

Text: Great giant tropical spiders, Presidente! We have a crisis and we have to act fast!
NewTranslation: 巨大的热带蜘蛛，总统阁下！我们有问题了，需要赶紧行动！

Text: Comrade Presidente, it is time to act! The great Tropican Revolution will wait for no one!
NewTranslation: 总统同志，是时候采取行动了！伟大的海岛革命将不会等待任何人！

Text: There are profits to be made, Mr. President. If we don't take advantage of this, someone else will.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，有钱不赚是傻帽。我们不出手，别人就出手了。

Text: Foreign demands are coming, my good chum. In the game of diplomacy you win or you die. Sometimes it can be as brutal as cricket.
NewTranslation: 国外的请求来了，老伙计。在外交的游戏中，你要么生，要么死。有时候这就和打板球一样，没有人情味。

Text: My latest invention is almost complete, Herr President! There is just one itty-bitty kink to iron out.
NewTranslation: 我的发明已经接近尾声，总统先生！现在只剩一个小小的矛盾需要解决。

Context: PopupNotificationPreset Generic Task - US Pres title

Text: The United States has strategic interests in your region. Since we are friends, I convinced the Senate that Tropico is on our side, so we are not going to invade for the time being.
NewTranslation: 美国对您所在区域的战略利益感到兴趣。但作为朋友，我说服参议院相信小岛是站在我们这边的，所以我们暂时不会进行入侵。

Text: You are an ambitious man, Presidente. It is time to realize your potential!
NewTranslation: 您是一个有野心的人，总统。是时候展现您卓越不凡的潜力了！

Text: Agreed to return the Soviet rockets
Returned the Soviet rockets hidden in banana shipments
NewTranslation: 归还藏在香蕉运输船内的苏联导弹

Text: Refused to participate in drinking contest
Turned the Soviet rockets to the USA
NewTranslation: 把苏联导弹送给美国佬

Text: Turned the Soviet rockets to the USA
NewTranslation: 把苏联导弹送给美国佬

Text: As far as I remember, keeping missile of strategic value lying around isn't very wise or healthy nowadays.
NewTranslation: 据我所知，让导弹都躺在地上来增加它战略价值的做法是不明智的。

Text: The choice how to get rid of them is yours, my good sir.
NewTranslation: 应该如何处理它们您说的算，谁让您给我开工资呢。

Text: Extorted USA for better Oil prices
Extorted the USSR for better Oil prices
Extorted USA for better Oil prices
Extorted USSR for better Oil prices
Praised the USA as part of the Alliance for Progress
NewTranslation: 赞美美国并加入进步联盟

Text: Chose the Communist way of over-urbanization
NewTranslation: 选择了共产主义的方式导致过度城市化

Text: Chose to build Apartments as part of the Alliance for Progress
NewTranslation: 作为进步联盟的一员而选择建造公寓

Text: I wouldn't get my hopes up too high, but things are warming up between the East and the West.
NewTranslation: 虽然我并不看好，但不得不承认东西方关系正在缓和。

Text: Stood on the USA side on the Peace Summit
NewTranslation: 在和平峰会上站在美国一边

Text: Stood on the USSR side on the Peace Summit
NewTranslation: 在和平峰会上站在苏联一边

Text: After a short squabble, the Caribbean family has grown by one more member.
NewTranslation: 经过短暂的口角，加勒比的大家庭出生了一个新成员。

Text: Exported resources for a new Caribbean nation
NewTranslation: 出口资源到新加勒比国家

Text: Supported USA claims over the new Caribbean nation
NewTranslation: 支持美国将其纳为附庸

Text: Supported USA claims over the new Caribbean nation
NewTranslation: 支持美国将其纳为附庸

Text: Supported USSR claims over the new Caribbean nation
NewTranslation: 支持苏联将其纳为附庸

Text: Supported USSR claims over the new Caribbean nation
NewTranslation: 支持苏联将其纳为附庸

Text: We have been invited to establish official trade relations with the entire Eastern Bloc.
NewTranslation: 我们收到东欧共产主义集团建立官方贸易关系的邀请。

Text: Hid some US  missiles in Tropico
NewTranslation: 在海岛藏匿一些美国导弹

Text: We seem to have a rather peculiar problem on our hands, old boy.
NewTranslation: 我们似乎遇到一个很特别的问题，老大哥。

Text: Stabilized US warheads with manure coating
NewTranslation: 用粪便涂层来稳定美国的火箭弹头

Text: I'm not sure whether this idea is absolutely brilliant or you've finally set a new personal record for stupidity - no easy feat!
NewTranslation: 我不确定这个主意到底是真的绝妙呢，还是您想打破一项新的个人逗逼纪录-反正看起来好像很屌的样子！

Text:
I'll play along for now. You do know we'll have to raise the rates of our canned goods by 20% without giving any practical reason whatsoever, right? I wonder how long this will go under the radar.

<_objective> Export <amount> Canned Goods at a 20% increased price
<_reward> +10 Capitalists relations
NewTranslation:
我也来凑热闹了。您知道我们必须提高20%的罐头商品价格，并且不会透露任何实际理由，对吗？我不知道这样的事在雷达的监控下能持续多久。

<_objective>出口<amount>罐头商品价格提高20%
<_reward>+10与资本主义者关系

Text: Fed the starving with urainum-enriched canned food
Fed the starving with urainum-enriched canned food
You have done well!. I am very proud of you, Comrade!
NewTranslation: 做得好！我以您为傲，同志！

Text: Comrade Governor, we need to inspire the people and set an example for the proletariat. We need to create a working class hero.
NewTranslation: 同志，我们需要树立一个无产阶级英雄来鼓励人民。我们需要找到一个工人阶级的英雄。

Text:
There are some skillful people on our island. You should hire one of them as a manager in any building. He will serve as an example to the workers and become symbol of our socialist agenda.

<_objective> Hire a new manager (in any building)
<_reward> Revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我们的岛上有一些技巧纯熟的人，您应该雇佣一个作为督导派遣到任何建筑内。他将为工人树立一个榜样，成为社会主义进程的象征。

<_objective>雇用一个督导(任意建筑物)
<_reward>获得革命者支持

Text: It's not you, Governor, it's us. With your mandate dwindling away we realized that this relationship just wouldn't work out.  His Majesty asks: "What about my needs? What about my feelings?"
NewTranslation: 总督，这次不是您说了算，这是我们。随着您任期的缩短，关系也变得糟糕透顶。陛下曾曰:“我的需求是什么？您知道我的感受吗？”

Text:
You can't be surprised. We've been moving to this point for months. We simply stopped communicating. I'm sorry. It's over.

Anyway his Majesty wishes you the best and hopes we can still be friends.
NewTranslation:
您可能不会感到惊讶。我们已经搬到这里几个月了。我们只是简单的停止了双边对话。对不起。一切都结束了。

祝陛下福如东海，寿比南山！希望我们仍然是朋友。

Text: Your family's rather rollicking love life has lead to an unexpected pregnancy.
NewTranslation: 激情燃烧，难免发生意外！

Text: The dread pirate Black Soulpatch has begun terrorizing the seas near Tropico. Many say that one day he will be the most famous pirate of all.
NewTranslation: 恐怖的海盗黑色山羊胡已经开始在海岛周边进行恫吓。许多人说，总有一天他会成为最著名的海盗。

Text:
If we are to capture him, we would need a fleet.

<_objective> Have <amount> Docks

<_reward> +$$<SwissReward>
NewTranslation:
如果我们想要抓住他，那我们就得需要一个舰队。

<_objective>拥有<amount>码头

<_reward>+$$<SwissReward>

Text: Shall we send one of your valiant dynasty members on an expedition?
NewTranslation: 我们要不要让您的一位勇敢的继承人加入到远征队当中？

Text: I received an offer from the Middle East. They are looking to sell鈥?I mean betroth a member of their dynasty to a new family.
NewTranslation: 我从中东收到一份请求。他们正在寻求出售…我的意思是他们想给自己的一个王室成员找个新家。

Text:
I have no idea how he or she looks like as they say that this will give us unfair advantage when it comes to pricing.

<_objective> Pay $$<MoneyToPay>

<_reward> A new female dynasty member
NewTranslation:
我不知道这个人看起来如何，不过他们说我们绝对稳赚不赔。

<_objective>支付$$<MoneyToPay>

<_reward>一名新的女性家族成员

Text: The Allied command is in a diplomatic pickle, a term I coined myself.
NewTranslation: 同盟国指挥部身处在一个进退两难的境地，这个成语是我自己造出来的的。

Text:
They want to somehow get rid of an overly rowdy general but want to make it look like a promotion. We need have adequate facilities for him to come but then we will be able to command him as we see fit.

<_objective> Build a new Army Base
<_reward> A new dynasty member
NewTranslation:
他们想设法摆脱一个大流氓，但是想要让这件事获得进展，我们需要有足够的设施使他能够来我们这里，然后我们就可以命令他做我们认为合理的事了。

<_objective>建造一个军事基地
<_reward>一名新的家族成员

Text: I say, old chap, a young Axis commander contacted me with a peculiar request. It appears he does not have the lineage he claims and that, should this be discovered, he is toast.
NewTranslation: 我说，老盆友啊，一个年轻的轴心国指挥官与我联系并提出了一个特殊的请求，他似乎没有他所声称的王室血统，但我们发现，他在科学领域广受赞誉。

Text:
He hopes we can take him up with us. However, we have to smuggle him in somehow. I thought about it and I think we can smuggle him as a important scientist.

<_objective> Issue the "Global Research Initiative" edict; the edict will be active for at least 2 years
<_reward> A new dynasty member
NewTranslation:
他希望我们可以把他带来。然而，我们不得不想办法把他偷运过来。我认为我们可以把他弄过来作为一名重要的科学家。

<_objective>发布“全球科研倡导”法令；该条法令会执行至少2年
<_reward>一名新的家族成员

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于其他原因，法令无法被终止。

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于其他原因，法令无法被终止。

Text: Comrade! Our ties with the USSR should be stronger. We should profess our love for them at all times.
NewTranslation: 同志！我们与苏联的关系应该更铁。我们应该一直公开宣称我们与苏联同志们纯真的爱。

Text:
To that end, we must participate in their program for exchanging political cadres. Let's praise them as a start.

<_objective> Praise the USSR
<_reward> Participation in the cadre exchange program.
NewTranslation:
为此，我们必须参与这个政治干部交换的过程。让我们以赞扬苏联作为开端。

<_objective>赞扬苏联
<_reward>参与政治干部交换

Text: Excellent work, comrade! The hundred-foot oak of misdeed has almost fallen!
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮，同志！这个万丈高的参天大树就要倒塌了！

Text: Now we must exchange fairly with the USSR - one of your dynasty members for one of their best young leaders.
NewTranslation: 现在我们必须和苏联进行公平的交换-一名您的家族成员交换一名最年轻的领导者。

Text: Accept the exchange (pick a dynasty member who will be sent )
NewTranslation: 接受交换(选择一名作为交换的家族成员)

Text: Presidente, at a rambunctious CIA party I found out that they have planted one of their agents on the island.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我在骚乱的中央情报局里发现，他们已经在我们的海岛上安插了一名特工。

Text:
After some snooping around, I found out who she is and I think we can torture her into joining our cause. She hates hippies so you know what we must do...

<_objective> Issue the Sensitivity Training and "Organic" Campaign edicts; they will be active for at least 2 years

<_reward>A new dynasty member
NewTranslation:
经过四处打探，我终于发现她是谁了，我们可以折磨她，好让她说出打入我岛内部的原因。她讨厌嬉皮士，所以……嘿嘿，您懂的。

<_objective>颁布“敏感度训练”和“有机运动”法令，法令将至少执行2年
<_reward>一位新的家族成员

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于其他原因法令无法被终止

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于其他原因法令无法被终止

Text: Presidente, education is important. Why look at me - who knows where I would have ended up were I not kicked out鈥?educated at some of the most prestigious universities around the world.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，教育非常重要。呃，别这样看着我，你知道我真的没有被……我没有被世界最有名的大学踢出来。

Text:
I am sure that most of your dynasty members will love the college experience. It will be a nice two year holiday full of drunken parties and new experiences (if you catch my meaning). And in the end they'll even receive a diploma.
The only question, Presidente, is which college should get the honor of having a member of your dynasty as a student.

<_effect> The dynasty member will leave the island for 2 years and return with an improved skill and other benefits.
NewTranslation:
我敢肯定您的家族成员都很喜欢大学，那将会是充满了疯狂聚会和许多新奇经历的两年长假(如果您明白我的意思的话)，而且最后他们还会获得文凭。简直不可思议，对不？
唯一的问题是，总统阁下，大学应该有一位您的家族成员来作为其荣耀的体现。

<_effect>一位家族成员将会离开海岛2年，并且在回来时技能会得到改善并且会获得其他好处

Text: You need good relations with at least one foreign power.

· 高级工业可用
· 叛军可能反抗你的政权
· 居民开始要求选举
· 轴心国和同盟国可能入侵海岛

· 石油工业可用
· 旅游业可用
· 通过研究并修建核计划或航天工程进入现代时期
