Text: Have <param_amount> different Entertainment and Luxury Entertainment buildings
NewTranslation: 拥有<param_amount>个不同类别的娱乐类建筑

Text: Survive the rebel attack by the USSR
NewTranslation: 在苏联指使的叛变袭击中存活下来
保护好你的大使馆，免遭恐怖分子毒手

Text: Survive the rebel attack by the CIA
NewTranslation: 在中央情报局指挥的叛变袭击中存活下来

Text: Have at least <OfficesAmount> Offices for every 100 citizens
NewTranslation: 每100个市民至少拥有<OfficesAmount>个办公楼

Text: Failed to pay the tax demanded by the Crown
Failed to pay the tax demanded by the Crown
NewTranslation: 未能按照王室的要求支付税款

Text: A new beginning far from the politics of the old world. A chance to start fresh and do things my way.
NewTranslation: 一个崭新的开始，远离旧世的喧嚣，逃脱政局的纷乱。一个难得的机会，注入新鲜的血液，贯彻吾辈的正义！

Text: My unique approach to government will make this colony the most prosperous in the Caribbean.
NewTranslation: 但我有特别的管理技巧，这块殖民地必将成为加勒比最繁盛的乐园！

Text: How hard can it be - you just need some planks, a few nails and a trusty advisor to shout at.
NewTranslation: 何其易也—一些木板，一打铁钉，还有，一个能随叫随到的忠实顾问，如此足矣。

Text: The prince is safe and the Crown has given me a second island.
NewTranslation: 王子是安全的，国王给了我第二个岛。

Text: Furthermore, thanks to the Pirate King, we have enough gold to make our move against Leon Kane.
NewTranslation: 此外，幸亏海盗王，我们有足够的黄金，里昂·凯恩。

Text: Professor Zweistein warns me that we should be very careful not to make any drastic changes to the timeline.
NewTranslation: Z因斯坦博士警告我，我们应该非常小心，不要随意更改了时间轴。

Text: I reassured him that I am always careful.
NewTranslation: 我向他保证，我总是小心。

Text: I have settled on a simple plan - we'll prevent Cayo de Fortuna and Bao-bao from gaining independence.
NewTranslation: 我已经选定了一个简单的计划，我们将阻止财富之键岛和宝宝岛获得独立。

Text: The repercussions of this small change will be a serious hindrance to Leon's plans in the future.
NewTranslation: 这个小变化在未来将严重阻碍里昂的计划。

Text: Changing history is not easy, even when you are Presidente.
NewTranslation: 改变历史是不容易的，即使您是总统。

Text: Leon was able to counter all of my moves and both Cayo de Fortuna and Bao-bao won their independence. No matter, I like a challenge!
NewTranslation: 里昂反对财富之键岛和宝宝岛所赢得的独立。没关系，这就像个挑战。

Text: There is one little thing to do before I take care of him. I will turn Tropico into a world power.
NewTranslation: 在我照顾他之前，还有一个小事儿。我将把海岛变成一个世界强国。

Text: To accomplish this I will need money, lots and lots of money. Fortunately, my knowledge of the future should make this an easy task.
NewTranslation: 为此我需要钱，很多很多钱。幸运的是，我的未来应该让知识去承担这项任务。

Text: War. War never changes. The conflict between the Tropican islands seems predestined.
NewTranslation: 战争。战争永远不会改变。海岛之间的冲突似乎是注定的。

Text: This time we won't fight simply to endure the storm.
NewTranslation: 这一次我们不会打架只是忍受暴风雨。

Text: This time we fight to save not only Tropico but the whole world.
NewTranslation: 这次我们战斗拯救不仅是海岛而且是整个世界。

Text: If our previous attempts to rewrite history have proven anything, it is that small changes have no effect. They simply correct themselves.
NewTranslation: 如果我们以前曾试图重写历史已经证明了一切，那就是小的变化没有对历史有任何影响。他们是正确的。

Text: Professor Zweistein is certain that Tropico is a focal point for the events about to unfold.
NewTranslation: Z因斯坦教师确信海岛的焦点事件即将上演。

Text: Whoever controls Tropico decides the fate of the world. I always suspected it would be that way.
NewTranslation: 谁控制海岛来决定世界的命运。我一直怀疑。

Text: History changes for no man. All of my attempts to alter the timeline, both minor and major have been unsuccessful. It is time for the most drastic of measures.
NewTranslation: 历史没有因为人而改变。我努力的改变时间表，所有尝试均告失败。是时候采取极端措施了。

Text: To save the world I must kill Leon Kane.
NewTranslation: 我必须杀了里昂·凯恩，这样才能拯救世界。

Text: Assassinations are not my style. I prefer to crush my opponents and let them experience utter defeat live and in person.
NewTranslation: 暗杀不是我的风格。我喜欢碾压我的对手，让他们彻底失败生活。

Text: However, I will use any means to make sure that Day Zero never dawns. Put away that cheese grater, Penultimo!
NewTranslation: 然而，我将确定明天没有黎明！拿走奶酪开瓶器，贝奴迪莫！

Text: Leon will be difficult to kill. He is devious and has evaded assassins many times.
NewTranslation: 里昂很难被暗杀。他是狡猾的，多次逃避刺客。

Text: I will need a number of agents to dispose of him. I will use tourism as a cover to train the best spies in the world.
NewTranslation: 我需要一些助手来处理他。我将用旅游业作为掩护组织了世界上最好的间谍活动。

Text: The good news - we changed history with Leon's death! The bad news - things didn't turn out as we had expected.
NewTranslation: 好消息，我们改变了历史--里昂的死！坏消息，事情不像我们预想的结果。

Text: My mentor's mad vision lives on in Adrianna Diaz. She used his death as a means to infiltrate the Soviet government.
NewTranslation: 我的导师疯狂的想生活在阿德里安娜·迪亚兹。她用他的死来渗透苏联政府。

Text: With the Soviet nuclear arsenal at Miss Diaz's disposal, Day Zero will dawn that much sooner.
NewTranslation: 随着苏联处理核计划的临近，黎明来了！

Text: The solution is simple - I must bring down the USSR. That is the only way to stop, or at least delay, the end of the world.
NewTranslation: 解决方法很简单-我必须阻碍苏联。停止的唯一途径，或者至少延迟，世界末日。

Text: If I flood the world market with cheap oil the Soviet economy will collapse, and the USSR with it.
NewTranslation: 如果我让廉价石油涌入世界市场，苏联经济将会崩溃。

Text: Brought Hope to the Middle East
As I watched the mushroom cloud consume my other island I finally understood.
NewTranslation: 在我看到蘑菇云毁灭了我其他的到岛屿时，我终于明白了。

Text: In a way, Leon was right. You can't change the world with wars and missiles. You can't change the world with intrigue and money.
NewTranslation: 就某种意义而言，里昂是正确的，你无法用战争和导弹改变世界，也无法用阴谋和金钱改变世界。

Text: To change the world you need something else.
NewTranslation: 要改变世界，你还需要一些其他的。

Text: Leon Kane was convinced that you need to destroy everything in order to fix it. A mad notion, yet it lives even after his death.
NewTranslation: 里昂·凯恩认为你想要解决它，就必须摧毁一切。这是一个疯狂地设想，即使他已经死去。

Text: But there is a stronger force, one that can unite the world in peace - hope.
NewTranslation: 但是，这真是非常有魄力，这是一个可以团结世界使之和平的力量--信赖。

Text: I will give the world hope again and stop the apocalypse.
NewTranslation: 我会继续相信这个世界，并阻止世界毁灭。

Text: At last, some recognition. I've always wanted to be part of a secret fraternity bent on world domination.
NewTranslation: 最后，我承认。我一直想成为统治世界的秘密兄弟会的一员。

Text: They even got me appointed Governor of a new island just to show what they can do.
NewTranslation: 他们甚至任命我为一个新海岛的总督-仅仅为了展示他们的力量。

Text: Now it is time for the hazing rituals, I guess. My new brethren want me to befriend the US President.
NewTranslation: 我猜，现在到了难堪的时候了。我的同胞要我去协助美国总统。

Text: The Order wants to spread its influence throughout the Americas, and I am the one to do it.
NewTranslation: 共济会派人在美洲扩大影响，我就是其中之一。

Text: Making friends with the Yankees is not my forte, but I'm sure I will master this skill in no time.
NewTranslation: 和美国佬做朋友并不是我的强项，但我一定会马上掌握这种本领。

Text: My fellow Tropicans, today a new enemy rises to threaten my way of life, my freedom, and my strategic banana reserves!
NewTranslation: 海岛上的同胞们，今天，一个新的敌人已经危及到了我的生活、自由和香蕉储备战略！

Text: Without provocation, Isla Rojo has declared war on our great nation.
NewTranslation: 没有前奏，红岛已经向我们这个伟大的国家宣战了。

Text: Now is not the time for fear, Tropico! We will face this threat head on and we will endure!
NewTranslation: 现在已经不是害怕的时候了，同胞们！我们即将面临这一威胁，并将承受这次打击！

Text: We will defend our shores and we will endure!
NewTranslation: 我们会死守我们的岛屿，我们会克服！

Text: Like our llamas, we shall spit in the eye of any enemy that treads our soil. We will endure!
NewTranslation: 如同我们的羊驼一样，只要我们的敌人踏上这片土地，我们必将予以反击。我们要胜利！

Text: War - it's a terrible thing. It costs far too much and achieves far too little.
NewTranslation: 战争-这是一个糟糕的东西。成本太高，得到的又太少。

Text: The Order tried to stop it before with reason, politics and money but failed every time.
NewTranslation: 共济会试图通过合理的方法，政治或者金钱阻止他，可是都失败了。

Text: To change the world we need something stronger - we need fear.
NewTranslation: 想要改变世界，我们还需要一些东西--比如敬畏。

Text: A new super-weapon must be created. One so destructive that the threat of its mere existence will put an end to all war.
NewTranslation: 我们必须拥有一个新的超级武器。这样一个毁灭性的武器，其存在本身就可以结束所有的战争。

Text: There is only one man that can help us realize this plan - the brilliant Abraham Zweistein.
NewTranslation: 只有一个人能够帮助我们实现这个计划-天才的阿德里安娜·迪亚兹。

Text: I must smuggle him out of that little country where I hide all of my money.
NewTranslation: 我必须把他偷偷弄出那个我藏了我所有钱的地方。

Text: The Great Wars are over. In a sense, the Order's plan did work, but I am not sure we are better off now.
NewTranslation: 战争结束了。某种意义而言，共济会的计划成功了，但我不知道现在是不是更好的情况。

Text: Two nuclear powers have divided the world. Wars, although smaller, are still fought.
NewTranslation: 两个核大国分裂了整个世界。战争，虽然仅仅是小小的战争，却还一直存在着。

Text: The threat of nuclear annihilation has brought fear, suspicion and paranoia.
NewTranslation: 核战争给世界带来了恐惧、猜疑和妄想。

Text: My friend and mentor Leon Kane has become jaded and concerned as well. He fears for his life.
NewTranslation: 另外，我的朋友和导师开始变得疲劳而且忧心。他担心着自己的生命！

Text: Personally, I think no assassin will ever get either one of us, but it is reasonable of him to take precautions.
NewTranslation: 个人认为，刺客不会杀死我们中的任何一个，不过做一些预防措施也不错。

Text: He has asked for my aid and I will do what I can to help him.
NewTranslation: 他想要获得我的帮助，我会尽我所能。

Text: You did it, Presidente! Tropico and the world are grateful for your leadership, having prevented a war and all that; plus WE NOW HAVE A GREAT BIG SHINY NUCLEAR MISSILE!
NewTranslation: 您做到了！总统阁下。海岛和世界都在感激您，是您的领导成功阻止了诸如一场战争。现在！我们拥有了一个巨大的、闪亮的核导弹！

Text:
Well, the world does not know of your heroic acts to keep the peace but they are an ungrateful bunch of simpletons, so who cares! The important people know. 

The US President and the USSR General Secretary send us telegrams of gratitude for your swift actions which forced the military brass to avoid invasion and its consequences!

In other news, Dr. Zweistein said he found something wrong  in the time-space continuum but we should not worry because he will fix it! Boy, what will the future bring?
NewTranslation:
好吧，这世界的人们并不知道您的英勇让他们无忧无虑，因为他们就是一群忘恩负义的傻瓜，谁在乎他们！那些有权势的人知道就好了。

美国总统和苏联的总书记发来电报以表感激之情，正是您的迅速行动胁迫了军队的大人物，避免了他们的侵略和后续的结果。

另一个消息，Z因斯坦博士发现时空连续体有些不对劲，但我们不需要担心，他会修好它！未来到底会发生什么？

Text: Leon is dead. I have no time to mourn. I must save the world.
NewTranslation: 里昂死了。但我没有时间哀伤，我必须拯救这个世界。

Text: The arms race between the US and the USSR has put us on a dangerous path. It would only take the tiniest spark to burn us all.
NewTranslation: 美国和苏联的军备竞赛让我们的道路充满艰辛。也许只是小小的火花就会让我们一无所有。

Text: To balance the threat, I must make sure that everyone knows that there is no end game.
NewTranslation: 我必须让所有人知道，在威胁中寻找平衡，是一个没有重点的游戏。

Text: A simple idea - mutually assured destruction. To this end I need to develop my own nuclear weapon.
NewTranslation: 一个简单的例子-同归于尽。因此，我需要发展出自己的核武器。

Text: It will be a deterrent to keep the peace and prevent the coming of a nuclear winter.
NewTranslation: 这是一种威慑力，可以维持和平，也可以防止核冬天的到来。

Text: Leon is alive! Of course my old friend didn't perish, but simply faked his own death to thwart his enemies.
NewTranslation: 里昂还活着！我的老朋友当然死不了，他只是装死来骗过敌人。

Text: Exactly what I would've done in his place.
My mentor's return was not incidental. The world is changing.
NewTranslation: 导师的回归不会是偶然。世界正在改变！

Text: It is a time of social turmoil, a time of rising concerns about pollution, fossil fuels and nuclear power.
NewTranslation: 是时候搞些社会动乱了，是时候重提污染、化石燃料和核能的话题了。

Text: A new energy crisis is looming and Leon has returned to offer the solution.
NewTranslation: 新的精神危机出现了，里昂回归需找解决方案。

Text: Day Zero. No, it's not named after you, Penultimo. It is named after the end of the world.
NewTranslation: 末日。不，这不是以你命名的，贝奴迪莫。这是以世界终结命名的。

Text: Leon Kane, the man I called a friend and a mentor wants to end us all.
NewTranslation: 里昂·凯恩，这个我称之为朋友和导师的男人，想要终结我们。

Text: Was he always insane or did I miss the moment when he snapped?
NewTranslation: 他总是这样疯癫吗，还是我错过了他发怒的时候？

Text: Leon believes that the only way to save the world is to destroy it and then rebuild from the ashes - a hard reset for humanity.
NewTranslation: 里昂相信拯救这个世界的唯一方式只有先摧毁它再在废墟里重新建设-艰难的人性重启

Text: The bad news is that he is smart enough to succeed and possesses all the nuclear weapons he needs to achieve his goal.
NewTranslation: 坏消息是，他足够聪明能成功搞到需要的核武器来达到他的目的。

Text: We have but one chance - Abraham Zweistein and his crazy time-travelling gizmo.
NewTranslation: 我们只有这唯一的选择:爱因斯坦和他疯狂的时间旅行计划。

Text: Greetings Tropico, I come from the future.
I've traveled back in time to stop the coming apocalypse and save the world. Of course, I'll need a new island to do so.
NewTranslation: 我及时回到过去阻止了天启日，拯救了整个世界！当然，我将需要一个新的岛屿去完成它！

Text: Immediately noticing my amazing leadership skills, the Crown quickly agreed to appoint me Governor of a fledgling colony.
NewTranslation: 注意到我惊人的领导才能，皇室同意指派我去统治一个新的殖民地。

Text: Ironically I was given a choice between Puerto Coco and Isla Rojo, our old enemies.
NewTranslation: 讽刺的是我只有两个选择，椰岛或者红岛，我的老对手。

Text: I need a plan to stop Leon Kane, but first I should get my bearings and reacquaint myself with these times.
NewTranslation: 我需要一个计划用来阻止里昂·凯恩，但是首先我需要担负起我的职责，趁这段时间重新认识我自己。
为了一个战争更少的明天！

Text: Old boy, I propose we enter official diplomatic relations with the Yankees.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，我建议我们和美国佬建立正式外交关系。

Text:
This way we can work together for wealth and prosperity - for a better tomorrow. Also, this lowers the chance of them bombing us.

<_objective> Invite the USA in one of your Embassies
<_reward> +10 USA relations
NewTranslation:
这样我们就可以与美国佬合作，为了财富和更好的明天！同时，这样可以减少美国佬炸我们的危险。

<_objective>在你的大使馆与美国建立外交
<_reward>加10与美国关系

Text: Those Yankees are really breathing down our necks.
NewTranslation: 那些美国佬真是碍手碍脚，

Text:
Right now they are so afraid of terrorist groups establishing a foothold in the region that they demand we strengthen our military. Needless to say, it's better we do it, rest they could decide to secure the place for us.

<_objective> <amount> Military buildings
<_reward> +10 USA relations
NewTranslation:
现在他们又害怕恐怖组织在这个地区建立据点。所以他们要求我们加强军事建设。当然了，不用他们说，我们也要加强军事建设，总比他们派部队来为我们加强好。

<_objective><amount>座军事建筑
<_reward>加10与美国关系

Text: The President of the US is facing defeat in the next elections.
NewTranslation: 美国总统将要输掉下次选举。

Text: This being said, he isn't willing to leave it be and is looking to start a dummy war with someone to win the nation's support. Should we provide?
NewTranslation: 可是，他不想就这么着，他要和某个国家打一场假战来赢得国内支持。我们要帮助他吗？

Text: Agree to start a fake war
NewTranslation: 同意开始一场假的战争

Text: Ooh, Presidente, I've always wanted to play laser tag in real life! Will there be explosions? I want explosions!
NewTranslation: 欧也，总统阁下，我一直想玩玩真人镭射枪射击游戏！会有爆炸吗？我喜欢爆炸！

Text:
I'm rushing to get my laser tag gun and I'll be waiting outside the palace for the Americans. I hope they don't cheat and use real guns!

<_objective> Survive the fake-invasion
<_reward> +10 USA relations
NewTranslation:
我赶着去拿我的镭射激光枪。我会在总统府外面等那些美国人，希望他们不要骗我，用真的枪！

<_objective>从假入侵中幸存
<_reward>加10与美国关系

Text: In my defense it really sounded like a proposition the first time they brought it up.
NewTranslation: 从我个人来看，美国人第一次提出这个主意的时候，真的好像只是和我们商量。

Text:
However, I should have known those bloody Yankees had already made up their minds and were just giving diplomacy a shot before they go ahead and do it anyway. Well, let's buckle up and see this dummy war through.

<_objective> Survive the fake-invasion
<_reward> +10 USA relations
NewTranslation:
然而我早该知道，该死的美国佬早就下定决心了。他们只是在行动前试试外交手段罢了，反正他们无论如何都会这么干的。既然这样，那让我们系好安全带，看看假战争将会怎样吧。

<_objective>从假入侵中幸存
<_reward>加10与美国关系

Text: The US is shocked and dismayed at your decision to implement a change in leadership. Very saddened indeed.
NewTranslation: 美国震惊了，他们对你想要让他们更换领导人的决定感到悲伤。事实上真的非常悲伤！

Text:
But since it can't be helped and this is what you wish, they'll do it. The invasion is on the way.

<_objective> Survive the fake-invasion
<_reward> +10 USA relations; your current president will die mysteriously
NewTranslation:
但是即使你不能帮他们，而且这也不是你想要的，他们还是会这么做！入侵马上开始了！

<_objective>从假入侵中幸存
<_reward>加10与美国关系。现任总统将神秘死亡。

Text: The EU will not talk to anyone who does not uphold their values.
NewTranslation: 欧盟不会同任何不认可他们价值观的人谈判。

Text:
Basically, this means that we will need more bureaucrats, clerks and similar cutthroats in order to fall in line with the EU.

<_objective> Have <amount>  Economy & Foreign Relations buildings
<_reward> +10 EU relations
NewTranslation:
基本上来说，这意味着我们需要更多的官僚、文员和相似的谋杀者来跟上欧盟的官僚体制。

<_objective>拥有<amount>座经济和外国关系建筑
<_reward>加10与欧盟关系
事件-填完这些格式化的表格文件

Text: Event - became the new father of the Euro
It seems only logical that we establish official diplomatic relations with the new major player in world politics.
NewTranslation: 看起来我们该和世界政坛新的玩家建立正式外交关系了，这合乎逻辑。

Text:
I suspect interesting times ahead of us, which  coincidentally is a Chinese curse. At least we can now import some bloody good green tea. 

<_objective> Invite the Chinese in one of your Embassies
<_reward> +10 China relations
NewTranslation:
我们的前途一片光明，虽然这恰好是一句中国诅咒。但至少现在我们能进口一些非常爽的绿茶。
<_objective>在大使馆中与中国建交
<_reward>加10与中国关系

Text: Started diplomatic relations with the Chinese
NewTranslation: 开始于中国建立外交关系

Text: The Chinese have requested our aid in counting their population.
NewTranslation: 中国请求我们在人口普查上提供帮助。

Text:
Civil war and poverty has left huge rural areas largely unaccounted for, so now that they have got their bearings together, they wish to know exactly how large a labor force they have. For the task they want us to produce numbered shirts for every Chinese citizen. Based on the number of shirts sold they will be able to tell the number of Chinese Citizens.

<_objective> Export <amount> Apparel for the first batch of shirts
<_reward> +10 Chinese relations
NewTranslation:
内战和贫穷使得大量农村人口没有计入人口普查，所以他们现在挑起重担，打算真正了解一下中国到底有多少劳动力。他们需要我们为每个中国公民生产一件编号的衬衫。依据销售的衬衫数量，他们就可以知道真正的中国人口数量了。
<_objective>出口<amount>件服装(第一批)
<_reward>加10与中国关系

Text: Sent the first batch of Apparel
A phony Chinese company is pirating our design and selling cheap copies of the t-shirts we ourselves sell.
NewTranslation: 一家盗版企业正在盗版我们的服装设计，出售便宜的版本。

Text:
This is an absurd situation!

What action do we take?
NewTranslation:
这真是无耻行径。
我们该怎么办？

Text: Send a dynasty member to stop the factory
NewTranslation: 派一个家族成员去阻止这家工厂
观望观望，或许我们可以把中国培养成山寨大国？

Text: It turns out those replicas of our t-shirts were pretty good and have been selling like hotcakes.
NewTranslation: 结果证明那些盗版衬衫非常棒，卖的也很火！

Text:
Of course, this has the minor consequence that now the official Chinese population tops a billion citizens, when our own estimates are that they are a bit less than a hundred thousand. Still, let's keep our part of the bargain and hope no one finds out. 

<_objective> Export <amount> Apparel
<_reward> +10 Chinese relations
NewTranslation:
当然，对于10亿中国人口来说，这点小问题无关痛痒，何况我们还以为中国人口少于10万人。就让它这样去吧，我们保住我们那部分贸易，希望认为我们是盗版。

<_objective>出口<amount>件服装
<_reward>加10与中国关系

Text: Sent the second batch of Apparel
The Chinese have promised us that those responsible will be punished.
NewTranslation: 中国人承若那些盗版负责人将会受到严惩。

Text:
They are very fond of punishments and are grateful for our signal.

<_effect> + 40 Chinese relations
NewTranslation:
他们喜欢惩罚别人，并且对我们的举报表示感激。

<_effect>加40与中国关系

Text: Told them of the shirt pirates
Our ambassador to China has a most peculiar find on his hands.
NewTranslation: 我们派去中国的大使手里掌握了一个最奇怪的发现。

Text:
It seems the Chinese suffer from a condition that causes them to replicate everything they see illegally. He found a cure and will administer it to those affected.

<_objective> Export <amount> Pharmaceuticals
<_reward> +10 China relations; Your dynasty member will level up
NewTranslation:
中国人好像得了一种病，他们喜欢盗版一切他们认为违法的东西。大使找到了治疗方法，他马上就去执行。

<_objective>出口<amount>药物
<_reward>加10与中国关系；你的家族成员升级了

Text: Cured some Chinese of a condition
A new era of knowledge is upon us.

And there doesn't seem to be much place for nations who fail to adhere to the call of innovation and technological advance.

<_objective> Build <amount> Science Lab
<_reward> +10 to all foreign relations
NewTranslation:
看起来没有足够的地方可以给那些未能跟上创新和科技进步的岛民。

<_objective>建设<amount>间科学实验室
<_reward>加10与所有外国关系

Text: Presidente, for the first time in my life I actually feel the thirst for knowledge! This is so great that I want to share it with everyone!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，有生以来第一次我感到对知识如此的饥渴！我迫不及待要和大家分享。

Text:
Now I know how to sign myself with P instead of X! The more scientists like us, Tropicans, are on the path of knowledge, the more we will find out about the Universe!

<_objective> Issue the Global Research Initiative edict
<_reward> +10 Globalists relations
NewTranslation:
现在我知道怎么用P代替X来签名了！越多像我们岛民们这样的科学家在通往知识的道路上，我们就越能了解整个宇宙！

<_objective>颁布“全球性研究倡议”法令
<_reward>加10与全球主义者关系
颁布全球性研究倡议法令

Text: Back To The Future Research I
Everyone seems to have invested too much in this modern science thing. I say, let's take it even further!
NewTranslation: 每个人都似乎都在这个现代科学技术上投资巨大。要我说，让我们更进一步吧！

Text:
In typical Tropican fashion, we will take science two steps ahead of the competition, and start researching the technologies of the Future!

<_objective> Research "The Future" Technology
<_reward> +10 Globalist relations
NewTranslation:
典型的海岛风格，我们总是在科学竞争面前超前两步！开始研究未来科技！

<_objective>研究“未来”科技
<_reward>加10与全球主义者关系

Text: Back To The Future Research II
Everyone seems to have invested too much in this modern science thing. I say, let's take it even further!
NewTranslation: 每个人都似乎都在这个现代科学技术上投资巨大。要我说，让我们更进一步吧！

Text:
In typical Tropico fashion, we will take science two steps ahead of the competition, and start researching the technologies of the Future!

<_objective> Research "Swiss Future" Technology
<_reward> +10 Globalist relations
NewTranslation:
典型的海岛风格，我们总是在科学竞争面前超前两步！开始研究未来科技！

<_objective>研究“瑞士未来”科技
<_reward>加10与全球主义者关系

Text: Back to The Future Research III
Everyone seems to have invested too much in this modern science thing. I say, let's take it even further!
NewTranslation: 每个人都似乎都在这个现代科学技术上投资巨大。要我说，让我们更进一步吧！

Text:
In typical Tropico fashion, we will take science two steps ahead of the competition, and start researching the technologies of the Future!

<_objective> Research "Future Materials" technology
<_reward> +10 Globalist relations
NewTranslation:
典型的海岛风格，我们总是在科学竞争面前超前两步！开始研究未来科技！

<_objective>研究“未来物质”科技
<_reward>加10与全球主义者关系

Text: Now that the USSR is a thing of the past, let's start anew with Russia.
NewTranslation: 苏联已经成为过去，让我们与俄罗斯重新开始。

Text:
They are basically the same thing anyway, and we've learned anything during the cold war years is that, we have keep close ties with the crazy Russians.

<_objective> Invite Russia in one of your Embassies
<_reward> +10 Russia relations
NewTranslation:
其实俄罗斯和苏联都是一样的，我们在冷战的这些年都学乖了，必须时刻与疯狂的俄罗斯人保持联系。

<_objective>在大使馆与俄罗斯建交
<_reward>加10与俄罗斯关系

Text: The Hunt For The Red Oligarchs
A number of Russian oligarchs have arrived in Tropico. The Kremlin wants them back as they want to use them for political propaganda.
NewTranslation: 一些俄罗斯政治寡头抵达了海岛。克林姆林宫希望他们回去，因为他们需要用这些人做政治宣传。

Text:
Fortunately, Kremlin is not particularly concerned who we send back as long as the numbers add up. We may just arrest ordinary Crime Lords and send them instead.

<_objective> Banish <amount> Crime Lords
<_reward> +10 Russia relations
NewTranslation:
幸运的是，克林姆林宫不关心我们到底送了谁回去，只要数量够就行。我们可以逮捕岛上的犯罪头目，然后把他们送过去。

<_objective>消灭<amount>个犯罪头目
<_reward>加10与俄罗斯关系
不同的时期，相同的乐曲

Text: The Kremlin is in hot water over the oligarch arrests, old chap.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，克林姆林宫那边为了搞掉寡头政治可是下了血本啊！

Text:
The world sees the whole affair as the new Russia going with it's Soviet era ways. Right now they could use any political support they can muster up. It's a good chance for us to score points with them, they could be useful in the future. 

<_objective> Praise Russia
<_reward> +10 Russia relations
NewTranslation:
全世界都看到了新生的俄罗斯还是在走苏联的老路。他们正在争取一切可能的政治支持。为了以后能得到俄罗斯的援助，现在轮到我们表现自己的时候了。

<_objective>称赞俄罗斯
<_reward>+10同俄罗斯关系
称赞俄罗斯逮捕寡头政治领袖

Text: The Kremlin is impressed with how well you managed to create a semblance of a democracy in your country.
NewTranslation: 克林姆林宫对你“表面上”把国家治理的如此民主印象深刻。

Text: They want you to give them pointers, as they plan to do the same.
NewTranslation: 他们希望你能指点，他们打算照猫画虎。

Text: Help them personally (your ruler will level up)
NewTranslation: 亲自指导他们(总统等级提升)

Text: Claim to be a genuine democracy (+10 USA relations)
NewTranslation: 声称自己是真正的民主(+10同美国关系)

Text: Explained semblance of democracy to Russia
NewTranslation: 给俄罗斯介绍“表面上”的民主

Text: Explained semblance of democracy to Russia
NewTranslation: 给俄罗斯介绍“表面上”的民主

Text: The Russian response - "Funny guy. I kill you last!"
NewTranslation: 俄罗斯方面回应“你特么在逗我？看老子弄死你！”

Text: Claimed to be a genuine democracy
NewTranslation: 声称自己是真正的民主

Text: Political connections with the nations of the Middle East are of paramount importance in this day and age.
NewTranslation: 在这个时期与中东国家搞好关系是至关重要的。

Text:
Let us establish official diplomatic relations with them. 

<_objective> Invite the Middle East in one of your Embassies
<_reward> +10 Middle East relations
NewTranslation:
让我们与他们建立正式外交关系。

<_objective>邀请中东进驻大使馆
<_reward>+10同中东关系

Text: Some Middle East leaders wish to visit the Tropico, but the scoundrels want to be provided more suitable lodgings.
NewTranslation: 一些中东领导人想要访问海岛，但这帮混蛋要求的住房条件还真不低。

Text:
I heard that the camel, the most beloved Arabian animal, is the ship of the desert. What do you say about building a Cruise Ship for them, so that they can enjoy staying at the ship of the seas! We can paint the windows yellow so that they think they are among the friendly desert dunes!

<_objective> Have <amount> Cruise Ship
<_reward> +10 Middle East relations
NewTranslation:
在阿拉伯最受欢迎的骆驼被认为是沙漠中行驶的船。所以我们也在海边给他们建造一艘游轮，让他们享受在“船”上的感觉，顺便把窗户涂成黄色，这样感觉更真实！

<_objective>拥有<amount>艘游轮
<_reward>+10同中东关系

Text: Middle Eastern leaders wish to visit the island, but desire that they be provided more, how should I put it... extravagant lodgings.
NewTranslation: 访问海岛的中东领导人还需要更多更奢华的服务！现在这些根本不能满足他们。

Text:
As far as they're concerned, Tropico has no such place to offer currently, so we should look into that. Odd fellas...

<_objective> Build <amount> Spa Hotel
<_reward> +10 Middle East relations
NewTranslation:
就现在而言海岛还没有这样的设施，看起来是时候建造一些了，老伙计。

<_objective>建造<amount>栋温泉酒店
<_reward>+10同中东关系

Text: Built a Hotel for the Middle East
NewTranslation: 为中东访客建造温泉酒店

Text: The Middle Eastern leaders have made it clear they intend to take full advantage of their stay in Tropico, away from their many wives...
NewTranslation: 中东领导人已经明确表示，他们打算在海岛多留一段时间，这样就可以暂时摆脱那群烦人的妻子们…

Text:
They expect places where they can -  I think "chill" is the most appropriate word here - after a long day of official meetings and meals.

<_objective> Build <amount> Cabarets
<_reward> +10 Middle East relations
NewTranslation:
他们希望在一天的正式工作与会餐之后，去一个“冷清”点的地方，至少要跟老婆们这么报告……

<_objective>建造<amount>间歌舞厅
<_reward>+10同中东关系

Text: The Middle Eastern leaders have made it clear they intend to take full advantage of their stay in Tropico, away from their many wives...
NewTranslation: 中东领导人已经明确表示，他们打算在海岛多留一段时间，这样就可以暂时摆脱那群烦人的妻子们…

Text:
They expect places where they can -  I think "chill" is the most appropriate word here - after a long day of official meetings and meals.

<_objective> Build <amount> Nightclubs
NewTranslation:
他们希望在一天的正式工作与会餐之后，去一个“冷清”点的地方，至少要跟老婆们这么报告……

<_objective>建造<amount>家夜总会

Text: Built new attractions for the Middle East
NewTranslation: 修建新设施吸引中东访客

Text: Hear me out, old top. Why don't we invite the Pope to visit Tropico? It will be a great marketing strategy.
NewTranslation: 听我说，头儿。为什么我们不邀请教皇来海岛，这绝壁是一个伟大的营销策略！

Text:
It will please the religious demographic and also raise Tropico's global standing. 

<_objective> Have <amount> Cathedrals 
<_reward> +10 Religious rewards
NewTranslation:
这会取悦宗教人士并增加海岛的国际知名度。

<_objective>拥有<amount>座大教堂
<_reward>+10同宗教人士关系

Text: Built Cathedrals to invite the Pope
NewTranslation: 建造大教堂来邀请教皇

Text: Apparently our efforts fall short of impressing the Pope and he refuses to visit.
NewTranslation: 显然我们短期的努力并没有被教皇认可，他拒绝访问海岛。

Text:
Maybe a little bit more personal dedication on your side can sway him our way. 

<_objective> Have a dynasty member working as a manager of a Cathedral 
<_reward> +10 Religious relations
NewTranslation:
也许我们应该用自己方式来宣扬教皇的教义。

<_objective>派一位家族成员作为大教堂的管理者
<_reward>+10同宗教人士关系

Text: Dynasty member as manager of Cathedral
NewTranslation: 派遣家庭成员作为大教堂管理者

Text: Built Cathedrals to invite the Pope
NewTranslation: 建造大教堂来邀请教皇
教皇摆起谱，谁都请不动

Text: Alright, that bugger is beginning to piss me off!
NewTranslation: 好吧，我快被这货搞疯了！

Text:
Despite our utmost efforts, the Pope still refuses to come to Tropico... Who does he think he is?!... Expect, well, the Pope. 

Your call, old boy?
NewTranslation:
我们都这么努力了教皇还是不肯来海岛。他以为他是谁啊！！我X！好吧，您是教皇，您牛逼。

怎么办，我亲爱的总统阁下？

Text: Send a dynasty member to kidnap him
NewTranslation: 派一位家族成员绑架他
让他听见我们虔诚的祈祷

Text: What have you done, old chap?! Are you out of your mind?!
NewTranslation: 你都做了些什么？你疯了么？

Text:
How could you kidnap the Pope? God forgive, our only hopes are that the old fella won't remember that he refused to come to Tropico. Maybe I could convince him that he agreed, after all. But to maintain the illusion, we have to build an Aerodrome and make up an official welcome ceremony of some sort!

<_objective> Have <amount> Aerodrome
<_reward> +10 Religious relations
NewTranslation:
你怎么能绑架教皇？我的天啊！现在只希望教皇不会记恨我们，我会再去说服他的。现在为了给大众制造教皇将要驾到海岛的假象，我们需要建造一个机场，并筹备一场盛大的欢迎仪式。

<_objective>建造<amount>个航空港
<_reward>+10同宗教人士关系

Text: The Pope is busy fighting temptation and sin across the world.
NewTranslation: 教皇正忙着满世界和邪恶作斗争呢。

Text:
I figure that if we give him a hand in his holy quest, we may accelerate his coming to Tropico. Maybe we can set an example to his liking?

<_objective> Issue the Prohibition and Contraception Ban edicts; 
<_effect> The edicts will remain enabled for at least 2 years
<_reward> +10 Religious relations
NewTranslation:
在我看来为了让教皇能尽快来到海岛，我们应该投其所好，以身作则帮助教皇传播爱的种子。

<_objective>颁布“禁止避孕”法令
<_effect>保持该法令生效时间至少2年以上
<_reward>+10同宗教人士关系

Text: I won't be the one to argue with that plan, old boy.
NewTranslation: 我不能同意的更多，老伙计。

Text:
We should at least make sure we say the correct prayer. Let's not flop this, we need to invest some research in the matter. We need to find out what the proper prayer is.

<_objective> Build <amount> Libraries
<_reward> +10 Religious relations
NewTranslation:
我们至少要找到正确的祷告词。只有花钱请一些人来研究了，一定要找到合适的祷告词！

<_objective>建造<amount>个图书馆
<_reward>+10同宗教人士关系

Text: This has become quite awkward. The Pope refuses to leave, he likes it here.
NewTranslation: 蛋疼的事来了！教皇喜欢海岛的一切，赖着不走了！

Text:
The Vatican, on the other hand, are very stern that they want him back and even offered that they pay us to make him leave. We could probably take a few controversial actions that may influence his decision to leave on his own.

<_objective> Issue the Same-sex Marriages and Stem-cell Research edicts
<_effect> The edicts will be active for at least 2 years
<_reward> +$<MoneyReward>
NewTranslation:
另一方面，梵蒂冈也希望教皇能够回去，甚至愿意为我们赶他走的行动买单。看来我们要动真格的了！一定要把他恶心走！

<_objective>颁布“同性结婚合法化”和“干细胞研究”法令
<_effect>保持该法令生效时间至少2年以上
<_reward>+$<MoneyReward>

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

Text: Not ready to host the Olympics yet
NewTranslation: 还没准备好举办奥运会

Text: Presidente! The nationalists have too much free time and are just wandering around committing random acts of machismo!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，民族主义者太闲了，没有人知道这群天天闲逛的精壮男子会捅出什么篓子。

Text:
They start pub fights, steal brides from weddings and even have llama races in the middle of the Capital! Don't be mad at them Presidente, they love you too much and that gives them energy. I propose you build them a stadium so they have a place to officially be macho.

<_objective> Build <amount> Stadium
<_reward> +10 Nationalist relations
NewTranslation:
酒吧斗殴，婚礼上抢新娘，甚至在首都中心举办草泥马选美大赛！！他们这么做不是因为不满，而是在表达对总统满满的爱啊！我建议修建一个体育馆来释放他们的这份沉重的爱。

<_objective>建造<amount>个体育馆
<_reward>+10同民族主义者关系

Text: Supported Tropican manliness with a Stadium
Now that we have a Stadium, the only natural next step is to host the Olympics, old boy.
NewTranslation: 现在我们拥有了体育馆，下一步就是举办奥运会了！老伙计！

Text:
Although, first we should prepare for the tourist influx that goes hand in hand with such an affair.

<_objective> Have <amount> Hotels
<_reward> +10 Globalist rewards
NewTranslation:
首先我们要为可能大量涌入岛内的游客提供足够的旅馆。

<_objective>拥有<amount>间旅馆
<_reward>+10国际奖励

Text: Built hotels so tat we may host the Olympics
NewTranslation: 为筹办奥运会准备旅馆

Text: Excellent, we are now more than prepared to receive the floods of tourists that will come to Tropico.
NewTranslation: 棒极了，我们已经能应对即将到来的一大波游客了！

Text:
Now then, let's get this show on the road. Let's host the Olympics. Hurry! Chop-chop.

<_objective> Issue the Host the Olympics edict
<_reward> +10 Globalist relations
NewTranslation:
好了，现在让我们的奥运圣火传递起来。传遍世界的大街小巷！快！

<_objective>颁布“举办奥运会”法令
<_reward>+10同全球化主义者关系

Text: Presidente! I've always wanted to see the Olympics! I am so excited!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下！我太兴奋了！我已经迫不及待的想看奥运会开幕了！

Text: Now, let's decide which discipline will guarantee us some gold medals. No self-respecting nation hosts the Olympics and fails to secure gold medals!
NewTranslation: 现在我们来看看有哪些项目可以稳拿金牌的，要是东道主一块金牌都没拿到那简直太丢人了！

Text: Shooting (+$<RebelReward> for every rebel; double the sum if "Right to Arms" is activated)
NewTranslation: 射击(每射杀一个叛军+$<RebelReward>，如果颁布了“武器升级”则奖金翻倍)
举重(每个卡车司机办公室+$<TeamsterReward>)

Text: Team sports (+$<TeamReward> for every Shack on the island)
NewTranslation: 团体项目(岛上每个窝棚+$<TeamReward>)

Text: We manage to receive $<param1> from our participation in the Olympics
NewTranslation: 我们预计在奥运会期间获得$<param1>

Text: Presidente, I think it's time to win the Noble Peace Prize! It would be a great honor for Tropico.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，是时候赢取诺贝尔和平奖了！这对海岛来说会是至高无上的荣耀！

Text:
The way I see it, these days the prize is awarded to whomever starts and wins the most wars. Piece of Cake!

<_objective> Have <amount> Military buildings
<_reward> +10 Militarist relations
NewTranslation:
在我看来这个奖项的得主都是有仗必打，一打就赢的主。这简直小菜一碟啊！

<_objective>拥有<amount>处军事设施
<_reward>+10同军国主义者关系

Text: Prepared a Military force to take the Nobel Peace Prize
NewTranslation: 为赢取诺贝尔和平奖筹备一只队伍

Text: I have a brilliant idea Presidente! There's no need for pointless wars to win the Noble Peace Prize!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我们根本没有必要为了诺贝尔和平奖发动一场战争！我想到了一个绝妙的方法！

Text:
Instead, we can directly attack the Nobel Committee. This should guarantee our success!

<_objective> Fight with the Nobel Committee
<_reward> +10 Militarist relations
NewTranslation:
只要我们直接进攻颁奖会场，那么这奖铁定是我们的！

<_objective>和诺贝尔奖大会宣战
<_reward>+10同军国主义者关系

Text: Fought with the dreaded Nobel Committee special forces
NewTranslation: 击败可怕的诺贝尔委员会特种部队

Text: That was the most powerful Swedish invasion since ABBA. It was glorious, Presidente!
NewTranslation: 这是自继东正教之后对瑞典对成功的一次入侵。太牛逼了！总统阁下！

Text:
I had so much fun! How about we aim for 2 Nobel Prizes while we're at it - let's build PresidenteCare which will give us a prize in Medicine for certain!

<_objective> Have <amount> Healthcare buildings
<_reward> +10 Globalist reward
NewTranslation:
这太有趣了！我们的目标是取得双连冠！让我们建设属于总统的医疗队伍，这样医学奖也是我们的了！

<_objective>拥有<amount>座医疗建筑
<_reward>+10国际奖励

Text: We shall provide affordable healthcare for everyone - provided they can afford it.
NewTranslation: 我们将为每个人提供医疗服务，只要你能负担的起相关费用。

Text:
We didn't really get to the safety-net part of the idea.

<_objective> Issue the E-Government and Paid Healthcare edicts
<_effect> The edicts will be active for at least 2 years
<_reward> +10 Globalists relations
NewTranslation:
我还是没有搞懂安全网络的相关问题。

<_objective>颁布“电子政府”和“付费医疗”法令
<_effect>保持该法令生效时间至少2年以上
<_reward>+10同全球化主义者关系

Text: Won a Noble Prize for PresidenteCare
No one has ever won three Nobel Prizes but, after all, you are El Presidente!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，您将成为拥有3个诺贝尔奖的人了！

Text:
I propose Physics! I won first place at a school science fair by producing electricity with some rubber. I'm sure we can "wow" the world with a larger scale version of the same.

<_objective> Produce <amount> Electricity
<_reward> +10 Nationalists relations
NewTranslation:
我觉得物理学奖是个不错的选择，因为当年我用橡胶发电使我第一次赢得了学校的科技奖。我们只要把那个装置等比例放大就可以了。

<_objective>发<amount>电
<_reward>+10同民族主义者关系

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

NewTranslation: 由于不可抗拒因素该法令不能撤销

Text: The religious community is pleased with your spirituality, old boy.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，宗教人士被你的虔诚所感动。

Text: They will join together in a common effort to reward your actions. How should they show their gratitude?
NewTranslation: 他们想一起给您准备一份厚礼，现在您想要什么呢？
岛上出现更多宗教人士
岛上出现更多宗教人士
岛上出现更多宗教人士

Text: The Militarists are bowled over by your utter recklessness and want to give you an incentive to keep on doing whatever it is you're doing.
NewTranslation: 军国主义者被你的残暴虐的欲仙欲死，他们想让您保持现状，一直做下去不要停。

Text: And by that I don't mean a gun pointed at your head. Instead, they offer a reward:
NewTranslation: 而且现在他们并没有拿枪指着你的脑袋，相反给您提供了一些奖励。
岛上出现更多军国主义者

Text: I'm glad I finally made it to the Palace, old chap. Receiving thanks from ten thousand Chinese diplomats is a dreadful business.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，我可算从数以千计中国外交官的感谢信中挣脱出来赶到皇宫来。

Text: As usually, you get the easy job - choose the reward by the Chinese government:
NewTranslation: 轻松的工作就交给您了，选择你想要的奖励吧！

Text: I don't know how you managed to charm those cowboys, but they like you so much they might not even bomb us for a while!
NewTranslation: 我不知道你究竟用什么办法搞定那些牛仔，他们现在非常客气并愿意停火一阵子。

Text: On top of that, they offer a reward:
NewTranslation: 不仅如此，他们还提供了一些奖励:

Text: +$<MoneyReward> and not bombing you for a while
2 Free Oil Wells and not bombing you for a while
+$$<SwissReward> and not bombing you for a while
The Russian comrades are very pleased with your joint work.
NewTranslation: 俄罗斯官员非常赞赏你所作的工作。

Text: They would like to express their respect in a certain way. What shall it be?
NewTranslation: 他们会适当的有所表示，您觉得哪个比较好？
阿拉伯都爱我们的总统

Text: You seem to be very popular in the Middle East, old boy.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，看来您现在中东备受推崇。

Text: They wish to send you herd of camels, yet I insisted you chose your reward yourself. What shall it be?
NewTranslation: 他们想送您一屋子骆驼，但我坚持让总统您自己选择合适的奖励:

Text: The Revolution is its own reward, but have a little something extra from its fruits.
NewTranslation: 革命本身就是奖励，但是除了胜利果实外还有一些别的。

Text: Built the foundation of a dystopic future
NewTranslation: 建造错位的未来的基础

Text: Formed an alliance with the Allies
Formed an alliance with the Allies
Formed an alliance with the Axis
Formed an alliance with the Axis
Expelled the Allies from your Embassy

NewTranslation: 把轴心国从你的使馆驱逐出去

NewTranslation: 给抵抗组织找一个动物信使

NewTranslation: 给抵抗组织提供假的德军制服

NewTranslation: 提升海岛产品的出口价格

NewTranslation: 拆除所有朗姆酒酿造厂，并支持禁酒令

NewTranslation: 拒绝支持美国的禁酒令

NewTranslation: 在大萧条时期鼓舞了美国人

NewTranslation: 同盟国很高兴贝奴迪莫并没有生活在他们周围

NewTranslation: 帮助同盟国赢得了战争

NewTranslation: 帮助了轴心国，但战争失败了

NewTranslation: 帮助了轴心国，但战争失败了

Text: New skills: Manager skills for production buildings
NewTranslation: 新功能:可向生产建筑派驻督导

Text: New edicts: Census, Urban Development, Building Permit
NewTranslation: 新法令:人口普查，城市发展，建筑许可

Text: Increased support for independence. Basic Constitution principles: Voting Rights, Religion and State, Armed Forces
NewTranslation: 提高对独立的支持率。宪法基本原则:投票权，宗教，国家以及军队。

Text: New buildings: Embassy. New diplomatic actions: Praise
NewTranslation: 新建筑:大使馆。新政策:恭维外国势力

Text: New edicts: Social Security, Literacy Program, Mortgage Subsidies
NewTranslation: 新法令:社会保障，义务教育，贷款补助金

Text: New Constitution principles: Political Rights, Labor Policy, Citizenship
NewTranslation: 新宪法原则:政治权利，劳动政策，公民化

Text: New buildings: Drydock, New effect: Tropican map is revealed
NewTranslation: 新建筑:干船坞。新效果:显示海岛全图

Text: New skills: Manager skills for military buildings
NewTranslation: 新能力:军事建筑维护技术

Text: New buildings: Army Base. New unit: Tank
New buildings:  Oil Well, Oil Refinery
New skills: Manager skills for entertainment buildings
NewTranslation: 新项目:解锁娱乐建筑管理员职位

Text: Presidente, remember that show where we wanted to execute whoever was responsible because of the things they said about you? Well, we now have a solution - every show is to have an executive or a person we can execute if we don't like what is in the show. That way everything will be much neater!
NewTranslation: 总统大人，还记得我们讨论过人人都该为自己说的话负责这个措施么，好，我们现在有一个机会来实践它了。海岛每一个节目我们都安排一个管理员，做得好我们就赞扬，做的不好我们就干掉他。您看，是不是一切都和谐多了？

Text: <_effect> Manager skills for entertainment buildings unlocked
New Constitution principles: Personal Rights, Economy Structure, Media Independence
NewTranslation: 新的宪法条目:人权，经济体制，媒体独立性

Text: New edicts:  International Summit, Tourism Campaign, Organic Campaign
NewTranslation: 新法令:国际峰会，旅游，生态旅游

Text: <_effect> International Summit, Tourism Campaign and Organic Campaign edicts unlocked
NewTranslation: <_effect>解锁法令:国际峰会，旅游，生态旅游

Text: New effect: Constitution can be amended more often
NewTranslation: 新效果:可以更频繁的修改法令

Text: New buildings: Uranium Mine, Nuclear Power Plant

We have discovered a novel technique for scanning the brain and displaying its contents. While testing this new discovery on me we found a huge empty space. The Universe also consists primarily of empty space. Coincidence? I think not!
NewTranslation: 我们发明了一种黑科技，用来扫描脑子，看看里面究竟装了些什么。在用我进行实验时，我们发现我的脑子空白一片。而宇宙的基本组成也是空白一片。这是巧合吗？我觉得不是！

Text:
Anyway we can now use my brain to predict how the Universe behaves.

<_effect> Space Program unlocked
NewTranslation:
反正现在我们可以用我的脑子来预测宇宙运行的规律了。

<_effect>航天工程解锁

Text: New buildings: Spa Hotel, Beach Villa
NewTranslation: 新建筑:温泉酒店，海景别墅

Text: Presidente, flawed patent laws allowed us to discover hot water. Unfortunately, now we are in hot water as every nation on earth is patenting left and right to get everything else that is not patented already. Fortunately, the unfolding scandal has left foreign tourists with the impression that there will be hot water in their hotels and attractions and we can use that.
NewTranslation: 总统，专利法的缺陷使得我们可以开发温泉。但是，现在糟了，地球上其他国家都在抢注那些未被申请专利的东西。幸运的是，那些扩散的传闻让外国游客还以为在他们住的酒店和旅游景点会有温泉呢，正好，我们可以利用这点。

Text: <_effect> Spa Hotel and Beach Villa unlocked
New buildings: Modern Apartment, Fashion Company
NewTranslation: 新建筑:现代化公寓，时装公司

Text: We are as small as dust motes in the grand scale of the Universe. Fortunately, we can take it out on others and make them feel even smaller. Let's make the buildings so huge that our citizens feel small and insignificant. It seems logical to me that we would then become significant, and much larger than dust motes. Maybe as large as tennis balls!
NewTranslation: 茫茫宇宙中的我们渺小如尘埃。幸运的是，我们可以把这种自卑发泄在屁民身上，让他们觉得自己更加渺小。让我们建些巨大的建筑吧，这样那些屁民就会意识到自己到底有多么渺小和微不足道了。对我来说这合情合理:只有这样我才能成为重要人物，比尘埃大得多的人物，也许有网球那么大！

Text: <_effect> Modern Apartment and Fashion Company unlocked
NewTranslation: <_effect>现代化公寓和时装公司解锁

Text: New Constitution principles: Digital Rights, Globalization, Ecology
NewTranslation: 新的宪法准则:数字版权，全球化一体，可持续发展

Text: Presidente, look at these big, comforting letters. Obviously they are big because they mean something important. Anything important would surely be written in big nice-looking letters like these. There is nothing below them worth looking at.
NewTranslation: 总统，看看这些巨大，养眼的字母。很明显，它们很大因为它们代表着重要的东西。重要的东西一定会用像这样的又大又好看的字母书写。任何比这小的字体都不值得一看！

Text:
<font Text10> By reading this I agree to raise Penultimo's salary by 300%.</font>

<_effect> More Constitution options unlocked
NewTranslation:
<font Text10>读到这里我欣然同意给贝奴迪莫加薪300％。</font>

<_effect>解锁更多的宪法选项

Text: New edicts: E-Government, Free Wi-Fi, IT Education
NewTranslation: 新法令:网上政务大厅，免费WiFi，IT教育

Text: Presidente, I finally put my foot down and called a plumber in to look at the pipes in the Palace. The plumber started crying several times while working but told me that it's a good thing I called him, or we would soon no longer have been an island. Apparently, we were losing so much water that the worldwide ocean level was dropping by two meters per day.
NewTranslation: 总统，我终于能把脚放下来了，我找来一个水管工查看宫殿的管道。这个水管工在工作时哭了好几次，他告诉我，我能找他来修实在是明智之举，如果再晚一点的话我们将再也不能叫这个地方小岛了。显而易见，由于水管问题，我们流失了太多的水，世界范围的海平面都因此每天下降两米。

Text:
Now we can build more buildings dependent on water.

<_effect> Hydroponic farms unlocked
NewTranslation:
现在我们可以建造更多依赖于水的建筑物了。

<_effect>水培农场解锁

Text: Allows conversion of Research points to Swiss Bank account
Context: Technology 12.1. Research to Swiss Account Description
NewTranslation: 允许将研究点转化至瑞士银行账户

Text: Allows conversion of Research points to money
NewTranslation: 允许将研究点转化为金钱

Context: Technology 12.3. Research to Free Building Description
Technology 12.3. Research to Free Building Title

Text: Did you know that human hair, egg shells and spider web are some of the strongest materials on Earth? More importantly they are cheap. Using other futuristic materials such as the skin of one's teeth will allow us to build buildings for almost nothing!
NewTranslation: 你知道吗，人的头发、蛋壳和蜘蛛网是地球上强度最高的材料。更重要的是它们非常便宜。要是用其它的未来材料的话，比如说牙釉质，那我们就啥都建不成！

Context: Technology 12.3. Research to Free Building BodyText

Text: Are you sure you want to Praise <power> in order to improve your foreign relations?
NewTranslation: 你确定要称赞<power>以改善外交关系吗？

Text:
Are you sure you want to send a Delegation to <power>?

You will receive a special request from <power>. Complete it to improve your foreign relations and receive a reward.
NewTranslation:
你确定要派一个代表团去往<power>吗？

你将从<power>收到一份特别的请求。完成该任务将改善外交关系并获得报酬。

Text: Are you sure you want to break alliance with <power>?
NewTranslation: 你确定要终止与<power>联盟吗？

Text:
Are you sure you want to ally yourself with <power>?

You will receive a special request from <power>. Complete it to form the alliance. <power> will provide greater foreign aid as well as reinforcements if you are invaded by another country.
NewTranslation:
你确定要与<power>结盟吗？

你将从<power>收到一份特别的请求。完成该任务就能结盟。<power>将在你遭到入侵时为你提供提供军事支援。

Text: Are you sure you want to expel <power> from this embassy? Expelled power cannot be invited for 24 months.
NewTranslation: 你确定要从大使馆驱逐<power>外交官吗？被驱逐的势力在24个月内无法再次被邀请入境。

Text: (Departure) Farewell, Tropico. You will forever hold place in my heart.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)永别了，海岛！你永远在我的心中占据着一个地方。

Text: (Departure) The last thing I want to do is leave Tropico, but my time is up.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)我最后想做的最后一件事就是离开海岛，嗯，时间到了。

Text: (Departure) I almost forgot that I have a real life outside of Tropico.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)我差点忘了我在海岛外还有一份真正的生活。

Text: (Departure) I'm really glad that this's over.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)我真高兴这一切都结束了。
(心去难留)差点就没有活着从海岛逃出来！

Text: (Departure) Tropico, I have to leave, but my heart stays here.
NewTranslation: (心去难留)海岛，尽管我必须离开这里，但是我的心还在这里！

Text: There are no workers in Tropico
There are no unemployed in Tropico
There are no homeless in Tropico
There are no known special citizens in Tropico
NewTranslation: 岛上尚无已知特殊岛民

Text: There are no known rebels in Tropico
There are no soldiers in Tropico
You need to purchase a trading license to begin trading.
NewTranslation: 你需要一个贸易许可来开展贸易。
敌人正在攻击这栋大楼！

Text: Export raw resources while dealing with unexpected taxes.
NewTranslation: 出口原材料并应对各种莫名税目

Text: Amass an insane amount of money in your Swiss Bank Account.
NewTranslation: 为自己的瑞士账户疯狂敛财

Text: Attract tourists while paying annual contributions.
NewTranslation: 通过发展旅游业支撑本岛经济

Text: Become a Nuclear Power before you run out of time.
NewTranslation: 在世界末日来临前获得核武器

Text: Export Uranium while dealing with numerous problems.
NewTranslation: 出口铀并应对大量与此“完全无关”的问题

Text: Research key technology before you run out of time.
NewTranslation: 在有限的时间内取得关键科技

Text: Export large amounts of Gold at low price.
Export tons of raw resources before you run out of time.
NewTranslation: 在有限的时间内出口大量原材料

Text: Amass Treasury while exploiting unique opportunities.
NewTranslation: 利用各种手段快速积累财富

Text: Build the largest military in the Caribbean.
NewTranslation: 在加勒比海域组建大量军队

Text: Attract enough tourists before you run out of time.
NewTranslation: 在有限的时间内吸引大量游客

Text: Export Oil at sub-market value to achieve political goals.
NewTranslation: 通过出口原油达成政治目标

Text: Unite the World while fighting off invasion after invasion.
NewTranslation: 一边抵抗如潮的入侵一边努力团结全世界

Text: A trade route has no active ships.
Our trade ship exported Tropican goods worth <amount>
NewTranslation: 我们的贸易船出口了价值<amount>的海岛货物

Text: Our trade ship imported foreign goods worth <amount>
NewTranslation: 我们的贸易船进口了价值<amount>的外国货物

Text: A freighter exported Tropican goods worth <amount>
NewTranslation: 一艘货船出口了价值<amount>的海岛货物

Text:
His Majesty demands a combined total of <ResourceAmount> of your cash crops. Your Revolutionaries find this number too high and suggest that you send only half that amount. Opposing this, the Royalists demand that you send double the amount instead.

With whom will you side?
NewTranslation:
国王想从您这儿弄走<ResourceAmount>经济作物。革命派认为数量太多了，您只能给他一半。相反，保皇派认为您应该付双倍给国王。

您站谁那边？

Text: Greetings, old chap! Have I got a deal for you today. As Crown representative, I can offer you your very own trading license.
NewTranslation: 你好，老兄，有件业务介绍给你，作为皇家代表，我可以给你特别的贸易许可证。

Text:
I can start you off with the silver package that includes the trading license and a free trade ship. However for a man such as yourself I have to recommend the platinum package - that includes all features of the silver package as well as not one, not two, but three special trade offers to start you off.

<_reward> Unlock trade; 1 free trade ship
NewTranslation:
你从白银礼包开始，礼包里有贸易许可证和一艘免费商船。但是我还是推荐你购买白金礼包-不但包含白银礼包的全部内容，还多出来，一……二……三，呃，三个额外的特别贸易协议供你选择。

<_reward>解锁贸易；1艘免费商船

Text: Buy Platinum Package (-$4,000; additional trading offers)
NewTranslation: 购买白金礼包(-$4000；额外贸易路线)

Text: Buy Trade License from the Dutch (-$500; -10 Crown relations)
NewTranslation: 从荷兰人手里购买贸易许可证(-$500；-10王室关系)

Text: Presidente... Whooops I'm getting ahead of myself. Governor, the island is ripe for revolution.
NewTranslation: 总统先生……哦，见鬼，我要先跑了。总督大人，革命席卷了整个海岛。

Text: Your approval rating is high enough so that you can proclaim Independence from the Crown and we can finally be free from their stupid demands.
NewTranslation: 您已到达宣布独立的等级，我们终于获得自由，可以摆脱国王那愚蠢统治了。

Text: Otherwise we will lose our best weapon - the knowledge of what is to come.
NewTranslation: 否则我们将会失去我们最好的武器-关于未来的知识。

Text: Deactivate to forbid citizens to take food from this building.
NewTranslation: 解除激活以禁止市民从这座建筑中获取食物

Text: Enter a name for your new dynasty.
NewTranslation: 为你的家族输入新名字

Text: Deactivate to stop Swiss Bank profits and restore the original Service Quality.
NewTranslation: 取消向瑞士银行收益，服务质量回复原态

Text: Deactivate to remove the extra space for families and restore the original Housing Quality
NewTranslation: 取消群租房，房屋质量恢复原有水平

Text: Deactivate to stop siphoning money to your Swiss Bank account.
NewTranslation: 停止向您的瑞士银行账户转钱

Text: Deactivate to allow citizens to use the building. The Service Quality will be decreased.
NewTranslation: 取消此项，海岛居民将访问此建筑。服务质量将降低。

Text: The rebels are launching an attack!
The rebels are launching an attack to overthrow the government!
NewTranslation: 叛军正在发动攻击企图推翻政府！
叛军击败了我们的防御。

Text: Do not stop the Cold War yet
If checked, abandoning the task kills the running sequence.
NewTranslation: 检查后，结束任务，关闭进程。

Text: Use <LT> and <RT> to cycle throught the building models.
NewTranslation: 用<LT>和<RT>to cycle throught the building models。

Text: Hold Shift to place multiple buildings of the same type.
NewTranslation: 按住Shift来放置多个同样的建筑。

Text: Use the < key and the > key to cycle throught the building models.
NewTranslation: 用<和>键来循环选择各种建筑样式。

Text: You can construct the Ancient Ruins luxury entertainment building at this location.
NewTranslation: 你可以在此地建造奢华的古代遗址风格的娱乐场所。

Text: The Crown has reinstated the real estate tax. Our bribe was not large enough.
NewTranslation: 王国又恢复了房地产税，看来我们贿赂的还不够。

Text: The connection to the other player was lost.
There are no citizens not currently in Tropico's labor force
NewTranslation: 目前所有岛民都在工作中

Text: Dynasty members available for level up

NewTranslation: 除总统外可用的家族成员

Text: The workers in our <building> have gone on strike.
Better effectiveness due to a nearby volcano
NewTranslation: 因为靠近火山效率度更好

Text: Change the <crop/livestock> in this building for <cost>. Any upgrades will be lost.
NewTranslation: 改变这栋建筑生产的<crop/livestock>将花费<cost>。所有升级都将被取消。

Text: Are you sure you want to change the <crops/livestock> to <new type>? This will cost <cost>. Any upgrades will be lost.
NewTranslation: 你确定你想把<crops/livestock>变成<new type>？这将花费<cost>。而且所有升级都将被取消。

Text: The workers in our <building> have gone on strike.
Corruption results in a loss of money from the treasury. The Constitutional principles chosen will either increase or decrease corruption.
NewTranslation: 腐败会导致财政资金流失。选择不同的宪法原则会增加或减少腐败。

Text: <red>Level up cost will decrease upon scenario completion.</red>
NewTranslation: <red>在剧情完成之后，升级费用将减少。</red>

Text: Effectiveness indicates how well a building performs its primary function. A full workforce, larger budget and good conditions will improve it.
NewTranslation: 效率指数表现了建筑在执行其主要功能时的优劣程度。职工人数满员，提高预算和工作环境变好都可以提高效率。

Text: Change the crop in this building for <cost>. Any upgrades will be lost.
NewTranslation: 在这个建筑改变作物将花费<cost>。失去所有已有升级。

Text: Change the livestock in this building for <cost>. Any upgrades will be lost.
NewTranslation: 在这个建筑改变牲畜将花费<cost>。失去所有已有升级。

Text: Press <A> to add to the research queue.
Press <X> to remove from the research queue.
This dynasty requires a DLC that is not installed.
NewTranslation: 该家族需要一个你未安装的DLC。
按住Ctrl并左键单击以雇佣外籍劳工。

Text: My best days were spent in the Asylum. I was a great general who conquered Europe singlehandedly. Then the walls started creeping in and it was very scary. Then I couldn't stop laughing by the jokes the voices in my head told me. I finally emerged as the man I am today - a silent protector, a dark night, the man Tropico neither needs nor deserves. I am Toucanman!
NewTranslation: 我最好的时光是在避难所里度过。我曾是个单枪匹马征服欧洲的将军。后来墙慢慢地挤过来了，吓尿我了，我要被挤扁了。再后来，脑内的低语给我讲着笑话，我不停地笑啊笑啊。最终，我决定放弃我现在的身份 - 一个无言的守护者，一个黑夜的骑士，一个海岛不需要也不配得到的超级英雄。我是巨嘴鸟侠！

Text: Provides Healthcare. The "Discredit" citizen action has no negative effects.
NewTranslation: 提供医疗。败坏岛民名声的行为将不带有负面效果。

Text: Increases the effectiveness of the building by 20 using proven medical methods
NewTranslation: 新的医疗手段提高建筑物效率20

Text: Slowly generates new citizens with manager skills
NewTranslation: 新市民将慢慢获得“督导”技能。

Text: Modernize all Country Houses to Houses

The national producer of fine cheese for the gentry (and the poverty-stricken too). Tropican cheese is reputed to stand alone as the best-tasting cheese in the world, even better than Venezuelan beaver cheese.
NewTranslation: 为富人(和穷鬼)提供奶酪的国有乳制品厂。海岛独有奶酪因其独有而世界闻名，甚至比委内瑞拉海狸奶酪还要好。

Text: Provides Entertainment for the workers in the Creamery
NewTranslation: 为乳制品厂的工人提供娱乐

Text: Increases the standing with the Nationalists by 5 (up to 20 from different Creameries)
NewTranslation: 民族主义者的支持度+5(累计最高+20)

Text: Increases the amount of Cheese produced from the same amount of raw resources.
NewTranslation: 消耗等量原料，生产更多的奶酪

Text: Can a simple guard tower keep your precious palace safe? Of course not, you need something that provides better security! A veritable fortress, with lots of machine gun emplacements in fortified positions that will make Normandy look like a walk in the park.
NewTranslation: 一个简陋的炮楼能保卫你珍贵的宫殿么？当然不行，你需要一些更好的安全措施！一个用大型强化机枪阵地武装起来的名副其实的堡垒，会让诺曼底登陆看上去像是在花园里漫步。

Text: Engages enemy soldiers in its vicinity.
NewTranslation: 攻击在其范围内的敌人。

Text: Every evil mastermind should get one of those! Nothing says "super villain" like a giant laser on top of your inconspicuous secret lair. Just beware of those pesky superheroes - they are never happy with the eye surgery you aim to perform with this excellent device!
NewTranslation: 每一个邪恶策划者都应该拥有！秘密巢穴顶上有一个巨大的激光器也许对于超级恶棍来说不算什么，只是要小心那些讨厌的超级英雄-他们永远不会对你的这个眼科手术设备感到满意。

Text: Allows remote disintegration of enemy squads and building personnel.
NewTranslation: 允许远程瓦解敌人的小队和建筑中的敌人。

Text: Everybody expects the Tropican inquisition! Those guys aren't very subtle, walking around the island in their nice uniforms, accusing everyone in sight of witchcraft, heresy and impurity of thought. Nowadays burning heretics on the stake is considered to be in really bad taste and the inquisitors let most the people go with a stern warning.
NewTranslation: 每个人都期待海岛的宗教法庭！大家都以为这些人只会穿着漂亮的制服在海岛上闲逛，看到人就指责他们会巫术，会害人，思想不纯洁。事实上现在的法庭，烧烤异教徒已经不流行了，口水就能喷死人。

Text: Allows the persecution of factions. Discovers the hidden roles of citizens.
NewTranslation: 允许派系迫害，发现岛民中的隐藏人物

Text: The Inquisition provides profits depending on the number of religious buildings in the area.
NewTranslation: 根据该地区的宗教建筑数量，宗教法庭可以提供收益

Text: Produces Natural Gas based on the number of Plantations and Hydroponic Farms in the area
NewTranslation: 基于周边的种植园和水培农场生产天然气。

Text: Modernize all Plantations (Corn) to Hydroponic Farms (Corn)
NewTranslation: 升级所有种植园(玉米)为水培农场(玉米)

Text: The Tropican supercomputer is able to calculate Pi's 30000-th digit, provided this digit is 8. It was able to prove Fermat's Last Theorem with a solution so short and elegant that it could fit in the margin of a single book page. It still has some bugs in its software, but the programmers are affectionately calling them "undocumented creatures".
NewTranslation: 这台海岛超级计算机可以计算到π小数点后30000位！它还能在一页便签纸上给出费马大定理最短最优雅的证明。虽然它的软件系统还存在一些小毛病，不过程序员都把它们亲切的叫做“不存在的东西”

Text: Provides 3 votes for you in elections.
NewTranslation: 为你的选举提供三张选票

Text: Teach the Supercomputer to play chess. Improves relations with the USSR/Russia by10
NewTranslation: 教这台超级电脑玩国际象棋。可以提高和苏联/俄罗斯外交关系10点

Text: The TV Station begins to generate profits.

Early attempts to farm wind in Tropico have met with failure, mainly because the whole enterprise was Penultimo's idea. In a stroke of genius, El Presidente ordered a few large propellers and rebranded the whole initiative as an environment-friendly, modern way to produce electricity and keep the toucan population in check.
NewTranslation: 早期风力发电失败原因很明显是因为这都是贝奴迪莫的主意，而我们的总统灵光一闪，通过不变的大扇叶和重新设计的环保理念，不仅发电成功，同时也维持了我们可爱犀鸟的数量

Text: Provides Electricity. Better Effectiveness on higher ground and near shores.
NewTranslation: 提供电力，在高处或者海边效率更高

Text: Our air strikes have caused <number> civilian casualties.
NewTranslation: 我们的空袭导致了<number>位平民的伤亡。

Text:
Insidious domestic spies are spreading evil fact-based propaganda that there are enemy warships around our beautiful island. I had them put in jail, but we really must do something or else we will soon be under attack.

<_effect> Foreign ships have appeared near our shores. If relations do not improve soon we will be invaded.
NewTranslation:
阴险的间谍散布了一些邪恶但基于事实的传言，譬如目前我们美丽的岛屿周围出现了敌方战舰。我将他们投入监狱，但我们真的必须做点什么，否则我们很快就会受到攻击。

<_effect>外国船只现在出现在我们的进海岸。如果不能尽快改善外交关系，我们将被侵略。

Text:
The unrest on the streets is increasing. I think this is the result of indigestion caused by bad soup. Soup is evil. 

We have to please the people somehow or they may start something they will regret.

<_effect> If people remain unhappy a Coup or an Uprising will begin.
NewTranslation:
街头骚乱不断增加。我认为喝了变质的汤而腹泻，汤是万恶之源。

我们得让这些混蛋“强制”服药，否则他们会对自己的所作所为后悔的。

<_effect>如果幸福度持续走低，政变或起义将爆发。

Text:
In a bold tactical operation, the rebels managed to defame all of your portraits. They are becoming more aggravating with each passing day. We should do something about them or they may attack!

<_effect> Expect larger rebel operations against your regime unless the Rebel threat decreases.
NewTranslation:
叛军准备干票大的，破坏掉您所有的肖像。他们的队伍日愈壮大，我们应该打开他们的脑壳，把“敬爱总统”刻进去！

<_effect>如果不降低叛军威胁，将会爆发大规模叛军行动。。

Text:
We are under attack by those pesky foreign powers. How dare they?!?

 If I were not suffering from acute cowardice rendering me unfit for military duty I would have led the charge against the foreign oppressors myself!

<_effect> A foreign power is invading our island.
NewTranslation:
那些外国的乡巴佬竟然踏足我们神圣的国土，好大的胆子？！

可惜的是我有种不治之症，一参军就失禁，这大大地影响了我的光辉形象！否则我一定会把他们全部踹进加勒比海！

<_effect>外国势力正在侵入我们的领土。

Text:
Some of our loyal troops have turned out to be just troops. Right now they are trying to take you down!

<_effect> A military coup has begun.
NewTranslation:
很多原本的亲信，现在都成“倾信”了。现在他们要颠覆您的统治了。

<_effect>军事政变开始。

Text:
The people have revolted and I can't understand why. All I said was that they should eat some cake!

<_effect> An uprising has started.
NewTranslation:
我也不知为什么老百姓都去造反了，我只不过说了句，饿了就吃蛋糕！

<_effect>一场起义开始。

Text:
The rebels are attacking, coming for your head. I told the guys in the print shop that your new election posters look too much like wanted posters, but would they listen?

<_effect> The rebels are attacking.
NewTranslation:
叛乱者来了，他们想要您的脑袋。我给印刷店的家伙们说，您的新竞选海报看上去很像通缉令，难道他们真的印成通缉令了？

<_effect>叛乱者开始进攻。

Text: Ah, the new flavor we added to our cheese requires the opinion of an expert degustator to gain leverage on the international cheese market. Be careful, customers can be very capricious!
NewTranslation: 额，我们新口味的奶酪如果想在国际市场是获得优势，就得找个国际美食家给我们点小小的意见。不过要小心，顾客的口味总是众口难调！

Text: Who gets to taste our new <cheese_name>?
NewTranslation: 谁来命名我们的新奶酪<cheese_name>？

Text: That's the way to go, old chap! His Majesty is astounded by the quality of the Tropican cheese he was offered and applauds our efforts!
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮，老伙计！国王陛下对我们奶酪的质量表示惊叹，他对我们的努力工作表示钦佩。

Text: Dear Lord, my good chum! The King nearly took the offering of our cheese for an assassination effort! He is extremely offended, which, naturally entertains the Revolutionaries...
NewTranslation: 总督大人，我的朋友！国王陛下差点把我们进献奶酪当做刺杀行为！他非常气愤，当然，这让革命者们很开心……

Text: <_effect> Mandate reduced by 6 months, but 10 educated Revolutionaries will arrive on the island
NewTranslation: <_effect>任期被缩短了6个月，不过10位受过教育的革命者将会来到岛上

Text: This cheese packs some punch, my good chum! The lad who tasted it stood up on the table and began singing the Tropican hymn, even before it was written! The Revolutionaries are fascinated!
NewTranslation: 这奶酪包着惊喜，我的老伙计！试吃完这奶酪的小伙子站到桌子上开始唱起了本岛的赞歌，这赞歌还没被写出来呢！革命者们沉醉在歌声里！

Text: <_effect> 15 educated Revolutionaries will arrive on the island
NewTranslation: <_effect>15名受过教育的革命者将会来到岛上
革命反叛军开始反对你！

Text: The unfortunate lad who tasted the bit of cheese didn't make it through the ordeal, old chap. The Revolutionaries aren't particularly fond of the happening, but the Crown agents want to buy some and weaponize it against the Revolutionaries.
NewTranslation: 不幸的是，试吃奶酪的小伙子没能撑下来，老朋友。革命者们对这种事发生不是很高兴，但是王室的特工倒是对这奶酪很感兴趣，说不定这可以成为用来对付革命党的新式武器。

Text: With the first bite the pirates went berserk, rampaging through Tortuga's pubs and brothels for three days. When their captain recovered from his hangover, he traded a ton of gold for a piece of our new cheese!
NewTranslation: 吃下第一口奶酪的海盗们都变成的狂暴战士，在海盗岛上的酒馆和妓院里狂闹了整整三天。当他们的船长在宿醉中醒来的时候，甚至拿出一吨黄金，只为买一片我们的奶酪！

Text: <_effect> You receive $10,000 and increased base cost for Cheese
NewTranslation: <_effect>你收到$10000，奶酪的基础成本提高

Text: The Pirates tasted the cheese and they went furious! Their captain says that this was the biggest insult he received - to be fed hogwash!
NewTranslation: 海盗们尝过奶酪之后很愤怒！他们船长说这是他受过的最大的羞辱-妈蛋，这明明是猪饲料！

Text: <_effect> A minor pirate force will attack Tropico in 6 months. Luckily, there's a $5,000 bounty on their heads
NewTranslation: <_effect>一小堆海盗将在6个月后会对海岛发起进攻。幸运的是，这儿有$5000的他们的悬赏金。

Text: Comrade Presidente, the children of the flowers in the States empathize with us and are sending me regular messages via albatross flocks.
NewTranslation: 三军总司令总统先生，美国的花季儿童们很同情我们，他们用信天翁每天给我发信息。

Text: Nobody suspects a bunch of intoxicated airheads shambling around military facilities, but that鈥檚 just a ruse. They work better than any spy network. They just told me that the Americans will attack us in <attack_months> months. This time we can expect <infantry_count> <invasion_infantry> and <tank_count> <invasion_tanks> brigades coming our way.
NewTranslation: 看见那群在军事设施周围左摇右晃、喝得烂醉的空脑壳儿了么？那只是个障眼法。他们比任何间谍都要棒，他们刚刚告诉我美国佬将在<attack_months>个月内进攻我们，这次他们大概有<infantry_count><invasion_infantry>和<tank_count><invasion_tanks>

Text: The Unthinkables have been assembled for your inspection, Presidente. They are a rowdy bunch, but give me a few months and I will turn them into real soldiers!
NewTranslation: 为了接受您的检阅，这群逗逼被集合了起来，总统先生。虽然他们是一群蠢货，但是给我几个月，我会把它们调教成真正的战士！

Text:
We need a proper training regimen and a corresponding obstacle course! One that will be soaked with their blood, sweat and tears.
In what kind of soldiering should our Unthinkables specialize in? The corresponding building will be required as a training ground.
<ObjectiveText>
NewTranslation:
我们需要一个真正的训练场和一个有针对性的障碍训练课程！一个让他们在流血流汗流泪的时候都会记得的训练。
我们应该让这群逗逼针对什么训练呢？我们需要些针对性建筑，比如说训练场。
<ObjectiveText>

Text: I always thought Tropico needed paratroopers (<Choice1BuildingName>)
NewTranslation: 我总觉得海岛需要伞兵(<Choice1BuildingName>)

Text: You can't go wrong with guerilla fighters (National Park)
NewTranslation: 选游击队员是不会错的(国家公园)
全地形骑兵(工业化牧场(山羊))

Text: Excellent, Presidente! Our Unthinkables are already looking tired and miserable! That means our new drill sergeant is doing a fine job.
NewTranslation: 太好了总统先生！我们的逗逼小队看上去又累又苦！这说明我们的新兵训练官做得很好。

Text:
We need one last thing to turn our bunch of sissies into a truly elite fighting force.

<ObjectiveText>
NewTranslation:
我们需要做最后一件事，来把这群娘娘腔变成真正的勇士。

<ObjectiveText>

Text: Be the first to export <param_amount> Meat
NewTranslation: 成为第一个出口<param_amount>肉类的总统
拥有一座航天工程基地
拥有<param_amount>个适宜闲散游客旅馆
拥有<param_amount>个适宜生态游客旅馆
拥有<param_amount>个适宜家庭游客旅馆
拥有<param_amount>个适宜文艺游客旅馆
拥有<param_amount>个不同的豪华娱乐设施
拥有<param_amount>个不同的豪华娱乐设施
拥有<param_amount>个不同的工业建筑
拥有<param_amount>个不同的工业建筑

Text: For too long have the Tropican soldiers been ridiculed across the globe, Presidente! Time to assemble an elite commando unit that will demonstrate the full might of our military!
NewTranslation: 长期以来，岛上的士兵被全世界所嘲笑，总统先生！是时候来组建一个精英突击队来展示我们军队的实力了！

Text:
I plan to call those people "The Unthinkables". All the other good names have already been copyrighted.
First things first - they will need a place to train, sleep and stand at attention for hours on.

<_objective> Have a Defense HQ
NewTranslation:
我给他们起了个名字叫“逗逼部队”，因为所有其他的好名字都已受版权保护了。
首先，他们需要一个地方来训练，睡觉和站军姿。

<_objective>建造一个国防总部

Text:
We need a proper training regimen and a corresponding obstacle course! One that will be soaked with their blood, sweat and tears.
In what kind of soldiering should our Unthinkables specialize in? The corresponding building will be needed as a training ground.

<ObjectiveText>
NewTranslation:
我们需要一个能进行常规训练和障碍训练的场所，一个让“逗逼部队”洒下血，汗和泪水的地方！
我们这些“逗逼部队”应该专精于什么？首先我们需要建一个合适的训练场！

<ObjectiveText>

Text: Our elite troops, the Unthinkables, need just one more thing to maximize their potential. A mean and vicious drill sergeant!
NewTranslation: 逗逼部队-我们的精英部队，还需要做点什么来发挥他们最大的潜能，卑鄙恶毒的教官！

Text: I planned to train them personally, but I just remembered that I've got a condition. We will have to appoint another specialist.
NewTranslation: 我本打算亲自训练他们，但我记起来自己还有要事在身。所以我们不得不另请一名专家。
邀请苏联雪域特战队队长
邀请美国绿色贝雷帽上尉

Text:
The new Sarge requests several shiploads of Rum for a special Spetsnaz training course.

<_objective>  Export <RumAmount> Rum
<_reward> Defense HQ effectiveness increased permanently, + 20 USSR relations
NewTranslation:
新教官需要几船朗姆酒用于特殊训练课程

<_objective>出口<RumAmount>朗姆酒
<_reward>国防总部效益持续增加，+20与苏联关系

Text: Spetsnaz drill sergeant received his Rum
NewTranslation: 雪域特战队队长收到了朗姆酒

Text:
The new Sarge is a very godly man and requests a new cathedral named after Saint Drogo, the patron-saint of the Unthinkables. 
<_objective>  Build a new Cathedral
<_reward> Defense HQ effectiveness increased permanently, + 20 USA relations
NewTranslation:
新教官是一个非常虔诚的人，他请求建造一个新的大教堂，并给它起名叫做圣迭戈，他觉得圣迭戈是逗逼部队的守护神。
<_objective>新建一座大教堂
<_reward>国防部持续发挥作用，+20与美国关系

Text: Built a Cathedral for the US drill sergeant
NewTranslation: 为美国教官新建一座大教堂

Text:
The new Sarge is prone to pushing our men to the extreme. We will need a new hospital to ensure they survive the training.
<_objective> Build a new Hospital
<_reward> Defense HQ effectiveness increased permanently, +20 Militarists relations
NewTranslation:
新教官训练残酷至极，我们得建造一座医院来保证受训者在训练中活下来。
<_objective>新建一座医院
<_reward>国防总部持续发挥作用，+20与军国主义者关系

Text: Built a Hospital for the Unthinkables
NewTranslation: 为逗逼部队建造一座新医院

Text: Comrade, Presidente. We may have won our independence ages ago, but there are still others in this world that are under the tyrannical rule of the imperialist capitalists. Of course, I am talking about our brothers and sisters - the dolphins.
NewTranslation: 总统同志，我们多年前就开启了我们的独立时期。但在这个世界上，仍然有一些人生活在帝国主义资本家的暴虐统治下。当然，我说的是我们的兄弟姐妹-海豚。

Text:
Poor comrade dolphins are under constant terror of capitalist fishermen. The imperialist pigdogs are catching all the fish and leaving none for our dolphin brethren. We should send them aid.

<_objective> Export <amount> Fish
<_reward> Moral superiority
NewTranslation:
可怜的海豚同志一直生活在资本主义渔民的恐怖高压下。这些帝国主义畜生把鱼都捞走了，没有为我们的海豚弟兄留下一条。我们应该给海豚兄弟援助。

<_objective>出口<amount>鱼
<_reward>道德优越感

Text: The plight of our dolphin comrades is great, Presidente. Some of them have swum to our shores seeking asylum. We have to save them!
NewTranslation: 困境中的海豚同志是伟大的，总统，一些海豚已经游到海岸寻求庇护，我们要救他们！

Text:
You should establish a refugee camp for all the dolphins that want to escape to the safety of Tropico.

<_objective> Build a new Dolphinarium
<_reward> Moral superiority ... and $<MoneyReward> Treasury
NewTranslation:
您应该为那些逃到海岛来避难的海豚建造一座难民营。

<_objective>建造一座新的海豚馆
<_reward>道德优越感……以及$<MoneyReward>财政资金

Text: Comrade Presidente, it is time we take a stand and help our dolphin brothers and sisters proclaim their independence from imperialist tyranny!
NewTranslation: 总统同志，我们是时候表明立场，帮助海豚兄弟姐妹宣告它们已经脱离帝国主义的暴虐统治了，独立自由万岁！

Text:
As you probably remember there are two ways to declare independence, comrade Presidente - with money and with a revolution. However, the true revolutionary should always choose the path of the revolution. We must send our armies to liberate the oceans!

<_objective> Have <amount> Soldiers
<_reward> Liberty AND freedom for all dolphins
NewTranslation:
总统同志，您应该记得宣布独立有两种方法，那就是金钱与革命。然而，真正的革命者只应该选择革命的道路，所以我们必须派军队去解放海洋！

<_objective>拥有<amount>士兵
<_reward>让所有海豚获得解放和自由

Text: Comrade, Presidente. I am glad to report that our soldiers stand ready to liberate the dolphins. We only need the right commander to lead them.
NewTranslation: 总统同志，我很高兴的向您报告，我们的士兵已准备好随时解放海豚，现在只需要找个合适的指挥官带领他们就行。

Text: While it would be best if you lead the liberation forces personally, I understand that you are too busy ruling. We should send the next best man or woman, but who is he or she?
NewTranslation: 如果您亲自带领解放部队是极好的，但我发现您太忙了，我们还是再派别人去吧，他或她会是谁呢？

Text: Send a communist (+20 USSR relations, -20 US relations)
NewTranslation: 派遣一名共产主义者(+20与苏联关系，-20与美国关系)

Text: Send a dynasty member (+$$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 派遣一名家族成员(+$$<SwissReward>瑞士银行)

Text: Send a capitalist (+20 US relations, -20 USSR relations)
NewTranslation: 派遣一名资本主义者(+20与美国关系，-20苏联关系)
派遣一头海豚(免费的海豚馆)

Text: Sent a Communist as leader of the Glorious Dolphin Revolution
NewTranslation: 派遣一名共产主义者作为光荣的海豚革命领导者

Text: Leader of the Glorious Dolphin Revolution
NewTranslation: 光荣的海豚革命领导者

Text: Sent a Capitalist as leader of the Glorious Dolphin Revolution
NewTranslation: 派遣一名资本主义者作为光荣的海豚革命领导者

Text: Sent a Capitalist as leader of the Glorious Dolphin Revolution
NewTranslation: 派遣一名资本主义者作为光荣的海豚革命领导者

Text: Congratulations, comrade Presidente. Dolphins, like people, deserve freedom. After all, dolphins are people too!
NewTranslation: 祝贺您，总统同志。海豚应该像人一样得到自由，毕竟，海豚也是人！

Text:
All our dolphin comrades are now free to roam the world! Grateful, they have pledged to guide and bring good fortune to our trade ships.

<_effect> <TradeRouteReward> new trade offers; Extra trade routes
NewTranslation:
现在我们的海豚同志可以自由地漫游世界了！作为答谢，他们承诺为我们的贸易船只导航并且带来好运！

<_effect><TradeRouteReward>提供新贸易；额外的贸易路线

Text: I'd Like to Buy Some Cheese
Greetings, old boy. His Majesty has chosen you for a most daring task. Succeed and you'll be granted a royal title.
NewTranslation: 嘿，老伙计。陛下已经选中了您去做最大胆的任务，成功的话您会被授予皇家头衔。

Text:
His Majesty was feeling a little peckish and decided to try some cheese. Unfortunately all the cheese shops in the empire are empty. You are hereby instructed to begin production of cheese to satisfy His Majesty's hunger. Of course you'll first need to milk some goats.

<_objective> Build a new <_PrimaryBuildingName>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
陛下有点饿了想吃一些奶酪，不幸的是帝国所有奶酪店的奶酪都已经卖光了。您需要生产奶酪来满足陛下。当然您需要一些山羊。

<_objective>建立一个新<_PrimaryBuildingName>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text: Bad news, old chum. The empire's strategic reserves of milk have been drained. His Majesty fears that this will have a serious impact on his afternoon tea.
NewTranslation: 坏消息，老朋友。帝国的奶已经用完了。陛下担心这将严重影响他的下午茶。

Text:
The entire empire mourns this loss caused by a massive milk spill. I know that you were set to begin your cheese production but we have to address this problem first. We must restock our milk supply in order to save the afternoon tea for all mankind. 

<_objective> Export <amount> Milk
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
整个帝国为这大量奶泄漏所造成的损失而哀悼。我知道您已经开始生产奶酪，但我们必须先解决这个问题。我们必须生产足够的奶来拯救全人类的下午茶。

<_objective>出口<amount>奶
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text: With the milk crisis averted it is time to get back to making cheese, my good chum. His Majesty demands it!
NewTranslation: 奶危机已经解除了，我们该生产奶酪了，老朋友。这是陛下的决定！

Text:
As you probably know cheese is a vital source of nutrition and can prevent tooth decay. Contrary to some beliefs it doesn't actually cause nightmares. I read this is an encyclopedia. Now be a good chap and build a new Creamery to begin cheese production. Remember you'll need milk to make cheese.

<_objective> Build a new <_PrimaryBuildingName2>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
您看能知道奶酪是一个至关重要的营养来源，还可以防止蛀牙。一些信仰并不会导致恶梦，我读了百科全书。现在您要当个好的小伙子，建立一个新的奶酪厂并且开始生产奶酪。记住您需要奶来生产奶酪。

<_objective>建立一个新的<_PrimaryBuildingName2>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text: Congratulations, my good chum. His Majesty is very pleased with your cheese-making progress and has bestowed upon you the title of King of all Cheese.
NewTranslation: 恭喜您，我的老伙计。陛下对您的奶酪生产进程十分满意，并且赐予您“奶酪之王”的称号。

Text:
From here on now you will be known as the Monarch of Cheddar, Czar of Sirene, Sovereign of Gouda, Protector of Brie, Duke of Mozzarella and Parmesan, Defender of Feta, His Most Cheesy Goodness, the King of all Cheese.

You have also been granted one of these three rewards:
NewTranslation:
现在，您以切达干酪君主，沙皇塞娜，高德干酪君主，布里干酪保护者，马苏里拉奶酪和帕尔马干酪公爵，羊乳酪守卫之王，最优良的奶酪以及奶酪之王而闻名。

现在您可以从下列三个奖励中选择一个:

Text: Majestic Portrait (Increased standing with the Royalists)
NewTranslation: 雄伟的肖像(增加皇权支持者)

Text: Majestic Portrait as the King of Cheese
Although I detest royalty, I find it insulting that we have a King of Cheese but we don't have a Queen of Cheese. You should rectify this immediately.
NewTranslation: 虽然我憎恨皇室，但我觉得很这样很侮辱，我们有奶酪之王，但我们没有奶酪皇后。您应该立即纠正这一点。

Text:
Certainly there are many candidates, but if you are true to the Cause you will choose someone who best represents the revolutionary ideals of Tropico.

Whom will you choose to become the Queen of all Cheese?
NewTranslation:
当然这里有很多候选人，但如果您信赖您将要选择最能代表革命理想的人。

那您会选择谁成为奶酪女王？
另一个家族成员($$<SwissReward>瑞士银行)
艾维塔·瓦斯克斯(增加了革命者的支持)
王后(增加了皇室成员的支持)

Text: Became the King And Queen Of Cheese
NewTranslation: 成为国王女王奶酪大王

Text: Favored the Queen as Queen Of Cheese
NewTranslation: 赞成女王成为奶酪女王

Text: Your cheesy Highness, his Majesty is organizing a fondue party and requires much of your most excellent cheese.
NewTranslation: 长官大人！陛下正在组织一场芝士火锅派对。当然！需要您最好的奶酪！

Text:
Being a monarch yourself, I am sure that you understand the need to entertain your subjects from time to time. His Majesty's fondue is set to be the event of the year and thousands of the most prominent lords and ladies of the empire will attend. Ah... I am sure that your invitation is somewhere in the mail. 

<_objective> Export <amount> <_PrimaryResourceName2>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
身为一个统治者，我相信您肯定理解什么是不出任何差错。陛下的火锅派对将有成千上万的最有名的帝国的贵族们，名媛们出席。啊…我确信邀请信在您某个邮箱里！

<_objective>出口<amount><_PrimaryResourceName2>
<_reward>您的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text: The fondue party was a great success, old chap. It was a night for the history books. So sorry you couldn't attend. Your invitation must have gotten lost in the mail. Ever since His Majesty moved the post services to the Bermudas this has been a problem.
NewTranslation: 芝士火锅派对是一个伟大的成功，老朋友，这是创造历史夜晚。抱歉您不能参加。您的邀请邮件一定是迷路了。自从陛下的邮政服务搬迁到到百慕大群岛后，这种事情很常见。

Text: Just to make sure that there are no hard feelings, His Majesty, has allowed me to grant you a reward. One worthy of the King of Cheese, of course.
NewTranslation: 为了确保没有怨气，陛下让我给您一个奖励。无愧于奶酪之王的奖励。

Text: Certificate of loyalty (<MandateReward> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 忠诚证书(<MandateReward>个月的任期延长)

Text: Tax-free cheese brand (10% Cheese export price increase)
NewTranslation: 免税的奶酪品牌(增加10%奶酪出国价格)

Text: As any other important birth, the event will grab the attention of people far and wide. It may even cause some controversy. How should we handle this, Presidente?
NewTranslation: 新的继承人出生了，这件事会广泛的吸引人的注意力，甚至可能会引起人们的一些争议。我们该如何处理这个问题，总统？

Text: Organize a quick wedding (Build a new <ReligiousBuildingName> in 9 months)
NewTranslation: 举办一次闪婚(在9个月内建造一个新的<ReligiousBuildingName>)

Text: I like a good scandal (acknowledge the child; -<_FactionModifier> <_FactionName> relations)
NewTranslation: 我喜欢一个好的绯闻(承认这个孩子；-<_FactionModifier><_FactionName>关系)

Text:
We are arranging a quick wedding.

<_objective> Build a new <ReligiousBuildingName>
<_reward> New dynasty member
NewTranslation:
我们正在安排一次闪婚。

<_objective>建造一个新的<ReligiousBuildingName>
<_reward>新的家族成员

Text: Perhaps it is time to consider adding another member to your dynasty, just to be on the safe side. I've done some research and discovered that you have around <RandomLargeNumber> cousins. We'll need some sort of a test to narrow that number down a bit. Do you have any ideas?
NewTranslation: 也许是时候为自己的家族新增一名成员了，为了安全起见。我已经做了一些调查，发现您身边有<RandomLargeNumber>表亲。我们需要做一系列的测试来缩小合适人选，您有什么想法？

Text: I don't need a successor. I will live forever!
NewTranslation: 我不需要继承人。我将与天同寿！

Text: Harvard (Pay $<HarvardCost>; Improves foreign relations upon return)
NewTranslation: 哈佛大学(支付$<HarvardCost>；返回时改善外交关系)

Text: Lomonosov (Pay $<LomonosovCost>; Improves foreign relations upon return)
NewTranslation: 罗蒙诺索夫大学(支付$<LomonosovCost>；返回时改善外交关系)
马加丹州州立大学(获得$$<MagadanPrize>)

Text: Now is not the time for a holiday

Your dynasty member has stumbled upon some minor problems at his university. It looks like after a night of hard ... studying he stole the head from the university patron's statue, harassed the entire football team, drove the dean's car to the roof of the building and rolled it over before drinking all the water from the pool. Oh, and he was buck naked the whole time.

How should we handle this?
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员在他的大学期间出了一些小问题，好像是经过一晚上的……嗯……学习(您懂的)，他偷走了大学守护神雕像的头，骚扰了整个足球队，在房顶驾驶院长的汽车，把饮水池的水全部弄了出来，我的个天啊，到现在为止他都是一丝不挂。

我们应该如何处理？

Text: Pay to cover up the incident ($<MoneyToPay>)
NewTranslation: 找我们熟悉的那个危机公关吧……($<MoneyToPay>)

Text: Promote his heroic deeds in the news (-<_ForeignModifier> <_ForeignName> relations; +<_FactionModifier> <_FactionName> standing)
NewTranslation: 散播他的英雄事迹(-<_ForeignModifier><_ForeignName>关系；+<_FactionModifier><_FactionName>支持率)

Text: While studying abroad one your dynasty members met someone special - the offspring of another great Presidente. The young couple is now expecting and that may become a problem as both families want to adopt the newborn into their own dynasty. We must not lose, Presidente!
NewTranslation: 留学的家族成员爱上了另一位伟大总统的孩子-现在好了，两个家族都想将这对夫妇的新生儿纳入自己的家族。我们不能失去它，总统！
没有什么事情是金钱不能够解决的(支付$<MoneyToPay>)

Text: Challenge them to a duel (chance for a dynasty member to die)
NewTranslation: 和他们决斗(家族成员有一定几率死亡)
