Text: This is no competition. The baby is ours! (-<_ForeignModifier> <_ForeignName> relations; new dynasty member)
NewTranslation: 这不是竞争，孩子是我们的！(-<_ForeignModifier><_ForeignName>关系；新的家族成员)

Text: We won the duel! The baby is ours.
NewTranslation: 我们赢得了决斗！孩子是我们的了。

Text: We lost the duel. Your dynasty member will be missed.
NewTranslation: 我们输掉了决斗。将要失去家族成员。
自豪的罗蒙诺索夫大学
自豪的马加丹州州立大学

Text:
I am happy to report that your dynasty member has returned victorious from his education abroad. In addition to improving his skills, I am happy to report that he has grown more resistant to the effects of intoxicating beverages.

<EffectText>
NewTranslation:
我很高兴的向您报告，您的家族成员已经从国外深造归来了。除了技能的提高，他还能抵抗更多酒精的影响。

<EffectText>

Text:
Members of the royal family, famous politicians, notorious actors, everybody's got one. Pet project, that is. It is the latest fad for the super rich and powerful.
You should assign a member of your dynasty to a pet project. All the chaps at my club are doing it. Of course, that person won't be able to attend to his or her official duties for a couple of years but they aren't all that important anyways.
NewTranslation:
皇室成员，著名的政治家，臭名昭著的演员，每人都有一个宠物。宠物计划，这是最近超级富豪们的新时尚。
把家族成员分配到宠物计划中，当然，在接下来的几年中他不会出席或履行他的职责，虽然这些都不重要。

Text: We have no time for pets
It's a commentary on modern Tropican life (+<FactionBonus> <Faction1Name> relations)
NewTranslation: 这是海岛现代生活的佐证(+<FactionBonus><Faction1Name>关系)

Text: Had a pet project that was a commentary on modern Tropican life
NewTranslation: 拥有宠物是海岛现代化的证明

Text: It's a re-imagining of the Tropican spirit  (+<FactionBonus> <Faction2Name> relations)
NewTranslation: 这是海岛精神的新印象(+<FactionBonus><Faction2Name>关系)

Text: Had a pet project that was a re-imagining of the Tropican spirit
NewTranslation: 拥有宠物是海岛精神的新印象

Text: It's the Tropican dream (<CitizenBonus> citizens will immigrate to the island)
NewTranslation: 这就是海岛梦(<CitizenBonus>市民移居到岛上)

Text: Had a pet project that represented the Tropican dream
NewTranslation: 拥有宠物是海岛梦的象征

Text: It's a canoe (<TradeRouteBonus> new trade routes)
NewTranslation: 这是一只独木舟(<TradeRouteBonus>新的交易路线)

Text: Had a pet project that was a canoe
NewTranslation: 宠物计划是一条独木舟
这是一个陷阱！(减少叛乱威胁)

Text: Had a pet project that was a trap!

NewTranslation: 这是现代艺术(未知后果)

Text: It's a critique on the Tropican condition (<EducatedBonus> college educated citizens will immigrate to the island)
NewTranslation: 这是对海岛条件的批判(<EducatedBonus>大学生将会移居到海岛)

Text: Had a pet project that was a critique on the Tropican condition
NewTranslation: 拥有宠物是对海岛条件的批判
这是一个世界末日装置(+$$<SwissBonus>；-<ForeignPenalty><_ForeignName>关系)

Text: Had a pet project that is a doomsday device
NewTranslation: 执行宠物计划会导致世界末日

Text: At last your dynasty member's greatest creation is complete! Years of hard work have finally paid off. Tropicans eagerly await the unveiling of the project. There is one minor problem. We still don't know what the damned thing actually is. We have to think of something, quick.
NewTranslation: 最后，家族成员伟大的创造完成了！多年的努力终于有了回报。海岛急切的等待着计划的揭幕，但是我们仍然不知道这该死的东西是什么，我们得想一想，快。

Text:
Your dynasty member's pet project was sabotaged by the rebels. They managed to sneak in without anyone noticing, stole the project before trashing the place and littering it with empty bottles of imported beer and Scottish whiskey. Those confounded rebels!
It was the rebels, right? It doesn't matter, we'll blame them anyway.
<_effect> Rebel threat decreased.
NewTranslation:
您的宠物计划被叛军破坏了。在没人注意时，他们设法偷走了项目并且把它扔进了垃圾桶。这些该死的叛军。
这些是叛军，对吗？没关系，我们会惩罚他们的。
<_effect>叛军威胁减少

Text: Failed to complete a pet project

Thinking - it doesn't always come naturally. Sometimes you can write a novel in one sitting and sometime you just stand there staring at a blank page for hours. Fortunately I have the perfect cure for writer's block - a vacation.
You should send a member of your dynasty on a nice, long vacation. I am sure they will come back with answers to all of our problems.
NewTranslation:
思考-并不总是源于自然，有时一坐下来就妙笔生花，但有时盯着白纸却只能瘦驴拉干屎-连个屁都出不来。幸运的是我遇到写作障碍后，有一种超赞的治疗方法-一个假期。
您应该送一名家族成员去度假，我肯定他们回来后会回答我们的所有问题。

Text: Send a dynasty member on vacation (he or she will be unavailable for some time)
NewTranslation: 送一名家族成员去度假(在一段时间内这名成员不可用)

Text: 1 Free building from the Research & Education category
1 Free building from the Welfare & Media category
2 Free buildings from the Raw Resources category
2 Free buildings from the Residential category
1 Free building from the Economy & Foreign Relations category
NewTranslation: 1座免费建筑(经济和对外关系)

Text: Your dynasty member has returned from the 2 year vacation well rested and literally bursting with ideas. Yes literally, meaning that if we don't implement at least one of them your dynasty member may burst. Which one shall we implement?
NewTranslation: 您的家族成员在两年长假后回来了，他是得到了好好休息，还是脑袋里灵感不断。我们必须要从中选出一项，不然这个可怜的娃就没命啦。我们要选择哪一个？

Text: Immigration Reform (<CitizensReward> people will immigrate to the island)
NewTranslation: 移民改革(<CitizensReward>人移居到海岛)

Text:
Your dynasty member has returned from a 2 year vacation and, from what I've heard, it sounds like it was a vacation in hell. First the toilet on the ship broke, then the plane crashed on an island in the Bermuda Triangle full of deadly dinosaurs, then there were robot zombies, cannibals, flying monkeys and yellow submarines and then it all turned out to be a dream.
Well, at least your dynasty member was able to sell the movie rights.
<_effect> $$<SwissReward> have been added to your Swiss Bank Account.
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员在两年长假后回来了，我听说，简直是地狱休假。首先船上的厕所坏了，然后飞机坠毁在百慕大三角的一座岛上，岛上到处都是致命的恐龙，还有机器人僵尸，食人族，飞猴和黄色潜水艇，最后……额……它其实只是一个梦。
至少您的王朝成员能够出售电影版权。
<_effect>$$<SwissReward>添加到瑞士账户

Text:
We have devised a new way to defeat the insurgents. We will use one of your dynasty members to seduce the leaders of the rebels. It is a risky plan but if we are successful we'll know the name and location of every rebel leader on the island. From there on it's a simple process of elimination.
<_effect> Your dynasty member will be unavailable for some time. There is a chance that he or she will be killed on this assignment.
NewTranslation:
我们设计了击败叛军的新方法，我们将用一位家族成员来引诱叛军领袖。这是一个危险的计划，但如果我们成功，我们就会知道岛上每一个叛军领袖的名字和位置。
<_effect>一段时间内您选择的家族成员无法使用。分配的家族成员有一定几率被杀死。

Text:
Your dynasty member was able to seduce and kill the last of the rebel leaders. Congratulations, Presidente! The rebels are no more.
<_effect> Rebel leader killed. Your dynasty member has returned victorious from his mission.
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员引诱并杀死了叛军领袖。祝贺您，总统阁下！

<_effect>叛军领袖被杀死。家族成员执行任务后返回。
独自引诱所有叛军领袖

Text:
Your dynasty member was able to seduce a rebel leader. Now we know everything about him or her. You should send our soldiers to eliminate this threat.
<_effect> Rebel leader discovered
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员成功引诱了叛军领袖，现在我们对他了如指掌，您应该派士兵将他绳之以法。

<_effect>叛军领袖消失。

Text: Your dynasty member's attempts to seduce the rebel leaders have all been unsuccessful. Even worse, the rebels have captured your dynasty member and are demanding a ransom. What shall we do, Presidente?!
NewTranslation: 您的家族成员试图诱使叛军领袖没有成功。更糟的是，叛军抓获了您的家族成员并要求赎金。我们该做什么，总统阁下？！
支付赎金(-$<RansomCost>；叛军威胁增加)

Text: Tropico doesn't negotiate with rebels! (the dynasty member may die)
NewTranslation: 海岛不能与叛军妥协！(家族成员可能会死)

Text: Your dynasty member was eaten by La Chupacabra while trying to escape the rebels' clutches.
NewTranslation: 当您的家族成员正准备从叛军的魔爪中逃脱出来时，被卓柏卡布拉吃掉了。

Text: Your dynasty member managed to escape the clutches of the rebels.
NewTranslation: 您的家族成员设法逃脱了叛军的魔爪

Text:
Inconceivable,  Presidente! Your dynasty member has failed to seduce the rebel leaders. Even worse, one of the rebel leaders has seduced your dynasty member into joining the rebels.
<_effect> Your dynasty member has joined the rebels. Rebel threat increased.
NewTranslation:
简直神作，总统先生！您的家族成员不但没能引诱叛军首领，反而加入了叛军。

<_effect>您的家族成员加入了叛军。叛军威胁增加。

Text:
During last night's family gathering a heated dispute arose between two of your dynasty members. <dynasty_name1> stated that the toucan should be made mascot of the Tropican national team. <dynasty_name2> disagreed saying that only the llama has the wisdom and grace to be the symbol of Tropico.

You'll have to take a side before things escalate.
NewTranslation:
昨晚您的两个家族成员发生了激烈的争论。<dynasty_name1>表示，犀鸟应该做为海岛国家队的吉祥物。<dynasty_name2>不同意，说羊驼的智慧与慈悲才是海岛的象征。

您不得不在事态进一步升级之前赞同一方。

Text: Side with <dynasty_name1> (+10% export price of Bananas for 4 years; Toucans like Bananas)
NewTranslation: 站在<dynasty_name1>一边(在接下来的4年里+10%香蕉的出口价格；犀鸟喜欢香蕉)

Text: Side with <dynasty_name2> (+10% export price of Wool for 4 years)
NewTranslation: 站在<dynasty_name2>一边(在接下来的四年里+10%毛出口价格)

Text: Let them bicker. It builds character.
NewTranslation: 让他们继续争辩，建立自己的个性

Text: Ever since the toucan/llama dispute your dynasty members have been quibbling about everything. Now things have escalated into an all-out verbal war over which milk is best. <dynasty_name1> claims that cow milk is more natural while <dynasty_name2> claims that goat milk is healthier. Time to choose sides again.
NewTranslation: 自从犀鸟和羊驼谁更有代表性的话题诞生以来，家族成员一直喋喋不休的争论这个话题。现在好了，事情已经上升到了完全的唇枪舌战当中，现在又开始讨论什么样的奶更好了。<dynasty_name1>声称，肯定是牛奶好，然而<dynasty_name2>却声称，羊奶才是最健康的。

Text: Side with <dynasty_name1> (+10% export price of Milk)
NewTranslation: 站在<dynasty_name1>一边(+10%奶制品出口价格)

Text: Side with <dynasty_name2> (+10% export price of Milk)
NewTranslation: 站在<dynasty_name2>一边(+10%奶制品出口价格)

Text:
Your dynasty member <dynasty_name2> is unhappy with you. There are even rumors that <dynasty_name2> has been trying to turn the army against you. I know what will calm <dynasty_name2> down - llamas. You should build some more llama ranches quickly or you may lose your dynasty member.

<_objective> Build <amount> new Llama ranches
<_timelimit> 12 months
<_reward> <dynasty_name2> is placated
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员<dynasty_name2>和您在一起就感觉菊花疼，甚至有传言说<dynasty_name2>试图策反军队然后搞死您。我知道什么能让<dynasty_name2>平静下来-羊驼。您应该建立一些羊驼牧场，否则您有可能会失去您的家族成员。

<_objective>建造<amount>新的牧场(羊驼)
<_timelimit>12月
<_reward><dynasty_name2>被安抚

Text:
Your dynasty member <dynasty_name2> has betrayed you and has launched a military coup in the hope of replacing you as Presidente.
<_effect> Dynasty member lost. A Coup starts
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员<dynasty_name2>背叛了您并且发动了军事政变妄图取代您。

<_effect>失去家族成员。政变开始。

Text: To Beer Or Not To Beer

Your dynasty member <dynasty_name1> is angry with you and is considering leaving the island. All <dynasty_name1> thinks about now is beer, and he wants to start a microbrewery on some other island. We could try to convince <dynasty_name1> to stay with the help of some good old Tropican Rum.

<_objective> Export <amount> Rum
<_timelimit> 24 months
<_reward> <dynasty_name1> is placated
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员<dynasty_name1>在生您的气，他正在考虑离开这个岛。<dynasty_name1>现在脑子里全是啤酒，他想在岛上开一个啤酒厂。我们可以在海岛老朗姆酒的帮助下试着去说服<dynasty_name1>留下来。

<_objective>出口<amount>朗姆酒
<_timelimit>24月
<_reward><dynasty_name1>被安抚

Text:
Your dynasty member <dynasty_name1> has decided that he is no longer needed here and is moving on to start a microbrewery on another island.
<_effect> Dynasty member lost.
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员<dynasty_name1>决定了他不再需要这里了，并且搬到另一个岛开起了一个小啤酒厂。

<_effect>失去家族成员。

Text:
Your dynasty members <dynasty_name1> and <dynasty_name2> are still mad at each other. It is time to make them reconcile their differences and make up. The best way to bring the family together is a good old fashioned home-cooked meal.

<_objective> Increase Food Happiness to <amount>
<_reward> $$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank Account
NewTranslation:
您的家族成员<dynasty_name1>和<dynasty_name2>两个还是在争论那个傻逼的问题。是时候弥合他们的分歧了，让家人呆在一起的最好的方式就是做一桌传统家常菜。

<_objective>增加<amount>食品幸福度。
<_reward>$$<SwissReward>瑞士银行。
汽车时期(建设一座汽车工厂)

Text: Presidente, I've been hearing a lot of bad things about fast food lately. We should weaponize it!
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，我最近看到了许多关于快餐的负面新闻。我觉得垃圾食品是一个不错的武器。

Text:
Even if only half of those things I've read on the Internets are true, it would mean that fast food is one of the most dangerous substances on the planet. We should perform some tests to see what the full potential of fast food is.

<_objective> Build a new Fast Food Joint
<_reward> $$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank
NewTranslation:
哪怕网上的那些消息只有一般是真的，那也足以证明快餐是世界上最危险的物质之一！我们应该研究它到底有多么牛逼的破坏力！

<_objective>建造一家快餐店
<_reward>$$<SwissReward>

Text: Presidente, now that we have fast food we shouldn't test it on our own citizens ... I meant we shouldn't test it only on our own citizens. We need some foreigners for a more complete study.
NewTranslation: 总统阁下，现在我们的岛民已经拥有快餐了，我的意思是不能只是我们的岛民，我们还需要外国的游客来做小白鼠！这样得到的数据才够全面。

Text:
I've skimmed through the user manual of our Fast Food joint and it says that Slob tourists are preferred. This is perfect! The Slobs will generate extra profits in our fast food joints and we'll use them for our experiments.

<_objective> Have <amount> tourists on the island
<_reward> $<MoneyReward> Treasury
NewTranslation:
通过查询我们快餐店的用餐记录，发现贫民游客尤其喜欢这些食物。这简直棒极了，他们不仅会帮助我们完成实验，更会为我们带来更多收益！

<_objective>在海岛上拥有<amount>位游客
<_reward>$<MoneyReward>

Text: It doesn't look good, Presidente! We can't confirm any of the mythic properties of fast food. It's not even all that bad for your health. In fact, it is quite tasty.
NewTranslation: 看起来不太妙，总统阁下。我们并没有发现快餐有什么神秘加成属性，它对健康影响也不是很大。而且实际上这东西味道还不错。

Text: I still believe we can make my plan work, Presidente, I'm sure of it! People already believe that there's tons of weird and dangerous stuff in fast food. We should try to add some of our own. What do you say, Presidente?
NewTranslation: 但我仍然相信我们的计划能够实现，总统阁下。我确信人们已经开始觉得快餐里面有一些诡异危险的东西，那么为什么我们不自己往里面加点危险的东西呢？您说呢，总统阁下？

Text: Add medicine to fast food (Have a Pharmaceutical Company)
NewTranslation: 加药快餐(拥有制药公司)

Text: Add toxic waste to fast food (Build a new Waste Treatment Plant)
NewTranslation: 加有毒废弃物(新建一座垃圾处理厂)

Text: Add Pineapples to fast food (Build 2 new Hydroponic Farms (Pineapple))
NewTranslation: 加菠萝(新建2座水培农场(菠萝))

Text: It doesn't look good, Presidente! We can't confirm any of the mythic properties of fast food. It's not even all that bad for your health. In fact, it is quite tasty.
NewTranslation: 看起来不太妙，总统阁下。我们并没有发现快餐有什么神秘加成属性，它对健康影响也不是很大。而且实际上这东西味道还不错。

Text:
I know we should add some medicine to the fast food. That will certainly make the burgers more dangerous.

<_objective> Have a Pharmaceutical Company
NewTranslation:
看来我们要往快餐里下点药了！这一定会把汉堡变得危险的！

<_objective>拥有一家制药公司

Text: After countless experiments all tests prove negative. No enhanced flavor, no mutations, no nothing! It seems like our fast food will never be anything more than mere burgers.
NewTranslation: 经过无数次的实验但都失败了。没有特殊风味！没有基因突变！什么都没有！跟普通的汉堡有毛的区别！

Text: Unfortunately stuffing our burgers with medicaments didn't make our fast food any more dangerous. In fact it made it even more nutritious and healthy. Actually that's kind of a medical marvel and we have several buy offers for our burger recipe.
NewTranslation: 不幸的是我们汉堡并没有变危险，反而更加的营养健康了。幸运的是针对这项伟大的医疗成就已经有许多人来咨询讨要配方。

Text: Sell the recipe to the USA ($10,000 Treasury; -10 Russia relations)
NewTranslation: 把汉堡配方卖给美国(国库+$10000；-10同俄罗斯关系)

Text: Sell the recipe to Russia ($$10,000 Swiss Bank; -10 USA relations)
NewTranslation: 把汉堡配方卖给俄罗斯(瑞士银行+$$10000；-10同美国关系)

Text: Sell the recipe to China (50 immigrants; -10 Russian and USA relations)
NewTranslation: 把汉堡配方卖给中国(50移民；-10同美国与俄罗斯关系)

Text: Sell the recipe to the EU (No effect)
NewTranslation: 把汉堡配方卖给欧盟(没影响)

Text: Sold your burger recipe to the USA
Sold your burger recipe to Russia
NewTranslation: 把汉堡配方卖给俄罗斯

Text: Sold your burger recipe to China
Sold your burger recipe to China
It doesn't look good, Presidente! We can't confirm any of the mythic properties of fast food. It's not even all that bad for your health. In fact, it is quite tasty.
NewTranslation: 看起来不太妙，总统阁下。我们并没有发现快餐有什么神秘加成属性，它对健康影响也不是很大。而且实际上这东西味道还不错。

Text:
I know we should add some toxic waste to the fast food. That will certainly make the burgers glow in the dark.

<_objective> Build a new Waste Treatment Plant
NewTranslation:
我们应该加点有毒废弃物，没准这样我们的汉堡就有夜光属性了！

<_objective>新建一座垃圾处理厂

Text: After countless experiments all tests prove negative. No enhanced flavor, no mutations, no nothing! It seems like our fast food will never be anything more than mere burgers.
NewTranslation: 经过无数次的实验但都失败了。没有特殊风味！没有基因突变！什么都没有！跟普通的汉堡有毛的区别！

Text:
Unfortunately stuffing our burgers with toxic waste didn't make our fast food any more dangerous. Although there were no physical mutations, there were some mental changes in our test subjects. Somehow they became smarter, like me.

<_effect> 10 citizens have gained manager skills
NewTranslation:
不幸的是我们汉堡并没有变危险，尽管没有基因突变，但是它使一些人变得更聪明了！比如说我！

<_effect>10个市民变成管理人员

Text: It doesn't look good, Presidente! We can't confirm any of the mythic properties of fast food. It's not even all that bad for your health. In fact, it is quite tasty.
NewTranslation: 看起来不太妙，总统阁下。我们并没有发现快餐有什么神秘加成属性，它对健康影响也不是很大。而且实际上这东西味道还不错。

Text:
I know we should add some pineapples to our fast food. Mmmm... pineapples. Since my student years, I've always loved pineapples.

<_objective> Build <amount> new Hydroponic Farms (Pineapple)
NewTranslation:
看起来是时候加一些菠萝了！呣～从我的学生时期开始，我最喜欢的水果就是菠萝了。

<_objective>建造<amount>座新水培农场(菠萝)

Text: After countless experiments all tests prove negative. No enhanced flavor, no mutations, no nothing! It seems like our fast food will never be anything more than mere burgers.
NewTranslation: 经过无数次的实验但都失败了。没有特殊风味！没有基因突变！什么都没有！跟普通的汉堡有毛的区别！

Text:
Oddly enough stuffing our burgers with pineapples didn't make our fast food tastier or any more dangerous. However we did win the reward for best use of pineapples since Miss Pineapple.

<_effect> +20% export price of Pineapples and Canned Pineapples
NewTranslation:
尽管菠萝没有把汉堡变得危险，但是我们赢得了凤梨小姐的赞赏。

<_effect>+20%菠萝以及罐装菠萝出口价格

Text: Rebel Incursion. The Rebel threat will increase over the next 2 years.
NewTranslation: 叛军入侵。未来两年内叛军威胁增加。

Text: Mr. President your aide Penultimo was hit by a falling brick... seven times. Now he thinks he is a superhero. And that you are HIS sidekick.
NewTranslation: 总统先生…您的助手贝奴迪莫先生被飞砖砸中了…七次！现在他嘚瑟自己是个英雄，而你…是他的助手。

Text:
We probably should do something. I fear that this time we will need experts, Mr. President. We need a special place for the mentally impaired, such as Penultimo. A nice place with padded walls and lots and lots of happy pills.

<_objective> Have an Asylum to treat Penultimo's delusion
NewTranslation:
我们该有点行动了。恐怕这次我们需要一些砖家，我的总统先生。我们需要一个地方，去招待那些智障人士，比如…贝奴迪莫。一个有水泥墙和很多很多快乐丸的地方，那可真是极好的。

<_objective>建造一座疯人院去治疗贝奴迪莫的妄想

Text: Mr. President, the doctors have concluded that Penultimo suffers from multiple personality disorder. Personally, I am shocked that Penultimo has any personality at all.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，医生们诊断出贝奴迪莫患有多重人格。但对我个人而言，我很震惊贝奴迪莫竟然还有人格？！

Text: The doctors believe that we should let Penultimo's delusions play out in order to cure him. Would you talk to him when you have the time?
NewTranslation: 为了治好贝奴迪莫，医生们认为我们应该让他继续妄想下去。你有时间和他谈谈么？

Text: I'm Katman! We have to save the city from the evil crime lords. To the monorail-Katmobile, Yarn-boy!
NewTranslation: 作为扁蝠侠！我们必须把城市从大反派手中救回来！菜鸟，快去把我的扁蝠独轮车开过来。

Text:
Come on, Yarn-boy, we have to locate the crime lords and dispense justice upon them. But these evildoers keep to the shadows! They are hidden throughout the city! We'll need help from the commissioner to find them.

<_objective> Defeat the crime lords on the island by banishing or eliminating them
<_hint> Use Police Stations to discover special citizens such as Crime Lords and Rebel Leaders
NewTranslation:
来吧，菜鸟，我们必须找到那些黑帮大佬并降服他们！这些坏家伙都藏的很好，看来我们需要专业人士的帮助。

<_objective>打败岛上的犯罪头目或消灭他们
<_hint>使用警署来发现特别的家伙，譬如犯罪头目和叛军领袖。
扁蝠侠很生气，后果很严重

Text: Oh no, Yarn-boy, the crime lords were just a diversion, setup by my arch-enemy - El Lupus! Now we have fallen into his shark infested trap. Is this the end of our heroes?
NewTranslation: 哦不，我想我们上当了，那个黑帮大佬只是个幌子，真正的幕后黑手是我的死敌狼先生，该死，我想我们已经陷入他精心设置的陷阱了，饥肠辘辘的鲨鱼就在身边。难道今日我们将命丧于此？

Text: Fear not, as Katman has not one, not two, but three plans to escape the dastardly trap! Our dashing hero decides to leave the choice to his trusty sidekick. So what will it be, Yarn-boy?
NewTranslation: 哈，伟大的扁蝠侠早就预料到这种情况了！伟大的扁蝠侠早已准备好许多战略转移的计划了！不过伟大的扁蝠侠决定给菜鸟一个表现的机会！你打算怎么办，菜鸟？

Text: Call the Justice Pals (Praise the Allies)
NewTranslation: 快打电话给我们的正义小伙伴们(赞美同盟国)

Text: Use the shark repellant kat-spray (Have a Cannery)
NewTranslation: 快使用扁蝠侠先生独家驱鲨喷雾(拥有一家罐头厂)
让我们试试扁蝠侠的诊断光束怎么样？

Text: Great idea, Yarn-Boy! We'll cure Lupus with my univerasl antidote. I just hope we are not too late!
NewTranslation: 好主意，菜鸟！只要只要时间还够，我想扁蝠侠全宇宙独家解毒剂会治好狼先生的。

Text:
The bad news is that my univeral antidote is in my kat-belt back home. We'll need to improvise - quickly gather some doctors and we'll mix up a new batch in a jiffy.

<_objective> Have <amount> doctors
<_reward> Cure El Lupus and possibly Penultimo
NewTranslation:
卧槽，我出门前忘记把解毒剂塞在我的腰包里了！我想我们需要赶紧召集一批医生就地做出解药了。

<_objective>拥有<amount>医生
<_reward>全力救治贝奴迪和莫狼先生
我们可以点亮扁蝠侠光束求援么？

Text: That's right Yarn-boy! We can get by with a little help from our friends - the Justice Pals. Activate the kat-signal, Yarn-boy!
NewTranslation: 好主意！我的好男孩，我们可以从正义小伙伴那里获得一点帮助。快去点亮扁蝠侠光柱，菜鸟！

Text:
Our comrades will help us escape your dastardly, shark infested trap, El Lupus! Then it will be curtains for you, my old enemy! 

<_objective> Praise the Allies from an Embassy
<_reward> Defeat El Lupus and possibly cure Penultimo
NewTranslation:
哈！我的亲密战友会把我们从你这个卑鄙的鲨鱼陷阱中救出去的！而狼先生你就请在这里多呆一会吧！

<_objective>通过大使馆赞美你的盟友
<_reward>打败狼先生并全力救治贝奴迪莫
可以释放俺扁蝠侠的独家防鲨喷雾了么？

Text: Holy mackerels, Yarn-boy! Bring me the shark repellant kat-spray.
NewTranslation: 看在老天的份上！快把防鲨喷雾给我拿过来，菜鸟！

Text:
What?! We're out of shark repellant kat-spray! Well, now we are in trouble. Quickly, make a new batch! You'll need coffee, pineapples, fish and meat. Put them in a can, then shake and spray the sharks for an explosive resolution!

<_objective> Have Cannery
<_reward> Defeat El Lupus and possibly cure Penultimo
NewTranslation:
什么！！我们的喷雾用完了？我想我们有麻烦了！快，我们得再做出一批来，我想我们需要咖啡，凤梨，鱼还有肉！对，就是这些，把它们一起塞进罐子里！我想这就足够对付这帮鲨鱼了！

<_objective>拥有一家罐头厂
<_reward>打败狼先生并全力救治贝奴迪莫

Text: The jig is up, El Lupus! You can't stop me with sharks and traps because... I'm Katman! Wait what's going on here, Presidente! Why am I wearing a kat suit?
NewTranslation: 哈！哈！哈！我的狼先生，你再也不能用你可怜的鲨鱼陷阱阻止我了！因为我是伟大的扁蝠侠！呃…呃？发生什么事情了，总统大人？我为什么穿着这可笑的扁蝠侠服？

Text:
I don't get it! Why are we here, El Presidente, and who's that laying unconscious on the floor? And what's with that suitcase full of money? It must be yours, Presidente!

The End?
NewTranslation:
我，我不明白，总统先生。为什么我们会在这？晕倒在船板上的那个家伙又是谁？天啊？这还有个装满钱的大箱子，噢，这玩意我倒是很能确定是您的，总统先生。

这就完了？

Text: Take the money for yourself ($$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 私自带走这个钱箱($$<SwissReward>瑞士账户)

Text: Deposit the money in the Treasury ($<MoneyReward> Treasury)
NewTranslation: 把钱交给财政部($<MoneyReward>财政资金)

Text: KAPOW! Katman and Yarn-boy have vanquished another crime lord. Take that, evildoers!
NewTranslation: 卡砰！扁蝠侠和他的菜鸟小子再次击退了邪恶势力！哈，坏人们，接招吧！

Text: KAPOW! Katman and Yarn-boy have vanquished another crime lord. Take that, evildoers!
NewTranslation: 卡砰！扁蝠侠和他的菜鸟小子再次击退了邪恶势力！哈，坏人们，接招吧！

Text: I Can Haz Crime Lordz, lol!
NewTranslation: 哈！邪恶在我面前无处遁形。

Text: (singing) Na-Na Na-Na Na-Na Na-Na Na-Na Katman! Na-Na Na-Na Na-Na Na-Na Na-Na Katman! Katman, Katman, Katman!
NewTranslation: 哒啦嗒~哒啦嗒~我就是扁蝠侠，扁蝠侠就是我~哒啦嗒~哒啦嗒~

Text:
Holy sardines, Yarn-boy! The evildoers are up to no good again. Fortunately the Kat-computer has located one of the crime lords. To the Kat-amaran, Yarn-boy!

<_effect> A crime lord has been discovered
<_hint> You can view a list of all discovered special citizens from the Almanac population page
NewTranslation:
哈，菜鸟！看起来邪恶再次出现了，不过没关系，本大侠的电脑已经定位他们了！让我们出击吧！

<_effect>发现一名犯罪头目
<_hint>你可在年鉴的人口页面查看所有已知的特殊人员

Text: Effectiveness is increased when building is that close to a volcano marker
NewTranslation: 建筑物建在火山附近时效益增加

Text: Unable to find map. You don't have the required DLC to join this game.
NewTranslation: 找不到地图。你没有加入该局游戏所需的DLC。

Text: Either another version of your dynasty exists or your dynasty was deleted. You can save this dynasty under the same or a different name.
NewTranslation: 可能是你有另一个版本的家族存在，也可能是家族已被删了。你可以将此家族以相同或不同的名字命名。

Text: The game is from a different version.
NewTranslation: 该游戏版本与你的不同。

Text: Be the first to have <param_amount> Filthy Rich Tropicans
NewTranslation: 成为第一个拥有<param_amount>个非常富裕岛民的总统

Text: You need at least one Embassy
NewTranslation: 您需要至少拥有一个领事馆

Text: We are ready (the enemy will invade immediately)
NewTranslation: 我们准备好了(敌军立即入侵)

Text: A game account associated with this e-mail address already exists.
NewTranslation: 与该电子邮件地址相关联的游戏帐户已存在。

Text: <blue>This building will be completed after the battle is over</blue>
NewTranslation: <blue>此建筑将在战斗结束后完工</blue>

Text: Write your name in the scrolls of history with the finest cheese in the Caribbean.
NewTranslation: 把您的名字和最好的奶酪一起铭刻在加勒比海的历史卷轴中。

Text: Demonstrate your military power in a series of clashes with the US Army.
NewTranslation: 在一系列和美国的冲突中展示您的军事肌肉。

Text: El Presidente's dolphin friends are the only hope for the future of humankind.
NewTranslation: 总统先生的海豚朋友是人类未来的唯一希望。

Text: The worst vices of El Presidente manifest in this hypnotherapeutic session.
NewTranslation: 在催眠理疗讲习会上罗列总统先生十大恶习。

Text: Establish your own brand of savory, delicious fast food in Tropico!
NewTranslation: 美国有麦当劳，我们有麦海岛！

Text: I say, Presidente, old boy! You may not know this, but diplomacy is a game of chess, literally. There's a big chessboard at the UN and whoever wins gets to set the global political trends for that month.
NewTranslation: 我说，总统，老伙计！也许您不知道，外交其实就是一盘棋。在联合国这个大棋盘上，谁赢了，谁就可以指定全球政治趋势。

Text:
Unfortunately Tropico seems to be completely devoid of chess players, good ones at least. If we are serious about dabbling in this global politics business we will have to build ourselves an electronic Kasparov.
You get the construction started, old chum. I will go round up some geeks to teach the machine to play chess. 
<_objective> Have a Supercomputer with the "Deep Green" upgrade
<_reward> <ImmigrantReward> College educated immigrants
NewTranslation:
可惜海岛貌似没什么好棋手。如果我们真想在全球政治中插一脚，那我们就得弄一个电子卡斯帕罗夫。
老伙计，您开工建设，而我，要去找些极客来教这机器怎么下象棋。
 
<_objective>拥有一个升级了"深绿"的超级电脑
<_reward><ImmigrantReward>受过大学教育的移民

Text: You know what they say, old boy. In the game of pawns you either promote or you en passant. Our supercomputer has learned all the chess moves. We can now unleash it on the UN chess game.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，您知道他们说什么？在国际象棋中，您可以升格或者吃过路兵。我们的超级计算机已经学会了所有的招数，现在让它去联合国国际象棋赛上大杀四方吧！

Text:
As the newcomers to the grand chessboard, we have the right to challenge one of the 2 current superpowers. Beating the USA grandmaster will be easy. However they are sore losers and may invade us in spite. We have to prepare a gift to appease them - some cigars will do the trick.
We can't beat the USSR in a fair game. We will have to bribe them with rum.
NewTranslation:
作为大棋盘上的新人，我们有权去挑战两大超级大国中的一个。打败美国的国际象棋大师很简单，尽管当他们可耻的失败之后可能会入侵我们。我们得准备一些礼物来安抚他们-一些雪茄就够了。
我们无法在公平的游戏中打败苏联，我们得用朗姆酒来贿赂他们。

Text: Play against USA (export cigars; <ImmigrantsReward> High-School educated immigrants)
NewTranslation: 对阵美国(出口雪茄；<ImmigrantsReward>受过高中教育的移民)

Text: Play against USSR (export rum; cheap import trade routes)
NewTranslation: 对阵苏联(出口朗姆酒；廉价的进口贸易路线)

Text: We have challenged the USA to a game of chess. Our Supercomputer will surely win. After we beat the USA we have to present them with a gift or they will throw a hissy fit.
NewTranslation: 我们提出和美国下一盘棋，我们的超级计算机肯定能赢。我们打败了美国之后得给他们送礼，否则他们就会乱扔东西发脾气。

Text:
With our victory assured I am writing new international immigration laws which will allow us to lure many educated workers to our shores.
<_objective> Export <amount> Cigars
<_reward> <ImmigrantsReward> educated immigrants
NewTranslation:
我们获胜后，新的国际移民法就由我们制定了。这就意味着知识分子快快来，文盲傻逼靠边站。

<_objective>出口<amount>雪茄
<_reward><ImmigrantsReward>受教育的移民

Text: We have challenged the USSR to a game of chess. Our Supercomputer will surely lose... in a fair game. To win we must bribe the USSR with alcohol, lots and lots of alcohol.
NewTranslation: 我们向苏联挑战国际象棋。公平比赛的话，我们的超级计算机输定了……为了取胜，我们得用很多酒来灌晕苏联人。。

Text:
Should our ruse prove successful, we can set new international trade laws that will lower the import prices of goods.
<_objective> Export <amount> Rum
<_reward> Cheap import trade routes
NewTranslation:
如果我们的计划成功了，我们能指定新的国际贸易法。这意味价低的进码头，价高的靠边站。

<_objective>出口<amount>朗姆酒
<_reward>廉价进口贸易路线

Text: We are in a bit of a pickle, old boy. Our chess playing supercomputer has become self-aware and has taken over the UN. With it in charge, the UN might even get some work done. We have to stop it!
NewTranslation: 我们有点小麻烦了，老伙计。我们的超级计算机的自我意识开始觉醒了，它还接管了联合国！然后这家伙可能会对我们下手，我们得阻止它。

Text:
We have to create a new chess prodigy to defeat our own supercomputer. There are a few options to choose from, old chap, and not all of them are Penultimo.
Who will we train in the art of chess?
NewTranslation:
我们必须制造一个新的国际象棋神童来击败我们的超级计算机。我们得好好考虑一下人选问题，老伙计，当然，不一定非得是贝奴迪莫。
我们挑选谁来训练棋艺？

Text: Chess, my good chum, is a game of wit and intelligence. Therefore to win we need to boost the intelligence of your dynasty member's with some brain food.
NewTranslation: 我的朋友，国际象棋是智商和情商的游戏。因此我们需要一些大脑食物来增加您的家族成员的智力。

Text:
While I am sure that your dynasty member has the capability to beat a human player or even a normal computer, beating a supercomputer will require a lot of brain power. I've heard that fish is an excellent brain food. We should feed your dynasty member as much fish as possible.
<_objective> Export <amount> fish
NewTranslation:
我相信您的家族成员有能力击败人类棋手甚至普通电脑，但击败超级计算机还需要大量的脑力。我听说鱼是一种很好的健脑食品，我们得让家族成员多吃鱼。

<_objective>出口<amount>鱼

Text: Chess, my good chum, is a game of wit and intelligence. Penultimo is derived of both, so we will have to cheat.
NewTranslation: 我的朋友，国际象棋是智商和情商的游戏。贝奴迪莫……这两个东西他都没有，所以我们得作弊。

Text:
I can see only one solution to this problem. We should build a new Supercomputer to feed Penultimo instructions through a hidden earpiece during the match. Even if the new supercomputer tries to take over Penultimo's brain, he will be sorely disappointed.
<_objective> Build a new Supercomputer
NewTranslation:
我有一个解决办法。我们制造一个新的超级计算机，在比赛中激活贝奴迪莫隐藏的耳机。尽管新的超级计算机也许会尝试接管贝奴迪莫的大脑，但计算机会失望的。

<_objective>建造一个新的超级计算机

Text: Use a llama to beat a supercomputer at chess! Way to think out of the box, old chum.
NewTranslation: 在国际象棋中用羊驼战胜超级计算机！我们要跳出思维定式，老朋友。

Text:
I am sure that your plan will confuse the supercomputer to a point it would lose. However we still need to find a llama that can at least move the chess pieces. You know I think I saw a llama act in a circus once.
<_objective> Have a Circus with the "Dancing Llamas" upgrade
NewTranslation:
这个计划肯定能让超级电脑当机的，它输定了。但是我们得先找到一头会移动棋子的羊驼，我在马戏团就见到了一头。

<_objective>有一个升级“羊驼舞”的马戏团

Text: That's that, old boy. We've managed to defeat our own creation and the UN is again back to its old normal and hopeless sate.
NewTranslation: 搞定了，老朋友。我们尝试并击败了我们创造的一切，联合国又回到了之前平淡又绝望的样子。

Text: We've conquered the grand chessboard twice. However the UN has decided to disqualify us on the grounds of playing too aggressively. As a consolation prize we have been allowed to make one last international law, for old time's sake.
NewTranslation: 我们已经赢得了两次，然而联合国却因我们玩过头了而取消我们的资格。但我们有个安慰奖，允许最后一次参与到国际法的制作，看在老交情的份上。

Text: New passenger ship routes (<ImmigrantReward> uneducated immigrants)
NewTranslation: 新的客运航线(<ImmigrantReward>未受教育移民)
总统生日礼金($$<SwissReward>瑞士银行账户)

Text: The Llama Development Act (<LlamaReward> free Ranches (Llamas))
NewTranslation: 羊驼发展法案(<LlamaReward>免费的牧场(羊驼))

Text: Comrade Marx says that religion is the opinion of the people. Therefore we should use religion to change the opinion of the people towards the revolution.
NewTranslation: 马克思同志说:“宗教是人民的意见”。因此，我们应该利用宗教来改变人民对革命的态度。

Text:
While I am not very religious myself, the people of Tropico demand religion. Building a new Catholic Mission will make them happier. We can in turn use the mission to preach the idea of the revolution and convert the masses to our cause.
<_objective> Build a new Catholic Mission
<_reward> Revolutionary Support
NewTranslation:
虽然我要求自己的时候从来都不严格，但是海岛人民需要宗教信仰。建造一个新的布道所将会使他们更加快乐。我们可以用这项任务来宣传革命的思想，改变群众对我们的看法。

<_objective>建造一个新的布道所
<_reward>革命支持

Text: (singing) Governor? Do you want to build an Inquisition? Come on, let's go and play! Let's persecute some royalists and make them go away.
NewTranslation: (唱歌中)总督，您想要建一所宗教审判庭？来吧，我们一起玩！让我们去调戏那帮保皇党然后让他们滚蛋。

Text:
I may have misquoted comrade Marx but the sentiment remains the same - we should use religion to turn the people to the cause of the Revolution. We can establish an Inquisition to help us persecute those pesky Royalists and increase the number of Revolutionaries on the island.
<_objective> Have an Inquisition
<_reward> Revolutionary Support
NewTranslation:
我可能误解了马克思同志的思想，但我们的感情是一致的-我们应该利用宗教来让人民投身革命。如果我们建立宗教审判庭，那那些讨人厌的保皇党就该头疼了，而且更多的人会涌入革命的洪流。

<_objective>有一所宗教审判庭
<_reward>革命支持

Text: Just as we expected, the Inquisition is here. However we will need someone to lead them - a Grand Inquisitor.
NewTranslation: 不出意外，宗教审判庭竣工了。然而我们需要一个人来领导他们-一个大审判官。

Text:
We need to choose someone who instills fear and surprise into the people. Someone who is ruthlessly efficient, yet fanatically devoted to Tropico. Someone who would look good in a nice red uniform. Someone who is not Penultimo!
So who will be the Grand Inquisitor of Tropico?
NewTranslation: 我们得找个人向人民灌输恐惧，传播惊喜。这个人沉着冷静高效并积极投入到海岛的伟大事业中。这个人穿着漂亮的红色制服。这人绝不是贝奴迪莫！那么谁会是海岛的大审判官？
一个家族成员($$<SwissReward>瑞士银行账户)
一个革命者(增加革命支持)

Text: Everybody wants forgiveness, old chap. And the Church can provide it, for a small fee.
NewTranslation: 老兄，每个人都想得到宽恕，教堂可以提供这项服务，但是需要点小钱。

Text:
I see you've got yourself an Inquisition. That's all well and good, but His Majesty believes you should start monetizing it. Just start selling indulgencies and you'll stand to profit quite well from your religious buildings.
<_objective> Have an Inquisition with the "Sell Indulgencies" upgrade
<_reward> 2 free Catholic Missions.
NewTranslation:
我看您有了自己的宗教审判庭，干得好，但是陛下认为您应该开始赚钱。您可以出售赦免权，这样您的宗教建筑就可以盈利了。

<_objective>有一所升级“出售赦免权”的宗教审判庭
<_reward>两所免费的布道所

Text: To Kill Or Not To Kill
Governor, it is time to cut off the head of the snake. We have to deal with the leader of the Royalists.
NewTranslation: 总督，现在是砍下蛇头的时候了，我们必须处理掉保皇党领导人。

Text:
Let us only hope that he is indeed a snake and not a hydra. We can discover special citizens, such as the leader of the Royalists, with the help of our Inquisition.
<_hint> You can kill, bribe, banish or discredit any Tropican citizen. Keep in mind that each of these actions has its own consequences.
<_objective> Locate and the Royalist leader and kill, bribe, banish or discredit him
NewTranslation:
我们希望他只是个地头蛇而不是九头蛇。我们可以借助宗教审判庭发现特殊人群，比如说保皇党的领导人。

<_hint>您可以处死、收买、驱逐或诽谤任意一个海岛人民。记住，每项行动都会导致不同的后果。
<_objective>找到保皇党领导者然后处死、收买，驱逐或者诽谤他。

Text: Governor, faction leaders are like weeds - you pluck one of them but another one springs in its place.
NewTranslation: 总督，派系领导人像野草一样-野火烧不尽，春风吹又生。

Text:
The Royalist leader is dead but another one has taken his place. Also it seems that the family of the ex-leader and the royalists as a whole are a bit angry at you.

Don't worry, Governor. We, the Revolutionaries, appreciate your decisive actions!
<_effect> Increased revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
保皇党的领导者去世了，但很快有人接了他的班，似乎前领导人家属和保皇党都有对您不满。
别担心，总督。我们革命者为您的行动喝彩！

<_effect>增加革命支持

Text: His Majesty has heard some very good things about you from the royalists on your island. How much did you pay them?
NewTranslation: 陛下从海岛上的保皇党听到许多关于您的好事情，您付给了他们多少好处费？

Text:
Bribes are a powerful tool in a ruler's arsenal. Paying the right people can turn public opinion for, at least for a while. When you bribe a faction leader your standing with that faction and therefore your overall approval will be improved.
<_effect> 12 months mandate extension
NewTranslation:
行贿是统治者强有力的兵工厂，至少一段时间内，可以吸引公众的舆论。当您贿赂您支持的派系领导人时，全体满意度将会提升。

<_effect>12个月任期延伸。

Text: Good job getting rid of that infuriating royalist and his family, Governor. I'm sure they won't need all their wealth where they are going.
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮！把那些令人发指的保皇党和他的家人赶出去，总督。我相信他们不需要财产什么的。

Text:
I'm told that banishment is a less messy way to get rid of unsavory characters and their entire families. As an added bonus you also get to appropriate their wealth into your Swiss Bank account. Unfortunately banishing people raises unrest on the island and factions tend to become upset if you banish their leader.
Don't worry, Governor. We, the Revolutionaries, appreciate your decisive actions!
<_effect> Increased revolutionary support
NewTranslation:
我听说，驱逐出境是个可以让讨厌的人和他的家人彻底滚蛋的简单方法。当然他们的财产流进了您的瑞士银行账户。不幸的是，如果被驱逐的是某个派系的领导人，岛上的不安定因素会增加，派系会不满。
不过无需担心，总督。我们革命者认为您果断行动值得称赞！

<_effect>增加革命支持

Text: Good show, old bean! His Majesty has gotten word of the "rumors" about the leader of the royalists. As a result he is no longer a leader, nor a Royalist.
NewTranslation: 干的不错，老兄！陛下听信了关于保皇党领导者的“谣言”。结果，他再也不是一个领导者，更不是保皇党。

Text:
Slander can be quite effective if wielded properly. A discredited person is kicked out of any and all factions. If he was a leader of a faction, that faction will also lose a part of its members and some of them may even join opposing factions.
His Majesty has decided to extend your mandate as a compensation for any problems caused by the ex-leader of the Royalist faction.
<_effect> 6 months mandate extension
NewTranslation:
如果诽谤运用合理，效果将十分明显。没有哪个派系喜欢一个声名狼藉的人。如果一个派系领导人声明狼籍，部分派系成员会退出派系，甚至加入敌对派系。
作为前派系领导人的补偿，国王陛下决定延长您的任期。

<_effect>6个月任期延长

Text:
Setting up a new brand means that you have to overcome the brutal competition 鈥?especially here, in the Caribbean, where people are ready to defend the pride of their national cheese with their lives. Good luck, my good chum!

<_objective> Generate <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Win the mission!
<_hint> Cheese price is low at start, but you will be able to increase it
NewTranslation:
创立一个新的品牌意味着你需要克服残酷的竞争–尤其是在加勒比，这里的人们会用生命来捍卫自己国家的奶酪。祝好运，我的密友！

<_objective><text_param>赚取<amount>
<_reward>完成任务！
<_hint>奶酪的价格一开始较低，但你能够提高价格。
金灿灿的奶酪，总统先生！

Text: You have proven to be the cheesiest dictator in the Caribbean. Tropicans will remember your name forever as you have given them future worth living for!
NewTranslation: 您被公认是加勒比地区的独裁者，海岛人民将会因为您给与他们生活的信念而永远记住您的名字！

Text:
The ripening of the cheese is what adds to its unique flavor, but it takes time, and our time is money. On the other hand, if there was something smelly enough to add to the newly curdled cheese, it will gain distinctive flavor in no time. Imagine 鈥?a cheese with classy taste at a price anyone can afford!

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Increased base price for Cheese
NewTranslation:
成熟的奶酪有着自己独特的风味，但这很消时间，对于我们来说时间就是金钱。另一方面，如果在新凝结的奶酪中添加够味的东西，他将立即获得与众不同的味道。想象一下–一种可以让任何人都买得起的风味奶酪！这酸爽简直不能忍！

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>增加奶酪价格

Text: <_effect> The pirates will attack Tropico within 6 months. Luckily, there's a bounty on their heads worth $5000
NewTranslation: <_effect>海盗们将会在6个月内攻击海岛。幸运的是，他们头上的赏金高达5000美金呢

Text: Coffee-Enriched Cheese for the Refined Taste
NewTranslation: 文艺青年专供咖啡味浓缩奶酪

Text:
No one in Europe would dare stray from the traditional recipes, under the threat of the direst of consequences. On the other hand, we are creating a brand new tradition, right here! I say, we add a flavor to our cheese that is so unusual, perverted even, if you prefer that term, that the rich and decadent upper class in Europe will find it irresistible!

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Increased base price for Cheese by <reward>%
NewTranslation:
在恐怖后果的威胁下那些欧洲佬没人敢走出传统奶酪的束缚。另一方面，我们正在创造新传统，就在这里！要我说，我们的风味奶酪是如此的不同寻常，甚至绅(bian)士(tai)(如果你喜欢这样形容的话)，在欧洲那些腐朽的上层阶级与土豪阶级是无法抵挡它的诱惑的！

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>提高奶酪基础价格<reward>%

Text: Coffee-Enriched Cheese for the Refined Taste
NewTranslation: 文艺青年专供咖啡味浓缩奶酪

Text: <_effect> The pirates will attack Tropico within 6 months. Luckily, there's a bounty on their heads worth $5000
NewTranslation: <_effect>海盗们将会在6个月内攻击海岛。幸运的是，他们头上的赏金高达5000美金呢

Text: Sugar-Fermented Cheese for Those Strong of Spirit
NewTranslation: 意志坚定者专供糖酵奶酪

Text:
By combining traditional methods of producing strong Caribbean alcohol and our newly-bred Tropican cheese, we can create a brand of cheese that has the kick of a dozen of pints. No, better make it two dozens!

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Increased base price for Cheese by <reward>%
NewTranslation:
将用传统方法酿造的加勒比烈酒和我们新制成的海岛奶酪结合起来，我们可以创造出一种效果和十二品脱烈酒差不多的奶酪。还是算了，弄成二十四品脱会更好些！


<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>提高基础奶酪价格<reward>%

Text: Sugar-Fermented Cheese for Those Strong of Spirit
NewTranslation: 意志坚定者专供糖酵奶酪

Text: <_effect> You receive $10 000 and increased base price for Cheese
NewTranslation: <_effect>你获得$10000并且奶酪的基础价格提升

Text:
We will strike the heart of the biggest cheese industry in the Caribbean 鈥?the Venezuelans and their beaver cheese! We just need to be ready for the bloody outcome!

<_objective> Have a Military Fort
<_reward> You get to insult the Venezuelan Beaver Cheese. What a joy!
NewTranslation:
我们将直击加勒比最大奶酪工厂的核心-委内瑞拉人和他们的海狸奶酪！让血雨来的更猛烈些吧！

<_objective>拥有一个军事要塞
<_reward>你将凌辱委内瑞拉海狸奶酪。真爽！

Text: Now you get to choose how to insult the Venezuelan Beaver Cheese!
NewTranslation: 现在你得选择怎样去凌辱委内瑞拉海狸奶酪。

Text: "Even mold can鈥檛 grow on that fermented cur!"
NewTranslation: “霉菌甚至都不想长在那个混蛋身上！”
“我的新鞋子散发着更多的芬芳！”

Text: "We fed it to swine and they vomited!"

Luckily, your insult was so dire, that it sent their country into disarray and confusion, common folks fleeing the cities in panic and priests giving last rites to shock-stricken people. It will take them time to mount a proper offensive.

<_effect> Venezuelans will invade Tropico in <attack_time>
<_reward> Greatly increased base price for Cheese 鈥?should you survive!
NewTranslation:
更幸运的是，你的凌辱十分给力，使他们国家陷入了杂乱与混沌之中，恐慌的公众竞相逃离城市，牧师为吓尿的人们作临终祈祷。这将使得他们花费大量的时间去准备进攻。

<_effect>委内瑞拉人将在<attack_time>后入侵海岛
<_reward>奶酪的基础价格大幅增长–你一定能活下来吧！

Text:
As you close your eyes, you breathe slowly and feel even more relaxed. Now imagine that spot becomes your happy place. It is the place where you feel completely relaxed and nothing bothers or worries you. Imagine how it looks. Now describe it to me.

<_objective> Build an Asylum
<_reward> Feeling more relaxed you can focus better on the imaginary island. You receive 'The Compass' technology for free
NewTranslation:
闭上眼睛，慢慢吸气~吐气~吸气~吐气~你感到越来越放松。现在，想象那个斑点是一个使你感到幸福的地方，你感到非常放松，宁静，现在看看它什么样的，告诉我……哇擦，伍尔夫要哭了！

<_objective>建一所疯人院
<_reward>使你感到更轻松，更容易找到130水路上的幻岛，你将免费获得“指南针”科技

Text:
Now, visualize a person standing outside your happy place. You realize that this person is one of your vices that tries to control your life. Now visualize a person for each of your vices that you want to get rid of. Relax, breathe and push them out of your consciousness.

<_effect> You visualize your Vices in the form of special citizens. Discredit them to push them out of your mind.
<_objective> Discredit <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Win the mission
NewTranslation:
现在，想象一个人站在外面。你开始意识到他是你的恶习之一，他曾试图影响你的人生，现在，将每一个你要克服的恶习都想象成一个人。放轻松，深吸一口气，并将他们推出你的意识。

<_effect>你将你的恶习想象为表中特殊岛民。抹黑他们来将其推出脑海。
<_objective>抹黑<amount><text_param>
<_reward>获得胜利

Text: <_reward> Your acting Presidente will level up!
NewTranslation: <_reward>你的现任总统将会得到晋升！

Text: On behalf of all Tropicans, namely your advisor team, I want to thank you for attending Dr. Fraud. By the way, he's waiting in the palace dungeon for your second session, just as you ordered!
NewTranslation: 我代表所有的海民，以及您的顾问团队，感谢弗劳德博士的出席。呵呵，顺便说一下，他正在宫殿地牢里等待您的会议，就像您的命令！

Text:
I want you to visualize a friendly person. Is he a police officer, chasing and beating bad people with a bat? Oh, that鈥檚 disturbing, but expected. Keep on it until you feel better.

<_objective> Build <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Feeling of comfort that takes the form of $<task_reward>
<_hint> Use Police Stations to discover Vices and other hidden special citizens who dwell in their vicinity
NewTranslation:
现在我要你想象一个友善的人。他是一个警察么？拿着警棍四处抓捕殴打坏人……(译者注:此处双关，暗指蝙蝠侠，batman)呃，这让人有点躁动不安。继续，不要停，直到你感觉更好些。

Text:
When your mind is focused, you will find it easier to re-think your past and see the roots of your bad sides. Then they are easy to isolate and forget.

<_objective> Answer the three questions correctly
<_reward> Better self-awareness
NewTranslation:
当你的思维集中起来，你会发现你可以和容易回想起你的过去并发现陋习的根源。这样他们就很容易被隔离并遗忘。

<_objective>答对三道问题
<_reward>更清楚地认识自己

Text: Which llama went to the forest?
All the anteaters in the world.
Which llama went to the barn?

The goal of this test is the same - answer the questions correctly.

<_objective> Answer the three questions correctly
<_reward> Better self-awareness
NewTranslation:
这个测试的目标是相同的-答对问题。

<_objective>答对问题
<_reward>更清楚地认识自己

Text: Which llama went to the forest?
How many anteaters there will be in three years?
NewTranslation: 三年后会有多少只食蚁兽？

Text: All anteaters which are alive in the world
NewTranslation: 世上所有活着的食蚁兽

Text: Which llama went to the barn?

<_effect> You answered the questions correctly. Good job!
<_reward> More Vices are revealed!
NewTranslation:
<_effect>你答对了这些问题。干得漂亮！
<_reward>揭示出更多的陋习！

Text: <_effect> You didn't answer the questions correctly. You have to focus!
NewTranslation: <_effect>你没有答对这些问题。你要集中精神！

Text:
This is a regular panic attack. Don't be alarmed. Trying to overcome your Vices will regularly lead to such happenings.

Instead, try to breathe deep and calm down. Breathe in, count from one to six, pause, then breathe out, counting from one to six. That's it, that's right. You can remove the Panic Attack with minimum effort every time it tries to rise again.
NewTranslation:
乖~别怕，别怕，这种恐慌很常见的。试图克服陋习经常会导致这种现象。
别怕，别怕，深呼吸会让你平静些的，深吸一口气，一直吸，从一数到六，停，慢慢吐气，吐，再吐，从一数到六。就这样，这就对了。你可以毫不费力地在恐慌将要发作时平复下来。

Text:
A panic attack can be a very frightening and uncomfortable experience, but it is absolutely not dangerous. Panic attacks are a state of mind. When you learn to control your mind, you will experience the rewarding feeling of relaxation.

<_effect> No more panic attacks!
<_reward> $<panic_reward>
NewTranslation:
恐慌发作将是一种非常可怕的，令人难受的经历，但它绝对没有生命危险。恐慌是一种心理影响。当你学会控制你的思想，你将享受到前所未有的放松。

<_effect>恐慌不再增长！
<_reward>$<panic_reward>

Text: The universe is trying to oppose your efforts
NewTranslation: 宇宙都试图让你的努力白费。

Text: If I had Just One Last Wish
NewTranslation: 如果我还能许最后一个愿望

Text:
Although I appear like someone you know, I come from the 31st century. In my timeline the Earth was destroyed by an alien fleet working on a new inter-galactic highway. According to the aliens, Earth was vacated by its truly intelligent inhabitants 鈥?the dolphins, which we doomed to extinction centuries ago. By the laws of galactic bureaucracy, only the dolphins are allowed to file a complaint and stop the imminent destruction of the planet.

<_effect> The Universe struggles to keep its course of events - <text_param> cost increased!
<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Save the future of the entire humanity!
NewTranslation:
尽管我表现的像你所知的某个人，但实际上我是来自于31世纪的。在我的时间线里地球被正在修建银河高速公路的外星人施工队拆迁了。按照外星人的说法，地球应该腾出空间给高智能种族-海豚居住，而我们人类在太古以前就该被灭绝了。所以根据银河系的官方法典及有关司法解释，只有海豚才能提出反对爆破地球的诉讼请求。

<_effect>宇宙意志努力确保悲剧继续发展-<text_param>花费增加！
<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>拯救全人类！顺便准备银河系漫游指南

Text: Side by Side in Life's Great Gene Pool
NewTranslation: 肩并肩，为了生命的延续！

Text:
My instruments detect that great forces and probabilities shift to impede your efforts and provide the people of the 31st century with dolphin ambassadors of hope! You will have to push harder to meet the goal.

<_effect> <text_param> cost drastically increased
<_objective> Have a total of <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Win the mission!
NewTranslation:
我的仪器探测到强大的灵压使宇宙概率及事态转向于不利于你的方向，这为31世纪的人类以及海豚大使提供了一线希望！你必须更加努力以达成目标。

<_effect><text_param>花费大幅度增加
<_objective>拥有总量为<amount><text_param>
<_reward>通关！

Text: Goodbye and Thanks for All the Fish!
NewTranslation: 感谢所有的鱼儿们，再见啦！！

Text: Thanks to your efforts, the future of humankind is secured, Presidente! Before leaving, the dolphins whistled their farewell message - "So long and thanks for all the fish!"
NewTranslation: 总统先生，通过您的努力，人类未来的安全得到了保证。离开之前，海豚奏鸣着他们告别的信息-“深深感谢所有的鱼儿们！”

Text:
Dolphins are very curious and love new things. We just need to introduce them to enough different specimens of our species to motivate them not to choose to get rid of us. I may even be able to channel some resources back to this timeline, should you succeed.

<_objective> Generate <amount> new <text_param> on the island
<_reward> $<reward>
NewTranslation:
海豚都是十分好奇并且热爱新事物的。我们只需要为他们提供我们人类的各种样本，就能打动他们，使他们不会做出消灭人类的选择。当然，如果你成功了，我将开启次元传送，供应些资源到你的时间线。

<_objective>在这个岛上产生<amount>新的<text_param>
<_reward>$<reward>

Text: So long and thanks for all the fish!

Well, that鈥檚 a problem, because after the building efforts of the 2714 Summer Olympics, the oceans and rivers turned into toxic sludge and all the fish died. Would you mind to provide me with enough fish samples that I may clone when I get back home?

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> $<reward>
NewTranslation:
好了，言归正传，因为2714年夏季奥运会的大规模建筑，海洋与湖泊早就惨不忍睹，所有鱼类都中毒身亡了。所以说，你不介意向我提供些鱼类样品吧，这样我回去之后就能克隆鱼群以改善海豚兄的伙食了。

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>$<reward>

Text: El Presidente and the Temple of Dolphins

When I arrived in your timeline, my instruments showed the same readings, only weaker. They are coming from some ancient ruins buried deep into the jungle. I tried to enter the temple, but no matter how much I yelled, the commanding AI didn't want to open the stone doors! I guess that I need the help of a more primitive member of my species to enter.
NewTranslation: 当我到达你们的时间线后，我的装置显示了同样的信息，只不过信号较弱。他们来自于埋藏在雨林深处的远古遗迹。我试图进入神殿，但无论我怎么叫芝麻开门，石门的控制AI都禁止我进入！我感觉有必要向更原始的人类求助。

Text: Communicated with the Ancient Dolphins from Nibiru
NewTranslation: 与来自尼比鲁的远古海豚沟通

Text:
He claims he was touched by the wisdom of the Ancient Dolphins from the planet Nibiru and he knows the secrets of the universe, and beyond! He doesn't want to share much details, but he seems unusually smart and wise, even for someone from your dynasty.

<_reward> One free random technology and your Dynasty Member levels up!
NewTranslation:
他说自己触碰到了来自尼比鲁星球的远古海豚的智慧，并且已经通晓宇宙的奥义，甚至宇宙之外的秘密！虽然他不愿意透露更多的细节，但是却显得异常机灵与聪明，就好像自己不是你家的人一样。抱歉，我并没有骂你蠢，总统大人--

<_reward>获得一项免费的科技，并且你的王朝成员升级

Text:
I don't know why you are gathering that many dolphins, but I say we shouldn't give in to their barmy threats! I'd suggest you to gather your troops before those narks come rantipoling around Tropico. Tally-ho!

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param> working in your military buildings
<_reward> $<reward>
<_timelimit> <time_limit>
NewTranslation:
我不知道您为什么要收集那么多海豚君，但我还是得说，我们不该向他们得寸进尺的威胁让步！我建议您在他们把海岛搞乱之前集结军队，撒，一库哟！

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>在你的军事建筑工作
<_reward>$<reward>
<_timelimit><time_limit>

Text:
My instruments indicate that a large force of ill-tempered humans is approaching the island. They are armed, dangerous and I fear they come here to take my dolphins! I expect that they will reach the shores of the island in about <time_limit> months, 1 day, 5 hours and 32 minutes, plus-minus 5 minutes. We have to be prepared!

<_effect> Grin Pears ecologist attack incoming in T-minus <time_limit> months. Defend your <attack_objective>!
NewTranslation:
我的探测设备显示，一大波怒气满满的人类正在接近。他们装备精良，强悍无比，恐怕是来夺取我们海豚的！我预计他们将在<time_limit>月，零一天，零五小时加32分钟，再加5分钟后在海岸登陆。我们必须好好准备！

<_effect>倒计时:“嬉笑之梨”生态骑士团将于<time_limit>月后造访你的岛。防御好你的<attack_objective>！

Text:
Unfortunately, we have to keep fighting those barbarians! I just want you to know that the brave men who defend the dolphins will be remembered as heroes for generations!

<_effect> Imminent Grin Pears ecologist attack incoming in T-minus <time_limit>. Defend your <attack_objective>!
NewTranslation:
不幸的是，我们不得不持续跟这群野蛮人作战！现在，我只想说，保卫海豚的人民英雄永垂不朽！

<_effect>倒计时:“嬉笑之梨”生态骑士团将在<time_limit>后发动进攻。防御好你的<attack_objective>！

Text:
The thing you have to do before I go on a chin wag with the right people is to build a Defensive HQ. It will show the rest of the world we have serious intentions about playing the war game.

<_objective> Build a <text_param>
<_reward> Having a building cooler than the Pentagon is its own reward!
NewTranslation:
在我向合适的人动下巴之前，你必须做一件事-建造一个防御总部。这将展现出世界全貌，方便我们下好战争棋。

<_objective>建造一个<text_param>
<_reward>拥有一座比五角大楼更酷的建筑本身就是一种回报！

Text:
You see, America got softer than the good old days. People don鈥檛 see it right for a real man to handle the country and they want to replace me. If you ask me, running around naked with flowers won鈥檛 do the trick when the commies come marching down the Pennsylvania Avenue. Scratch my back and I scratch yours 鈥?I鈥檒l send the runtiest rookies to lose a quick, clean conflict with you. You get your victory against a superpower and I鈥檒l show my folks that they have to toughen up!

<_objective> Survive the USA attack
<_reward> $<reward> from the US President
NewTranslation:
如你所见，比起往昔美好时光，美国比以前更软弱了。人们不再认为让个直男来统治国家有多好，个个想谋反篡位。显然，当共产党人沿着宾夕法尼亚大道进击的时候，我是无法安心的在花团锦簇下裸奔的。这样吧，让我们互利共赢-我会派一群渣菜鸟突击队来干净利落的败在你手中。这样你赢得了打败超级大国的面子，我也能告诉自己的人民他们毕竟图样图森破！

<_objective>在美军的攻击下存活下来
<_reward>$<reward>来自美国总统

Text: US Senators want your head on a stick!
NewTranslation: 美国参议院想把你的头插在长矛上！

Text:
I guess it's time for the good old game of who's the better man. Luckily for us, neither the US President, nor the general public wants this war. We just have to survive long enough to let the public opinion sway the scales in favor of a peace treaty. When it's all finally over, our Defensive HQ will stand as adamant symbol of our military prowess!

<_objective> Survive the <amount> US invasions that target your Palace!
<_effect> You're not at war. Only a minor 'border conflict'
<_reward> Win the mission!
NewTranslation:
我觉得是时候玩玩“谁更屌”的经典博弈了。幸运的是，我们、美国、还有广大人民群众都不想要战争。事已至此，我们只有尽量撑更长的时间，让公众舆论更多倾向于和平条约了。相信当一切尘埃落定，我们的防御总部将会成为武运长久的象征！

<_objective>在<amount>次目标为你的宫殿的美军入侵中存活下来！
<_effect>你不处于战争状态。只是个小小的边境冲突。
<_reward>通关！

Text: Presidente, oh how you kicked the Yankees' behinds! Boom-pow! Proving your nation's strategic worth - that's how it's done!
NewTranslation: 噢，总统先生，您踢到了美国佬的屁股！叮铃哐啷！为了证明这是我们民族的战略价值-就应该这么做！

Text:
The children of the flowers in corrupt America want to end this war as much as we do. They are singing rock music and are dancing naked in every American city to make their government stop this meaningless violence! We can help their cause by showing the rest of the world how the Tropicans suffer day and night under the iron boot of the imperialists!

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> <reward> high-school educated Environmentalists will arrive to fight imperialism!
NewTranslation:
腐朽的美国开出了灿烂的花朵，美利坚的孩子们也想结束这场不义之战。他们在每个城市奏着摇滚乐，跳着脱衣舞，要求政府立即停止这毫无意义的暴行！我们也要做些什么去支持他们的正义之举，告诉世界上的其他国家我们海岛人日日夜夜都在美帝的铁蹄下挣扎！

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward><reward>高中学历的环保主义者将抵达海岛与美帝斗争！

Text:
Pictures of Tropicans suffering under the iron foot of the US army would tell our story to the world. With some scenery and make-up we can let our inner suffering out.

<_objective> Build <amount> new <text_param>
<_reward> Reduced magnitude of invasions due to stronger peace demonstrations in the US
NewTranslation:
海岛遭受美帝军队蹂躏的景象将把我们的故事告诉全世界。一些巧妙的舞台布景和装饰能帮助我们传达这种受虐之苦。

<_objective>建造<amount>个新的<text_param>
<_reward>由于声势浩大的呼吁和平的示威，美帝的侵略攻势减弱了

Text:
Deep in my heart, I know that you love nature as much as I do and that these pictures are faked! I think it鈥檚 time to show your devotion to the green ideals to the rest of the world and stop these vile accusations once and for all.

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Reduced magnitude of invasions due to stronger peace demonstrations in the US
NewTranslation:
但您的伟大早已深入人心，我知道您爱护大自然之心苍天可鉴，那些照片肯定是被PS过的！我想是时候向世人展现你对绿之理想的执着与追求了，一劳永逸的让那些卑鄙的指控者闭嘴吧！

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>
<_reward>由于声势浩大的呼吁和平的示威，美帝的侵略攻势减弱了

Text:
They said that if we become the prime exporter of a resource of strategic value to them, they will be happy to send us troops to protect our borders.

<_objective> Export <amount> <text_param>

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>

Text: Created industry which is part of the USSR strategic interests
NewTranslation: 建立与苏联战略利益有关的工厂

The Soviets are happy to see that we are not giving up the fight. The Kremlin is ready to send us the blueprints for a brand new Aircraft Carrier and a subsidy for us to build one should we supply their Krasnoye Sormovo shipbuilding factory.

苏联人很高兴看到我们并未放弃战斗。克里姆林宫决定:如果我们能为他们的“克拉斯诺夫？索莫沃”船厂提供补给，他们将赠送我们最新的航空母舰设计图并且附带建造资金。

<_objective>出口<amount><text_param>

Text: Powered-up the indomitable Soviet shipbuilding industry!

As a result our relations with them worsened significantly. Finally, my liver would get a rest!

<_effect> You didn't use the Soviet funds to build an Aircraft Carrier and you relations with them are worsened by -<ussr_penalty>

作为“报酬”，我们与他们的关系大大的恶化了。看来我也可以稍微休息下了！

The Slow-Food chain sees the emergence of the Fast Food trend as a direct threat to their century-long history. But don't think about eventual problems, think about sure profits!

<_objective> Generate <amount> profits from <text_param>
<_reward> Win the mission!
NewTranslation:
慢食联盟将渐成主流的快餐视为百年大患。但从未想过其出现的根本原因，仅仅只想要保护自己的收益！

<_objective>从<text_param>中获得<amount>的收益
<_reward>获得胜利！

Text: You gave Tropicans - and the world - the best food one can afford. But not only this - you made the 'yo mama' jokes sound honorable! Congratulations, Presidente!
NewTranslation: 您给了海岛乃至全世界最好的食物，但不止这些-您使得“啊呜啊呜”的吞咽声听上去十分神圣！恭喜您，总统先生！

Text: Income from all Fast-food Joints increased

We will put scratch-cards in every menu sold at our <text_param>. If you鈥檙e lucky enough, you get to stay at any of our hotels for one week for free! Poor sods, the odds will be one-in-a- million. No! Let鈥檚 make it a billion, I like billions!

<_objective> Build <amount> new <text_param>
<_reward> <task_reward>
NewTranslation:
我们会把刮刮乐藏在<text_param>卖出的每一个菜单中。如果你足够幸运，你可以凭卡在旗下任一家酒店免费住上一星期！可怜大家伙，一定想不到吧，我们把中奖率设为百万分之一了。不！应该改为十亿，我喜欢十亿这个数字！

<_objective>新建<amount>个<text_param>
<_reward><task_reward>
刮刮乐现已加入快餐店豪华套餐！

Text:
Having waste-disposal facilities will deceive everybody that we care about Earth. Besides, piles of thrown-away burgers that never rot might make the customers concerned a little bit.

<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> <task_reward>

只要有废物处理设施就会使人们误认为我们很爱护地球。顺便一提，丢掉的汉堡从不腐烂可能会稍稍引起顾客的关注。

<_objective>拥有<amount><text_param>

NewTranslation: 所有快餐店的服务质量增加

Text:
Instead, I suggest that we start a whole new campaign that advertises the Joints as a place where you can have an all-day long entertainment. Of course, activities that involve physical movement or attention are wrong. Give the slobs free Wi-Fi and put the alcohol somewhere else 鈥?they鈥檒l never overstay their welcome!

<_objective> Issue the <text_param> edict
<_reward> <task_reward>

相反，我建议我们展开一个新的行动，将快餐店介绍成一个可以给你全天提供乐趣的地方。当然，不能提供健身或有益身体健康的活动。给那些笨蛋们免费WiFi然后到处放上酒精–这样他们就不会呆的太久了！

<_objective>颁布<text_param>法令
<_reward><task_reward>

Text: Competition profits will gradually increase until you complete this task
NewTranslation: Competition profits will gradually increase until you complete this task

Text: Service Quality in all Fast-food Joints increased
NewTranslation: 所有快餐店服务质量增加

Text:
A weaker individual would give in to the panic and start building clinics and start doing research about the problem, but that would reduce profits. My approach 鈥?attract less health risk-prone groups to the Fast-food Joints and turn defeat into victory.

<_effect> <penalty>
<_objective> Build <amount> new <text_param>
<_reward> <task_reward>
NewTranslation:
思想不坚定的同志可能会感到恐慌并建造医疗中心来进行相关研究，但这将会减少我们的利润。我的方法是–尽可能吸引那些低健康风险群体进入店中消费，这将使我们反败为胜。

<_effect><penalty>
<_objective>新建<amount>个<text_param>
<_reward><task_reward>

Text: Service Quality in all Fast-food Joints increased
NewTranslation: 所有快餐店服务质量增加

Text:
This time they are playing the 'obesity' card. Well, what can we do about the fact that fast food is so tasty? We can't tell our customers to stop getting stuffed with it. We can, however, force-feed a Tropican football team with fast food and use them as a face for our gourmet kitchen. Those who get fat and slow should be shot, of course.

<_effect> <penalty>
<_objective> Have <amount> <text_param> built
<_reward> <task_reward>
NewTranslation:
这一次他们打出了“肥胖卡”这张牌。而我们又有什么办法，快餐真真是极美味的。我们又不能告诉我们的客户“客官~，不可以！！！您已经吃不下了！”。我们能做的仅仅是赞助一支球队，给他们提供快餐，然后将他们作为我们的美食形象大使。当然，那些又胖又慢的家伙真该被枪毙。

<_effect><penalty>
<_objective>拥有<amount>个<text_param>
<_reward><task_reward>

Text: Service Quality in all Fast-food Joints increased
NewTranslation: 所有快餐店服务质量增加

Text:
Back on the subject, Mr. President - they are claiming that the quality of the food at our Fast Food Joints is the lowest grade possible. Luckily, the modern media gives us some pretty useful memes - in this case the organic one. It's our get-out-of-jail-free card, so let's use it!

<_effect> <penalty>
<_objective> Issue the <text_param> edict
<_reward> <task_reward>
NewTranslation:
言归正传，总统先生-他们声称我们快餐店用的食物质量极低。幸运的是，现代媒体给了我们一些非常有用的流行元素-现在看来就是有机食物。这是我们的“免罪卡”，现在就让我们来发动它吧！

<_effect>旅游评级降低<penalty>
<_objective>颁布<text_param>法令
<_reward><task_reward>

Text: We are all going to be stars, Presidente! Your plan of engaging our entire economy and all the citizens of Tropico into the super-production of a single movie is nothing short of revolutionary!
NewTranslation: 我们都要成为明星了，总统先生！您动员我们全部的经济能力和全部海岛人民参与到这部电影的超级制作中，哇噻，这计划和我们伟大的革命事业一样，酷！

Text: That's not in the script, Presidente? Those soldiers storming the island are firing real bullets! And there are tanks now! We've cut the tanks when we run out of money five months ago, how did those get here?
NewTranslation: 总统先生，这和剧本不太一样？那些笨大兵席卷了整个海岛……小心！他们居然射的是真子弹……靠！他们还有真坦克！我们五个月前不是因为缺钱把这些坦克报废了吗？这些家伙怎么开出来的？

Text:
I think someone is staging a real invasion against Tropico, Presidente. It's probably all those Hollywood moviemakers, desperate to stop us before we ruin them with "T-Day".  Anyway, this battle is for real and if our defenses fail, we are done for!

I am keeping the cameras rolling. If we survive this, we are releasing one hell of a movie!

<_objective> Survive the T-Day invasion
<_reward> Win the scenario
NewTranslation:
总统先生，我认为有人正在有计划地对海岛进行真正的侵略。那些所有在好莱坞混吃等死的制片人很可能就是元凶，他们害怕我们用“T日”击败他们，让他们从制片人变成扫厕所的，所以才竭尽全力对付我们。不管怎么说，眼前的战斗是真的，如果我们防御失败了，我们就完蛋了！

放心，总统先生，我不会关了摄像机的。如果我们赢了，我们就把它剪辑成一部让他们去见鬼的电影！

<_objective> 成功抵御T日的入侵
<_reward> 剧情任务胜利

Text: I Love the Smell of Celluloid in the Morning
NewTranslation: 嗯……我喜欢一大清早就闻到一股赛璐珞的味道~~

Text: It smells like... victory, Presidente! The Palace is safe and now nobody can say a thing when we claim that our "T-Day" is based on a true story.  The movie is going to be a hit, I just know it.
NewTranslation: 这味道闻起来就像……胜利！是的，总统先生，胜利！我们的宫殿安全了，而且当我们说我们的电影“T日”是根据真实事件改编的时候，没有人能说个不字。这电影肯定会轰动的，我就知道。

Text: It turns out we cannot just start shooting a movie willy-nilly, Presidente. We have to create a realistic set first. Since our "T-Day" is a war movie, we will need lots of fortifications.
NewTranslation: 事实证明，电影不能说拍就拍，总统先生。我们得先期布景，场景真才是真。我们的电影“T日”是一部战争电影，我们需要更多的工事。

Text: Our screenwriters are on strike, Presidente. Normally I would suggest we strike them back, but the movie is a no-go without them.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们的编剧罢工了。平时的话，我会建议我们“处理”掉他们，但是现在我们的电影不能没有他们。

Text: This is a crisis, Presidente! The International Politdiversity Bureau requires that we cast a token female character. It turns out every movie absolutely must have one, because of gender equality issues.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，这是一个突发情况！国际多元化政治局要求我们的演员名单中必须有一个女性角色。而且每一部电影都必须有一个，因为……你知道，性别平等。

Text: Out lead actor is underperforming, Presidente. His scenes just lack the impact and flair that we need to take those shiny academy awards home.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们的主角表现平平。如果我们想把亮闪闪的奥斯卡小金人带回家，他的演技还缺乏激情和天赋。

Text: A burlesque show will cheer him up (Build a Cabaret)
Nothing like a feast of classical music (Build an Opera)
Let him gamble his boredom away (Build a Casino)
NewTranslation: 让他把烦恼和筹码一起去赌掉吧。(修建一个赌场)

Text: We'll take care of the prima donna later
NewTranslation: 我们等会在照顾这个“女”主角

Text: Out lead actor is underperforming, Presidente. His scenes just lack the impact and flair that we need to take those shiny academy awards home.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们的主角表现平平。如果我们想把亮闪闪的奥斯卡小金人带回家，他的演技还缺乏激情和天赋。

Text: He decided to give up his movie career and dedicate his life to womanizing.
NewTranslation: 他决定放弃他的电影生涯，花花公子是个不错的活儿。

Text: He decided to give up his movie career and dedicate his life to gambling.
NewTranslation: 他决定放弃他的电影生涯，赌徒是个不错的活儿。

Text: He decided to give up his movie career and dedicate his life to yodeling.
NewTranslation: 他决定放弃他的电影生涯，唱二人转是个不错的活儿。

Text: The lead actor just handed his resignation, Presidente. Looks like our plan to cheer him up worked a little too well.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们的主角刚刚递交了辞呈。看起来我们对他太好了点儿，对吧？

Text: <StarProblem> Looks like building a <objectiveBuildingName> was not such a good idea. To save the movie we will need a new lead actor and we really have no time to look for one right now.
NewTranslation: <StarProblem> 看起来，修建一个 <objectiveBuildingName> 并不是一个特别好的主意。我们急需一个新的主演来确保电影开拍，但是没时间找人了！

Text: All those movie people ever do is complain, Presidente. They are worse than Tropicans in that regard.
NewTranslation: 所有那些搞电影的，只会一天到晚的抱怨这抱怨那。总统先生，那些家伙简直比我们的岛民还能抱怨。

Text: Brilliant, Presidente! The lighthouse is the perfect solution for illuminating the movie set. If the cameraman complains again, I am firing him on the spot.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，您太聪明了！原来只要我们有一座灯塔，就可以完美解决拍电影的灯光问题。如果那些摄影师再敢抱怨，我就炒了他鱿鱼！

Text: Corn price increases - the world is stockpiling on popcorn for your great movie
NewTranslation: 玉米价格上涨-全世界为您的精彩电影囤积爆米花

Text: Corn price increases - the world is stockpiling on popcorn for your great movie
NewTranslation: 玉米价格上涨-全世界为您的精彩电影囤积爆米花

Text: Corn price increases - the world is stockpiling on popcorn for your great movie
NewTranslation: 玉米价格上涨-全世界为您的精彩电影囤积爆米花

Text: Corn price increases - the world is stockpiling on popcorn for your great movie
NewTranslation: 玉米价格上涨-全世界为您的精彩电影囤积爆米花

Text: Are you sure about this supervillain idea, Presidente? I always imagined us as the good guys, fighting on the same team as my personal hero Katman!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，你确定这个注意没问题吗？我……我一直以为我们是好人，是并肩战斗的伙伴，就像我的个人偶像 - 扁蝠侠一样。

Text: Hooray for our very own mega-laser! It doesn't quite work yet, but I won't tell anyone if you don't, Presidente. Now comes the hardest part - choosing your supervillain title.
NewTranslation: 巨型激光万岁！呜啦！它貌似不怎么正常工作啊……嘿嘿，如果总统先生您能保密，那我也能。现在是最艰难的时刻了 - 你觉得哪一个超级坏蛋比较合适呢？

Text: Almost done, Presidente! Only one more field to fill up in the supervillain registration form and I am issuing the press release.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，就快完成了！就差填写一张超级大坏蛋注册登记表，然后我再读一篇新闻发布稿就行了。

Text: (I swear, Presidente, I wrote "Macho", with an "M". How and why did we end with "Nacho", I have no idea.
NewTranslation: 我发誓，我发誓，总统先生，我明明写的是“巨汉”，明明是“汉”。这……这TMD怎么就成了“屌”了？我也不知道，真的，我真的不知道！

Text: It turns out our resident law expert didn't do his homework - the name you picked is copyrighted both by a prominent Tropican nationalist and a major game development company.
NewTranslation: 看起来我们的民事法律专家是个没有好好学习的砖家 - 您挑出来的这个名字，同时被一个激进热带民族主义者和一个大型游戏开发商注册了版权保护。
医学博士 - 总统先生

Text: The global league of supervillains is proud to accept a new Doctor among their ranks. They asked me if you are a medical doctor and I may have mislead them with my answer that Presidente excels at everything.
NewTranslation: 大坏蛋联盟十分荣幸地接纳了一位博士成为他们的新成员。他们问我您是否是一位医学博士，我说总统先生无所不能，当然，这只是在误导他们。

Text: Comrade Presidente, I am so proud that you chose a communist name for your alter ego! Your commitment to the proletariat and our endless fight for control over the means of production is admirable.
NewTranslation: 总统同志，您改变自我，选择了一个共产主义者的名字，这真让我们为之骄傲！您为无产阶级的无私奉献，和为了绝对控制生产资料而进行的无尽斗争，简直让人敬佩得五体投地。

Text: Presidente, the Militarists are proud of to have a supervillain officer of high military rank on the island. Now, more than ever, they are ready to fight off the enemies of Tropico in the name of your grand vision for the future.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，军国主义者自豪地团结在您的身边，接受超级大坏蛋的指挥。现在、未来，他们将高呼着您伟大的名字，与敌人战斗到底，坚定不移！

Text: Presidente, the Nationalists are proud of to have a supervillain as Presidente. While the foreigners name you a villain, all trueborn Tropican patriots recognize you as the hero you are.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，所有的民族主义者团结在您的身边，遵从超级大坏蛋的领导。即使那些国外的二货成您为“卑鄙小人”，所有土生土长的海岛人都视您为英雄。

Text: A music band was inspired by your supervillain persona, Presidente. They are going to name their next album after you!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，一支疯狂的摇滚乐队受您超级大坏蛋身份的启发，灵感爆棚。他们决定用您的名字为他们下一张专辑命名。

Text: Those foreigners are in love with you, Presidente. Or perhaps they just fear our giant laser! In any case, we've receive some extra foreign aid this year.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，那些外国人爱上您了。呃……也有可能他们只是害怕了我们的巨型激光！管他呢，反正我们今年收到了更多的国外援助。

Text: Those foreigners are afraid of you, Presidente. Or perhaps they fear our giant laser! In any case, we've receive some extra foreign aid this year.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，那些外国人害怕您了。呃……也有可能他们只是害怕了我们的巨型激光！管他呢，反正我们今年收到了更多的国外援助。

Text: What's the most important thing for an aspiring supervillain, Presidente? The trademark costume, of course.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，超级大坏蛋的终极追求是什么？当然是印着特别标志的紧身衣啦~~

Text: I am happy to report that our megalaser is finally operational, Presidente! Time to test it out.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我很荣幸地告诉您，我们的巨型激光终于可军用化了！测试时间到！

Text: We've received a mysterious letter, Presidente. It was attached to an anvil and flew down from the stratosphere. I am so excited - I think we have a superhero nemesis now!
NewTranslation: 我们收到了一封神秘信件，总统先生。它被绑在一个铁砧上从平流层飞下来。我太兴奋了 - 我想，我们终于有一个超级英雄来做对手了！

Text: Captain Anvil is burning your city! Take that, evildoer!
NewTranslation: 铁砧队长正在你的城市里撒泼！看招，妖孽！

Text: Clone-boy is collapsing your buildings! Take that, evildoer!
NewTranslation: 克隆男孩正在摧毁您的建筑！看招，妖孽！

Text: What good is a supervillain without his army of devoted drones ready to live and die for him, Presidente. No, I don't mean me, there are other Tropicans more qualified for this job description.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，超级大坏蛋怎么能没有一群随他出生入死、随时准备战斗的无人机战队呢？不，我没有说我，我说的是有一些海岛人更加胜任这份工作。

Text: Taking on the world should be a piece of cake for an evil genius like you, Presidente. Heck, I've read so many comics, that even I can do it.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，像您这么有天赋的超级大坏蛋，征服世界只是小菜一碟。真见鬼，我喜剧看多了，我都能征服世界了！

Text: Transform the world ocean into guacamole
NewTranslation: 把海洋变成鳄梨色拉酱

Text: Invent a giant nuclear bowling ball
NewTranslation: 制作一个巨大的核保龄球

Text: Unleash an army of impolite robots
NewTranslation: 派出一支冷酷的机器人部队

Text: Brilliant, Presidente. Turning the world ocean to Guacamole will paralyze all naval transportation and with our giant laser we will be safe from any kind of air attack.
NewTranslation: 明智之举，总统先生！把整个海洋的水都变成鳄梨，就可以瘫痪所有海洋运输。而且借助巨型激光的保护，所有对我们的空中打击都将是蚊子嗡嗡叫。

Text: Brilliant, Presidente! When it comes to taking over the world, nothing beats tornado-attracting sharks, especially if we figure a way to fire them as missiles!
NewTranslation: 明智之举，总统先生！要说到征服世界，没有什么比旋风鲨鱼更厉害了，如果我们找到方法，可以像发射导弹一样发射旋风鲨鱼，那就更棒了！

Text: Brilliant, Presidente! Every crook may create killer robots but only a villain with an impeccable sense of style will unleash an army of impolite robots!
NewTranslation: 明智之举，总统先生！每一个坏蛋都可以变成一个杀戮机器人，但只有一个坏到无可挑剔的超级大坏蛋才能把这支杀戮机器人军队握在手中！

Text: Hooray, we received another letter from our nemesis, Presidente! I kinda hoped it will be from Katman this time, but that Captain Anvil guy should not be underestimated either! *gasp* he even mentions me this time!
NewTranslation: 呜啦啦，总统先生，我们又收到对手的来信了！我希望这一次是扁蝠侠写的，当然，铁砧队长也不容小觑！*偷瞥*他这次居然提到我了！

Text: Mr. President, a new blow to Penultimo's head has resulted in a relapse of his split personality. This time he's locked himself in the Palace basement, calling it his "kat-cave".
NewTranslation: 总统先生，贝奴迪莫头部受伤后，他的人格分裂症又复发了。这次他把自己关在宫殿的地下室里，并称那是“扁蝠侠洞穴”。

Text:
Once again Penultimo believes he is Katman - a crime-fighting superhero. To cure him you'll need to first get him out of the Palace basement. Fortunately I have a searchlight with a silhouette of a misspelled cat on it. We just need to power it and we'll grab Penultimo's attention.

<_objective> Generate <amount> MW Electricity
<_reward> Help Penultimo get better and <ImmigrantReward> immigrants will be attracted by the bright lights
NewTranslation:
贝奴迪莫又一次相信他就是扁蝠侠-一个打击犯罪的超级英雄。为了治疗他受伤的心灵，您得先把他从地下室弄出来。幸运的是我们有一个拼着猫剪影的探照灯。我们需要电来让它亮起来，吸引贝奴迪莫的注意力。

<_objective>生产<amount>MW电力
<_reward>帮助贝奴迪莫，得到<ImmigrantReward>由闪耀灯光吸引的移民

Text: (singing) Here I come to save the day! Tropico needs us once again my trusty sidekick, Yarn-boy!
NewTranslation: (唱歌中)让我来拯救这一天！海岛再次需要我忠实的伙伴，菜鸟！

Text:
I've just heard that an evil group, nay, a league of villains calling itself R.E.B.E.L.S. is threatening our fair city. These terrorists want to blow up our buildings and kill our soldiers. We can't let that happen, Yarn-boy! We have to find and defeat the leader of R.E.B.E.L.S.
<_objective> Defeat a Rebel Leader by banishing or eliminating them
<_hint> Use Police Stations to discover special citizens such as Rebels and Rebel Leaders
<_reward> Increased standing with the Nationalists and the Militarists
NewTranslation:
我刚刚听说一个邪教组织，不，一个自称是R.E.B.E.L.S.的组织正在威胁我们的城市。这些恐怖分子想要炸毁我们的建筑和杀害我们的士兵。我们要阻止这一切，菜鸟！我们必须找到并消除R.E.B.E.L.S.首领。

<_objective>通过驱逐或者杀死来打败叛军领袖
<_hint>利用警察局来发现特殊公民，例如叛军和叛军首领
<_reward>增加军事主义者和民族主义者的支持

Text: Helped Katman dispose of a Rebel Leader
NewTranslation: 帮助扁蝠侠消灭叛军首领

Text: Helped Katman dispose of a Rebel Leader
NewTranslation: 帮助扁蝠侠消灭叛军首领

Text: My Kat sense is tingling, Yarn-boy! I believe we have not seen the last of R.E.B.E.L.S. Come, we must get ready for our next showdown with them.
NewTranslation: 我的扁蝠意志有些不安，菜鸟！我相信肯定还有R.E.B.E.L.S.的残党，我们需要着手准备，下一次终结他们。

Text:
We will harness the might of volcanoes to power up my kat-lazor. Unable to resist the mesmerizing allure of our giant lazor pointer, our enemies will surely be lured away from Tropico.
Get started on the kat-lazor, Yarn-boy. I will go tame the power of the volcanoes!
<_objective> Have a Giant Laser
<_reward> Free Geothermal Power Plant
NewTranslation:
我们可以利用火山来启动我们的扁蝠光波。没有人能抵抗我们巨大激光发射器的诱惑，我们的敌人很快会逃离海岛。
赶快开始扁蝠光波，菜鸟。我将会去驯服火山的力量！

<_objective>拥有一个巨型激光
<_reward>免费的地热发电站

Text: Holy baloney, Yarn-boy! R.E.B.E.L.S. have learned the secret location of our kat-cave.
NewTranslation: 真胡扯，菜鸟！R.E.B.E.L.S.找到了扁蝠洞穴的秘密地点。

Text:
A hero is always ready to defend the innocent against the forces of evil. With the help of our secret weapon we will surely defeat R.E.B.E.L.S. and ensure the safety of Tropico. Power up the kat-lazor, Yarn-boy and let them come.
<_effect> Accepting this task will trigger a rebel invasion
<_objective> Survive the rebel invasion
<_reward> Cure Penultimo
NewTranslation:
英雄总是在时刻保卫了无辜的人免受邪恶的迫害。通过我们的秘密武器我们能够打败R.E.B.E.L.S和确保海岛的安全。爆炸吧，扁蝠光波，让暴风雨来得更猛烈些吧。

<_effect>接受这个任务将触发叛军入侵
<_objective>在叛军入侵中存活
<_reward>治愈好贝奴迪莫

Text: Fear not citizens of Tropico, I will watch over and protect our fair city! For I'm Katman!... Wait, where am... I and since when do we have a kat-lazor on the island?
NewTranslation: 别害怕，岛民们，我会守护好我们美丽的城市！因为我是扁蝠侠！……等等，说到哪了……我们的岛上怎么有了个扁蝠光波？

Text:
Presidente, there are some rebels swimming away from Tropico for some reason. Also, why do I smell something burning?
For some reason the UN called and offered us some money just to stop us from shooting with our new kat-lazor. What shall I do with the money?
NewTranslation:
总统先生，一些叛军基于某些原因游泳离开了海岛。还有，我是不是闻到了烧焦的味道？
由于某些因素，只要我们不再使用扁蝠光波，联合国就会给我们钱。我们怎么处理这些钱呢？

Text: Take the money for yourself ($$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 这是您的钱($$<SwissReward>瑞士银行账户)

Text: Deposit the money in the Treasury ($<MoneyReward> Treasury)
Those Yankees from the colonies are whining for attention, old boy. They are jealous that we've become close with the Russians.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，这些从殖民地里出来的美国佬儿，满嘴抱怨。他们只是在极度而已，因为我们最近和俄罗斯走的有点儿近。

Text:
The USA expressed concern that there's a growing Russian presence in Tropico. They want an Offshore Office of their own to "monitor the situation". The Russian President also made a comment from the peak of Mount Elbrus - "Russia is happy that American people do smart thing and follow our example."

<_timelimit> 12 months
<_objective> Build an Offshore Office and rent it out to the USA
<_reward> Improved relations with the USA and $$<SwissAccountReward>
NewTranslation:
对于在海岛上逐渐增强的俄罗斯存在，美国表示了密切地关注。他们希望能有一个海上办公楼来“密切关注局势变化”。身处厄尔布鲁士山顶峰的俄罗斯总统也发表了评论：“俄罗斯很高兴，因为美国人民终于做了件聪明事儿，当然，紧跟俄罗斯的步伐。”

<_timelimit>12个月
<_objective>修建一座海上办公楼，并把它出租给美国
<_reward>增进与美国的友谊，同时获得$$<SwissAccountReward>瑞士银行存款

Text: Russia has sent us another "request", old boy. This signed picture of the Russian President riding a shark arrived with the communique.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，俄罗斯向我们递交了另一份“外交诉求”。还有随赠小礼物：俄罗斯总统骑鲨鱼的签名照一张。

Text:
"Comrade Presidente, we good friends now. Russian people love water. Russian people love Tropico. You build some new houses on the water. We send some Russian people to Tropico. Deal?"

<_timelimit> 12 months
<_objective> Build <amount> new Floating Apartments
<_reward> Improved relations with Russia and 30 Russian immigrants
NewTranslation:
“总统同志，我们现在是好朋友。俄罗斯人民热爱水，俄罗斯人民热爱海岛。你在水上修建一些新房子，我们给你送点儿俄罗斯移民，怎么样？”

<_timelimit>12个月
<_objective>修建<amount>幢水上公寓
<_reward>增进与俄罗斯的友谊，30名俄罗斯移民抵岛

Text: For green lawns press 3 (<BuildingReward> free Houses)
NewTranslation: 绿色的草地请按3(<BuildingReward>免费住宅)

Text: For green promises press 3 (<BuildingReward> free Wind Farms)
NewTranslation: 绿色的承诺请按3(<BuildingReward>免费的风力发电站)

Text: You have reached the European Union reward center. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance purposes.
NewTranslation: 欢迎致电欧盟奖励中心。为了确保服务质量，您的电话可能将被录音。

Text: Please select the reward you wish to claim:

NewTranslation: 绿色补贴请按1($<MoneyReward>财政资金)
绿色的支持者请按2(<ImmigrationReward>移民)

Text: To request a personal green gift press 4 ($$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 要求个人礼物请按4($$<SwissReward>瑞士银行账户)

Text: Mr. President, we have been invited to speak at the European Environment Expo. It is a perfect opportunity to squeeze more Green money out of the EU.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们被邀请在欧洲环境博览会上演讲。这是一个完美的机会去榨取欧盟更多绿色的钱。

Text:
The European Environment Expo or E3, as it is dubbed, is notorious for its wild parties and beer babes. It is also the perfect time for some backstage politics. I've arranged a meeting with the van Hoof family to discuss further Green subsidies for Tropico.

Who shall we send to represent Tropico at E3?
NewTranslation:
欧洲环境博览会或者E3，不过大家都喜欢这么称呼它:臭名昭著的狂野派对和啤酒盛宴。E3是进行幕后政治的最佳时机，我已经安排了一个会议，与范霍夫家庭讨论进一步对海岛绿色补贴。

我们是否应该派遣代表到E3？

Text: We have a problem, old chap! The Russian President just announced that he has annexed Tropico.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，我们有麻烦了！俄罗斯总统刚刚宣布要吞并海岛。

Text:
He gave a press conference while flying to Tropico balancing on three Africans sparrows:

"Russian people held a referendum and unanimously chose to join Russia and Tropico into one country. Today."
NewTranslation:
在与三只非洲麻雀保持队形飞往海岛的途中，他举行了一个新闻发布会：

“今天，俄罗斯人民进行了一次民主和谐的投票表决，决定将海岛拥入伟大祖国的怀抱！”

Text: Announce that Tropico has annexed Russia
NewTranslation: 宣布海岛被俄罗斯吞并

Text: In the Swiss Bank (+$$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank after the necessary bribes)
NewTranslation: 把钱私吞(+$$<SwissReward>瑞士银行账户贿赂)

Text: You Won't Like Them When They Are Angry
Mr. President, your dynasty member's speech at E3 caused wide spread protests and traffic jams throughout Europe.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，您的家族成员在E3上的演讲导致了全欧洲的交通堵塞和大规模抗议。

Text:
It seems that your dynasty member gave the wrong speech at the European Environment Expo. He was supposed to talk about the environment instead he gave a speech about maximizing profits from green energy.

An outraged Green activist accused your dynasty member of being an oligarch and began to protest by blocking street traffic and organizing one-man flash mobs.
<_effect> -20 EU Relations
NewTranslation:
看上去您的家族成员在欧洲环境博览会上的发言讲错了内容，他应该谈如何保护环境而不是赚钱，赚钱的事儿明明得在私下再说的，这个蠢货。
一个气愤的绿色环保主义者指责您的家族成员的寡头行为，并且组织快闪暴走族阻断交通，进行抗议。

<_effect>-20欧盟关系
