Text: Presidente, I appreciate your efforts to help mother Earth, but you're doing it wrong. Any rational Environmentalist knows that nuclear power is the only sensible solution to the energy problem.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我十分欣赏您拯救地球之母的努力，但您选错了方向。所有理性的环保主义者都知道核能发电才是解决能源问题的明智之举。

Text:
Forget those expensive and bulky solar panels. Forget those ugly bird-killing wind turbines. You need millions of them to generate as much power as a single nuclear power plant. If we invest in one of those progressive Thorium reactors we will practically negate any harmful effects on the environment.

Believe me, Presidente. Someday Thorium will save the world.
<_objective> Have a Nuclear Power Plant with the "Thorium Reactor" upgrade
<_reward> Save the world. <ImmigrationReward> new citizens will come to the island and rejoice
NewTranslation:
忘了那些昂贵和笨重的太阳能电池板，忘了那些笨鸟造成风力涡轮机的损毁。数百万个它们才相当于一个核电站的发电量。如果我们投资这些先进的钍反应堆，这将会消除任何对环境的不利影响。
相信我，总统。钍会拯救世界。

<_objective>有一个升级“钍反应堆”的核电站
<_reward>拯救世界。<ImmigrationReward>出现新的移民，幸福度升高

Text: Mr. President, I see stupid people! They are everywhere. We have to eliminate this threat, Mr. President. I urge you to declare war on stupidity.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我看见了愚蠢的人民！他们到处都是。我们需要消除这个威胁，总统先生。我将会敦促您向愚蠢开战。

Text:
These are new times, Mr. President. We need people who have at least some basic education to work in our factories. And how about our army, are we going to let illiterate people have guns, when we can have an educated professional army?
While you fight on the frontlines of the war on stupidity, I will secure some funds to sure up our defenses.
<_objective> Build a new High School
<_reward> Free Fortress
NewTranslation:
这是新时代，总统先生。我们需要一些至少有过工厂工作经验的人。关于我们的军队，我们要让不识字的人持枪么，或者我们拥有受过教育的军队？
当您在和愚蠢战斗的前线时，我们需要一些资金来确保我们的防御工事。
<_objective>建造新的高中
<_reward>免费的要塞

Text: Mr. President, our war on stupidity is progressing well, but we can do more! We need dedicated people to lead the fight.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们征服愚昧的战争正在稳步前进，但我们可以做得更好！我们得找个专业人士来指挥这场征服愚昧的战斗。

Text:
The High School is slowly helping us overcome the illiterate hordes. We can try to speed things up by hiring a proper manager for our High Schools or even raising their budgets. 
<_hint> Students will graduate faster from schools with high effectiveness.
<_objective> Have a Manager in a High School
<_reward> <ImmigrantReward> new citizens will immigrate to Tropico
NewTranslation:
高中能够慢慢地清除文盲，雇佣一个合格的督导或提高预算可以有效地加快教育的速度。

<_hint>高中效率越高，在此毕业的学生越多
<_objective>高中有一个管理人员
<_reward><ImmigrantReward>新的公民将会移民海岛

Text: I detest stupid people... Yes even Penultimo! Mr. President, it is time to make our decisive offensive in the war on stupidity.
NewTranslation: 我讨厌愚蠢的人类……甚至是贝奴迪莫！总统先生，是时候让我们向愚蠢进攻了。

Text:
My initial plan was simply to round up all the remaining stupid people in the world and send them to another island. However, it turns out that no island is big enough for them in the entire Caribbean. We need a new plan, hopefully a smarter one.

How shall we fight stupidity, Mr. President?
NewTranslation:
我原先计划逮捕世界上所有剩下的蠢货，然后把他们流放到其他岛去。然而，事实证明世界上蠢货比加勒比地区的海岛还多。我们需要一个新的计划，比原来的那个更好。
我们该如何对愚蠢宣战呢，总统先生？
用疯狂的派对做武器(建立一所大学)
与天文学者并肩(建立一个天文台)
与官僚主义者配合(实施扫盲计划)

Text: Fight stupidity with wild parties - that's an ... interesting plan. I guess once the parties lure people to the College we can than hope that they will get smarter due to their proximity to books.
NewTranslation: 用疯狂的派对来让人变聪明是个愚蠢的行为-也是一个……呃……有趣的行为。我猜一旦人们都被大堆刺激的聚会吸引，去上大学，去亲近书，他们肯定会很聪明。

Text:
And since Tropican parties are awesome, I am absolutely certain that some educated foreigners will come and join us.
<_hint> Only high school graduates can enroll in the College
<_objective> Build a new College
<_reward> <ImmigrantReward> high school educated citizens will immigrate to Tropico
NewTranslation:
由于激情四溢的海岛派对，我十分确信一些受教育的外国人会加入我们。

<_hint>只有高中毕业生才能上大学。
<_objective>建造一所新的大学
<_reward><ImmigrantReward>高学历人才将会移民到海岛

Text: Fight stupidity with stargazing - how romantic. We will start our war on romance when we are done with the war on stupidity.
NewTranslation: 一边眺望星空一边愚蠢地战斗-这是多么浪漫的事儿啊！当我们结束了所有愚蠢的战争时，浪漫的战争将会拉开帷幕。

Text:
For now, let's leave encourage people to stare at the moon and count the stars. I don't know if that will make them smarter, but it is sure to speed up our research, so it must be a smart move.

I've found some additional funding for a Fortress to help us secure our Observatory from any stupid counter attacks.

<_objective> Build a new Observatory
<_reward> Free Fortress
NewTranslation:
现在，让我们鼓励人民去赏月、去数小星星。我不知道这样子是否会使他们更加聪明，但是我们可以肯定，这可以加快我们的科研速度，明智之举啊！
我发现了，修建要塞的钱有点多，我们完全可以用来保护我们的天文台，以防被傻逼们破坏了。

<_objective>建造新的天文台
<_reward>免费的要塞

Text: Perrrrfect! Either bureaucracy will destroy stupidity or stupidity - bureaucracy. Either way the Free Market, may It bless us with wisdom, will benefit.
NewTranslation: 非非非非常完美！就像自由市场经济要么暴富，要么破产；官僚主义和傻逼行为这二者也只能存活一个！唯一的不同就是，前者事关金钱经济，后者事关大家的智商。

Text:
We can increase the effectiveness of our High Schools and Colleges with one easy monthly payment.

<_objective> Issue the "Literacy Program" edict
<_reward> $$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank
NewTranslation:
每个月多付点钱，大学和高中的效率将会提高不少。

<_objective>实施“义务教育”法令
<_reward>瑞士银行账户增加$$<SwissReward>

Text: Mr. President, the war on stupidity is over. We have won, sort of. In totally unrelated news, I've been told that I am no longer allowed to call stupid people "stupid", or "morons", or "brainless", or... The new term is "intellectually-challenged".
NewTranslation: 总统先生，对抗愚昧的战争结束了，我们胜利了……某些方面。不过您知道一个新闻么？我说，有人告诉我，我们再也不能称呼那些愚蠢的人为“傻逼”、“二货”、“脑残”……什么的了。现在，得用新名词，“智商堪忧”。

Text:
I don't like this, Mr. President. We didn't fight a war on stupidity to have these "intellectually-challenged" people force their "intellectually-challenged" political correctness on us.
Anyway here's a reward for a job well done.
NewTranslation:
这不是我喜欢的，总统先生。我们和蠢货开战，不是为了让一群“智商堪忧”的家伙把他们“智商堪忧”的政治主导性强加给我们。
不过，都无所谓了，这是对您成绩斐然的奖励。

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 该法令由于外部原因无法停止

Text: The edict can not be stopped due to external reasons
NewTranslation: 该法令由于外部原因无法停止

Text: We can not work while the <edict> edict is active
NewTranslation: 由于<edict>法令的颁布，我们无法运作。

Text: Cannot construct on the location of a depleted deposit
NewTranslation: 无法在资源耗尽的位置建造

Text: Game synchronization error. This may happen because one of the players in the game has corrupt or modified game files or is using a third-party mod, cheat or trainer.
NewTranslation: 游戏同步错误。由于玩家中有人作弊、修改游戏文件或者使用了第三方mod。

Text: If the problem persists try reinstalling your game or using the "Check game files" option on Steam.
NewTranslation: 如果问题尚未解决，请尝试重新安装游戏，或者使用steam平台的“检查本地文件完整性”选项。

Text: Modified files detected. You may have installed a third-party mod, cheat or trainer. Please remove all modifications to play in multiplayer.
NewTranslation: 修改过的文件被发现。你可能安装并使用了第三方的mod或修改器，如果想联机游戏，请先移除所有修改文件。

Text: Your access to the Tropico 5 servers has been restricted by the game administrators.
NewTranslation: 你已经被游戏管理员限制访问海岛大亨5服务器。

Text: Use of exploits, cheats, trainers or third party modifications.
NewTranslation: 使用作弊、欺诈、修改器或第三方mod。

Text: Profanity, offensive language, abuse or harassment.
NewTranslation: 发表猥亵、侮辱、骚扰、攻击性言论。

Text: Using an unlicensed copy of the game.
Using a bot or an automation script.
NewTranslation: 使用自动挂机或自动脚本。

Text: Once a private property of the Crown, this island paradise was left untouched for generations.
NewTranslation: 成为王室的私有财产后，这个岛已经很久无人打理了。

Text: The numerous rainbows on this paradise island attract settlers with free spirit and an eye for beauty.
NewTranslation: 这美丽小岛上的无数彩虹吸引着众多向往自由和美景的移居者的眼球。

Text: High mountains arching over lush jungles maka Becouya a desired place for men with axes and tourists alike.
NewTranslation: 所有游客和伐木工都喜欢这里的高山和郁郁葱葱的大森林。

Text: Old colony records state the Crown designated this island as a penal colony for mad criminals.
NewTranslation: 这破地方以前是王室指定的罪犯流放地。

Text: This large island offers much possibilities for hard-working Tropicans and crafty presidentes.
NewTranslation: 这个大型岛屿为勤劳的岛民和诡计多端的总统提供了多重机遇。

Text: The violent volcanos on Oualichi lead to the extinction of the natives who named the island.
NewTranslation: 岛上狂暴的火山灭绝了给这个海岛命名的当地人。

Text: The harsh environment of Madre de Dios is compensated by the resilience of its population.
NewTranslation: 人多力量大，穷乡变迪拜。

Text: A captain mad with love named this island after his beloved Queen. She had him beheaded and thus the island was cursed.
NewTranslation: 船长用他心爱的女王名字命名了这里，但是自从女王砍了他后，这个岛也受诅咒了。

Context: MapName dlc9 - Fast Food - DLC_Manana DisplayName

Text: Legend has it this was the last refuge of the Mayans.
Context: MapName dlc9 - Fast Food - DLC_Manana Description
NewTranslation: 传说这里是玛雅人的最后避难所。

Context: MapName dlc10 - Giant Laser - DLC_IslaDelPescado DisplayName

Text: Many fishermen have returned disappointed from Isla del Pescado.
Context: MapName dlc10 - Giant Laser - DLC_IslaDelPescado Description
NewTranslation: 您以为鱼岛就真的有鱼？问问那些渔民吧。

Text: The Inquisition is not amused with you.

NewTranslation: 总督先生，我们得动作快点！

Text: It's as if these worshipers are awakening some evil form the bottom of the ocean. We have to stop them!
NewTranslation: 就像有崇拜者从海底唤醒恶魔一样，我们得阻止他们。

Text: I say, something is definitely amiss on Tropico old boy. Ritualistic murmurs, bonfire lit hills at night. It seems some cult has found it fit to use Tropico for it's nest of worship.
NewTranslation: 我说，老伙计，海岛上肯定有点什么不对劲。仪式的嘈杂，山上的半夜篝火，似乎有些邪教徒发现海岛挺适合作为他们的邪教老巢的。

Text: If we ever want to see Tropico as a respected independent nation, we have to take care of these pests beforehand. Concern yourself with governing this Island for now, I shall investigate the matter further. Oh and, all priests have fled the island while damning this the devil's den. Quite a predicament we have on our hands here old boy.
NewTranslation: 如果我们希望海岛成为一个自强独立的国家，那么我们就必须先除去这些害虫。出于对海岛政局的稳定考虑，我将就此事做进一步调查。哦，还有，由于邪教泛滥，所有岛上的牧师都跑路了，真悲剧啊……就到这儿吧，老伙计。

Text: Governor! We have reasons to believe this was no ordinary earthquake. Just before it happened the palace gates where flooded with scared farmers reporting on cultist activity outside of town.
NewTranslation: 总督大人！我们有理由相信这次地震不正常。宫殿大门外有一群被吓尿了的农民报告说，城市里到处都是邪教成员。

Text:
I need you to trust me now, more than ever Governor. I have made contact with an organization that deals with pests like these...but they, er, need some convincing to come. I so happen to know that exporting a lot of gold from Tropico would sway them to do so.

<_objective> Export 1000 Gold
<_reward> Inquisition becomes available
<_hint> Research The Shovel and explore the island for a gold mine
NewTranslation:
总督大人，你得比平时更加相信我！我和一个专门除“虫”的组织取得了联系……但他们，呃，要让他们来，得拿出点诚意。我知道要是我们大量出口黄金，他们会很开心。

<_objective>出口1000黄金
<_reward>可修建宗教审判庭
<_hint>研究科技铁铲，并探索岛屿，发现并建造金矿井

Text: Governor, great news! Thank you for trusting me, I'm sure you will not be disappointed. With great pride and joy I reveal to you my brilliant plan. I Invited...The Inquisition!
NewTranslation: 总督大人，好消息！谢谢您信任我，我相信您不会失望的。以无上的骄傲与快乐，我向您展示我才华横溢的计划……我邀请到了-宗教审判！

Text:
Of course I had to win over their attention with all that gold we exported, you how these Spaniards are, always gold gold, but that's water under the bridge now, for they have accepted the task to weed out this cult and..., why are you looking at me like that.

<_objective> Build an Inquisition
<_reward> Start identifying cultists
NewTranslation:
当然我们必须吸引他们的眼球，我们就出口黄金。您知道，这些二货西班牙人一天到晚的就是黄金黄金，一个印加还不够。但这些都是毛毛雨啦，因为他们已经接受了我们的委托，来收拾这些异教徒……大人，您怎么那样看我？

<_objective>修建一座宗教审判庭
<_reward>开始识别异教徒

Text: I knew you'd come through for me Governor. We shall clean up Tropico from these vile cultists in no time.  Of course, let's hope they don't summon Cthulhu or whatever before that...
NewTranslation: 我就知道您肯定会批准我的请求，总督大人。我们立刻清理这些卑鄙的异教徒，然后让他们滚出海岛。

Text:
This is how we will go about it. The Inquisition will provide you with the names, you rid us of them however you see fit, be it by assassination or just banishing the scum from Tropico. Happy hunting. 

<_objective> Get rid of all cultists 
<_reward> Cult-Free Tropico
NewTranslation:
我们就是在这么干的。宗教审判庭给您提供名单，您可以用您喜欢的方式处理他们，暗杀或流放，这两种方法都不错。是时候让这些虫子滚出去了，狩猎愉快！

<_objective>处理掉所有异教徒
<_reward>海岛重获自由

Text: The Inquisition have found out that the Mines on Tropico are used as worshiping grounds and demand we collapse them for good.
NewTranslation: 宗教审判庭宣称海岛的矿井就是异教徒的滋生地，他们要求我们拆除这些矿井。

Text:
They say they will use the chaos to rid the island of at least 10 key figures.

<_objective> Demolish all current Mines
<_reward> -10 cultists
NewTranslation:
他们说他们会利用这混乱，把至少10个关键人物踢出海岛。

<_objective>摧毁所有现存的矿井。
<_reward>减少10个邪教徒

Text: The Inquisition think literacy is overrated.
NewTranslation: 宗教审判庭认为我们的教育水平太高了。

Text: The Inquisition have a list of all other cult worshippers left on the island and plan to take heavy action against them...if we were to alocate the funds they need to cover their expenses.
NewTranslation: 宗教审判庭有一份岛上所有异教徒的名单，他们准备干票大的……呃，前提是我们提供他们需要的费用。

Text: The Inquisition have a list of all other cult worshipers left on the island and plan to take heavy action against them...if we were to allocate the funds they need to cover their expenses.
NewTranslation: 宗教审判庭有一份岛上所有异教徒的名单，他们准备干票大的……呃，前提是我们提供他们需要的费用。

Text: The Inquisition wishes to spread it's sphere of influence on the island, which they promise will help hasten the identification of the cultists.
NewTranslation: 宗教审判庭希望可以扩大信仰在海岛上的传播，他们保证加速异教徒的判别。

Text:
They would have us build a new outpost for them, but they do have some interior specifics they seem hellbent on...they do involve a lot of golden interior decorations.

<_objective> Build a Catholic Mission
<_reward> Increased Inquisition effectiveness
NewTranslation:
他们希望我们修建一个新的宗教据点，但他们对内部细节提出了一些要求。他们要求修建的宗教建筑物都遵循这些要求……比如大面积的金色内饰。

<_objective>修建一座布道所
<_reward>宗教审判庭效率增加

Text: The Inquisition is pleased with their new outpost,old chap.
NewTranslation: 宗教审判所对他们的新据点感到十分满意，老伙计。

Text: They have began using it to eavesdrop on the population as we speak!
NewTranslation: 他们已经开始用它从人们口中偷听我们的讲话了。

Text: Governor, I sail on sad tides.
NewTranslation: 总督大人，我的悲伤如潮水。

Text: The revolutionist movement is not pleased that you have allowed for a dark cult to infest Tropico. For now they will sit aside and observe but promise action if you prove incapable of handling the situation.
NewTranslation: 革命党对您在海岛允许一个黑暗邪教很不满。他们会在一旁观察，当您无法处理这个情况的时候，他们就会出手了。

Text: People call this the new world because it leaves behind the ways of the old world, and installing an functioning Inquisition isn't exactly viewed as progressive Governor. I hope you reconsider.
NewTranslation: 人们称这里是抛弃落后的新世界，修建一个宗教审判庭并不会被人们视为是一种进步，总督大人。我恳请您三思。
听听我的谏言吧，总督大人。

Text: Don't give more power to the Inquisition Governor, you will deeply regret it.
NewTranslation: 别再给宗教审判庭更多的权利了，总督大人，否则你会后悔的！

Text: Governor, it's still not too late, stop feeding the evil Inquisition.
NewTranslation: 总督大人，为时不晚，别在满足宗教审判庭的无理要求了！

Text: You still have time to avert the crash course you have set sail on.
NewTranslation: 您还有时间调整航线，躲避冰山。您不是泰坦尼克！

Text: This is my last warning Governor.
NewTranslation: 这是我的最后通牒，总督大人。

Text: You have created a monster with which you shall deal on your own.
NewTranslation: 您的所作所为造就了一个新的怪物，您得自己解决了。

Text: <player> has invited you to a saved game: <game_name>
NewTranslation: 玩家 <player> 邀请你加入一个存档游戏: <game_name>
玩家 <player> 拒绝加入游戏。
玩家<player> 联机游戏存档已丢失。

Text: (Design)The citizen is already scheduled for arrest

(Design)This citizen will be arrested. Family members and bystanders will be angered. Increases the civil unrest. If the target or the target's spouse is a faction leader this action influences his faction.
NewTranslation: (设计)该市民将被逮捕。其家庭成员和现场目击者会感到愤怒。增加动乱。如果该市民或其配偶是某一派系领导人，逮捕行动会影响该派系。

Text: All unsaved progress will be lost. Are you sure you want to abandon your current game?
NewTranslation: 所有未保存的游戏进度将丢失。确认退出当前的游戏吗？

Text: An error occurred while connecting to the App Store. Please try again later.
NewTranslation: 连接应用商店时发生错误，请稍作等待后再试。

Text: You are not allowed to authorize payments.
An error occurred while purchasing <title>. Please try again later.
NewTranslation: 购买 <title> 发生错误。请稍作等待后再试。

Text: An error occurred while restoring previous purchases. Please try again later.
NewTranslation: 恢复已购买项目时发生错误，请稍作等待后再试。

Text: All unsaved progress will be lost. Are you sure you want to abandon your current game?
NewTranslation: 所有未保存的游戏进度将丢失。确认退出当前的游戏吗？

Text: Tropico had a cultists problem once...some say inviting the Spanish Inquisition was probably a tad overdoing it.
NewTranslation: 海岛一度爆发了邪教危机……有人说西班牙的宗教审判比较给力，说不定能有点用。

Text: Tropico brought the world on the brink of destruction by the hands of a super intelligent AI before it was cool.
NewTranslation: 海岛曾经让世界为之颤抖，因为我们的超级智能差点就把整个世界拖入毁灭的深渊，不过最终它冷却下来了，嗯，CPU没烧。

Text: Rich reserves of dirty oil have been found under Tropico... but the super expensive schematics on how to take advantage of this super polluting goo is tied to the leg of toucan. Long Story. El Presidente needs that bird caught!
NewTranslation: 海岛的地下发现了丰富的污油储备……但是我们用不了，因为污油开发的图纸绑在一只巨嘴鸟的腿上，那玩意儿超贵！长话短说，总统先生需要抓鸟，立刻马上！

Text: Greetings, my good chum! You are not to reveal the information I am about to share to anyone. It seems that His Majesty can't locate his crown jewels.
NewTranslation: 贵安，我的朋友！无事不登三宝殿。貌似国王陛下王冠找不到了。

Text:
The crown jewels have to be replaced. His Majesty decrees that you begin producing pearls for the creation of a duplicate. Carry out His Majesty's wishes and you will be rewarded with an extension to your mandate as well as other benefits.

<_objective> Build a new <_PrimaryBuildingName>
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
找不到了就得换新的，所以我们需要做个新的。国王希望你能开始生产替代用的珍珠。如果你能不负国王陛下的希望，作为奖励，你的任期将被延长。

<_objective>修建一座新的<_PrimaryBuildingName>
<_reward>你的任期将被延长<reward>个月

Text: What ho, old chap! His Majesty needs a couple of your fine pearls for the crafting of his new crown jewels.
NewTranslation: 嗨，老兄！国王陛下需要两个你们这儿最好的珍珠去做新的王冠。

Text:
We are still keeping the disappearance of the original crown jewels a secret from the public. You'll have to deliver a larger number of pearls to make it look like a regular shipment from the colonies. His Majesty will choose the best two and we'll dispose of the rest of them.

<_objective> Export <amount> Pearls
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
旧王冠丢失的事件，我们没有对公众公开。所以你得像往常一样，从殖民地进贡一大批珍珠。国王陛下会挑出来最好的两颗珍珠，至于其他珍珠，那就不是你有权过问的了。

<_objective>出口<amount>珍珠
<_reward>你的任期将延长<reward>个月

Text: Governor, one of our divers has discovered a large pink pearl. Just minutes after his discovery he was eaten by a giant squid. Many now believe that the pearl is cursed.
NewTranslation: 总督大人，一个潜水员发现了一个超大的粉红色珍珠，不过他刚发现没一会儿就被一个巨型乌贼给吃了。许多人都认为粉红色珍珠是被诅咒的。

Text: The people of Tropico are concerned about the pink pearl. A man picked it up and a llama spat in his face, another was attacked by a flock of toucans. It's cursed, I tell you! We have to get rid of it.
NewTranslation: 海岛人民时刻关注这这个粉红色珍珠。一个男人刚捡起它，就被一头羊驼吐了一脸。另一个男人则被一大群巨嘴鸟进行了鸟粪饱和轰炸。我告诉您，这是诅咒！我们得赶快弄走它。

Text: Give it to a dynasty member ($$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank)
NewTranslation: 把它给一个家族成员(瑞士银行进账$$<SwissReward>)

Text: Gift it to a neighboring country (<CitizenReward> immigrants)
NewTranslation: 把它送给邻国(获得<CitizenReward>移民)

Text: Gift it to the King (increased revolutionary support)
NewTranslation: 把它送给国王(革命党支持增加)

Text: We have a problem, old chap. His Majesty has decided to personally design the new crown jewels. By the latest designs we'll need over 9000 tons of gold.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，我们又麻烦了。国王陛下亲自设计了一个新的王冠，根据这份设计，我们需要超过9000吨黄金。

Text:
Wait that can't be right! Aha, I got it! Someone used pounds instead of grams. Let me do a few quick calculations. Let's see, multiply by ten by the power of -3, than carry over the 2, divide by 0, then add <amount> and we get...

<_objective> Export <amount> Gold
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
等待总不是个事儿！啊哈，我知道了！肯定有人用了英镑做单位，而不是克。让我算一算。嗯……-3乘以10，结转2，除以0，然后加上<amount>，等于……

<_objective>出口<amount>黄金
<_reward>你的任期将被延长<reward>个月

Text: Governor, I just heard that the King has lost the Crown Jewels. We should inform the people about this and garner further support of the Revolution.
NewTranslation: 总督大人，我听说国王把王冠丢了。我们应该告诉人们，革命党人需要这样振奋人心的消息。

Text: This information was delivered by a very secret source, which shall remain nameless. I also know that the Crown is trying to replace the Crown Jewels with new ones in secret. We can use this information to turn more Royalists to our revolutionary ideas.
NewTranslation: 这个消息必须秘密传播，全程匿名。我知道他们正试图悄悄地用新王冠来掩盖这件事。我们不能坐等机会流失，我们要利用这个消息让更多的人加入革命的队伍。

Text: Start a rumor (increased revolutionary support; <CrownStandingReward1> Crown standing)
NewTranslation: 散布一个谣言(增加革命党支持，<CrownStandingReward1>王室支持)

Text: Blackmail the Crown ($$<SwissReward> Swiss Bank; <CrownStandingReward2> Crown standing)
NewTranslation: 勒索王室(瑞士银行获得$$<SwissReward>，<CrownStandingReward2>王室支持)

Text: Sell the information (<FreeBuildingsReward> Free Smuggler's Docks)
NewTranslation: 卖掉这个情报(获得<FreeBuildingsReward>个免费的走私码头)

Text: Keep quiet and carry on (<MandateReward> months mandate extension)
NewTranslation: 保持低调，不搅浑水(任期将被延长<MandateReward>个月)

Text: The Crown has a new job for you, old chap. To complete the new Crown Jewels, His Majesty, needs a very special centerpiece 鈥?a perfectly square pearl.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，王室有新任务给你了。国王陛下为了制作新王冠，需要一种特殊的珠宝-完美的方形珍珠。

Text:
I expressed my skepticism about the existence of such a pearl, but His Majesty has decreed that they indeed do exist, although they are very rare. Based on the Law of Large Numbers, His Majesty believes that we simply need a large amount of pearls to guarantee that we will find a perfectly square one.

<_objective> Export <amount> Pearls
<_reward> Your mandate will be extended by <reward> months
NewTranslation:
方形珍珠是否存在，我表示怀疑。但是国王陛下说那玩意儿肯定存在，只不过非常稀少而已。基于“林子大了什么鸟都有”原则，国王陛下相信只要我们有非常非常多的珍珠，肯定能挑出一个正方体的。

<_objective>出口<amount>珍珠
<_reward>你的任期将被延长<reward>个月

Text: Good news, old chap! His Majesty found the old Crown Jewels he lost. They were in the Queen's boudoir all this time.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，好消息！国王陛下总算找到了他的旧王冠了，他落在往后的床底下好几天了。

Text:
His Majesty is quite relieved to have his old Crown Jewels back. The gold and pearls that were to be used for the new Crown Jewels will instead be used to pay for a new wardrobe for the Queen. 
From now on you will receive fewer if any options to extend your mandate.

As a sign of gratitude for your help in these troubling times for His Majesty you have been granted a reward of your choice.
NewTranslation:
找到王冠后，国王陛下如释重负。原本用来做新王冠的黄金和珍珠，用来给王后买衣柜了。
从现在开始，能延长任期的任务选项将减少。

作为在困难时期对国王陛下伸出援助之手，国王陛下将授予你奖励，请挑选。
安全工作(人气将被延长<MandateReward>个月)
方形珍珠(瑞士银行进账$$<SwissReward>)
肆掠许可证(获得<FreeBuildingsAmount>个免费走私码头)
不自愿的志愿者(获得<CitizenReward>个新移民)

Text:
As per your orders, we aim to recreate the greatest battle in the history of Tropico - the T-Day invasion. It will be just like the real thing, only more epic and with bigger explosions. With you in charge, our movie "T-Day" will become a blockbuster for sure!

There are just a few kinks to iron out first.

<_objective> Complete special tasks and create Tropico's first movie "T-Day"
<_reward> Making movies is its own reward. Also, we get tons of cash and immortality in the hearts of the audience.
NewTranslation:
按照您的命令，我们准备重现海岛历史上最伟大的战斗-T日大作战。电影肯定效果逼真，场景宏大，爆炸更多。有了您的指导，我们的电影“T日”肯定会成为超级大片！

首先，我们有几个小问题需要解决一下。

<_objective>完成特殊任务，完成海岛第一部电影“T日”的拍摄
<_reward>拍电影本身就是奖励。当然，会附赠观众的心，和成吨的钱。

Text: We are all set, Presidente! Everything is in place for the big battle scene. Just say the word and our trained stuntmen will stage a massive fake attack against your palace.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们准备妥了！所有设备和人员都已到位，随时准备开拍战斗场景。只要您发话，立马会有一大群训练有素的人对宫殿发动进攻，当然，武器是假的。

Text: Our extras will return fire from the Fortresses and Guard Towers on the set. The battle should be as realistic as humanly possible, reinforcing the two main themes of our movie - "War is hell" and "Nobody gets to Presidente's palace alive".
NewTranslation: 我们的演员将在预定的要塞和炮楼开火。战斗场面力求真实，力显我们电影的两个主题-“战争地狱”和“总统府前无活人”。

Text: And while we are on top, we've got to stay there, right? Let me pitch you a new script, Presidente! It is about the exploits of a superhero named Katman and his trusty sidekick Yarn-boy.  And I know just the perfect dashing and likeable scoundrel to cast as the main lead...
NewTranslation: 逆水行舟，不进则退，对么？总统先生，我已经为您准备好了新的剧本！这是一个关于超级英雄扁蝠侠和他最信赖的小伙伴菜鸟男孩儿的故事。而且我觉得这完美的跑酷和可爱的小恶棍将赚足了眼球……

Text:
Movie sets are traditionally created from lightweight, rigid materials, but we aim for realism above all things. I suggest we use concrete instead.

<_objective> Build <amount> fortresses
<_reward> <reward> extras will immigrate to Tropico
<_hint> This will take some time. Don't forget to establish a strong economy to sustain the production costs
NewTranslation:
电影场景和设备都是用轻量型、刚性材料制作的，但是我们认为真实性重于一切。所以我建议我们用钢筋混凝土布景吧。

<_objective>修建<amount>座要塞
<_reward><reward>名新移民将移居海岛
<_hint>这得占用不少时间。别忘了，强壮的经济体系才是维持您国内正常运转的支柱。

Text:
The writers demand a bunch of things that I don't really understand, so I suggest we build them some Luxury Mansions instead.

<_objective> Build <amount> Mansions
<_reward> <reward> wannabe screenwriters will immigrate to Tropico
NewTranslation:
编剧总是要一些我也搞不懂的东西，干脆我们给他们造些豪宅算了。

<_objective>修建<amount>座豪宅
<_reward><reward>名编剧将移民海岛

Text: Please, sign this, Presidente. We need your approval to secure a few vantage points on the island, from which our camera crew will shoot our awesome movie.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，请签字。我们需要您允许我们的摄制组在几个有利地点安置摄像机，当然，您得确保安全。

Text:
Being an armchair expert in shooting, I know the perfect structure for their purposes.

<_objective> Build <amount> Guard Towers
<_reward> <reward> trained shooters will immigrate to Tropico
NewTranslation:
作为一个射击“砖”家，我知道他们心中完美的地点在哪儿。

<_objective>修建<amount>座炮楼
<_reward><reward>名膝盖未中箭(训练有素)的士兵将移民海岛

Text:
We finished casting ages ago! Only way we can plug-in an actress right now is to create a lifelike statue and hope no one notices. Wait... casting... Steel Mill... that could work! It's not as if she has any lines in the script. To the Steel Mill!

<_objective> Export 3000 Steel until you create the perfect gender equality statue
<_reward> <reward> fans of your newly forged actress will immigrate to Tropico
NewTranslation:
我们的演员名单已经确定了很久了！现在再加入一个女演员，唯一的办法就是先铸造一个栩栩如生的雕像，但是不能被别人发现。等等……演员表……铸造雕像……炼轧钢厂……行得通！剧本里好象没有任何关于她的剧情线，向炼轧钢厂前进！

<_objective>出口3000钢铁，直到您修建完美的性别平等雕塑
<_reward><reward>名您新铸造“演员”的粉丝将移民海岛

Text: Speaking frankly, he looks a little bit bored. Perhaps a new luxury entertainment building will motivate him?
NewTranslation: 老实说，他看起来有点无聊了。也许一个新的豪华娱乐场所会让他更精神点。

Text:
To tell you the truth, he looks a little bit bored on our island. Per your orders, we will construct a new <objectiveBuildingName> to properly motivate him!

<_objective> Build a new <objectiveBuildingName>
<_reward> <reward> fans of our lead will immigrate to Tropico
NewTranslation:
说实话，她看起来在我们岛上有点无聊了。如果您下令，我们将修建<objectiveBuildingName>来让他精神点！

<_objective>修建一座新的<objectiveBuildingName>
<_reward><reward>名我们主演的粉丝将移民海岛
别害怕，贝奴迪莫，一个家族成员将站立在聚光灯下。

Text:
The cameraman talked my ear off about how the lighting on our set is terrible and then started rambling about diffuse and directional lights for hours on. He even suggests we hire some people just to point lights at stuff and position semi-transparent white sheets in front of them! Not going to happen, I told him.

In any case, if you have any idea how to illuminate the island, we should go for it!
NewTranslation:
啊！！！摄影师在我耳边抱怨了几个小时，说我们的灯光设备到底有多糟糕，然后又开始唠叨几个小时的漫射灯光和定向灯光。他甚至建议我们雇佣一些人专门控制灯光照射拍摄场景，再雇佣一些像傻帽一样举着半透明的白色床单！我义正词严地告诉他，没门！

不过，如果您有什么主意可以照亮海岛，无论什么想法，我们都会全力以赴！

Text: <_reward> 20 qualified immigrants hoping to get a job in the movies will arrive on the next ship
NewTranslation: <_reward>20名希望从业于电影事业的高素质移民将在下一船次抵达海岛

Text: The world is stocking on popcorn
NewTranslation: 全世界都在囤积爆米花

Text: The world is stocking on popcorn
NewTranslation: 全世界都在囤积爆米花

Text: The world is stocking on popcorn
NewTranslation: 全世界都在囤积爆米花

Text: The world is stocking on popcorn
NewTranslation: 全世界都在囤积爆米花

Text: Shooting a movie is not so different than being El Presidente.
NewTranslation: 拍电影和当总统没什么区别

Text: Keep the unruly crew in line and keep pretending you know what you're doing no matter what happens.
NewTranslation: 让那些不听话的家伙守规矩，而且不管发生了什么，都装作成竹在胸。

Text: As this new seventh art gains momentum across the world, it is my plan to turn Tropico into the Hollywood of the Caribbean.
NewTranslation: 趁着着新兴的第七艺术进军全世界时，我计划把海岛打造成加勒比的好莱坞。

Text:
Oh... oh, I get it now! You aim to become the dark antihero, free of the shackles of idealism, saving the world by threatening to destroy it. What an awesome plan! Only thing we need is a giant laser and we are good to go.

<_objective> Construct a Giant Laser
<_hint> Don't forget to take care of the basic needs of your citizens and setup your economy first
NewTranslation:
哦……哦，我现在明白了！你准备变成黑暗的反派英雄，解放理想主义的枷锁，保护世界免遭毁灭的威胁。这主意太酷了！我们仅仅需要一个巨型激光，然后我们就这么干！

<_objective>修建一座巨型激光
<_hint>人民和经济才是您国家进步的保障，别忘了照顾他们。

Text:
I noticed most of those supervillain types are doctor or have some other megalomaniacal title before their names. Nobody takes you seriously when you are simply Penultimo. Doctor Penultimo, though, sounds like a guy who can take on the world.

What shall be your supervillain title, Presidente?
NewTranslation:
我发现大多数超级大坏蛋的名字前面都有个称号，诸如博士、侠什么的，反正怎么狂妄自大怎么来。如果名字仅仅是“贝奴迪莫”，没人会注意个屌丝的。如果是“贝奴迪莫博士”，啊哈，是个带出门、走向世界的名字了。

总统先生，您想给您起个什么称号呢？

Text:
It turns out you are not allowed to be named simply "The <_Title>". It sounds cool and all but someone already trademarked it. Fortunately, Tropico's leading intellectual property law specialist, that is - me, has found a loophole. We just add another word after this one and no one can foil our supervillain plans with legal hassle.

So, what will be your ULTIMATE supervillain name, Presidente?
NewTranslation:
虽然您想自称“<_Title>”，但是不行。这个听起来酷酷的名字已经有人使用了，还注册了版权。幸运的是，海岛上最博学的法律专家，我，发现了一个漏洞。我们只需要在这个词的后面再加一个词，组成一个词组，那么就没有人在法律层面给我们的计划制造麻烦。

那么，总统先生，您想好了您，超级大坏蛋的终极名称了么？

Text:
Still, the press release has already been issued, so we are stuck with what we have. Your final and most badass supervillain name is <_Title> <_Name>.

Even with an "N", it does sound kind of awesome, doesn't it?
NewTranslation:
不过，新闻发言稿已经准备好了，我们会坚持不变的。您最终的超级大坏蛋的名字是<_Title><_Name>。

就算发音有点后鼻音，但也听起来很酷，不是吗？

Text:
We don't want to get into that mess, Presidente. If there is a thing that even supervillains fear, it is legal trouble. The vile lawyers eat even supervillains for breakfast.

Don't worry, I averted the crisis by changing your supervillain name to the first thing that came to my mind: <_Title> <_Name>. Close enough, yet legally bulletproof.
NewTranslation:
总统先生，我们不想惹麻烦。如果这世界上能有什么东西能让超级大坏蛋害怕的，那肯定是法律纠纷。那些卑鄙的律师会把超级大坏蛋当作是早餐中的蛋饼或油条。

别着急，为了避免这麻烦，我首先想到的是，改名：<_Title><_Name>。差不多了，此名够防弹，法律靠边站。

Text:
In any case, they are sponsoring a new hospital in Tropico in honor of all the medical professionals among their ranks.

<_effect> One free Hospital
NewTranslation:
看起来，为了向所有医学教授致敬，他们给海岛捐赠了一所新的医院。

<_effect> 一座免费医院

Text:
Others may call <_Title> <_Name> a villain, but you will forever remain a hero for the Communist faction.

<_effect> Increased standing with the Communists.
NewTranslation:
对于其他人来说，<_Title><_Name>是个混蛋，但是对于共产阵营来说，您永远都是英雄。

<_effect>共产党员的支持率上升

Text:
<_Title> <_Name> is a name that will inspire every Tropican soldier to give his life for our motherland.

<_effect> Increased standing with the Militarists. 6 free Guard Towers.
NewTranslation:
<_Title><_Name>的名字鼓舞着每一个为我们伟大祖国奉献生命的士兵。

<_effect>军国主义者支持率上升，6座免费炮楼。

Text:
Viva <_Title> <_Name>! Viva Tropico!

<_effect> Increased standing with the Nationalists
NewTranslation:
<_Title><_Name>万岁！海岛万岁！

<_effect>民族主义者支持率上升

Text:
Those bearded guys are awesome, Presidente! We are going to pocket tons of money from royalties!

Viva <_Title> <_Name>! Viva Tropico!

<_effect> Free Night Club. Gain Swiss Bank account every year for the next five years.
NewTranslation:
总统先生，那些大胡子太棒了！版权费，这玩意儿可以让我们用吨来数钱！

<_Title><_Name>万岁！海岛万岁！

<_effect> 免费夜总会。接下来五年瑞士银行每年都有入账。

Text: Good news, Mr. President! I have secured a deal with an American entrepreneur who wants to sell a new brand of snacks named after you.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，好消息！我认识一个美国企业家，他准备用您的名字命名一款零食。

Text:
There will even be little <_Title> <_Name> action figures with detachable heads!

<_effect> Gain $$10000 Swiss Bank account
NewTranslation:
当然，零食内附赠小<_Title><_Name>人物玩偶，玩偶脑袋可拆卸！

<_effect>瑞士银行账户获得$$10000

Text:
The best way to do so would be to provoke a superpower into invading Tropico. I'm prepared to officially announce that <_Title> <_Name> will take over the world and enforce mandatory work on Saturdays for everyone. If that doesn't provoke someone to invade us, I don't know what will. Just say the word and I am sending the press release. And one last thing - you wouldn't really force me to work Saturdays, would you?

<_hint> An invasion will start when the task is accepted. Don't forget to test fire the laser! You will have to aim the laser on the path of the moving invaders to inflict maximum damage,
NewTranslation:
如果想煽动一个超级大国入侵海岛，最好的办法就是这么干。我准备了一份官方声明，<_Title><_Name>将统治世界，所有人每周必须做六休一。如果这都不能让那些家伙入侵海岛，我就真没辙了。只要您同意，我立马召开新闻发布会，发表官方声明。哦，对了，还有件事儿 - 您不会也强迫我每周做六休一吧，对吧？

<_hint> 接受任务，海岛将面临一次入侵。别忘了您还有巨型激光呢，那家伙可以开火，别闲置了！如果想造成最大伤害，记得激光要瞄准，注意行进提前量。

Text:
"Cease and desist, <_Title><_Name>! This will be your only and final warning. We will not rest until I put an end to your reign of evil. You give our regards to Saint Peter. Or whoever has his job, but in Hell.

Signed: Captain Anvil and his sidekick Clone-boy!"
NewTranslation:
“放下武器，立刻投降！<_Title><_Name>！这是最后警告。直到你的邪恶王朝覆灭，否则我们将不死不休。替我们向圣彼得问好，或者是向接替他工作的什么人问好……呃，忘词儿了……妈蛋的，反正滚进地狱去吧！

签名：铁砧队长和他的小伙伴克隆男孩！”

Text:
<_objective> Have <amount> minions (soldiers)
<_reward> You will be ready to execute your evil plan and TAKE ON THE WORLD!
NewTranslation:
<_objective>最少拥有<amount>(士兵)
<_reward> 您将开始您伟大的计划，统治世界！

Text:
Due to its limited range, our giant laser won't be sufficient to persuade the whole world to bow down before you. We will need an even more megalomaniacal evil plan!

What shall we do, <_Title> <_Name>?
NewTranslation:
由于射程问题，我们的巨型激光还没办法让全世界都在您的脚下臣服。我们需要一个更加宏大的邪恶计划！

我们怎么办，<_Title><_Name>？

Text:
There is only one minor hitch - we will need tons of avocado. And it doesn't grow on trees! Ok, maybe it does, but not in Tropico. I've taken the initiative to secure a long term exchange deal with Mexico, trading our Pineapple for their Guacamole!

<_objective> Have <amount> Hydroponic Farms (Pineapple)
<_reward> Try to take over the world!
NewTranslation:
有点小麻烦 - 我们需要成吨的鳄梨。树上不长鳄梨！好吧，也许鳄梨确实长在树上，但海岛的树上绝对不长！我们已经主动和墨西哥达成协议，我们用菠萝换他们的鳄梨！

<_objective> 拥有<amount>水培农场(菠萝)
<_reward>尝试统治世界！

Text:
There is only one minor hitch - we will need lots of sharks. Even if we catch all the sharks in our territorial water, they won't be enough. I've taken the initiative to secure a long term exchange deal with Mexico, trading our Fish for their sharks!

<_objective> Export <amount> Fish
<_reward> Try to take over the world!
NewTranslation:
有点小麻烦 - 我们需要很多鲨鱼。就算我们把我们领海内所有的鲨鱼都抓起来，但还是不够。我们已经主动和墨西哥达成协议，我们用鱼换他们的鲨鱼！

<_objective>出口<amount>鱼
<_reward>尝试统治世界！

Text: Brilliant, Presidente! A giant nuclear bowling ball is the perfect weapon to strike against our enemies. Get it? "Strike"?
NewTranslation: 总统先生，太棒了！一个巨大的核保龄球可以完美地打击我们的敌人，他们就是一堆球瓶。是吧？“打击”

Text:
I've taken the initiative to secure the construction of our Bowling Bowl of Doom in Mexico. They constructed Chichen Itza, they should be qualified to create a giant ball made of uranium.

<_objective> Export <amount> Uranium
<_reward> Try to take over the world!
NewTranslation:
我已经通告了墨西哥我们要制造毁灭保龄球。那些墨西哥草帽佬儿修剪过玛雅古城奇琴伊察，那么他们肯定可以用铀制造一个保龄球。

<_objective>出口<amount>铀
<_reward>尝试统治世界！

Text:
There is only one minor hitch - all Tropicans are very polite and we never ever say something that would not pass PEGI-16 rating. I've taken the initiative to secure a long deal with Mexico, importing their swearwords that we need for our impolite robots! The Mexicans said they will accept some Electronics in exchange.

<_objective> Export <amount> Electronics
<_reward> Try to take over the world!
NewTranslation:
有点小麻烦 - 所有的海岛人都太有礼貌了，他们从来不说例如F开头K结尾的限制级词汇。我主动联系了墨西哥人，从他们那里进口脏话，否则我们用什么来制造我们的脏话机器人？草帽佬儿说，如果他们只接受用电子产品来换，否则没门儿！

<_objective>出口<amount>电子产品
<_reward>尝试统治世界！

Text:
"Your reign of terror is over, <_Title> <_Name>! We are coming to personally wipe up the floor with you and your lackey Penultimo! Signed: Captain Anvil, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy, Clone-boy"

<_objective> Captain Anvil and Clone-Boy will attack the island when the timer expires. Survive the invasion!
<_reward> Try to take over the world!
NewTranslation:
“你的恐怖统治即将终结，<_Title><_Name>！我们将亲自来把你和你的狗腿子贝奴迪莫，像扫地板一样扫进加勒比海！签名：铁砧队长，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩，克隆男孩”

<_objective>倒计时结束时，铁砧队长和克隆男孩会进攻海岛。搞定他们！
<_reward>尝试统治世界！

Text: We are victorious Presidente! That Captain Anvil guy has fled the island, crying for his mama! We were as awesome as Katman this time!
NewTranslation: 我们胜利了，总统先生！铁砧队长已经逃跑了，哭着找妈妈！哈哈哈！这次我们像扁蝠侠一样，酷毙了！

Text:
Unfortunately, our evil plan was foiled by our Mexican partners. They decided to back up on our deal, preoccupied by a Mexican standoff with New Zealand and Luxembourg, the two countries who dare oppose our plans.

So, what are we going to do tomorrow night, <_Title> <_Name>?
NewTranslation:
不幸的是，我们的邪恶计划被我们的墨西哥草帽佬儿挫败了。他们决定以我们的交易撑腰，和两个敢于我们做对的国家，新西兰和卢森堡，搞一场墨西哥僵局。(PS：墨西哥僵局，三人枪枪互指，其中一人放下枪或开枪，大家都玩完)

那，我们明晚打算怎么办，<_Title><_Name>？

Text: The same thing we do every night, Penultimo - try to take over the world!
NewTranslation: 贝奴迪莫，当然一如既往 - 统治世界！

Text: My childhood dream was to become a supervillain.
NewTranslation: 我童年的梦想是变成一个超级大坏蛋。

Text: You've heard me right - not a hero, but a villain.
NewTranslation: 你已经听到我说的了 - 英雄靠边站，老子是坏蛋！

Text: The so-called bad guys are the only ones who actively work to change the reality.
NewTranslation: 所谓坏蛋，就是那些唯一行动起来改变现实的人。

Text: They are the ones with the vision, the ones who methodically plan and prepare for years, inspiring legions of loyal minions to do their bidding.
NewTranslation: 他们看，他们听，他们思考筹划，他们潜伏隐忍，许多年，激励他们忠实的手下跟随着他们。

Text: The villains ultimately bring progress for everyone, willing or not.
NewTranslation: 坏蛋，才能给所有人带来进步，不管原意不愿意。

Text: I have great news! There are no more cultists remaining on Tropico, yes that's right. We are cult free once more. But I also have some not so good news.
NewTranslation: 我有一个大大的好消息！海岛已经没有邪教徒了，真的！我们的宗教信仰再一次获得自由。但是，也不全是好消息……

Text:
The Inquisition seem to like it here, and, er, don't really plan on moving away. What? Give them an eviction notice, ME? But, but...

<_objective> Demolish the Inquisition
<_reward> Inquisition-free Tropico
NewTranslation:
宗教审判庭看起来很喜欢这儿，然后，呃，呃……他们开起来不太想离开了。什么？给他们驱逐通知？什么？我去？但，但是……

<_objective>拆除宗教审判庭
<_reward> Inquisition-free Tropico

Text: Prepare for hell old boy. These blokes look bloody serious about not leaving.
NewTranslation: 准备好，老伙计，那些家伙开起来是真的不想离开了。

Text:
Word is we have around 3 month until we can expect Spanish soldiers to reach Tropico.

<_objective> Survive Retaliation
<_reward> Win Scenario
NewTranslation:
但是据说只要我们撑过3个月，西班牙士兵就会到海岛。

<_objective>撑过接踵而至的报复
<_reward>剧情任务胜利
挺过宗教审判庭的报复

Text:
If we were to help them keep it to a minimum, they say they shall go out of their way to rid us of the next 20 names on the list the very next day.

<_objective> Have 0 libraries
<_reward> - 20 cultists
NewTranslation:
如果我们可以满足他们的需求，他们将在第二天用他们的方式帮我们处理掉名单上的20个名字。

<_objective>拥有0座图书馆
<_reward>-20异教徒

Text: The Inquisition have the names the people are way too many to get rid of easily.
NewTranslation: 宗教审判庭有名单，这样处理那些人会很简单

Text: Bring them beneath 40 cultists and after one year they will bring up this question again.
NewTranslation: 给他们40个异教徒，一年后他们会再次提出这个问题的。
那群讨厌的环保主义流氓

Text: I'm so angry right now Presidente! Angry and confused!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我现在超级愤怒！愤怒得脑子都乱了！

Text: Those Eco terrorists have destroyed 2 of our new Wind Farms! Why!? I though they'd be happy that we have, or at least it seems that we have embraced clean energy. We must not let that detour our efforts to catch that toucan. I will conduct an investigation immediately. We must continue building those fans.
NewTranslation: 那些可恶的生态恐怖分子刚刚摧毁了我们两个风力发电站！为什么？我以为我们拥有，或至少看起来我们已经接受了清洁能源，他们会开心的。我们必须阻止他们，否则这帮混蛋会耽误了我们抓巨嘴鸟的大业。我已经报警，他们等着被查水表吧。我们必须继续修建那些大型风扇。

Text: That pesky green mafia is really getting on my nerves Presidente. I'm shaking with anger!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，那些生态混蛋居然组成了黑手党来烦人，真是气死人不偿命。

Text: Two more Wind Farms have be sabotaged.
NewTranslation: 又有两个风力发电站被破坏。

Text: One side thinks we are doing good that we are going green with the Wind Farms, the other says we are endangering the bird population with this and should stop.
NewTranslation:
看起来那些生态恐怖组织闹内讧了。
一方认为由于风力发电站的加分，我们做得很好；另一方面说因为我们要抓鸟，所以不是好东西。

Text:
I suggest we use the situation to our advantage and widen the gap even further by going extra green. Do that and I'll pull my strings and secure you a nice deal with the Wind Farm tech people.

<_objective> Build 15 Big Gardens
<_reward> 1 Free Wind Farm
NewTranslation:
我建议我们可以好好利用这次内讧，并且可以通过继续推广绿色环保来扩大他们的分歧。放手去干吧，我会利用我的笔下功夫，保证和风力发电站技术人员的交易稳赚不赔。

<_objective> 修建15个大花园
<_reward> 1座免费风力发电站

Text: This is going perfect. Let's show them how "appreciative"of nature we actually are and make them look like the ones going against it.
NewTranslation: 越来越完美了。让大家看看，我们才是真真的“感恩”自然，他们才是破坏分子。

Text:
Let's build more gardens! 

<_objective> Build 20 Gardens
<_reward> 1 Free Wind Farm
NewTranslation:
花园越多越好！

<_objective> 修建20座花园
<_reward> 1座免费风力发电站

Text: A Park to Put Parks to Shame
Weren't there some complaints a couple of years back, that Tropico has no national park. What happened with that?
NewTranslation: 这几年从外面回国的人貌似抱怨不断，说什么海岛没有国家公园。那是怎么回事儿？

Text:
I haven't really walked the poor neighborhoods much, but if we still don't have one, maybe it would be a good moment to change that. Throw in two more Wind Farms as an expected reward, the manufacturer loves green.

<_objective> Have a National Park
<_reward> 2 free Wind Farms
NewTranslation:
邻国那穷得兔子不拉屎的地方我没有去过，但是如果我们没有那玩意儿，也许是该考虑修建一座。弄过来两座风力发电站作为预期回报，谁让制造商喜欢绿色呢？

<_objective> 拥有一座国家公园
<_reward> 2座免费的风力发电站

Text: We may have to put the oil industry on hold for a while. This will be a move that will convince even the most skeptical of the those hippies that we have changed for the "better".
NewTranslation: 我们得把什么石油工业暂时放一边儿了。这么做的话，就算是那些最喜欢鸡蛋里挑骨头的嬉皮士也会认为我们确实“从良”了。

Text:
Oh I can't wait to see the look on their faces when we get a hold of those blueprints.

<_objective> Have no Oil Buildings
<_reward> Split the terrorist organization
NewTranslation:
哦，我都等不及了，等我们搞定了那些蓝图，他们被打脸的表情一定很赞。

<_objective> 没有一座石油建筑
<_reward> 分裂恐怖组织

Text: Presidente! It worked! There is a conflict within the environmentalist terror groups.
NewTranslation: 总统先生！有用了！环保恐怖分子内讧了！

Text: Most of them have decided not to sabotage our efforts to go green, but the other side, well, they are really mad at us and will probably attempt something stupid very soon. We have to prepare for an attack within the next couple of months.
NewTranslation: 他们大多数人决定不再破坏我们绿色环保的进程，但是其他人，嗯，他们确实是比较生气的，所以他们可能会干出些傻事儿。他们在未来的几个月内可能会动手，我们得做好准备。

Text: Well, the UN have accused us of building a some secret super weapon as I understand it, they just don't believe in us going green.
NewTranslation: 好吧，联合国指责我们拥有大规模杀伤性武器。嗯……我表示理解，毕竟不是每个人都会相信我们的绿色进程。

Text: Not that we are, but I feel embarrassed to explain we are actually trying to catch a damned chicken! Nonetheless, the price for making a wind farm has gone up considerably because of various embargoes on the raw materials. You know the drill.
NewTranslation: 不管怎么说，要我去跟他们解释我们这么做就是为了抓到一只鸡，这理由实在太丢脸了！尽管如此，风力发电站的造价会如预期的上涨，因为部分稀缺材料会因为随之而来的禁运而涨价。你知道他们总是这么干。

Text: OK, we have to fake it for the UN now, I guess no one believes us wanting to be a more responsible nation...probably not the best disguise anyhow.
NewTranslation: 好的，我们现在已经骗过了联合国。我相信没人会相信我们希望变成一个负责任大国……总之这不是什么好的伪装。

Text:
Let's build 3 waste treatment plants as a start while I think of something better.

<_objective> Build 3 waste plants
<_reward> Prove good intentions to the UN
NewTranslation:
首先，让我们建造3座废物处理厂，我想这会让情况有所改观。

<_objective>修建3座废物处理厂
<_reward>向联合国证明我们良好的发展方向

Text: Ok, the plants made everyone even more suspicious.
NewTranslation: 好吧，那些处理厂反而让更多人越发怀疑了。

Text:
Maybe if we invite world leaders here, so they see first hand how environmentally responsible we are trying our best to fake we have become, the trick might work? What's your assessment of the situation?

<_objective> Issue the International Summit Edict 
<_reward> Probably boost confidence from UN
NewTranslation:
或许，如果我们邀请世界领导人来海岛参观，让他们亲眼看一看我们为了成为对生态环境负责任大国而做出的努力(当然那都是骗他们的)，或许会管用。您看这个建议如何？

<_objective>颁布国际峰会法令 
<_reward>可能会加速获得联合国的信任

Text: The summit was an unprecedented success. However, we may have convinced the leaders in some lies...but the public still largely don't trust Tropico.
NewTranslation: 峰会获得了空前的成功。只不过，我们也许瞒过了各国领导人……但是大多数公众仍然不信任海岛。

Text:
I talked with some of the nation leaders here, and the idea to host the Olympics pop-ed up. Now, I would have to pull some of my strings for that to happen but I think it will help our agenda a lot.

<_objective> Host the Olympics
<_reward> This time make the UN stop doubting Tropico for sure
NewTranslation:
我和各国领导人交流过，有个方法不错，举办奥运会。现在我不得不再次用我的笔下功夫让海岛成功申办奥运会，我相信这会让我们的议程尽早实现。

<_objective>举办奥运会
<_reward>这一次联合国会停止质疑海岛

Text: Ok, we are back on track. We may have lost some time but now there is nothing stopping us from catching that dammed bird.
NewTranslation: 好的，一切都恢复正常了。也许我们确实多花了些时间，不过现在没什么能阻止我们去抓那只见鬼了的鸟了。

Text: Bloody good show. I don't know what you've been doing these last couple of months but it seems you've earned yourself a Nobel Prize for leading the world nations in Environmental Responsibility.
NewTranslation: 您表现得很好。虽然我不知道你过去几个月到底做了什么，但似乎因为你领导国家变成了一个对生态环境负责任的大国，而为你赢得了一个诺贝尔奖

Text: Tropico has officially been dubbed the Paradise City and now investors and electronics manufacturers are all fighting to play a part in even further developing this paradise. Apart from receiving some hard cash, building Wind-farms has become ridiculously cheap,
NewTranslation: 海岛现在被正式成为天堂岛了。投资者和电子制造商现在为了在海岛分得一杯羹而抢破了头。我们除了收到了一些资金以外，现在风力发电站打折大优惠了。唉……便宜老多了。

Text: America is fed up with your shenanigans. We have proof that you are building all these fancy parks and windmills or what you'ma call it...YOU are doing this with the sole reason to make the US look bad!
NewTranslation: 美国人已经受够了你的阴谋诡计了。我们有证据证明，你在海岛大肆修建精美的花园，高大的风车(那玩意儿叫什么？)……你这么干的唯一原因就是，让美国看起来更丑！

Text: Well, this isn't going to happen. Prepare for WAR!
NewTranslation: 那么，我们不会坐视不顾的。准备开战吧！

Text: I warned you not to mock the bloody yanks old boy. What? I didn't? Well, doesn't really matter now, does it. They've made it painfully clear they plan to put us in our place. I see they will need around 3 months to muster up and attack.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，我告诉过你，别调戏那个美国佬儿。什么？我没说过么？好吧，现在这不重要了。看起来他们这次真的准备下狠手了，大概三个月后就准备进攻我们了。

Text: We have to act fast if you wish to remain in power and see that dirty oil make Tropico in the richest nation on Earth! Good luck! Oh and, Tropico is entirely surrounded by the US Navy so no Wind Farm parts can get through.
NewTranslation: 我们必须动作快了，如果你还想延续你的政权，看到肮脏的石油把海盗变成世界最富有的国家。祝你好运！哦，对了，海盗已经被美国海军团团围住，连只苍蝇都进不来。所以风力发电站，想都别想了。
在美国入侵中幸存下来

Text: We do not need this hippy-dippy stuff.
NewTranslation: 我们不需要乌七八糟的玩意儿

Text: Presidente, knowing how much you anticipated the blueprints to the dirty oil processing plant, yes, the ones you payed a lot of money for, I wished to, er, surprise you and attached them to a messenger toucan so they arrived ahead of me.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，您知道那张您渴望很久的肮脏的石油加工厂蓝图么，对，就是您花了很多钱才搞到的那个，我想，呃，我原本想给您一个惊喜，所以就把蓝图绑在一只巨嘴鸟信使身上了，因为它比我飞得快多了……

Text:
However, as I was later told, we had no messenger toucans on the ship and so the top secret, super expensive blueprints are attached to a regular toucan now, probably somewhere on Tropico or the near by islands. I had some scientists do the math, and they said that if we cover the island in wind-farms, statistically speaking we would surely..er, "catch" the toucan. On the plus side, this will ease the tensions with the environmentalists as well.

<_objective> Have 40 Wind-Farms
<_reward> Catch the toucan! (win scenario)
NewTranslation:
不过，后来有人告诉我，船上根本没有什么巨嘴鸟信使，顶级机密、超级昂贵的蓝图被绑在了一只普通的巨嘴鸟身上。我错了，我绑错鸟了。也许现在这支鸟就在海岛周边的哪一个小岛上。我咨询过科学家，从统计学来说，如果我们在海岛上修建风力发电站，肯定……我说，有可能那巨大的电风扇可以把巨嘴鸟吸过来。而且，绿色能源可以讨环保主义者的欢心。

<_objective>拥有40座风力发电站
<_reward>抓住巨嘴鸟！(剧情胜利)

Text: One thing is for sure. We sure have a lot of spare electricity on our hands and lot's of buyers at that.
NewTranslation: 有一件事是肯定的。我们现在手里有很多多余的发电余量，很多买家都盯着呢。

Text: Exporting electricity has never been my thing, not that much profit in it, but who am I to turn down free money, right? All excessive electricity will be sold every year - the more electricity we have in excess, the more the profit.
NewTranslation: 电力输出从来都和我无关。就算那没与多少利润，但是有钱不赚是傻逼，对不？每年发电量太多了就要卖出去，发电量越多，利润就越高。

Text: The abundance of energy has made the business climate quite favorable here in Tropico.
NewTranslation: 丰富的能源让海岛上的商业气氛越来越好了。

Text:
We should make use of this by all means. Starting businesses should practically be effortless to an extent.

<_reward> 3 Office Buildings for free
NewTranslation:
我们应该物尽其用。我们应该不遗余力地开展我们的商业业务。

<_reward>3座免费的办公楼

Text: I don't like wind turbines. I really don't. I can't fully swallow the idea that an economy is driven by the wind. I always thought that capitalism is too far evolved to depend on the elements as much,
NewTranslation: 我并不认同风力涡轮机，真的。我一想到我们的经济是由风在推动的，就如鲠在喉。我认为资本市场发展的太快，以至于对资源的依赖性越来越大。

Text:
This being said, all this spare electricity is really helping the local business boom. We should not waste this chance. 

<_reward> 3 Office Buildings for free
NewTranslation:
这就是说，所有多余的发电量可以帮助当地经济蓬勃发展。我们不应该浪费这个机会。

<_reward>3座免费的办公楼

Text:
Ill-minded revolutionaries are working to overthrow His Majesty and his royal cousins all over Europe. Following the royal tradition, His Majesty will hide behind meat shields that you should provide him until the turmoil ends.

<_effect> All Creameries will stop production.
<_objective> Export <amount> Meat
<_reward> Creameries resume production and <reward> months mandate
<_hint> Cattle Ranches allow you to produce both Meat and Milk
NewTranslation:
脑子缺弦了的革命者们计划推翻国王陛下和他遍布欧洲大陆的兄弟姐妹的统治。按照皇室的光荣传统，国王陛下将躲藏在一大堆肉盾的后面。为了国王陛下的安全，你得提供足够多的“肉”盾，直到那帮人脑子里的弦再长出来为止。

< _effect >所有乳制品厂将停止生产。
<_objective> 出口 <amount> 肉
< _reward >乳制品厂恢复生产，<reward>月任期
< _hint >牛畜牧场可以同时提供肉和奶

Text:
Some Swiss nobles took a bit off Tropican cheese. They were struck with dismay from the lack of holes in it and threatened His Majesty with war. To avert the crisis His Majesty has ordered you to import Swiss cheese as a sample for further production.

<_effect> All Creameries will stop producing.
<_objective> Import <amount> Cheese
<_reward> Creameries resume production and <reward> months mandate
<_hint> New Cheese import routes will be added
NewTranslation:
一些瑞士贵族稍走了一些海岛奶酪，但是因为海岛的奶酪上孔太少了，他们觉得这是对他们严重的侮辱和蔑视，这些贵族扬言要对我们的国王陛下发动战争。为了避免这次危机，国王陛下命令你进口瑞士奶酪作为以后生产时的样品。

<_effect> 所有乳制品厂将停止生产。
<_objective> 进口 <amount> 奶酪e
<_reward> 乳制品厂将恢复生产，延长 <reward> 个月任期
<_hint> 新的奶酪进口贸易路线增加。

Text: His Majesty is satisfied with your progress. He has extended your mandate as a show of gratitude and he has restored your rights to produce more cheese!
NewTranslation: 国王陛下对你的表现深感满意。他已经延长了你的任期，并且恢复了你生产奶酪的权利。

Text: Nobody suspects a bunch of intoxicated airheads shambling around military facilities, but that's just a ruse. They work better than any spy network. They just told me that the Americans will attack us in <_attack_months> months. This time we can expect <_infantry_count> <_invasion_infantry> and <_tank_count> <_invasion_tanks> brigades coming our way.
NewTranslation: 没有人会怀疑一群在军事设施周围晃来晃去的醉醺醺的空脑壳，但实际上那只是个小把戏。他们干的比任何间谍网络还要好。他们刚刚告诉我，美国佬儿要在 <_attack_months> 个月内进攻我们，这次我们将面对 <_infantry_count> <_invasion_infantry> 和 <_tank_count> <_invasion_tanks> 。

Text: Harvests Fish deposits around the island. Produces Fish.
NewTranslation: 在海岛周围的渔业资源点进行捕捞。出产鱼。

Text: Increases the Beauty in the area
NewTranslation: 增加区域内的美景指数

Text: Must be constructed over a fishing deposit. Produces Pearls. Reduces pollution by a small amount.
NewTranslation: 必须在渔业资源点上修建。出产珍珠。轻微减轻污染。

Text: The Effectiveness of Jewelry Workshops on the island is increased by 10 based on effectiveness (max 30).
NewTranslation: 岛内的珠宝工坊效率提高10(最高30)。
供应本地市场(牡蛎养殖场升级)

Text: Illegally imports extra goods from started import trade routes. Provides additional trade routes with the Smugglers.
NewTranslation: 开始非法进口额外的商品。走私者将为您提供额外的贸易路线。

Text: Produces Power. Consumers with higher budget are serviced preferentially. Must be placed on shore. Affects negatively other Tidal Power Plants.
NewTranslation: 发电。优先供给高预算的消费者。必须在海岸边修建。会对其他潮汐发电站产生不良影响。

Text: Are you sure you want to cancel the construction?

Don't forget, while the dumb heroes are allowed to make poor fashion choices, a true villain is stylish above all else.

<_objective> Customize your supervillain costume
NewTranslation:
别忘了，当愚蠢的英雄还在面对千篇一律的紧身衣发愁的时候，真正的超级大坏蛋已经走到了时尚的前列。

<_objective>自定义你的超级大坏蛋的着装

Text: I can't say I'm outright comfortable with these blokes old boy. Unnerving as they are just by being on this island,  now they want to redecorate the place with their fancy churches.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，和这些平头老百姓在一起，我不能说我过的很舒服。但令人不安的是，就在这个岛上，这帮家伙想把他们喜欢的礼拜堂重新装修一番。

Text:
They say the extra catholic buildings will improve the service they do best, but they demand we do away with our old missions. I will abstain from giving an opinion on this old friend, I'm sure you know best.

<_objective> Demolish all Catholic Missions
<_reward> The Inquisition will let you build their own and thus improve effectiveness.
NewTranslation:
他们说宗教建筑越多，他们的服务就尽可能的越好。但是他们掀起我们的布道所都太老旧了。对于这位老朋友，我保留观点了。您来拿主意吧。

<_objective>拆除所有的布道所
<_reward>你将被只允许修建宗教审判庭，并且其效率提高
宗教审判庭太贪得无厌了。

Text: Will have to fake good will.
What ho, old chap! Did you know that the EU is giving huge grants for Green energy? Now, technically Tropico is not in Europe, but I'm sure they'll overlook this tiny detail.
NewTranslation: 嗨，老兄！您知道现在欧盟在给绿色能源巨大的补贴？现在，严格来说海岛不在欧洲，但我相信他们不在在意这些细节。

Text:
I've begun filling out the EU paperwork for the Green energy grant. It shouldn't take me more than a year to complete. In the meantime you should build some of those wind turbines to show them we mean business.

<_timelimit> 12 months
<_objective> Build a new Wind Farm before Lord Oaksworth completes the paperwork for the EU
<_reward> Moral superiority. Reward from the European Union.
NewTranslation:
我开始为欧盟进行文书工作来填充绿色能源。他们不相信我们能够在12个内月完成。同时，您应该建立一些风力涡轮机来表明我们是认真的。

<_timelimit>12个月
<_objective>在欧克沃斯总管为欧盟完成这项工作前，建造一个新的风力发电站
<_reward>道德优越感。来自欧盟的奖励。

Text: Mr. President, it seems that Green has completely taken over Europe. We have to join in and pretend that we are Green too.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，看上去绿色接管了整个欧洲，我们也得加入其中并假装我们也是绿色的一份子。

Text:
As you may have already noticed Yellow is the natural enemy of Green. And Red is even worse. Fortunately we have a way to fight Red and Yellow - the Waste Treatment Plant. Fighting pollution is normally an exercise in futility, but this time we will get money from EU, so I decided to support it.

<_objective> Have <amount> Waste Treatment Plants
<_reward> Moral superiority. Reward from the European Union.
NewTranslation:
您或许已经注意到黄色是绿色的天敌，而红色则更为糟糕。幸运的是，我们有办法与红色和黄色进行战斗-废物处理厂。对抗污染通常是徒劳无功之举，但这次欧盟给钱了，看在前的份儿上，我们也得有所行动。

<_objective>拥有<amount>废物处理厂
<_reward>道德优越感。来自欧盟的奖励。

Text: Mr. President, your dynasty member has returned from E3 mostly unharmed.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，您的家族成员安然无恙的从E3上回来了。

Text:
The European Environment Expo was a great success for Tropico. Your dynasty member was able to get some more money from the EU for our "Green" initiatives. 

Where shall we deposit the money?
NewTranslation:
欧洲环境博览会对于海岛来说是十分成功的。您的家族成员能够从欧盟的“绿”色倡议中得到一些钱。
我们怎么处理这些钱？

Text: Good news, old boy! The Russians have a generous proposition for us. They want to export some of their oligarchs to our shores and in exchange they probably won't invade us.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，好消息！俄罗斯像我们递交了一份慷慨的提议。他们将向我们出口一些寡头物资，如果我们同意，他们将不会入侵我们。

Text:
The Russian President had this to say on the matter while on his annual bear riding vacation.
"Russian businessmen need to move to better climate for "health reasons". Build new offshore office and we'll be good pals. Don't build new offshore office and we won't be good pals. Your choice..."

<_timelimit> 12
 months
<_objective> Build an Offshore Office and rent it out to Russia
<_reward> Increased relations with Russia and <CitizenReward> Russian immigrants
NewTranslation:
俄罗斯总统在他一年一度的骑熊假日里，发表如下言论“由于‘健康问题’，俄罗斯商人得去换换地方、享受好天气。修建海上办公楼，我们就是小伙伴；不修建，我们就不能一起愉快地玩耍了。你决定吧……”

<_timelimit>12个月
<_objective>修建一座海上办公楼，并出租给俄罗斯
<_reward>与俄罗斯的外交关系提升，获得<CitizenReward>俄罗斯移民
新的海上办公楼(俄罗斯)

Text: Name a volcano after the Russian President
NewTranslation: 用俄罗斯总统之名命名一座火山

Text: Ask the American President for help

Announcing that Tropico has annexed Russia made the Russian President laugh joyfully for a few minutes, before he ordered the Russian army to invade Tropico. They are bound to arrive in about 6 months. We should ready our troops for the attack.

<_objective> Survive the Russian invasion
NewTranslation:
宣布俄罗斯被海岛吞并了的这件事，让俄罗斯总统开怀大笑了几分钟。当然，这是在他命令俄罗斯军队进攻海岛之前发生的事儿。他们将在6个月内抵达海岛，我们需要整备军队，沉着应战。

<_objective>成功抵御俄罗斯的入侵

Text: Good job, old bean! We repelled the Russian army and defended Tropico's sovereignty. The Russian President congratulated us with the letters "GG" and sailed off towards the sunset on his orca whale.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，干得好！我们成功地击退了俄罗斯军队，捍卫了海岛的主权。俄罗斯总统用“GG”二字祝贺我们，然后骑着他的虎鲸向日落的方向游去了。

Text:
We also found this message and a briefcase full of money at the Palace balcony.

"Russian people enjoy good fight. Now we better friends. I also leave something small for you. Until we meet again, Presidente!"

<_effect> $<MoneyReward> Treasury. Improved relations with Russia
NewTranslation:
当然，我们还在供电的阳台上找到了一个装满前的公文包和另一个字条。

“俄罗斯人民享受战斗。现在我们不打不相识。我为你留下了些小玩意儿。期待我们的再次会面，总统先生！”

<_effect>国库获得$<MoneyReward>。与俄罗斯的外交关系改善

Text:
Our only hope is to play the USA and Russia against each other like the good old days.

<_objective> Praise the USA
NewTranslation:
我们唯一希望的就是美国和俄罗斯能想过去一样，继续“秀肌肉”。

<_objective>赞扬美国

Text: Worry not, my good friend, I will settle your problem with the Russian President mano-a-mano. I will challenge him to the manliest contest there is... interpretive dance!
NewTranslation: 我的好朋友，别担心，如果你和俄罗斯总统单挑，我会帮你的。我们将用形意舞来挑战他！

Text: Real men, secure in their manliness, are not afraid to settle their differences on the dance floor.
NewTranslation: 真男人，男子气概，安全感，无畏。真男人从来不害怕在舞池中展露舞姿的不同。

Text: That was some fine dancing, my good friend. We danced for seven days and seven nights, but we are equally matched. The spirit of competition has brought the USA and Russia closer than ever before.
NewTranslation: 我的好朋友，这舞真心不错。我们已经跳了七天七夜了，但我们不相上下。比赛精神让美国和俄罗斯的关系比以前更加紧密了。

Text:
Also sorry for the earthquake. The Russian President and I celebrated our understanding with several hours of kazachok and caused a few shakes. Rest assured it was all for the good of mankind.

<_effect> Increased relations with the USA and Russia.
NewTranslation:
同时，关于地震，很抱歉。俄罗斯总统和我为了庆祝双方相互理解，我们连续挑了好几个小时的哥萨克舞。放心，一切都为了全人类好。

<_effect>与美国和俄罗斯的外交关系得到改善

Text:
However we have a plan to repel the Russian threat on Tropico and that plan is sobriety!

<_objective> Issue the "Prohibition" Edict. It will stay active for at least 2 years
NewTranslation:
不过我们有一个如何削弱俄罗斯对海岛的威胁的计划，安心，制定这个计划的时候没喝伏特加！

<_objective>颁布“禁酒令”法案。该法案将在未来最少两年内有效。

Text: <_objective> Issue the "Prohibition" Edict. It will stay active for at least 2 years
NewTranslation: <_objective>颁布“禁酒令”法案。该法案将在未来最少两年内有效。

Text: Well done, old boy. Once the Russian President saw that there's no alcohol on the island he lost all interest in Tropico.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，干得好！一旦俄罗斯总统看见海岛上一滴酒精都没有，他就会对海盗失去兴趣了。

Text:
We got this message and a case of vodka shortly after:

"Russian people feel bad about great Tropican tragedy. No alcohol is like no life. Russian people send money to help in these bad times. Sadly with no alcohol we cannot be pals any more. So sad, vodka will help."

<_effect> <MoneyReward>Treasury. Relations with Russia have been lowered
NewTranslation:
不久之后，我们就收到这封信和一箱伏特加酒：

“俄罗斯人民觉得海岛的生活就是一个悲剧，大悲剧。没有酒，就没有生活。俄罗斯人民慷慨解囊，准备捐助海岛度过这悲惨时刻。没有酒，那我们就不再是小伙伴了，不能一起快乐地玩耍了。心都凉了，不过还好有伏特加可以暖暖。”

<_effect>国库获得<MoneyReward>。与俄罗斯的外交关系降低。

Text: The Russian President arrived to climb the volcano we named after him. When the two met the volcano erupted as a sign of respect.
NewTranslation: 俄罗斯总统准备来爬爬以他名字命名的火山。两个同名同姓的家伙碰到了一起，激动之情溢于言表，还是来一场火山喷发来的坦率。

Text:
The Russian President had a quick swim in the lava and said it felt quite refreshing. Satisfied by conquering the volcano he decided to leave Tropico for the Tropicans stating - "Russia and Tropico like big brother and little cousin - we all family but we visit only on holiday and special occasion."

<_effect> Increased relations with Russia
NewTranslation:
俄罗斯总统在岩浆里进行了简短的游泳运动后表示，全身上下非常凉爽。在征服了火山心满意足之后，他决定离开海岛。离开前，他发表讲话 - “俄罗斯和海盗就像大哥哥和小表弟 - 我们都是一家人，但是我们只能在假日和特殊场合碰面”

<_effect>与俄罗斯的外交关系得到改善

Text: I hate to be the bearer of bad news, old chap, but we've made the Russian President angry and you won't like him when he's angry.
NewTranslation: 老伙计，我讨厌当坏消息的通报员，但是你确实惹怒了俄罗斯总统了，而且他生气的样子没人喜欢，可丑了。

Text:
The Russian President even postponed his sambo demonstration to send us this message:
"We extend arm of friendship and you make Russia sad today. What happens when you extend arm of friendship and comrade Wolf bites it off?"

<_effect> Relations with Russia have been lowered
NewTranslation:
俄罗斯总统甚至延迟了他的摔跤示范赛来给我们发信息：
“我们伸出友谊之手，但是你今天却让俄罗斯蒙羞。如果你伸出友谊之手，但是狼同志却狠狠地咬了一口，你会怎么办？”

<_effect>与俄罗斯的外交关系降低

Text:
Your happy place, the Asylum you visualized, cannot help you escape this crisis. Think about your favorite things and send your good thoughts to the world around you.

<_effect> The Asylum has stopped working. You can still discredit Vices.
<_objective> Export a total amount of <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> The Asylum operation will be restored
NewTranslation:
你的安乐窝，你那可以看见的庇护所，都不能帮你逃过这次危机。想想你最喜欢的东西，把你的好点子分享全世界。

<_effect> 避难所将停止工作。但你仍可以谴责罪恶。
<_objective>出口总量为 <amount> 的 <text_param>
<_reward> 避难所将恢复工作。

Text:
Can you feel the love taking over you from the inside? Good, now I will touch you gently in some places so that you can remember this feeling for the rest of your life. Yes, yes, excellent!

<_effect> The Asylum is restored to normal
<_reward> Sharing your positive thoughts with the world results in bonus <reward_standing> Standing with all foreign powers
NewTranslation:
你能感觉到从你内心涌出的爱吗？很好，我要温柔地抚摸你，记住这种感觉，用你的一生记住这种感觉。对的，对的，精彩绝伦！

<_effect> 避难所恢复正常
<_reward> 在全世界分享你积极乐观的想法，所有的外国势力对您的支持度上升 <reward_standing>

Text:
Remember the police officers are your friends. They cannot be your enemies. I said - not your enemies. Don't give in to paranoia. Oh, well, that did it. Personal note: Don't mention maniacal disorders in front of hypnotized patients.

<_effect> Induced paranoia kicks in. Police station effectiveness is reduced by half.
<_objective> Re-assure yourself by finding new imaginary friends - have <amount> <text_param>
<_reward> Police stations will restore to normal and will even gain increased effectiveness
NewTranslation:
记住，警察是你的老友。他们不可能是你的敌人。我说 - 不是你的敌人。哦，别犯二了。哦，好吧，就这样了。个人笔记：别在催眠的病人面前提什么狂暴这样的词儿。

<_effect> 犯二的偏执狂开启狂暴状态了。警察局的效率降低一半。
<_objective> 找到新的虚假朋友是您自己安心 - 拥有 <amount> 个 <text_param>
<_reward> 警察局将恢复正常，并获得效率加成。

Text: If You're Happy and You Know It

The anger you feel towards your own personality is making your vices personalize in your best friends - the policemen. Show me that you love yourself and this condition will be alleviated.

<_effect> Policemen begin to become Vices
<_objective> Love yourself - love your citizens. Increase <text_param> to <amount>
<_reward> Policemen will stop becoming Vices on purpose and you will receive <reward> free Police stations
NewTranslation:
情绪会传染，您自身的愤怒会让您的好朋友们也开始愤怒，那么犯罪也许就是个不错的发泄途径。放松些，只要让他们知道，其实您内心充满爱，情况就会好转的。

<_effect> 警察开始犯罪。
<_objective> 爱自己 - 爱你的人民。增加 <text_param> 的数量到 <amount>
<_reward> 警察停止犯罪，你将获得 <reward> 个免费的警察局。

Text:
A space-time paradox occurred while trying to explore the ancient ruins on the island. Whatever we tried the corridors of the temple shift so that they never allow us to reach the central chamber from where the signal is emitted. You have to fixate the temple in a stable quantum state.

<_objective> Build Ancient Ruins
<_reward> Finish the expedition to the ancient temple
NewTranslation:
在对岛上一处远古遗迹进行考古发掘的时候，出现了一个时空悖论。无论如何尝试，这个寺庙内变化的走廊让我们无法接近寺庙中心发出信号的房间。你得给这个寺庙固定一个量子状态。

<_objective> 修建一个古代遗迹
<_reward> 结束古代寺庙的考察之旅。

Text:
If that crazy-Communist-from-the-future wants you to meet dolphins with people, why can't we make extra profits from this? Let's throw a bit of dust in her eyes and focus on milking some cultural tourists first.

<_objective> Build <amount> hotels for Cultural tourists (Historic Inn and Hacienda)
<_reward> Tourism rating increased by <reward>
NewTranslation:
如果那个疯狂的来自未来的共产党员希望您去接见海豚和人，那为什么我们不能从这件事里占点儿便宜呢？让我们使个障眼法，优先满足文化游客吧。

<_objective> 为文化游客修建 <amount> 个旅馆(古典旅馆和庄园)
<_reward> 旅游评级增加 <reward>
已修建庄园和古典旅馆

Text:
And what better reward than the opportunity to earn more money? Think about it - dozens of Eco tourists crowding to see the cute dolphin babies. They will never pay attention at us robbing them.

<_objective> Build <amount> Country Hotels
<_reward> Tourism rating increased by <reward>
<_hint> You can upgrade your Dolphinariums to earn extra from Eco tourists
NewTranslation:
想想看，比赚钱机会还要好的奖励是什么？成群的生态游客蜂拥而至，观赏海豚宝宝。他们绝对不会注意到我们正在洗劫他们的。

<_objective> 修建 <amount> 个乡村旅馆
<_reward> 旅游评级将增加 <reward>
<_hint> 你可以通过升级海豚馆来吸引更多的生态游客。

Text:
The Slow-Food Joint pulled strings with a famous US fast-food chain to file a complaint of copyright infringement. The US are furious by the fact that they're losing money and they threatened to bomb us! We were forced to suspend our Fast Food Joints from operations until the crisis is averted.

<_effect> US relations set at 40. All of your Fast Food Joints have stopped working
<_objective> Raise your standing with the US to <amount> or pay them royalties
<_reward> Fast Food Joints start working and their service quality is increased
NewTranslation:
我们的慢餐店因为和一个美国著名的快餐店的名字很雷同，所以引起了盗版侵权的诉讼。美国人有些恼怒，因为他们赔钱了，因此他们威胁要轰炸我们。我们不得不现在是关闭了我们的快餐店，直到这次危机结束。

<_effect> 与美国的外交关系为40。您所有的快餐店关门停业了。
<_objective> 将您与美国的关系提升至 <amount> ，或者掏腰包吧。
<_reward> 快餐店恢复营业，并且提高漆服务质量。

Text:
Using its media influence, the Slow-Food Joint issued us a challenge. Should we fall behind their profits, they will persuade investors and clients across the world of our unworthiness.

<_effect> Lose the game if your Fast Food Joint profits fall behind with <fallback_profit> or more. You have <years_count> to setup your Fast Food chain before being threatened with losing the mission.

<_objective> Win the mission before the Slow-Food Joint generates enough profits to oust you!
NewTranslation:
利用媒体的影响力，慢餐店给我们带来了新的挑战。如果我们的追不上他们的利润，他们将向我们全世界的投资者和顾客诉说我们的无能。

<_effect> 如果您的快餐店利润落后他们超过 <fallback_profit> ，游戏将失败。你有 <years_count> 年时间可以建立你的快餐产业链，省的那帮家伙威胁你并弹劾您。

<_objective> 在慢餐店赚取足够利润让您滚蛋之前完成任务。

Text:
Of course I'm talking about the Slow-Food Joint. I hope you've found the mental capacity to notice that they are about to get significant advantage over us and deny us our market share.

<_effect> If you continue to lose ground to the Slow-Food Joint, you will lose the mission!
NewTranslation:
当然，只有慢餐店才会让我这么头疼。我希望您做好了心理准备：他们就要抢占重要的商机，并且打压我们的市场份额了。

<_effect> 如果您继续在这场对阵慢餐店的商战中步步败退，您就得下台了。

Text:
With a big media event the Slow-Food Joint declared they've won the challenge. Don't worry, Presidente - this isn't the end for us! We can still earn our living working as carnival buffoons!

<_effect> You lose the mission!
NewTranslation:
慢餐店联盟在一个重大的媒体发布会上宣布，他们成功赢得了这次商战的胜利。别担心，总统先生 - 这不是我们的末日！嘉年华小丑的工作还是挺赚钱的！

<_effect> 总统府不再是您的家了！

Text: Activate to stop citizens from visiting this building (only tourists will visit). The Service Quality will increase by 10.
NewTranslation: 开启选项，海岛居民禁止进入此建筑(只允许游客访问建筑)。服务质量增加10。

Text: Deactivate to allow citizens to use the building. The Service Quality will be decreased.
NewTranslation: 取消选项，海岛居民可以访问此建筑。服务质量将降低。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 title

Text: Welcome to Tropico, Presidente! I am your loyal advisor and number one fan Penultimo, and I am here to remind you of the joys of dictatorship.
NewTranslation: 欢迎来到海岛，总统！我是你的忠实顾问,也是你的头号粉丝-贝努迪莫，我是来提醒你享受独裁的快乐。

Text:
The numbers above the minimap represent your current treasury, population and support. Since Tropico is currently just a colony of the Crown, the number next to the calendar represents the remaining years and months of your mandate as its governor.

Close this message by clicking on the OK button to continue.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 text
NewTranslation:
小地图上方的数据代表着你当前的财富，人口和支持率。由于小岛现在只是皇室的一个殖民地，日历旁边的数字代表着你的剩余任期。

点击OK按钮以关闭此消息来继续进行游戏。

Text:
The numbers above the minimap represent your current treasury, population and support. Since Tropico is currently just a colony of the Crown, the number next to the calendar represents the remaining years and months of your mandate as its governor.

点击<image1>以关闭此消息来继续进行游戏。

Text: The camera offers a bird's-eye view of your island and starting town.
NewTranslation: 游戏中提供可以俯瞰岛屿和起始城镇的视角。(上帝视角)。

Text:
Move the mouse cursor to the edge of the screen to pan in this direction. Use the mouse wheel or the PgUp/PgDown keys to zoom in and out. Hold the middle mouse button or the Alt key to rotate or tilt the camera.

The camera controls will be present on screen for the duration of this tutorial. Try them now!

<_objective> Familiarize yourself with the camera controls
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 description
NewTranslation:
移动鼠标指针至屏幕边缘来向该方向拖动视野。使用鼠标滚轴或者“PageUp/PageDown”来缩放视野。按住鼠标中键或“Alt”来旋转或倾斜视角。
视角控制将在这个教程中会一直在屏幕上显示。现在就来试试吧！

<_objective>熟悉镜头控制

<_objective> Familiarize yourself with the camera controls

视角控制将在这个教程中会一直在屏幕上显示。现在就来试试吧！

Text:
You can see all active tasks at the right side of your screen. The in-view task markers look like this: <image UI/Common/task_major.tga>

Text: All Presidentes have special executive powers, such as the ability to control time itself. Indeed, being the most awesome person in the world, you are able to accelerate time at your whim.
NewTranslation: 所有的总统都有特殊的经营技巧，比如操控时间。事实上作为世界上最杰出的人，你可以通过意念来控制时间。

Text:
Press the fast forward button to do so.

<_objective> Increase the game speed to "fast"
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 description
NewTranslation:
点击加速按钮来实现时间的加速流逝。

<_objective>提高游戏速度至“快速”

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 summary

Text:
Press <image1> to increase the game speed.

<_objective> Increase the game speed to "fast"
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 x_description
NewTranslation:
按下<image1>来加快时间流逝。

<_objective>提高游戏速度至“快速”

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 title

Text: Good job! Fast speed is very useful when you have to wait for things like building construction or the export of produced goods.
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮！快进在你不得不等待建筑完工或者出口货物的时候都非常有用。

Text: You are also able to slow down and even stop time when things get too frantic. No tasks will progress while time is paused but you can still issue orders.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 text
NewTranslation: 在你忙不过来时，你也可以减缓时间流逝，甚至使其停止。当时间停止时所有的任务都不会有任何进展，但你仍可颁布法令。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 title

Text: Time for an official inspection, Presidente.
NewTranslation: 总统，是时候进行内政检视了。

Text:
You can select any building by left-clicking on it. This will open the building infopanel and show you all important information about it.

<_objective> Select any building (make sure that the game is not paused)

<_hint> You can close the building infopanel by clicking on a clear ground in the view.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 description
NewTranslation:
你可以左键点选任意建筑来选定它。这将会打开建筑信息面板来给你提供相关的重要信息。

<_objective>选择任一建筑(请先确认游戏未处于暂停状态)

<_hint>你可以通过点选视野中的空地来关闭建筑信息面板。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 summary

Text:
You can select any building by positioning the selector over it and pressing <image1>. This will open the building infopanel and show you all important information about it.

<_objective> Select any building (make sure that the game is not paused)

<_hint> You can close the building infopanel by pressing <image2>
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 x_description
NewTranslation:
你可以通过将光标移至建筑上并按下<image1>来选中建筑。这将会打开建筑信息面板来给你提供相关的重要信息。

<_objective>选择任一建筑(请先确认游戏未处于暂停状态)

<_hint>你可以通过按下<image2>来关闭建筑信息面板。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 title

Text: A ruler that doesn't pay attention to his subjects may end up on the wrong side of a Coup d'Etat. Let's select one of the little Tropicans!
NewTranslation: 如果统治者不关心自己的臣民的话，很有可能会被武力夺权。让我们来选择一个小岛民吧

Text:
Point at any of your citizens and left click to select him. You may have to zoom in to do so. Selecting the citizen opens his infopanel, showing all information that we have on him, including his approval for your regime.

<_objective> Select a citizen (make sure that the game is not paused)
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 description
NewTranslation:
左键点击一位居民以选中。你可能需要放大才能做到这些。选择公民来打开TA的信息面板，这将展示我们所掌握的所有有关TA的信息，包括对您证券的“感情状况”。

<_objective>选择一位居民(请先确认游戏未处于暂停状态)

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 summary

Text:
Positioning the selector near any of your citizens and pressing <image1> will select him. You may have to zoom in to do so. Selecting the citizen opens his infopanel, showing all information that we have on him, including his approval for your regime.

<_objective> Select a citizen (make sure that the game is not paused)
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 x_description
NewTranslation:
将光标移向并按下<image1>以选中居民。你可能需要放大才能做到这些。选择公民来打开TA的信息面板，这将展示我们所掌握的所有有关TA的信息，包括对您政权的“感情状况”。

<_objective>选择一位居民(请先确认游戏未处于暂停状态)

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 title

Text: Paying attention to our infrastructure is very important. Looks like this Iron Mine has not been connected to a road. This means it will never be able to export its produced goods.
NewTranslation: 关注我们的基础设施非常重要。看起来似乎这个矿山上未连接至道路网。这意味着他将永远不能运出其生产的产品。

Text:
To construct a road you have to open the build menu by right-clicking anywhere in the view. Once it is open, select the "infrastructure" category and finally the Road item. Place a road near the mine entrance and connect it to your existing road network by left-clicking.

<_objective> Connect the Mine to the road network
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 description
NewTranslation:
要建造道路，首先你需要视野中任意地方右键单击以打开建筑菜单。在它打开后，选择“基础设施”并点击道路项目。将道路放在矿上入口旁，并通过左键单击将其连入你的道路网。

<_objective>将矿山连入道路网

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 summary

Text:
To construct a road you have to open the build menu by pressing <image1>. Once it is open, select the "infrastructure" category and finally the Road item by navigating with <image2> and confirming with <image3>. Place a road near the mine entrance and connect it to your existing road network by pressing <image3> and panning the camera.

<_objective> Connect the Mine to the road network
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 x_description
NewTranslation:
要建造道路，首先你需要按下<image1>以打开建筑菜单。在它打开后，选择“基础设施”并选中道路项目。你可以通过<image2>来进行选择并用<image3>来确认。通过按下<image3>并平移视角将道路放在矿上入口旁并将其连入你的道路网。

<_objective>将矿山连入道路网

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 title

Text: Good, your mine is now connected and the teamsters will carry its production to the docks. It will be exported on the next ship that arrives there.
NewTranslation: 干的不错啊，你的矿山已连入道路网，物流将会把其产出带至巷口。这些货物会在下一艘船到来时进行出口。

Text:
Ships arrive at the docks at least once a year.

<_objective> Export 100 Iron
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 description
NewTranslation:
船只每年至少一次驶入巷口。

<_objective>出口100铁矿

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T1 title

Text: Building our glorious future is your most important task as our Presidente. Let me show you how to erect new buildings.
NewTranslation: 作为我们的总统，你最重要的任务就是为我们建立美好的未来。让我教你如何建造新的建筑物吧。

Text:
Open the build menu with a right-click, select the "Welfare & Media" category and then select the Catholic Mission building. Place it by left-clicking.

The Catholic Mission construction site must be placed near a road. Constructors from your Construction Office will travel to the site and the new building will be ready in a few months. Constructions that are far away and multiple constructions at once will take longer.

<_objective> Construct a Catholic Mission
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 description
NewTranslation:
鼠标右击以打开建造菜单，选择“福利与媒体”并点击天主教教堂。左键以放置建筑。

天主教教堂必须放置在道路旁边。建筑公司将派遣工人前往进行建设，该建筑将会在几个月后建成。如果公司距离建筑太远，或者同时进行多个建设，竣工时间或许会更长一些。

<_objective>建造一个天主教教堂

Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: Welcome to the second tutorial. It will teach you how to research new technologies, create a stable and profitable economy and how to issue edicts.
NewTranslation: 欢迎进入第二个教程。在这里你将学到如何研究系技术，建立拥有稳定收益的经济以及如何颁布法令。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: To research new technologies, you must first build a Library,
NewTranslation: 要开发新技术，你必须先有个图书馆，

Text:
The Library is located in the "Research & Education" category.

<_objective> Construct a Library.

NewTranslation:
图书馆在“研究与教育”页面。

<_objective>建造一座图书馆。

Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: You will need some educated workers to start conducting research in the Library.
NewTranslation: 你的图书馆需要一些受过教育的工人来进行研究。

Text:
To hire them, select your library and click on the "Workers" button in the infopanel. Use the Hire button to invite 3 workers from abroad. They will arrive with the next ship. They are expensive, but well worth it. In later Eras you will be able to educate your citizens and not rely on foreign experts.

<_objective> Invite three college educated workers in the Library to start the research on Planks
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation:
要雇用他们，首先需要选中你的图书馆并在信息面板点击“员工”按钮。使用“雇佣”按钮来邀请3名外籍劳工。他们将随着下一趟船只到达。他们很贵，但却超值。以后你可以教育你的公民来进行聘用，而不需一直依赖外国专家。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: We can send expeditions out to explore our island and discover valuable resources.
NewTranslation: 我们可以派遣探险者来探索我们的岛屿，并寻找有价值的资源。

Text:
There is a squad of soldiers stationed in the Palace - your personal guard. Let us send them to discover a forest suitable for logging. Select your palace, click on the explore button and left-click on your desired destination within the foggy unexplored areas.

And don't worry, Presidente, I promise nobody will depose you while the guards are away.

<_objective> Send an expedition to explore the island
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation:
宫殿中驻扎了一些士兵-你的私人护卫。让我们派遣他们去寻找适合采伐的森林吧。选中你的宫殿，点击“探索”按钮，左键点击你想要让他们探索的被战争迷雾覆盖的地点。

别担心，总统。我保证你的亲卫们外派时，不会有人起义的。

<_objective>派遣探险队探索岛屿。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary

There is a squad of soldiers stationed in the Palace - your personal guard. Let us send them to discover a forest suitable for logging. And don't worry, Presidente, I promise nobody will depose you while the guards are away.

<_objective> Send an expedition to explore the island
