Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: While waiting for the research to be completed, let us set up some raw materials production. Let's order a Logging Camp from the "natural Resources" category in the Build menu.
NewTranslation: 在等待研究完成的这段时间里，让我们来进行一些原料的生产吧。让我们在建筑菜单中选择“自然资源”来建造一个伐木场吧。

Text:
You will notice a colored grid over the terrain while placing the Logging Camp. This is the logging overlay. Green signifies desirable locations near big clusters of trees while red locations are undesirable and will result in low production.

Remember, it must be connected to a road and you can increase the game speed if you don't like to wait.

<_objective> Construct a Logging Camp
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation:
你将会发现一个彩色地形网格当你准备放置伐木场时。这是可采伐资源丰富度视图。绿色代表附近有大量可采伐树木的适合地点，而红色代表不佳地点，在那里建造将会导致其产量很低。

切记，它需要接入道路网如果你不想等待的话你可以加快游戏速度。

<_objective>建造一个伐木场

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: Your Logging Camp has to be connected to our road network to function.
NewTranslation: 你的伐木场必须连接至道路网来正常运转。

Text: Let me remind you, roads are located in the "Infrastructure" category of the build menu.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation: 提醒:道路位于建筑菜单的“基础设施”页面。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: Good job, the Logging Camp has been completed!
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮，伐木场已建成！

Text:
Every production building will be serviced by teamsters if it is connected to a road. They will carry the production to a dock or where it is needed on the island. When a freighter arrives it will export the goods stored on the dock and the profits from their sale will be added to the treasury.

Buildings that are far away from the Teamster's office will take longer to be serviced.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 text
NewTranslation:
每个连接到道路网的生产建筑都会得到到物流工人的服务。他们将运送产品到码头或者岛屿上需要这些产品的地方。当货轮到达巷口后它会出口寄存在巷口的那些商品，而贸易所得利润会加存入你的金库中。

远离物流公司的建筑需要更长的时间来接受物流工人的服务。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: All buildings have allocated budgets - those encompass the money spent on them each month.
NewTranslation: 所有建筑都可以进行预算分配-这是他们每个月可花在自身的金额。

Text:
Higher budget results in higher effectiveness of the building and higher wealth of the workers. It will also attract more workers when the workforce is insufficient.

Since we are setting up our economy, let us maximize the budget of our Teamster's Office. This will allow the teamsters working there to transport larger loads.

<_objective> Maximize the budget in the Teamster's Office
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation:
提高预算会提高建筑的效率以及工人的财富。而且当劳力不足的时候，也会吸引更多的工人。

因为我们的经济才刚刚发展，让我们来将物流公司的预算调至最大。这将促使这里的物流工人运载更多的货物。

<_objective>将物流公司的预算调至最大

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary

Text: Move the slider to set the budget.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 text
Scenario Isla grande lago T2 x_text
NewTranslation: 按下<image1>，<image2>来将预算调至最大。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: Let us erect a production building, Presidente. Everybody likes animals - let us build a Ranch! It can be useful both for feeding our people and producing resources for export.
NewTranslation: 让我们建造一个特殊的生产建筑吧，总统。人人都爱动物-让我们建造一个牧场吧！无论出口还是养育我们的人民都很有效。

Text:
You can select a type of livestock from the menu in the construction panel on the right side of the screen. Different animals produce different resources.

Again, it is preferable to place the ranch near a green overlay area, visualizing the good pastures on the island..

<_objective> Construct a Ranch
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation:
你可以在屏幕右侧的建筑菜单中选择一种动物来进行饲养。不同的动物可产出不同的资源

再次提醒，最好将牧场放置在绿色区域，尽可能选择岛上资源较好的位置。

<_objective>建造一个牧场

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary

Text:
You can select a type of livestock using <image1> during placement. Different animals produce different resources.

Again, it is preferable to place the ranch near a green overlay area, visualizing the good pastures on the island..

<_objective> Construct a Ranch
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 x_description

<_objective>建造一个牧场

Text: Edicts are special laws that you can issue.
NewTranslation: 法令是一条你可以颁布的特别法律。

Text:
Let's issue a Building permit edict that will allow you to put something aside in your Swiss bank account.

<_objective> Issue Building Permit Edict
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation:
然我们颁布“建筑许可”法令吧，这是你能够将一些东西存入你的瑞士银行账户。

<_objective>颁布“建筑许可”法令

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary

Text:
Let's issue a Building permit edict that will allow you to put something aside in your Swiss bank account. Open the edicts menu with <image1> + <image2>

<_objective> Issue Building Permit Edict
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 x_description
NewTranslation:
然我们颁布“建筑许可”法令吧，这是你能够将一些东西存入你的瑞士银行账户。用<image1>+<image2>打开法令菜单


<_objective>颁布“建筑许可”法令

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: Let us build something like a few cheap Country Houses to see how this "corruption" thing works.
NewTranslation: 让我们建造一些东西，比如一些廉价的的乡村小屋，然后再看看“腐败”是怎么一回事。

Text:
Remember, while "Building permit" is enacted, a percentage of every construction goes to your personal slush fund. Money in the Swiss Bank cannot be used for state expenses but can be used for certain "special" expenses for you and your Dynasty.

<_objective> Earn $$<amount> Swiss Bank account from constructions
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation:
切记，当“建筑许可”法令被通过时，每次建造建筑都会有一定比例的金额进入你的非法基金中。瑞士银行中的钱财尽管无法用于国家的建设但可以“特殊”方式为你的家族服务。

<_objective>在瑞士银行通过建筑赚取$$<amount>

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text:
With the Planks research completed and the Logging Camp ready, it is time to build our first factory - a Lumber Mill. It will process Logs from the Logging Camp into the more expensive Planks resource.

Don't forget that you have to connect the new Lumber Mill to the road network.
NewTranslation:
随着木材研究的完成和伐木厂的建成，实施后建立我们的第一家工厂-一个木材厂了。它将对来自伐木场的原木进行再加工以获得更加昂贵的资源“木板”。

不要忘了将你新建的木材厂连入道路网。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text:
Your resources are automatically exported at default prices, but more profitable trade offers will appear from time to time.

The Trade button allows you to inspect different offers and set up trade routes. Add ships to start a trade route, remove ships to cancel an active route.
NewTranslation:
你的资源会自动按照默认价格出口，较高利润的贸易需求将会不时出现。

你能通过点击“贸易”按钮来检视不同的贸易需求并建立贸易路线。添加船只来开启贸易路线，移除船来取消一条已启用的的贸易通路。

Text: <_objective> Start a trade route to export Planks to the USA
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 description
NewTranslation: <_objective>启用一条贸易路线以出口“木板”到美国

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 summary

Text:
Your resources are automatically exported at default prices, but more profitable trade offers will appear from time to time.

The Trade overview opened with <image1> + <image2> allows you to inspect different offers and start trade routes. Add ships to start a trade route, remove ships to cancel an active route.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 x_description
NewTranslation:
你的资源会自动按照默认价格出口，较高利润的贸易需求将会不时出现。


通过按下<image1>+<image2>打开贸易总览，以检视不同的贸易需求并建立贸易路线。添加船只来开启贸易路线，移除船来取消一条已启用的的贸易通路。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: The managers are either your dynasty members or exceptional citizens whose skills can improve a building's performance.
NewTranslation: 督导即可由你的家族成员担任，又可由杰出岛民任职的，能够提高建筑性能的职位

Text:
Let's assign a manager to your Lumber Mill. To do so select it and click on the Workers button.

Sometimes there might not be a suitable manager available on the island. In this case you may have to wait until a new dynasty member or skilled citizen appears.

<_objective> Assign a manager to the Lumber Mill

<_objective>为木材厂委任一位督导吧

Let's assign a manager to your Lumber Mill. To do so select it and press the Workers button in the infopanel.

Sometimes there might not be a suitable manager available on the island. In this case you may have to wait until a new dynasty member or skilled citizen appears.

<_objective> Assign a manager to the Lumber Mill

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 text
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Welcome to the third tutorial! It will teach you how to advance to the next Era, create a Constitution, keep your people happy and deal with the internal factions and foreign powers.
NewTranslation: 欢迎来到教程第三阶段！你将学到如何前进至下一时期，创造一个宪法，使人民幸福，以及如何与内部派系和外国列强交往

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary

Text: Your remaining mandate is displayed next to the <image UI/Common/mm_date.tga> symbol.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 text
NewTranslation: 你的剩余任期在<image UI/Common/mm_date.tga>标志旁。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Tropico is currently in the Colonial Era. We are subject to the whims of the Crown and you will be removed from office when your mandate, indicated above the minimap, expires.
NewTranslation: 小岛目前处于殖民时期。我们受到皇家认可，但当你的任期结束时你将会被罢免。剩余任期在位于小地图上方。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 text
NewTranslation:
· 大多数高级建筑在殖民时期不可用
· 经济几乎完全依赖于原材料生产
· 完成王室任务获得任期延长、人口、金钱奖励

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: As you saw in the Almanac, the progressive Revolutionaries are on your side while the Royalists oppose you - just as they oppose the idea of an independent Tropico.
NewTranslation: 正如你在年鉴中所视，先进的革命派站在你这边当保皇派反对你时-就像他们反对海岛独立的想法那样。

Text:
Certain advanced buildings and researches will encourage more people to become Revolutionaries. Openly defying the Crown will also make the Revolutionaries faction grow, but may have dire consequences for you.

The Revolutionaries have long demanded some military structures of our own. Let us construct 2 Guard Towers - this will encourage more people to join their movement.

<_objective> Build 2 Guard Towers
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
某些先进的建筑和研究将会鼓励人们加入革命的队伍。公然反抗皇室也会促使革命的队伍壮大，但可能会造成可怖的后果。

革命派一直要求我们建造一些自己的军事力量。让我们建造2座炮楼吧-这将鼓励更多的人加入革命的队伍。

<_objective>建造2座炮楼

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Good job! By meeting the Revolutionaries' demands we will attract more people to their cause. Support for independence will grow and Tropico will finally be able to progress beyond the Colonial Era.
NewTranslation: 干得漂亮！通过满足那些革命派的需求我们促使愈来愈多的人投身到革命的事业中去。愈来愈多的人支持独立，这最终将使海岛跨过殖民时期。

Text:
Let us see how the popular support will grow.

<_objective> Wait a while until the popular support grows to 51%
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
让我们看看民众支持是如何提高的。

<_objective>等待一段时间直至民众支持率增长至51%

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: If Tropico stays in the Colonial Era too long your mandate will end and a new governor will take your place. Time to declare independence and proclaim Tropico a free country!
NewTranslation: 如果海岛停留在殖民时期过长，而你的任期已结束，你将会被一个新的总督取而代之。是时候宣布独立来使海岛成为自由的国度了！

Text:
Our actions to this point have already secured enough popular support and the Revolutionaries faction is strong.

<_objective> Advance to the World Wars Era
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
迄今为止，我们的行动以获得足够的革命派和民意支持。

<_objective>前进至世界大战时期

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary

Text:
Our actions to this point have already secured enough popular support and the Revolutionaries faction is strong.

<_objective> Advance to the World Wars Era
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 x_description
NewTranslation:
迄今为止，我们的行动以获得足够的革命派和民意支持。

<_objective>前进至世界大战时期

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Two political factions are active in Tropico during the Colonial Era - the Royalists and the Revolutionaries. Other factions, such as Militarists, the Religious, Communists and Capitalists become prominent in later Eras.
NewTranslation: 岛上两个党派活跃在殖民时期-保皇派和革命派。其他派系，如军国主义者，宗教人士，共产主义者和资本主义者将在之后的时期登上历史舞台。

Text:
You have a standing with all of these factions and the higher this standing is, the more likely is for their supporters to vote for you during elections. But beware - as you try to appease one faction, you may alienate their opposing faction.

<_objective> Check out the Politics Page in the almanac to see the factions active in this Era
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
这些派系都会对你的作为进行评价，声望愈高，在竞选时相应派系将会给予更高的支持率。但需要注意的是-当你试图讨好某一个派系时，你可能会疏远与他们的敌对派系。

<_objective>检视年鉴中的政治页面来查看在此历史阶段活跃的派系。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary

Text: Select this link to open the Politics page. Close the Almanac with a right-click.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 text
NewTranslation: 选中此链接来打开政治页面。右键单击以关闭年鉴。

Text: Use <image1> and <image2> to change the Almanac page. Close the Almanac with <image3>
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 x_text
NewTranslation: 使用<image1>和<image2>来改变年鉴页面。按下<image3>来关闭年鉴

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Era features several Foreign Powers. During the World Wars Era these are the Axis and the Allies.
NewTranslation: 每个时期都存在着外国列强。在世界大战时期为轴心国和同盟国

Text:
Foreign powers are important because they provide foreign aid and because if we piss them off too much, they may invade us. To start diplomatic relations with them we should construct an Embassy.

<_objective> Construct an Embassy
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
外国列强很重要，因为他们会提供国际援助，并且当我们激怒他们时他们可能会对我们进行入侵。欲与其展开双边关系，须先建大使馆。

<_objective>建造大使馆

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Our embassy is ready - time to invite a Foreign Power to our island.
NewTranslation: 我们的使馆已准备就绪-是时候邀请外国列强进驻小岛了。

Text:
To do select the Embassy and invite either the Axis or the Allies from its infopanel.

<_objective> Invite either the Axis or the Allies in your Embassy
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
选中大使馆，并在信息面板中向轴心国或同盟国发出邀请。

<_objective>在大使馆中向轴心国或同盟国发出邀请

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Let me direct your attention to another important edict - the sovereign debt.
NewTranslation: 让我们将注意力放至另一个重要的法令上-主权债券。

Text:
When you buy Tropico's independence from the Crown the country starts the World Wars in debt. Debt may also be created by issuing bonds to get money in a hurry. Borrowed money will incur interest.

<_objective> Repay the sovereign debt
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
你从王室手中买下海岛的独立权，但在世界大战开始时仍有一定的债务。你可以通过发行主权债券来获得应急的资金。但债务会产生利息。

<_objective>偿还主权债务

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary

Text: Repay the debt by buying back the bonds
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 text
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Free Tropico is ready for its very own Constitution, Presidente!
NewTranslation: 我们自由的海岛联邦已准备好颁布自己的宪法了，总统！

Text:
The Constitution is the document in which you set the principles of our young nation. Each decision you make while drafting the Constitution will have a special effect on life in our great country.

Our Constitution principles affect greatly both the foreign relations and the internal politics. The Constitution can be amended once every 5 years. New Constitution principles will become available through research.

<_objective> Draft the Constitution
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
宪法是设定国家基本性质的文件。在每次你为我们伟大的国家起草宪法时，所做出的决定都将会对我们的生活产生特殊的影响。

我们的宪法条例将会极大地影响对外关系和内部政务。宪法每5年可以修订一次。通过研究可增加一个新的宪法条例。

<_objective>起草宪法

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Elections are coming, Presidente! No dictator likes them, but they are usually the better alternative to uprisings and military coups.
NewTranslation: 总督，大选将至！没有任何独裁者喜欢选举，但它可以很好的减少起义和暴乱的产生

Text:
Since Tropico is a democracy, we can cheat only so much to tilt the elections in our favor. The happiness of your people and the political standing with the island factions are the decisive factors for the vote.

<_objective> Win the Elections
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
由于Tropico是一个民主的国家，我们只能做出这一点点的民意操纵。你的人民的幸福指数和政党的在岛上的政治地位将起到决定性的作用。

<_objective>获得选举胜利

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: As election day draws near, it may be a good idea to check to see how happy your people are. This and other helpful information can be found in the Almanac.
NewTranslation: 随着大选的临近，去看看你的人民有多幸福或许是个好主意。你可以在年鉴中找到这个或其他有用的信息

Text:
To open the Almanac, click on the suggested button.

<_objective> Check out the happiness page in the Almanac
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation:
点击建议按扭来打开年鉴。

<_objective>检视年鉴中的幸福指数页面

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary

Text:
To open the Almanac, use <image1>+<image2>

<_objective> Check out the happiness page in the Almanac
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 x_description
NewTranslation:
用<image1>+<image2>
来打开年鉴。

<_objective>检视年鉴中的幸福指数页面

Text: Select this link to open the Happiness page. Close the Almanac with a right-click.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 text
NewTranslation: 选择这个标签来打开年鉴中的幸福指数页面。右键单击来关闭年鉴。

Text: Use <image1> and <image2> to change the Almanac page. Close the Almanac with <image3>
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 x_text
NewTranslation: 使用<image1>和<image2>来更改年鉴的项目。用<image3>来关闭年鉴。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text:
Low happiness scores indicate that the Tropicans are not happy with certain aspects of their life on the island, such as the lack of entertainment. Let us build a Tavern to address this.

This may take some time. You will start to notice the tavern effect a few months after it has been completed.
NewTranslation:
低幸福指数表明岛民们对岛上生活条件的一项或几项不满意，譬如缺乏娱乐。让我们建立一个小镇酒馆来解决这个问题。

这将花费一些时间。在小镇酒馆建成的几个月后你才会注意到它的影响。

Text: <_objective> Construct a Tavern and increase the Entertainment happiness to 10.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation: <_objective>建造一个酒馆并增加娱乐产生的幸福至10。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: Let me explain how service buildings such as our Tavern work. The Tavern provides people living in the vicinity with Entertainment, thus increasing their happiness.
NewTranslation: 让我来解释下服务建筑设施如小镇酒馆如何产生效果的。酒馆为生活在附近的人们提供娱乐，这将会使他们的幸福感提高

Text:
Certain other buildings provide various services like Religion and Healthcare. People living closer to a service may take better advantage than the ones living far away.

The Tavern has the capacity to service a certain number of people. If the population grows larger you will have to construct a new entertainment building or suffer reduced Entertainment happiness.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 text
NewTranslation:
某些其他建筑物提供各种服务，如宗教与医疗保健。居住得离公共设施越近的人们生活越好。

酒店仅拥有为一定数量的人员服务的能力。如果人口大量增长你将不得不建造一个新的公共设施，否则你的人民幸福感将降低

Text: <image UI/Common/mm_approval.tga> represents the percentage of the voters that support you. If you are concerned about the elections results, you can use certain edicts such as "Tax Cut" to influence the voters.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 text
NewTranslation: <image UI/Common/mm_approval.tga>代表着你在选民中的支持率。如果你担心选举的结果，你可以使用特定的法令如“减税”来提高你对选民的影响。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: You have invited the Allies onto the island. This will strengthen our relationship with them, but worsen our standing with their enemies - the Axis. Be advised, poor relations may result in retaliation against Tropico.
NewTranslation: 你已邀请盟军使节团在海岛进行访问。这将增强我们与他们之间的关系，但会恶化与他们敌人-轴心国的关系。特别提醒，关系过于恶略将会引起对小岛的侵略。

Text: Another factor influenced by foreign politics is the foreign aid. Foreign aid is given at the end of each year by the superpower with highest relations to Tropico. Let us wait and see what foreign aid we will receive this year.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation: 影响外国政治的另一个因素就是国际救援。每年年末与小岛关系最密切的超级大国将给予小岛国际援助。让我们看看今年我们会收到什么。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary
Scenario Isla grande lago T3 title

Text: You have invited the Axis onto the island. This will strengthen our relationship with them, but worsen our standing with their enemy - the Allies. Always be mindful of foreign relations, for if our standing is too low for too long the superpower involved may take aggressive action against Tropico.
NewTranslation: 你已邀请轴心国使节团在海岛进行访问。这将增强我们与他们之间的关系，但会恶化与他们敌人-盟军的关系。时刻注意对外关系，如果我们与超级大国的关系太低或离他们期望太远都会引起对小岛的侵略。

Text: Another factor influenced by foreign politics is the foreign aid. Foreign aid is given at the end of each year by the superpower with highest relations to Tropico. Let us wait and see what foreign aid we will receive this year.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 description
NewTranslation: 影响外国政治的另一个因素就是国际救援。每年年末与小岛关系最密切的超级大国将给予小岛国际援助。让我们看看今年我们会收到什么。

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T3 summary

Text: Cheese! It turns barbarians into gentlemen and gentlemen into barbarians, depending on the occasion.
NewTranslation: 奶酪！奶酪！它能使野蛮人变成绅士也能使绅士变成野蛮人，这取决于所处的场合。

Text: Cheese is a commodity that has to be accessible for every God-loving citizen, no matter his estate and property! Besides, nobility pays off, old bean.
NewTranslation: 神爱众生，奶酪应该是一种神的子民们无论贫富贵贱居民皆易获得的商品！顺便一提，高尚会获得回报的，老豆。

Text: This cheese surely packs some punch! The lad who tasted it stood up on the table and began singing the Tropican hymn, even before it was written! The Revolutionaries are fascinated!
NewTranslation: 这种奶酪够味！那个尝了它的家伙站到了柱子上，在海盗圣歌还没有写出来的时候就唱了出来！那些革命派都深深地陶醉了！

Text: The Pirate captain blew a gasket after tasting our cheese! He says that this is the biggest insult he received - to be fed hogwash!
NewTranslation: 海盗船长在尝完我们的奶酪之后大发雷霆！他说这是他受到的最大的侮辱-被人当猪来喂！！

Text: To the rest of the Europeans, the New World is a place of exotic beauty and mysticism. I say, we use that in our favor, my good sir.
NewTranslation: 对那些欧洲佬来说，新世界充满了异域风情。依我来看，我们可以利用这点，我的好先生~。

Text: That's the way to go, old chap! His Majesty is astounded by the quality of our  cheese applauds our efforts!
NewTranslation: 这就是我们要走的路，老豆！陛下对我们努力提高奶酪的质量感到震惊！

Text: The unfortunate lad who tasted our cheese didn't make it through the ordeal . The Revolutionaries aren't particularly fond of the happening, but the Crown agents want to buy some and weaponize it against the Revolutionaries.
NewTranslation: 那个不幸尝到我们鱼香奶酪的小伙没有挺过来。革命派不喜欢这样的结局，但皇家特工想要采购一些作为对付革命派的秘密武器。

Text: The Pirate captain blew a gasket after tasting our cheese! He says that this is the biggest insult he received - to be fed hogwash!
NewTranslation: 海盗船长在尝完我们的奶酪之后大发雷霆！他说这是他受到的最大的侮辱-被人当猪来喂！！

Text: Good cheese always goes well with good wine, old chap. Now imagine cheese that bears all that鈥檚 good from the good drink! That would be a hit!
NewTranslation: 好的奶酪如美酒一般，老伙计。现在想像一下奶酪有了美酒的一切特点！这将是个沉重的打击！

Text: The unfortunate lad who tasted our cheese didn't make it through the ordeal . The Revolutionaries aren't particularly fond of the happening, but the Crown agents want to buy some and weaponize it against the Revolutionaries.
NewTranslation: 品尝我们奶酪的那个家伙很不幸的没能通过考验。革命派不怎么欣赏这件事。但是皇室代理却想买一些用于武装从而对抗革命派。

Text: After their first bite of our cheese, all pirates went berserk, rampaging through Tortuga's pubs and brothels for three days. When their captain recovered from his hangover, he traded a ton of gold for another taste!
NewTranslation: 才咬下第一口，海盗们便变得跟狂战士一般，在龟岛酒吧与妓院狂欢了三天三夜。当清醒过来时，他们船长便要求用一大笔黄金来换得第二口奶酪！

Text: From the times of the Roman Empire, the consumption of cheese was tightly related with bloody gladiatorial battles. When the blood soaks the soil and the cries of the dying fill the air, the masses become exalted with the thought of buying and consuming unsavory amounts of cheese!
NewTranslation: 从遥远的罗马帝国时期开始，奶酪的消费就与血雨腥风的战争有着密不可分的关系。当淋漓的鲜血染遍大地，当死亡的哀鸣划破长空，人们便为购买和消费大量的奶酪的想法狂热不已！

Text: I personally made sure that every Tropican soldier swore an oath of fealty to the Tropican cheese in the presence of a priest and a Bible. I tell you, these lads are ready to give their lives for the national cheesy pride!
NewTranslation: 我以个人名义向您保证，每个岛上的士兵都要在牧师和圣经前立下神圣誓言:永远忠于海岛奶酪！我郑重地告知您，这些小伙子们准备好为奶酪的尊严而献身了。

Text: That did it, old bean! The Venezuelans are furious and are mobilizing their troops to invade Tropico!
NewTranslation: 我们办到了，老兄！委内瑞拉人十分愤怒并打算集结百万雄师入侵海岛！

Text: To earn immortality, a man can write his name in the scrolls of history with either blood or cheese.
NewTranslation: 为了永垂不朽，一个人可以用鲜血使自己名垂于青史之上，或者，用奶酪……

Text: Being a good-willed yet-to-be dictator, I decided that cheese is the better option.
NewTranslation: 作为一个讲求仁义的独裁者，我决定还是奶酪吧。

Text: For generations I will be remembered as the creator of the Tropican cheese.
NewTranslation: 世世代代我将被铭记-海岛奶酪之父！

Text: Our cheese would be better, much better than the Old World types, that everyone is fed off!
NewTranslation: 我们的奶酪将会更好，远超过那些旧世界的渣渣款式，能让人人以此为食！

Text: My cheese will be the cheesiest, the noblest of foods. The manna of heavens!
NewTranslation: 我的奶酪将成为奶酪中的贝爷，食品中的王者。对！天赐之物！

Text: Well, old chap, I see that you want to play with the big lads. Turning Tropico into a Caribbean superpower won't happen overnight. Luckily, you got me!
NewTranslation: 喂，老兄，听说你想和大家伙们玩玩。但是让海岛成为加勒比超级大国可不是一晚上能搞定的哦。幸亏，你有我！

Text: Howdy, partner! That fine gentleman Lord Oaksworth called me and made me a proposition I could not refuse.
NewTranslation: 你好，小伙伴！昔日的绅士欧克沃斯总管呼叫了我并且给了我一个不容拒绝的议题。

Text: Strike me blind, old bean! Our relations with the US couldn't get worse even if we tried!
NewTranslation: 闪瞎我狗眼了，老兄！我们跟美国的关系已经差到不能再差了！

Text: Comrade Presidente, the free people of Tropico are not alone in the struggle against the American imperialism!
NewTranslation: 总统吾友，海岛的自由人民在反对美帝的斗争中并不孤单！

Text: Comrade Presidente, the flower revolution in the States needs some stirring up. Our comrades need a symbol that will gather the public opinion around their cause and help them stop the war.
NewTranslation: 总统吾友，看来美帝国内的星星之火需要借点东风方可燎原。我们的同志需要一个能集聚民意的象征从而结束这场战争。

Text: Comrade Presidente, the imperialist propaganda is trying to smear us in front of our friends in the States. They... they are showing pictures of you sitting in a chair covered in natural leather!
NewTranslation: 总统吾友，美帝的喉舌美联社试图在我们的朋友面前丑化我们的形象。他们……他们竟然发布了您坐在貂皮王座上的艳照！

Text: Tally ho, old boy! While our lads are fighting the American troops on our shores I was having a tough fight keeping my liver going in some intense negotiations with the Soviets.
NewTranslation: 哟哟哟，老兄！当我们的小伙子在海岸线奋力扛住美军的同时，我也在战斗，我让我们的人跟苏联老大哥进行了一些亲密的磋商。

Text: Nazdarovya, my good sir! I have taken a liking to my diplomatic missions to the Kremlin!
NewTranslation: 祝你身体健康，我的好同志！我在克里姆林宫的外交任务取得了突破性进展！

Text: Old boy, the Soviets are angry with your lack of subordination to the five-year plan. They asked me whether I know how many frozen potatoes could be bought with the money they gave you to build an Aircraft Carrier.
NewTranslation: 老兄，苏联人对于您不配合他们的五年计划的行为感到生气。他们问我是否告诉过您，这些给您造航母的钱可以用来买多少冰镇土豆。

Text: Over the years, I managed to turn Tropico from a tiny backwater colony into a small outback country.
NewTranslation: 多年以来，我致力于将海岛从一个落后的殖民地发展成一个小的主权国家

Text: I had those sleepless nights when I was thinking how I can improve the reputation of my country to benefit us all.
NewTranslation: 无数个不眠之夜，我冥思苦想，到底该如何加强我国的威望使大家都从中受益呢？

Text: Then it hit me 鈥?turning Tropico into a superpower requires a symbol of its power.
NewTranslation: 然后一个念头闪过—海岛要成为超级大国就必须有一个大国的象征

Text: Every great country has one 鈥?the Americans have the Pentagon, the Russians 鈥?their Kremlin.
NewTranslation: 每个伟大的国家都有自己的象征—美国的五角大楼，俄罗斯的克里姆林宫

Text: But simply having the monument doesn't make you great. I needed a way to prove Tropican military might.
NewTranslation: 但是单纯的拥有纪念碑式的建筑并不会让你伟大，所以我还要想方设法去证明海岛的军容强盛。

Text: So I made a simple arrangement. Well, here's how it turned out.
NewTranslation: 所以我做了个简单的规划，好了，具体如下

Text: This is our most desperate hour. Help me, Comrade Presidente! You're my only hope!
NewTranslation: 这是最绝望的时刻。帮帮我，亲爱的总统！您是我唯一的希望了！

Text: Comrade Presidente, I fear that the Universe is trying to re-adjust itself back to its original course that will lead to our utter destruction!
NewTranslation: 总统吾友，恐怕宇宙意志想重置自己从而回到原来的状态，好让我们彻底被毁灭！

Text: Comrade Presidente, we have to make sure the Tropican dolphins develop a fond love of humanity before we send them to the future. Thus we will assure that they will step up for us when they meet with the aliens.
NewTranslation: 总统吾友，我们必须确保海岛的海豚们与人类建立了深厚的友谊，这样才能安心的把他们送到未来。如此这般，我们才能保证海豚大人在跟外星人交涉的时候为我们说话。

Text: Comrade Presidente, do you think the dolphins would enjoy recycled jelly for their four daily meals? Oh, by the look of your face, I think nobody enjoys that, really.
NewTranslation: 总统吾友，你认为海豚们会喜欢一日四餐吃的都是不明的胶状物吗？噢，看你的表情就知道了，没人愿意吃这种迷之食物，真的。

Text: When the alien fleet approached Earth, our energy readings went crazy. Our scans showed that ancient places emanated intense beams into the cosmos, possibly signaling the aliens.
NewTranslation: 外星人施工队接近地球的时候，我们的能量出现紊乱，数据显示异常，我们的自控装置显示，从古老的地方向宇宙发出了一道强束激光，可能是向外星人发送某种信号。

Text: Presidente, the expedition returned from the ancient ruins, but your dynasty member seems changed in a strange manner.
NewTranslation: 总统大人，探险队从远古遗迹顺利返航，但是你的家族成员样子看起来有点奇怪。

Text: Keep a stiff upper lip stiff, old chum, I say we're quite snookered. I've just got a shirty message from the Grin Pears, a radical eco-activist group. They say we better stop enslaving dolphins, or there will be consequences!
NewTranslation: 勇敢的面对吧，我的总统，这次我们遇到了一个巨大的阻挠。我刚收到来自著名的激进生态活动家团体“嬉笑之梨”的问候，他们建议我们最好停止奴役海豚，不然有我们好受的！

Text: Comrade Presidente, I sense a great disturbance in the time-space continuum! The universe struggles to keep the events back to their predetermined state, the odds are aligning against our efforts!
NewTranslation: 总统吾友，我感觉到了一股来自于时空太虚的强裂次元震！貌似宇宙意志发誓要让一切回归到业已决定的状态，宇宙变数再次调整，事态朝着不利于我们的方向发展！

Text: Comrade Presidente, we may have beaten the last attack of the Grin Pears, but they will soon come back for more. The predetermined course of events of the universe aligns the factors to urge them to strike again.
NewTranslation: 总统吾友，我们击退了“嬉笑之梨”的最后一波攻势，但是他们说“我们还会回来的”，并且承诺将派出更多数量的圣战者。宇宙意志跟诸多因素形成合力促使他们再度向我们进攻。

Text: The good Presidente puts the future of his people in the first place.
NewTranslation: 卓越的总统总是把人民的未来放在首位

Text: This is the reason why I decided to address the plea of a very unusual visitor.
NewTranslation: 为啥我要处理这个异常来访者的请求？这就是原因。

Text: In a flash of bright light she appeared out of thin air on the terrace of my palace.
NewTranslation: 刹那间强光一闪，她凭空“生成”在了我宫殿的阳台上。

Text: You can imagine my astonishment when she told me that I'm the only hope for the survival of the entire human race.
NewTranslation: 你能想象，当她告诉我，我才是人族延续下去的唯一希望时，我和小伙伴们都惊呆了。

Text: But when duty calls, the man of honor has no other option but to act!
NewTranslation: 但当使命召唤时，真汉子为了荣誉除了成就一番霸业还能有什么其他的选择吗！

Text: It's not that I hadn't saved the world many times over, right?
NewTranslation: 现在想来，我曾屡次拯救世界，是么？

Text: I want you to focus on a spot on the wall. Focus all of your awareness into it. Let nothing break your focus. Let everything else become blurry and distant. Breathe slowly.
NewTranslation: 深呼吸，看着那个墙上的斑点，将你所有的注意力集中在上面。现在你感到很放松，一切都十分遥远和模糊。慢慢吸气~吐气~吸气~吐气~

Text: Our session is complete. Now I will start counting down from ten to zero. When I reach zero, you will wake up and feel a much better person.
NewTranslation: 我们的催眠将结束了。现在我将从10倒数至0，当数到0的时候，你将会醒来并感觉更好了。

Text: From the way you are breathing and sweating, I can sense your discomfort. Your sub-consciousness is trying to resist getting rid of your vices. I will now touch you to make you feel better.
NewTranslation: 通过你的呼吸和出汗能，我能感到你的不适。你的潜意识正在试图抵挡摆脱你的恶习。我现在将摸摸你来使你感到更好些。

Text: I can sense your struggling with the concept of getting rid of your vices. We can do a simple exercise to help you focus while remaining completely relaxed. Just listen carefully.
NewTranslation: 我能感受到你试图改掉陋习时的努力。我们可以通过一个简单的练习来帮你在完全放松时集中注意力。仔细听着。

Text: A black llama and a white llama are standing on a meadow. The black llama goes to graze on leaves and the white llama to graze on straw.
NewTranslation: 一只黑色羊驼和一只白色羊驼一起站在草原上。黑羊驼去吃叶，白羊驼只吃茎

Text: How interesting. Now, the next question. A bag holds three anteaters.
NewTranslation: 多么有趣啊。现在，请听下一题。一只袋子里有三只食蚁兽。

Text: A black llama and a white llama are standing on a meadow. The black llama goes to graze on leaves and the white llama to graze on straw.
NewTranslation: 一只黑色羊驼和一只白色羊驼一起站在草原上。黑羊驼去吃叶，白羊驼只吃茎。

Text: It is time for a new control test. I want you to focus on this one and try to keep calm.
NewTranslation: 现在是时候进行新的控制测试了。我希望你能专注与此并试着保持平静。

Text: A black llama and a white llama are standing on a meadow. The white llama goes to graze on leaves and the black llama to graze on straw.
NewTranslation: 一只黑色羊驼和一只白色羊驼一起站在草原上。白羊驼去吃叶，黑羊驼只吃茎

Text: Good, good, now the next question: every year ten anteaters are born.
NewTranslation: 不错，不错，现在请听下一题:每年都有十只食蚁兽出生。

Text: A black llama and a white llama are standing on a meadow. The white llama goes to graze on leaves and the black llama to graze on straw.
NewTranslation: 一只黑色羊驼和一只白色羊驼一起站在草原上。白羊驼去吃叶，黑羊驼只吃茎

Text: Excellent, you are doing great so far. I want you to cherish this re-assuring feeling and remember it.
NewTranslation: 非常好，到目前为止，你都做的不错。我想让你珍惜这种安心的感觉，并牢牢记在心中。

Text: I see that you are feeling a bit uncomfortable and unfocused. You have to breathe deeply, relax and try to get more focused.
NewTranslation: 老夫观汝身体欠安，精神涣散，现有一法告知与汝:神舒体静，刻刻在心，呼吸精气，守中抱一。

Text: Accepting a panic attack for what it is can help to lessen its effect.
NewTranslation: 了解什么是恐慌将有效减小其影响。

Text: Hello. I am Doctor Fraud. I took personal interest in your case as it was very intriguing.
NewTranslation: 你好。我是弗莱迪医生(译者注:Fraud，欺诈)。我时刻关注你的经历，因为这十分有趣。

Text: I've seen quite a lot of Napoleons, Stalins and Julius Caesars during my career but that's completely new.
NewTranslation: 在我的职业生涯中见过不少的朱利叶斯·凯撒，拿破仑和斯大林~但从来没见过你这种的。

Text: You seem to be an incurable extreme megalomaniac and the president of a small Caribbean nation.
NewTranslation: 你似乎是个患有极端难治的自大症的加勒比小国总统。

Text: Since you are incurable, we will at least try to soften your bad sides.
NewTranslation: 虽然你的病无法痊愈，但我们觉得你还可以抢救下，至少可以减轻发病症状。

Text: Your friends, the advisors, called me to help them help you so that Tropico becomes at least barely tolerable to live in.
NewTranslation: 你的朋友，参谋长，邀请我加入他们来帮助你使海岛的居住环境变得至少能被忍受。

Text: With the help of a deep hypnotic state I will help you get rid of your vices. Let us begin.
NewTranslation: 我会用深度催眠来帮你摆脱你的陋习，你准备好了吗~？

Text: Mr. President, you know my opinion on capitalizing on cheap food 鈥?it's great! I still hope you know about the potential dangers of attracting the animosity of the fast food's greatest competition 鈥?the Slow-Food Joint.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，你知道的，我的关于善用廉价食物的想法那是相当不错！但我人希望你能慎重考虑，因为这可能会引起快餐最大敌人慢食联盟的注意。

Text: Mr. President, while you're thinking the delicious, savory fast food is an advertisement enough on itself, I think we can stir the crowds into an even greater feeding frenzy.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，在你考虑美味可口的快餐是否足够成为其自身的广告时，我想我们可以激起一波民众的进食狂潮。

Text: Mr. President, there comes a time for us all to think about the international effort to save the planet. Especially when it will allow us to bleed our customers dry!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们曾一度思考通过国际影响来拯救地球。尤其是它将允许我们榨干所有的客户时！

Text: Mr. President, we don't want to give the impressions that our Fast Food Joints are mere feeding pens. The customers should never know the truth!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我们都不想让人们觉得我们的快餐店只是喂养牲口的地方。决不能让顾客们知道真相！

Text: Mr. President, I had the gut feeling that the Slow Food is plotting against us and I was right 鈥?they just made their dirty move, spreading rumors about the unhealthy qualities of the fast food.
NewTranslation: 总统先生，我一直觉得慢食联盟在策划推翻我们，事实证明我是对的–他们卑鄙地散布快餐不利于身心健康的谣言来抹黑我们。

Text: Mr. President, here is what the Slow-Food Joint came up with. If they weren't our competition and I could feel any humanly emotion, I would've fallen in love with the way they think!
NewTranslation: 总统先生，慢食联盟又有一个点子啦。如果我和他们不是竞争对手，而我又能拥有人类的感情，我会深深爱上他们……的思维方式！

Text: Ha, I begin to think the Slow Food chain is really slow. I've been trolling them on MugBook all day.
NewTranslation: 哈！我渐渐开始觉得慢食联盟实在太慢了。我已在“非活不可”上吐槽他们一整天了。

Text: Even El Presidente can afford a small vacation from time to time.
NewTranslation: 甚至总统先生都能时不时得来段度假。

Text: My visit in the United States introduced me to a particularly fascinating aspect of their culture and cuisine 鈥?Fast Food!
NewTranslation: 我在美国访问的时候，我了解到了美国文化非常吸引人的独特一面，他们美味的快餐！

Text: I was so impressed of the attempts of the Fast-Food chains to feed the poor and starving that I took their mission kindly to my heart.
NewTranslation: 他们的快餐产业为供养穷人和饥饿人民所付出的努力让我印象深刻，所以我牢牢记住了他们的使命。

Text: I immediately headed back to Tropico to introduce the idea of delicious, savory fast food...
NewTranslation: 我立刻返回海岛，将这个想法引入了美味，开胃的快餐产业当中……

Text: Little did I know that I鈥檓 getting involved in the fight with the ominous Slow-Food Joint...
NewTranslation: 但是我却不知道我已经被卷入了与那些不详传统饭店的会战中……

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 title

Text: Presidente, you are the best leader anyone could wish for! With you in charge, all our dreams are fulfilled.
NewTranslation: 总统大人，你是我见过的最好的领导者！只要你还在，我们所有的梦想都能实现。

Text: The next tutorial will teach you about economics, research and stashing money in your Swiss Bank account.
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T1 text
NewTranslation: 下一个教程将教给你关于经济，研究和如何将钱存入瑞士银行账户的知识

Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 title

Text: Presidente, you are like a good father to the entire Tropican nation. Some may say that you're just too good.
NewTranslation: 总统，你就像一位伟大的海岛共和国国父。或许有人会说你好过头了。

Text: The final tutorial will teach you how to keep those pesky Tropicans happy, deal with the political factions on the island and stay in power!
Context: Scenario Isla grande lago T2 text
NewTranslation: 最后一部分教程将教你如何取悦那些让人讨厌的岛民，如何与岛上其他政派打交道并保证你的权利！

Text: Continue to breathe slowly. Your happy place seems to be a mental asylum. Everything about this is perfectly fine. Feel relaxed, nobody is judging you. Everything is alright.
NewTranslation: 持续进行深呼吸。使你感到愉悦的地方似乎是个疯人院。额，似乎这很正常。嘿~放松点，哥们，没人会歧视你的，一切都很正常。

Text: Choose a display resolution for the game
Choose a refresh rate for your monitor
Synchronize the game frame rate with the monitor refresh rate
NewTranslation: 游戏帧数与显示器刷新率同步

Text: Choose a predefined visual quality level
Choose the render size to be upscaled to the game resolution
NewTranslation: 选择适合于游戏分辨率的渲染尺寸

Text: Choose the method of smoothing for object edges
Choose the sharpness of building and terrain textures in the distance
NewTranslation: 设置远处的建筑物和地形纹理清晰度

Text: Choose the view distance of the game
Choose the level of detail for textures
Choose quality of water in the game

NewTranslation: 关闭效果达到游戏的运行流畅度

Text: Enable or disable the shadow from the clouds
Set the volume of sound effects
Set the volume of voice messages
Set the volume of the background music
Invert the zoom direction of the mouse wheel
Invert the camera tilt direction with the controller
NewTranslation: 将鼠标调节镜头方向反向
将鼠标旋转镜头方向反向

Text: Unspecified error occurred (code %s1). The game will now close.
NewTranslation: 未指定的错误(code %s1)。游戏现在将关闭。

Text: You need a supported DX11-compatible video card with a recent driver to play this game.
NewTranslation: 你的显卡必须支持DX11才能运行此游戏。

Text: Failed to retrieve the additional game content!
NewTranslation: 未能检索额外的游戏内容！

Text: Failed to retrieve the game achievements!
A storage device containing downloadable content is no longer available. The title will be restarted.
NewTranslation: 含有可下载的内容储存器不再可用。标题将重新启动。

Text: A downloadable content file appears to be damaged and cannot be loaded. Please delete it from the Memory section of the Dashboard and download it again.
NewTranslation: 下载的内容中文件可能损坏，无法加载。请从控制器的内存段中删除并重新下载。

Text: Only a single component of that type may be present.
NewTranslation: 可能存在一个单一的组件的类型。

Text: A new downloadable content package has been installed. The title must be restarted in order for the new content to appear in game.
NewTranslation: 新的DLC内容已安装。重新返回标题以在游戏里面显示新内容。

Text: A storage device containing downloadable content is no longer available. The title will be restarted.
NewTranslation: 一个包含DLC的存储设备不再可用，将返回到标题画面。

Text: There was a problem with loading your saved game.
There was a problem with loading your saved game.
The storage device you selected is no longer available. Loading your game failed.
NewTranslation: 所选储存设备不可用，游戏加载失败。

Text: There was a problem with loading the game progress file.
NewTranslation: 游戏进度文件夹载入错误。

Text: There was a problem with loading the game progress file.
NewTranslation: 游戏进度文件夹载入错误。

Text: The storage device you selected is no longer available. Loading the game progress file failed.
NewTranslation: 所选储存设备不可用，游戏加载失败。

Text: There was a problem with saving your game.
There is not enough space on the storage device you selected.
NewTranslation: 所选储存设备空间不足。

Text: Your save game file appears to be damaged and there was a problem while trying to delete it. Please delete it from the Memory section of the Dashboard instead. You will not be able to save until you do so.
NewTranslation: 游戏储存文件夹受损删除失败，只有从控制面板的存储区删除后才能储存游戏。

Text: The storage device you selected is no longer available. You will not be able to save your game until a valid storage device is selected.
NewTranslation: 所选储存设备不可用，有效储存设备选择后才能储存游戏。

Text: There was a problem with saving your game progress.
There is not enough space on the storage device you selected.
NewTranslation: 所选储存设备空间不足。

Text: Your game progress file appears to be damaged and there was a problem while trying to delete it. Please delete it from the Memory section of the Dashboard instead. You will not be able to save until you do so.
NewTranslation: 游戏进度储存文件夹受损删除失败，只有从控制面板的存储区删除后才能储存游戏进度。

Text: The storage device you selected is no longer available. You will not be able to save your game progress until a valid storage device is selected.
NewTranslation: 所选储存设备不可用，有效储存设备选择后才能储存游戏进度。

Text: Your game progress file was damaged and could not be loaded. It will be automatically overwritten.
NewTranslation: 游戏进度文件夹损坏无法加载，将被自动覆盖

NewTranslation: 删除受损游戏进度文件夹错误，请从储存位置删除

Text: There was a problem with loading the game progress file.
NewTranslation: 游戏进度文件载入错误。

Text: There was a problem with loading your saved game.
Your game progress file was damaged and could not be loaded. It will be automatically overwritten.

NewTranslation: 游戏储存文件夹损坏无法加载，将被自动删除。

Text: There was a problem with deleting your damaged game progress file. Please delete it from the Memory section of the Dashboard.
NewTranslation: 删除受损游戏进度文件夹错误，请从储存位置删除

Text: There was a problem with deleting your damaged  save game file. Please delete it from the Memory section of the Dashboard.
NewTranslation: 删除受损游戏储存文件夹错误，请从储存位置删除

Text: The storage device you selected is no longer available. Loading your game failed.
NewTranslation: 所选储存设备不可用，游戏载入失败。

Text: There is already a game progress file on this device. Do you want to overwrite it or select a different storage device?
NewTranslation: 设备已存在游戏进度文件夹，你要覆盖或是重新选择储存设备？

Text: The connection to Xbox LIVE has been lost.
There was a network connectivity problem while trying to download challenge data. Please try again later.
NewTranslation: 下载挑战数据时发生网络错误，请稍后重试。

Text: There was a network connectivity problem while trying to download a challenge. Please try again later.
NewTranslation: 下载挑战时发生网络错误，请稍后重试

Text: There was a network connectivity problem while accessing the leaderboard. Please try again later.
NewTranslation: 连接排行榜网络错误，请稍后重试。

Text: There was a network connectivity problem. Your score has not been submitted.
NewTranslation: 网络错误，你的分数未能上传。

Text: There was a network connectivity problem while trying to download DLC data. Please try again later.
NewTranslation: 下载DLC时网络错误，请稍后重试。

Text: There was a network connectivity problem. Please try again later.
NewTranslation: 发生网络错误，请稍后重试

Text: You have not submitted your score. You will lose this score if you choose to cancel.
NewTranslation: 未能上传分数，点击取消会丢失成绩。

Text: You must be connected to Xbox LIVE to access this feature
NewTranslation: 只有连接到Xbox LIVE才能访问此功能。

Text: All active players must be connected to Xbox LIVE to access this feature
NewTranslation: 必须所有玩家连接到Xbox LIVE才能访问此功能。

Text: The Multiplayer privilege for your profile must be enabled in order to access this feature
NewTranslation: 访问此功能必须开启多人游戏特权。

Text: All active players must have their multiplayer privileges enabled in order to access this feature
NewTranslation: 必须所有玩家开启多人游戏特权才能访问此功能。

Text: You are not signed in to an Xbox 360 gamer profile. You will be unable to save any game content until you sign in.
NewTranslation: 没有登录Xbox 360玩家文件夹，未登录前不能储存游戏内容。

Text: The selected storage device is not available. Do you want to choose a different storage device?
NewTranslation: 选择的储存设备不可用，你要另外选择一个吗？

Text: The selected storage device is not available. Do you want to choose a different storage device?
NewTranslation: 选择的储存设备不可用，你要另外选择一个吗？

Text: You will not be able to save because no storage device was selected.
NewTranslation: 不能储存游戏因为没有选择储存设备。

Text: There is already a game progress file on this device. Do you want to overwrite it or select a different storage device?
NewTranslation: 设备上已存在游戏进度文件，你要覆盖或是重新选择储存设备？

Text: You need DirectX 11 and a DirectX 11-capable graphics card to run this game.
NewTranslation: 你需要DirectX 11和DirectX 11的显卡才能运行此游戏。

Text: You need an OpenGL 3.2-capable graphics card to run this game.
NewTranslation: 你的显卡必须支持OpenGL 3.2才能运行此游戏
图形子系统初始化失败。

Text: A required DLC was not found.
Your game progress file is damaged and cannot be loaded.
NewTranslation: 游戏进度文件夹受损不能加载。

Text: This savegame requires a DLC that is not installed.
NewTranslation: 已储存游戏需要的DLC未安装。

Text: You can not enter multiplayer as the multiplayer privileges have been turned off on this profile.
NewTranslation: 不能进入多人游戏，该文件夹多人游戏已关闭。

Text: The multiplayer game could not be started because one of the players is missing a required DLC.
NewTranslation: 多人游戏未能开始因为玩家之一缺少需求DLC。

Text: Checking for downloadable content... Please wait.
NewTranslation: 检查可下载内容... 请耐心等待。

Text: Not enough free disk space in
Do you want to delete all savegames, configuration data and DLCs?
NewTranslation: 确认删除所有的游戏存档、配置文件和DLC吗？

Text: <game> was successfully removed from your computer.
There is already a game settings file on this device. Do you want to overwrite it or select a different storage device?
NewTranslation: 此设备已经存在游戏的设置文件，你要覆盖或是重新选择储存设备？
